[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@##/_/rnying rgyud ka pa bzhugs so//
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D828}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba d+harma ma hA san+ti bo d+hi tsit+ta ku la ya rA dzA/_bod skad du/_chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[1b.2\]]rgyal po/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/_'og min gyi gnas chos nyid kyi mkha' 
[\[1b.3\]]dbyings nyid kyi klong sems nyid kyi gnas ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i gzhal yas khang na nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo dang /_nyid kyi thugs rje ye shes mngon du 
[\[1b.4\]]phyung ba'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_
[\[1b.5\]]nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chu zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku me zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo'i 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rlung zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor 'di 
[\[2a.2\]]lta ste/_'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_gzhan yang nyid kyi rang bzhin 
[\[2a.3\]]la lta ba'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/_shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_yongs su rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /_sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor 
[\[2a.4\]]dang /_nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo dang /_nyid kyi thugs rje rang bzhin 'byed pa mi mnga' bas thabs cig go/_/gzhan yang nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/_sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa'i 
[\[2a.5\]]'khor dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa'i 'khor dang /_slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las 'byung ba'i 'khor dang /_'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis thabs cig par bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[2a.6\]]byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'khor thams cad nyid kyi sems nyid kyi thugs la thim par mdzad do/_/rang 'byung gi ye shes gsal bar mdzad do/_/de nas thams 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]cad chos nyid du ldan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad bsdus nas thig le chen po gcig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas sems dpa' de nyid kyi rang bzhin thig le chen po gcig tu bzhugs pa de las byung nas/_byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar 
[\[2b.2\]]dga' ba'i sems kyis dang ba'i mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la smras pa/_sems dpa' rdo rje e ma ho/_/dga' ba'i sems skyes e ma ho/_/dang ba'i mdangs phyung e ma ho/_/nga las 
[\[2b.3\]]byung ba e ma ho/_/zhes gsungs pas/_de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/_kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/ston pa nyid kyang thig le spros med dam/_/'khor rnams kun kyang thig le spros med dam/_/bstan pa kun 
[\[2b.4\]]kyang thig le spros med dam/_/dus dang gnas kyang thig le spros med dam/_/thams cad kun kyang thig le'i rang bzhin na/_/ston pa'i ston pas ci zhig ston par mdzad/_/'khor du 'khor ba'i don ni ci la 'khor/_/'khor la bstan pa ci zhig ston 
[\[2b.5\]]par byed/_/dus dang gnas ni gcig pa ji lta bu zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po yid sgra la chug cig_/ngas don sgrar bshad kyis/_kye 
[\[2b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po/_sems nyid kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni/_/chos rnams thams cad kun gyi snying po ste/_/snying po ma spros ye nas thig le yin/_/thig le ye nas spros pa med pa'i don/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor dus gnas/_/
[\[2b.7\]]nga las byung bas ye nas thig le ste/_/nga yi rang bzhin thig le bstan pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]chos thams cad nyid las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba la gnas par mdzad do/_/de nas 'khor gyi rang bzhin las sems dpa' rdo rje langs nas ston pa byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i zhal du mdangs phyung ste 'khod nas 
[\[3a.2\]]zhus pa/_kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/khyod kyi 'khor du bdag 'dus 'khod pa ste/_/bdag ni 'tshal ba'i don ni ci zhig mchis/_/bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi 
[\[3a.3\]]sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin dang /_nyid kyi ngo bo dang /_nyid kyi thugs rje las chos thams cad bkod pa ni nyid kyi rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po gcig las rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po lnga byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_zhe sdang rang 'byung ye shes 
[\[3a.4\]]chen po dang /_'dod chags rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /_gti mug rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /_phrag dog rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /_nga rgyal rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang /_rang 'byung gi ye shes lnga po des rgyan gyi rgyu 
[\[3a.5\]]chen po lnga ni phyung /_'jig rten brten pa'i khams chen po gsum ni bkod de/_rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus lnga gcig tu blangs pa 'di lta ste/_rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus sa zhes bya ba'i lus dang /_rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus chu zhes bya ba'i lus dang /_rgyan gyi rgyu'i 
[\[3a.6\]]lus me zhes bya ba'i lus dang /_rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus rlung zhes bya ba'i lus dang /_rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i lus la gcig tu lus thams cad blangs/_ye shes lnga'i rigs so sor phye ste/_rang 'byung ye shes zhe sdang gi 
[\[3a.7\]]rigs dang /_rang 'byung ye shes 'dod chags kyi rigs dang /_rang 'byung ye shes gti mug gi rigs dang /_rang 'byung ye shes phrag dog gi rigs dang /_rang 'byung ye shes nga rgyal gyi rigs dang /_rang 'byung ye shes lnga'i rigs 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]lus rgyan gyi lus can gyi chos nyid bkod do/_/byang chub kyi sems dpa' kun byed rgyal po de nyid kyang nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi chos nyid bkod pa de bzhin du bzhugs so/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar yang 
[\[3b.2\]]'dug nas/_kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las/_/rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga byung nas/_/de las rgyan gyi rgyu lnga byung nas ni/_/ye shes lnga yi lus lnga blangs pa 'dis/_/kun 
[\[3b.3\]]byed rgyal po'i dgos pa ci zhig che/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des slar gsungs pa/_kye sems dpa' chen po dgos pa ni/_/kun byed rgyal po byed mkhan nga las ni/_/ma gtogs pa yi byed 
[\[3b.4\]]mkhan gzhan na med/_/chos nyid byed pa yang ni nga las med/_/ston pa gsum yang 'god pa nga las med/_/'khor gyi tshogs yang 'god pa nga las med/_/de bzhin chos nyid 'god pa nga las med/_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la nga yis 
[\[3b.5\]]ni/_/nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya/_/nga la rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yod de/_/nga yi rang bzhin byang chub sems yin no/_/byang ba dag gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/phun sum tshogs pa rnam gsum chos nyid byang /_/chub pa 
[\[3b.6\]]dag gi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/dgos pa tshogs pa rnam pa gsum gyis ni/_/nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab par gnas/_/sems zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/mi 'gag ma lus kun byed rgyal po ste/_/kun byas byang chub 
[\[3b.7\]]sems su ma lus byas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos nyid mngon du phyung nas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]sngon rol du byed pa po nga byung ba 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po yid rna dbang la zhugs cig_/rna dbang sgra la rtogs shig_/kye nga ni kun byed rgyal po ste/_/nga ni kun byed byang chub sems/_/nga med pa yi sngon rol 
[\[4a.2\]]na/_/chos rnams 'byung ba'i snying po med/_/nga med pa yi sngon rol na/_/chos kun byed pa'i rgyal po med/_/nga med pa yi sngon rol na/_/ston pa bya ba ye nas med/_/nga med pa yi sngon rol na/_/bstan pa bya ba ye nas med/_/nga med pa yi sngon 
[\[4a.3\]]rol na/_/'khor zhes bya ba ye nas med/_/sems dpa' rdo rje rtog ma skye/_/sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid kyang /_/nga yi ngo bo sprul pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la zhus pa/_kye kun 
[\[4a.4\]]byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/khyod ni ye nas chen po yin/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang /_/'khor la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun/_/byed mkhan khyod kyis byas pas na/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/byed mkhan khyod kyis byas par snang /_/
[\[4a.5\]]ston pa gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod/_/bstan pa gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod/_/'khor rnams gcig gam rnam pa du ru yod/_/ces zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/_kye rang 'byung ye shes kun gyi 
[\[4a.6\]]ston par gcig_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum snang ba la/_/ston pa'i grangs ni rnam pa gsum du byung /_/nga ni de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las/_/chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid/_/nga nyid byang chub sems las gzhan med do/_/nga 
[\[4a.7\]]las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/'khor la bstan pa rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/nga yi ngo bo gcig tu phyung nas ni/_/nga yi rang bzhin gcig tu bstan pa'i phyir/_/kun byed nga yi 'khor du kun kyang gcig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gyis/_/'khor gyi bye brag rnam pa gsum du yod/_/ces gsungs so/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/_kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/khyod las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum la/_/khyod sar 'gro ba'i lam ni yod dam med/_/med 
[\[4b.2\]]na khyod kyis sa ru phyin mi phyin/_/yod na bgrod nas phyin nam ma bgrod phyin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum la/_/nga yis ru bgrod pa'i lam med de/_/nga yi rang byung ye shes bstan pa yin/_/sku gsum ston pa 
[\[4b.3\]]de yi 'khor rnams la/_/rnam par thar pa'i lam ni rnam lnga ste/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi lam du bstan/_/rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi lam lnga ni/_/'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal dang ni phrag dog rnam lnga ste/_/rang 
[\[4b.4\]]'byung ye shes rnam lnga kun gyi lam/_/zhes gsungs so/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/rang 'byung ye shes lam lnga bstan pa de/_/rang 'byung zhes ni ji ltar byung ba lags/_/ye shes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ci la gdags/_/lam 
[\[4b.5\]]zhes bgyi ba'i don ni gang la bgyi/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang /_/phrag dog la sogs rnam pa lnga po de/_/lam lnga yin pa'i don ni bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga 
[\[4b.6\]]lam ni/_/rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med par byung ba yin/_/ye shes 'gag pa med par gsal ba yin/_/lam ni rgyu rkyen med pas bgrod mi dgos/_/mi bgrod rang 'byung lnga la lam lngar bshad/_/'dod pa chos rnams bdag tu 'dod pa yin/_/chags 
[\[4b.7\]]pa bdag tu 'dod pa de la chags/_/zhe ba skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/sdang ba cho 'phrul sna tshogs de la sdang /_/gti mug mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la dbye bsal med/_/nga ni ma nor ba yi byang chub sems/_/de bzhin 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]nyid du ye nas rgyal bar byed/_/thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la/_/yin min sgro skur 'debs la phrag dog byed/_/bgrod du med pa'i lam lnga bstan pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos 
[\[5a.2\]]rnams thams cad kun/_/rang 'byung ye shes lam lnga 'di las byung /_/'dod pa'i khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/gzugs kyi khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/gzugs med khams kyang rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/kun byed rgyal po 
[\[5a.3\]]nga yis byas pa'i phyir/_/ngas byas thams cad ye shes ngo bor bshad/_/khams gsum sems can rgyud drug thams cad kun/_/rang 'byung ye shes min par ngas ma bshad/_/de las ma gtogs pa yi byang chub sems/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mes 
[\[5a.4\]]po ngas ma bshad/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin la/_/chos nyid rnam pa gsum du bstan pa ste/_/ma skyes pa yi chos nyid dngos mi snang /_/de ni gzugs med khams su bstan pa yin/_/skye ba'i cho 'phrul gzugs su snang ba ni/_/de ni gzugs kyi 
[\[5a.5\]]khams su bstan pa yin/_/thugs rje ye shes ngo bo mngon phyung nas/_/bde sdug las de thugs rjes zad bya'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i khams ni thugs rjes phyung ba yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad kun 
[\[5a.6\]]byed rgyal pos byas pa las ji ltar byung ba'i khungs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin mtshan gyi chos bshad pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig_/nga ni 
[\[5a.7\]]ye nas rang 'byung ye shes te/_/nga ni ye nas chos kun snying po yin/_/nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/nga yi mtshan 'di sems dpa' rtogs par gyis/_/nga yi mtshan 'di sems dpas rtogs 'gyur na/_/chos rnams thams cad ma lus rtogs 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]'gyur gyis/_/nga zhes bya ba'i snying po ste/_/chos rnams kun gyi snying po yin/_/rang 'byung zhes ni bya ba ni/_/rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po pas/_/rtsol sgrub kun las 'das pa yin/_/ye shes zhes ni bya ba ni/_/'gag pa med cing ma bsgribs pas/_/chos 
[\[5b.2\]]kun ma lus ston par byed/_/nga ni byang chub sems la bya/_/ye nas bya ba'i don 'di ni/_/thog ma nyid nas gnas pa'i don/_/chos kun zhes ni bya ba ni/_/ston pa kun kyang chos nyid la/_/bstan pa kun kyang chos nyid yin/_/'khor gnas dus 
[\[5b.3\]]kyang chos nyid de/_/chos nyid ma yin gcig kyang med/_/snying po bya ba'i don 'di ni/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po ste/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/ston pa gsum yang de las byung /_/bstan pa gsum yang de las byung /_/'khor 
[\[5b.4\]]gnas dus kyang de las byung /_/thams cad 'byung ba'i snying por bshad/_/nga ni snying po sems nyid kyis/_/chos rnams ma lus kun byed de/_/kun zhes bya ba'i chos rnams kun/_/chos kun gang dang gang zhe na/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang /_/'khor 
[\[5b.5\]]gnas dus ni thams cad kun/_/byed ces bya ba mkhan po ste/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa dang /_/'khor gnas dus ni kun byed pas/_/rang 'byung ye shes mkhan po yin/_/rgyal po zhes ni bya ba ni/_/snying po rang 'byung ye shes de/_/byed pa'i mkhan po 
[\[5b.6\]]kun las rgyal/_/chos rnams byed mkhan kun las rgyal/_/byang ba'i don ni 'di lta ste/_/snying po byang chub sems de ni/_/rang 'byung ye nas rnam dag pas/_/kun byed rgyal pos byas pa kun/_/kun bzang nyid du rnam dag pas/_/byang zhes bya 
[\[5b.7\]]bar bshad pa yin/_/chub ces bya ba 'di lta ste/_/snying po rang 'byung ye shes des/_/snang ba dang ni srid pa dang /_/snod dang bcud kyis bsdus pa dang /_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/khams gsum rgyud drug sems can dang /_/
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]de bzhin nyid ni thams cad la/_/kun la chub ste khyab par gnas/_/des na chub ces bya bar bshad/_/sems kyi don ni 'di lta ste/_/snying po rang 'byung ye shes des/_/snang srid snod bcud thams cad la/_/'jug cing dbang sgyur 
[\[6a.2\]]gsal bar gcod/_/des na sems zhes bya bar bshad/_/rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying po des/_/kun la dbang sgyur thams cad byed/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga yi rang bzhin rtogs gyur na/_/ston pa kun kyang rtogs 'gyur la/_/bstan pa 
[\[6a.3\]]kun kyang rtogs par 'gyur/_/'khor gyi bsam pa rig 'gyur la/_/dus gnas kun kyang gcig 'gyur rig_/chos rnams thams cad nga yin pas/_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di rig na/_/chos rnams thams cad rig 'gyur bas/_/bya byed rtsol 
[\[6a.4\]]sgrub kun las 'das/_/mi rtsol lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las nga nyid kyi mtshan bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje 
[\[6a.5\]]la nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i mdo 'dus pa'i don 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di lta ste/_/yod ni gcig las med pa ste/_/bstan ni rnam pa gnyis su bstan/_/byung ni theg pa dgu ru byung /_/'dus ni 
[\[6a.6\]]rdzogs pa chen por 'dus/_/yin ni byang chub sems yin te/_/gnas ni chos nyid dbyings la gnas/_/gsal ni rig pa mkha' la gsal/_/khyab ni snod bcud kun la khyab/_/byung ni snang srid kun du byung /_/bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po 
[\[6a.7\]]med/_/mthong du dmigs pa'i yul dang bral/_/shes su tshig tu brjod du med/_/rgyu las ma byung snying po 'di/_/sgros kyis btags pa kun dang bral/_/don 'di nges par rtogs 'dod na/_/dpe ni nam mkha' lta bur brtag_/don ni chos nyid skye 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ba med/_/rtags ni sems nyid 'gag pa med/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid la/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon/_/dmigs su med pa'i chos nyid la/_/dmigs su med par mtshon te bstan/_/tshig tu brjod du med pa la/_/brjod du 
[\[6b.2\]]med pa'i tshig brjod de/_/dmigs med don gyi ngo bor bstan/_/bsdus te bstan pa'i don 'di ni/_/don gyi ngo bo 'grel pa ste/_/'di yis nga don rtogs par gyis/_/'di yis nga don rtogs par byed/_/'di yis nga don ma rtogs na/_/don gyi sgra tshig 
[\[6b.3\]]ci bstan kyang /_/nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/_/nga las gol la nga bsgribs pas/_/chos kyi snying po mthong mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las don gyi 'grel pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang 
[\[6b.4\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin la rdzogs pa chen po de bstan pa'i tshig gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje tshig 'di nyon/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/nga yi chos rnams dang por bkod/_/nga yi chos rnams mngon 
[\[6b.5\]]du phyung /_/nga yi ngo bo khyod la bstan/_/nga yi rang bzhin bstan nas ni/_/tshig dang sgras kyang don mtshon nas/_/ngo bo bstan pas khyod kyis mthong /_/rang bzhin bstan pas a de rig_/tshig tu brjod pas don sgrar thos/_/zhes gsungs nas 
[\[6b.6\]]cang mi gsung bar chos thams cad kyi ngo bor bzhugs so/_/sems dpa' rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal bo zhal du mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas kun byed rgyal pos/_kye sems dpa' chen po khyod nga la 
[\[6b.7\]]mdangs kyis 'khor pa de khyed kyis don ci 'dod pa gsol cig_/ces gsungs so/_de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/_kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal bo lags/_chos rnams thams cad khyed kyi rang bzhin na/_/khyod kyi ston pa bstan 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]pa 'khor bkod ci zhig lags/_phun sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa ci zhig lags/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal bos 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/chos rnams 
[\[7a.2\]]phun sum tshogs par bkod pa ni/_/nga nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin te/_/nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya/_/nga yi rang bzhin spros bral mi phyed pas/_/chos dbyings gnas 'di nga yis byas pa yin/_/byang chub nyid las de na gzhan mi 
[\[7a.3\]]bzhugs/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma bsgribs kun khyab pas/_/gsal ba'i nam mkha' ye shes gzhal yas khang /_/rang 'byung ye shes nyid las gzhan mi bzhugs/_/nga ni thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po bas/_/chen po lnga dang khams gsum rgyud drug 
[\[7a.4\]]rnams/_/nga yi sku gsung thugs las gzhan med pas/_/nga yi rang bzhin nga yis bkod pa yin/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can yang /_/nga yi rang bzhin khyed la bstan pa yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma skyes spros bral phyir/_/
[\[7a.5\]]mi gnas spyod yul kun las 'das pa yin/_/mi snang ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i yul las 'das/_/nga yi rang bzhin khyed la mi snang yang /_/nga yi ngo bo khyod la snang byas pas/_/khams gsum chen po lnga dang rgyud drug rnams/_/snang ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[7a.6\]]byang chub sems lnga las/_/rang 'byung snying po ye shes lnga byung bas/_/ye shes lnga yi yul lnga gsal byung bas/_/'dod pa lnga byung chags pa lnga byung nas/_/chags lnga so sor smin pa'i 'bras bu ni/_/'gro ba drug gi khyad par so sor snang /_/'di 
[\[7a.7\]]ltar snang ba nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin/_/sku gsum theg pa rnam pa drug bstan pa/_/nga yis bstan na khyed kyis ma mthong ste/_/de re nga yi rang bzhin re re la/_/de re nga yi ngo bo re re ste/_/sku re dang ni gsung re thugs re dang /_/kun gyis mthong ba'i ngo 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]bo re re'o/_/de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/_/yang dag kun gyi ngo bo byang chub ngas/_/spros med dbyings kyi ngo bo nga yin la/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas chen nga yin pas/_/rol pa khams gsum rgyud drug nga las shar/_/bde dang sdug bsngal las 
[\[7b.2\]]kyi khyad par te/_/yang dag ma nor nga yi thugs rje bstan/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams la/_/kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan mi bya/_/nga yi lung 'di nges par bstan byas na/_/dge sdig las la rgyu 'bras yod zer nas/_/yang dag nga la sgro dang skur 
[\[7b.3\]]btab pas/_/yang dag nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur/_/nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems kyis byas/_/khams gsum sems can byang chub sems kyis byas/_/snang 
[\[7b.4\]]srid snod bcud byang chub sems kyis byas/_/rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas/_/rgyu yi dus na 'byung chen lnga byas la/_/'bras bu'i dus na khams gsum sems can byas/_/dpe yi dus na kun dpe nam mkha' byed/_/don gyi dus na kun don 
[\[7b.5\]]skye med byed/_/rtags kyi dus na kun byed byang chub sems/_/gtan tshigs dus na rang 'byung ye shes ston/_/rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas/_/byang chub sems kyis kun byas gcig ma byas/_/kun byas byang chub nyid kyi rang bzhin 
[\[7b.6\]]byas/_/gcig ma byas pa nyid la bya mi dgos/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma brtags par/_/nga yis byas pa'i chos la nges brtags pas/_/brkam zhing chags pa'i dbang gis snang ba 'grub/_/mi rtag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/_/cha med dmu 
[\[7b.7\]]long lta bu'i rang bzhin no/_/kun byed rgyal pos byas par mi cha bar/_/dbang po drug la yul drug snang ba la/_/sdug bsngal mthong nas dbang po 'gegs par byed/_/des ni kun byed byas pa mi cha bas/_/skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu de la med/_/nges pa 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]gcig la bden pa gnyis byung nas/_/kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos nyid la/_/don dam kun rdzob bden pa gnyis byung bas/_/bden pa gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras yong mi mnga'/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i 'bras bud la med/_/med par 
[\[8a.2\]]tshol ba dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang /_/mi 'byung cho 'phrul yan lag bsgom mnga' bas/_/blang dor med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa med/_/don gcig ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgom byed pas/_/bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi rim par sgom byed pas/_/rtsol sgrub 
[\[8a.3\]]'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med/_/lhun gyis grub pas bya byed kun dang bral/_/skye med mtshon med gdags med de brjod pas/_/sgros skur bral ba'i brjod med de rig byed/_/chos kun byang chub sems yin de dpe ni/_/kun dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i rang 
[\[8a.4\]]bzhin du/_/byang chub sems kyi don yang de bzhin no/_/nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga/_/byang chub sems las rmad byung mngon sangs rgyas/_/srid gsum lam lnga 'gro drug snang ba yang /_/rnam smin las kyis mi bskyod mngon sangs rgyas/_/
[\[8a.5\]]khams gsum ye nas byang chub sku gsung thugs/_/de bas snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/_/nam mkha'i ngang na mi gnas med pa bzhin/_/byang chub sems kyi klong chen yul che bas/_/sangs rgyas sems can snod bcud kun kyang gnas/_/
[\[8a.6\]]thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid la/_/gnyis su med de sgro skur kun dang bral/_/gang gis med pa'i snying po sems ma mthong /_/bskal pa du mar don dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems su gcig_/sangs rgyas sems can 
[\[8a.7\]]snang srid snod bcud kun/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i byang chub snying po la/_/gcig tu med las bgrangs na brjod mi lang /_/sangs rgyas sku gsung sems can lus ngag kyang /_/byang chub sems yin ye nas gzung 'dzin bral/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gang gis grub pa de/_/des ni kun grub chos kyi rtsa ba grub/_/byang chub sems kyi mdo rtsa gcig pu la/_/sems shing rtog la dga' bas rnam par bgrangs/_/gnyis dang grangs la dga' la nga yis bstan/_/ji bzhin rang bzhin chos nyid sems gcig 
[\[8b.2\]]la/_/sems la rang bzhin rnam pa gsum snang bas/_/rang bzhin gsum ni bkod pa'i mchog gsum ste/_/de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i chos nyid do/_/gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin kun 'brel bas/_/rnal ma gcig la 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi/_/rnal 
[\[8b.3\]]'byor rnam pa bzhi yi yul du bstan/_/sems nyid gcig la che ba lngar bstan pa/_/sems kyi rang bzhin yon tan lnga ldan pas/_/rang bzhin lnga la che lngar ming du btags/_/nges pa gcig la yin min sgros byung bas/_/gol sgrib the tshom rtog pa 
[\[8b.4\]]bsam yas ni/_/kun byed rtsol sgrub rtog 'das sel bar byed/_/yod med sgro skur the tshom bsal ba'i phyir/_/de bzhin nyid kyi byang chub mi rtog pas/_/ma nor nges pa'i lung de gtan la 'bebs/_/de nyid yid ches mngon du bstan pa'i phyir/_/la dor 
[\[8b.5\]]yid ches pa yi lung bcu yis/_/rtsol sgrub bya med don bstan de yid ches/_/med par bden pa'i tshig dgu smras pa ni/_/snying po gcig la mthong ba'i yul dgu byung /_/rang res mthong ba'i bden pa'i tshig dgu smras/_/kun byed nga la thams cad rdzogs pa'i 
[\[8b.6\]]phyir/_/byang chub sems kyi don 'di che bar gyis/_/chos kun rtsa ba kun byed byang chub sems/_/ji ltar snang ba nga yi ngo bo yin/_/ji ltar byung ba nga yi cho 'phrul yin/_/sgra tshig ji ltar byung ba thams cad kun/_/nga yi don nyid tshig sgrar phyung ba yin/_/sangs 
[\[8b.7\]]rgyas sku dang ye shes yon tan dang /_/sems can lus dang bag chags la sogs pa/_/snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun/_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ye nas yin/_/sems las ma gtogs pa yi chos rnams ni/_/nga las byung ba'i sangs 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]rgyas sngar 'das la/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung ma bstan/_/da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa la/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub lung mi ston/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rtsa ba gcig pa'i le'u ste 
[\[9a.2\]]drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyis byas pa las byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste/_/ji bzhin gnyis med bde ba chen po la/_/rnam pa 
[\[9a.3\]]kun ldan rnam pa yongs kyis med/_/spros bral nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas la/_/dmigs pa'i yul 'das gcig ces bgrang du med/_/byang chub sems la bgrang zhing mtshon med na/_/sems kyis byas pa'i chos la rnam grangs byung /_/sems kyis 
[\[9a.4\]]byas pa gang dang gang zhe na/_/snang srid snod bcud sangs rgyas sems can rnams/_/sems kyi rang bzhin ngo bo de las byas/_/byas nas mngon du phyung ste bstan pa ni/_/chen po lnga dang rigs drug snang ba dang /_/de yi don mdzad gzugs sku rnam gnyis ni/_/
[\[9a.5\]]sems kyi rang bzhin dag tu phyung nas bgrangs/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/_/kye kun byed rgyal po e ma ho/_/kun du bzang po e ma ho/_/byang chub sems khyod e ma ho/_/dang por byang chub sems langs nas/_/rang 
[\[9a.6\]]dang chos rnams ma shes nas/_/kun mkhyen khyed kyi 'khor du 'dus/_/zhu ba'i dmigs ni mi cha bas/_/kun mkhyen khyod kyis bka' stsal pa/_/chos rnams gcig tu 'dus par ni/_/byang chub sems mdo bka' stsal na/_/gcig la 
[\[9a.7\]]gnyis su bstan pa yi/_/rnam grangs don 'di ji ltar lags/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_kye nga ni ye nas lhun gyis grub/_/nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i snying po yin/_/
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]nga ni thugs rje'i ngo bo ste/_/gang la dga' ba'i dus su ni/_/gang dga' ba yi don bya'i phyir/_/nga yis byas pa'i don bstan gyis/_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig_/gcig la dga' ba de la ni/_/chos rnams gcig tu 'dus pa'i phyir/_/byang chub 
[\[9b.2\]]sems kyi ngo bo ste/_/sems kyi ngo bo kun byed bstan/_/mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la/_/kun byed rgyal pos byas pa yi/_/sna tshogs brjod kyis mi lang bstan/_/de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan/_/gcig ni nga nyid snying po ste/_/gnyis byung nga yis 
[\[9b.3\]]byas pa ste/_/byas pa'i chos la bgrangs pa yin/_/grangs kyi don ni gcig dang gnyis/_/grangs kyi mtha' ni brjod du med/_/brjod med chos kyi snying po yin/_/brjod med snying po gcig tu bstan/_/gcig ni kun byed byang chub sems/_/byas pa'i chos 
[\[9b.4\]]ni rnam pa gnyis/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis las/_/don dam kun rdzob rnam gnyis kyis/_/dpe don rtags dang gtan tshigs su/_/nges lung drang lung gnyis su bshad/_/rgyu ni 'byung chen rnam lnga la/_/'bras bu khams gsum sems can 
[\[9b.5\]]yin/_/khams gsum sems can rgyu byas nas/_/'bras bu sangs rgyas ming btags te/_/rgyu 'bras dpe don de ru bstan/_/rgyu ni khams gsum sems can la/_/'bras bu sangs rgyas lung bstan pa/_/de ni drang ba'i lung du bshad/_/rnam pa 
[\[9b.6\]]gnyis su dbye bar bya/_/rgyu ni 'byung chen rnam lnga yin/_/byas pa'i chos ni thams cad kun/_/sems nyid mngon du phyung ba yin/_/de bzhin nyid du ma gtogs par/_/ma rig log rtog gzung 'dzin gyis/_/yul drug chos la nges brtags pas/_/'jig 
[\[9b.7\]]pa drug dang brten pa drug_/'jig rten zhes su bshad pa yin/_/yul drug chags pa drug brten nas/_/chags drug sdug bsngal ya nga la/_/mya ngan mya ngan zhes su bshad/_/mya ngan mya ngan 'das zhes pa/_/yul drug chos la mi rtog pas/_/skye 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]drug gnas su mi skye ste/_/sdug bsngal drug las 'das pa'i phyir/_/mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya/_/ji bzhin snying po byang chub las/_/ma btsal rang bzhin shar ba yi/_/'byung ba chen po lnga po yang /_/rang gi mtshan nyid rang 'dzin la/_/
[\[10a.2\]]thams cad snying po byang chub kyang /_/dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo 'dzin/_/mtshan nyid mtshan nyid zhes su bshad/_/rang bzhin shar ba'i chen po lngas/_/chos kun bskyed pa'i snying po yin/_/de yis bskyed pa'i sems can rnams/_/rang 'byung yin par mi rtog par/_/
[\[10a.3\]]spyod pa'i lam de rgyur bltas nas/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'dod pas/_/rgyu zhes ming du btags pa yin/_/'bras bu gang thob theg par bshad/_/spong 'gegs sbyong ba rnams su bstan/_/'bras bu zhes su btags pa ni/_/snying po rgyu las 'bras bur 
[\[10a.4\]]bshad/_/snying po'i rang bzhin de la ni/_/skye 'jig med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rdo rje zhes su bshad pa yin/_/rdo rje de sgrub phyi pa gnyis/_/sku dang gsung thugs ye shes ni/_/blang dor byas pa'i sgo nas ni/_/chu zla bzhin du grub par 'dod/_/blang dor 
[\[10a.5\]]med pa'i nang pa ni/_/rim pa gsum dang snying po yis/_/bdag nyid dbyings dang ye shes lta/_/gang la'ang mi brten bya med 'di/_/kun gyi snying por gyur pas na/_/bya ba med pa'i phrin las 'das/_/bya med bde ba spong byed pa/_/mi rtsol bde ba'i lung bstan 
[\[10a.6\]]bkod/_/bskal pa gsum dang mi tshe bdun/_/zla drug lo gcig zla bcu drug_/rtsol bar byed pa'i theg pa can/_/bya med ngo bo 'di bstan pas/_/mi rtsol lhun grub bde lag nas/_/'di la ma rdzogs gang yang med/_/gcig rdzogs gnyis rdzogs kun 
[\[10a.7\]]rdzogs pas/_/bya ba phun sum tshogs par bde/_/gcig rdzogs byang chub sems su rdzogs/_/gnyis rdzogs sems kyis byas par rdzogs/_/kun rdzogs phun sum tshogs par rdzogs/_/gcig la rdzogs pa'i lung 'di yis/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]pa 'di la gnas/_/kun rdzogs pa yi don 'di yis/_/thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed/_/bya med 'di la gang gnas pa/_/lus 'di gang zag lha mi yang /_/dgongs pa chos nyid sangs rgyas yin/_/'di yis sems can don byas na/_/rtsol sgrub mi byed bde 
[\[10b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rnam grangs bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos byas pa'i chos thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las de bzhin nyid la rang bzhin 
[\[10b.3\]]gsum snang bar 'gyur ba de so sor snang ba 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga yi de bzhin nyid gcig ni/_/phun sum tshogs pa gsum du snang /_/de bzhin ma skyes rang bzhin ni/_/de bzhin nyid de yul du snang /_/yul de kun gyi de bzhin 
[\[10b.4\]]nyid/_/de la kun kyang brtags byas nas/_/de bzhin nyid la lta byed pa/_/ma bsgribs rang 'byung ye shes ni/_/rgyu 'bras ston pa sku gsum snang /_/la la rgyu yi ston par snang /_/la la 'brel ba'i ston par snang /_/la la 'bras bu'i ston par snang /_/thugs 
[\[10b.5\]]rje mngon du phyung ba yi/_/rang 'byung ye shes rnam lnga las/_/byung ba'i sangs rgyas sems can rnams/_/bstan pa'i yul dang 'khor du snang /_/de lta bu yi 'khor tshogs la/_/rgyu 'bras ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/de bzhin nyid kyi yul gcig la/_/'khor gyi 
[\[10b.6\]]lta ba so so pas/_/la la spong 'gegs yul du bstan/_/la lar sbyong zhing bgrod par bstan/_/la lar byin rlabs dag par bstan/_/la lar blang dor gyis grub bstan/_/la lar rang rgyud dag pa ste/_/btsal zhing bsgrub tu yod par bstan/_/de ltar ston pa sku 
[\[10b.7\]]gsum gyis/_/rgyu dang 'bras la dgongs nas bstan/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis kyang /_/de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/_/kun byed nga yis lung bstan to/_/de bzhin nyid ni 'di lta ste/_/kun byed nga yang de bzhin nyid/_/ngas byas kun kyang de bzhin 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]nyid/_/yul drug nga yis byas pa yin/_/dbang drug nga yi rig pa yin/_/rnam par shes pa'i tshogs rnams ni/_/nga yi rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/'byung chen lnga yang rgyu lnga ste/_/kun gyi rgyu lnga de bzhin nyid/_/thugs rje rang 'byung 
[\[11a.2\]]ye shes lnga/_/khams gsum rgyud drug phyung ba yang /_/de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bor bshad/_/de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/_/ngo bo gnyis su med pa ste/_/rang bzhin gcig tu gnas pa la/_/rnal 'byor bzhag pa bzhi phyung ba/_/rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi 
[\[11a.3\]]las byung /_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun gyi snying po byang chub sems 'di ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi rnal ma'i ngo bo ste/_/ji bzhin de bzhin nyid du ye nas gnas/_/shin tu rnal 'byor yongs su rnal 'byor dang /_/rnal 'byor chen po 
[\[11a.4\]]sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bzhis/_/snying po don gyi rnal ma bya med la/_/bltas pas mthong ba'i yul ni rnam pa bzhi/_/sems dpa'i rnal 'byor yul dang dbang por mthong /_/byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis/_/byin gyis brlabs nas sems dpa'i lha 
[\[11a.5\]]gnyis lta/_/snying po don gyi rnal ma mthong ba med/_/ma bcos de bzhin nyid du sems dpa' zhog_/don gyi snying po rnal ma bya med la/_/rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis mthong ba ni/_/ye nas rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rgyu las 'bras bu lha yi 
[\[11a.6\]]dkyil 'khor te/_/bsnyen bsgrub bzhi yi yan lag rdzogs byas nas/_/'phro 'du bdag nyid lhun gyis grub par lta/_/don gyi snying po rnal ma mthong ba med/_/ma bcos de bzhin nyid du chen po zhog_/don gyi snying po rnal ma bya med la/_/yongs su 
[\[11a.7\]]rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong ba ni/_/dbyings ni snying po rnal ma'i rgyur mthong la/_/ye shes chen po rnal ma'i 'bras bur mthong /_/snying po gcig la rgyu 'bras gnyis mthong bas/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba med/_/ma bcos de bzhin 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]yongs su rnal 'byor zhog_/don gyi snying po rnal ma bya med la/_/shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen lta mthong ba/_/byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying por mthong /_/de nyid ma bcos don gyi rnal mar mthong /_/lta ba ye nas bsgom du med par gzhag_/dam 
[\[11b.2\]]tshig ye nas bsrung du med par gzhag_/phrin las ye nas btsal du med par gzhag_/bzhag pas de bzhin nyid la rnal du 'byor/_/rnal 'byor rnam bzhi lta ba'i bye brag ni/_/yul gcig re re la yang bzhir dbye ba/_/sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bye brag 
[\[11b.3\]]bzhir dbye ba/_/yul dang dbang po rnam par mi rtog sems/_/des na sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nyid du bshad/_/byang chub byin rlabs cho 'phrul 'byin pa ni/_/de ni rnal 'byor chen po zhes su bshad/_/phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan pa ni/_/yongs su rnal 
[\[11b.4\]]'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/ye shes dam tshig rang bzhin med lta ba/_/shin tu rnal 'byor dgongs par sems dpa' bzhed/_/blang dor med pa'i rnal 'byor de ma mthong /_/rnal 'byor chen po bye brag bzhir dbye ba/_/dang por ting 'dzin rnam 
[\[11b.5\]]gsum sems pa ni/_/sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/rang rgyud dag pas ye shes lta byed pa/_/rnal 'byor chen po zhes su bshad pa yin/_/bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa ni/_/yongs su rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa 
[\[11b.6\]]yin/_/thams cad bdag nyid chen por lta ba ni/_/shin tu rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba min/_/yongs su rnal 'byor bye brag bzhir lta ba/_/ting 'dzin rim pas bdag skur mi bskyed par/_/chos nyid 
[\[11b.7\]]rang rgyud dag par sems pa'i phyir/_/sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/yab yum thabs dang shes rab mi ltos par/_/snying po tsam gyis dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i dgongs par bshad pa yin/_/snang ba rang 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]bzhin med pa'i chos nyid du/_/spyod pas yongs su rnal 'byor nyid du bshad/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/rgyu dbyings 'bras bu ye shes lta ba'i phyir/_/shin tu rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/rgyu 'bras 
[\[12a.2\]]'das pa'i rnal ma mthong ba min/_/shin tu rnal 'byor bye brag rnam bzhi ni/_/blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems de ni/_/sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems de ni/_/rnal 'byor chen po zhes su 
[\[12a.3\]]bshad pa yin/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems de ni/_/yongs su rnal 'byor zhes su bshad pa yin/_/yin min sgro dang skur pa 'das pa'i phyir/_/shin tu rnal 'byor zhes su nga yis bshad/_/yongs su rnal 'byor la sogs gsum po la/_/rang 
[\[12a.4\]]'byung ye shes che dang mi ldan pas/_/lam la bgrod cing sa la sbyong bar byed/_/dam tshig tshul bsrung lta ba sgom byed pas/_/gom pa drag dal lta spyod yod ma yin/_/de bas shin tu rnal 'byor lta spyod ni/_/ye nas kun byed nyid kyis byas pa'i phyir/_/lam 
[\[12a.5\]]la mi bgrod sa la spyod mi byed/_/dam tshig mi srung lta ba sgom mi byed/_/byang chub chen po'i lam nas kun 'byung phyir/_/byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi bgrod/_/bgrod sa byang chub nyid las med pa'i phyir/_/byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi spyod/_/
[\[12a.6\]]dam tshig rang bzhin byang chub nyid yin pas/_/byang chub nyid la byang chub nyid mi srung /_/bsgom pa'i rang bzhin byang chub nyid yin pas/_/byang chub nyid kyis nyid la bsgom du med/_/lta ba'i yul ni byang chub nyid yin pas/_/byang chub nyid kyis nyid la 
[\[12a.7\]]bltar med phyir/_/shin tu rnal 'byor lta spyod bya med 'di/_/rang 'byung ye shes gom pa drag dal can/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi gom pa yin/_/rgyu 'bras theg pa can gyi spyod yul min/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]chos nyid kyi rang bzhin las chos nyid kyi yul kun la bkod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa bgrod lam nor bas rdzogs pa chen po las gol sa dang sgrib par gyur pa 'di gsungs 
[\[12b.2\]]so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'di nyid ni/_/chos kun ma lus pa yi snying po ste/_/ma skyes rnam par dag pas sgrib pa med/_/bgrod pa'i lam dang bral bas gol sa med/_/ye nas lhun gyis grub pas 
[\[12b.3\]]btsal du med/_/chos kun snying po byang chub sems su gcig_/gcig la rnam par bgrangs pas gol sgrib byung /_/bgrod du med la bgrod pas gol sa byung /_/dmigs med bltas pas ma mthong sgrib pa byung /_/de bzhin nyid du thams 
[\[12b.4\]]cad gcig pa la/_/rgyu spyad 'bras bu phyi mar 'dod pa ni/_/pha rol phyin bcu sa bcu thob 'dod pa/_/bskal pa gsum gyi bar du gol nas bsgribs/_/phyi nang rtog pa dag pa rnam gsum gyis/_/byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul yan lag gi/_/dam 
[\[12b.5\]]tshig sdom pa tshul bzhin dag na yang /_/mi tshe bdun gyi bar du gol zhing bsgribs/_/rgyu la spyod cing 'bras bu lta ba ni/_/lta spyod so so gnyis su bltas pa yis/_/gnyis su med la mi tshe gsum bsgribs gol/_/snying po gcig la blang dor byed pa de/_/
[\[12b.6\]]gcig tu ma mthong gnyis su mthong bas na/_/blang dor ma bral bar du gol zhing bsgribs/_/rang 'byung gcig la yin pa gsum bsgoms pas/_/rtsol bral lung las gol zhes lung ston cig_/ji ltar snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams la/_/snying po de bzhin 
[\[12b.7\]]nyid du ma rtogs par/_/dbyings dang ye shes rgyu 'bras bltas pa'i phyir/_/rgyu yi sgros dang 'bras bu'i skur yin pas/_/sgro skur gnyis bral yid ches bar du sgrib/_/med pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa rnam drug ni/_/rgyu la bden pa gnyis kyis thob byed dang /_/ngag 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]gsum spyad pas 'bras bu thob byed dang /_/lta spyod so sos thob par 'dod pa dang /_/blang dor spyad pas thob par 'dod pa dang /_/rig pa gsum bsgoms thob par 'dod pa dang /_/rgyu 'bras dbyings nyid ye shes bltas pa yis/_/thob par 
[\[13a.2\]]'dod pa'i nges thob rnam pa drug_/gol sa drug dang sgrib pa drug drug ste/_/byang chub sems las go la sgrib skyon yin pas/_/nges thob drug gi skyon yon gsal bar gsung /_/rtog dpyod gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib pa la/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis kyang gol sa 
[\[13a.3\]]sgrib par bshad/_/lta spyod gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib par bshad/_/lta spyod blang dor rtsol sgrub rgyu 'bras 'das/_/mi rtsol bde ba che la kun gol bsgribs/_/byang chub sems ni nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' lta bu sems nyid chos nyid la/_/lta 
[\[13a.4\]]bas bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med/_/phrin las btsal med ye shes sgrib pa med/_/sa la sbyang med bgrod pa'i lam yang med/_/phra ba chos med gnyis med 'brel pa med/_/sems las nges lung gtan la 'bebs pa med/_/sgro skur 'das pas 
[\[13a.5\]]man ngag la bzlar med/_/rdzogs chen byang chub sems kyi lta ba'o/_/ltar med gcig la sgom byed drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs lta ba'i gol sgrib byung /_/bsrung med gcig la sdom pa drug bsrungs pas/_/la gol la bsgribs dam tshig gol sgrib 
[\[13a.6\]]byung /_/btsal med gcig la phrin las drug rtsol bas/_/la gol la bsgribs phrin las gol sgrib byung /_/bsgribs med gcig la ye shes drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs ye shes gol sgrib byung /_/sbyangs med gcig la sbyangs thob drug byung bas/_/
[\[13a.7\]]la gol la bsgribs sa yi gol sgrib byung /_/bgrod med gcig la lam bgrod drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs lam gyi gol sgrib byung /_/gzung med gcig la 'dzin byed drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs chos kyi gol sgrib byung /_/gnyis med 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]gcig la 'brel pa drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs 'brel pa'i gol sgrib byung /_/bden pa gcig la nges pa drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs lung gi gol sgrib byung /_/brjod med gcig la rjod byed drug byung bas/_/la gol la bsgribs man 
[\[13b.2\]]ngag gol sgrib byung /_/kun gyi snying po byang chub sems 'di ni/_/ye nas rang gi rang bzhin lhun grub pas/_/rang bzhin bcu yis btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos/_/nga yi rang bzhin kun dpe nam mkha' 'dra/_/nam mkha' dag la kun kyang rtsol mi byed/_/
[\[13b.3\]]nam mkha' dag la kun gyis rtsol bya ru/_/nam mkha' kun byas rtsol sgrub kun las 'das/_/de bzhin kun byed snying po byang chub sems/_/nga nyid spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir/_/nga la ltar med bsgom du ye nas med/_/de bzhin rang bzhin 
[\[13b.4\]]bcu po des kyang ni/_/'das pa nga la bya ru yod ma yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams kyis/_/rang bzhin bcu yis nga la btsal byas nas/_/nga dang nga yi rang bzhin mthong 'dod pas/_/mkha' la gom bor sa la ltung ba bzhin/_/rang bzhin 
[\[13b.5\]]bcu pos bgrod pas ltung bar 'gyur/_/nga yi rang bzhin nges par khungs bstan pa/_/nga ni spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i phyir/_/lta ba bsgom du med pa de bzhin du/_/rang bzhin bcu la de bzhin don med kyis/_/rang bzhin bcu la don yod ma 
[\[13b.6\]]rtogs shig_/nga ni bltas pas mthong ba'i yul med pas/_/lta bar ma byed de bzhin nyid du zhog_/spros bral ma skyes bral ba'i rgyu med pas/_/sdom pa dang ni tshul khrims bsrung mi dgos/_/snying por ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/rtsol 
[\[13b.7\]]ba dang ni bsgrub pa bya mi dgos/_/rang 'byung ye shes sgrib pa med pa'i phyir/_/rig pa'i ye shes gsal bar bskyed du med/_/thams cad nga yi sa ru gnas pa'i phyir/_/sbyangs nas bgrod pa'i sa ni yod ma yin/_/nga yis kun la khyab par 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]gnas pa'i phyir/_/nga la bgrod par bya ba'i lam yod min/_/nga ni ye nas gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir/_/phra ba zhes ni ming du gdags su med/_/nga yi gzugs kyis kun la khyab pa'i phyir/_/gnyis shes bya ba ye nas yod 
[\[14a.2\]]ma yin/_/nga ni ye nas rang 'byung ye shes la/_/nga la gzhan gyis gtan la dbab tu med/_/nga ni kun gyi byang chub snying po bas/_/gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan na yod ma yin/_/sgro dang skur pa kun las 'das pa'i phyir/_/chos rnams kun gyi la ni 
[\[14a.3\]]nga yis bzlas/_/nga med pa yi yul ni gzhan med pas/_/lta ba bsgom du med par la yang bzlas/_/nga las gzhan du bsrung du med pa'i phyir/_/dam tshig bsrung du med par la yang bzlas/_/nga las gzhan du btsal du med pa'i phyir/_/phrin las 
[\[14a.4\]]btsal du med par la yang bzlas/_/nga las gzhan du gnas pa med pa'i phyir/_/sa la sbyang du med par la yang bzlas/_/nga la sgrib pa ye nas med pa'i phyir/_/rang 'byung ye shes yin par la yang bzlas/_/nga ni ma skyes chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/_/phra ba 
[\[14a.5\]]chos nyid yin par la yang bzlas/_/nga las gzhan du bgrod du med pa'i phyir/_/lam la bgrod du med par la yang bzlas/_/sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/_/snying po byang chub nga las byung ba'i phyir/_/ye nas gnyis su med par la yang 
[\[14a.6\]]bzlas/_/rang 'byung ye shes gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/_/lung chen thog 'bebs yin par la yang bzlas/_/chos rnams thams cad nga las med pa'i phyir/_/kun byed nga ni kun gyi la bzla'o/_/nga ma shes pas sgrib pa'i ngo bor bshad/_/nga 
[\[14a.7\]]las gzhan btsal gol sa byung ba yin/_/las dang shes bya rnam pa gnyis su bstan/_/ma mthong ba ni las kyi sgrib pa yin/_/ma shes pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/snying po byang chub sems kyi ngo 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bo bas/_/ma rig ma shes sgrib gnyis ngo bor bshad/_/btsal zhing bsgrub pa gol sar ngas bshad do/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad ni/_/rang yin gzhan min de la rang rtog na/_/de ni rang 
[\[14b.2\]]la rang gis bsgribs pa ste/_/rang gi rang bzhin de yis shes pa min/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/sems dpa' nyid yin nyid las gzhan min gyis/_/mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du bde bar mnos/_/de la bde ba'i don ni 'di lta 
[\[14b.3\]]ste/_/rang bzhin chen po bcu la rtsol mi dgos/_/rang bzhin chen po bcu la ma btsal bas/_/gol sa sgrib pa drug drug bcu po yi/_/sum brgya drug cu gol sgrib mtha' yas med/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams 
[\[14b.4\]]thams cad kun/_/rang gi snying po byang chub mngon byung gis/_/'di ma yin gyi chos ni gzhan ma bshad/_/'di la ma rtog shig par nga lung ston/_/sems dpa' khyod kyis 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/_/ngas bstan bzhin du tshogs la lung ston cig_/
[\[14b.5\]]ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las gol sgrib skyon sel gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/
[\[14b.6\]]kun byed nga la thams cad tshogs pa'i phyir/_/de phyir phun sum tshogs zhes bya bar bshad/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/_/ston pa bstan pa 'khor rnams byung ba'i phyir/_/kun byed ces ni de la btags pa yin/_/dang por ston pa 
[\[14b.7\]]phun sum tshogs pa ni/_/kun byed nga yi rang 'byung ye shes las/_/rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du byung ba de/_/sku gsum ston pa gsum du bstan pa yin/_/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_/sprul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]sku gsum de yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/chos kyi sku yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin bzhugs/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi rang bzhin ni/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzogs par bzhugs/_/
[\[15a.2\]]sprul pa'i sku yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/ji ltar 'dul ba'i sku ru sprul nas bzhugs/_/sku gsum ston pa de yi bstan pa ni/_/phyi nang gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/ston pa chos sku'i bstan pa 'di lta ste/_/gsang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin bstan 
[\[15a.3\]]pa ste/_/gzhi ma chos nyid dag gi rang bzhin las/_/gsang ba bskyed dang gsang ba rdzogs pa dang /_/gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po'i rang bzhin gsum/_/kun gyi spyod yul ma yin gsang bar bshad/_/med pa'i rim pa gsum skyed gsang ston 
[\[15a.4\]]pa/_/de ni gsang ba bskyed pa zhes su bshad/_/gsang ba rdzogs pa zhes su bstan pa ni/_/nang gi shes rab ting 'dzin gsum mi rtogs/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la/_/nang gi ting 'dzin shes rab snying po brjod/_/rang rgyud 
[\[15a.5\]]dag pa ye nas lhar byas nas/_/rang gi lus kyi rdo rje skye mched rnams/_/lta spyod blang dor gnyis med bdag nyid 'dod/_/de ni nang gi gsang ba rdzogs par bshad/_/gsang ba rdzogs pa chen po bstan pa ni/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams 
[\[15a.6\]]cad ni/_/ting 'dzin gsum gyis byang chub sems ma bskyed/_/snying po yig 'bru brjod nas rdzogs ma byas/_/kun byed nga ni rdzogs pa chen po ste/_/nga la ma rdzogs pa ni gang yang med/_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum bstan pa ni/_/rdzogs chen byang chub 
[\[15a.7\]]sems gsum bstan pa yin/_/de ni gsang ba rdzogs pa chen por bshad/_/de ni ston pa chos sku'i bstan par bshad/_/ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bstan pa ni/_/bya ba byed pa'i phyi pa sde gsum ste/_/bya ba byed pa'i rtog can sde pa ni/_/dang 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]por rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis/_/phyi nang rtog pa dag pa gsum bsgoms pas/_/rtog pa'i gza' skar dus tshod sgo nas 'jug_/byang chub dang ni cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis/_/bdag dang ye shes lha ni rje khol tshul/_/dag pa gsum gyi mchod pa de byas 
[\[15b.2\]]nas/_/med par sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dod/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka sgyu mar bshad/_/lta ba spyod pa gnyis su 'byed pa yi/_/gnyis la brten nas don gcig sgrub byed pa/_/yod pa'i spyod pas med pa'i don sgrub pas/_/rten med mkha' 
[\[15b.3\]]la spyang mo nyug pa 'dra/_/blang dor byed pa'i phyi pa'i gsang ba ni/_/mi rtog ting 'dzin byin rlabs cho 'phrul gyis/_/thams cad byin rlabs ye shes sems dpar byas/_/mchod pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum mchod nas/_/sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya 
[\[15b.4\]]bzhi ldan pa'i/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob re ba/_/chags med re ba 'jog pa'i ting 'dzin 'di/_/lta spyod blang dor byed pas grub pa med/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi bstan par bshad/_/ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi bstan pa ni/_/nyan thos 
[\[15b.5\]]rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde gsum/_/phyi zhes mtshan nyid phyi pa zhes su bshad/_/kun byed nga yi ngo bo 'dod yon lnga/_/ye shes lnga yi ngo bor phyung ba la/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum byung ste/_/de 'dul ba yi gnyen por gsungs pa ni/_/
[\[15b.6\]]chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/_/'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga byung ba/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro reg las/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnam gsum byung /_/de dag 'dul ba'i gnyen por sde snod gsum/_/'dod chags 'dul ba'i gnyen 
[\[15b.7\]]por gsungs pa ni/_/'dul ba nyi khri chig stong gsungs pa yin/_/gti mug 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni/_/mdo sde'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong gsungs/_/zhe sdang 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni/_/mngon pa'i sde snod nyi khri chig stong gsungs/_/dug gsum 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]cha mnyam 'dul ba'i gnyen po ru/_/sde snod gsum las nyi khri tshig stong gsungs/_/spyi ru brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa yang /_/dug gsum gnyen pos 'dul phyir gsungs pa yin/_/mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa rnam gsum ste/_/sgo ni 
[\[16a.2\]]mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum/_/de ni bsdus pa'i don zhes bstan pa yin/_/mdo sde la yang bshad lugs bcu dang gnyis/_/so sor dbye ba'i don du bstan pa yin/_/dug gsum rgyu las 'bras bu ngan song gsum/_/sems can rgyu la las spyod dge 
[\[16a.3\]]sdig gnyis/_/'bras bu mtho ris ngan song rnam gnyis so/_/mtshan nyid rgyu las rab tu bsgrags pa yin/_/'di ni sngar gsungs da gsung phyis gsung 'gyur/_/'di don brjod du med pa'i don 'di ni/_/snga ma ma gsungs da ltar mi gsung ste/_/sprul pa'i sku 
[\[16a.4\]]yis phyis kyang gsung mi 'gyur/_/de bas sprul pa'i sku yi bstan par bshad/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum la/_/'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum shar/_/sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi 'khor bstan pa/_/kye 
[\[16a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ston pa chos kyi sku yi 'khor bstan pa/_/nga yis byas pa'i 'khor ni thams cad kun/_/nga yi rang bzhin chos kyi sku 'khor yin/_/sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/_/chos kyi sku yi 'khor du ma 'dus 
[\[16a.6\]]med/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi 'khor bstan pa/_/mos spyod bzhi yi sa la 'das pa yi/_/dang po rab tu dga' ba'i sa mnan nas/_/sa bcu chos kyi sprin gyi sa pa rnams/_/de 
[\[16a.7\]]ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi 'khor du bstan/_/ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi 'khor bstan pa/_/mu stegs mur thug rgyang 'phen phyal ba bzhi/_/bla med byang chub lam la gtan gol bas/_/dbang po sems bsgyur thugs rje byin brlabs nas/_/dge slong 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pho mo dge bsnyen pho mo bzhi/_/ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi 'khor du bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyi/_/sku gsum so so rang re gnas bstan pa/_/ston pa chos sku'i gnas ni 'di 
[\[16b.2\]]lta ste/_/'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste/_/yang dag don gyi 'og min de ru bshad/_/ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gnas bstan pa/_/'jig rten mtshan ma kun gyi steng gyur pa/_/gnas kyi 'og min khang bu brtsegs pa yi/_/gzhal yas khang 
[\[16b.3\]]de gnas kyi 'og min bshad/_/ston pa sprul pa'i sku yi gnas bstan pa/_/sprul pa'i sku ni rabs bdun shAkya thub/_/gnas ni bya rgod phung po'i gnas bstan te/_/yang dag thugs rje sprul pa nges med gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen 
[\[16b.4\]]po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa yi/_/'dul ba'i zhing khams khyad par bstan pa ni/_/chos sku ston pa'i 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' yis klas pa dang /_/nam mkha'i khams kyis ji ltar khyab pa de/_/chos 
[\[16b.5\]]kyi sku yi 'dul ba'i zhing khams yin/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku'i 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni/_/nga las byung ba'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pas 'dul/_/sprul pa'i sku yi 'dul ba'i zhing khams ni/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni bye ba phrag 
[\[16b.6\]]brgya las/_/rang 'byung ye shes thugs rjes rgyud drug 'dul/_/de ni mthun pa'i bye brag bstan pa yin/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum de/_/rgyu mthun 'bras bu mthun la rang bzhin gcig_/rgyu ni byang chub sems su kun mthun la/_/'bras bu sangs 
[\[16b.7\]]rgyas yin par kun kyang mthun/_/rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo gcig par bstan/_/'dul ba'i dus la snga phyi phye ba med/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po yang nyon cig_/kun byed rgyal po nga las byung ba yi/_/sku gsum ston pa de yi bshad 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]lugs ni/_/ston pa chos skus byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bos bshad/_/sprul pa'i sku ni tshig dang don bsdebs nas/_/gang zag rna ba'i dbang por tshig don ston/_/chos sku byin gyis brlabs kyis 
[\[17a.2\]]bshad pa ni/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ste/_/skye ba med las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du/_/ji ltar snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/_/ngo bo thugs rje cho 'phrul phyung ba ste/_/rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad ces bya/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku rang 
[\[17a.3\]]gi ngo bo ston/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs pa yi/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad rdzogs par ston/_/rang gi ngo bos bshad ces nga yis bstan/_/sprul skus tshig dang yi ges bsdebs bshad pa/_/ji ltar 
[\[17a.4\]]snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/ston pa'i ngo bor ston pas ma rig ste/_/bstan pa zhes pa'i khyad par 'dod sprul pas/_/don rnams tshig dang yi ger sgra brjod pas/_/tshig gi sgra des don de go byas nas/_/don de tshig sgra de yis bshad pa yin/_/kye sems 
[\[17a.5\]]dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun byed nga ni sku gsum ngo bo ste/_/mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa de/_/spros bral chos kyi sku yi ngo bo yin/_/rang bzhin 'byung ba'i skye ba'i cho 'phrul de/_/'dod pa 'byung ba'i longs spyod rdzogs sku yin/_/thugs rjes ji ltar 'dul 
[\[17a.6\]]ba'i don mdzad pa/_/de ni sprul pa'i sku yi ngo bo yin/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin rnam gsum gyis/_/gang la gang gis 'dul ba'i skur ston mdzad/_/bstan pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pa'i don/_/gang la gang 'tsham de yis don mdzad pa/_/de ni 
[\[17a.7\]]bstan pa phun sum tshogs par gsungs/_/'khor gyi rang bzhin gang la gang 'dus nas/_/de la 'dus nas de yi gdung 'tshob 'dzin/_/de la phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor zhes bya/_/nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/_/kun byed gcig la rnam pa gsum 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bgrangs pa/_/kun byed nga dang nga yi rang bzhin dang /_/nga yis byas pa'i chos dang rnam pa gsum/_/nga ni ston pa kun byed kun gyi mes/_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa bcur bstan pa/_/de ni bstan pa kun gyi snying por bshad/_/kun byed nga 
[\[17b.2\]]yis byas pa'i chos rnams ni/_/dus gsum gcig na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/khams gsum gnas pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kun/_/dbye ba med par 'khor gyi dam par byas/_/kun byed gcig gis phun sum tshogs byas pas/_/
[\[17b.3\]]sems kyi dgos pa kun byas phun sum tshogs/_/gang la gang dgos dgos pa tshogs pa la/_/kun byed nga yis phun sum tshogs par bshad/_/ston pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum bstan pa/_/'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum shar/_/ma skyes 
[\[17b.4\]]gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin de/_/'khor gyi dang po ston pa chos skur shar/_/skye ba'i cho 'phrul kun bzang rol pa de/_/'dod spyod longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru shar/_/sna tshogs ji ltar 'dod pa byung nas ni/_/de dang mthun par kun kyang tshim byed 
[\[17b.5\]]pa/_/de ni sna tshogs sprul sku zhes su bshad/_/sku gsum ston pa grags phyogs mthong ba ni/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bzod thob gsum/_/gang 'thad ston pa'i sku la de 'dus nas/_/de dang mthun pa'i gnas su don ston bzhugs/_/bstan 
[\[17b.6\]]pa'i rang bzhin yang ni de 'dra ste/_/sku gsum gang gis 'khor la gang ston pa/_/gang la gang gis 'dul ba'i don rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas lha mi 'jig rten las dag la/_/bstan pas 'dul phyir phun sum tshogs zhes bshad/_/mi gnas chos sku 
[\[17b.7\]]dbyings na bzhugs pa yis/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la/_/spros med byang chub sems ni chos skus bstan/_/ye shes longs spyod 'og min bzhugs pa yis/_/sa bcu pa yi byang chub sems dpa' la/_/byang chub sems 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]de sku dang ye shes bshad/_/thugs rje sna tshogs nges med sprul pa yis/_/bzod thob gang na 'dus pa'i 'khor de la/_/ma nges gang gis 'dul ba'i don yang bstan/_/smon lam las bzang rkyen gyis bar ma chod/_/nga yi thugs rje 
[\[18a.2\]]sems dpa'i dus la bab/_/ngas bstan 'khor gyi nang nas khyod sdud dang /_/gnyis med don nyid nga yis bstan pa gsum/_/tshogs pas dus gnas rang bzhin de la tshang /_/phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po de/_/ye nas dkon pa'i dkon mchog 
[\[18a.3\]]gsum du bstan/_/kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs su bshad/_/ston pa dkon pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog ni/_/chos sku longs spyod sku dang sprul sku ste/_/bstan pa dam chos dkon pa'i gsung mchog ni/_/brjod du med pa'i kun byed gsung mchog 
[\[18a.4\]]gsum/_/'khor gyi dge 'dun thugs mchog de la ni/_/gang la gang dgos gang 'tsham ston par byed/_/nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/_/sku gsum byed pa'i ston pa ngas byas nas/_/bstan pa dam chos gsum du bkod pa ni/_/phyi dang 
[\[18a.5\]]nang dang gsang ba gsum du bkod/_/de la rnam pa gsum gsum dgur grags pa/_/sprul sku thugs rjes ji ltar 'dul gsum bsgrags/_/longs spyod byed phyi nang gsum du sgrogs/_/chos sku gsang ba'i mngon pa gsum sgrogs pa/_/phyi dang nang dang 
[\[18a.6\]]gsang ba gsum po de/_/lus dang ngag dang yid dang sku gsung thugs/_/de las 'phros pas rnam pa dgur byung ba/_/la dgu lung dgu lam dgu bgrod pa yis/_/theg gcig kun byed byang chub sa la bgrod/_/kun byed bya byed med par rtsol sgrub 
[\[18a.7\]]'das/_/bgrod pa med par byang chub sa la phyin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las phun sum tshogs pa shin tu dkon pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos chos 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsdus pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang rtsa ba ni 'di lta ste/_nga ni chos kun rang bzhin yin pa ste/_/nga yi rang bzhin las ni chos gzhan med/_/ston pa sku gsum nga 
[\[18b.2\]]yi rang bzhin yin/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/byang chub sems dpa' nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/rnal 'byor rnam bzhi nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams gsum yang /_/kun byed nga 
[\[18b.3\]]yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/_/'byung chen lnga yang nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/rgyud drug sems can nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/snang ba thams cad nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/srid pa thams cad nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud bsdus pa nga yi rang bzhin 
[\[18b.4\]]yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med pas/_/chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba nga la 'dus/_/nga las ma 'dus pa ni gcig kyang med/_/ma skyes pa dang skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang /_/thugs rje'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum byung ba/_/de ni ston pa gsum 
[\[18b.5\]]gyi rang bzhin yin/_/snga pa da lta phyi pa dus gsum yang /_/nga nyid gcig tu gnas pa'i rang bzhin las/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu gnas pa'i phyir/_/de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/_/nga nyid gzung 'dzin bral bas byang ba dang /_/
[\[18b.6\]]nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab pa dang /_/chos rnams kun gyi snying po byed pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems kyang nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/kun byed nga ni gcig tu gnas pa la/_/nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin rnal ma la/_/rnam bzhi 'byor pa rnal ma 
[\[18b.7\]]gcig tu 'byor/_/des na nga yi rang bzhin yin par bshad/_/kun byed nga yi lus ngag yid gsum las/_/'byung yang nga yi rang bzhin de las 'byung /_/'dus kyang nga yi rang bzhin de la 'dus/_/yin yang nga yi ngo bo de yin pas/_/khams gsum nga yi 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]rang bzhin yin par bshad/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam lnga ni/_/nga yi ngo bo rnam lnga phyung ba ste/_/nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/_/kun byed nga yi thugs rjes mngon byung nas/_/rang 
[\[19a.2\]]'byung ye shes rnam lnga bstan pa ni/_/'gro ba rigs drug sems can snang ba yang /_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin las/_/snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun/_/thams cad ngas byas nga las byung 
[\[19a.3\]]ba'i phyir/_/ngar ma 'dus pa'i chos ni gcig kyang med/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum yang /_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum ston/_/snga pa da lta phyi pa dus gsum gyi/_/rnam gsum gcig tu gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyang /_/snga phyi 
[\[19a.4\]]med par kun byed rang bzhin gnas/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yang /_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin sems dpar byed/_/rnal 'byor rnam bzhi rnal mar 'jog pa yang /_/kun byed nga la rnal du 'jog par byed/_/kun byed rgyal pos 
[\[19a.5\]]thams cad byas pa bzhin/_/thams cad kun byed rgyal po nyid du 'dus/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po nyid kho nar 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//
[\[19a.6\]]de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po nga yis chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi mdo 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga ni kun gyi lung khungs yin pa ste/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/thams cad nga las byung bar shes par 
[\[19a.7\]]gyis/_/chos kyi spyi khungs chen po 'di nyon la/_/chos rnams thams cad 'di ltar lung ston cig_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/lung chen kun gyi rgyal po nga yin pas/_/ston pa gsum yang dang po nga las byung /_/lung zhes bya ba ston 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]pa'i bka' la gdags/_/man ngag kun gyi rtsa bar yin pas/_/sems las ma gtogs pa yi chos nyid ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la/_/kun byed nga yis yang dag bstan pa med/_/rgyud dang mdo sde kun gyi spyi 'grel 
[\[19b.2\]]yin/_/rgyud dang mdo sde ston pa'i ston pa yang /_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin phyung ba yin/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa gnyis ka 'grel/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/bstan pa kun gyi yang rtse yin par bshad/_/nga las byung ba'i ston 
[\[19b.3\]]pa sku gsum gyis/_/bstan pa'i 'dul ba mdo sde mngon pa dang /_/tan tra so so'i sde ni 'bum sde dang /_/bskyed rdzogs gsang ba la sogs rtsol sgrub can/_/kun kyang rtsol sgrub 'das pa nga la bgrod/_/rtsol sgrub nyid kyis 'das pa nga mi mthong /_/des 
[\[19b.4\]]na bstan pa kun gyi yang rtse yin par bshad/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/theg pa kun gyi nying khu yin par bshad/_/ston pa gsum gyi gnas pa'i theg pa gsum/_/nges par gnas pa theg pa gcig las med/_/gcig ni kun theg 
[\[19b.5\]]byang chub sems kyis/_/de ni theg pa kun gyi nying khur bshad/_/kye nga ni ma rig pa yi mun bsal nas/_/ye shes chen po'i snang ba mched par byed/_/de yang ji lta bu zhes bstan zhe na/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/byang chub 
[\[19b.6\]]de bzhin nyid du ma rig ste/_/ma rig rtog pa'i mun par 'thibs pa la/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa'i phyir/_/kun byed byang chub sems su rig byas nas/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams 
[\[19b.7\]]thams cad kun/_/so sor rtog pa'i mun pa bsal nas kyang /_/rang 'byung ye shes chen po snang ba mched/_/des na ma rig mun sel snang ba mched ces bya/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba dral nas ni/_/nyon mongs pa yi phreng 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]thag gcod par byed/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos 'di thams cad la/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams kyis/_/la las dug mthong spong ba'i rtog pa byed/_/la las sems chags pa yi yul mthong nas/_/bden gnyis ma chags pa yi 
[\[20a.2\]]rtog pa byed/_/la las rnam dag bya ba'i yul mthong nas/_/dag pa gsum dang byin rlabs cho 'phrul gyis/_/rje dang khol gyi tshul du rtog par byed/_/la las rang dag pa yi rang bzhin la/_/bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhis sgrub 'dod rtog byed pa/_/thams cad kun 
[\[20a.3\]]byed byang chub sems nga yis/_/sems las gzhan ma yin rtog dral nas ni/_/so sor rtog pa'i nyon mongs phreng thag gcod/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/khyod kyis nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs la/_/
[\[20a.4\]]ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/nga las gzhan med pa ru lung ston cig_/khyod kyis nga yi lung 'di bstan 'gyur na/_/khyod la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs gyur nas/_/kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/_/kun kyang nga yi rang 
[\[20a.5\]]bzhin gyur pa na/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la/_/kun kyang spong 'gegs bden gnyis sbyong mi byed/_/gtsang sbras dag gsum byin gyis rlob mi byed/_/ting 'dzin sems bskyed rtsol dang sgrub 
[\[20a.6\]]mi byed/_/thams cad kun byed nga ru byas zin pas/_/kun byed nga ru thams cad mnyam pa nyid/_/mnyam nyid nga yis mnyam nyid bya mi dgos/_/mnyam nyid bya mi dgos par sngar lung bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[20a.7\]]rgyal po las nges par lung khungs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des lung thams cad kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi spyi lung bshad pa'i bshad lugs 'di gsungs so/_/kye 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga ni chos kyi spyi lung yin pa'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam lnga ni/_/spyi don rnam pa lnga yis bshad pa ste/_/lo rgyus don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang /_/rtsa ba don gyi bshad lugs 
[\[20b.2\]]bstan pa dang /_/yo ga don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang /_/dgos pa don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa dang /_/tshig gi don gyi bshad lugs bstan pa'o/_/dang po yid ches pa yi khungs bstan phyir/_/lo rgyus don gyi bshad lugs bstan 
[\[20b.3\]]par bya/_/chos kun rtsa ba sems su 'dus pa'i phyir/_/des na rtsa ba'i don de bstan par bya/_/theg pa'i khyad par so sor dbye ba'i phyir/_/yo ga don gyi rtsa ba bstan par bya/_/rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos par bstan pa'i phyir/_/dgos ched don gyi dgos 
[\[20b.4\]]pa de ru bstan/_/mi rtogs don de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/tshig gi don de sgra ru brjod par bya/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/lo rgyus don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/_/dang por yid ches pa yi khungs bstan phyir/_/lo rgyus don gyi bshad lugs bstan 
[\[20b.5\]]pa ni/_/rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad lugs dang /_/rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i bshad lugs dang /_/don gyi sgra tshig bsdebs pa'i bshad lugs so/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum 
[\[20b.6\]]gyis/_/rang bzhin dang ni ngo bo sgra tshig gis/_/ji ltar byung ba'i khungs des yid kyang ches/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rtsa ba don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/_/snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas sems can 
[\[20b.7\]]bsdus pa thams cad kun/_/kun byed byang chub nga yis byas pa'i phyir/_/thams cad byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan zhes bya ba ye nas med pa'i phyir/_/kun kyang byang chub sems su bstan pa'i phyir/_/rtsa ba don gyi dgos ched 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]bstan pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/yo ga don gyi dgos ched bstan pa ni/_/kun byed nga las byung ba'i sku gsum gyis/_/longs spyod sku dang chos sku'i bstan pa yi/_/tan tra la sogs yo ga sde rnams la/_/so so'i 
[\[21a.2\]]khyad par bye brag yod kyis kyang /_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa nga yi bstan pa ni/_/rdzogs chen a ti yo ga'i don 'di ni/_/theg pa shan 'byed rdzogs pa'i lung zhes bshad/_/des na yo ga'i don gyi dgos pa bstan pa yin zhes bya/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/
[\[21a.3\]]dgos ched don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/_/bskal ba dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas/_/kun byed byang chub nga la dad pa yi/_/las dang skal ldan shin tu rnal 'byor pa/_/lta ba bsgom med dam tshig bsrung du med/_/phrin las btsal med lam la bgrod du 
[\[21a.4\]]med/_/sa la sbyang med rgyu dang 'bras bu med/_/don dam dang ni kun rdzob rnam gnyis med/_/bsgom zhing bsgrub tu med par mthong ba dang /_/sems bskyed med cing gnyen po med mthong ba/_/kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba yi/_/de lta bu yi 
[\[21a.5\]]dgos ched bstan pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/tshig gi don gyi dgos pa bstan pa ni/_/kun byed byang chub sems nga de bzhin nyid/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams bstan pa ni/_/kun byed de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin 
[\[21a.6\]]te/_/tshig dang yi ge sgra ru ma bsgrags na/_/gang zag yid kyi dbang po rig po yis/_/de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gab mi snang /_/des na tshig dang yi ge sgra ru bsgrags/_/des na tshig gi don gyi dgos par bshad/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/gang 
[\[21a.7\]]dang gang gi lo rgyus bshad pa ni/_/ston pa bstan pa 'khor gyi lo rgyus te/_/ston pa kun byed rang bzhin rnam gsum las/_/'khor gyi rang bzhin sku gsum ston pa byung /_/sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ni/_/ston pa bstan pa gsum 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]gyi lo rgyus yin/_/gang dang gang gi rtsa ba bshad pa ni/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/ji skad bstan pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/rtsa ba byang chub sems su bstan pa'i phyir/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams kyi/_/rtsa ba don gyi 
[\[21b.2\]]gtan tshigs bstan pa yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la/_/rnal 'byor rnam bzhi yo ga'i bye brag ni/_/lta ba spyod pa dam tshig sgrub pa dang /_/mi mthun khyad par so so'i bye brag de/_/shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub 'das pas 'byed/_/des 
[\[21b.3\]]na yo ga'i don gyi gtan tshigs bstan/_/dgos ched don gyi nges tshig bstan pa ni/_/dgos ni khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/_/rang sems de bzhin nyid de mthong 'gyur na/_/sangs rgyas tshig gi sa la mi gnas te/_/da lta nyid nas shin 
[\[21b.4\]]tu rnal 'byor thob/_/las med skal ba chung ba rnams la ni/_/ma gab mngon du phyung yang mi rtogs te/_/gang zhig nor bu rin chen 'dod pa de/_/shing la byi dor byas pas mi 'gyur bzhin/_/las bzang skal ldan shin tu rnal 'byor la/_/lta ba dam 
[\[21b.5\]]tshig phrin las sa lam dang /_/sems bskyed rgyu 'bras sgom sgrub gnyen po med/_/don dam kun rdzob rnam gnyis med mthong ba/_/des na sems kyi de bzhin nyid mthong bas/_/de lta bu la dgos pa'i dgos ched yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/tshig 
[\[21b.6\]]gi don gyi dgos pa'i nges tshig ni/_/med pa'i don bcu med pa'i sgra dang tshig_/tshig tu brjod pas bya med don mthong nas/_/bya mi dgos pa'i kun byed de thob pas/_/tshig gi don gyi dgos pa bstan pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun 
[\[21b.7\]]byed rgyal po las sems kyi bshad lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi gsang ba dam pa'i gdams ngag 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/kun byed nga ni kun tu gsang ba'o/_/
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa la/_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum mi bstan gsang /_/nga la gnas pa'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la/_/nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya/_/nga la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad la/_/nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang 
[\[22a.2\]]bar bya/_/nga yis byas pa'i khams gsum sems can la/_/nga yi rang bzhin mi bstan gsang bar bya/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan byas nas/_/sku gsum ston pa nga las 'byung mi 'gyur/_/sku gsum ston pa nga las ma byung na/_/bstan gsum theg gsum 'khor gsum tshogs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[22a.3\]]bstan gsum theg gsum 'khor gsum ma tshogs na/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum/_/bla med byang chub kun gyi rig pa med/_/nga las byung ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas la/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan gyur na/_/sku gsum ston 
[\[22a.4\]]gsum med pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_/nga la 'dus pa 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma gsang bstan gyur na/_/ston gsum theg pa khyad par phyed mi 'gyur/_/nga yis byas pa'i khams gsum sems can la/_/nga yi rang bzhin thugs rjes 
[\[22a.5\]]bstan gyur na/_/ston pa gsum gyis bstan pa'i gnas med 'gyur/_/ston pa gsum gyi bstan pa'i gnas med na/_/kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos rnams la/_/phun sum tshogs pa zhes su su zhig 'dogs/_/des na kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/nga 
[\[22a.6\]]yi rang bzhin nga yis phyung nas ni/_/nga la nga yi rang bzhin nga yis bstan/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa 'khor rnams la/_/bstan pa'i lung ni kun byed ngas ma phog_/shin tu rnal 'byor kun byed nga yin pas/_/de la kun byed rang bzhin bstan par bya/_/
[\[22a.7\]]zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las skal med la gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi lung chen po mngon du phyung ba'i lung 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]cig_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/mngon du phyung ba gsum bstan te/_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum ngas bstan pa/_/don rnams ston pa'i ston pa dang /_/don rig 'dod pa'i 'khor rnams dang /_/ma nor nges pa'i don dang gsum/_/kun byed nga 
[\[22b.2\]]yis mngon du phyung /_/don ston mngon du phyung ba ni/_/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs/_/sprul pa'i sku dang rnam pa gsum/_/'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum ste/_/don ston pa yi ston pa de/_/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang bzhin dang /_/nga yi ngo bo ston 
[\[22b.3\]]pa dang /_/thugs rje'i rang bzhin don mdzad gsum/_/rang bzhin gsum las mngon du phyung /_/ston pa gsum yang mngon phyung ba'o/_/don rig 'dod pa mngon phyung ba/_/ston pa gsum gyi 'khor gsum ste/_/nga bstan pa yi bye brag ni/_/dus gsum 
[\[22b.4\]]bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun/_/mi rtog mnyam nyid gnas pa de/_/kun byed nga yis mngon phyung 'khor/_/dbang po yul gyi rnam pa la/_/nyon mongs mi skye rnam mi rtog_/rang gi byang chub sems nyid 
[\[22b.5\]]la/_/chos dang chos nyid rtog byed pa/_/dang po sa nas bcu par bsgribs/_/sa bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/longs spyod 'dod yon rnam pa lngar/_/mthong ba'i ston 'khor rnam gnyis kyang /_/nga yi ngo bor mngon phyung yin/_/de bzhin nyid 
[\[22b.6\]]kyi rang bzhin la/_/rig pa yid kyi dbang po des/_/brtags pas mthong ba'i shes pa de/_/la las rtag pa nyid du mthong /_/la las stong pa chad par mthong /_/rgyu 'bras log par mthong ba yi/_/mu stegs rnam bzhis byin brlabs nas/_/rgyu dang 
[\[22b.7\]]'bras bu lung bstan pa'i/_/sdig spong sems dge rnam bzhi ni/_/bskal pa chen po gsum bar du/_/gnas pa'i 'khor dang ston pa yang /_/nga yis mngon du phyung ba yin/_/ye shes rig pa'i yul can la/_/yang dag nges par mngon du phyung /_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]kye sems dpa' chen po/_/mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba/_/gang gis gang mngon phyung ba ni/_/gang gis nga yis mngon du phyung /_/gang zhig mngon du phyung ba ni/_/sems de nyid de mngon du phyung /_/gang gi don du mngon phyung na/_/yul 
[\[23a.2\]]la so sor lta ba yi/_/'khor gyi don du mngon phyung yin/_/la la spong ba'i don du phyung /_/la la 'gegs pa'i don du phyung /_/la la spyod pa'i don du phyung /_/la la dag byed don du phyung /_/la lar blang dor don du phyung /_/la lar bdag nyid don du phyung /_/la las 
[\[23a.3\]]spang ba'i yul du mthong /_/la las dgag pa'i yul du mthong /_/la las spyod pa'i yul du mthong /_/la las dag bya'i yul du mthong /_/la las blang dor yul du mthong /_/la las dbang bsdu'i yul du mthong /_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ston pa yi/_/'khor tshogs 
[\[23a.4\]]rnams kyis de ltar mthong /_/sems dpa' chen po/_/nga yi rang bzhin mngon phyung ba/_/'di ni nges par lung ston cig_/nga ni khyed kyi ngo bo ste/_/nga yi rang bzhin phyung ba de/_/khyed kyi rang bzhin phyung ba yin/_/khyed kyi rang bzhin phyung ba des/_/rang gi rang 
[\[23a.5\]]bzhin shes par gyis/_/rang gi ngo bo shes par gyis/_/rgyu 'bras 'khor la lung ston cig_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des rgyu 'bras kyi 'khor la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ston 'khor rnams/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed 
[\[23a.6\]]kyis/_/kun byas phun sum tshogs par byas/_/phun sum tshogs pa mngon phyung ba/_/rang gi rang bzhin mngon phyung bas/_/rang gi rang bzhin yin par rtogs/_/rang gi ngo bo yin par rtogs/_/de la gzhan yin ma rtogs par/_/rang nyid yin par kun 
[\[23a.7\]]gyis rtogs/_/rang nyid yin par ma rtogs te/_/yul de rang du ma rtogs par/_/yul de dgra dang tsher brtags nas/_/rang gi rang bzhin de spangs nas/_/bskal pa brgya phrag yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong /_/rang sems chos nyid ma 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]mthong na/_/bskal pa brgya phrag yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/rang gi byang chub de spong 'gyur/_/bya med bde chen de mi thob/_/yul de rang du ma rtogs par/_/yul de rkyen gyis dgrar brtags nas/_/rang gi rang bzhin de bkag na/_/bskal pa brgya phrag yun 
[\[23b.2\]{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong /_/rang sems chos nyid ma mthong na/_/bskal pa brgya phrag yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/rang gi byang chub de 'gegs pas/_/bya med bde chen de mi thob/_/yul de rang du ma rtogs par/_/yul de sbyangs pa'i yul mthong 
[\[23b.3\]]nas/_/rang gi rang bzhin sbyong byed na/_/bskal pa chen po gsum bar du/_/chos nyid rang gi sems mi mthong /_/rang sems chos nyid ma mthong ste/_/rang sems sbyang med gding dang bral/_/yul de byang chub rang dag la/_/gzung 'dzin dri ma yod 
[\[23b.4\]]mthong nas/_/phyi nang rtog pa dag gsum gyis/_/khrus dang gtsang sbra dag byed pa/_/dag pa'i rang sems ma mthong ba/_/rang sems dag pa de dang bral/_/mi yi skye ba tshe bdun du/_/rang sems chos nyid de mi mthong /_/blang dor med pa'i byang chub la/_/
[\[23b.5\]]blang dang dor ba'i yul mthong nas/_/rang 'byung nyid la blang dor byas/_/rang gis rang la blang dor byas/_/bar ma chod kyis tshe gsum du/_/rang sems gnyis med de mi mthong /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub la/_/btsal zhing bsgrub pa'i yul mthong nas/_/
[\[23b.6\]]sems bskyed ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis/_/thams cad dbang sdud bdag tu byed/_/rang gi byang chub btsal med la/_/btsal bas grub par 'dod pa'i phyir/_/bcu drug zla bas tshes bsgrubs nas/_/stong dang brgya drug lo yis ni/_/cha lugs longs sku 
[\[23b.7\]]bzung nas ni/_/rang sems lhun grub bzod rtog byed/_/rang sems chos nyid mngon phyung 'di/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rtog byed pa'i/_/rtsol sgrub can la phan med kyang /_/las dang skal bar ldan pa yi/_/dgos ched don du phyung ba yin/_/zhes 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/_/de nas kun byed rgyal po nyid kyis lung bstan pa/_kye sems dpa' chen po/_/chos nyid mngon du phyung ba rang sems yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu theg pa can rnams kyis/_/rang sems mngon du phyung 
[\[24a.2\]]ba ma rtogs te/_/spong zhing 'gegs pas bskal pa yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]gnas/_/sbyongs shing bgrod la bskal pa gsum du gnas/_/dag byed khrus dang gtsang sbras mi tshe bdun/_/byin rlobs blang dor can ni mi tshe gsum/_/dbang sdud bdag 'dod lo stong brgya drug 
[\[24a.3\]]tu/_/longs sku cha lugs de yi rang sems rtogs/_/nam rtogs dus na mi rtsol bde chen thob/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rgyu 'bras theg chen bzhin du ma yin gyis/_/kun byed nga yi lung 'di nges par zung /_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams 
[\[24a.4\]]cad dang /_/rang sems chos nyid ye nas gcig yin pas/_/rgyu 'bras lugs bzhin 'di la rtog ma byed/_/rang sems de bzhin nyid la rtog ma byed/_/rang sems de bzhin nyid la brtag bya ru/_/rang gi byang chub ngo bo snang ba yin/_/'di las ma rtogs 
[\[24a.5\]]so sos ming btags pa/_/kun rdzob snang la don dam mi snang 'dogs/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis med bden pa gcig_/bden pa yang dag nges par yod ma yin/_/yang dag 'dogs pa nga yang 'khrul pa yin/_/bde ba 'dod pa chags pa'i nad 
[\[24a.6\]]yin pas/_/'dod pa med pas bde ba len par byed/_/sangs rgyas bsgrubs pas grub pa ma yin te/_/ma btsal rang bzhin gnas pas lhun gyis grub/_/ma btsal rang bzhin gnas la mi rtog zhog_/sangs rgyas don gyi [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]ming 'di la/_/
[\[24a.7\]]sangs rgyas yang dag yod par nga mi ston/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas yod par mthong ba ni/_/chos nyid dbyings las sangs rgyas mi rnyed de/_/sangs rgyas ma lta rang sems bar med rtogs/_/brtags na med de rang sems ye nas gsal/_/dngos su mi 
[\[24b\]]
