[\[24b.1\]]snang rang sems kun la khyab/_/yin pa'i ngo bo snang ba 'di yin te/_/'di min snyam pa'i rgyu 'bras theg chen la/_/spong 'gegs sbyong ba byin brlabs sna tshogs kyis/_/rang sems chos nyid bya med de las gol/_/rang gam bzhag nas gzhan ma rgyang 
[\[24b.2\]]du tshol/_/bya med bde bor rtsol ba dang du len/_/tshi chad pa yi nad du de las med/_/ma yengs ting 'dzin 'dzin pa'i rtod phur yin/_/ye nas yin la yengs pa'i shor ba med/_/ma yengs ting 'dzin re ba'i slu mkhan des/_/rgyu 'bras theg chen drang 
[\[24b.3\]]ba'i lung bstan yin/_/ye nas yin la yengs med shor med de/_/rtsol sgrub kun gyi gnyen po 'joms byed de/_/rgyu 'bras ston pa'i ston pa 'khor rnams la/_/kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan gyur na/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung zhes sgro skur 
[\[24b.4\]]'debs/_/sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin can/_/ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i ma bcos rnal 'byor spangs/_/ma bcos rnal ma kun gyi chos nyid yin/_/chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med/_/sangs rgyas ming du btags pa [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_/
[\[24b.5\]]chos nyid bya ba gzhan med rang sems te/_/rang sems ma bcos chos kyi sku ru bshad/_/ma bcos pa la ye nas skye med pas/_/skye med don la btsal zhing bsgrub tu med/_/btsal zhing bsgrubs pas bya med 'grub mi 'gyur/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon 
[\[24b.6\]]cig_/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs sku dang /_/sprul pa'i sku dang ston pa rnam pa gsum/_/theg gcig theg gnyis theg pa rnam gsum gyi/_/ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yis phyung /_/nga ni ston pa kun gyi 'byung gnas yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin 
[\[24b.7\]]rnam pa gsum las phyung /_/spros bral skye med dga' ba'i 'khor rnams la/_/nga yi rang bzhin gzung 'dzin bral ba las/_/mi rtog mnyam pa nyid kyi chos sku byung /_/chos sku'i 'khor ni phye ba med pa ste/_/ma skyes mnyam pa nyid kyi don bstan pa/_/
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]de ni lhag ma med pa'i theg par bshad/_/nga yi rang bzhin kun du snang ba la/_/'dod spyod dag pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/_/nga yi ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs par phyung /_/ngo bo de la lta spyod rdzogs byed ston/_/de ni thun mong min pa'i 
[\[25a.2\]]theg pa ste/_/nga yi rol pa'i ngo bo phyung ba yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin thugs rjer 'byung ba las/_/ji ltar 'dul bar sprul nas don mdzad pa'i/_/sprul pa'i sku dang 'khor tshogs rnam bzhi la/_/rgyu 'bras 'tsham pa'i thugs rje phyung ba yin/_/kye sems dpa' 
[\[25a.3\]]chen po/_/mdor na mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes pa/_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar bstan pa la/_/mngon du phyung ba'i lung zhes bstan pa yin/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin gcig pu la/_/snang ba'i yul ni rnam pa gsum snang la/_/de las byung ba'i chos ni 'di lta 
[\[25a.4\]]ste/_/sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mngon phyung yin/_/'di las gzhan yin pa ru rtog byed pa/_/kun byed nga dang phrad pa'i skal med pas/_/'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyi/_/rim pas sbyangs pa'i 
[\[25a.5\]]rgyu 'bras theg 'khor yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga yis mngon du phyung ba 'di/_/gzhan ma mngon du phyung ba yin/_/nga nyid mngon du phyung ba yin/_/chos nyid mngon du phyung ba yin/_/rang sems mngon du phyung ba yin/_/ma nor mngon du phyung ba yin/_/
[\[25a.6\]]nges pa mngon du phyung ba yin/_/de bzhin mngon du phyung ba yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga yi rang bzhin mngon du phyung ba 'dis/_/che ba lnga yi sangs rgyas mngon du phyung ba yin/_/che ba lnga yi sangs rgyas 'di lta ste/_/nga yi ngo bo mngon du phyung ba ni/_/snang 
[\[25a.7\]]srid snod bcud nga yi chos nyid 'di/_/kun la snang bas mngon par phyung ba yin/_/bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin/_/rtsol grub med pas ye nas che bar bshad/_/mngon par sangs rgyas zhes su bshad pa yin/_/nga yi rang sems mngon du phyung ba 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]'di/_/snying bor gyur pas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/_/bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin/_/rtsol sgrub med pas ye nas che bar bshad/_/bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas che bar bshad/_/ma skyes spros bral mngon du phyung ba 'di/_/ye nas gzung 
[\[25b.2\]]'dzin bral bas chos kyi dbyings/_/bya mi dgos pas ye nas sangs rgyas yin/_/rtsol sgrub mi dgos ye nas che bar bshad/_/chos dbyings sangs rgyas che ba yin par bshad/_/nga yis nges par mngon du phyung ba 'di/_/dpe don rtags ni rnam pa gsum 
[\[25b.3\]]bstan te/_/chos nyid don la nam mkha'i dpe bstan te/_/byang chub sems kyi rtags kyis nges pa ru/_/the tshom za ba rnams la mngon pa ru/_/dpe don rtags kyis de yin sangs rgyas bstan/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma nor nyid 'di ni/_/su la mngon du 
[\[25b.4\]]phyung yang mi snang bas/_/de ni ma nor ba yi rang bzhin la/_/bzhin ni bcos pa med pa'i rang bzhin te/_/nyid ni ngo bo nyid la btags pa yin/_/de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin de nyid la/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas yod pa'i sgros mi 'dogs/_/khams 
[\[25b.5\]]gsum sems can med pa'i skur mi 'debs/_/rtog dpyod bsam pa cir yang dgongs med pas/_/sangs rgyas med pa'i che bar nga yis bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rang bzhin rnam pa gsum mngon du phyung ba'i 
[\[25b.6\]]le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la gdams ngag phog pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje chen po 'di nyon cig_/nga ni ye nas kun byed rgyal po yin/_/ston pa bstan pa 'khor 
[\[25b.7\]]dus ngas byas nas/_/ston pa'i ston pa yang ni nga yis byed/_/bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin de ston la/_/'khor yang nga yi ngo bo de phyung nas/_/dus gnas nga yi rang bzhin de ru ni/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa las/_/nga min chos ni gcig kyang bstan pa 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]med/_/sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang /_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir/_/khyod kyang nga las nga yis phyung ba yin/_/kun byed nga ni chos kyi snying por zhog_/kun byed nga ni ye nas byas zin gyis/_/da gdod bya 
[\[26a.2\]]dgos kun la lung ma ston/_/da gdod bya dgos 'khor la lung bstan na/_/'khor rnams rtsol ba'i nad kyis zin par 'gyur/_/rang 'byung ye shes med pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_/byang chub sems la 'chos pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid la 
[\[26a.3\]]'chos pa'i skyon du 'gyur/_/skyon gyis yon tan khyad du gsod par 'gyur/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis bden pa bslus pas bslad pas na/_/min pa'i rtsol bas bya med yin ma sgrub/_/sems dpa' khyod kyis kun byed nga rig gis/_/nga yis byas pa'i chos 
[\[26a.4\]]rnams thams cad kun/_/ye nas rang 'byung ye shes de bzhin nyid/_/ston gsum nga yi rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/bstan pa gsum yang nga yi de bzhin nyid/_/'khor rnams kun kyang sems dpa' rdo rje'i tshul/_/dus gnas phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[26a.5\]]thams cad kun/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yin byang chub sems/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/_/sems dpa' rdo rje la gdams ngag phog pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun 
[\[26a.6\]]byed rgyal po des nyid kyi sku gdung 'di zung shig par gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po 'di zung zhig_/sku gdung ring bsrel rtag 'chang na/_/rgyal ba'i yang mes kun byed nga dang mnyam/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa/_/kye 
[\[26a.7\]]dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yang mes po/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/sku gdung ring bsrel rtag tu zung zhig pa/_/sku ni rgyal ba gang dang gang gi sku/_/gdung ni sangs rgyas gang dang gang gi gdung /_/ring bsrel zhes ni ji lta bu la bgyi/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]zhes zhus so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/sku ni nga sras rgyal ba gsum gyi sku/_/gdung ni dus gsum rgyal ba nga yi sems/_/dus med rtag tu sems dpa' 'di 'chang na/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchod pa'i rten/_/sku gdung ring 
[\[26b.2\]]bsrel zhes ni de la bya/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/sku gdung ring bsrel de ltar lags na yang /_/de la dus gsum sangs rgyas ji ltar mchod/_/mchod pa la ni yon tan ci zhig mchis/_/zhes zhus so/_/kye sems dpa' 
[\[26b.3\]]chen po khyod nyon cig_/nga yi sku gdung ring bsrel de la ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rtag tu sems ltas mchod/_/de yi yon tan mi 'bral de thob nas/_/chos rnams kun byed rgyal po nus par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems 
[\[26b.4\]]kun byed rgyal po las sku gdung gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi chos nyid nga nyid yin pa'i lung 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/snang srid 
[\[26b.5\]]snod bcud thams cad kun/_/snang ni nga yi ngo bor snang /_/dag ni chos nyid dbyings su dag_/'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs ston/_/sku gsum sna tshogs byung nas ni/_/theg pa gsum ni ngo yang ston/_/rgyu 'bras can ni des tshim byed/_/'das pa 
[\[26b.6\]]yul la mi ltos pas/_/rgyu la mi bsgrub 'bras mi 'dod/_/'dod pa med pa'i dgongs pa dang /_/rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/_/ye nas yin la bya mi dgos/_/don rnams ji bzhin bskyod med pas/_/ji bzhin pa la bsgrub mi dgos/_/
[\[26b.7\]]chos kun rang bzhin lhun grub phyir/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas grub pas kyang /_/rtsol zhing sgrub pa'i lung mi 'bogs/_/btsal na gang btsal ting 'dzin des/_/mi grub ting 'dzin nad du che/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga min ston pa thams cad 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]kyis/_/bya ba'i phrin las sna tshogs dang /_/bsam pa'i ting 'dzin rim pa dang /_/'phro ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dang /_/blta ba'i yul ni ci dmigs kyang /_/ji bzhin pa la g.yos pa med/_/bya ba'i las kyis grub pa med/_/bsam pa'i 
[\[27a.2\]]ting 'dzin yal bar 'gyur/_/'phro ba'i 'od zer zhi 'gyur na/_/blta yul gang yang mthong ba med/_/des na btsal ba'i las ma byed/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/yul las btsal bas grub pa'i lung de ni/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg can ston par byed/_/rgyu dang 
[\[27a.3\]]'bras bu'i theg can chos nyid ni/_/chos dang chos nyid rnam pa gnyis phye nas/_/chos kyis chos nyid tshol ba rnyed lung med/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las btsal bas mi 'grub pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[27a.4\]]de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des ma btsal bas grub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/bstan pa'i theg pa rnam gsum bstan pa ni/_/ston pa gsum gyis mi 
[\[27a.5\]]stsol lung ma bstan/_/kun byed nga yis theg gcig bstan pa ni/_/btsal bas grub pa'i lung du ngas ma bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun byed byang chub nga yi rang bzhin las/_/ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ni/_/rgyal ba 
[\[27a.6\]]kun gyi snying po sku gsum ste/_/nga yi rang bzhin ma bcos chos skur grub/_/nga yi ngo bo ma bcos longs spyod rdzogs/_/nga yi thugs rje mngon phyung sprul sku gsum/_/btsal nas grub pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa med/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' 
[\[27a.7\]]chen po nyon cig_/sku gsum kun byed nga ru 'dus pa ste/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rjes ma bcos gsum/_/sku gsum nga yi de bzhin nyid du bstan/_/nga dang nga yi de bzhin nyid las ni/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya'i 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]yon tan sgros kyang med/_/sems can zhes bya'i skyon gyi rnam pa med/_/mi rtog mnyam pa nyid du de bzhin gnas/_/'di las ma gtogs pa ni gzhan med pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di las lhag pa yi/_/kun byed nga la nges lung mnos pa 
[\[27b.2\]]med/_/byed mkhan kun byed rgyal po nga yis kyang /_/mi rtog mnyam nyid de bzhin nyid 'di las/_/nyid la nyid kyis bstan pa rdul tsam med/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu 
[\[27b.3\]]dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi byung khungs nyid las byung ba 'di gsungs so/_/kye chos kun sdud pa'i rdo rje nyon/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/nga ni chos kun snying po ste/_/nga ni chos 
[\[27b.4\]]kun sa bon yin/_/nga ni chos kun rgyu yang yin/_/nga ni chos kun sdong po ste/_/nga ni chos kyi gzhi ma yin/_/nga ni chos kyi rtsa ba yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/'dus pa'i phyir na snying por bshad/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/
[\[27b.5\]]skye ba'i phyir na sa bon yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/'byung ba'i phyir na rgyu yang yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kyi/_/yan lag 'byung bas sdong po yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/nga la gnas pas gzhi ma yin/_/ji 
[\[27b.6\]]ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/nga yin pas na rtsa bar bshad/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyon cig_/kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/_/rang bzhin ma bcos rnam gsum las/_/ming tsam sku gsum byung tshul bstan/_/nges par sku gsum ston pa 
[\[27b.7\]]yang /_/de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/_/kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/_/ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba las/_/chos sku skye med ming tsam byung /_/nges par chos sku ming tsam ste/_/de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/_/kun byed byang chub sems nga yi/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ngo bo ming tsam mngon phyung ba/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku ming tsam tshul/_/nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku de/_/de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/_/kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/_/thugs rje sprul sku mngon phyung ba/_/thugs rje ma bcos 
[\[28a.2\]]rang bzhin las/_/ming tsam sprul sku tshul byung ba/_/nges par sprul pa'i sku de yang /_/de bzhin nyid las g.yos pa med/_/de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las/_/sku gsum g.yos pa med pa bzhin/_/sku gsum bstan pa'i chos rnams dang /_/sku gsum 
[\[28a.3\]]'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang /_/chos rnams kun la'ang g.yos pa med/_/ma g.yos pa yi chos nyid la/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur btags byas nas/_/rtsol dang bsgrub pa byas nas ni/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung 'dod pa/_/kun byed nga las byas pa yi/_/
[\[28a.4\]]rgyu 'bras 'das las gol ba yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i sku gsum ston pa dang /_/nga las byung ba'i dus gsum sangs rgyas dang /_/nga las byung ba'i 'khor gnas dus la sogs/_/kun kyang 
[\[28a.5\]]nga yi byang chub sems yin na/_/sems dpa' rdo rje de la rtog mi rtog_/sems dpa' rdo rje de la ma rtog shig_/nga ni ye nas kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/nga yis byas pa kun kyang byang chub sems/_/nga yi rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag byang /_/nga 
[\[28a.6\]]yis kun la khyab pa ye nas chub/_/nga yis rang bzhin gsal bas ye nas sems/_/nga ni nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis/_/ye nas yin pa'i byang chub sems kyis ni/_/'jig rten sgyu mar snang ba'i chos bzhin du/_/sku gsum ston pa dus gsum 
[\[28a.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams/_/bu dang tsha bo 'khor gyi tshul byung nas/_/ma nor bden pa'i gdams ngag 'bogs pa bzhin/_/byang chub sems ni nam mkha' bzhin bstan nas/_/kun byed byung tshul nam mkha' bzhin du bstan/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las chos thams cad byang chub sems kun byed las byung ba'i khungs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi khungs kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir nyid las byung ba'i 
[\[28b.2\]]tshig 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig_/nga ni chos rnams kun byed rgyal po ste/_/sku gsum ston pa'i pha ma nga yin la/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po yin/_/'khor gnas dus kyi ston pa'i sgron ma byed/_/kun 
[\[28b.3\]]byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/_/sku gsum ston pa nga las phyung bas ni/_/sku gsum de yi bshad lugs rnam gsum gyis/_/chos kyi bshad lugs rnam pa gsum yang bstan/_/de yang kun byed nga yis bstan pa yin/_/kun byed rgyal po nga 
[\[28b.4\]]yis rang bzhin 'di/_/ston pa kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs rnam pa lngas/_/ma nor nges pa'i gtan tshigs khungs bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/byang chub 
[\[28b.5\]]sems ni ye nas rdzogs pa che/_/rdzogs pa chen po rgyu 'bras 'das/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i bshad lugs bstan pa dang /_/kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las/_/sku gsum ston pa byung ba'i bshad lugs dang /_/rnam pa gnyis kyi bshad lugs 
[\[28b.6\]]bstan pa'o/_/kun byed byang chub sems kyi bshad lugs ni/_/byang chub sems ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir/_/gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lnga yis bshad/_/sku gsum ston pa gsum gyi bshad lugs ni/_/phun sum tshogs pa rnam 
[\[28b.7\]]pa lnga nang du/_/chos kyi sku ni byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa rang gi ngo bo ston/_/sprul pa'i sku ni don rnams tshig tu sdeb/_/sku gsum ston pa'i bshad lugs rnam gsum ste/_/nga yis rang bzhin rnam gsum bshad lugs 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]yin/_/kun byed nga ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa ste/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pas spyod yul kun las 'das/_/kun las 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems ni kun gyi snying po yin/_/snying po yin pas yid ches khungs kyang 
[\[29a.2\]]bstan/_/byang chub sems ni chos kun rtsa ba ste/_/rtsa ba yin pas thams cad don yang 'dus/_/byang chub sems ni khyad par kun las 'phags/_/khyad par 'phags pas theg pa'i shan yang 'byed/_/byang chub sems rtogs chos nyid kun sangs rgyas/_/
[\[29a.3\]]des na skal ldan dgos ched bstan pa yin/_/sems kyi rang bzhin tshig tu brjod med de/_/ma brjod sems kyi rang bzhin mi snang bas/_/mi snang mtshon du med ces ma brjod na/_/kun kyang rang sems ma mthong rtsol sgrub byed/_/des na brjod med tshig gi don yang 
[\[29a.4\]]bshad/_/des na gtan tshigs don gyi bshad lugs lngas/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems kyi don/_/ma nor nges par gtan la 'bebs par byed/_/rgyu 'bras med par gtan la phab pa yin/_/thams cad byang chub sems yin yid kyang ches/_/byang 
[\[29a.5\]]chub sems yin ye nas yid ches pas/_/sems la btsal ba med par yid kyang ches/_/btsal du ye nas med par yid ches pas/_/mi rtsol bde ba chen po ngang la gnas/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin de ltar gnas/_/kun byed nga las sangs rgyas gzhan 
[\[29a.6\]]med do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las gtan tshigs bshad lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du gzhag pa'i phyir bya med rdzogs pa'i lung 
[\[29a.7\]]khungs chen po 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyon cig_/kye bya med yul ni mi gnas nam mkha' 'dra/_/mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul med mi rtog chos kyi lam/_/bsngo ba'i cha shas phra mo'i yul la byung ba ste/_/rtog sgom chos kyi 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]sku ni khyad par don med pas/_/rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas/_/bya bral yul la mi gnas gnyen pos bcos su med/_/yan lag chos kyi dbang gis snying po'i yul tshol zhing /_/rnam pa cir yang mi rtog thabs kyis de la rol/_/snying 
[\[29b.2\]]po rang bzhin 'byung bas chos sku gzhan na med/_/rdul phran gcig la gtses shing phyogs bcu kun dang bral/_/mi gnas don nyid legs pa'i ye shes rang 'byung ste/_/mngon sum kun la mi rtog yangs pa'i snying po la/_/rnam dag lam der zhugs 
[\[29b.3\]]nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob/_/mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pas chags pa'i gnas med de/_/de bzhin bzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med/_/mngon sum thob par 'dod nas rgyu la rtag tu sgom/_/sgom chags bde ba de la mnyam pa'i don mi 'byung /_/
[\[29b.4\]]sku gcig kun la khyab pas bsnan pa'i chos med de/_/mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba med/_/chos kyi rol pas nyams phag lhag pa'i gnas med de/_/rang 'byung che ba'i yul la kun du ji bzhin gnas/_/ngo mtshar mthong ba'i yul med de la mthong ba'i 
[\[29b.5\]]mig_/gang la thos par mi rigs snyad pa kun dang bral/_/chos dang chos min rtag tu 'dres shing mtshungs/_/don dam chos shes lhag pa'i gnas shes bshad pa'ang med/_/'khrul dang byang chub lam de rtog pas thob pa'ang med/_/rang 'byung ye shes nyid 
[\[29b.6\]]kyang tshig gi mtha' dang bral/_/ye nas rgyas pa'i bdag nyid mngon sum gnas pa la/_/grib ma gzugs kyi dpe bzhin de la rtog pa 'byung /_/med de med pa ma yin med pa'i snying po 'byung /_/stong ste stong pa ma yin stong pa'i yul la gnas/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[29b.7\]]rang bzhin de la 'byung ba'i dran pa skye/_/bya bral zin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa med pas len/_/bza' ba'i yul med de la ye shes 'byung ba rtsom/_/sngon gyi drang srong rjes su chags pa'i yid kyang 'jog_/rnam rtsol 'bad pa'i gdung pas kun tu zin ta re/_/rang 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]bzhin lam der zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/ji bzhin pa zhes rnam rtog de phyir rtog bsgom pa/_/bde ba chen po 'dod pas chags pa'i nad yin te/_/mi g.yo mnyam par gnas pas sman chen ma byas na/_/mtho ris 
[\[30a.2\]]bgrod pa'i rgyu des nyon mongs zin par 'gyur/_/lam med lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi nad che ba/_/phyin par 'dod pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/_/rnyed pa'i yul med 'jig rten gsum du mi 'byung zhing /_/sa bcur ltos pa'i gnas kyang byang chub 
[\[30a.3\]]sgrib pa yin/_/shin tu myur ba'i ye shes bsam pa kun dang bral/_/bshes gnyen kun las 'byung ba'i nor bu rin chen bzhin/_/dmigs pa med cing 'gyur ba'i gnas la mi ltos par/_/rang gi rang bzhin legs pas re ba thams cad skong /_/brtags 
[\[30a.4\]]na med la bzhag na legs pa 'byung ba che/_/dngos su mi snang chags pa'i cha lugs kun la ston/_/bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod/_/thams cad grub pa'i yul zhes bdag med snying rjes bstan/_/nang nas ma g.yos nang du btsal 
[\[30a.5\]]ba'i gnas med de/_/yul phyir chags la yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med/_/mi 'byung mi 'jug bdag med snying rje de yis ni/_/gzhan gyi nor min mi 'ong ye nas gnas pa yin/_/bde ba 'dod na bde la rgyab kyis phyogs/_/bde bas zin te bde bas 
[\[30a.6\]]bde ba tshol/_/byang chub 'khrul pa ye rngam chos la za/_/'di lta'i yul can sangs rgyas mthong ba med/_/sangs rgyas med pas sangs rgyas ming yang med/_/sangs rgyas ston pas ming du btags pa nor/_/sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob byed nor ba'i lam/_/
[\[30a.7\]]gzugs med chos kun bshad pa rdul tsam med/_/zin dang chags dang bral dang zhi/_/dngos po med dang rnam par spong /_/bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin la/_/bza' ba'i thabs la rag pa med/_/yangs so che'o chos chen po/_/chung ngu rnams kyi gnyen po yin/_/
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]che la dmigs pa'i cha bsnyams nas/_/chung che de rnams dmigs dang bral/_/gsung dang rgyas dang dmigs dang snang /_/sgyu mkhan ri mo'i rnam pa bzhin/_/'byung 'jug ye shes rmugs pa yis/_/de yi dbang las skye bar 'gyur/_/'di ni theg pa 
[\[30b.2\]]kun gyi rgyal/_/btang ngo bzhag go rang bzhin te/_/'dod pa med cing len pa med/_/brod pa rdul tsam mi bskyed do/_/khyung chen nam mkha' lding ba bzhin/_/spro ba med cing bsdu ba med/_/stor bar mi dogs bza' ba med/_/rgya mtsho bzhin du ye 
[\[30b.3\]]gnas la/_/chos rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar byed/_/yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/_/bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med/_/byang chub snying por de ma thag_/ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po 'byung /_/snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin/_/mi rtog 
[\[30b.4\]]nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la/_/skye zhing 'pho ba'i chos med de/_/rgyu rkyen yan lag bcu gnyis po/_/skur pas brtags pas bshad pa yin/_/'khrul pa rnams kyi sgo tsam du/_/mkhas pas de bzhin shes 
[\[30b.5\]]par gyis/_/'gro ba rgyud drug snang ba yang /_/dang po'i lam du shes par bya/_/'dod spyod snying rjes brlan pas na/_/gang du dga' bar byang chub spyod/_/shen ba smad 'tshong mtshams med lnga/_/kha na ma tho 'jig rten spong /_/yongs su rdzogs pa chos 
[\[30b.6\]]kyi rtsis/_/bde ba che las gzhan med do/_/yang chos thams cad de bas na/_/chos kyi rang bzhin de yin pas/_/chos kyis chos nyid btsal ba dang /_/nam mkhas nam mkha' btsal ba dang /_/gzhan la ltos pa'i chos nyid ni/_/me yis me 
[\[30b.7\]]gsod pa 'dra ste/_/shin tu dka' ba'i las byed pa'o/_/rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di/_/yongs kyi rgyud la sbas pa med/_/mi len byang chub spyod rnams la/_/rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bya med rdzogs pa'i lung 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bcu las mi gnas yul med kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des lta ba yul med kyi lung 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos 
[\[31a.2\]]rnams ni/_/rang gi byang chub sems yin pas/_/de la blta ba'i yul ma mchis/_/mi rtog pas na mnyam pa nyid/_/de bzhin nam mkha'i dgongs pa ste/_/rnal 'byor zhes ni de la bya/_/dbang po lnga la snang ba rnams/_/rang gsal de la mi rtog 
[\[31a.3\]]pas/_/de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas/_/rnal 'byor de bzhin nyid du gnas/_/tshig dang yi ge don brtags pas/_/tshig yig don la brtag med pas/_/rtog med mnyam pa de bzhin nyid/_/de yang nam mkha'i dgongs pa gnas/_/
[\[31a.4\]]bsam du med pa'i don 'di ni/_/nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bya med rdzogs pa las lta bu yul med kyi nam mkha'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[31a.5\]]rgyal po des bya med rdzogs pa'i lung phyag rgya bzhugs tshul gyi le'u 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/sems nyid kun du bzang po yi/_/bzhugs tshul bstan pa 'di lta ste/_/byang chub sems su bzhugs tsam na/_/chos rnams kun 
[\[31a.6\]]gyi snying por bzhugs/_/de rtogs kun byed rgyal po yin/_/kun byed rgyal po 'gyur ba med/_/des na 'gyur ba med par bstan/_/chos kyi sku ru bzhugs tsam na/_/gzung 'dzin spros dang bral nas bzhugs/_/gzung 'dzin bral la 'gyur ba 
[\[31a.7\]]med/_/longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhugs tsam na/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas/_/'dod pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs/_/sprul pa'i sku ru bzhugs tsam na/_/gang gis 'dul ba'i dus tsam na/_/gang la gang dgos sku sprul nas/_/
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dgos pa phun sum tshogs par bzhugs/_/dus gsum 'gyur ba med par bzhugs/_/chos kun phyag rgya nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid/_/sku gsum mtshan nyid de bzhin gnas/_/thams cad de 
[\[31b.2\]]bzhin nyid du gnas/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos kun ni/_/ji bzhin pa la bcos su med/_/btsal zhing bsgrub pa thams cad kyis/_/snga ba bgrod pas phyin pa gcig kyang med/_/snga ma byas pas zin pa gcig kyang med/_/bsgrubs shing btsal 
[\[31b.3\]]bas snga ma grub pa med/_/thams cad ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bya med rdzogs pa phyag rgya 'gyur med kyi lung gi le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems 
[\[31b.4\]]kun byed rgyal po des khams gsum gyi sems can la rang gi sems ston pa yin par bstan pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/_/rang gi byang chub sems de ni/_/ston pa yin par mngon bstan na/_/bskal pa 
[\[31b.5\]]brgya phrag stong du ni/_/rang sems ston par ma mthong bas/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/rang sems ston pa mngon phyung bas/_/rang sems ston pa'i chos nyon cig_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/kun rgyu byang chub sems las ni/_/sems 
[\[31b.6\]]kyi ngo bo 'byung chen lnga/_/ston pa byang chub sems lnga phyung /_/sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_/chos ni rang gi ngo bos 'chad/_/ston ni rang gi rang bzhin ston/_/ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku de/_/dgongs pa nyid la nyid mi rtog_/yul chos 
[\[31b.7\]]gzhan la'ang rtog mi byed/_/byang chub sems kyi ston pa lngas/_/kun kyang chos nyid de bzhin ston/_/byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/_/ston pa sa yi skur byung nas/_/tshig dang yi ges mi ston te/_/rang gi rang bzhin ston byed pa/_/bdag 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog_/mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston/_/khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/_/de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/rtsol ba'i chos nyid ma btsal 'grub/_/byang chub sems kyi ye shes 
[\[32a.2\]]des/_/ston pa chu yi skur byung nas/_/tshig dang yi ges mi ston te/_/rang gi ngo bos ston byed pa/_/bdag tu mi rtog gzhan mi rtog_/mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa ston/_/khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/_/de rtogs sangs rgyas 
[\[32a.3\]]kun dang mnyam/_/rtsol ba'i chos nyid ma btsal grub/_/byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/_/ston pa rlung gi skur byung nas/_/tshig dang yi ges mi ston par/_/rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa/_/bdag gzhan gnyis su mi rtog par/_/mi rtog mnyam pa'i 
[\[32a.4\]]dgongs pa ston/_/khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/_/de rtogs sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/rtsol ba'i chos ni ma btsal grub/_/byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/_/ston pa nam mkha'i skur byung nas/_/tshig dang yi ges mi ston 
[\[32a.5\]]par/_/rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa/_/bdag gzhan gnyis su mi rtog par/_/mi rtog mnyam ba'i dgongs pa ston/_/khams gsum sems can thams cad kyis/_/de rtog sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/rtsol ba'i chos ni ma 
[\[32a.6\]]btsal grub/_byang chub sems kyi ye shes des/_ston pa nam mkha'i skur byung nas/_/tshig dang yi ges mi ston te/_/rang gi ngo bos chos ston pa/_/bdag gzhan gnyis su mi rtog par/_/mi 'byed pa yi dgongs pa ston/_/khams 
[\[32a.7\]]gsum sems can thams cad kyis/_/mngon phyung ston pa de rnams kyis/_/rang gi ngo bos chos 'chad pa/_/'di yis kun kyang rig par gyis/_/kye khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/khyed rnams 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]nga yis byas pa'i phyir/_/nga yi sras yin nga dang mnyam/_/nga dang mi gnyis nga yin phyir/_/nga yis khyed la mngon phyung ba/_/nga yi ngo bo ston pa lngas/_/rang bzhin rnam lnga gcig tu bstan/_/gcig ni kun byed nga yin gyis/_/de bzhin khyed 
[\[32b.2\]]kyang yid ches kyis/_/kye khams gsum sems can ma lus kun/_/nga med tsam na khyed kyang med/_/khyed med tsam gyi dus tsam na/_/ston pa lnga yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mi rtog chos kyang ston mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[32b.3\]]sems kun byed rgyal po las rang sems ston par phyung ba'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems las byung ba'i chos chen po lnga ston par byung ba'i rtags su ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems ston par zhal gyis 
[\[32b.4\]]bzhes pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/bsam 'das brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems/_/ston pa'i sgron mar gyur pas yon tan rab bsngags pa/_/chos kyi snying por gyur pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyid/_/bya 
[\[32b.5\]]bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas/_/tshul khrims la sogs spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa'i/_/ji snyed rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan pa/_/bde gshegs yum 'gyur kun gyi mtshungs lam de/_/de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam 
[\[32b.6\]]grol mchog gi lam/_/phra zhing shes dka' kun gyi lam ste mi rtog rtog las 'das/_/mi gnas mi dmigs spros med bsam pa kun dang bral/_/tshig gis mi phebs dbyibs dang kha dog spyod yul med/_/bstan cing brtag par 
[\[32b.7\]]dka' la brjod du rdul tsam med/_/sngon gyi drang srong lam du gang zhugs pa/_/bsgom chags lam gyi nad kyis zin ta re/_/ston pa'i lung bzhin tshig gi mtha' spyod lam du de mthong na/_/de ni rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/_/
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]yang dag lam ni tshig gis mtshon du med/_/yang dag nyid du bstan pa nga yis 'khrul/_/dag dang ma dag gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs/_/rnam pa cir yang mi 'byed ye shes gti mug dang /_/thogs med gsal ba'i mar me 
[\[33a.2\]]bsam pa kun dang bral/_/ngang gis mi g.yo rmugs shing ting 'dzin rgyal por gnas/_/mngon sum mthong bas mthong med mngon sum mthong ba'i mig_/de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan zhes de la bya/_/mtha' dang dbus med yangs pa'i 
[\[33a.3\]]snying po la/_/mi len mi 'dor mnyam pa'i rgyal por gnas/_/sems dang bag chags gnyis med 'dres shing mtshungs/_/'dzin pas brtags shing snang ba'i chos rnams ni/_/rang gi rgyan du snang bas mi 'dor spong mi byed/_/cir yang mi dgongs 
[\[33a.4\]]thabs kyis de la rol/_/kun dang mi mthun yongs kyis spong ba'i chos/_/nyon mongs lnga dang mtshams med lnga po yi/_/rnam dag lam der zhugs nas mnyam pa'i rgyal po thob/_/bud med la sogs kun kyang spong mi byed/_/lo rgyus don gnyis 
[\[33a.5\]]tshad ma'i blor bzhag nas/_/ting 'dzin gsum po brtan nas grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa/_/rtsod bral lung las gol zhes 'khrul ba yin/_/bya bral lhun rdzogs bde ba'i lhun la gnas/_/ye shes rang 'byung che ba'i snying po nyid/_/mi g.yo mi 
[\[33a.6\]]'gyur bsnyad pa kun dang bral/_/zin pa'i bdud rtsis rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms/_/bya bral zin pa'i yul la ji bzhin gnas/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/chos rnams thams cad thig le chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na/_/spos ba 
[\[33a.7\]]med cing bsdus pa med/_/skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/_/'gog pa med par de bzhin gnas/_/rnam par mi rtog snying po 'di/_/nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas pas/_/rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bya med rdzogs pa bsgom du med pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi gdams ngag phog pa dang mthun pa'i lung chen po rim gyis bstan te/_/kye sems 
[\[33b.2\]]dpa' chen po nyon cig_/chos rnams thams cad nga las byung ba na/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/ye nas rnam dag dbyings kyi lung du bstan/_/phyi dang nang kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings/_/ye nas rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul 
[\[33b.3\]]la/_/sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis su med/_/lam dang gnyen pos bcos su ga la yod/_/bsgrub med rtsal sprugs smon pa med pas na/_/bya med lhun rdzogs snga ma de nyid don/_/rtog spyod rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings la/_/
[\[33b.4\]]log rtog byis pa'i spyod pas ci zhig bslus/_/gnyis med bde chen sems can kun spyod la/_/'khrul pas nor ba'i lam du brtags pa yang /_/gong du bstan pa'i lam chen de la mi gnyis pas/_/mnyam par shes pas sangs rgyas kun gyi 
[\[33b.5\]]rje/_/nga dang bdag tu rtog pa mu stegs 'khrul ba'i lam/_/byis pas bslus pas chos spyod rtog pa'i lam la btsud pa ni/_/phyin pa'i dus med rtogs pa'i dus med pas/_/chos nyid chos tshol rnyed par ga la 'gyur/_/tshad mar ma gyur slob 
[\[33b.6\]]dpon spre 'dra'i lung /_/bstan dang lam nor rtog pas zin ta re/_/de bas gser la nag tshur gtong ba yi/_/slob dpon yang dag ston pa'i rin chen mdzod/_/rin thang dpag tu med pas blu bar 'os/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems 
[\[33b.7\]]kun byed rgyal po las bya med rdzogs pa rnam dag dbyings kyi lung bstan pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi rang bzhin 'gyur med 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga yi rang 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bzhin dbyings la 'gyur ba med/_/nga yi ye shes nam mkha' 'gyur ba med/_/nga yi chos nyid rang bzhin 'gyur ba med/_/nga sems chos kyi snying po 'gyur ba med/_/de bzhin thams cad 'gyur ba med pa la/_/nga las byung 
[\[34a.2\]]ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur chos la ming btags nas/_/sprul pas lung bstan dbang po yul spong 'gyur/_/rang rkyen chos lnga 'chang ba'i sems can la/_/rang 'byung chos nyid yin par lung ma bstan/_/ngan 'gro sdig sgrib che 
[\[34a.3\]]zhes lung bstan nas/_/lus ngag yid gsum sdig spong dge bcu spyod/_/rang 'byung chos la blang dor spyad pa'i phyir/_/rang 'byung ye shes bskal mang phrad mi 'gyur/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/sprul pa rang las 'dus pa'i 'khor 
[\[34a.4\]]tshogs la/_/rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi chos spangs la/_/ye shes lnga spong dgra lnga choms lung bstan/_/dgra lnga rang 'byung ye shes ma rtogs te/_/rang sems spong 'gyur nga yis lung ma bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rang gi sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rang gi 
[\[34a.5\]]sems las byung ba'i chos nyid la/_/don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis/_/sbyangs nas rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung zer nas/_/bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sbyong byed pa/_/sdom dang pha rol phyin bcus rang mi 'gyur/_/sems nyid 
[\[34a.6\]]'gyur bar nga yis lung ma bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rang sems chos nyid ting 'dzin byin brlabs nas/_/dag pas chu zla bzhin du gsal byas nas/_/rjer ltas de la mnyes pa'i mchod phul bas/_/de la re 'dod grub pa 
[\[34a.7\]]thob re ba/_/chu zla med de rang sems ma rtogs pas/_/skye ba bdun gyi bar du rang 'byung gi/_/ye shes med ces nga yis lung ma bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rang sems byin brlabs cho 'phrul bsgoms pa yi/_/ting 'dzin ye 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]shes sems dpa' grogs mnyam des/_/bdag 'dod pa yi dngos grub ster re ba/_/rang 'byung chos nyid de la 'dod len med/_/rang sems bya med mi tshe gsum mi phrad/_/kun byed nga yis lung bstan ma yin no/_/kye sems dpa' chen 
[\[34b.2\]]po nyon cig_/ngang las byung ba'i chos nyid lhar byas nas/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang snying po 'phro 'du yis/_/mi 'gyur ba yi chos nyid rgyur sgrub byed/_/sems kyi ting 'dzin dbang gis thob sems pa/_/des kyang thob par nga yis lung ma bstan/_/
[\[34b.3\]]kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/gzhi ma dbyings la 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir/_/dbyings de 'gyur bar nga yis lung ma bstan/_/dbyings la dbang sgyur byed pa'i sku gsum gyis/_/rang 'khor zhi gnas tshol ba'i ting 'dzin bstan/_/des na 
[\[34b.4\]]'dren pa'i lung du bstan pa yin/_/de bzhin nam mkha' 'gyur ba med pa de/_/rang nyid nam mkha' nam mkha' 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa de/_/rang nyid chos kyis chos nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin sems 
[\[34b.5\]]nyid 'gyur ba med pa de/_/sems nyid rang gis sems nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/_/mi 'gyur sgyur bar byed pa'i ting 'dzin ni/_/dus dang smon lam re ba 'jog pa yi/_/dus la ltos pas ting 'dzin tshe chad 'gyur/_/kun byed nga yis nges lung bstan 
[\[34b.6\]]pa med/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bya med rdzogs pa 'gyur med btsal mi rnyed pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems rnal du bzhag pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye 
[\[34b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga ni kun byed byang chub sems/_/chos rnams thams cad nga yin te/_/nga yi rang bzhin thams cad ni/_/ye nas rnal du bzhag pa yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/_/ston pa 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]bstan pa 'khor gnas dus/_/rnam lnga rang bzhin rnal du bzhag_/ston pa'i rang bzhin 'di ltar bzhag_/chos sku ma bcos rnal du bzhag_/rang nga'i rang bzhin de bzhag yin/_/longs spyod ma bcos ngo bo bzhag_/nga yi 
[\[35a.2\]]rang bzhin bzhag pa yin/_/sprul pa ma bcos thugs rje bzhag_/nga yi rang bzhin bzhag pa ste/_/rang 'byung ye shes bzhag pa yin/_/gnas ni gang na gnas pa'i gnas/_/de yang rnal du bzhag pa yin/_/dus ni snga phyi gang tshogs 
[\[35a.3\]]dus/_/rnal bzhag dus su tshogs pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po da nyon cig_/phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga/_/ma bcos rnal du bzhag pa las/_/chos zhes bya ba gzhan yod med/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_phun sum 
[\[35a.4\]]tshogs par ma 'dus pa'i/_/chos ni gcig kyang yod ma gsungs/_/kye nga ni rnal du bzhag pa yis/_/thams cad chos nyid grol ba yin/_/ston pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin/_/bstan pa ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin/_/'khor 
[\[35a.5\]]yang ma bcos chos nyid grol ba yin/_/kye thams cad grol bar bshad pas na/_/rang lus ma bcos lha ma bsgom/_/smra ba'i tshig dang ngag ma 'chos/_/ting 'dzin ma byed sems ma 'chos/_/bcos pas rnal du 'byor med pas/_/rnal du ma 
[\[35a.6\]]'byor grol mi 'gyur/_/ma grol chos nyid mnyam mi thob/_/kye sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_/byang chub sems kyi kun byed rgyal po ni/_/ye nas 'das pa'i rnal du bzhag pa la/_/lta ba rnams kyis rnal du 'jog mi shes/_/rdzogs chen 
[\[35a.7\]]kun byed ye nas rnal bzhag la/_/nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyis thos mthong na/_/dug skye zer nas rang sems spong 'gegs 'gyur/_/des kyang lta ba rnal du 'jog ma shes/_/bskal pa grangs med 'jog mi shes la gnas/_/theg 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]chen mdo sdes rdzogs chen thos 'gyur na/_/rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te/_/ji bzhin nyid du 'jog pa ma shes te/_/bgrod cing sbyong la bskal pa gsum du gnas/_/rjes su rnal 'byor sems dpas thos 'gyur na/_/'di ltar snang 
[\[35b.2\]]ba'i chos rnams de bzhin la/_/rang sems de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs par/_/ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma shes pas/_/byang chub yan lag cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis/_/byin rlobs sems la mi tshe bdun par gnas/_/rnal 'byor chen po 
[\[35b.3\]]rnams kyis thos 'gyur na/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid yin pas na/_/ye nas yin la gdod rtsol sgrub par byed/_/stong phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag drug tu ni/_/ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa mi shes te/_/ting 'dzin gsum gyi sa la gnas par 
[\[35b.4\]]byed/_/yongs su rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na/_/ye nas yin la rgyu 'bras ming btags nas/_/ji bzhin rnal du 'jog pa ma shes te/_/rgyu ni dag pa chos kyi dbyings su grub/_/'bras bu dag pa ye shes dkyil 'khor grub/_/
[\[35b.5\]]bar ma chod kyis mi tshe gcig tu gnas/_/shin tu rnal 'byor rnams kyis thos 'gyur na/_/ye nas sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur/_/bya med bde ba chen po 'di yis thob/_/bsgrub pa med par ye nas sangs rgyas thob/_/lha mi sems 
[\[35b.6\]]can dbang po mi mthun te/_/la la dbang po sbyangs pa'i 'phro can yod/_/la la dbang po ye nas chig chod yod/_/des na dgos ched don zhes bstan pa yin/_/a ti yo ga rdzogs pa chen po zhes bya ba/_/a ti zhes ni sgra yi tshig tu bstan/_/a 
[\[35b.7\]]ni ma skyes chos nyid rnal du bzhag_/ti ni ma btsal lhun gyis 'grub par bstan/_/yo ga shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen la/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu yod zer smra byed pa/_/de ni rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i don mi ldan/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis su smra byed 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]na/_/sgro dang skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig yin te/_/de yis gnyis su med pa rtogs pa med/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs pa yang /_/gnyis su ma mthong rnal bzhag nyid du 'dod/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang 
[\[36a.2\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi snying po sems dpa' rdo rje la sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyi rang bzhin bya med rdzogs pa'i lung mi nub 
[\[36a.3\]]pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyon cig_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid la/_/nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan par bya/_/nyid ni kun byed nga yin te/_/nga ni ye nas byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems ni 'di lta'o/_/des na byang 
[\[36a.4\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan nam mkha' che 'di gsungs so/_/rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che/_/kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings/_/rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol phyir/_/mi skye mi 'gag cir mi dgongs/_/
[\[36a.5\]]byams pas don nyid rnam sbyangs phyir/_/snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad/_/che bas che ba'i zab mo yi/_/yon tan cir yang bsngags pa med/_/don rnams ji bzhin mi bskyod de/_/bya ba med pas grol bas grol/_/rang 'byung ye shes btsal 
[\[36a.6\]]med pas/_/grol na grol ba'i lam yang ston/_/'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/phyin ci log tu rnam brtags kyang /_/grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min/_/che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba/_/
[\[36a.7\]]shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub/_/ming tsam gzhan la brten 'dra yang /_/mngon sum bde ba rang las 'byung /_/cho 'phrul chen po dka' ba min/_/yon tan kun dang stobs kyi rnams/_/ji bzhin rtogs pa phra ba yis/_/de ma thag tu 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]rang las 'byung /_/snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/_/ma btsal bzhag pas bsgoms pa yin/_/de dang der ni rnam btsal na/_/de las de bzhin de mi 'byung /_/mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid ni/_/rna dbang gzhan las thos mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin 
[\[36b.2\]]lce yi dbang pos kyang /_/de la brjod du rdul tsam med/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal byang chub sems/_/kun du chub pas rnam par rol/_/de la bskyod pa med bzhin du/_/nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mnyam par gnas/_/khyad par cir yang mtshungs pa 
[\[36b.3\]]la/_/las so zhes ni rnam par brtags/_/ci ste las kyi dbang 'gyur na/_/rang 'byung ye shes yod ma yin/_/rgyu nyid rdo rje rkyen dang 'dra/_/ma skyes pas na 'jig pa med/_/gdod nas snying po byang chub la/_/btsal ba'i bsam pas dbyings ming 
[\[36b.4\]]bskyod/_/yon tan chen po'i bsam gtan ni/_/bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du med/_/ma bsams ma sbyangs chos bzhin du/_/rnam rtog nyid las ye shes skye/_/phra ba'i sgo mor ming btags te/_/sems kyi dben pa lam tshol zhing /_/dgon 
[\[36b.5\]]pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin cing /_/brtags na rnam par rtog 'gyur bsgom/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur ming btags te/_/dge sdig gnyis ka rnam par sel/_/'jig rten 'di la 'byung ngo zhes/_/blang dor brod pa mchog tu bskyed/_/chags dang ma 
[\[36b.6\]]chags tshig gi lam/_/dbu ma bzhin te brag ca 'dra/_/bde dang sdug bsngal rgyu mthun zhes/_/'gro ba'i mgon po sems dpas gsungs/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang /_/byang chub chen po'i lam las byung /_/kun spyod yon tan 
[\[36b.7\]]rnam lnga yang /_/chos nyid dbyings kyi rgyan zhes gsungs/_/nam mkha' rtog pa skye med cing /_/rtog pa de nyid nam mkha' 'dra/_/mi chags nam mkha'i bsngo ba las/_/rang don chen po nam mkha' 'byung /_/rtog med mnyam nyid 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]chos kyi sku/_/bzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra/_/kun du bzang po'i rol pa yis/_/A li kA li zab tu bstan/_/'di ni a dang mdzes pa'i ta/_/pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin/_/'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la/_/sangs 
[\[37a.2\]]rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung /_/e ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul 'di/_/btsal bas rnyed pa'i gnas med de/_/drug gi chos bzhin yul med pas/_/ldongs pas nam mkha' bsnyabs pa bzhin/_/gong nas gong du tshangs pa'i lam/_/bya bral chos 
[\[37a.3\]]dang mthun pa min/_/ci ste lam la bgrod 'gyur na/_/nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin thob pa med/_/de ltar de bzhin de yi phyir/_/de la de bstan de yang thob/_/de ni snying po de bas na/_/de las de byung ngo mtshar che/_/sngon gyi de dang da ltar 
[\[37a.4\]]de/_/de bzhin de yi gnas su che/_/de ltar de yi lam 'dra ba/_/de ni de yi rang bzhin no/_/de dang 'dra ba yongs kyi lam/_/zla ba las byung rten dang bcas/_/kun gyi mnyam nyid yin pa la/_/phyogs su bltas pas grub pa med/_/de ltar 
[\[37a.5\]]bde dang phyi mar bde/_/mngon sum pa dang rgyab nas 'byung /_/de yang rnam pa'i skyon yin pas/_/de la brten par mi bya'o/_/dus gsum gcig ste khyad par med/_/sngon med phyis med gdod nas 'byung /_/chos skus khyab pas gcig pa'i phyir/_/
[\[37a.6\]]che ba'i chen po rang bzhin gnas/_/srid pa gsum na sbyor ba yang /_/ming tsam sgyu mar snang ba ste/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas chen yang /_/sgyu ma sbyong ba'i bsti gnas yin/_/rnam spyod dus la ltos pa rnams/_/dus de 'byung bar mi 'gyur 
[\[37a.7\]]te/_/ma bral smon pa spyod pas na/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bzhin/_/gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med/_/rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas/_/ma byung ma skyes snying po la/_/sgros btags chos kun ga la yod/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]phyi nang gnyis ka phyi nyid nang /_/zab mo cha shas rtogs yul med/_/srid pa ming tsam log pa'i stobs/_/de bas ting 'dzin mnyam dang bral/_/de la tha tshig phyi dang nang /_/rang bzhin phung po khams bzhin gnas/_/dus gsum 
[\[37b.2\]]'di dang mi 'bral bas/_/tha tshig ming du btags pa med/_/mi g.yo ba ni sku yi rgya/_/mi bskyod pas ni ye shes te/_/mi len pa ni bdag med cing /_/mi 'dor tshig bral mnyam nyid do/_/gang dang gang gi gang du yang /_/kun 'khol kun 
[\[37b.3\]]spyod bdag las byung /_/'di la skyes pa bud med ces/_/mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yod ma gsungs/_/'di la brtul zhugs drag shul gyis/_/gnas su bya ba'i ming med de/_/a dang par ni rnam ldan na/_/sgyu ma'i bde ba 'byung bar 'dod/_/
[\[37b.4\]]rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pas/_/ji ltar bltas pa de ltar snang /_/snang 'dod rtsol sems bde ba yang /_/de ni de sgrib skyon chen yin/_/byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgo/_/cha lugs bsgoms pas chu zla bzhin/_/ma gos ma chags 'byung 'gyur 
[\[37b.5\]]yang /_/bsgoms pas byis pa'i spyod yul bzhin/_/dkyil 'khor khro gnyer cha lugs kyis/_/khro bdag chen po'i lus bzung nas/_/yi ge mngon du byung na yang /_/zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min/_/nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis na/_/ta 
[\[37b.6\]]la'i mgo bo bcad pa dang /_/sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang /_/de yi dbang du mi 'gyur ston/_/rnam grangs brgya stong phrag yas pa/_/gang ltar spyad kyang me tog skye/_/mtshan ma med pa'i dbang gis na/_/bsti gnas de las 'byung mi 'gyur/_/
[\[37b.7\]]gleng bral 'di la gnas pa ni/_/rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang /_/bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas/_/sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol/_/lhag ma med pas yongs su rdzogs/_/'gyur ba ma yin drang por gnas/_/nam mkha' bzhin te 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mtha' mnyam zhing /_/gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin/_/lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen de/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis/_/rang gi mthu yi rig pa las/_/chos ni gzhan las 'byung mi 'gyur/_/sla 
[\[38a.2\]]zhing dka' la sla phyir dka'/_/mngon sum mi gnas kun du khyab/_/ming tsam 'di zhes bstan par ni/_/rdo rje sems dpas mtshon du med/_/ngo mtshar rmad byung rol pa 'di/_/bya bral nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/_/cir yang mi dmigs 
[\[38a.3\]]gti mug las/_/de ma thag tu rang las byung /_/'di ni thams cad mtshungs pa'i lam/_/'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas/_/bus bas bslad pas 'khrul ba'i phyir/_/sman nyid sman pa tshol ba bzhin/_/go ba'i yul na bde ba che/_/'di ni 
[\[38a.4\]]rnam dag 'jig rten yin/_/de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas/_/phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og 'grub/_/ma nges 'ja' tshon kha dog las/_/rigs kyi khyad par mngon par snang /_/de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba/_/'byung ba lnga bas gtso chen 
[\[38a.5\]]yin/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/tha snyad ming la mi gnas te/_/skye 'gag med par rnam brtags shing /_/de nyid dus gsum chen por sbyor/_/mnyam pas rim par bkod pa med/_/gcig pas phyogs bcu bsngo dang bral/_/tshogs 
[\[38a.6\]]kyi rgyan rnams bkram pa yang /_/rang bzhin gnas pas 'grim pa med/_/lhun gyis gnas pas mi bsngo zhing /_/gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi yin/_/'du mched bcu gnyis khyad par du/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas bzung ba med/_/yid 
[\[38a.7\]]kyis bsam pas yon bdag ste/_/bltas pas tshogs ni bkram pa'o/_/mthong bar gyur pas dngos grub la/_/de nyid mnyam bzhag rdzogs pa'o/_/yud tsam bzung bas sbyor ba yin/_/dga' bar gyur pas dam tshig ste/_/thabs kyis 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gar thabs bskyod pa yis/_/gnyis med sbyor ba phul ba yin/_/mi bzung gtong bas gtong ma yin/_/bya ba med pa'i las rnams te/_/mi rtog ye shes bgegs bsal nas/_/ma gsungs mnyam bzhag sngags tshig go/_/bla ma 
[\[38b.2\]]mchod dang gtong ba dang /_/de bzhin bsod nams thams cad kyang /_/ma chags mi g.yo'i stobs med na/_/byas na 'ching ba chen por 'gyur/_/de bas de lung de nyid la/_/de la de sbyar sgrib par 'gyur/_/de ltar de la de rtog na/_/de la de nyid 
[\[38b.3\]]grub pa med/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des kun byed kyi rang bzhin 
[\[38b.4\]]bya med rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/sna tshogs rang bzhin mi gnyis kyang /_/cha shas nyid du spros dang bral/_/ji bzhin pa zhes mi rtog kyang /_/rnam par snang mdzad kun du bzang /_/zin pas 
[\[38b.5\]]rtsol ba'i nad spangs te/_/lhun gyis gnas pas gzhag pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rdo rje tshig drug gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 
[\[38b.6\]]sems dpa' rdo rje la ma byas don grub kyi lung nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar don rig gis/_/ji ltar snang ba de bzhin nyid du gcig_/'di la su yang 'chos par ma byed cig_/ma bcos mnyam pa'i 
[\[38b.7\]]rgyal po de la ni/_/mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa de la gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las nges pa tshig bzhi'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]las byung ba'i chos nyid de nyid kyi rig pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba/_chos thams cad rig par byed pa'i rgyal po rang 'byung gi ye shes de la nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po 
[\[39a.2\]]yid kyi dbang pos sgra rtogs shig_/sgra yis don de rtogs rig byos/_/kun gyi gnas ni chos kyi dbyings yin na/_/dbyings kyi sgra don ji ltar rig par byed/_/kun gyi lta yul nam mkha'i khams 'di la/_/nam mkha'i sgra don ji ltar rig 
[\[39a.3\]]par byed/_/mngon du gsal ba 'byung ba lnga yin na/_/mngon du snang ba'i don ni ji ltar rig_/de las byung ba'i khams gsum sems can ni/_/de yi don ni ji ltar rig par byed/_/rig pa'i rgyal pos nyid phyir nga la nyon/_/zhes 
[\[39a.4\]]gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/khyod kyi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' ba/_/rnam bzhi bstan pa'i sgra yis bdag gis rtogs/_/dbyings kyi sgra yis 'byed pa med par rtogs/_/nam mkha'i sgra yis ma 
[\[39a.5\]]bsgribs gsal bar rtogs/_/'byung ba'i sgra yis kun gyi snying por rtogs/_/sems can sems kyis sgra don de rig byed/_/de rigs kun byed shin tu rtogs dka' rig_/kun byed nyid las gzhan zhes bstan pa med/_/ces gsungs so/_/
[\[39a.6\]]de nas kun byed rgyal pos rig pa'i rgyal po la slar gsungs pa/_/nga yi rang bzhin rtogs dka' 'di rig na/_/chos kyi mdo rtsa yan lag kun rig gis/_/rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su mtshan yang btags/_/kye byed pa'i rgyal po kun byed byang chub 
[\[39a.7\]]sems/_/khyod kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar chos nyid 'di/_/sems dang ye shes chos nyid rig pa ste/_/de yi rang bzhin bdag gis 'di ltar mthong /_/sems nyid spros bral sgra ni chos nyid sgra/_/sems nyid ma bsgribs sgra ni nam mkha'i khams/_/
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]sems nyid ngo bo snying po 'byung ba'i sgra/_/rig pa so sor rtog pa sems can sems/_/sems kyi rang bzhin las ni gzhan med de/_/kun byed rgyal po sems las gzhan med do/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/
[\[39b.2\]]nga yi rang bzhin de rig na/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rig pa yin/_/nga rig gcig rig kun rig thams cad rig_/sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod la ni/_/rig pa'i rgyal po zhes su ming btags so/_/kye rig pa'i rgyal pos de ltar 
[\[39b.3\]]rig gyur na/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/bstan pa'i theg pa rnam pa gsum byung nas/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod pa gsum gyis ni/_/bya ba'i las ni lta spyod sna tshogs kyis/_/'bras bu gsum ni gang dang gang sgrub pa/_/rig 
[\[39b.4\]]pa'i rgyal pos chos de ji ltar rig_/ces gsungs so/_/rig pa'i rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/_/kye kun byed rgyal po khyod las byung ba yi/_/sku gsum ston pa khyod kyi ngo bo gsum/_/de gsum bstan pa rnam gsum khyod kyi ldem dgongs te/_/rig 
[\[39b.5\]]pa so so'i sems la ldem dgongs bstan/_/de dag gang la dgongs nas ldem pa bstan/_/mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol la dgongs pa'i phyir/_/rang re gang 'thad yul la ldem du gzhug_/sku gsum ston pa drang lung ston pa des/_/la las sa dang lam gyi 
[\[39b.6\]]'bras bu bstan/_/la las dngos min chu zla'i 'bras bu bstan/_/la las nyid kyis nyid bsgrub 'bras bu bstan/_/sku gsum bstan pa ldem dgongs lung bstan te/_/nges par ma bstan drang ba'i lung bstan te/_/mi 'phro zhi gnas tshol 
[\[39b.7\]]ba'i ting 'dzin yin/_/rgyu 'bras theg chen drang ba'i lung du bstan/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye rig pa'i rgyal po sems dpa' rdo rje nyon/_/don dam nges pa'i lung zhes bstan pa ni/_/rig pa'i rgyal pos rig gam bstan du med/_/mi gnas 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dmigs par bya ba'i yul ma yin/_/mi rtog rtog las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/_/ting 'dzin mi bsgom bsam pa'i yul dang bral/_/'dod pa'i sems med blang ba'i 'bras bu med/_/mi rtog ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des/_/
[\[40a.2\]]lam la ma bgrod sangs rgyas sa ru phyin/_/rig pa ma sbyangs rang 'byung ye shes rnyed/_/phrin las ma btsal rang bzhin lhun gyis grub/_/dam tshig mi sdom rang bzhin rnam par dag_/yul dang dbang po de bzhin nyid du gsal/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[40a.3\]]sems can gnyis su ma mthong ste/_/de bzhin nyid du thams cad gcig par mthong /_/de bzhin nyid la gcig dang du ma med/_/ma byung ma skyes pa yi snying po la/_/sgros kyis btags pa'i tha snyad ga la yod/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rig pa'i rgyal/_/
[\[40a.4\]]sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin sgros skur bral/_/nga yi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gcig la/_/sku gsum ston pas so sor bstan pa yang /_/de bzhin nyid la drang ba'i lung bstan yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang 
[\[40a.5\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las nges pa'i lung dang drang ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa nyid la 'dus pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[40a.6\]]kye rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgra nyon cig_/kun byed rgyal po nga yis ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dgongs pa'i don ni nga la 'dus/_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di la ni/_/sku 'dus gsung 'dus dgongs pa 'dus/_/nga yi sgra nyon dgongs 
[\[40a.7\]]'dus gyis/_/ces gsungs so/_/kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs/_/kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_/rnam gzigs gtsug tor la sogs te/_/rabs bdun shAkya thub pa dang /_/stong rtsa gnyis kyi 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]sangs rgyas dang /_/lhun gyis grub dang rdul snyed kyi/_/dgongs pa khyod la 'dus lags sam/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas kun byed rgyal pos yin pa'i sgra brjod pa/_/kye rtogs pa'i rgyal po da nyon cig_/ho ho yin pa'i sgra brjod de/_/dpe dang 
[\[40b.2\]]don dang rtog gsum gyis/_/dgongs pa 'dus pa'i don bstan pa/_/nga yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/_/nga yi don ni chos nyid yin/_/nga yi ngo bo byang chub sems/_/kye nga ni ma bsgribs rtog pa med/_/rtog med nam mkha' chos kyi sku/_/
[\[40b.3\]]nga ni mi rtog blang dor med/_/blang dor med de nam mkha' 'dra/_/nam mkha' blang dor med pa bzhin/_/kun du bzang la blang dor med/_/blang dor med pa nga las 'dus/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kye nga ni ma skyes nam mkha' 'dra/_/
[\[40b.4\]]ma skyes pa yi nam mkha' bzhin/_/rdo rje sems la skye ba med/_/skye med dgongs pa nga la 'dus/_/rnam gzigs rabs bdun shAkya thub/_/stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang /_/lhun grub sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/dgongs pa nam mkha'i 
[\[40b.5\]]rang bzhin te/_/skye med mi rtog blang dor med/_/dpe yis nga la 'dus par bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kye gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_dgongs pa don gyis 'dus pa ni/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin 
[\[40b.6\]]ni/_/skye ba med par bstan pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas kun la skye med pas/_/skye med chos nyid 'dus par bstan/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin la/_/chos nyid 'gag pa med pa bzhin/_/gong bshad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/chos 
[\[40b.7\]]nyid la ni 'gag pa med/_/des na chos nyid 'dus par bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rtags kyis 'dus par bstan pa ni/_/rtags ni kun rtags byang chub sems/_/kun byed rgyal po sems kyis ni/_/chos kyi sku dang kun du 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]bzang /_/rdo rje sems la sogs pa yi/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i/_/snying po rtags ni sems su 'dus/_/des na dpe don gsum du 'dus/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga la ni/_/spyi 'dus sgo 'dus dgongs pa 'dus/_/spyi 
[\[41a.2\]]'dus dpe don rtogs 'dus la/_/sgo 'dus rnam pa lnga 'dus te/_/chos sku dgongs pa 'dus pa ni/_/mi rtog mnyam pa nyid 'dus la/_/mi g.yo cho 'phrul 'byin par nus/_/longs spyod sku yi dgongs 'dus pa/_/mngon sum rang bzhin snang ba dang /_/
[\[41a.3\]]'dod pa tshogs pas 'byin par 'dus/_/kun bzang dgongs pa 'dus pa ni/_/ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun/_/bzang ngan blang dor med pa ru/_/kun byed mngon du phyung bar 'dus/_/rdo rje sems dgongs 'dus pa ni/_/mi skye mi 'gag dgongs pa 
[\[41a.4\]]'dus/_/rabs bdun shAkya thub pa dang /_/stong rtsa gnyis dang rdul snyed dang /_/sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad pa'i/_/byung yang sku gsung thugs las byung /_/sku gsung thugs kyi chos nyid la/_/sku gsung thugs kyis don mdzad tshul/_/de 
[\[41a.5\]]yang kun byed nyid du 'dus/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/_/nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas na/_/nga ru ma 'dus gcig kyang med/_/ces gsungs pas der sems dpa' rdo rje sngangs te brgyal lo/_/der 
[\[41a.6\]]brgyal ba sangs nas zhus pa/_kye 'dus pa'i rgyal po de nyon cig_/byas pa'i chos dang kun 'dus na/_/ma byas pa yang kun 'dus sam/_/ma byung ba yang kun 'dus sam/_/chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams/_/mu stegs phyin ci 
[\[41a.7\]]log lta ba/_/rtag chad gnyis su lta ba yang /_/khyod kyis ma nor dgongs yin na/_/sangs rgyas sems can ci la gdags/_/mu stegs sangs rgyas ci la rgya/_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po thams cad 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]'dus pa'i rgyal po des bka' stsal pa/_kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur na/_/kun kyang 'dus par yid ches na/_/sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni/_/nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'dra/_/rtogs mi 'dra bas 
[\[41b.2\]]yid mi ches/_/kun byed byang chub sems rtogs shig_/kun byed byang chub sems rtogs na/_/rang 'byung byang chub sems de yis/_/rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' bsal te/_/ma skyes gzung 'dzin bral ba yis/_/rtag pa'i dngos po mtha' bsal 
[\[41b.3\]]la/_/rang 'byung ye shes 'gyur med pas/_/med pa chad pa'i mtha' yang bsal/_/mu zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings/_/stegs zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i gnas/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis mthong ba/_/kun byed byang chub sems ma mthong /_/
[\[41b.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las dgongs pa 'dus pa'i lung gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyi bstan pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung 
[\[41b.5\]]rgyu 'bras rtsol sgrub las 'das pa 'di bstan te/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga yi spyod yul 'di ni dka' ba ste/_/sgo dang lta ba dang ni dam tshig dang /_/phrin las dang ni bgrod lam gnas pa dang /_/ye shes chos nyid rnam pa brgyad po 'di/_/sku gsum 
[\[41b.6\]]theg pa rnam pa lnga po yi/_/theg pa gzhan dang lta spyod mi mthun te/_/sgo ni btsal du med pa'i sgo nas 'jug_/lta ba bsgom du med par bstan pa yin/_/dam tshig bsrung du med par bstan pa yin/_/phrin las btsal du med par bstan pa yin/_/
[\[41b.7\]]lam la bgrod du med par bstan pa yin/_/gnas sa sbyang du med par bstan pa yin/_/ye shes mi rtog bskyod pa med pa yin/_/chos nyid ji bzhin bcos su med pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po don 'di ni/_/rgyu 'bras theg pa can la bstan 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]'gyur na/_/'jig rten rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos bzhin du/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bas mi rigs zer/_/rgyu ni khams gsum sems can las bsgrubs nas/_/'bras bu dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod/_/rgyu ni lta ba 
[\[42a.2\]]bsgom pa byas pa yis/_/gang bsgoms 'bras bu de thob 'dod pa ni/_/bsgom pa de yis 'bras bu thob pa med/_/thams cad ji bzhin pa yi chos yin pas/_/ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed pa ni/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis bden pa bslus pa sdig re che/_/
[\[42a.3\]]lta bsgom dam tshig la sogs rtsol sgrub kyis/_/dbang po yul la yengs pa phral nas ni/_/dben pa'i yul la thabs kyis khrid nas ni/_/rtog med mnyam pa'i thabs kyis bstan pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[42a.4\]]rgyal po las rdzogs pa chen po'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du 'dus pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' 
[\[42a.5\]]chen po/_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di rtogs shig_/nga ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te/_/byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po yin/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs/_/sku gsung thugs kyis ma byas gcig kyang med/_/dus 
[\[42a.6\]]gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyis byas/_/khams gsum sems can lus ngag yid gsum yang /_/kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas/_/snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kyang /_/ji bzhin ma bcos pa yi chos nyid du/_/
[\[42a.7\]]kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs kyis byas/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_sems dpa' rdo rjes slar zhus pa/_/kye kun byed rgyal po byed pa'i bdag po lags/_/ma rig ma rtogs don 'di bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar byas pa bdag la bshad du gsol/_/zhes 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]zhus pas/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/_/sku ni chos nyid mngon du phyung ba des/_/kun bzang rol pa rmad du 'byung ba byas/_/gsung gi sgra tshig mngon du bsgrags nas ni/_/don gyi chos nyid tshig gis 
[\[42b.2\]]go bar bstan/_/thugs ni rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med kyis/_/ston pa ye shes sgron ma byas nas ni/_/chos nyid don gyi ngo bo ma nor ston/_/kye sems dpa' chen pos don 'di rtogs par gyis/_/snang srid snod bcud de ltar snang ba las/_/nga la sku 
[\[42b.3\]]yi ngo bo gzhan med pas/_/rang gi ngo bos 'chad cing ston pa yin/_/sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis kyang /_/ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i sgra grag dang /_/rgyud drug 
[\[42b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi sgra tshig 'di/_/kun byed nga yi gsung las gzhan med pas/_/tshig sgra don gyis bsdebs bshad de la bya/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang /_/ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig_/kye sems dpa' 
[\[42b.5\]]chen po nyon cig_/khams gsum rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang /_/'byung chen lnga yi mi rtog mnyam nyid dang /_/chos nyid mi skye mi rtog mi 'gag ste/_/kun byed nga yi thugs su de las med/_/sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod kyis ni/_/
[\[42b.6\]]ma rtogs gzhan la khyod kyis lung ston cig_/sems dpa' chen pos 'di lung ma bstan na/_/nga yi rang bzhin shin tu mi rtogs te/_/ma rtogs nga dang phrad par mi 'gyur na/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa/_/khams 
[\[42b.7\]]gsum gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang /_/la dgu lung dgu rgal ba'i sa bcu dang /_/tshe la dbang sgyur phyag rgya lhun gyis grub pa dang /_/rig 'dzin gsum la sogs pa'i gdung 'tshob kyis/_/kun byed nga dang yun du phrad mi 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]'gyur/_/kun byed nga dang yun du ma phrad na/_/khams gsum rgyud drug gnas pa'i sems can gyis/_/rang gi rang bzhin rang gis ngo mi shes/_/sa bcu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/grangs med pa yi bskal 
[\[43a.2\]]pa gsum bgrangs kyang /_/kun byed nga dang phrad par yang mi 'gyur/_/des kyang rang gi rang bzhin shes mi 'gyur/_/lus la dbang sgyur rig 'dzin gsum gyis kyang /_/lus kyis sangs rgyas longs spyod sku bzung nas/_/yid kyi dbang po rang sems 
[\[43a.3\]]mthong med lta/_/des kyang kun byed rgyal po nga dang ni/_/rang gi rang bzhin gnyis med de mi mthong /_/ma mthong bar du tshi chad nad kyis zin/_/de bas nga yi rang bzhin lung ston cig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po 
[\[43a.4\]]las sku gsung thugs su 'dus pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i chos nyid bsgom du med pa 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje la sogs te/_/rig 'dzin gyi ni sa 
[\[43a.5\]]la gnas pa dang /_/sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/khams gsum sems can dus la bab pa yi/_/kun gyi don chen kun byed nga yin gyis/_/nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid byang chub sems/_/chos nyid sems la bsgom med rtogs 
[\[43a.6\]]par gyis/_/rgyu 'bras ston pa'i sku gsum ston pas ni/_/nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid bsgom med la/_/'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos dang don mthun par/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung bar lung bstan nas/_/bsgom pa'i lung ni 'di ltar so sor bstan/_/
[\[43a.7\]]chos nyid byang chub sems gcig ngo bo la/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung bden pa rnam pa bzhis/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ngan song rgyu zer nas/_/chos nyid byang chub sems de spong bar byed/_/de yis chos nyid mi mthong spangs pa yin/_/chos nyid 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la/_/don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa bcus/_/sa bcu lam la sbyangs te bgrod pa yis/_/chos nyid ma mthong sbyong ba'i sa la gnas/_/chos nyid byang chub sems kyi ngo 
[\[43b.2\]]bo la/_/gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs bzang sgo nas/_/byang chub lnga dang cho 'phrul chen po bzhis/_/'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad la/_/byin gyis brlabs nas lha yi skur bsgom pa/_/de yis rang sems bsgom med mthong ba min/_/
[\[43b.3\]]chos gcig byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la/_/ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga rnam pa lngas/_/rang rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje phung po la/_/bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi yi lha bsgoms nas/_/snang la rang bzhin med par byed pa ni/_/btsal zhing bsgrubs nas rang 
[\[43b.4\]]sems lhar bcos pas/_/des kyang rang sems bya med mthong ba min/_/rang gi chos nyid byang chub sems la ni/_/kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i ston pas kyang /_/rang sems ye nas chos nyid grol ba la/_/ston pa gsum la bsgom pa'i lung ma 
[\[43b.5\]]bstan/_/sgom sgrub btsal na rang sems spangs pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rang sems grub 'dod na/_/'dod pa med pas grub pa yin pa'i phyir/_/rtog med mnyam pa nyid la gnas mi byed/_/blang dang dor med 
[\[43b.6\]]yul la rang bzhin gnas/_/g.yos pa med pa'i ngang la ngang gis gnas/_/sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo de/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du grub/_/ji bzhin pa la 'chos par ma byed cig_/ngo bo nyid las gzhan du ma sgrubs 
[\[43b.7\]]shig_/rang nyid yin gyis gzhan du ma tshol cig_/btsal na rgyal bas dbyings nas rnyed mi 'gyur/_/sngar byas zin pas nga ni byed mi bdog_/sngar grub zin pas da grub mi byed par/_/mi rtog cir mi dgongs la mnyam par 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]zhog_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_/rang gi sems las gzhan du chos btsal med/_/ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong /_/ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa bsgom 
[\[44a.2\]]ma myong /_/rang sems mi rtog pa yis grub pa yin/_/da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa yang /_/rtog med mnyam pa nyid kyis grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bsgom du med pa'i mdo lung 
[\[44a.3\]]gi le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor gyi ston pa'i bstan pa gol sa dang sgrib par gyur pa 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyi/_/
[\[44a.4\]]bstan pa gsum ni gol sgrib ste/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug_/rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mdo sde ni/_/kun du 'od kyis 'dod pa/_/bden pa 
[\[44a.5\]]gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis/_/chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar 'dod/_/a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/_/rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems/_/rtog dpyod 'das la mdo sdes bsgribs/_/rdzogs chen rtog dang dpyod pa ni/_/mdo sde dag tu gol bar 
[\[44a.6\]]bshad/_/kri ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa/_/dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas/_/gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas/_/a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/_/gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems/_/gzung 'dzin 'das la kri yas bsgribs/_/
[\[44a.7\]]rdzogs chen gzung dang 'dzin byed pa/_/kri ya dag tu gol bar bshad/_/u pa ya yi lta spyod ni/_/kri ya spyod cing yo ga sgrub/_/lta spyod 'brel ba'i don med pas/_/gnyis su med pa'i don ma rtogs/_/a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems/_/gnyis su med la u pas bsgribs/_/rdzogs chen gnyis su 'byed pa ni/_/u pa ya ru gol bar bshad/_/yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pa/_/mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas/_/phyag rgya bzhi 
[\[44b.2\]]la gtsor byed de/_/blang dor med la 'jug mi nus/_/a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni/_/blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems/_/blang dor med la yo gas bsgribs/_/rdzogs chen blang dang dor byed pa/_/yo ga dag tu gol bar bshad/_/ma hA rdo rje 'chang 
[\[44b.3\]]'dod pa/_/thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas/_/rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi sgrub par byed/_/a ti yo ga bde chen ni/_/rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i byang chub sems/_/rtsol sgrub 'das la ma hA sa bsgribs/_/rdzogs chen 
[\[44b.4\]]rtsol sgrub byed pa ni/_/ma hA yo gar gol bar bshad/_/a nu dbye med sa 'dod pa/_/dbyings dang ye shes sgor zhugs nas/_/'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la/_/rgyu ni dag pa'i dbyings lta ba/_/'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor lta/_/a ti yo ga'i 
[\[44b.5\]]bde chen ni/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems/_/rgyu 'bras 'das la a nus bsgribs/_/rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras gnyis lta na/_/a nu yo gar gol bar bshad/_/lta spyod gnyis kyi gol sgrib ba bstan/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/rdzogs pa 
[\[44b.6\]]chen po'i lta spyod ni/_/rgyu 'bras sgrub dang mi 'dra ste/_/lta spyod byang chub sems de ni/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin te/_/nam mkha' la ni rtog dpyod 'das/_/gang zhig rtog dpyod byed pa des/_/byang chub nam mkha' bzhin du 'grub/_/rtog dpyod 
[\[44b.7\]]gnyis byung gol sgrib bo/_/lta spyod nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/_/gang zhig gzung dang 'dzin byed pas/_/byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub/_/gzung 'dzin gnyis byung gol sgrib bo/_/lta spyod rnam pa gnyis byung nas/_/nam mkha' gnyis su 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]med pa bzhin/_/byang chub la ni gnyis su med/_/gang zhig gnyis su byed pa des/_/byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub/_/lta spyod gnyis byung gol sgrib bo/_/byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin de/_/nam mkha' la ni blang dor 
[\[45a.2\]]med/_/gang zhig blang dor byed pa des/_/byang chub nam mkha'i de mi 'grub/_/blang zhing dor ba gol sgrib po/_/byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin de/_/nam mkha' la ni rtsol sgrub med/_/gang zhig rtsol sgrub byed pa des/_/byang chub nam mkha' 
[\[45a.3\]]de mi 'grub/_/rtsol zhing sgrub pa gol sgrib po/_/byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin de/_/nam mkha' la ni rgyu 'bras med/_/gang zhig rgyu 'bras gnyis lta bas/_/byang chub nam mkha' de mi 'grub/_/rgyu 'bras lta ba gol sgrib bo/_/kye sems 
[\[45a.4\]]dpa' chen po/_chos kun nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_/nam mkha' la ni rang bzhin med/_/nam mkha' la ni dpe yang med/_/nam mkha' la ni tshad kyang med/_/chos rnams thams cad ma lus pa'i/_/don ni 'di ltar shes par bya/_/kye 
[\[45a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po 'di rtogs shig_/theg pa re la lta ba re/_/lta ba'i yul ni gzhan med de/_/chos nyid byang chub sems 'di la/_/gzhan du lta ba'i yul med pas/_/lta ba zhes lta nor bar bshad/_/theg pa re la dam tshig re/_/byang 
[\[45a.6\]]chub lam gyi skyel ma byed/_/byang chub gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir/_/gzhan du bsrung du med pa'i phyir/_/dam tshig la yang bsrung du med/_/theg pa re la phrin las re/_/byang chub lam gyi stong grogs byed/_/byang chub lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/
[\[45a.7\]]phrin las btsal du med pa yin/_/las kyis lhun gyis grub 'gyur med/_/theg pa re la gnas sa re/_/byang chub lam gyi gzhi rten byed/_/rdzogs chen byang chub sems sa la/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/sku gsum ston pa 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]bzhugs pa dang /_/khams gsum sems can ma lus dang /_/snang srid snod bcud gnas pa'i phyir/_/sa la sbyangs shing bgrod du med/_/theg pa re la chos nyid re/_/rdzogs chen chos nyid byang chub sems/_/sems las ma gtogs chos 
[\[45b.2\]]med pas/_/theg pa'i chos kun byang chub sems/_/rdzogs chen rang 'byung ye shes ni/_/yul la rtog par mi byed de/_/mi rtog mi bskyod ye shes so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lta spyod kyi gol sgrib 
[\[45b.3\]]bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin thams cad la gol sa dang sgrib pa med pa rgyal ba'i snying po yin pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga ni 
[\[45b.4\]]kun gyi byang chub sems/_/des na kun gyi snying por bshad/_/sku gsum ston pa rnam gsum dang /_/dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa dang /_/khams gsum sems can thams cad dang /_/snang srid snod bcud thams cad la/_/'byung 
[\[45b.5\]]ba'i snying po nga las med/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_mi rtog mnyam pa de nyid las/_/skye ba med pa'i chos sku byung /_/rang gi ngo bo de nyid las/_/'dod pa longs spyod rdzogs sku byung /_/thugs rje byang chub chen po las/_/sprul pas 'gro ba'i don 
[\[45b.6\]]mdzad byung /_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/sngar 'das pa yi sangs rgyas kyis/_/rang 'byung ye shes sems nyid de/_/mi rtog rtogs nas sngar sangs rgyas/_/da ltar mi rtog ngang la bzhugs/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[45b.7\]]kyang /_/rang 'byung ye shes sems nyid de/_/mi rtog pas ni 'gro don mdzad/_/slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/byang chub rang 'byung ye shes de/_/mi rtog pa yi lung bstan nas/_/'gro ba'i don la 'byung bar nges/_/rig 'dzin dang ni 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]sa pa rnams/_/rang 'byung byang chub sems de ni/_/bltas pas mthong ba ma yin na/_/rang sems snying po de ru phrad/_/khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/rang 'byung ye shes bkag med pas/_/dbang po yul 
[\[46a.2\]]la rig gsal ba/_/ma bcos pa yi byang chub sems/_/de nyid snying po yang dag bshad/_/snang srid snod bcud thams cad kyang /_/nga yis ma bskyed gcig kyang med/_/kun rgyu nga las ma byung med/_/des na kun gyi snying por bshad/_/
[\[46a.3\]]nga ni kun las rgyal ba ste/_/sku gsum las kyang nga rgyal la/_/sangs rgyas gsum las nga rgyal lo/_/rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can dang /_/snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun/_/byed 
[\[46a.4\]]pa nga yin kun las rgyal/_/kun byed byang chub sems nga yis/_/bstan pa kun gyi sngon rol du/_/byang chub sems kyi bstan pa bkod/_/byang chub sems kyi bstan pa 'di/_/kun gyis dgod par mi nus te/_/de yang ji ltar dgod ce na/_/chos 
[\[46a.5\]]la bya ru med pa'i phyir/_/btsal ba med pa'i sgo nas 'jug_/byang chub sems las med pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems kyi chos nyid la/_/sems kyis bsgom du med pa'i phyir/_/lta ba bsgom du med pa bkod/_/gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i chos nyid la/_/
[\[46a.6\]]dam tshig bsrung du med pa dgod/_/ye nas lhun gyis grub pas na/_/phrin las btsal du med pa bkod/_/byang chub sems la kun gnas pas/_/sa la sbyang du med pa bkod/_/byang chub sems ni bgrod pa'i gnas/_/sems kyi sa la bgrod med 
[\[46a.7\]]pas/_/lam la bgrod du med par bstan/_/chos nyid byang chub sems yin pas/_/chos nyid gzhan du lta mi byed/_/ye shes rang 'byung ye shes te/_/yul la rtog pa'i ye shes min/_/kun byed byang chub sems nga ni/_/lta spyod kun las 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]rgyal ba dang /_/byed pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir/_/rgyal ba'i snying po zhes su bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rgyal ba'i snying po'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[46b.2\]]rgyal po des byang chub kyi sems nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/bdag gi bstan pa 'di bkod pas/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/khams 
[\[46b.3\]]gsum sems can thams cad kun/_/rtsol dang sgrub pa ma byas par/_/ye nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pas/_/'khor gyi ston pa rnam gsum gyi/_/rtsol sgrub byed pa'i brtan pa gsum/_/gol sa sgrib pas zhig par 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[46b.4\]]gsungs so/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes slar zhus pa/_kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/khyod kyi bstan pa byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems 'di sangs rgyas na/_/khams gsum sems can sangs rgyas sam/_/khams gsum 
[\[46b.5\]]sems can sangs rgyas na/_/khams gsum gnas su ci ste 'khor/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos slar gsungs pa/_kye sems dpa' chen po 'di nyon cig_/byang chub sems las byung ba yi/_/ji ltar 
[\[46b.6\]]snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/chos nyid mngon du byung ba ste/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/_/chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/_/'dod mi 'dod ni lnga lnga las/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal skye zer nas/_/chos nyid yul lnga spong byed pa/_/rang 
[\[46b.7\]]'byung ye shes snang ba de/_/bskal pa gsum du mi spong bas/_/khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/_/chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/_/'dod dang mi 'dod lnga snang la/_/'khor ba'i rgyu ni yin zer 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]nas/_/chos nyid lnga po 'gegs par byed/_/rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/_/bskal pa du mar mi khegs pas/_/khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/_/chos nyid yul ni lnga snang 
[\[47a.2\]]la/_/'dod dang mi 'dod lnga yul byung /_/chags pa'i gnas ni yin zer nas/_/chos nyid lnga po sbyong bar byed/_/rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/_/bskal pa yun du mi spyod pas/_/khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/_/chos nyid mngon du 
[\[47a.3\]]byung ba yi/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa yi/_/chos nyid yul ni lnga snang la/_/'dod dang mi 'dod lnga byung bas/_/byin brlabs gnas ni yin zer nas/_/phyi nang dag par byin gyis rlob/_/chos nyid lnga po dag par byed/_/rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/_/
[\[47a.4\]]mi tshe bdun du byin mi rlob/_/khams gsum gnas su 'khor ba yin/_/byang chub sems las byung ba yi/_/chos nyid mngon du phyung ba yi/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa las/_/chos nyid yul ni lnga snang las/_/'dod dang mi 'dod lnga 'byung ste/_/
[\[47a.5\]]mtho ris ngan song rgyu zer nas/_/de bzhin nyid la blang dor byed/_/rang 'byung ye shes snang ba de/_/rang gi rkyen gyis dor mi btub/_/mi btub dor bar byed pas 'khor/_/byang chub sems las byung ba yi/_/mngon du byung ba'i chos nyid de/_/de bzhin 
[\[47a.6\]]nyid du gcig pa las/_/chos nyid yul ni lnga snang ste/_/'dod dang mi 'dod yul lnga ste/_/sku gsung thugs su shes byas nas/_/sku gsung thugs su gdod sgrub byed/_/ye nas yin la sgrub byed pas/_/sgrub pa nyid kyis 'khor ba yin/_/kye sems 
[\[47a.7\]]dpa' chen po de bas na/_/byang chub sems spangs pha rol na/_/rang 'byung ye shes ye nas med/_/'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol na/_/mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba med/_/chos can spangs pa'i pha rol na/_/chos nyid bya ba ye nas med/_/thams cad de 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]bzhin nyid du gcig_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la/_/de bzhin nyid la bcos pas nor/_/de ni ma nor ba yi ming /_/bzhin ni bcos su med pa'i don/_/nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid bstan/_/de bzhin nyid la 'chos ma byed/_/de bzhin nyid la 
[\[47b.2\]]'chos byed pa/_/byang chub sems la su 'chos pa/_/des ni 'khor ba'i snying po bsgrub/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//de nas byang 
[\[47b.3\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nga yin pa 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' dam pa rdo rje khyod/_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar shes par gyis/_/nga ni ston pa'i sgron ma byang chub sems/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po 
[\[47b.4\]]yin/_/khams gsum sems can kun gyi pha dang ma/_/snang srid snod bcud kun gyi rgyu yang yin/_/nga las ma byung ba ni gcig kyang med/_/nga ni mi gnas kun du khyab pa'i phyir/_/nga ni ye nas dus gsum sangs rgyas yin/_/nga ni mi rtog mnyam 
[\[47b.5\]]par gnas pa'i phyir/_/rtog med mnyam nyid chos sku ye sangs rgyas/_/nga yi ngo bo kun du longs spyod phyir/_/nga nyid longs spyod rdzogs skur ye sangs rgyas/_/nga nyid rang 'byung ye shes snang ba'i phyir/_/nga nyid thugs rje sprul skur mngon sangs rgyas/_/
