[\[47b.6\]]des na dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi snying por bshad/_/nga yi ye shes byang chub sems snang ba/_/rang 'byung ye shes lnga po rgyud drug sems/_/des na khams gsum sems can pha dang ma/_/snang srid snod bcud kun gyi ngo bo yang /_/nga yi ngo bor byung ba 
[\[47b.7\]]snang bas/_/nga nyid ye nas snang ba sangs rgyas yin/_/nga la gnyis med gcig tu 'dus pa chu/_/sdud par byed pas sems nyid chu yin no/_/nga ni thams cad mnyam pa drod snyoms me/_/kun la mnyam par gnas pas me sangs rgyas/_/nga ni thogs med 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]yang zhing g.yo ba yin/_/thogs med g.yo bas rlung du mngon sangs rgyas/_/nga ni ma bsgribs kun khyab gsal ba'i phyir/_/nam mkha' zhes ni ming btags sangs rgyas yin/_/nga las ma byas pa yi sangs rgyas ni/_/'byung chen srid 
[\[48a.2\]]pas bsdus pa'i chos la med/_/'byung lta nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/gcig la nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rang bzhin tshang /_/snang ba sa la sdud pa chu yin te/_/mnyam pa me la g.yo ba rlung du gsal/_/ma bsgribs gsal bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_/gcig 
[\[48a.3\]]la nyi shu rtsa lnga tshang ba ni/_/byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan bstan/_/chos la gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig_/gcig gis kun byas kun byed rgyal pos byas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ngo bo 
[\[48a.4\]]gcig pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kho nar sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kye chos kyi sku ni byang chub sems/_/
[\[48a.5\]]byang chub sems las chos kyi sku/_/rdul tsam sus kyang bcos pa med/_/des na sangs rgyas sems las med/_/longs spyod rdzogs sku byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems la longs spyod sku/_/sems las byung ba'i gzugs rnams las/_/longs spyod 
[\[48a.6\]]rdzogs las sku gzhan med/_/sprul pa'i sku ni byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems kyi sprul pa las/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad gzhan na med/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_/byang chub sems las gzhan med de/_/snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs 
[\[48a.7\]]rgyas rnams/_/rang sems ma bcos sngar mthong rtogs/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/ma bcos pa yi rang sems des/_/ma bcos ji bzhin rtogs gyur nas/_/da ltar 'gro ba'i don yang mdzad/_/slad nas byon pa'i sangs 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rgyas rnams/_/rang 'byung sems nyid 'di la ni/_/snga bar 'chos par lung ma bstan/_/da ltar ting 'dzin sems mi 'chos/_/ma bcos lam du zhugs nas byon/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la/_/byang chub sems su ma rtogs te/_/bcos 
[\[48b.2\]]shing bsgrubs pas 'grub mi 'gyur/_/ma rtogs bcos pas grub par byed/_/bskal pa du ma'i grangs pa grangs kyang /_/mi rtsol bde ba phrad mi 'gyur/_/kye sku gsum sems las ma bcos phyir/_/sku gsum ston pa'i mdo lung las/_/'chos par 
[\[48b.3\]]byed pa'i don 'byung ba/_/de ni ston pa sku gsum yang /_/nyid kyi ston pa rang bzhin ston pa min/_/de bzhin 'chos par byed pa yi/_/ston pas bden tshul ji bstan yang /_/nges lung ma yin drang lung yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems 
[\[48b.4\]]kun byed rgyal po las bcos su med pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad kyi ston pa nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga ni 
[\[48b.5\]]chos rnams kun gyi ston pa ste/_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam pa gsum las ni/_/ston pa yang ni rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/bstan pa yang ni rnam gsum nga yis bstan/_/de 'dzin 'khor tshogs gsum yang nga yis bstan/_/ston pa gsum yang gang dang gang 
[\[48b.6\]]zhe na/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa dang /_/chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa dang /_/don gyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pa'o/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ni/_/skye ba med las byin gyis brlabs phyung ste/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams 
[\[48b.7\]]cad kun/_/chos kyi de bzhin nyid du ston par byed/_/chos kyi ngo bo ston pa'i ston pa ni/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/ston pa nyid kyi sku ru phyung nas ni/_/chos kyi ngo bor de las med par ston/_/chos kyi sgra tshig ston pa'i ston pas ni/_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]chos rnams kun gyi don ni sgra bsdus nas/_/ma rig mi shes khams gsum sems can la/_/don de sgra dang tshig gis bsdebs nas ston/_/des na ston pa'i rang bzhin bstan par bshad/_/de 'dzin 'khor ni rnam pa gsum bstan te/_/
[\[49a.2\]]shin tu rnal 'byor rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'khor/_/sgor zhugs yid ches sangs rgyas sa la gnas/_/rig 'dzin sa dang dang po bcu pa'i 'khor/_/ma thob nye reg bsgom pa'i sa la gnas/_/sems bskyed mos pa spyod pa'i 'khor rnams ni/_/rgyu dge 
[\[49a.3\]]'bras bu dug 'joms sa la gnas/_/de ni ston pa gsum gyi 'khor du bstan/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/ston pa gsum dang 'khor tshogs de ltar na/_/bstan pa rnam gsum ji ltar bstan par bgyi/_/zhes zhus pas/_
[\[49a.4\]]kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/chos kyi sku yi bstan pa de bzhin nyid bstan te/_/de bzhin nyid la rnam pa dbye ru med/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/sems kyi ngo bo yin pas de bzhin nyid/_/de la gang su sgom zhing 'chos 
[\[49a.5\]]byed pa/_/de yis chos sku bstan pa rtogs pa med/_/snang ba med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la/_/ma nor de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs te/_/de la gang su 'chos shing sgom byed pa/_/de yis rang sems bcos med de mi rig_/snang srid chos 
[\[49a.6\]]med byang chub sems/_/sems kyi de bzhin nyid 'byung de bzhin nyid/_/de bzhin nyid du ma rtogs so sor mthong /_/de bzhin nyid ni dbyings nas tshol byed pa/_/dus gsum rgyal bas btsal yang mi brnyes so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon 
[\[49a.7\]]cig_/longs spyod rdzogs pa bstan pa longs spyod de/_/longs spyod lnga ni chos nyid longs spyod gcig_/gzugs la sogs pa'i longs spyod lnga la ni/_/gcig la'ang lnga lnga nyi shu rtsa lnga spyod/_/rtsa lnga longs spyod de ni sku lnga'i tshul/_/tshul ni chos 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]nyid don gyi ngo bo nyid du bshad/_/sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi longs spyod du/_/longs sku nga yi gzugs la spyad du med/_/rig 'dzin sa bcu rnams la nga yis bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/sprul sku 
[\[49b.2\]]bstan pa thugs rjes don 'tsham ste/_/khams gsum sems can bsam pa tha dad la/_/sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnam gsum gyis/_/bsam pa tha dad sku gsung thugs rjes bzlog_/dbang po yul la zhen pa de bzlog nas/_/dben pa'i 
[\[49b.3\]]yul ni gang 'thad de bstan nas/_/des ni nga yi thugs rje 'dren lung byed/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga ni chos rnams kun gyi ston yin phyir/_/sangs rgyas la yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan/_/sems can la yang nga yi rang bzhin 
[\[49b.4\]]bstan/_/rang bzhin bstan pas ston par zhal gyis bzhes/_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di ltar rig par gyis/_/ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor rnams ni/_/nga yi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan med de/_/ston pa rang 'byung ye shes 'gag med 
[\[49b.5\]]yin/_/bstan pa nga yi rang bzhin ma bcos yin/_/de 'dzin 'khor ni nga yi ngo bos 'dzin/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ston par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi 
[\[49b.6\]]sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid la bya ba med pa'i don 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_bya ba med pa'i don 'di ni/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin te/_/nga la bya ba med pa ni/_/nga ni ye nas byas zin pas/_/bya ba med pa'i chos nyid yin/_/
[\[49b.7\]]chos nyid nga yi rang bzhin las/_/rang bzhin de la bya ru med/_/rang bzhin rang bzhin bya ba de/_/bcos su med pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/bcos med byang chub de la ni/_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod ma 'chos/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes de 'chos na/_/kun byed 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]nga la bcos pa yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig_/nga yi rang bzhin 'gyur med la/_/bsgoms na 'chos shing bsgyur ba yin/_/nga ni ye nas lhun 
[\[50a.2\]]grub la/_/bsgrubs na nga la bcos pa yin/_/nga la bgrod pas phyin pa med/_/nga la btsal bas grub pa med/_/nga la sbyangs pas byang ba med/_/nga la ma lta yul med kyis/_/nga la ma bgrod lam med kyis/_/nga la ma sbyongs sgrib med kyis/_/
[\[50a.3\]]mi gnas dmigs pa'i yul dang bral/_/spros med bsam pa'i yul las 'das/_/'dzin pas brtags pa'i chos rnams ni/_/nga yi ngo bo bstan pa yin/_/de la spong 'gegs su byed pa/_/bskal pa gsum gyi bar du ni/_/kun byed nga dang phrad mi 
[\[50a.4\]]'gyur/_/spang bar bya ba'i chos de ni/_/rang gi ngo bo yin par bshad/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste/_/kun byed byang chub sems kyis byas pa ni/_/byang chub sems las gzhan du byas pa med/_/byang chub 
[\[50a.5\]]sems ni ye nas ma nor yin/_/ye nas yin pas ye nas nor ba med/_/nor ba med la bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]sgros mi 'dogs/_/rgyu bden 'bras bu rtsol sgrub kun las 'das/_/byas zin rtsol sgrub 'das pa ma rig nas/_/rtsol sgrub bya byed bsgoms nas 
[\[50a.6\]]grub lta na/_/byang chub gegs su de las che ba med/_/mi gnas mi rtog cir yang dgongs med pas/_/mi rtog mnyam pa'i yul la rang bzhin gnas/_/ye nas byas zin rtsol ba'i sems mi 'byung /_/bde chen de la gang su gnas pa ni/_/chos 
[\[50a.7\]]rnams kun gyi snying por de 'gyur ro/_/de yis bdag gzhan kun gyi don mi byed/_/gcig 'dus thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po des/_/ma bltas dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyang gsal/_/ma bsgribs sems can kun gyi sems kyang snang /_/kye sems 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun byed nga yis sems can don byas zin/_/nga yis don byas gzhan gyis bya mi dgos/_/gzhan la ltos pa'i chos ni nga lung min/_/nga la kun rdzogs ye nas byas zin rdzogs/_/ye nas byas zin lta ba bsgom mi dgos/_/
[\[50b.2\]]ye nas rnam dag dam tshig srung mi dgos/_/ye nas byang chub sa la kun gnas pas/_/rig 'dzin sa dang sa bcu sbyang mi dgos/_/ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/btsal ba'i phrin las ye nas bya mi dgos/_/rang 'byung ye shes yul 
[\[50b.3\]]la mi rtog pas/_/rig pa'i ye shes yul gyis bsal mi dgos/_/bde chen chos sku sems kyis gcig pa'i phyir/_/snga phyi dus gsum med de khyad par gcig_/phun sum tshogs dang dus gnas kun gcig dang /_/thams cad gcig phyir nga la 
[\[50b.4\]]kun rdzogs te/_/rdzogs pa chen po nga la kun rdzogs pas/_/lta spyod phrin las dam tshig sa lam ni/_/gong bshad bzhin du btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos/_/de ltar ma rig rtsol sgrub byas 'gyur na/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur nas/_/
[\[50b.5\]]bya med bde chen de dang mi phrad de/_/rtsol sgrub nad kyis ma rig de zin 'gyur/_/de bas rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rdzogs chen la/_/skal med rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pas/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i chos la spyad par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[50b.6\]]sems kun byed rgyal po las rdzogs chen skal med don med kyi le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rdzogs pa chen po la lta ba bsgom med kyi mdo lung 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_rang gi lta ba bsgom 
[\[50b.7\]]med ni/_/kun byed nga yin nga la bsgom du med/_/kun byed nga ni bsgom pa'i yul ma yin/_/nga ni ma bcos kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/rang bzhin gnas pa'i bsgom du med pa de/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/nga las mngon du phyung ba'i 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]chos nyid la/_/brkam chags lnga yi sdug bsngal yin zer nas/_/ma bcos mi 'jog brtul zhugs spong 'gegs bsgom/_/de lung bstan pas ma bcos don dang 'gal/_/mu stegs sde bzhi sprul pa'i thugs rje yis/_/byin brlabs 'khor 
[\[51a.2\]]du bkod nas lung bstan pas/_/bya bral bde ba de nyid thob mi 'gyur/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid la/_/brkam chags lnga yis sdug bsngal skye zer nas/_/dang po sa nas bcu par sems dpa' la/_/bden pa rnam pa gnyis 
[\[51a.3\]]kyi rtog dpyod kyis/_/don dam med la kun rdzob yod pa ru/_/sprul pas lung bstan rtog dpyod sgom pa byed/_/ma bcos ji bzhin nga yi don dang 'gal/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/nga las mngon du phyung ba'i chos nyid de/_/ma bcos ji bzhin pa yi chos nyid 
[\[51a.4\]]la/_/longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung bstan pa/_/ji bzhin bcos pa med par ma rtogs te/_/phyi nang snod bcud dag par byin brlabs te/_/byang chub yan lag cho ga kun sgo nas/_/bsgom pa'i ye shes lha ni snang bar byed/_/skad cig mchod 
[\[51a.5\]]nas gshegs gsol ting 'dzin bshig_/yang bsgoms yang bshig byis pa'i 'dag khang 'dra/_/ji bzhin ma bcos nga yi don dang 'gal/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa lung ston gyis/_/nga yis byung ba'i chos 
[\[51a.6\]]nyid mngon phyung la/_/ting 'dzin mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs nas/_/chos nyid gcig la blang dor byas nas ni/_/ye shes dam tshig so sor bsgoms nas ni/_/grogs po dag gis dngos grub ster re ba/_/gcig la gnyis su ltas pa'i bsgom pa nor/_/
[\[51a.7\]]ngo bo gcig la gnyis kyis thob pa med/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga yi rang bzhin mngon du phyung ba la/_/phung po 'byung ba rnam shes dbang po yul/_/rang rgyud dag pa rdo rje ltar byas te/_/bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi cho ga bsgom byas nas/_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]sems kyi 'phro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byed/_/'phro 'du bsdus nas dngos grub thob 'tshal bas/_/rang gis rang gi dngos grub thob par bsgom/_/de yang sems kyi ting 'dzin tshi chad 'gyur/_/rdzogs chen lta ba bsgom du med pa ni/_/kun 
[\[51b.2\]]byed nga yi sems kyi yon tan te/_/byang chub sems kyi che ba'i yon tan gyis/_/btsal zhing bsgrubs pa'i dka' ba spyad mi dgos/_/rgyu rkyen med pas btsal ba'i las mi dgos/_/'bras bu'i rang bzhin gzhan nas bsgrub mi dgos/_/chos nyid rang 
[\[51b.3\]]yin bsgom pa bya mi dgos/_/ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i gnyen po med/_/gzhan la ma ltos bsgom gnas tshol mi byed/_/nga la gang zhig sgom par byed pa des/_/bsgoms pa nyid kyis nga dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/chos nyid mngon du phyung ba nga yin pas/_/
[\[51b.4\]]sdug bsngal mi skye rnam par spang mi dgos/_/rang 'byung yin pas skye 'jig med pa'i phyir/_/ma rig rten 'brel dbang po dgag mi dgos/_/rang 'byung rnam dag chos nyid sbyang mi dgos/_/ye nas dag pas gtsang sbra bya mi dgos/_/ye nas lhun 
[\[51b.5\]]grub rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos/_/bltas pas ma dag pa yi chos med de/_/de bzhin nyid dang rnam snang kun du bzang /_/dbang po drug la snang ba'i chos rnams kyang /_/ye nas de yin de las gzhan ma med/_/de la gang zhig bsgom dang sgrub byed pa/_/
[\[51b.6\]]de ni mdongs pas nam mkha' snyegs pa 'dra/_/nga yi rang bzhin spyod yul kun las 'das/_/nga yis mngon du phyung ba'i chos rnams ni/_/nga yi ngo bo kun gyis mthong bya'i phyir/_/sna tshogs dbang po ngo la bstan pa yin/_/de la nga yi rang bzhin kun 
[\[51b.7\]]rtogs shig_/de la nga yi rang bzhin ma mthong na/_/kun byed nga yi theg pa bstan mi bya/_/rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang skal med pas/_/rgyu 'bras theg pa drang ba'i lung la gzud/_/nga ni ye nas spyod yul 'das pa 'di/_/rgyu 'bras dga' ba'i skal ba 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]med rnams la/_/bstan na sgro dang skur pa 'ong ba'i phyir/_/bstan na rang gi sems la skur btab pas/_/drug tu skye zhing gtan du 'khor bar 'khyam/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nga don rtogs/_/de ni spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i 
[\[52a.2\]]phyir/_/tshig gis mi phebs dbang po'i spyod yul 'das/_/nga yi rang bzhin bsdus te thig ler gnas/_/ma spros gnyis med ye nas gcig tu bstan/_/dam tshig bsrung ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos/_/phrin las btsal ba'i bsgom pa bya mi dgos/_/lam 
[\[52a.3\]]la mi bgrod sa la mi spyod ste/_/rang las gzhan du chos nyid tshol mi byed/_/rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog g.yos pa med/_/gzhan gyis lung min kun byed nga yi lung /_/rgyu 'bras 'das pas rtsol dang sgrub mi byed/_/ma byung bas na dngos po sgom mi 
[\[52a.4\]]byed/_/ma skyes pas na 'jig pa'i dogs pa med/_/nga mi snang bas dmigs pa bsgom dang bral/_/bde chen bdal ba'i klong dkyil na/_/mi rtog mnyam pa'i rang bzhin gnas/_/chos nyid snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/rig pas mi rtog ting 
[\[52a.5\]]'dzin ma byed cig_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/bsgoms na gang bsgom nga yi nad yin gyis/_/kun gyi snying po byang chub sems yin na/_/byang chub sems ni gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir/_/bsgom par bya ba rdul tsam yod ma yin/_/gong bshad bsgoms 
[\[52a.6\]]pas 'bras bu ma thob bzhin/_/nga yang bsgoms pas thob par lung mi ston/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nga la ltos/_/nga ni kun byed byang chub sems yin te/_/kun byed byas pas kun byas nyid du byas/_/kun ni ma lus pa yi sgrar bshad de/_/byed pa'i 
[\[52a.7\]]snying po de yis thams cad byed/_/byang ba gzung du yod pa ma yin la/_/chub pa kun gyi snying pos snying por chub/_/sems ni rang 'byung ye shes kun du sems/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lta bsgom med kyi le'u ste zhe 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig bsrung du med po 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rdzogs chen dam tshig bsrung du med bstan pa/_/kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang 
[\[52b.2\]]bzhin ni/_/ma skyes spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis/_/skye ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs yul byung nas/_/yul de rang gi rang bzhin yin zhes byas/_/de la mi rtog rtog pa'i yul las 'das/_/yul la mi 'dzin spong dang len med pas/_/med pa phyal ba gcig 
[\[52b.3\]]pu lhun grub ste/_/bsrung bar bya ba'i sdom khrims kun dang bral/_/bsrung med nga las byung ba'i ston gsum gyis/_/mu stegs sde bzhi thugs rjes byin brlabs nas/_/'dul ba phog pa'i 'khor ni sde bzhi la/_/bsrung bar bya ba'i khrims ni 'di lta ste/_/
[\[52b.4\]]rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bsrung ba'i grangs/_/nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga brgya lnga bcu khrims/_/bsrung ba'i dus na grangs dang don mi shes/_/des na sdom pa mi thub bsrung thabs med/_/rdzogs chen ci spyod rtog pa kun las 'das/_/sdom pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas 
[\[52b.5\]]grangs mang ba/_/lus ngag yid la bsdus pa rnam pa gsum/_/dbang po yul las sdug bsngal byung nas ni/_/lus kyis 'gro 'dug gom pa bor sa med/_/ngag gis tshig brjod don gyis bden par dka'/_/yid kyis bsam pa bden pa kun las 
[\[52b.6\]]'gal/_/ma nor bsam pa kun kyang bsgrub tu med/_/lus ngag sdom pa rgya mdud dam po des/_/bden nyid don dang phrad pa shin tu dka'/_/bsrung med nyams pa med dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/bsrung med nyams pa med pa kun byed lung /_/kye sems 
[\[52b.7\]]dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pas lung phog pa/_/gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs bzang sgo nas/_/phyi nang gtsang ma'i khrus kyis dag byas te/_/sdom pa tshul khrims 'gro don zhal 'ches pa/_/gang yang dam bcas tshul bzhin mi 'grub 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]ste/_/dam bcas ma grub bshags pas sems mi 'dag_/bsrung med nga dang yun du thag ring nyams/_/kye rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig ni/_/rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag lnga rnams te/_/rtsa ba gsum ni sku gsung thugs 'dus te/_/
[\[53a.2\]]sku ni lha yi skur bsgom lus kyang 'ching /_/ngag ni 'dzab dang ting 'dzin zhi ba min/_/yid kyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'dus bzung nas ni/_/rtsa ba mi rtog dam tshig bde dang bral/_/yan lag rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste/_/dang por shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/phung 
[\[53a.3\]]po lnga dang 'byung ba rnam pa lnga/_/rnam shes dbang po yul la sogs pa rnams/_/lha dang dkyil 'khor rang bzhin shes par bya/_/shes bya shes byed med pa des ma mthong /_/spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni/_/sta na ga na ma byin blangs pa dang /_/
[\[53a.4\]]mi tshangs spyod dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_/rnam pa lnga ni thabs mkhas spyod byed pa/_/ma spyad nyams mthong rtog dang bcas nas spyod/_/de yang mi rtog mnyam dang bral ba yin/_/dang du blang ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni/_/dri chen dri tshu la sogs dam rdzas lngas/_/
[\[53a.5\]]rgyal ba'i sku lnga 'di las 'grub zer nas/_/dpa' bo 'bru lngas 'phro 'du byas nas ni/_/rgyal ba'i sku lnga dang du len byed pa/_/dang du ma blangs sku lnga mi grub rtog_/blang dor bral ba'i rtogs 'das de ma grub/_/mi spong ba yi dam rdzas rnam lnga ni/_/'dod chags zhe 
[\[53a.6\]]sdang la sogs dug lnga po/_/gsang ba rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po ru/_/nyon mongs lnga bsgyur ye shes rnam pa lngar/_/dug lnga mi spong ye shes rnam lngar len/_/blang dor med pa'i bde ba des ma grub/_/grub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ni/_/phung po lnga dang 'byung 
[\[53a.7\]]ba lnga rnams dang /_/rnam shes yul rnams dkyil 'khor grub byed pa/_/ting 'dzin gsum dang cho ga lnga rdzogs nas/_/rgyal ba'i rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor grub byed pa/_/ting 'dzin cho ga lnga yis sems rtsol byed/_/mi rtog ma btsal lhun gyis grub dang 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]'gal/_/bsgom pa'i sku ni mi rtog 'ja' tshon 'dra/_/cho ga bzlas brjod 'dzab kyang rtsi skya 'dra/_/rtsol sgrub spyod pas lhun gyis grub mi 'gyur/_/med par bsgrub pas shin tu grub pa med/_/kun byed nga la bsrung ba'i dam tshig med/_/rgyu rkyen med pas 
[\[53b.2\]]rtsol zhing bsgrub mi dgos/_/lhun gyis grub pas spyad par bya mi dgos/_/ye shes yin pas shes par bya mi dgos/_/rang 'byung yin pas rgyu dang rkyen mi dgos/_/bzang ngan med pas blang dor bya mi dgos/_/dngos po med pas med pa zhes su bshad/_/
[\[53b.3\]]dngos su mi spyod ye shes ma 'gags pas/_/de la phyal ba zhes su btags pa yin/_/sems su kun gcig gcig pur btags pa yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/yid ches byang chub sems su rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/lhun gyis 
[\[53b.4\]]rdzogs pa zhes su nga yis bshad/_/tsha grang bkres skom blun lkugs chos nyid la/_/sku gsum 'khor sngangs 'bros pa'i cho ga drug_/gong bshad bzhin du btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgos/_/rgyu nyid rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/las kyi rkyen gyi dbang 
[\[53b.5\]]du de mi 'gyur/_/chos nyid rang bzhin cir yang 'gyur med pas/_/btsal bas grub par nga yis lung ma bstan/_/rang 'byung ye shes kun dang mtshungs med pas/_/rgyu rkyen las kyis rang 'byung de mi 'grub/_/bden pa gnyis kyis gtan la dbab tu 
[\[53b.6\]]med/_/nges pa gcig la bden pa rnam pa gnyis/_/ma nges the tshom can gyi lung de la/_/nges pa gcig tu bstan pa ga la yod/_/rnal 'byor gang zag chos la rlom byed ni/_/ston gsum rgyu 'bras lung la brten smra ba/_/de la bden gnyis tshad ma 
[\[53b.7\]]bzhi yang dgos/_/kun byed nga yis chos kun byas pa'i phyir/_/ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis mi dgos/_/ngas byas chos la bden pa gnyis dgos su/_/ngas byas thams cad byang chub sems su byas/_/byang chub sems la don dam kun rdzob med/_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las dam tshig bsrung du med pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po la phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so/_/
[\[54a.2\]]kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun byed nga ni rdzogs pa chen po ste/_/rdzogs pa chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/phrin las ye nas btsal du med par bstan/_/phrin las btsal du yod par lung ston pa/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/
[\[54a.3\]]rang re 'khor la btsal ba'i las phog pa/_/btsal ba'i las ni rang res so sor phog_/sprul pas btsal ba'i rgyu la las phog pa/_/lus ngag yid gsum tshad med sgor zhugs nas/_/lus kyi sdom pa srog gcod rku g.yem spang /_/ngag gi sdom pa dag 
[\[54a.4\]]khyal tshig rtsub dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang phra ma la sogs ngag gis spang /_/yid kyis mnab sems gnod sems log lta spang /_/dge bcu spyod pa'i las de rgyur bkod nas/_/sbyin pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin bcu las/_/spyad nas sa dang kun 'od thob 'dod 
[\[54a.5\]]pa/_/tshi chad las ni bskal pa gsum du spyod/_/de yang kun byed nga yis lung phog min/_/longs spyod rdzogs pas 'khor la lung phog pa/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas las phog pa/_/sems can ting 'dzin las ni 'di lta ste/_/khrus dang gtsang sbrar phyi nang 
[\[54a.6\]]dag byas te/_/cho 'phrul las kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ni/_/ye shes sems dang dam tshig gnyis ltas nas/_/ting 'dzin las kyis mchod cing gshegs gsol byed/_/las des mi tshe bdun du tshi chad 'gyur/_/chos kyi sku las longs spyod skur bzhengs 
[\[54a.7\]]nas/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i 'khor la lung phog pa/_/bdag nyid chen po yin par lung bstan nas/_/rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams la/_/kha dog rigs dang sbyar ba'i lha bsgoms nas/_/zhi lhas zhi bar byed pa'i las byed pa/_/rgyas lhas rgyas 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]par byed pa'i las byed pa/_/dbang lhas dbang du sdud pa'i las kyang byed/_/drag lhas stongs par byed pa'i las kyang byed/_/tshe la gnas dang phyag rgya rig 'dzin 'grub/_/phrin las rnam bzhis tshi chad grub pa med/_/mi rtsol bya med las ni de ma grub/_/
[\[54b.2\]]rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir/_/btsal zhing bsgrubs pas bya med grub pa med/_/rgyu 'bras lta ba'i ston pas lung bstan pa/_/'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos la tshod btsugs nas/_/rgyu las btsal nas 'bras bu grub byed pa/_/sems la rgyu 
[\[54b.3\]]med ye nas 'bras bu med/_/byang chub sems la skye ba med pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten skye ba'i chos la dpe blangs nas/_/skye las 'jig pa 'byung bar sgros mi gdags/_/rang 'byung rgyu 'bras 'das pa ma brtags par/_/'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos la 
[\[54b.4\]]tshod btsugs nas/_/rgyu las btsal bas 'bras bu 'byung zer ba/_/de ni rgyu 'bras theg pa drang lung yin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ye shes ye shes zhes su bstan pa ni/_/rang 'byung ye shes ma 'gags kun dang mtshungs/_/rgyu las ma 
[\[54b.5\]]byung mtshungs med ye shes de/_/thams cad bskyed pas gzhan nas chos 'byung med/_/'jig rten rgyu 'bras chos la tshod btsugs nas/_/btsal ba med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten skye 
[\[54b.6\]]'gag chos la tshod mi gzugs/_/byang chub sems ni rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas/_/'jig rten rkyen bskyed chos la dpe ma len/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/che ba 'dod nas bsgom bsgrub rtsol byed pa/_/bsgom bsgrub btsal bas che ba de mi 'grub/_/che 
[\[54b.7\]]ba rang 'byung ye nas che ba yin/_/bsgoms na sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'chos pa yin/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa gang zhig 'chos byed pa/_/de yis sangs rgyas thams cad spangs pa yin/_/de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa ma yin te/_/de yis rang gi byang chub 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]sems spangs pas/_/rang gi rang bzhin bskal par phrad mi 'gyur/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/sems kyis ting 'dzin sgom pa ma byed cig_/ye shes yul la rtog par ma byed cig_/ngag gis 'dzab dang snying po bzla mi dgos/_/lag gis 
[\[55a.2\]]'du byed phyag rgya bca' mi dgos/_/sems kyis ting 'dzin 'phro 'du las ma byed/_/ngang la gnas pas g.yos med lhun gyis grub/_/rang bzhin gnas pas sus kyang bcos su med/_/ma btsal ji bzhin pa ru gnas pa des/_/bya ba med pa las kyi mchog 
[\[55a.3\]]tu bstan/_/don de rtogs pas las rnams mi byed de/_/las ma byas pas de bzhin nyid du gnas/_/de bzhin nyid la gang zhig su gnas pa/_/de yis ma nor ma bcos 'grub par 'gyur/_/de ni ma nor bzhin ni ma bcos yin/_/nyid ni ma nor 
[\[55a.4\]]ngo bo nyid la bya/_/de bzhin nyid las sangs rgyas chos med do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las phrin las btsal du med pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des/_chos 
[\[55a.5\]]thams cad gzhi ma kun byed nyid yin par zhal gyis bzhes pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun byed nga ni kun gyi byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems ni chos kun gzhi ma ste/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/_/phun 
[\[55a.6\]]sum tshogs pa'i dgos pa kun kyang tshang /_/rang bzhin gsum ni 'di ltar shes par bya/_/skye ba med dang 'gag pa med pa dang /_/mi 'gag skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba gsum/_/gsum ni phun sum tshogs par bstan pa yin/_/ma skyes skye ba med pa'i rang 
[\[55a.7\]]bzhin las/_/chos kyi gzhi ma bstan pa phun sum tshogs/_/ma bsgribs ma bkag pa yi rang bzhin las/_/ston pa gsum gyi rang bzhin phun sum tshogs/_/ma skyes skye ba'i cho 'phrul ngo bo las/_/'khor gyi rang bzhin rnam gsum phun sum tshogs/_/kye 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga yi rang bzhin chos nyid gcig pu la/_/nga ma 'gags pa'i ston pa rnam gsum gyis/_/skye ba'i cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i 'khor gsum las/_/nga yi chos nyid de bzhin nyid gcig la/_/rtogs par bya ba'i thabs kyi gzhi 
[\[55b.2\]]ma drug_/lta ba chos nyid mthong ba'i gzhi ma byed/_/des ni mthong bar bya ba'i thabs yin te/_/ma skyes dmigs par bya ba'i yul med pas/_/bltas pas de bzhin nyid la mthong ba med/_/dam tshig rang skyon sel ba'i gzhi ma byed/_/des ni bar chad 
[\[55b.3\]]med pa'i thabs yin te/_/de bzhin nyid la bsrung ba'i yul med pas/_/bsrungs pas de bzhin nyid la thub pa med/_/las ni grub par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed/_/btsal bas grub par byed pa'i thabs yin te/_/de bzhin nyid la btsal ba'i yul med pas/_/
[\[55b.4\]]de bzhin nyid la las kyi grub pa med/_/lam gyis bgrod pas phyin pa'i gzhi ma byed/_/des ni gnas su phyin pa'i thabs yin te/_/de bzhin nyid la lam gyis bgrod med phyir/_/bgrod pas phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin/_/sa ni gnas par byed pa'i 
[\[55b.5\]]gzhi ma byed/_/des ni sbyang mi dgos pa'i thabs yin te/_/de bzhin nyid la thams cad kun gnas pas/_/gnas par bya ba'i sa la sbyang du med/_/ye shes rtogs par byed pa'i gzhi ma byed/_/ngas ni chos nyid rig pa'i thabs yin te/_/de bzhin nyid 
[\[55b.6\]]la rtogs pa'i yul med pas/_/rang 'byung ye shes yul la rtog pa med/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/byang chub sems ni chos kyi gzhi yin pas/_/theg pa so so lta spyod drug drug gis/_/rgyu 'bras ltos pa'i 'khor la de bstan pas/_/de re rang 
[\[55b.7\]]'thad bsam pa re re yis/_/lta spyod gzhi ma drug la btsal byas kyang /_/de bzhin nyid la btsal ba'i yul med pas/_/btsal bas de bzhin nyid la bcos pa'i phyir/_/rang sems gzhi ma bcos med de mi phrad/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/lta ba 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bsgom du med ces bstan pa ni/_/chos kyi rtsa ba rang las med pa'i phyir/_/rang gis rang la blta ru med pa'i phyir/_/rang med yul ni nga yis bstan pa med/_/des na lta ba bsgom du med ces bstan/_/dam tshig bsrung du med ces bstan pa ni/_/
[\[56a.2\]]bsrung bas mi thub rang gi sems mi khegs/_/rang 'byung ye shes yin pas bsrung du med/_/kye phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa ni/_/rdzogs chen rgyu 'bras ye nas 'das pa'i phyir/_/phrin las rgyu las bsgrubs nas 'bras bur 'dod/_/rdzogs chen 'bras 
[\[56a.3\]]bu 'dod pa med pa ni/_/phrin las btsal ba med pa'i phyir/_/phrin las btsal du med ces bstan pa yin/_/lam la bgrod du med ces bstan pa ni/_/kye dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can la/_/bgrod pa byang chub sems kyi lam la 
[\[56a.4\]]bgrod/_/sems su sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med/_/des na sems kyis sems la lam bgrod med/_/sa la sbyang du med ces bstan pa ni/_/chos dbyings byang chub sems kyis 'di la/_/sbyangs pas thob par 'dod pa rgyu 'bras can/_/chos 
[\[56a.5\]]nyid byang chub sems kyi sa 'di le/_/sbyangs bcos byas grub lung ni ngas ma bstan/_/ye shes yul la mi rtog zhes bstan pa/_/yul de ye nas rang 'byung ye shes te/_/ye shes la ni ye shes yul ma mchis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[56a.6\]]sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad kyi gzhi ma kun byed nyid yin par bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des thams cad nga la gnas pa'i sa 'di bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_
[\[56a.7\]]kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni/_/kun gyi byang chub snying por gnas/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/khams gsum sems can thams cad kun/_/klong chen sems 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]kyi gnas de na/_/ma gnas pa ni gcig kyang med/_/kun gyi gnas dang sa yin te/_/'du 'bral med par de na bzhugs/_/de la sbyang zhing bgrod mi dgos/_/de la sbyangs te bgrod 'gyur na/_/rang gi sems de 'chos pa ste/_/bcos pas rang sems 
[\[56b.2\]]'byongs mi 'gyur/_/de ni spyi sa kun gyi gnas/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/rgyu 'bras dga' ba'i 'khor rnams la/_/sa mdo rnam pa gsum bstan te/_/bskyed pa'i sa dang spyod pa'i sa/_/bsgrub 
[\[56b.3\]]pa'i sa dang gsum bstan te/_/bskyed pa'i sa ru sems bzhi bskyed/_/spyod pa'i sa ru sems spyod bcus/_/bsgrub pa'i sa ru grub 'dod pas/_/de ni drang ba'i lung du bstan pa'i phyir/_/yang dag nges par yod par lung ma bstan/_/yang dag nges par nga yi 
[\[56b.4\]]lung 'di nyon/_/byang chub sems la rgyu rkyen med pa'i phyir/_/bskyed pa'i sa ru byang chub sems mi bskyed/_/bskyed pa'i sa ru byang chub sems bskyed na/_/chos dbyings nam mkha' byang chub sems mi shong /_/dge sdig las la dran pa dbang bsgyur 
[\[56b.5\]]bas/_/phyi yul chos nyid spangs pas ma spongs te/_/rang 'byung ye shes mi khegs bzhin du 'gegs/_/rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog bzhin/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa yod ces 'joms par byed/_/des na byang chub sems la skyes pa med/_/
[\[56b.6\]]spyod pa'i sa ru byang chub bcu spyad pas/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/byang chub sems la g.yos pa med pa ni/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid snang bar zad/_/nam mkha' la ni g.yos pa rdul tsam med/_/de bzhin byang chub sems 
[\[56b.7\]]la g.yos pa med/_/grub pa'i sa ru byang chub grub 'dod pa/_/kun du 'od dang ma chags pad+ma'i spyan/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang stug po bkod pa dang /_/'khor lo tshogs chen rdo rje 'chang ba dang /_/rgyu 'bras kun bzang dbye ba med sa drug_/byang chub bsgrub pa'i sa ru 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]ming btags pa/_/sems kyi rang bzhin rgyu rkyen bral ba'i phyir/_/bsgrubs pas grub pa'i 'bras bu ngas ma bstan/_/sems kyi rang bzhin drug snang bstan pa yin/_/sems kyi rang bzhin drug ni 'di lta ste/_/rang 'byung ye shes ma 
[\[57a.2\]]'gags pa yi rtags/_/dbang po sgo lnga kun du gsal ba la/_/kun du 'od kyis zhes btags pa yin/_/yul la mi rtog chags pa med pa la/_/ma chags pad+ma spyan du btags pa yin/_/skye 'jig med pa'i byang chub sems de la/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes 
[\[57a.3\]]su nga yis btags/_/rang gi rang bzhin chos nyid dpag med la/_/rang 'byung ye shes mi rtog mnyam par bkod/_/stug po bkod pa'i sa zhes btags pa yin/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de/_/rang la gnas pa'i chos rnams thams 
[\[57a.4\]]cad la/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa rnams te/_/sku gsung thugs la skye dang 'jig med pas/_/rdo rje 'chang gi sa zhes bshad pa yin/_/byang chub sems la rgyu 'bras gnyis med de/_/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams thams cad la/_/bzang 
[\[57a.5\]]ngan blang dor ye nas med pa'i phyir/_/dbye ba med pa'i sa zhes nga yis bshad/_/des na byang chub sems kyi chos dbyings la/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can kun/_/de nas 'byung zhing de ru gnas pa'i phyir/_/chos dbyings byang 
[\[57a.6\]]chub sems ni kun spyod sa/_/zhes gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i sa zhes btags pa de/_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de las ni/_/gong bshad bzhin du byang chub sems la gnas/_/zhes sbyang du med pa'i sa bstan to/_/byang chub kyi sems 
[\[57a.7\]]kun byed rgyal po las rdzogs pa chen po'i sa la sbyang du med pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des byang chub kyi sems rang byung ba'i ye shes la sgrib pa med pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]cig_/ye shes ye shes zhes bya ba/_/ye shes ye nas shes pa yin/_/rang byung ye shes ye nas shes/_/yul la rtog pa'i ye shes de/_/yul las byung bas rang byung min/_/yul med tsam na gsal mi byed/_/des na rang byung ye shes de/_/
[\[57b.2\]]ye nas shes pa'i ye shes yin/_/ye shes zhes ni de la bya/_/'khor gyi ston pa'i ye shes ni/_/yul la brtags pa'i ye shes de/_/gang su yul la rtog byed pa/_/de ni rig byed ye shes yin/_/rig par bya ba'i yul de ni/_/byang chub sems 
[\[57b.3\]]las byung ba'i phyir/_/de ni yul med byang chub sems/_/ye shes rang las byung ba'i phyir/_/de la ting 'dzin sgom mi byed/_/ting 'dzin sgom pa mi byed pas/_/ting 'dzin bag chags sog mi 'gyur/_/bag chags med pa'i chos nyid de/_/dus 
[\[57b.4\]]gsum sangs rgyas dgongs par bshad/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dgongs pa'i yul la mi rtog ste/_/mnyam pa nyid du ye nas gnas/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rang byung ye 
[\[57b.5\]]shes thugs de la/_/ye nas rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi mdzad de/_/rtog pa'i yul ni kun dang bral/_/shin tu rnal 'byor gang zag gang /_/su yang rung ba de yis ni/_/rtog pa med la gnas gyur na/_/de ni sangs rgyas 
[\[57b.6\]]dgongs pa mdzad/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/rang 'byung ye shes sangs rgyas dgongs pa mdzad/_/rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog pas/_/rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags gos mi 'gyur/_/las ni ting 'dzin brtags pa'i 
[\[57b.7\]]bag chags yin/_/mi rtog pa la bag chags yod ma gsungs/_/mi rtog pa yi rang 'byung ye shes lnga/_/sems kyi rang bzhin dbang po sgo lngar bshad/_/rang 'byung ye shes de la 'gag pa med/_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bo mngon snang la/_/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]rang 'byung ye shes mi 'gag so sor gsal/_/rang gi rkyen gyis snang bas dor mi byed/_/ting 'dzin mi rtog bag chags sog mi 'gyur/_/'di yang dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa ste/_/gang du mi rtog 'di la su gnas la/_/nga la 
[\[58a.2\]]mi gnas 'gro ba'i don mi gnas/_/chos sku byang chub sems la 'di gnas te/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus/_/kye sems dpa' chen po tshig don 'di/_/rig pa nyams su mngon sum rtogs par gyis/_/rang 'byung ye shes 
[\[58a.3\]]yul la lngar gnas pa/_/ye shes lnga ni yul lnga 'dod ma yin/_/yul 'dod lnga ni ye shes lnga la snang /_/yul de ye nas ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/yul dang ye shes gnyis su ngas ma bstan/_/des na yul yang rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/rang 
[\[58a.4\]]'byung ye shes gcig las med pa la/_/nga las byung ba'i 'khor gyi ston pa yin/_/yul la brten nas ye shes ming btags pa/_/rnam pa grangs kyi ye shes byung ba ni/_/rnam brtags pa yi ye shes gcig gis ni/_/yul gcig rang bzhin 
[\[58a.5\]]so sor snang ba la/_/yul can la ni yul gyi ming btags pa/_/de ni nges pa ma yin 'khrul pas brtags/_/kun byed nga yi rang 'byung ye shes min/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin gcig bu la/_/'khor gyi 'dod pa rnams kyis ming btags pa/_/
[\[58a.6\]]la las byang chub sems su ming btags la/_/la las chos kyi dbyings su ming yang btags/_/la las nam mkha'i khams su ming yang btags/_/la las rang 'byung ye shes ming yang btags/_/la las chos kyi sku ru ming yang btags/_/
[\[58a.7\]]la las longs spyod rdzogs par ming yang btags/_/la las sprul pa'i sku ru ming yang btags/_/la las sku gsung thugs su ming yang btags/_/la las thams cad mkhyen par ming yang btags/_/la las rnam pa thams cad ming yang 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]btags/_/la las ye shes bzhi dang gsum du btags/_/la las ye shes lnga ru ming btags la/_/la las dbyings dang ye shes ming btags pa/_/rang 'byung byang chub sems ni gcig la btags/_/rang 'byung nga la mthong tshad smras 
[\[58b.2\]]pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rang 'byung ye shes bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des rdzogs pa chen po'i lam la bgrod du med pa 'di 
[\[58b.3\]]gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/kun byed rgyal po nga ni byang chub sems/_/byang chub sems ni kun gyi lam chen te/_/gnas dang yul dang sangs rgyas sa dang gsum/_/gzhan na med de 'di na rang bzhin gnas/_/chos kyi 
[\[58b.4\]]dbyings dang chos nyid 'di na gnas/_/nam mkha'i khams dang gzhal yas 'di na gnas/_/sangs rgyas sa dang yul ni byang chub sems/_/gzhan du bgrod pa'i lam dang gnas med de/_/bgrod pas nam mkha'i lam la phyin pa med/_/kye 
[\[58b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/lam la bgrod pa yod par lung ston pa/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/bgrod pa'i lam ni lnga dang gsum bstan te/_/de la bgrod pas phyin par 'dod pa ni/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu thob par 'dod 
[\[58b.6\]]yin na/_/rdzogs chen bgrod du med dang mi mthun te/_/tshogs dang sbyor bsgom mthong pa lngar/_/tshogs gnyis bsags nas gzung 'dzin gnyis choms te/_/bsgoms pas chos mthong thob pa'i 'bras bu de/_/bgrod du med pa'i 
[\[58b.7\]]lam dang ma phrad pas/_/bde chen rtsol sgrub 'das pa ming mi grag_/'bras bu gsang bar bstan pa lam gsum ni/_/de bzhin nyid dang kun du snang la sogs/_/sku gsum lam zhes goms par bsgoms pa des/_/rang byung chos la rgyu 'bras bsnyen 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sgrub bzhis/_/bgrod pas rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i sar mi phyin/_/rang sems spros bral chos kyi dbyings yin pas/_/spros bral de na sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs/_/de bas lam la bgrod par ma byed cig_/rang sems ma 
[\[59a.2\]]bsgribs nam mkha' bzhin du gsal/_/de na dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs/_/de bas lam la bgrod par ma byed cig_/rang sems ma bcos chos nyid ji bzhin pa/_/de la dus gsum sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub/_/de bas lam la 
[\[59a.3\]]bgrod par ma byed cig_/gal te ma rig lam la bgrod gyur na/_/phyin pa'i dus med rtogs thob dus med de/_/bgrod pas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin pa med/_/sangs rgyas rang sems rtog pa bral ba yin/_/bgrod pas rang sems rtog bral der mi phyin/_/
[\[59a.4\]]lta ba bsgoms pas ting 'dzin yul dang phrad/_/ting 'dzin de yis rtog bral mnyam dang bral/_/dam tshig bsrungs pas ma nyams 'dzin la gnas/_/ma nyams 'dzin pas rtog med mnyam dang bral/_/phrin las btsal bas grub pa'i ting 'dzin byed/_/
[\[59a.5\]]grub pa'i ting 'dzin mi rtog mnyam dang bral/_/sa la sbyangs pas gnas pa'i ting 'dzin byed/_/'byongs pa'i ting 'dzin rtog med mnyam dang bral/_/chos nyid brtags pas gsal ba'i ting 'dzin byed/_/ting 'dzin gsal bas rtog med mnyam dang bral/_/
[\[59a.6\]]ye shes gsal bar rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin byed/_/gsal bar rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin mi rtog bral/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/'dod pa'i ting 'dzin ji ltar gsal ba des/_/'dod pa med pa bde ba grub par byed/_/bya bral zin pa'i 
[\[59a.7\]]bde ba chen po de/_/mi rtog 'dod pa med pa de yis blangs/_/ting 'dzin mi byed bag chags mi sog pas/_/rang 'byung ye shes las kyi dbang mi 'gyur/_/rang 'byung ye shes chos sku'i snying po de/_/btsal bas mi 'grub rang bzhin gnas pas 'grub/_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]grub par bya ba'i don rnams kun dang bral/_/don zhes bya ba'i ming tsam btags pa yin/_/yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas ming tsam yin/_/sangs rgyas ming du 'dogs par byed pa ni/_/des pa'i lung min drang ba'i lung du bstan/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa 
[\[59b.2\]]sku gsum gyis/_/chos dang sangs rgyas dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum/_/yod par ming btags de gnyan bsgrub pa ru/_/nga las byung ba'i 'khor ni sems can la/_/bde yo skyid do sdug bsngal de blangs nas/_/'di las ma gtogs pa yi bde 
[\[59b.3\]]ba ni/_/gzhan med zer nas lta spyod sna tshogs pa/_/spyad pas grub pa'i lung 'di bstan pa yin/_/bya med kun byed nga yi lung ma yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lam la bgrod du med pa'i le'u ste nga 
[\[59b.4\]]gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des bya med rdzogs pa 'dod pa med pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/chos rnams thams cad grub 'dod na/_/'dod pa'i sa ni ma sgrub cig_/'dod par byed pa'i sems 
[\[59b.5\]]de ni/_/mi len thams cad spong ba yin/_/'di ni rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu 'dod nas rgyu mi sgrub/_/mi rtog rang bzhin gnas pas 'grub/_/'dod pa'i ting 'dzin thams cad spongs/_/'dod med thams cad len par byed/_/ting nge 'dzin 
[\[59b.6\]]pas 'dod pa 'dzin/_/'dod pa de ni yang dag min/_/yang dag gzung du yod ma yin/_/byas pa'i las ni thams cad kyis/_/ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa sgrub/_/ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa de/_/byas pas grub pa ma yin te/_/ma byas ye nas 
[\[59b.7\]]lhun gyis grub/_/'dod pas thams cad kun spangs pas/_/grub par byed pa'i gegs su che/_/'dod pa'i ting 'dzin bag chags des/_/bag chags de ni sems 'dzin yin/_/'dzin pas bde ba de spong byed/_/mi 'dzin bde ba kun len pas/_/ji bzhin 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]pa yi rang bzhin no/_/ji bzhin bcos pa med pa de/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa gcig_/bde ba che las ma gtogs pa/_/'dod dang 'dzin pa ga la yod/_/mi gnas pa la dmigs pa med/_/mi rtog pa la 'dzin pa med/_/
[\[60a.2\]]med pa don gyi snying po de/_/'dod pa med pas thob par 'gyur/_/gang la 'dzin chags med pa des/_/ting nge 'dzin te 'dzin pa'i mchog_/kun zin ye nas grub zin pas/_/btang gzhag mi rtog grub pa'i rgyal/_/kye sems dpa' chen 
[\[60a.3\]]po/_sna tshogs bsgoms pas gcig mi gsal/_/gsal ba ting 'dzin gang byed pa/_/de la'ang ting 'dzin yod ma yin/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pa la/_/sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su phye/_/bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis phye 
[\[60a.4\]]nas/_/bde ba dang du blang lung bstan/_/sdig pa rgyab tu bor lung bstan/_/de ni nges pa'i lung dang 'gal/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_/gcig la gnyis su ma 'byed cig_/bde ba sdug bsngal byang chub gcig_/sangs rgyas sems can sems su 
[\[60a.5\]]gcig_/snang srid snod bcud chos nyid gcig_/bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gnyis kyang chos nyid mnyam/_/bde ba ma len sdug ma spong /_/rang bzhin gnas pas kun kyang 'grub/_/bde la chags pa sdug bsngal yin/_/kun gsal de la rtog med pas/_/de ni rang 
[\[60a.6\]]'byung ye shes yin/_/ye shes bag chags mi sog pas/_/las kyis gos par ga la 'gyur/_/rgyu 'bras ye shes ting 'dzin rtog_/rtog pa'i ye shes bag chags can/_/ye shes bag chags dbang sgyur bas/_/rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom 
[\[60a.7\]]mi bya/_/rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom byas pas/_/mi rtog mnyam dang bral bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin rtsol ba'i nad kyis zin/_/kye sems dpa' chen po/_kun byed nga ni byang chub sems/_/thams cad byang chub sems yin la/_/byang chub sems las 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]thams cad med/_/sems las sprul pa'i chos ni sna tshogs te/_/sna tshogs sprul pa cir yang snang ba ni/_/sems can gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog dang /_/ji ltar snang ba de la dad pa re/_/dad pa de yis 'thad pa'i chos ston pa/_/de ni ye shes thugs 
[\[60b.2\]]rje sprul par bshad/_/de yang rang bzhin chos la g.yos pa med/_/sangs rgyas rang bzhin chos la g.yos med pas/_/dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi chos nyid yin/_/chos nyid las ni sangs rgyas gud na med/_/sangs rgyas las ni sems can gud na med/_/
[\[60b.3\]]sems can mi rtog sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin/_/byang chub sems ma byung gi bar du ni/_/sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gnyis ka med/_/de bas sangs rgyas kun pas sems nyid bsngags/_/sems nyid mi 'gyur ba ye nas med/_/chos nyid 
[\[60b.4\]]bsgyur bas g.yos pa rdul med par/_/gcig la rim pa dgu dang brgyad khri stong /_/'byed pa'i ston pas gcig gi don mi rtogs/_/gcig ma rtogs pas kun don rtogs mi 'gyur/_/des na sems gcig don de rab tu rtogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang 
[\[60b.5\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ma g.yos 'dod pa med pa'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad g.yos pa med pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po da rtogs shig_/nga 
[\[60b.6\]]rtogs chos rtogs g.yos pa med/_/kun byed rgyal po ston pa nga nyid ni/_/byang chub sems la g.yos pa med pa de/_/thams cad byang chub sems las g.yos med cing /_/rang 'byung ye shes rgyu rkyen med pa de/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu kun las shin tu rgyal/_/
[\[60b.7\]]rgyu 'bras theg pa can la shin tu gsang /_/ma skyes rdo rje chos kyi dbyings na rgyal/_/rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang /_/sems nyid ma 'gags nam mkha'i dbyings na rgyal/_/rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang /_/snang srid snod bcud ma bcos 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]chos nyid rgyal/_/rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang /_/nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga/_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bor shin tu rgyal/_/rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang /_/khams gsum dus gsum thugs rje ye shes 
[\[61a.2\]]rgyal/_/rgyu 'bras can la mi smra shin tu gsang /_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin kun byed la/_/ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin zhi ba med/_/chos dbyings rang bzhin spros med zhi ba de/_/ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin spros pa med/_/rang 'byung ye shes ma 
[\[61a.3\]]bsgribs gsal ba de/_/mkha' la ma yal ma zhi zhi ba med/_/snang srid snod bcud chos nyid rang bzhin te/_/ma yal ma zhi rang bzhin zhi ba med/_/chos rnams thams cad ma yal ma zhi ba/_/rang bzhin gsal te ngo bo g.yos pa med/_/g.yos med chos 
[\[61a.4\]]la rgyu 'bras sgrub byed pa/_/de ni nga yi lung min 'dod lung yin/_/nga ni 'dod pa med pas kun grub ste/_/mi 'dod 'dod pa med par rang bzhin 'grub/_/grub ces bya ba nga yis smras pa med/_/rgyu 'bras grub 'dod rnams kyi tshig tu'o/_/nga ni sgro dang skur pa'i sgra ru che/_/
[\[61a.5\]]yod dang med dang grub dang ma grub dang /_/sgro dang skur pa btab pa thams cad kun/_/mi rtog pas ni mnyam pa nyid du gnas/_/mnyam pa nyid las ma gtogs gzhan pa ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ngas ma gsungs/_/ma gsungs dgongs pa sangs rgyas kun 
[\[61a.6\]]mi ston/_/gsungs pa thams cad nga yi ngo bo gsungs/_/ngo bo rang bzhin chos rnams thams cad yin/_/rang bzhin rnam dag mnyam pa'i rgyal po de/_/mi 'gyur rang bzhin chags pa kun dang bral/_/gzung ba'i yul med sems kyi gnas kyang med/_/
[\[61a.7\]]de la mngon sum thob par su 'dod pa/_/'dod pa de ni chags pa'i gnas yin te/_/de la mi rtog mnyam pa'i dgongs pa de/_/chos nyid ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa la/_/de btsal bsam pas 'dod sgrub byed pa ni/_/rang sems gzhan du tshol bar byed pa 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]yin/_/de yis chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams/_/khams gsum gnas dang srid pa'i chos bshig kyang /_/rang sems rang bzhin gnas pa de mi rnyed/_/rang gi sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_/mtha' la thug pa med pas dbyings la bri ba 
[\[61b.2\]]med/_/rang sems nam mkha' rang bzhin de mi rig_/chos kyi rang bzhin kun kyang de lta ste/_/ji bzhin pa la kun kyang bcos pa med/_/'chos pa rol pa'i ting 'dzin ci byas kyang /_/ji bzhin pa la ngo bo 'gyur ba med/_/'gyur te lhag pa'i stobs 
[\[61b.3\]]gcig che 'gyur na/_/ting 'dzin gcig gis 'khor ba lhag ma med/_/smra yang ji bzhin pa la 'gyur ba med/_/rang bzhin che ba'i yul la rang bzhin gnas/_/rang bzhin ma bcos pa yi ming yin la/_/che ba ma bcos pa la lam zhes brjod/_/sangs 
[\[61b.4\]]rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs dang ni/_/sems can rnams kyi lus ngag yid gsum la/_/bzang ngan che chung khyad par yod ma gsungs/_/mi rtog chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du gnas/_/mnyam pas chos dang chos min gcig kyang med/_/sems can 
[\[61b.5\]]rgyu med sangs rgyas 'bras bu med/_/rgyu 'bras ston pa ston pa nyid lung nor/_/de bas nga las byung ba'i chos mnyam pas/_/nga las byung ba bzang ngan med mnyam gcig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad 
[\[61b.6\]]kyi rang bzhin g.yos pa med pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin rang 'byung gi ye shes yin la/_rang 'byung gi ye shes de don gyi ngo bo lnga dang ldan te gang zhe na/_/don chos 
[\[61b.7\]]thams cad 'byung ba'i snying po dang /_/don ma nor nges pa'i ngo bo dang /_don rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i ngo bo dang /_/don byar med pa'i ngo bo dang /_don chos thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i ngo bo dang lnga'o/_/de la rang 'byung gi ye shes de la bsdus pa'i mdo lung 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ni lnga/_phye ba'i mdo lung ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun po 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po don 'di nyon cig_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/rang 'byung ye shes chen po gcig la ni/_/rang 'byung ye shes bsdus pa 
[\[62a.2\]]lnga las ni/_/phye ba'i mdo lung lnga bcu rtsa bdun te/_/nga yi ngo bo lnga bcu rtsa bdun yin/_/de yi ngo bo ji ltar yin zhe na/_/ye shes ngo bo chos kyi snying po las/_/mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/ye shes ma nor nges pa'i ngo bo las/_/ma nor 
[\[62a.3\]]nges pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/ye shes rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i ngo bo las/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu yang 'byung /_/ye shes bya ba med pa'i ngo bo las/_/bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang 'byung /_/ye shes gtan la 'bebs pa'i ngo bo 
[\[62a.4\]]las/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang 'byung /_/sems nyid ye shes ngo bo rnam lnga las/_/mdo lung bcu tshan rnam pa lnga byung ni/_/rang bzhin ngo bo yid ches lnga bstan yin/_/bdun ni nges par bstan pa'i le'u bdun gyis/_/gcig gis 
[\[62a.5\]]gzhi bstan gcig gis gdams pa bstan/_/lnga yis so so dgos pa lnga yang bstan/_/de yi don gyi bye brag bstan pa ni/_/dbang po chos nyid mthong bar bya ba'i phyir/_/mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/yin min yid ches rtog pa 
[\[62a.6\]]bsal ba'i phyir/_/ma nor nges pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang 'byung ye shes de/_/rgyu rkyen dag la rag ma las pa'i phyir/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang 'byung ye shes des/_/bya 
[\[62a.7\]]byed rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos pa'i phyir/_/bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/kun byed rgyal po'i rang 'byung ye shes des/_/nyid kyi rang bzhin gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu yang bstan/_/de la don gyi 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dgos pa lnga yod de/_/chos nyid mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung la/_/chos nyid mngon du mthong ba'i dgos pa yod/_/chos nyid ma nor mngon du mthong ba des/_/lta spyod dam tshig lam la bgrod mi dgos/_/ma nor nges par ston pa'i mdo lung la/_/ma 
[\[62b.2\]]nor yid ches nges pa'i dgos pa yod/_/sems nyid ma nor yid ches mngon pa des/_/sangs rgyas bsgrub mi dgos pa'i dgos pa yod/_/rgyu rkyen rag ma lus pa'i mdo lung la/_/rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos pa'i yon tan yod/_/rtsol zhing sgrub pa bya mi 
[\[62b.3\]]dgos pa des/_/mi rtsol bde la gnas pa'i dgos pa yod/_/bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bstan pa la/_/ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dgos pa yod/_/bya med rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dgos pa des/_/ye nas lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dgos pa 
[\[62b.4\]]yod/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bstan pa las/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can dang /_/snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun/_/rgyu med nges pa rang 'byung bya med par/_/mdo lung lnga dang mthun par gtan la 
[\[62b.5\]]'bebs/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo rtsa bstan pa ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas dang por lung bstan pa/_/chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin la/_/snga phyi dus gsum lta ba'i sems can rnams/_/phyi ba dran med sda pa bag chags 'gags/_/
[\[62b.6\]]sems can nam mkha'i chos nyid mi shes mthong /_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya'i nges tshig ni/_/chos nyid byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/spros med dbyibs dang dbang po'i spyod yul sangs/_/nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab cing rgyas/_/
[\[62b.7\]]sangs rgyas ming du btags pa nga yis med/_/khams zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs bstan pa ni/_/mang zhing rgya che ba yi mtshan nyid de/_/khams gsum sems can gcig gi dbang po yis/_/dpag gis mi lang bas na khams zhes btags/_/yang dag 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]nges par ming du btags pa med/_/sems zhes bya ba'i nges tshig bstan pa ni/_/rgyu rkyen med pa'i rang 'byung ye shes des/_/ma 'gags kun la dbang po sgo lngar gsal/_/de la sems zhes bya bar gsal bar bshad/_/snang srid snod 
[\[63a.2\]]bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun/_/skye ba med las cho 'phrul snang ba de/_/sna tshogs srid pas snang srid ces su btags/_/snod dang bcud ces bya bar bstan pa ni/_/'byung lnga snod kyi nang na rgyud drug bcud/_/gnas pas snod bcud ces su btags 
[\[63a.3\]]pa yin/_/kun byed bya ba lhag ma ma lus pa/_/bsdus pas kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin lngar/_/mdo lung lnga bcu rtsa bdun byung nas bsdus/_/kun byed rang bzhin lnga ru 'dus par bstan/_/snying po mngon du 'byin pa'i rang bzhin dang /_/ma nor nges 
[\[63a.4\]]par ston pa'i rang bzhin dang /_/rang 'byung rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i rang bzhin dang /_/bya byed rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i rang bzhin dang /_/mthun par gtan la 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin dang lnga'o zhes gsungs so/_/kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/sems dpa' 
[\[63a.5\]]rdo rje bdag gi rig pa yis/_/kun byed rang 'byung ye shes gcig ngo la/_/dgos pa phun sum tshogs pa lnga byung ste/_/rang 'byung ye shes chos kyi snying po las/_/snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/mi snang ba la mngon du 'byin nus pas/_/chos 
[\[63a.6\]]kyi snying po yin par yid kyang ches/_/rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo de/_/don dam kun rdzob bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gnyis med par/_/ma nor nges pa'i byang chub sems ston pas/_/the tshom som nyi med par yid kyang ches/_/rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo 
[\[63a.7\]]de/_/rgyu la mi brten rkyen la mi sgrub pas/_/gzhan la rag ma las pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/rang 'byung ye shes yin par yid kyang ches/_/rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo de/_/rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/phrin las btsal zhing bya 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]byed bya mi dgos/_/ma btsal lhun gyis grub par yid kyang ches/_/rang 'byung ye shes gcig gi ngo bo de/_/rang 'byung ye shes ye nas ma bsgribs pas/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad gsal/_/chos rnams thams cad gtan la 
[\[63b.2\]]'bebs pa'i phyir/_/ston pa'i sgron ma yin par yid kyang ches/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las mdo lung thams cad kun byed nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsdus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[63b.3\]]byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad byang chub sems las gzhan med pa'i mdo 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig_/ji ltar snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa dang /_/don dang tshig tu brjod pa thams cad kun/_/byang 
[\[63b.4\]]chub sems yin pa ni 'di lta ste/_/chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams 'di yang /_/ma spros ma bsgribs pa yi byang chub sems/_/'di las gzhan yin bdag gis gsungs pa med/_/nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba yang /_/byang chub sems 
[\[63b.5\]]kyi ngo bo bstan pa yin/_/'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams gsum yang /_/byang chub sems kyi ngo bo gsum snang yin/_/de ston pa yi ston pa sku gsum yang /_/byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin rnam gsum yin/_/sems nyid ye 
[\[63b.6\]]shes ma 'gags 'dod khams snang /_/sems nyid ngo bo snang ba gzugs kyi khams/_/sems kyi rang bzhin ma skyes gzugs med khams/_/rang bzhin ma skyes spros bral chos kyi sku/_/sems nyid nyid la nyid spyod longs spyod rdzogs/_/sems 
[\[63b.7\]]las sems sprul sems kyi don mdzad sprul/_/dmyal ba la sogs 'gro ba ris drug gi/_/tsha grang bkres skom blun lkugs ltung 'gyur rnams/_/mi rtog mnyam pas ji bzhin chos nyid grol/_/rang 'byung ye shes yul la mi rtog pas/_/las kyi 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bag chags skyon yon kun dang bral/_/yon tan mi len skyon rnams mi dor bas/_/bde ba mi sgrub sdug bsngal spang du med/_/ji bzhin pa la ye nas g.yos pa med/_/de bzhin bsgyur bas 'gyur ba'i chos gang med/_/'dod pas 
[\[64a.2\]]len pas thob pa'i chos kyang med/_/chos rnams rang bzhin 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/sems las rang 'byung ye shes 'byung ba 'dra/_/'dra zhes ming btags rang 'byung ye shes yin/_/rang 'byung ye shes chos nyid yul gcig la/_/chos gzhan 
[\[64a.3\]]mthong nas ye shes de spong byed/_/rang 'byung ye shes de dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/spong 'gegs yul can dag la ming mi grag_/don dam kun rdzob bden pa rnam gnyis kyis/_/sbyangs kyang bskal pa gsum gyi bar du thogs/_/dag gsum sbyong 
[\[64a.4\]]dang mtshan med sgor zhugs nas/_/byang chub yan lag kun gyi sgor zhugs nas/_/cho ga rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin rim pa yis/_/rang 'byung ye shes tshe bdun bar du spangs/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sgor zhugs nas/_/skye med shes rab 
[\[64a.5\]]thabs kyis bskyod 'gyur nas/_/snang la rang bzhin med par rang bsgoms nas/_/cho ga lnga dang yo byad yan lag dang /_/dam tshig tshul dang rab tu brtson 'gyur na/_/rig 'dzin sa ste lo stong drug brgya ru/_/longs sku 'dod pa'i ting 'dzin yengs med byed/_/
[\[64a.6\]]longs sku thob nas rang sems bzod tshol la lta/_/stong phrag gcig na mi rtog mnyam bzod rnyed/_/kye sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khyod nyid kyang /_/nga lung ma nor khyod kyis nga ston cig_/kye sems can lha mi rnams ni shes pa rtsing /_/dbang po yul la yengs 
[\[64a.7\]]pa'i rang bzhin gyis/_/sems can mi shes gang bstan tshim pa la/_/ma nor nges pa'i lung chen ma bstan par/_/rgyu 'bras drang lung don dam kun rdzob bstan/_/bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gnyis kyis shes pa de tshim nas/_/bskal pa yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]bden [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]gnyis la gnas/_/de bas dang por rang sems ma nor bstan/_/bstan pas ma nor btsal med lam phrad nas/_/da lta nyid nas mi rtsol sa la gnas/_/btsal du med pa'i lam dang de phrad 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin bsgom mi dgos dang de phrad 'gyur/_/mi 
[\[64b.2\]]rtsol bde la gnas pa de yis thob/_/ma nor nges par rang sems de thob pas/_/ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i yon tan ni/_/sems bskyed mi dgos lam la bgrod mi dgos/_/sa la mi sbyong lta ba bsgom mi dgos/_/sdom pa tshul khrims dam du 
[\[64b.3\]]gnyer mi dgos/_/kye sems dpa' chen po lung ston cig_/'jig rten mtshan ma'i chos 'di bsgrub pa bzhin/_/lus kyi las su bya byed lha mi sgom/_/ngag gi las su sngags dang tshig mi brjod/_/yid kyi las su ting 'dzin gsal mi sgom/_/zhes 
[\[64b.4\]]gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems las med pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//_//de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de chos thams cad kyi ngo bo dang 
[\[64b.5\]]byed pa po yin par nyid kyi 'khor thams cad la tshig bsgrags pa dang rtogs pa phul ba 'di bsgrags so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/bdag gis khyod kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa ni/_/chos rnams thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin gcig_/
[\[64b.6\]]chos nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang de/_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi gzhal yas khang 'di yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/skye med chos kyi sku yi ston pa yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par 
[\[64b.7\]]rab tu grags/_/'dod spyod longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku 'di yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/thugs rje ye shes sprul pa'i sku 'di yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags khams 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'di yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi nga rgyal khams 'di yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/gzugs med khams kyi yid kyi lus 'di yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par 
[\[65a.2\]]rab tu grags/_/snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas don mdzad kyang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/slad kyis byon pa'i nyid las byung ba 
[\[65a.3\]]yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/rnal 'byor rnam bzhi nyid la lta ba yang /_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/snang srid snod bcud 'byung ba lnga bsdus pa/_/kun byed rgyal po yin par rab tu grags/_/kun byed rgyal po las ni 
[\[65a.4\]]ma gtogs pa/_/sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud dang /_/chos su grags pas bsdus pa thams cad la/_/kun byed rgyal po las ni gzhan mi snang /_/zhes sems dpa' rdo rjes bsgrags so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sems dpa' 
[\[65a.5\]]rdo rjes kun byed kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sgo nas bsgrags pa'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sems dpa' rdo rje la bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje 'di zung shig_/khyod 
[\[65a.6\]]ni rang 'byung ye shes te/_/khyod ni nga yis snying po 'byung /_/nga yi rang bzhin 'di zung shig_/nga yi rang bzhin rnam gsum las/_/sku gsum ston pa byung ba yang /_/de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis zung /_/de yi bstan pa rnam gsum yang /_/bstan pa smra ba'i 
[\[65a.7\]]seng ge gyis/_/dus gnas 'khor la sogs pa yang /_/nyid kyis byas par lung ston cig_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin nam/_/kun byed nga yi mtshan bshad bzhin/_/khyod kyis nga yi rang bzhin zung /_/nga ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin/_/sangs rgyas mes 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]po nga yin gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po gyis/_/kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni/_/sku gsum ston pa'i pha yin gyis/_/khyod kyis sku gsum pha ma gyis/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas mes po gyis/_/sems can kun gyi yang mes po/_/smra ba'i seng ge smra 
[\[65b.2\]]ba'i tshe/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/sems dpa' chen po nyid dang ni/_/kun byed rgyal po nga las ni/_/gzhan yin smra bar ma byed cig_/sku gsum bstan pa'i nang nas ni/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam gnyis las/_/rgyu la bsgrubs nas 'bras 
[\[65b.3\]]bur 'dod/_/sems can sangs rgyas ming btags nas/_/sems kyis sangs rgyas 'bras bur sgrub/_/'di ni nga yi bstan pa min/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ni/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis las 'das/_/sems can sangs rgyas gnyis med pas/_/
[\[65b.4\]]sangs rgyas sems kyis sgrub ma byed/_/kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni/_/sems nyid rang 'byung ye shes so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i mdo las bstan pa gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//byang chub kyi 
[\[65b.5\]]sems kun byed rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhas pa shrI siM ha bra b+hA dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pa gor bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po rang 'byung ye 
[\[65b.6\]]shes skye ba med par rtogs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces zhus so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/legs par gsungs pa'i mdo dag mthar phyin nas/_/ston pa gsum po 
[\[65b.7\]]nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs/_/bstan pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs/_/'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs/_/nyid kyis ji ltar rtogs pa'i dgongs pa'i don/_/bdag cag rnams la legs par bstan du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rtogs pa bshad pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par nyon/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/
[\[66a.2\]]so sor 'dul ba'i don du gang gsungs pa/_/ston pa re dang gnas dang 'khor dag dang /_/bstan pa sdud pa so sor gnas par rtogs/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa min/_/kye kun byed nga yi rtogs tshul bstan pa ni/_/nga nyid skye ba med pa'i 
[\[66a.3\]]rang bzhin te/_/de las byung ba'i chos ni thams cad kun/_/rang 'byung skye ba med pa'i dbyings su rtogs/_/kye sems dpa' chen po legs par da nyon cig_/nga nyid skye ba med par ngas rtogs pas/_/ston pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs/_/
[\[66a.4\]]bstan pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs/_/'khor gnas dus kyang skye ba med par rtogs/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba med par rtogs/_/da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa yang /_/skye ba med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs/_/ma byon slad 
[\[66a.5\]]kyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas yang /_/skye ba med pa nyid du rab tu rtogs/_/kye ston pa kun byed nyid kyis rtogs pa ltar/_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par gyis/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes de ltar ma rtogs na/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 
[\[66a.6\]]mi 'gyur/_/nga yi rang bzhin khyod kyis ma rtogs na/_/snying po'i rang bzhin bcu dag rtogs mi 'gyur/_/rang bzhin bcu yi don la rmongs pa yis/_/bsgom du med pa'i lung bcu ji ltar rtogs/_/kye nga yis chos rnams ji ltar bstan pa ltar/_/
[\[66a.7\]]sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs par byos/_/nga yi rang bzhin skye med rtogs pa ltar/_/kun gyi rang bzhin skye med rtogs par gyis/_/ston pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs/_/bstan pa gsum yang skye ba med par rtogs/_/'khor gnas 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]dus kyang skye ba med par rtogs/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas skye ba med par rtogs/_/rgyud drug sems can skye ba med par rtogs/_/sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga po yang /_/skye ba med pa'i ngang du rab tu rtogs/_/khams gsum srid gsum skye ba med par 
[\[66b.2\]]rtogs/_/'dod lnga yul lnga skye ba med par rtogs/_/des na chos kun byang chub sems nyid de/_/byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po nyid/_/kun byed rgyal po skye ba med par rtogs/_/chos kun rtsa ba kun byed nga nyid de/_/nga nyid ma skyes dbyings su 
[\[66b.3\]]rtogs pas na/_/kun kyang skye med dbyings su rtogs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rtogs pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lta ba bsgom 
[\[66b.4\]]du med pa rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da rtogs shig_/chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba kun byed la/_/lta dang blta bar byed pa yod ma yin/_/gang la ltar med snying po gang rtogs pa/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs 
[\[66b.5\]]pa yin/_/kye ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun/_/kun byed skye ba med par kun gnas pa/_/su zhig snying po'i don la rtogs 'dod pas/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs par gyis/_/kye kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma rtogs par/_/so 
[\[66b.6\]]sor bstan pa'i lung dang yid 'thad cing /_/sku gsum ston pa'i don la gang 'jug pa/_/kun byed nga yi don dang shin tu 'gal/_/kye ston pa kun byed nga nyid ma gtogs par/_/lta ba'i rang bzhin kun mkhyen skye med 'di/_/'das dang da ltar ma 
[\[66b.7\]]'ongs sangs rgyas kyis/_/ma rtogs mi rtogs rtogs par lung mi ston/_/ma skyes skye ba med pa'i sangs rgyas kyang /_/kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad nas ni/_/des kyang lta ba skye med rab tu rtogs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs/_/kye 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]kun byed rgyal po ston pa'i lung med na/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas khams gsum sems can dang /_/ma skyes lam la lta ba'i rnal 'byor dang /_/la dgu lung dgu rgal yang sa bcu yis/_/rang rang dngos po'i don la rtog dpyod pas/_/ma 
[\[67a.2\]]skyes snying po'i don la sgrib pa'i phyir/_/rgyu 'bras bral ba'i byang chub snying po 'di/_/kun gyi lta ba'i don 'di rtogs pa med/_/kye de bas ston pa kun byed nga yis kyang /_/'khor gyi dang po sems dpa' rdo rje la/_/sku gsum ston pa gsum gyis bshad pa'i 
[\[67a.3\]]lung /_/de la ma gnas shig par nga lung ston/_/de ltar nges pa'i lung 'di ma bstan na/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi gdung chad nas/_/kun kyang 'khor ba'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/_/kye de phyir sems 
[\[67a.4\]]dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis kyang /_/lta dang mi blta yul las 'das pa la/_/gang bltas don la rnam rtog mched pa'i phyir/_/rgyu 'bras can gyi lta ba khyod ma rtogs/_/shin tu rnal 'byor mi gnas theg pa la/_/bltas shing brtags pas mthong ba'i don 
[\[67a.5\]]'gag pas/_/ma bcos snying po kun byed rang bzhin la/_/bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don du rtogs/_/kye kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi blta ba'i me long ste/_/gsal la rang bzhin med par kun 'char bas/_/
[\[67a.6\]]ma bltas rang bzhin gsal bar lung bstan to/_/ma skyes de bzhin nyid kyi yul nyid la/_/blta ba'i yul med mthong ba chen por rtogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las skye ba med pa'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//_//
[\[67a.7\]]de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 'di/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/dbang po'i khyad par rim par lung bstan pa/_/kun byed 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bsrung du yod pa'i don du rtogs/_/la las sdom dang 'dul khrims dag par rtogs/_/la las rig 'dzin sdom pa dag par rtogs/_/la las grangs dang rtsa ba yan lag rtogs/_/ji ltar brtags kyang rtogs par lung ma bstan/_/kun byed rgyal 
[\[67b.2\]]po'i dam tshig 'di/_/bsrung dang mi srung phyogs ris med par bstan/_/gang gis bsrung dang mi srung med rtogs pa/_/kun byed nga yi dam tshig rtogs pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga /_/rtsa ba byang chub sems su kun gcig 
[\[67b.3\]]pas/_/kun kyang snying po'i dam tshig yin pas na/_/bsrung dang mi srung don la 'das par rtogs/_/kye kun byed rgyal po'i lta ba'i dam tshig ni/_/skye med nam mkha' lta bur phyogs 'das pas/_/gang gis de dag legs par rtogs pa 
[\[67b.4\]]de/_/kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rtogs pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/dam tshig bsrung du med par lung bstan pa/_/dam tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud las gang thos pa/_/'dis ni don de legs par rtogs pa yin/_/kye 
[\[67b.5\]]kun byed rgyal pos snga bar lung bstan ltar/_/dus gsum chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi dam tshig ni/_/dus gsum du ni bsrung du med par rtogs/_/kye chos rnams rtsa ba sems su gcig pa ltar/_/dam tshig rtsa ba 
[\[67b.6\]]bsrung du med par gcig_/de yang rang sems skye med rtogs pa yin/_/phyal ba dang ni med pa gcig pu dang /_/lhun gyis grub pas bsrung ba kun las 'das/_/kun byed rgyal po'i dam tshig rnam grangs te/_/skye ba med par rtogs pa'i rnam 
[\[67b.7\]]grangs yin/_/snying po bsrung du med par don gcig la/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par la dgongs nas/_/drang dang nges pa gnyis su rnam phye nas/_/bsrung du yod dang med par lung bstan to/_/kye 'dis ni dam tshig bsrung med rtogs pa'i phyir/_/
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa rtogs pa yin/_/gang gis 'di ma rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rang sems snying po'i don dang shin tu 'gal/_/kye kun byed nga yi dam las gang 'das shing /_/sku gsum ston pa'i dam la gnas pa 
[\[68a.2\]]dag_/bskal pa brgya phrag du ma rnams su yang /_/snying po'i don dang phrad par shin tu dka'/_/de phyir kun byed nga yi lung thob pas/_/dam tshig bsrung du med par rtogs par byos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las 
[\[68a.3\]]bsrung med dam tshig gi le'u ste drug cu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des phrin las btsal du med pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs shig_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga'i/_/rang bzhin 
[\[68a.4\]]las byung ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/so so ji ltar 'dul ba'i skur byung nas/_/phrin las btsal bas don dang phrad par rtogs/_/lus kyi las su phyag rgya bca' bar rtogs/_/ngag gis sngags dang bzlas pa byed par rtogs/_/sems kyis 'phro 'du ting 
[\[68a.5\]]'dzin bsgom par rtogs/_/sgo gsum yal bar gnas pas grub mi rtogs/_/kye ston pa kun byed nga yi phrin las ni/_/btsal bar bya med phrin las lung bstan pas/_/don dang mi 'gal bsam pa mthar phyung bas/_/phrin las btsal du med 
[\[68a.6\]]par khyod kyis rtogs/_/kye ston pa kun byed nga yi phrin las ni/_/bdag don lhun gyis grub pas bya med rtogs/_/gzhan don dbyings su gcig pas btsal med rtogs/_/de ltar khyod kyis nges par rtogs par gyis/_/kye kun byed byang chub sems 
[\[68a.7\]]su kun byas pas/_/byang chub sems la bya mi dgos par rtogs/_/ma byas bya bral snying po byang chub la/_/bya dang mi bya tha snyad gang gis gdags/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi phrin las ni/_/lus kyi las su phyag rgya bcar med rtogs/_/ngag 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]gis bzlas brjod byar med snying por rtogs/_/sems kyis 'phro 'du sgom dang bral bar rtogs/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs pa yang /_/phrin las bya med rtogs nas mngon sangs rgyas/_/dus gsum rgyal ba rtogs la rag lus pas/_/sems 
[\[68b.2\]]dpa' rdo rje thos nas rtogs par gyis/_/kye nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i lung bstan pa/_/rnam rtog mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la/_/'dul ba'i rtog pa grangs su bstan pa yin/_/kye de phyir kun byed nga yis lung 
[\[68b.3\]]bstan pa/_/thos pa'i don la ma nor brtag par byos/_/bya rtsol kun dang bral ba'i phrin las kyis/_/ma byas don kun rdzogs pas rtogs pa 'char/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs/_/snying po bya rtsol med pa'i don rtogs pas/_/bya 
[\[68b.4\]]dang mi bya med par don rdzogs pas/_/kun byed rgyal po'i phrin las 'di rtogs shig_/kye ston pa'i rgyal po kun byed nga yis ni/_/byas pa thams cad mtshan ma'i lam du bstan/_/bya bral phrin las nges don 'di rtogs pas/_/'gro ba kun byed rgyal 
[\[68b.5\]]po nyid du 'gyur/_/snying po bya bral sgo gsum ma nor bas/_/bya rtsol 'das pa'i don la rtogs pa ni/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa gcig pa'i phyir/_/ma nor lam la rtogs pa nyid mchog yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[68b.6\]]rgyal po las sgo gsum bya ba med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di da rtogs shig_/nga las 
[\[68b.7\]]byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba'i gdul bya la/_/tshogs dang dkyil 'khor bskyed du yod par bstan/_/gang zhig sku gsum lam la brten byas nas/_/mtshan ma grangs kyi sgo nas rtog byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]phrag yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/dkyil 'khor bskyed du med pa'i don mi rtogs/_/kye de bas ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/tshogs dang dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lhun rdzogs pa'i/_/ma byas rang bzhin grub pa'i chos nyid la/_/bskyed cing bsag tu 
[\[69a.2\]]med pa'i don rtogs na/_/kye kun byed nga yi dkyil 'khor bstan pa ni/_/rang las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i lung /_/ma lus snying bor rdzogs pas bskyed 'bri med/_/ma bskyed dus gcig rdzogs pa dkyil 'khor rtogs/_/kye dkyil ni ma nor don 
[\[69a.3\]]gyi snying po la/_/'khor ni 'khor 'das bde chen rdzogs par ldan/_/de ni dkyil 'khor snying po kun gyi rtsa/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus 'di la 'dus par rtogs/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi dkyil 'khor ni/_/ma lus snying por rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te/_/
[\[69a.4\]]gang gis de dag rdzogs par gang rtogs pa/_/dkyil 'khor bskyed pa med pa'i don la mkhas/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/skye med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/_/'gro dang 'ong med kun du khyab par bdal/_/rtogs pas skye 
[\[69a.5\]]ba med pa'i don la 'jug_/kye rang 'byung ye shes lnga yi dkyil 'khor ni/_/rtogs dang ma rtogs don la rag lus pas/_/bskyed dang mi bskyed gnyis su mthong ba yin/_/dam pa rtogs na bskyed dang mi bskyed med/_/de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis 
[\[69a.6\]]kyang /_/sgra la ma gnas don nyid rtogs par gyis/_/gang gis de la rtogs pa skyes ma thag_/kun byed rgyal po don la 'byor par 'gyur/_/kye rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po ste/_/rang bzhin khyab par gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/_/ma 
[\[69a.7\]]skyes rang bzhin gnas pa'i don 'di la/_/rtogs pa ci bder mnos la ma rtsol cig_/kye rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed ngas/_/dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par don rtogs pas/_/de yi rang bzhin sgra thos ma yin par/_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]kyis rtogs par gyis/_/kye kun byed rgyal po chags sdang rnam pa lnga/_/skye med byang chub sems su bstan pa ltar/_/sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis rtogs nas kyang /_/de bzhin 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[69b.2\]]sems kun byed rgyal po las dkyil 'khor bskyed du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos dbang la bskur du mod par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di nges 
[\[69b.3\]]rtogs shig_/nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/dbang la bskur thabs yod par lung phog pa/_/mtshan ma'i rtog pa'i lam la zhen chags pas/_/nga yi rang bzhin mi mthong bskal par 'gyur/_/kye nga 
[\[69b.4\]]ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/nga yi rang bzhin kun byed khyab rtogs pas/_/nga la gnyis pa'i don ni med pa'i phyir/_/bskur dang mi bskur don dang bral bar rtogs/_/gang zag mtshan ma grangs la dga' ba la/_/dbang gi grangs dang bskur ba'i rim 
[\[69b.5\]]pa bstan/_/ma bcos don la gnas pa'i gang zag la/_/ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i rim pa bstan/_/kye kun byed rgyal po'i rang bzhin kun khyab pas/_/de ltar 'jug cing rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/ma bskur rang bzhin gnas pa'i don rtogs 
[\[69b.6\]]pas/_/dbang la bskur thob med par lung ston cig_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/bskur thob med par rtogs nas lung bstan pas/_/skye med rnam dag sems kyi dbang thob nas/_/rang bzhin bcu yi dbang la rtsol mi 'gyur/_/sngags dang 
[\[69b.7\]]phyag rgya'i dbang la re mi 'jog_/rdzas dang mtshan ma'i dbang la sems mi 'chags/_/rang rgyud dag pas mtshan ma'i lha mi bsgom/_/gza' dang rgyu skar dus tshigs rim pa med/_/kye ston pa'i rgyal po nga yis rtogs pa ltar/_/sku gsum ston pa 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]gsum gyis ma rtogs pas/_/rang bzhin bcu yi don la bsgribs pa'i phyir/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal bo ngas/_/'khor gyi dang po sku gsum ston pa las/_/rang bzhin ma bcos 
[\[70a.2\]]ji bzhin lung phog pa/_/mtshan ma'i 'jig rten lha la rten mi 'cha'/_/tshogs la mi rten dbang la rag ma lus/_/skye med rig pa'i dbang la kun rdzogs pas/_/ma btsal bde bar bzhag pas don kun rdzogs/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/
[\[70a.3\]]sku gsum ston pa nga yis bkod pa yin/_/des bstan bcos kyang nga yis bkod pa yin/_/rang nyid rang la dgod pa bya mi dgos/_/kye de ltar kun byed rang bzhin gang rtogs pas/_/thams cad kun byed rang bzhin de rtogs pas/_/kun byed nga yi 
[\[70a.4\]]rang bzhin rtogs gyis la/_/mtshan 'dzin zhen pa'i dbang la ma rten cig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rang 'byung rtogs pa'i dbang gi le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal 
[\[70a.5\]]pos lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yi/_/rang bzhin ma skyes gcig tu gnas pa la/_/skye med mngon du rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir/_/'khor gyi dang po ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/rang rang 
[\[70a.6\]]dga' ba'i lam la gzud pa'i phyir/_/lam gyi khyad par bgrod du yod par bstan/_/blo chung brgyud nas don la 'dren pa'i phyir/_/drang ba'i lung du nga yis rtogs pa yin/_/kye tshogs dang sbyor lam mthong lam bsgom pa'i lam/_/mthar phyin rim pa bskal 
[\[70a.7\]]pa brgya phrag dang /_/tshe gsum bdun sogs dus der 'grub par rtogs/_/de yis nga yi lam 'di rtogs mi 'gyur/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam bshad pa/_/nga nyid skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la/_/'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das/_/de phyir 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]lam la bgrod du med par rtogs/_/lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog mtshan ma'i grangs/_/nga nyid mtshan ma'i yul las 'das pa'i phyir/_/mtshan ma'i lam gyis bgrod du med par rtogs/_/kye kun byed nga yi lam la rim med de/_/skye med thig le chen 
[\[70b.2\]]por gcig pa'i phyir/_/gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pa de yi phyir/_/lam la bgrod med gcig tu rtogs pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga /_/nga la 'jug pa'i rim pa'i lam med de/_/rang 'byung ye shes dus gcig rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/ma 
[\[70b.3\]]bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas phyin par 'gyur/_/de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod nyid kyis/_/nga la rim par bgrod par ma byed cig_/kye nga ni mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_/nam mkha'i mtha' la bgrod cing tshi chad ltar/_/nga yi rang bzhin lam 
[\[70b.4\]]gyis bgrod 'dod pa/_/tshi chad nang du de las che ba med/_/de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs nas kyang /_/khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig_/da ltar nga yi rang bzhin lung bstan pas/_/kun kyang nga yi rang bzhin nyid rtogs 'gyur/_/'jig rten
