[\[70b.5\]]mtshan ma'i lam la zhen mi 'gyur/_/rnam grangs tshig gi lam la rtsod mi 'gyur/_/ma bcos bder bzhag rtogs pas pha rol phyin/_/kun gyi snying po'i lam dang phrad par 'gyur/_/kye nga ni kun byed chos kyi gzhi ma ste/_/lam lnga sa bcur ston pa'i sku 
[\[70b.6\]]gsung yang /_/nga yi rang bzhin mngon du bstan pa yin/_/de ltar khyod kyis legs par rtogs par gyis/_/ma bcos bgrod med kun byed kun gyi lam/_/su zhig bgrod pas byang chub don mi rtogs/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur/_/
[\[70b.7\]]de bas bgrod du med pa'i don la rtogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lam la bgrod du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sa la sbyang du med par rtogs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don 'di legs par rtogs/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/sa la sbyang du med par bstan pa ni/_/kun gyi yul min brtag pa rab tu dka'/_/kye nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku 
[\[71a.2\]]gsum gyis/_/dman pa'i rim pa bgrod cing sbyangs pa'i phyir/_/rnam rtog grangs la dga' ba'i gang zag la/_/sa yi rnam grangs bcu dang drug tu bstan/_/bstan pa de bzhin 'khor gyis de ltar rtogs/_/rnam rtog blo yi grangs la snang bar zad/_/kye 
[\[71a.3\]]sa drug grangs kyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/kun du 'od dang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /_/rdo rje 'chang dang stug po bkod pa dang /_/pad+ma spyan dang rdo rje sems dpa'i sa/_/rim bgrod rnal 'byor don du gsungs pa ste/_/lha dang ting 'dzin khyad par re re gsungs/_/kye 
[\[71a.4\]]ston pa kun byed rgyal pos bstan pa/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa/_/skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa'i phyir/_/sa yi khyad par med de gcig tu rtogs/_/kun byed nga yis lam sbyar na/_/rtog pa'i sa yi rnam grangs kun thob 
[\[71a.5\]]kyang /_/so so rang gi rnam rtog snang ba las/_/kun byed nga dang phrad par lung mi ston/_/kye kun byed rgyal pos yi rang bzhin ni/_/ma bcos ma sbyangs rig pas lhun rdzogs sa/_/sbyangs shing bgrod kyang don dang mi phrad kyi/_/rang bzhin rtogs pas dus 
[\[71a.6\]]gcig rdzogs par byed/_/kye theg gcig kun byed byang chub sems kyis/_/skye med khyab pas rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/gang ltar bgrod pa nam mkha'i mtha' tshol 'dra/_/ma bgrod rang bzhin bzhag pas grol bar ston/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun 
[\[71a.7\]]byed rgyal po nga /_/sa yi ngo bor nga nyid shar ba'i phyir/_/nga yi sa la mtho dman rim pa med/_/kun byed nga yis 'di rtogs par gyis/_/nga nyid kun gyi mdun du mngon phyung yang /_/sku gsum 'khor gyis rnam rtog grangs su rtogs/_/kun byed 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]rgyal po'i dgongs pa zab mo yang /_/gang ltar bltas pas mthun par lung mi ston/_/kye nga yi 'khor gyi dang po sku gsum gyis/_/rang rang mos pa'i 'khor la chos bstan pa/_/sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa re re dang /_/sa re lam re 'bras bu 
[\[71b.2\]]re re bstan/_/kun byed nga yi sa lam ma rtogs na/_/rnam grangs sa des nges pa'i lam mi rnyed/_/des na sems nyid kun theg sems kyis/_/rtsa ba'i sa la brtan par rtogs par gyis/_/sa yi rang bzhin snang med 'di rtogs na/_/kun byed byang 
[\[71b.3\]]chub sems kyi sa la gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las sa la sbyang du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos spyod pa blang dor med par rtogs pa 'di 
[\[71b.4\]]gsungs so/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/la las dge spyad sdig pa dor bar rtogs/_/la las gtsang sme blang dor gnyis su rtogs/_/la las gtsang sme gnyis ka spyad par rtogs/_/spyad dang ma 
[\[71b.5\]]spyad med pa'i don ma rtogs/_/gang dag spyod pa 'di la gnas pa ni/_/rang rang gnyen po'i rtogs pa byed pa yis/_/dmigs pa yid la sbyangs pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/blang dor med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi 'gyur/_/kye kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa 
[\[71b.6\]]bstan pa ni/_/dge sdig blang dor gtsang sme che chung kun/_/skye med byang chub sems su kun gcig pas/_/blang dang dor ba med pa'i don du rtogs/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang med pa nyid du rtogs/_/spyad dang ma spyad gnyis su med par rtogs/_/mtha' 
[\[71b.7\]]dang dbus su 'byed pa med par rtogs/_/gzhi rtsa skye med byang chub sems su rtogs/_/kye kun byed rgyal po'i spyod pa bstan pa ni/_/gang ltar spyad pa de ltar mi 'gal te/_/byas dang ma byas gnyis ka skye med pas/_/shes pas gang ltar spyad pa skye med 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]don/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa la/_/mkha' ltar gnas pas grangs dang tshad gzung med/_/gnyis su med pas min yin phyogs las 'das/_/kun byed byang chub sems kyi spyod par rtogs/_/'dod pa lnga yang sems kyi 
[\[72a.2\]]spyod par rtogs/_/chags sdang lnga yang sems kyi spyod par rtogs/_/rgyan gyi rgyu lnga sems kyi spyod par rtogs/_/khams gsum srid gsum sems kyi spyod par rtogs/_/skye med ma rtogs pa yi spyod pa ni/_/rgyal ba kun gyi mes po ngas ma bshad/_/kye 
[\[72a.3\]]de phyir sems dpa' rdo rje khyod kyis ni/_/kun byed nga yi spyod pa 'di rtogs la/_/blang dor med par kun gyis rtogs pa'i phyir/_/nga yi 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig_/kun byed nga yi spyod pa ma rtogs par/_/sku gsum ston pa'i 'khor la gang zhen pas/_/
[\[72a.4\]]'jig rten log pa'i lta spyod la 'chol nas/_/blang dor med pa'i spyod pa rtogs mi byed/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/'khor gyi nang du spyod pa'i lung bstan pa/_/ma chags blang dor med pa'i spyod pa yis/_/thams cad skye med 
[\[72a.5\]]mnyam par rtogs lung bstan/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes 'khor la lung bstan pas/_/'khor kyang blang dor med par rtogs par 'gyur/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams ni/_/skye ba med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar/_/nga dang khyod kyis 
[\[72a.6\]]rtogs pa ji lta bar/_/khyod kyis 'khor gyi nang du lung ston cig_/snga bar lung bstan thos pa la brten nas/_/rtogs pas kun byed nyid la gnas par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las spyod pa blang dor med 
[\[72a.7\]]par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos ye shes rang la sgrib pa med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/ji ltar 'dul ba'i thabs su bstan 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/sgrib pa bsal zhing ye shes bsgrub par rtogs/_/sku gsum ston pas 'khor la de ltar bstan/_/'khor gyis go zhing rtogs pa de bzhin te/_/rang rang mos pa'i don la zhen pa'i phyir/_/kun 
[\[72b.2\]]byed nga yi 'khor du 'du mi byed/_/kye kun byed nga yis 'khor la lung phog pa/_/ji ltar snang grags gnas pa'i chos rnams kun/_/ma skyes de bzhin nyid du kun gcig phyir/_/sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su gnas mi byed/_/de phyir ye shes sgrib par nga 
[\[72b.3\]]ma 'byed/_/sgrib dang mi sgrib chos su ris mi lta/_/mthar thug med pa'i don la grangs mi bgrang /_/rgyu dang 'bras bus snying po'i don mi skyed/_/kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga yi bka'/_/sku gsum ston pa'i lung dang mi mthun pas/_/skye med gcig la 
[\[72b.4\]]mtshan ma'i grangs mi bgrang /_/yul shes mi blta gnyen po'i tshogs mi bsten/_/rig dang ma rig skye med dbyings gcig pas/_/gcig la gnyis 'dzin mtshan ma'i grangs mi 'debs/_/rnam par mi rtog 'du shes nang mi 'jog_/des 'jog ma 
[\[72b.5\]]yin dus gcig kun mkhyen pas/_/de ltar sems dpa' rdo rjes rtogs par gyis/_/kye ston pa kun byed nga yi ye shes nyid/_/bgrang du med la bgrang na mtha' las 'das/_/che ba re la ye shes grangs bstan pas/_/brjod pas de dag mi rdzogs lung 
[\[72b.6\]]bstan to/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi ye shes ni/_/rnam par mi rtog spros pa kun dang bral/_/rab zhi gdul med mkha' ltar gnas pa ste/_/skye ba med pa zhes su bstan pa yin/_/rang 'byung ye shes gcig las ma g.yos kyang /_/rnam pa'i khyad par ma bcos 
[\[72b.7\]]so sor gsal/_/de ltar gang gis rig cing rtogs pa nyid/_/kun byed rgyal po'i sras su lung bstan to/_/ye shes skye med rtogs pa ji lta bar/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes de ltar rtogs par gyis/_/kye nga ni ye shes kun byed rgyal po ste/_/ma rig pa yi lta 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]ba sel bar byed/_/sgrib pa'i dra ba ma lus gcod byed cing /_/ye shes snang ba rgyas par mched par byed/_/kun byed nga ni rang 'byung ye shes te/_/nga las ma byung ye shes gcig med pas/_/ye shes ma lus nga yis bkod pas 
[\[73a.2\]]na/_/nga ni ye shes rgyal po zhes su bshad/_/nyon mongs ye shes gsal bar byed 'dod na/_/kun byed nga yi lung ni rtogs par gyis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ye shes bsgrib pa med par rtogs pa'i le'u 
[\[73a.3\]]ste drug cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lhun grub btsal du med par rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/nga ni lhun grub btsal du med pa yin/_/nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par 
[\[73a.4\]]bya/_/khyod kyis nga yi don la legs rtogs shig_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/nga yi rang bzhin shin tu rtogs dka' bas/_/so so'i thabs kyis btsal du yod par bstan/_/de yang ji ltar 
[\[73a.5\]]nges par bstan zhe na/_/la la bden pa bzhi yi lam zhugs nas/_/nyon mongs ye shes spong len rtsol bar bstan/_/la la rten 'brel lam la zhen pa yis/_/nyon mongs ye shes dgag bsgrub rtsol bar bstan/_/la la bden pa gnyis kyi lam la 
[\[73a.6\]]'jug byas nas/_/sbyangs shing rtsol bas 'bras bu thob par bstan/_/la la gzung 'dzin bya ba'i rtsol ba yis/_/grub pa lhar gsal tshul du gnas par 'dod/_/la la las dang ting 'dzin rtsol ba yis/_/blang dor sgo nas 'bras bu thob par 
[\[73a.7\]]'dod/_/la la ting 'dzin rnam gsum rtsol ba yis/_/blang dor byas pas 'bras bu thob par 'dod/_/la la ting 'dzin 'phro 'du'i rtsol ba yis/_/blang dor med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod/_/la la rgyu 'bras ting 'dzin rtsol ba yis/_/sku gsung rdo rje 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]sems dpa'i 'bras bu thob/_/kye 'di dag btsal zhing bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yis/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin rtogs mi 'gyur/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni/_/kun la khyab kyang mi rtogs mchog tu gsang /_/nga yi rang bzhin 
[\[73b.2\]]ma mthong gsang ba'i phyir/_/rtsol sgrub can gyi theg pas skur btab pas/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig yun [{]rings su[,]ring du[}]/_/ngan 'gro tha ma'i gnas su de skyes nas/_/bde ba bral zhing dbang po ma tshang zhing /_/snying po'i don dang bral zhing bskal par 'gyur/_/
[\[73b.3\]]kye nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems/_/nga ni mtha' ltar yongs su khyab pa'i phyir/_/kun dang 'brel zhing yongs kyi don byed pas/_/btsal zhing bsgrub pa yod par lung mi ston/_/nga yi don 'di khyod la bstan pa yis/_/btsal zhing bsgrub tu med par nges 
[\[73b.4\]]par rtogs/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa de/_/nga yi 'khor la khyod kyis lung ston cig_/kye nga ni ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/ji ltar rtogs pa khyed la lung bstan pas/_/khyed kyis chos kun pha ltar rtogs par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[73b.5\]]nas rtsol bsgrub med par dbugs phyin pas/_/kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to/_/de bas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa yis/_/ma bcos bskal par sbyangs pa'i skyes bu la/_/'bad rtsol med par sa la gzhag pa'i phyir/_/btsal bsgrub med 
[\[73b.6\]]par rtogs par lung ston cig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lhun grub btsal du med par rtogs pa'i le'u ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 
[\[73b.7\]]'di skad ces bsgrags so/_/kye khyod ni kun byed rgyal po ste/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/byed pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis byas/_/ma lus khyod kyis kun byas kyang /_/byed pa'i rgyal po khyod nyid la/_/bya mi dgos te gdod nas grub/_/
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]dus gsum sangs rgyas khyod kyis byas/_/khams gsum sems can khyod kyis byas/_/rgyud drug lam lnga khyod kyis byas/_/skye bzhi 'gro lnga khyod kyis byas/_/ston pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod/_/bstan pa gsum yang khyod 
[\[74a.2\]]kyis bkod/_/sdud pa gsum yang khyod kyis bkod/_/dus gsum 'khor yang khyod kyis bkod/_/rang 'byung lnga yang khyod las byung /_/rgyan gyi rgyu lnga khyod kyis bkod/_/rang bzhin bcu yang khyod kyis bstan/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/
[\[74a.3\]]mdo lung kun gyi ngo bo khyod/_/bstan pa'i me long mun sel sgron/_/'khor gyi mun pa sel mdzad pa/_/khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi mes/_/rang 'byung thabs mchog kun gyi yab/_/'byung gnas shes rab kun gyi yum/_/spros pa med cing zhi ba med/_/ngag 
[\[74a.4\]]las 'das shing snying po med/_/mkha' ltar dag cing spyod yul 'das/_/kun gyis rtogs par bya ba'i yul/_/sgro skur 'das pa chos kyi dbyings/_/thog ma tha ma dbus las 'das/_/'khor lo 'byung gnas snying po can/_/rin chen pad+ma'i snying po ltar/_/yid 
[\[74a.5\]]'phrog tshim pa med pa'i sku/_/theg pa'i snying po dag gi rgyan/_/sku gsung thugs la mtshan med de/_/bdag gis rtogs dka'i don rtogs pas/_/rgyal ba kun gyi yang mes po/_/kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud/_/ces bstod cing bsgrags so/_/de nas 
[\[74a.6\]]byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bsgrags pa mdzad do/_/e ma ho sems dpa' rdo rje'i sku/_/rgyal ba kun gyi'ang sku gsung thugs/_/gsang ba'i mdzod la mnga' brnyes shing /_/smra ba'i seng ge bla na med/_/dam pa'i 
[\[74a.7\]]gsang ba rtogs pa'i thugs/_/gsang ba rgya mtsho sgrogs pa'i gsung /_/yon tan lhun grub rdzogs pa'i sku/_/khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras po ste/_/kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ltar/_/rgyal ba kun gyi mes po gyis/_/sa khams rnams kyi mun sel gyis/_/rnal 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]'byor rnams kyi bla ma gyis/_/gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po ste/_/bstan pa phyi ma gsang ba 'di/_/rnal 'byor pa la lung ston cig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rtogs pa bsgrags shing bstod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa 
[\[74b.2\]]dgu pa'o//_//rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba mdo lung bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa la gzigs shing dgongs nas cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/
[\[74b.3\]]de'i tshe sems dpa' rdo rje de nyid kyang ston pa de ltar gyur pa yang rig_/chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa la dgongs nas cang yang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags shing 'khod pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che dag gis de ltar rtogs 
[\[74b.4\]]nas sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces bskul lo/_/yang dag par bskul to/_/nges pa dam par bskul to/_/e ma ho/_sems dpa' rdo rje chen po bdag cag la phan gdags pa'i slad du rtogs pa'i don la ji ltar bsgom pa de ston pa la zhu ba'i 
[\[74b.5\]]dus la bab bo/_/nges par dus la bab po zhes bskul bas sems dpa' rdo rje de dga' ba'i mdangs dang bcas te dang zhing mos pa'i mdangs phyung nas stan las langs te ston pa'i mdun du 'di skad ces zhus so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 
[\[74b.6\]]lags/_/khyod kyi mdun du bdag 'dus 'khod pa de/_/bdag 'tshal ba yi don ni ci zhig mchis/_/bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol/_/zhes zhus pa las byang chub kyi sems kun byed nyid cang yang mi gsung bar bzhugs te sems 
[\[74b.7\]]dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/chos sku skye med thig le'i rang bzhin la/_/ston pa gsum po nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom/_/bstan pa gsum du nyid kyis ji ltar bsgom/_/sdud pa gsum du nyid 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]kyis ji ltar bsgom/_/'khor gnas dus kyi rang bzhin ji ltar bsgom/_/chos rnams kun gyi don la ji ltar bsgom/_/bsgom pa'i lung bcu bdag la bstan du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal 
[\[75a.2\]]pos 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don la da sgoms shig_/bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la/_/sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis med na/_/ma bsgoms rang bzhin bzhag na bsgom pa yin/_/don ni kun don skye ba med pa 
[\[75a.3\]]ste/_/rnam rtog mtshan ma de bzhin rig byas nas/_/dran bsam yid la rgyu ba ma lus kun/_/skye ba med pa'i ngang las ma yengs pa/_/gang ltar bsams kyang sgom pa yin shes na/_/ma bsgom gang ltar bzhag kyang yengs pa med/_/kye nga las byung 
[\[75a.4\]]ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/mtshan ma bsgom la dga' ba'i gang zag la/_/rang rang gang ltar 'thad pa'i lung bzhin du/_/bsgom du yod ces kun la lung du bstan/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po la/_/ston pa rang 'byung rig pa'i ye shes las/_/
[\[75a.5\]]ma bsdus ston pa gsum yang de la 'dus/_/ston pa de la ma bsdus ston pa de la 'dus/_/ston pas de la bsgom du med par bstan/_/bstan pa brjod bral rig pa mtshon 'das la/_/bstan pa gsum yang de la 'dus te gnas/_/ma bcos rig 
[\[75a.6\]]pa'i gzhal yas 'og min na/_/gzhal yas gsum yang de la 'dus par bshad/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/snying po byang chub sems la kun 'dus pas/_/'khor gsum dus gsum kun du 'dus par bshad/_/
[\[75a.7\]]ma bsdus rang bzhin 'du ba'i ye shes ni/_/sdud pa de las gzhan pa yod ma yin/_/ma bsgom rang bzhin bzhag pa'i lung 'di la/_/bsgom du yod dang med pa'i lung mi ston/_/re dogs sgro skur 'dzin pa'i sems mi 'jog_/ces gsungs 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bsgom du yod med bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos lta ba sgom med kyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po 
[\[75b.2\]]ste/_/nga las byung ba'i ston pa sku gsum gyis/_/mtshan ma rtog pas 'dul ba'i gang zag la/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i ting 'dzin grangs su bstan/_/la las zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sgom par byed/_/la las zab mo'i ting 'dzin sgom par byed/_/la 
[\[75b.3\]]las zhi gnas lhag mthong 'brel ba yi/_/bdag med ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed/_/la la mtshan ma dag pa la brten nas/_/mtshan ma rje dang 'bangs su dmigs par byed/_/la la lta spyod 'brel med la brten nas/_/'brel pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas 
[\[75b.4\]]par byed/_/la la mtshan med don la brten byas shing /_/mtshan ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed/_/la las rang rgyud dag pa la brten nas/_/rnam gsum 'phro 'du'i don la gnas par byed/_/la la rgyu 'bras dag pa gtsor byas nas/_/'od kyi 
[\[75b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la gnas par byed/_/'di dag mtshan ma grangs kyi ting 'dzin te/_/ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan/_/kye ston pa kun byed nga yis lung bstan pa/_/ma lus skye med rnam dag ting 'dzin te/_/bsgom dang mi sgom rkyen la rag ma 
[\[75b.6\]]lus/_/bsgom bya ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/_/gang du ji ltar bzhag pa'i tshul med par/_/ma btsal rang sar bzhag bas bsgoms pa yin/_/kye bsgom du med pa'i man ngag 'di dag la/_/tshig dang sgra las 'das pa'i don yin phyir/_/
[\[75b.7\]]snga rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung ma bstan/_/phyi rabs kun byed rgyal pos lung mi ston/_/da ltar kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan med/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/ma nor dgongs pa'i don la lung bstan pa/_/sgro skur 'das pa don 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]gyi snying po la/_/bsgom dang mi sgom mkha' la rtsod pa 'dra/_/rtogs pa'i don las ma yengs dgongs pa ste/_/dngos po ma yin dngos po med ma yin/_/phyogs min phyogs las 'das pa ma yin par/_/bsgom dang mi sgom phyogs la 
[\[76a.2\]]gnas mi byed/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/bsgom dang mi sgom mtshon par mi nus ltar/_/snying po don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/sems dpa' rdo rje de la gnas par bya/_/kye dus gsum ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/skye med 
[\[76a.3\]]byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa la/_/ming dang tha snyad tshig tu 'di'o zhes/_/ma bstan mi ston bstan par mi mdzad do/_/lta ba bsgom du med par don rtogs na/_/bsgom dang mi sgom res 'jog log pa'i lam/_/dam pa'i dgongs pa skye med thugs chud na/_/
[\[76a.4\]]dam pa de la log dang ma log med/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung phog ltar/_/ma bsgoms bsgom du med par rtogs goms nas/_/skal ldan rnal 'byor gang zag su yang rung /_/kun byed rgyal po nyid du lung bstan to/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang 
[\[76a.5\]]chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/_lta sgom dbyer med pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bsrung du med pa de bzhin nyid du gnas pa 'di gsungs so/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 
[\[76a.6\]]yis/_/rnam rtog mtshan ma'i lam la gnas pa'i bar/_/bsrung dang mi srung khyad par gnyis mthong ba/_/rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa bsrung bar bstan/_/kye kun byed nga ni ye nas de bzhin nyid/_/de bzhin nyid la gzung 'dzin med pa'i phyir/_/chos 
[\[76a.7\]]rnams de ltar gang gis rtogs pa la/_/bsrung dang mi srung 'du shes 'jug pa med/_/kye nga ni ma bcos kun byed byang chub sems/_/gnyen po mi bstan yul la 'jug mi byed/_/rang 'byung lhun grub rig pa'i dam tshig la/_/'da' nyams med pas ched 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]du bsrung ba med/_/rang rig ma nor blo yi tshad ma yis/_/ma bcos snying po'i don la 'jug par byed/_/skye med thugs su chos kun ro gcig pas/_/'jug dang mi 'jug mtha' la nga mi gnas/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don la goms par gyis/_/dgongs don 
[\[76b.2\]]gsang ba'i rig pa ma shar na/_/tshig dang sgra la 'dzin pa'i goms pa dag_/kun byed nga yi lung dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/bsrung du med pa'i dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di/_/kun du ye nas ma bsrungs gnas pa la/_/kun byed nga yi dgongs pa ma goms na/_/ji 
[\[76b.3\]]ltar bsrungs pa tshi chad nad du 'gyur/_/kye kun byed nga yi dgongs pa'i dam tshig ni/_/ma yengs dran pas dngos po ye shes su/_/ma bcos sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste/_/rig pas dbang bsgyur bsrung dang mi srung med/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams 
[\[76b.4\]]thams cad kun/_/rang 'byung snying por gsal bas dbang bsgyur bas/_/kun byed rgyal pos byas pa'i chos rnams la/_/rig dang ma rig gnyis ka'i yul las 'das/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/bsrung dang mi srung yul las 'das pa 
[\[76b.5\]]ltar/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms byas nas/_/nga yi 'khor la de ltar lung ston cig_/nga yi 'khor la de ltar lung bstan na/_/bya ba'i 'du shes lam las grol bar 'gyur/_/skye ba med pas kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur/_/kun byed 
[\[76b.6\]]rgyal po nga yi thugs su 'gyur/_/kye nga ni kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems/_/nga la sgro dang skur pa'i yul med pas/_/gang la sems par ma byed bsgom ma byed/_/sgo gsum bcos par mi bya lhug par bzhag_/gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs dus 
[\[76b.7\]]tshod med/_/yid la mi byed sngags dang phyag rgya bral/_/de bas kun byed byang chub sems nyid la/_/bsrung dang mi srung sa mtshams med par bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las/_lta sgom 'dar med pa'i le'u ste 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bdun cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos bya med rtsol ba dang bral bar rtogs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye nga ni kun byed rgyal po ste/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni/_/bsam pa'i yul las 'das pas 
[\[77a.2\]]bsgom du med/_/kye sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste/_/ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed ma myong /_/rang 'byung nga la rgyu rkyen kun dang bral/_/sgo gsum btsal med lhug pa nyid du zhog_/gang zhig bya rtsol mtshan ma'i rjes 'brangs pa/_/kun byed nga dang phrad 
[\[77a.3\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye ston pa'i kun byed nga yi phrin las ni/_/bya ba med pas rtsol ba'i las mi byed/_/dmigs pa med pas bsgom pa'i 'du shes bral/_/'du 'bral med pas ma brjed yid la zhog_/byung tshor skye ba med pas gsal 'gyur nas/_/gang 
[\[77a.4\]]yang byas pa med par las kun grub/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las ngas byas kyang /_/rang 'byung ye shes bya med rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/ji bzhin pa yi las la byed ma myong /_/ma btsal ji bzhin nyid du sems dpa' 
[\[77a.5\]]zhog_/ji bzhin ma bcos rgyal ba'i dgongs pa la/_/sems dang sems las byung ba ci skyes kyang /_/de nyid skye med nyid du gnas shes na/_/bya rtsol mtshan ma'i 'du shes kun dang bral/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig_/rtogs pa 
[\[77a.6\]]rang sar grol ba'i lta ba la/_/ma yengs rang bzhin bzhag pas bya btsal med/_/kun kyang rang 'byung rang sar grol ba yin/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig_/rang lus mi bcos dbang po mi rtul te/_/ngag kyang mi gdams bya 
[\[77a.7\]]rtsol byar yang med/_/sems kyang gar gtad mi g.yo'i ngang la bzhag_/bya ba med pa'i phrin las 'di bsgoms pas/_/byas pa med par don kun rdzogs par 'gyur/_/kye ji bzhin rtsol bral bde ba chen po la/_/sgo gsum mi rtsol bcos shing 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]dmigs mi byed/_/yid la mi byed mtshan ma'i rjes mi 'brangs/_/rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i don la bzhag_/'di ni rang 'byung 'od gsal dgongs pa ste/_/kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i phrin las so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid 
[\[77b.2\]]sgoms shig_/ma bcos ji bzhin nyid la 'jug pa la/_/tshad ma mi dgos gnyen pos bcos mi dgos/_/rtogs pa'i don la ma bcos de bzhin zhog_/kye bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin las 'di la/_/sgo gsum rtsol ba byas pas zin mi 'gyur/_/
[\[77b.3\]]kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa la gnas pas/_/nga yi dgongs pa phrin las lhun gyis grub/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las ji bzhin pa la bya rtsol dang bral bar gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[77b.4\]]de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po 'du 'bral med par gnas pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye ji bzhin pa la sems dpa' rdo rje sgom/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/snying po dgod du med par bstan pa ni/_/ji bzhin 
[\[77b.5\]]gtso 'khor med pa'i don du bstan/_/kye rig pa'i rgyal po gsal bar dbang bsgyur bas/_/snying po rtsol bsgrub 'das pa'i bdag nyid de/_/rtogs pa ye shes mchog gis len par byed/_/'di ni kun byed rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/kye 
[\[77b.6\]]ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/snying po sku yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni/_/ji ltar snang zhing gnas pa'i chos rnams kun/_/skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings ngang la bkod/_/snying po'i don la blang dor med pa'i phyir/_/de yang kun byed nga 
[\[77b.7\]]yis bkod pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/snying po gsung gi dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni/_/ji ltar grags shing gnas pa'i chos rnams ni/_/skye ba med pa'i dbyings las gsung du bkod/_/snying po brjod du med pa'i 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]gsung la 'dus/_/de yang kun byed rgyal pos bkod pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/snying po rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni/_/ji ltar dran rig rtog pa thams cad kun/_/ma skyes kun byed nyid kyi don 
[\[78a.2\]]du rig_/kun byed nga yi sku gsung thugs nyid ni/_/ma bcos rnal du bzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum/_/ma bkod dus gcig rdzogs pa'i don rtogs pas/_/lhun grub snying po don la 'jug par byed/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms 
[\[78a.3\]]shig_/rang 'byung snying po mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/_/sgo gsum lhug pas ji bzhin ngang bzhag na/_/kun byed nga yi dgongs par gnas pa yin/_/snga rabs 'das pa'i kun byed rgyal pos kyang /_/dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pas don rdzogs la/_/
[\[78a.4\]]ma byon dus kyi kun byed rgyal pos kyang /_/ma bcos rnal du bzhag pas don rdzogs 'gyur/_/da ltar bzhugs pa'i kun byed rgyal pos kyang /_/dgongs pa rnal du bzhag ste gnas pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje chen po khyod sgoms shig_/nga yi 
[\[78a.5\]]'khor du gtogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba/_/kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa 'di nyid la/_/ma btsal rnal du bzhag par lung ston cig_/dgongs pa rnal du bzhag pa'i don 'di ni/_/kun gyi spyod yul min pas mi shes shing /_/mnyam par bzhag pas 
[\[78a.6\]]rtogs pa'i yul las 'das/_/kun byed rgyal po de la gnas par byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las snying po don la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal 
[\[78a.7\]]pos rig pa dbang sgyur la gnas pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje ji bzhin nyid sgoms shig_/rig pa'i rgyal pos gsal bar dbang sgyur nas/_/mtshan ma'i bde ba'i dbang la rag mi lus/_/rtogs nas mi rtog don la ji bzhin zhog_/
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]kye kun byed rgyal po dbang thob rig pa na/_/dngos po ma bcos ji bzhin rtag tu shar/_/rgyu dang rkyen med zhi ba mchog gi lam/_/gzhi bzhag gang ltar bzhag kyang de nyid dang /_/kun byed rgyal po thabs chen rtogs pa'i dbang /_/kun kyang ji bzhin 
[\[78b.2\]]yul la 'jug pa na/_/skyon dang yon tan gnyi ga mnyam shes nas/_/'jug dang mi 'jug don las shin tu 'das/_/kye kun byed rig pas dbang sgyur dgongs pa 'di/_/ngag gis smrar med dmigs pa'i yul las 'das/_/dran pa zhi zhing spros 
[\[78b.3\]]pa med pa ste/_/mkha' ltar khyab cing phyogs cha yongs kyis med/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje de bzhin nyid sgoms shig_/bsgom dang mi sgom yul las 'das pa la/_/gnyis ka 'byung 'jug re dogs med pa yis/_/mnyam par mi 'jug 
[\[78b.4\]]don la sgom mi byed/_/dbang po dngos grub mi len bcos su med/_/kun byed rgyal po nyid la gus par gnas/_/kye ston pa kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni/_/rang 'byung sgom du med pa'i snying po ste/_/ye shes gsal la bsgrub pa med pa yin/_/
[\[78b.5\]]dbang ni rtogs pas re dogs bcad pa yin/_/'di la nges par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/shin tu rnal 'byor rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i lung /_/ma bcos ye shes kun byed rgyal po la/_/gang ltar 'di ltar 'jog ces lung mi ston/_/snga bar ma 
[\[78b.6\]]gsungs phyis kyang mi gsung zhing /_/da ltar byung bar gsung bar mi mdzad do/_/kye ston pa'i ngo bo kun byed rgyal po yis/_/bsgom zhing bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la/_/ma bsams yal bar gnas pas 'khor ba nyid/_/btsal zhing bsgoms 
[\[78b.7\]]pas rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i lam/_/de bas re dogs bcas pa'i ting 'dzin ni/_/gnas pas grol bar kun byed lung mi ston/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/rtogs pas gnyi ga'i 'ching ba rab bcad nas/_/mi 'gal mnyam pa'i 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]don la gnas byas pas/_/kun byed nga yi dgongs pa lhun gyis grub/_/kye gang gis 'ching ba de rtogs bcad byas shing /_/grol bar mi 'jug mya ngan 'das mi len/_/snying po'i don la phyogs ris dmigs mi 'dzin/_/don la 
[\[79a.2\]]mi sgom snying rje yul mi 'jug_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yis gang bstan pa/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes don la goms par gyis/_/ye shes dran pas dbang sgyur rig pa'i ngang /_/'di ni kun byed rgyal por ngas lung bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[79a.3\]]sems kun byed rgyal po las rig pa dbang sgyur la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos snying po don gyi lam 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje don la da sgoms shig_/snying po mi 
[\[79a.4\]]rtogs don gyi lam 'di la/_/nam mkha'i mtha' ltar gnas pas ma khyab med/_/skye med min pa med pas mi sgom med/_/rtog dpyod yul las 'das pas dmigs su med/_/snying po mtshan ma 'das pa'i yul 'di la/_/bgrod pa'i yul las 
[\[79a.5\]]'das pas bgrod pa med/_/lam la mi bgrod sa la mi sbyong zhing /_/mi rtog bde la gnas pas lhun gyis grub/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi lam nyid ni/_/chos kyi dbyings su gcig pas bgrod du med/_/snying po don dang 'grogs pas yengs pa med/_/
[\[79a.6\]]thig le gcig tu 'dus pas gar mi 'gro/_/kye de yi don la sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom/_/bsgom du med pa'i don la ma bsgoms na/_/mtshan ma'i grangs la bskal pa brgyar bsgoms kyang /_/kun byed nga yi dgongs pa rtogs mi 'gyur/_/rnam 
[\[79a.7\]]rtog yul la mtshan ma'i grangs las 'das/_/kun byed bya mi dgos la byar yang med/_/bya ba mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor rjes zhugs shing /_/bya bas mi zin rtog pas rtog pa 'jil/_/chu las rnyog ma bzhin te byis pas bslus/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]don la legs par sgoms/_/nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi lam 'dren pas/_/khyod kyang nga yi lam la legs par zhugs/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas skye med lam du zhugs/_/ma byon skye med lam la 'jug par 
[\[79b.2\]]'gyur/_/da ltar sangs rgyas skye med nyid la gnas/_/des na kun byed rgyal po kun gyi lam/_/kye lam 'dir 'jug cing bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/da lta nyid nas rgyal ba'i sa la gnas/_/dgongs pa mi 'dzin phyogs ris gzung du med/_/snying po'i 
[\[79b.3\]]lam la 'jug dang mi 'jug 'das/_/kye rnal 'byor dus gcig 'jug pa'i skal ldan la/_/kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa bstan byas nas/_/rtogs pa'i rlung la dran zhing 'dris pa las/_/bsgom zhing 'jug tu med par lung ston cig_/kye nga ni ston pa kun 
[\[79b.4\]]byed byang chub sems/_/ma lus kun byas byang chub sems su byas/_/sems nyid skye ba med pa'i lam du byas/_/skye med bde ba'i lam la 'jug tu med/_/skal ldan rgyal sras dam par nges pa la/_/kun byed nga yi lam 'di goms byas nas/_/bgrod 
[\[79b.5\]]med rtsal med snying po'i don rtogs nas/_/kun byed rgyal po nyid du the tshom med/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las snying po lam la gnas pa'i le'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal 
[\[79b.6\]]pos don la sbyang du med pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje rtogs pa'i don la sgoms/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa'i dus bstan pa/_/snying po rtogs pa'i sa zhes bshad pa yin/_/bde chen nges 
[\[79b.7\]]pa'i dus su gang bstan pa/_/de ni goms pa'i sa zhes bshad pa yin/_/gzhan dag rtsol zhing spyod pa'i khyad par dag_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i snying po bsgrib pa'i sa/_/sa zhes bya ba gnas pa'i khyad par te/_/gang la gang gnas de ni sa yin no/_/kye sku gsum 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ston pa'i sa la grangs bgrangs kyang /_/kun byed rgyal po'i sa la rim pa med/_/sa dang sa yi rim pa'i khyad par yod/_/ces pa sku gsum ston pas 'khor la bstan pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/mnyam nyid skye ba med 
[\[80a.2\]]pa'i rang bzhin la/_/thabs dang snying po rtogs pa'i gang zag gis/_/sgrib dang sa yi khyad par med par bstan/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi rang bzhin ni/_/dus gsum 'byung 'jug mi byed yid la byed pa med/_/ris su mi lta mtshan ma'i yul mi tshol/_/kun byed rgyal 
[\[80a.3\]]po'i dgongs pa'i lung du bstan/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi dgongs pa ni/_/tshig dang yi ges mtshon pa mi snyed cing /_/sgra dang tshad mas gtan la dbab tu med/_/skye ba med pas 'gag pa med pa yin/_/'phel ba med cing yongs su 'grib mi byed/_/mtshan ma 
[\[80a.4\]]min zhing de nyid min pa'ang min/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/skye ba med pa'i ngo bor byin brlabs pas/_/rtogs pa de nyid ngang du ldog par 'gyur/_/kun byed rgyal po nga yi byin rlabs kyis/_/
[\[80a.5\]]sems dpa' rdo rjes ji ltar rtogs pa ltar/_/phyi rabs kun byed lung la dad pa la/_/dngos po skye ba med par byin rlobs shig_/de ltar bsgom du med pa'i snying po la/_/ma yengs dran pas bzung ba man ngag yin/_/kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems 'di la/_/
[\[80a.6\]]bshad pas ma yin tshigs su bcad pas min/_/bsgoms pas ma yin ma bsgoms pas kyang min/_/snying po sngags dang phyag rgya kun las 'das/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yis bstan pa'i sa/_/ma lus 'di la brten pas spong len med/_/phyogs cha med par khyab 
[\[80a.7\]]pas che chung med/_/chos kyi dbyings su gnas pas rtog dang mi rtog med/_/de phyir dus gcig gnas pa'i sa 'di la/_/sems dpa' rdo rje legs par gnas par gyis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las don la sbyang med kyi le'u ste bdun 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mnyam pa la blang dor med pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/skye med byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/ji bzhin ma bcos gnas pa'i 
[\[80b.2\]]dgongs pa la/_/blang dang dor ba yod par lung ma bstan/_/skye med rang bzhin sgros skur bral ba ste/_/blang dang dor ba sgro skur don du bstan/_/su zhig snying po'i don la zhugs pa yis/_/sgro skur 'das pa snying po'i don du bstan/_/gang yang bsam pa kun las 
[\[80b.3\]]'das byed pa/_/blang dor med par rtogs par lung bstan to/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje snying po'i don la sgoms/_/nga ni ma nor don gyi snying po la/_/blang dor rnam rtog bcos pa'i yul med de/_/rang bzhin bde ba mchog gis goms par byed/_/kun byed 
[\[80b.4\]]rtogs na snying por kun gnas pas/_/snying po'i don la blang dor lung ma bstan/_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan/_/bzang ngan gtsang sme'i chos su'ang lung ma bstan/_/rtog dpyod bsam pa'i yul las 'das par bstan/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje nges 
[\[80b.5\]]par da sgoms shig_/bsgom dang bsgom par bya ba'i yul nyid ni/_/ma bcos kun byed sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/bsgom dang mi sgom blo yi yul las 'das/_/kye kun byed rgyal po byang chub sems nga ni/_/nga yi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la/_/
[\[80b.6\]]blang dang dor ba'i chos nyid nga mi ston/_/gcig la gnyis su dbye ba'i chos mi ston/_/rtog dang dpyod 'das rtog dpyod bsam mi byed/_/ma bcos ji bzhin pa la 'chos ma byed/_/bya ba gang btang ci snang chos nyid la/_/ma bsams rang bzhin bzhag 
[\[80b.7\]]pas grol bar ston/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje chen po da sgoms shig_/blang dor med pa'i chos nyid byang chub la/_/mkha' ltar gnas pas lus sems bcos su med/_/'du shes zhen 'dzin med pas bsgom du med/_/mkha' ltar rab zhi rnyog pa kun bral 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]la/_/yul la mi 'jug dgongs pa'i dmigs 'jug bral/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig_/dbang po yul la mi rtog sems mi sdud/_/gnyen po ma brtan lus sems rgyud ma sbyongs/_/lus sems ma bcos 
[\[81a.2\]]snying po'i don du rtogs/_/kye kun byed rgyal po nga yi spyod pa ni/_/ma btsal lhug par gnas pas don kun rdzogs/_/snying po'i don du 'dus pas blang dor med/_/re dogs rnam par chad pas mya ngan 'das mi sgom/_/kun byed nga yi spyod pa gang rtogs pas/_/
[\[81a.3\]]dus gsum skye med don du mnyam pa la/_/'jug dang mi 'jug tshig las shin tu 'das/_/'di ni blang dor med par lung bstan to/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las mnyam pa la blang dor med par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu 
[\[81a.4\]]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos rang 'byung snying po'i ngang la sgrib pa bsal du med pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/snying po sgrib med dgongs par lung bstan pa/_/ji ltar snang ba'i 
[\[81a.5\]]chos rnams ma lus pa/_/skye med chos kyi dbyings su kun gcig pas/_/skye med snying po thugs kyi rang bzhin la/_/sgrib pa mi sgrib khyad par bstan pa med/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig_/skye med chos kyi dbyings su gcig pa 
[\[81a.6\]]la/_/sgrib dang mi sgrib spong len gang 'dod pa/_/dam pa'i snying po'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur/_/kun byed byang chub sems kyis lung bstan pa/_/skye med bsgoms pas skye ba snying por gsal/_/mkha' ltar rtog dpyod 'das la gang gnas pas/_/
[\[81a.7\]]sgrib dang mi sgrib byang chub sems su gnas/_/kye kun byed rgyal pos 'khor la lung bstan pa/_/ye shes sgrib med gsal ba'i don du bstan/_/rang 'byung rgyu rkyen med pa'i snying por gnas/_/rtogs pas sgro skur 'das pa'i dgongs pa yin/_/kye de phyir 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]sems dpa' rdo rje da sgoms shig_/rang 'byung ye shes dmigs pa kun las 'das/_/rtogs pa dmigs pa'i don du gzhog mi byed/_/yul las 'das pas rnam shes srung mi byed/_/dngos po snying por gsal bas sgom mi byed/_/rnam pa snying por 
[\[81b.2\]]gsal bas re dogs med/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/ma bcos 'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/ma bcos snying po chos kun rtsa ba la/_/ji ltar snang ba gtan la 'bebs par byed/_/snying po rang bzhin gcig gi don rtogs 
[\[81b.3\]]na/_/kun gyi rang bzhin kun byed nyid du 'dus/_/des na kun byed nga yi don mkhas na/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos la mkhas par 'gyur/_/kun byed nga yi don la goms 'gyur na/_/kun gyi don la gnas shing goms pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' rdo 
[\[81b.4\]]rje legs par da sgoms shig_/ji ltar snang grags chos rnams thams cad la/_/snying po rtogs goms don nyid gcig las med/_/snying po mngon du phyung nas gang bstan pa/_/rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i don du rtogs/_/ma yengs re dogs chad pas dgongs 
[\[81b.5\]]pa yin/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos su gang bstan pa/_/kun byed rgyal po mtshon pa'i thabs su bstan/_/thabs de'i lung dang 'gal bar ma byed cig_/kun byed nga yi sras su zhugs rnams kyis/_/kun kyang 
[\[81b.6\]]skye med don du rtogs 'gyur na/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das par mi sems te/_/snying po rang bzhin rtog dpyod bral bar bstan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las mi sgrib pa'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi 
[\[81b.7\]]sems kun byed rgyal pos lhun grub re dogs las 'das pa'i dgongs pa 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig_/nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa/_/skye med sems kyi rang bzhin nyid du bstan/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]kye sems kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir/_/grub dang ma grub gnyis su lung mi ston/_/bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis su rtog mi byed/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das par re dogs bral/_/lhun grub sems kyi rang bzhin cir snang bas/_/ma 
[\[82a.2\]]byung stong pa'i don du smra mi byed/_/gzhi rtsa snying po rtog dpyod las 'das pas/_/grub cing brtan pa'i phyogs su zhen mi byed/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig_/lhun grub rtog dpyod 'das pa'i snying po la/_/grub dang ma grub don la rtog mi 
[\[82a.3\]]byed/_/de phyir khyod kyang rtog par ma byed cig_/kye lhun grub bya rtsol 'das pa'i snying po la/_/gang zhig phyogs ldog med pa'i zhen pa ni/_/ji ltar bus pa mkha' la rtsod pa ltar/_/kun byed nga yi rang bzhin mthong mi 'gyur/_/gang gis gang spangs ldog par 
[\[82a.4\]]'dod pa ni/_/re dogs 'jigs pa'i sems dang ma bral bas/_/mtha' bral mtha' la zhen pa'i gang zag gis/_/lhun grub snying po'i don la ji ltar reg_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da sgoms shig_/ma skyes rnam par dag pa'i don snang bas/_/snang ba 
[\[82a.5\]]dngos por mi lta 'jig mi byed/_/snang ba skye ba med par rang grol bas/_/stong pa mi sgom ji bzhin rtogs pas grol/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun/_/ma skyes rnam par dag par lung bstan pas/_/ji 
[\[82a.6\]]ltar skye ba med pa nyid du rtogs/_/kye nga las byung ba ston pa sku gsum la/_/sems nyid skye ba med par kun smra zhing /_/de bzhin med pa'i don la kun rtsod kyang /_/skye med mngon sum dus kyis rtogs pa med/_/de phyir kun byed rgyal po'i lung 'di la/_/shes 
[\[82a.7\]]nas ma yengs don la gnas pa las/_/rtsol bas mi 'jug gnyen pos sems mi sbyong /_/yul la mi 'jog dran pa'i sems mi sdud/_/gang ltar byung ba de nyid don yin pas/_/kun byed nga yi don la 'jug par gyis/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rgyal po yis/_/ma bcos sems kyi 'khor la lung phog pa/_/ma lus skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rang bzhin bcu las rtsol bar ma byed cig_/kun byed byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/shes pas gzung 'dzin mi shes spang med pas/_/
[\[82b.2\]]rtogs pa dbang sgyur don la gnas pa yis/_/kun byed rgyal po'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las lhun grub re dogs bcad pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed 
[\[82b.3\]]rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni khyod kyis byas/_/bstan pa'i dam chos ma lus khyod kyis bkod/_/dam pa'i rang bzhin khyod kyis bstan pas na/_/khyod kyi rang bzhin 
[\[82b.4\]]rtogs na chos kun rtogs/_/de bas kun byed nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di/_/'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsal bar ma rig pas/_/don du ji ltar gnas pa bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos mdo lung rgyud la bsdu ba 'di 
[\[82b.5\]]gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis/_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/'khor la mdo lung bsdus pa 'di phog pa/_/legs par bstan pa'i don la nan tan gyis/_/kye nga yi rang bzhin skye med don gcig la/_/rgyud kyi 
[\[82b.6\]]rang bzhin rnam pa gsum du bstan/_/gdams pa rnam pa gsum gyi rim pa yis/_/rgyud ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi ma dang /_/phyi ma'i phyi mas don rdzogs bstan pa yin/_/kye rtsa ba thos pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa ni/_/nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyis/_/
[\[82b.7\]]dngos po'i don kun gtan la phab pa ste/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par nan tan gyis/_/kye nga yi rang bzhin lnga bcu rtsa bdun ni/_/mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu bo dang /_/nges par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang /_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]po dang /_/bya med rdzogs pa'i mdo lung bcu po dang /_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i mdo lung bcu dag dang /_/dgos ched so sor bstan pas lnga bcu lnga/_/gcig gis gzhi bstan gcig gis gdams pa bstan/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po 
[\[83a.2\]]yis/_/mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa/_/dang po dang ni bcu dang gnyis bstan pa/_/bcu gcig pa dang gsum dang nyi shu pa/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa dang nyi shu lnga pa dang /_/nyi shu rtsa gcig drug pas rdzogs pa yin/_/gdams ngag phog pas mngon phyung mthong ba'i 
[\[83a.3\]]phyir/_/bcu drug pa yis mngon phyung dgos pa bstan/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/nges par bstan pa'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa/_/bzhi pa sum cu gsum pa bcu gsum pa/_/bcu gnyis pa dang lnga dang sum cu gnyis/_/sum cu drug dang sum cu bzhi 
[\[83a.4\]]pa dang /_/nyi shu dgu dang bcu bdun pa yis rdzogs/_/nges par bstan pa'i dgos pa yid ches dag_/lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa yis bstan pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i mdo lung bcu bstan pa/_/bzhi bcu gcig pa bcu bzhi 
[\[83a.5\]]sum cu brgyad/_/dgu ba dang ni so lnga bcu dgu pa/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa dag brgyad dang bzhi bcu dang /_/lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa yis bstan pa yin/_/rgyu 'bras 'das pas rtsol sgrub bya mi dgos/_/bdun pa nyid du nges par bstan pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal 
[\[83a.6\]]po yis/_/bya med rdzogs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni/_/nyi shu gnyis dang sum cu pa dag dang /_/nyi shu bzhi dang nyer brgyad nyi shu bdun/_/sum cu gcig dang nyer gsum nyi shu drug_/zhe bzhi lnga bcu drug pas bstan pa yin/_/ma byas rang bzhin rdzogs par 
[\[83a.7\]]bstan pa'i phyir/_/bzhi bcu gsum pas de yi dgos pa bstan/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/gtan la 'bebs pa'i lung bcu bstan pa ni/_/zhe brgyad pa dang sum cu dgu pa dang /_/bzhi bcu lnga dang so bdun zhe drug pa/_/zhe bdun pa dang zhe dgu nga gcig 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]pa/_/lnga bcu ba dang lnga bcu gsum pas rdzogs/_/gtan la phebs na ma bcos bcos med pas/_/bzhi bcu gnyis pas dgos pa bstan pa yin/_/lnga bcu bzhi pas rtsa ba'i gzhi bstan nas/_/lnga bcu bdun pas gtad cing gdams pa ste/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud de thos 
[\[83b.2\]]par gces pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/bsam pas gtan la phab ste bstan pa ni/_/rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i don rnams kyang /_/rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin bcu ru bstan pa'i phyir/_/rtogs pa'i mdo lung bcu ru bstan pa yin/_/
[\[83b.3\]]kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/bsgoms pas nges par 'byin par bshad pa ni/_/rang bzhin bcu ru dgongs pas bshad pa yang /_/skye ba med pa'i don du bsdus te bstan/_/skye med rtogs pa'i don las ma yengs pas/_/bsgom pa'i mdo lung 
[\[83b.4\]]bcu ru bsdus te bstan/_/'di las 'phros shing thams cad 'dir 'dus pas/_/kun gyi rtsa ba don gyi 'grel pa'i lung /_/kun byed nga yi sras su gyur pa la/_/ming gis don mtshon skye med rtogs phyir bstan/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par nan tan gyis/_/theg 
[\[83b.5\]]pa'i rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi lung /_/kun byed rgyal pos bsdus pa'i rtsa ba 'di/_/sems dpa' rdo rje legs par rtogs 'gyur na/_/rgyal ba'i rgyal ba kun byed rgyal por 'gyur/_/de phyir kun byed nga yi 'khor rnams la/_/sems dpa' rdo rjes don 'di lung ston 
[\[83b.6\]]cig_/skye med byang chub sems su lung ston cig_/'khor 'das dbyings su gcig par lung ston cig_/rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs par lung ston cig_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las dgongs don lde mig gi le'u ste brgyad cu 
[\[83b.7\]]rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa/_kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings/_/'khor ba mi spong thugs rje phyogs ris 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]med/_/ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun byed khyod kyis byas/_/ma byon pa dang da ltar byed cing mdzad/_/ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa 
[\[84a.2\]]kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/khams gsum srid gsum byed mkhan khyod kyis byas/_/rang 'byung lnga dang rgyan gyi rgyu lnga dang /_/ye shes lnga byas kun byed khyod la 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/sku gsum ston pa gsum yang khyod kyis byas/_/sku 
[\[84a.3\]]gsum thugs gsum ma lus kun byas pas/_/ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/sku gsum bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang khyod kyis byas/_/'khor gyi dang po sdud pa'ang nyid las byung /_/ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod 
[\[84a.4\]]la 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/'dus pa'i 'khor yang nges par khyod kyis byas/_/bstan pa gsum yang nges par khyod kyis byas/_/kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/zag med shes 
[\[84a.5\]]rab rtogs pa gsum bstan pas/_/'khor gyi mun pa'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa/_/kun byed rgyal po nyid la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las/_/'byung zhing sdud pa'i rtsa ba khyod nyid 
[\[84a.6\]]pas/_/chos kyi snying po khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod/_/ma rig pa yi lam ni bsal nas kyang /_/ye shes snang ba kun du mched par byed/_/ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud/_/kye ji ltar snang ba'i chos ni thams cad kun/_/
[\[84a.7\]]rang 'byung nyid pas rgyu rkyen kun dang bral/_/ma bcos snying po ji bzhin gsal bas na/_/rang 'byung ye shes kun byed rgyal po nyid/_/ji ltar brtags kyang gting mtha' dbus med de/_/kun gyi 'byung gnas bsam pa'i yul las 'das/_/skye 'gag dmigs 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]'jug las 'das rnam par zhe/_/su zhig 'jug cing dmigs dang dad pa dag_/'di la dman dang dam par dmigs med pas/_/mi rtsol bde la gnas shing dbugs phyin 'gyur/_/chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po las/_/ji ltar gnas pa rtsol sgrub kun dang bral/_/
[\[84b.2\]]zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las rjes su bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par 'dun nas zhus pa/_kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/
[\[84b.3\]]ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun/_/rang 'byung ye shes gcig tu bstan pa'i mdo/_/chos kyi rtsa ba kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud/_/phyi rabs rnal 'byor gang dang gang dag las/_/bstan cing gdams pa legs par bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas 
[\[84b.4\]]byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos skal ldan la gdams pa'i don 'di gsungs so/_/kye sems dpa' rdo rje legs par da nyon cig_/ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po ngas/_/ji ltar snang zhing grags pa'i chos rnams kun/_/ngas byas byed dang byed 'gyur snying po'i don/_/
[\[84b.5\]]gzhi rtsa kun 'das snying po byang chub rgyu/_/dgongs pa mngon du phyung ba'i mdo lung 'di/_/dad dang dam tshig brtson 'grus che ba dang /_/snying rje yi rang skyo dang yid ldog med/_/lus dang bu dang chung ma bran dang nor/_/gang la'ang ma chags dad dang dga' bas 'bul/_/'di dag dad dang 
[\[84b.6\]]dam tshig rtags yin pas/_/snying po'i don dang ldan pas sbyin par bya/_/grags pa spang zhing nga rgyal bral ba dang /_/dam pa snying po'i don phyir lus srog phangs pa med/_/bka' las mi 'da' rtags dang ldan pa la/_/snying po don dang skye med bstan pa sbyin/_/gang gis snying 
[\[84b.7\]]po'i bstan pa bdag thob na/_/'jig rten mtshan mas bdag la ci bgyi ste/_/thob na bdag gis dka' ba sgrub bo zhes/_/dam bca' legs par gnas na bstan pa sbyin/_/ji srid bdag dang slob dpon 'tsho ba'i bar/_/lus dang srog gi 'brel pa ma mchis par/_/khyod 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]kyi bka' bzhin bsgrub ces gnas bor la/_/bstan pa'i snying po kun byed rgyal po sbyin/_/mdor na lus dang srog kyang 'bul bya zhing /_/rdzas dang zhing yul rkang 'gros smos ci dgos/_/gal te bdag la dgos par ma gyur kyang /_/dam pas blangs te dkon 
[\[85a.2\]]mchog gsum la 'bul/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/snod min log pa'i gang zag bstan pa ni/_/grags dang 'jig rten chos la dga' ba dang /_/nga rgyal dam par mi bkur yid thung ldog_/'phyar zhing rdzas dang dad bar mi ldan te/_/rang tshod 
[\[85a.3\]]nyams len btsan thabs 'dod pa dang /_/bstan pa yongs la 'phel zhing mi mthun zhing /_/sgro skur bdag gzhan gnod sems bsgom pa min/_/'di la mi bstan mchog tu gsang bar bya/_/sngon du rtags dang dad pa brtag bya'i phyir/_/rin chen dbyig dang chas 
[\[85a.4\]]pas gus mnod kyis/_/chags sems nga rgyal gzhan sems ma nges la/_/de la kun byed rgyal po bstan mi bya/_/snying po'i don la blang dor mi gnas kyang /_/mi ma yin dang 'byung pos bar gcod cing /_/mkha' 'gro grub pa can gyis gnyis ka la/_/dus min 'chi dang 
[\[85a.5\]]'jigs pa'i dbang gyur nas/_/sgro skur dbang gis snying po'i theg pa nub/_/de bas rigs ngan gang zag spang bar bya/_/'jig rten zhen pa dbral zhing rgyud brtag phyir/_/lus dang longs spyod bla mas kun blangs la/_/nus dang mi nus khyad par rtags ldan nas/_/snying po 
[\[85a.6\]]don bstan kun byed rgyal po sbyin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las bstan pa gang la gzhag pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la sems dpa' rdo rjes legs par mdangs 
[\[85a.7\]]phyung ste mdun nas zhus pa/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags/_/nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las/_/skal ldan dus gcig grol bar mdzad pa'i mdo/_/mtshan gyi khyad par bdag la bshad du gsol/_/zhes zhus so/_/de nas byang chub kyi 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]sems kun byed rgyal pos mtshan gyi rnam grangs rnam par phye ba 'di gsungs so/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po yis/_/mtshan gyi khyad par phye ste bshad pa ni/_/ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/ma lus kun byas byed cing byed 'gyur te/_/
[\[85b.2\]]nyid la bya mi dgos te lhun grub pas/_/kun byed rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin/_/kye snying po nga la dri ma med pa dang /_/ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don ldan pas/_/'di la btsal zhing sgrub pa mi mnga' ste/_/byang chub sems zhes nges par bstan pa yin/_/kye 
[\[85b.3\]]ma gdod nas grub pa'i chos nyid la/_/rgyu dang rkyen med btsal med snying po 'di/_/ma bsgribs kun la phyogs ris med gsal bas/_/rang 'byung ye shes zhes su bstan pa yin/_/kye ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams thams cad kun/_/ma bcos ji bzhin ngang la kun 
[\[85b.4\]]snang bas/_/phyogs ris gnyis su chad pa'i don med de/_/bka' yi 'grel pa chos kyi me long yin/_/kye ji bzhin ma bcos snying po rnal ma la/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa 'byung sdud pa/_/blang dor 'dzin chags rgya las rnam grol te/_/snying po don gyi 
[\[85b.5\]]theg pa bstan pa yin/_/kye 'das dang ma byon da ltar rgyal ba la/_/skye med 'di las ma gzigs mi dgongs pas/_/ma bcos thig le gzung 'dzin las 'das pas/_/lta ba'i me long zhes su bstan pa yin/_/kye nga ni ma bcos ji bzhin snying po la/_/sgro 
[\[85b.6\]]'dogs skur 'debs don las kun 'das te/_/dus gsum rgyal ba nga las byung bas na/_/rgyal ba'i yum zhes nges par bstan pa yin/_/kye ma bcos skye med kun byed rgyal po la/_/ma btsal dgos pa'i yon tan tshad rdzogs pas/_/btsal zhing bsgrub pa kun las 'das 
[\[85b.7\]]pas na/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes su bstan pa yin/_/kye ma bcos don la ma nor blo 'jog pas/_/snying po don la sgro dang skur pa bral/_/gnyi ga mi 'gal don du gang ston pa/_/ma bcos don gyi lung du bstan pa yin/_/kye ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal pos lung bstan 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pa/_/skye med byang chub sems dang ldan pa'i don/_/gnyis med snying por ro gcig gnas pa la/_/kun gyi mdo ni mdo ru bstan pa yin/_/kye ma rig pa yi mun pa sel ba yin/_/ye shes snang ba mched par byed pa yin/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gcod 
[\[86a.2\]]par byed pa yin/_/snying po don la goms par byed pa yin/_/kye ngas ni ma rig pa yi dmigs bsal nas/_/skye med byang chub sems ni mngon bstan na/_/skal ldan rnal 'byor mig dang ldan pa dag_/bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin grol bar 'gyur/_/theg pa'i yang snying 
[\[86a.3\]]bka' yi rdzogs chen 'di/_/man ngag snying po lung dang ldan rnams kyis/_/rang bzhin bde bar gnas na gsal bar 'grub/_/ma bcos mi 'gyur 'jug cing rtsol ba med/_/kye nga ni ston pa kun byed rgyal po ste/_/theg pa'i rtsa ba chos kyi snying po'i lung /_/sku gsum ston 
[\[86a.4\]]pas ma gsungs rgya che ba/_/skye ba med par ston pa'i sems rgyud 'di/_/dus gsum rgyal bas sngon chad ma gsungs te/_/phyi ma mi gsung da ltar ston mi mdzad/_/kun byed rgyal pos 'pho 'gyur mi mnga' bas/_/snga bar gsungs shing phyis kyang gsung 'gyur 
[\[86a.5\]]la/_/da ltar byung bar gsungs pas skal ldan la/_/nges par bstan pas 'bad med grol ba'i lung /_/mdo lung mngon du bstan pa'i bka' rgyud 'di/_/mi 'phel mi nub snying po 'dzin pa la/_/kun byed rgyal po nges par khyod la gtad/_/ces gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[86a.6\]]sems kun byed rgyal po las mtshan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po lta ba nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud nam mkha'i snying po mchog gi don gsang ba mchog gi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 
[\[86a.7\]]pa rdzogs sto//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge mgon po dang dge slong ba ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]{D829}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta dz+nyAn gu h+ya ar+tha gaR+b+ha byU ha badzra tan+t+ra/_sid+d+hi yo ga A ga ma sa mA dza sarba bit+yA sU tra ma hA yA na a b+hi sa ma ya d+harmA par+yaya bi byU ha nA ma sU tra~M/_bru zha'i skad du/_hon pan ril til pi bu pi til ti ta sid 'un 'ub hang 
[\[86b.2\]]bang ril 'ub bi su bad ri zhe hal pa'i ma kyang ku'i dang rong ti/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor grub pa'i lung kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa 
[\[86b.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po dang po ste thog mar zug pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bgro ba bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[86b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po ji skad du rnam par bgro ba'i skyes bu smra ba'i seng ge de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa na 'khod cing sems can gyi ris tha dad pa na bzhugs te bsam 
[\[86b.5\]]gyis mi khyab pa bsam du med pa'i chos dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa'i 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/_thams cad rig pa gsang sngags kyi ngo bo ji snyed pa'i ji bzhin pa/_chos thams cad kyi me long de nyid mi 'gal bar nyan cing ma nor bar 
[\[86b.6\]]ston te rnam par bgro ba ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i zhing khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis rnam par brgyan pa na/_rdo rje phung po'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor 
[\[86b.7\]]dang bcas te/_sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/_yongs su 'das kyang de bzhin nyid du bsnyad pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]'byung ba'i zhing khams dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rin po che'i phung po rnam par bkod pa na baiDUr+ya 'od mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje rin chen zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/_sems kyi 
[\[87a.2\]]dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/_yongs su 'das nas kyang ji bzhin par bsnyad pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams pad+ma can zhes bya 
[\[87a.3\]]ba pad+mo mdzes par bkod pa na/_pad+ma'i phung po'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po chos kyi sprin zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/_sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 
[\[87a.4\]]'khor la de bzhin ston te/_yongs su 'das nas kyang ji lta bar bsnyad pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba in dra nI la'i dra bas brgyan pa na rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa'i spo zhes bya ba'i 
[\[87a.5\]]ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje las zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/_yongs su 'das nas 
[\[87a.6\]]kyang ma nor bar brtags pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing khams byang chub kyi snying po can zhes bya ba sems sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa na chos kyis mtho ba zhes bya ba'i ri bo la skyes bu chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya bar 
[\[87a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya'i 'khor dang bcas te/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston te/_yongs su 'das nas kyang de kho na nyid du nges pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]byed do/_/sangs rgyas thub pa'i dbang po'i zhing khams mos pa can mi mjed kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu zhes bya ba rdo rje gdan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/_/gnod sbyin gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na skyes bu chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar byang 
[\[87b.2\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya gnod sbyin gyi rigs can mang po'i 'khor dang bcas te/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang gi ston pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston to/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bsam gyis 
[\[87b.3\]]mi khyab pa'i zhing khams dpag tu med pa na grangs med pa'i skyes bu chen po zhes bya bar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sa ya brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'khor dang bcas te/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo mtha' yas de nyid rang 
[\[87b.4\]]rang gi ston pa dag la nyan cing rang rang gi nye 'khor dag la de bzhin ston te/_yongs su 'das nas kyang nges par brtags pa'i sgo nas de rnam par bgro bar byed do/_/de bzhin du chos kyi sku'i zhing khams snying po byang chub ces bya ba na/_/rgyal tshab skyes bu zhes 
[\[87b.5\]]bya bar/_rgyal tshab skyes bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/_sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas par gyur pa gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid la dgongs pa nges par 'grel to/_/de bzhin du sems can skyes bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_
[\[87b.6\]]lha'i ris dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang /_klu'i ris dang /_mi'i ris dang /_gnod sbyin gyi ris dang /_srin po'i ris dang /_/byol song gi ris dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ris dang /_dmyal ba'i ris la sogs pa 'jig rten dag gi phyogs bcu tha dad pa na ded 
[\[87b.7\]]dpon tha dad pa'i skyes bur gzugs tha dad par rnam par snang ba dag rang rang gi lus kyi 'khor tha dad pa dang bcas te/_sems kyi me long 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid rang rang gi thub pa'i dbang po la rang rang gi skad dang brda dang mos po sna tshogs kyis 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]nyan cing ming dang mtshan mar brtags pa'i sgo nas rang rang gi nye 'khor la de bzhin ston to/_/de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang la la ni byang chub kyi rigs can dag go/_/la la ni byang chub pa dag go/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpa' dag 
[\[88a.2\]]go/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag go/_/la la ni byang chub chen po dag go/_/de bzhin du gzhi lnga las btags pa tha dad du grags pa ni 'di lta ste/_rjes su yi rang ba dag dang /_ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dag dang /_
[\[88a.3\]]chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa dag dang /_'dun pas phyogs pa dag dang /_dad pas mos pa dag dang /_yongs su bsti gnas pa dag dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag dang /_
[\[88a.4\]]srid pa tha ma pa dag dang /_lam du 'jug pa dag dang /_'gro ba dag dang /_phyin pa dag dang /_phyir 'ong ba dag dang /_gnas pa dag dang /_smon pa pa dang /_ldang ba pa dang /_'jug pa pa dang /_gnas pa pa dang /_rdzogs pa pa dang /_rtsol ba pa dang /_slob 
[\[88a.5\]]pa pa dang /_mi slob pa pa dang /_goms pa pa dang /_mngon du gyur pa pa dang /_rgyud du byung ba pa dang /_rigs su nges pa dang /_chos su shes pa dang /_chos lugs pa dang /_rgyal tshab pa dang /_rigs thams cad pa dang /_gzungs sngags pa dang /_rig 
[\[88a.6\]]sngags pa dang /_gsang sngags pa dang /_rigs gsum pa bzhi pa lnga pa dang /_tshogs pa pa dang /_sbyor ba pa dang /_mthong ba pa dang /_sgom pa pa dang /_mthar phyin pa pa dang /_'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_
[\[88a.7\]]dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_tshig gi tshogs pa dang /_yi ge'i tshogs pa dang /_ming gi tshogs pa dang /_brda'i tshogs pa dang /_tha snyad kyi tshogs pa la sogs 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa sha dag go/_/de dag las gzhi gsum pa ni gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug go/_/spyod pa dang gnas pa dang /_thob pa dang /_phyir lta ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de kun du sgra la gnas pa dang /_sa la gnas pa dang /_tshe la gnas pa dang /_phyag rgya 
[\[88b.2\]]chen po dang /_lhun gyis grub par gyur pa 'ba' zhig go/_/de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling tha dad pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu dang bcas pa mtha' yas par 'jig rten gyi sgron ma bye ba 
[\[88b.3\]]mtha' yas par shar ba de dag kyang 'khor ba thog ma tha ma med pa nas brjod kyis mi lang ba'i khams su bskal pa thog ma tha ma med pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'i skabs la rtag par rgyun gyi khor mor 'byung zhing sgron ma'i bya bas lha mi'i 'jig rten gyi mun pa bsal 
[\[88b.4\]]nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas te/_nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor nub pa ltar yongs su mya ngan 'da' zhes thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su grags shing rnam par snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thun mong 
[\[88b.5\]]bca' gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas ji ltar de ltar 'di ltar mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdo rje thub pa'i dbang po de skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa la byung ste/_yun ha cang mi ring ba zhig bzhugs te yongs su 
[\[88b.6\]]mya ngan las 'das par dgongs nas yul yangs pa can zhes bya bar 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs par dbyar gyi ngo bo gsum 'das nas 'jig rten gyi slob ma la gdams ngag gsum gzhag pa'i slad du 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul 
[\[88b.7\]]cher sbyong la bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul can khyed deng la 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na nga'i slob ma gang dag 'khod pa 'di bar phyogs pa dag gang ji snyed pa rnams sdus shig_/nges par gzhag par bya ba dag yod do zhes gsungs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]can des chos kyi skad cig gis go bar bsgrags nas thams cad bsdus pa ni 'di lta ste/_rgyal ba'i zhing 'gyur ris drug gang su dag_/'di par nges shing phyogs pa kun nyon cig_/deng 'dir rgyal ba bdud rtsi gsum 'jog gis/_/dug 
[\[89a.2\]]gsum 'joms par 'dod pa kun 'dus shig_/de skad ces bsgrags pas dam pa'i rigs can lnga ma gtogs 'di lta ste/_sngags kyi bsam gtan chen po'i nang du yang dag 'jog pa bskul ba chen po lang ka'i mnga' bdag blo gros thabs ldan la sogs pa/_
[\[89a.3\]]las gzhan thams cad 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/_kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/'byor pa thams cad ni mthar rgud pa'o/_/dngos po thams cad ni nges par 'jig pa'o/_/
[\[89a.4\]]gang zag gi srog gi dbang po la skye shi yod pa'i phyir nga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas su dag the tshom ma chod pa rnams dri ba gyis shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po kun dza ra zhes bya ba de rang 
[\[89a.5\]]gi stan las langs te/_seng ge'i lta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/khyod ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_/'da' dang mi 'da' yong mi mnga'/_/'jig rten pa la mthun 'jug tu/_/'da' bas yongs su 'dul bar 
[\[89a.6\]]dgongs/_/khyod ni 'jig rten sgron mar shar/_/lha mi'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/mun pa'i dkyil 'khor kun bsal nas/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad de/_/sa dang rnam thar la spyad pas/_/byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yi/_/'dron 
[\[89a.7\]]pa'i theg pa rnam gsum la/_/gang dag rim par bkod lags na/_/mnyam pas blang dor med spyod cing /_/byang chub gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i/_/thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i/_/nges pa'i theg chen yong ma gsungs/_/rgyal ba'i dgongs 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa tshig gsum po/_/gdams ngag lung du ma bzhag na/_/blo chung mun pas rmongs ba rnams/_/nges pa'i blo gros gang la gzhag_/rnam par thar pa'i theg pa gsum/_/gang bsdu gang la gang gis bsdu/_/'jig rten gsal ba'i nyi nub na/_/sgron ma gang 
[\[89b.2\]]gis mdzad par 'gyur/_/bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sde pa/_/rgol ba gang gis tshar gcod 'gyur/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rig pa 'dzin pa chen po legs so/_/khyod kyis dri ba lnga dris pa ni shin tu legs 
[\[89b.3\]]so/_/'di lta ste/_de kho na nyid du nges pa'i theg pa chen po ste/_gnas skabs gnyis dang bcur 'byung ba ste/_gang rmongs gdung ba sel ba na yang 'byung /_gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongs su bkod pa na yang 'byung /_gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung /_
[\[89b.4\]]snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang 'byung /_dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba na yang 'byung /_gdul bya'i skabs la bab pa'i ched na yang 'byung /_byin gyi brlabs las snang ba na yang 'byung /_brgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang 'byung /_gang gi ched du mdzad pa 
[\[89b.5\]]na yang 'byung /_lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang 'byung /_las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang 'byung /_dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang 'byung /_de dag ni thams cad kyi thams cad nas thams cad du kun du yongs su rnam par snang ngo /_/snang bar 'gyur to/_/
[\[89b.6\]]snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pas dri ba dang po'i yongs su rtog pa chad do/_/de nas yang ston pas dri ba gnyis pa bka' stsal pa/_rig pa 'dzin pa chen po blo dang ldan par bya'o/_/gros kyis chod par bya'o/_/thabs kyis zin par bya'o/_/bsam pa dag par bya'o/_/
[\[89b.7\]]brjod pa drang por bya'o/_/spyod pa legs par bya'o/_/don btsal bar bya'o/_/dgos ched brtag par bya'o/_/nges pa rnyed par bya'o/_/bden par smra bar bya'o/_/tshig mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin du bya'o/_/sgo gsum la mkhas par bya'o/_/sngags 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]gsum la bslab par bya'o/_/grong khyer gsum bshig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/_dri ba gnyis pa'i yongs su rtog pa chad do/_/de nas yang ston pas dri ba gsum pa bka' stsal pa/_rig pa 'dzin pa 'di lta ste/_nga yis sgron ma gang bzhag 
[\[90a.2\]]pa/_/snod gsum dag tu snang ba ste/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong las mtha' gsum/_/dang por shes pa'i rgyud gsum la/_/de nas yi ge'i tshogs nyid la'o/_/che chung rim pa'i blo yod phyir/_/theg pa'i rim pa de bzhin te/_/bsdu ba'ang che chung gnyis kyis so/_/rnam 
[\[90a.3\]]pa gnyis kyi khyad par las/_/'jug pa'i yul yang de kho na'o/_/gang la mos pa de nyid du'o/_/zhes bka' stsal pas dri ba gsum pa'i yongs su rtog pa chad do/_/de nas yang ston pas dri ba bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa tshig le'u gcig pa bka' stsal pa/_gzhan yang dri ba tha 
[\[90a.4\]]ma gnyis/_gcig gis yongs su chod par byas/_/chos kyi spun du byas pa yi/_/rig pa 'dzin pa khyod nyon cig_/sgron ma byed pa'i bya ba yang /_/sngon du byung ba'i lung bstan pa'i/_/'gro ba'i lus kyi sems dpa' dag_/byung nas gsal byed log sun 'byin/_/
[\[90a.5\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pas dri ba bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i yongs su rtog pa tshad de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gdams ngag nges par gzhag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de'i tshe de'i 
[\[90a.6\]]dus na gang dag mi chen po rnams ni yongs su gdung ba med par nang du yang dag 'jog go/_/byis pa rnams ni yongs su gdung bar gyur te blo ya ya por gyur cing shin tu blong nas rtag par rab tu ngu'o/_/'jig rten pa la la ni shi la thug par gyur/_la la ni 
[\[90a.7\]]brgyal cing 'bog par gyur/_la la ni khams nas ro bam pa bzhin du gyur to/_/de bzhin du thams cad ku co mang po pha shi ba bzhin du kyi hud kyi hud zhes gdung ba'i sgra sgrogs so/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang snod ni yid du mi 'ong bar gyur to/_/bcud 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]kyang sems kyi dkyil 'khor mog mog por gyur to/_/chos 'di par phyogs pa rnams ni mdangs nag por gyur to/_/bdud kyi cha 'dzin cing gzhan gyi sde pa rnams ni bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dkar por gyur te kun kyang kyal ka'i tshig sgrogs par gyur to/_/de 
[\[90b.2\]]nas lo brgyad dang bcu gnyis 'das pa na dam pa'i rigs can sems dpa' chen po dag nang du yang dag 'jog las langs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi ston pa nub par gyur pas rma ga chad par dus nas kun kyang rang rang gi mngon par shes pas lang ka'i yul gyi 
[\[90b.3\]]grong rdal gyi mtsho gling rim la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse la rdzu 'phrul gyi bya bas mngon par rab tu 'dus so/_/yongs su 'dus nas 'dus pa de kun kyang mgrin gcig tu shin tu nyam thag pa'i nga ros smre sngags kyi gdung ba bton pa ni 'di lta ste/_e 
[\[90b.4\]]ma'o kyi hud e ma'o blong /_/ston pa'i sgron ma'i 'od nub na/_/'jig rten mun pa gang gis sel/_/tshad ma'i zhal de mi bzhugs pas/_/tshad mas gsungs pa'i bstan pa la/_/'jug par 'tshal ba'i 'gro ba rnams/_/log par 'jug par mi 'gyur 
[\[90b.5\]]ram/_/tshad mar dam bcas gang zag gis/_/des ma rnyed pa'i gang zag la/_/phan par bya phyir bka' bkrol bas/_/gtan la phebs par 'gyur zhig gu/_/legs nyes 'byed pa'i spyan zum pas/_/bka' nyid khyad du gsod pa yi/_/skyon gyi spyi 
[\[90b.6\]]gtsug mthar phyin pas/_/log stobs 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram/_/log pa'i bstan pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas/_/bden pa gnyis kyi nyi zla nub/_/'gro ba gang zhig lam tshol ba/_/mun par 'khyams par mi 'gyur ram/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das 
[\[90b.7\]]'og tu/_/bdud dang srin po mu stegs dang /_/gnod sbyin 'byung bo mi ma yin/_/ma rungs gdug pa sus 'dul 'gyur/_/dri med bstan pa'i bdud rtsi 'di/_/nub na shin tu ma rung na/_/rtsal dang ldan pa su zhig gis/_/'bar zhing snang bar byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]bslab pa dam pa'i rin po che/_/bral na shin tu ma rung na/_/skyes bu dam pa gang zhig gis/_/tshul rnams 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/_/ston pa mi bzhugs de rjes na/_/ston pa'i slob ma ji snyed pa/_/'phags dang gang zag tha dad pa/_/
[\[91a.2\]]lung bstan 'byung ba gang su zhig_/bstan pa nam mkha' 'dra ba la/_/mos pa tha dad par bzung nas/_/yin dang ma yin cha 'dzin cing /_/rtsod pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur ram/_/de nyid nges par rigs gcig la/_/rigs mi mthun par tha dad spyod/_/rigs 
[\[91a.3\]]gcig tha dad rigs rnams su/_/bslad cing bcos par mi 'gyur ram/_/rin thang med pa'i rin po che/_/mi mkhas gang zag tha dad pas/_/nyon mongs 'dod pas khrid dbang gis/_/dug dang brje bar mi 'gyur ram/_/chos kyi rgyal po ston pa ste/_/'di sngon 
[\[91a.4\]]phan chad zhal bzhugs tshe/_/ma rungs pa rnams 'tshe bgyid na/_/gdug pa dar bar mi 'gyur ram/_/gang 'dir bstan pa gnas pa'i yun/_/ji srid gcig tu gnas par 'gyur/_/gang 'dir sngar 'byung gang sngar 'byung /_/phyis 'byung dus 'di ji ltar 'gyur/_/
[\[91a.5\]]ston pa'i bstan pa tha ma'i tshe/_/nges par ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/_/bslab pa 'dzin pa'i slob ma rnams/_/tha ma ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/_/'di nas mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/gang ltar su yi ston par gshegs/_/zhing khams phyogs ni gang na bzhugs/_/de na 
[\[91a.6\]]bstan pa ci zhig sgrogs/_/nga yod 'jig rten mgon med rnams/_/mgon dang skyabs su gang zhig 'gyur/_/'phrul gyi blo dang gros stor na/_/blo dang gros ni gang nas btsal/_/nges pa'i don 'di ma rnyed na/_/nga yod nges don gang las gzung /_/mchod 
[\[91a.7\]]gnas yid rten mi bzhugs na/_/sku gdung ji ltar 'gyur zhig gu/_/slad kyis mchod gnas ci la bgyi/_/da ltar ston pa 'das 'og tu/_/gdung 'tshob skyes bu 'byung 'gyur ram/_/e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o blong zhes yongs su gdung ba bton to/_/sangs 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thog mar dam pas gdung ba bton pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de skad smras te gdungs pa las/_/srid gsum 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pa/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyis gsan/_/snying rje'i 
[\[91b.2\]]bdag po de dag kun/_/lcang lo can gyi pho brang du/_/gsang ba'i bdag po gnas su 'dus/_/bskul ba chen po 'di skad gsungs/_/gsang ba pa yi bdag po khyod/_/sngon gyi go cha yal lam ci/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal mi shes sam/_/snying rje'i sa la babs 
[\[91b.3\]]nas kyang /_/'jig rten gdung ba bsal ba'i rigs/_/so so'i rigs kyi cha bzung bas/_/ma rungs pa dag kun btul te/_/'dod khrid thabs su tshig rnams kyis/_/las kyi cha dang spyod mthun par/_/'du shes bsgyur ba byas nas ni/_/bka' yi bgro ba bshad 
[\[91b.4\]]sbyar nas/_/yang dag don la dgod pa'i rigs/_/de skad rnam par bskul ba las/_/dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/_/gdul dka' 'dul la mkhas pa'o/_/'jig rten kun la rgyal ba'i mchog_/gsang ba'i rtags 'dzin rdo rje can/_/dgyes shing 
[\[91b.5\]]gdan las bzhengs nas ni/_/cho 'phrul chen po kun bstan nas/_/'jig rten log pa'i gtso bo rnams/_/skal dang ldan par lung bstan pa/_/las dang skal bar rab ldan zhing /_/rgyal bas 'byung bar lung bstan pa'i/_/bsod nams chen po'i 
[\[91b.6\]]skal can rnams/_/sprul pas ji ltar lung bstan bzhin/_/da ltar dus la 'dir babs kyis/_/'khor ba'i snying por lung bstan phyir/_/cho 'phrul rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis/_/bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig_/ji ltar bshad cing lung bstan 
[\[91b.7\]]bzhin/_/skal ldan can la bgro bar bya'o/_/drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri/_/dgon pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni/_/ye shes snying po can rnams kyi/_/theg chen gsang ba 'byung ba'i gnas/_/thog ma tha ma'i dus med par/_/dam pa rnams 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]kyis bsngags pa yin/_/thog ma tha ma med pa yi/_/rgyal ba dpag tu med pa yis/_/dam pa'i dgon gnas chen po der/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor me long bzhin/_/bstan pa de ltar bdag gis kyang /_/thog ma tha ma med 
[\[92a.2\]]pa ru/_/bskul ba'i dus ni gar byung bar/_/bdag kyang de bzhin cho 'phrul snang /_/zhes bgros so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi gdung ba sel bar bgros pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe 
[\[92a.3\]]de nyid du/_/gnod 'dul rgyal pos de gsungs nas/_/mi yi gnas kyi 'jig rten khams/_/gling bzhi ba las 'dzam gling gi/_/drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ri/_/gnod sbyin 'du ba'i sa yin te/_/chos 'dzin rigs kyi grub gnas su/_/thugs 
[\[92a.4\]]rje'i sa la mngon sprul gshegs/_/sa rnams yongs su g.yos 'gyur te/_/rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis/_/thams cad sbyangs te bde bar snang /_/sngon du snang ba'i skal ldan can/_/dman pa'i lus 'dzin dam pa'i rigs/_/mi las rgyal rigs 
[\[92a.5\]]dra ma che/_/rgyal bu rgyal byin ltas su shar/_/de tshe dam pa'i rigs can rnams/_/dga' ba dang bcas the tshom skyes/_/spobs pa chen po'i dri ba dris/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad re che/_/skyes bu chen po khyod su zhig_/gang nas byon te gang ltar byung /_/
[\[92a.6\]]gang la brten nas gang du byon/_/don gyi ched ka ci zhes dris/_/cho 'phrul chen pos 'di skad du/_/nga ni cis kyang mi bskyod de/_/mi 'khrug rdo rje sems dpa' yin/_/snying rjes g.yo zhing bskyod pas na/_/srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gcig po/_/stong pa 
[\[92a.7\]]chen po nga yi yul/_/rdo rje rigs chen nga yi gdung /_/pha ni thabs mchog dpag tu med/_/ma ni shes rab brjod las 'das/_/thog ma med pa'i dus kyi tshe/_/nga yi yid bzhin nor bu stor/_/nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi de/_/yod par ma shes stor bar 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]tshor/_/de tshe kun nas dbul ba dang /_/thar med nad kyis gzir 'gyur zhing /_/mun pa mun nag smag tu 'khyams/_/bgrod par bya ba'i lam yang stor/_/gdungs par gyur kyang der ma shes/_/de tshe nga yi bshes gnyen mchog_/byams mgon dam pa 
[\[92b.2\]]zhig gi bstan/_/e ma'o khyod ci mi shes sam/_/mthong yun kun du bde ba yi/_/don srid chen po 'byung 'gyur ba/_/nor bu rin chen ma brlag gam/_/'on te yod par mi shes sam/_/'di ci chad par 'dug gam ci/_/de skad bshes gnyen mchog 
[\[92b.3\]]des sbran/_/de tshe nga yis slar sbran pa/_/don srid chen po 'byung ba de/_/yod par ma shes stor bar tshor/_/'di dang phrad par bya yi thabs/_/bshes gnyen khyod kyis lung ston cig_/dam pa de yis dmigs bstan pa/_/de dang myur du phrad 'dod na/_/btsal 
[\[92b.4\]]ba'i thabs la brtson bya dgos/_/sa mkhan dam pas dmigs mtshon te/_/mun snang khams dang sa khams dang /_/sna tshogs lam rnams bgrod byas nas/_/btsal kyang gzhan nas mi rnyed de/_/rang gi sa khams nyid nas 'byung /_/de ni rin chen sngar rnyed 
[\[92b.5\]]pa'i/_/dam pa rnams kyi khyim yin te/_/de ni sngar rnyed gyur pa yi/_/rnyed pa rnams kyi rnyed gnas yin/_/de skad thos nas de tshe ngas/_/gang tshe btsal ba'i ched phyir du/_/dam pa de la lam ltos te/_/blo gros dam pas nges bcad nas/_/theg chen cang 
[\[92b.6\]]shes de zhon te/_/mun snang gnyis kyi khams nas 'ongs/_/gcan 'phrang chu bo bzhi rgal te/_/sna tshogs lam bgrod kun btsal nas/_/dam pa rnams kyi lam du zhugs/_/sa dang rnam thar lam bgrod de/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer bsnyags/_/
[\[92b.7\]]nor bu rin chen rtsad bcad na/_/ma byung ma rnyed rang nyid kyi/_/chos nyid dbyings kyi khyim nas rnyed/_/rnyed pa nyid na rnyed med de/_/stong ba nyid na'ang stong bral med/_/yod min med min stor rnyed med/_/gzhan nas ma byung rang 'byung bar/_/shes la rnyed 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]btags ma shes la/_/stor zhes tha snyad btags par zad/_/yod dang stor dang rnyed pa'i dus/_/thog ma med pa'i dus nas so/_/de ltar chos nyid med pa las/_/sprul pa snang ba'i dus 'dir ni/_/mun snang gnyis kyi khams 'dir 'ongs/_/
