[\[93a.2\]]nga ni thabs kyi mnyan pa mkhan/_/'khor ba'i chu bo mtha' med las/_/srid gsum bsgral bar dam bcas kyis/_/thar par 'dod pa lam 'dir shog_/nga ni thabs kyi mig mkhan te/_/'jig rten long ba dpag med rnams/_/ling thog bsal bar dam 
[\[93a.3\]]bcas kyis/_/gang zhig mthong 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni thabs kyi sman pa ste/_/grong khyer gsum gyi nad pa rnams/_/gcod rnying sbyang bar dam bcas kyis/_/gang zhig bde 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni thabs kyi sa mkhan te/_/'gro ba lam log 
[\[93a.4\]]lam stor rnams/_/ma nor khrid par dam bcas kyis/_/yang dag lam 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni thugs rje spyan ras mkhan/_/'khor ba'i dgra dpung 'jigs pa las/_/thams cad bskyab par dam bcas kyis/_/'jigs dang bral 'dod lam 'dir 
[\[93a.5\]]shog_/nga ni rdo rje rdzong chen te/_/'khor ba'i g.yul chen dmag dpung las/_/'gro ba'i 'khras sar dam bcas kyis/_/gang zhig mkhar 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni thabs kyi tshong dpon te/_/'dod pa rgya mtshos mi ngoms rnams/_/gter chen sbyin 
[\[93a.6\]]par dam bcas kyis/_/gang zhig gter 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni thabs kyi sgron ma ste/_/mun nag smag tu 'khyams pa rnams/_/mun nag bsal bar dam bcas kyis/_/gang zhig snang 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/
[\[93a.7\]]yang dag yid bzhin 'dod pa rnams/_/yid bzhin bskang bar dam bcas kyis/_/lhun gyis grub 'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni bka' yi lde mig ste/_/bka' sgrom thar ram gsang ba rnams/_/rnam par 'byed par dam bcas kyis/_/gang zhig grol 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'dod lam 'dir shog_/nga ni bka' yi 'grel ba ste/_/gsung gi glegs bam zab mo rnams/_/nges par dgrol bar dam bcas kyis/_/gang dag shes 'dod lam 'dir shog_/rnam dag lam chen kun sgrol 'dir/_/skal ldan gang zhig su bzhugs pa/_/
[\[93b.2\]]nor bu rin chen 'od 'bar ba/_/nges par 'char gyis brtson par gyis/_/de nyid sems kyi me long ste/_/mngon sum gsal bar rtogs ma thag_/'gro ba'i lus la sangs rgyas yin/_/rdo rje gsang chen gsang ba yi/_/nges don dam pa'i mdzod mchog rnams/_/
[\[93b.3\]]'dir bgros gsal bar bshad sbyar bas/_/lha dang mi yi rig 'dzin las/_/rim par brgyud de grags par 'gyur/_/lha mi 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/mun pa'i gdung ba kun bsal nas/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur/_/ci phyir 
[\[93b.4\]]mun pa'i gdung bar zhugs/_/thub pa mya ngan 'das gdung ba/_/de ni nam mkha'i sku mnga' ba/_/'da' dang mi 'da' mi mnga' ste/_/'pho 'gyur med pas nam mkha' bzhin/_/de skad sprul pa'i sgra 'byung bas/_/sngon du byung ba'i rigs can rnams/_/
[\[93b.5\]]mchog tu dga' ba cher skyes te/_/dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa yis/_/lus btud shin tu gus sbyar nas/_/spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/_/mtshan mo'i mun nag sprin rum nas/_/glog 'gyur bar snang ston lta bur/_/thog ma tha ma med pa 
[\[93b.6\]]yi/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las/_/rnam dag lam chen de nyid du/_/byung ba'i skyes bu don grub khyod/_/dam pa rnams kyi gsang 'dzin cing /_/gsang ba pa yi bdag por grags/_/bka' rnams bgro bar khyod bsngags pas/_/khyod ni bka' 
[\[93b.7\]]'grel chen por grags/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la/_/mdzod gsum gsang ba'i nyi shar bas/_/shes bya'i mun pa kun bsal phyir/_/khyod ni gsal ba'i nyi mar grags/_/gdul dka' ma lus kun 'dul zhing /_/bdud kyi bdud sde 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bdud rnams 'joms/_/'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'joms byed pas/_/khyod ni bdud kyi bdud du grags/_/de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid/_/sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_/chos kun gzugs brnyan snang bas na/_/chos kyi me long zhes 
[\[94a.2\]]kyang grags/_/dug 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyis/_/zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med/_/nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pas/_/khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal por grags/_/dga' mgu rangs par mdzad pas na/_/khyod ni gdung ba sel bar grags/_/'dod pa yid 
[\[94a.3\]]bzhin skong bas na/_/khyod ni yid bzhin nor bur grags/_/dam pa rnams dang mthun mdzod la/_/bdag cag rig pa 'dzin rnams la/_/dam pa'i sprul pa gang ltar nub/_/dam pa'i sgron ma ji ltar bkod/_/dam pa'i gsang lung ji ltar 'byung /_/
[\[94a.4\]]gsang ba rgyud kyi bgro ba mdzod/_/dgongs pa'i tshig gsum bgro ba mdzod/_/nam mkha'i rdo rje bgro ba mdzod/_/ces gsol ba btab bo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las lung dam pa bgro bar gsol ba btab pa'i le'u ste 
[\[94a.5\]]lnga pa'o//_//de skad ces gsol ba btab pa las/_/gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_/sngon du byung bar lung bstan pa'i/_/'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams/_/gdung sngags dri ba dang bcas pa'i/_/sgyu ma'i rtog pa dgrol gyis 
[\[94a.6\]]nyon/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid/_/nam mkha' bzhin du nub pa med/_/rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal bas/_/de la gang sgrib de nyid sel/_/tshad ma gnyis kyis gang gzhal ba/_/shes bya de yang tshad mar 'gyur/_/legs nyes rtsa 
[\[94a.7\]]ba'ang de nyid pas/_/de nyid de la 'gyur ba med/_/sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_/dkar bas dkar ba'i nyi zla med/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'/_/chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/_/le lo can la phan gdags phyir/_/sprul pa rnams ni 'da' 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]tshul ston/_/ji ltar nam mkha' zhig 'gyur na/_/de tshe mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/gang dag gdug pa ma rungs pa/_/bdag med stong pa'i stobs kyis 'dul/_/rang bzhin 'od gsal spros bral ba'i/_/bstan pa rgya mtsho'ang de nyid pas/_/rang 
[\[94b.2\]]'byung seng ge rtsal can gyis/_/kun du 'bar zhing snang bar byed/_/bslab pa lhag pa'i sems nyid pas/_/bsgrub pa kun gyi mchog 'di ni/_/sa rab snang ba phyis 'byung ba'i/_/'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' 'dzin/_/mtha' thug med pa'i sems 
[\[94b.3\]]can rnams/_/byang chub snying por ye gnas pas/_/de bzhin nyid du rgyud des phyir/_/kun kyang mi slob de lung ston/_/sems nyid yod dang med do zhes/_/byis pa rnams ni rtsod par byed/_/mkhas pa ye nas rtsod dang bral/_/yod med rtog pa'i tshig 
[\[94b.4\]]mi brjod/_/nga yi gsang sngags gsang ba 'di/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang yin phyir/_/gang mi dpogs par gzhan dpags pas/_/gsang bar sgra gcig tha dad 'byung /_/dam pa rnams kyi gsang lung 'di/_/gang dag mi shes rmongs 'phyar bas/_/
[\[94b.5\]]dug dang bdud rtsir rje bas ni/_/phung byed gnyis ka sreg par 'gyur/_/kun gsal me long 'od po che/_/ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ston pa de/_/mkha' ltar 'pho 'gyur med pas na/_/'tshe ba'ang glog 'gyu sprin bzhin med/_/byang chub snying po yod kyi 
[\[94b.6\]]bar/_/de srid bstan pa gnas pa yin/_/thog ma tha ma med pa nas/_/byung bas snga phyi yod ma yin/_/dang po med las byung brjod pas/_/tha ma'ang brjod bral med par 'gyur/_/gdung 'dzin thog ma'ang de bzhin nyid/_/tha ma'ang de las gzhan mi 
[\[94b.7\]]'gyur/_/'di nas de bzhin nyid 'dir gshegs/_/bdal khyab chen po'i zhing na bzhugs/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba/_/de bzhin nyid du rnam par snang /_/byis pa'i ched du cho 'phrul zhig_/me tog bkod pa'i 'jig rten na/_/ma grags 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]pa zhes bya bar snang /_/snang ba'ang nyid na snang ba med/_/de bzhin zhing khams gang dag tu/_/sprul pa'i sangs rgyas snang mdzad pa/_/sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ji bzhin du/_/mi snang 'od kyang gzhan du snang /_/mi bskyod rdo rje thugs mchog kyang /_/
[\[95a.2\]]thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/'jig rten khams ni dpag tu med/_/mun snang rang 'byung rang bzhin yin/_/skye med ye shes nyid kyi dbyings/_/gdod nas bder gshegs snying po las/_/rnam rtog glo bur las kyis bsgribs/_/de nyid 'gro 
[\[95a.3\]]mgon skyabs chen yin/_/rgyal ba'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po/_/'phrul gyi blo dang gros mchog ste/_/yun gyi don srid chen po las/_/blo gros dam pa'i yul du snang /_/rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'jug pa/_/ji bzhin pa yi de kho na/_/nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo 
[\[95a.4\]]la/_/blo bzhag de nyid nges pa yin/_/chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/ye shes sku can rgyal ba rnams/_/sku la dngos can dngos med par/_/sku gdung ring bsrel ji ltar 'byung /_/sems can rnams la phan don du/_/med pa nyid las sprul pa 
[\[95a.5\]]yi/_/sgyu ma ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam/_/thugs rje thabs kyis gzhag tshul bstan/_/nges par ring bsrel gang 'dod pa/_/bye ma dag las mar 'dod 'dra/_/gang tshe 'bras btab til 'bru smin/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/gzugs snang brab 
[\[95a.6\]]sgrogs snying po can/_/sku dang gsung thugs snying po can/_/mchod gnas yid rten dam pa zhes/_/'gro mgon rdo rje sems dpas bshad/_/dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/'khor ba'i sems can rgyud las byung /_/'khor ba'i sems can rgyun bcad na/_/
[\[95a.7\]]sangs rgyas rgyun yang chad pa yin/_/dper na nam mkha'i gzha' tshon ni/_/dang po gzhan nas 'ongs pa dang /_/tha ma gzhan du song ba med/_/de nyid rang 'byung rang zhi ltar/_/sprul pa rang 'byung rang zhi bas/_/de nyid de la nub pa med/_/'das kyang ma bral 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]tha dad min/_/ma 'das pa na'ang gcig min te/_/'da' dang mi 'da' las 'das pas/_/bral dang ma bral ga la yod/_/des na gang la ci phyir gdung /_/gdung ba rmongs pa 'khrul pa yin/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ji lta bu/_/'di go ji ltar 'khrul zhig gu/_/
[\[95b.2\]]zhes gsang ba'i bdag po des seng ge rnam par lta ba'i tshul gyis gzhas btab pas rmongs pas gdungs pa rnams dga' mgu rangs nas gdung ba yongs su sangs te sems ma bcos par gnas te de bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'od gsal bar gyur 
[\[95b.3\]]to/_/de nas lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba ba'i bdag po la gsol pa/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po chen po gdung ba thams cad sel tam/_/'on te mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi gdung ba 'ba' zhig sel/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag 
[\[95b.4\]]po kho bo ni gdung ba thams cad sel ba ste/_/'das pa'i dus kyi gdung ba ji snyed pa yang bsal to/_/da lta mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yi gdung ba yang bsal/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rdul snyed kyi gdung ba yang bsal/_ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[95b.5\]]gdung ba ji snyed pa yang sel bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na gang dag yongs su gdung ba rnams ni mi shes pa/_rmongs pa/_shed ma bye ba kho na yin gyi shes pa/_ma rmongs pa mkhas pa shed bye ba rnams ni gang du yang gdung ba med pa gdung ba dang bral ba yin 
[\[95b.6\]]no/_/zhes thos pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yongs su gdung ba las sangs so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//
[\[95b.7\]]theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang rmongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa dang po'o/_/de nas lang ka'i bdag pos sngon du gnang ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]gnyis pa gang du sgron ma yongs su bkod pa na yang 'byung zhes lung bstan pa yongs su dri ba'i phyir gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngon bdag gis phyin ci ma log par thos pa/_gang rmongs pa rnams kyi 
[\[96a.2\]]gdung ba sel cing sems can rnams kyi sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi blo gros dam pa'i mdzod/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa phyin ci ma log pa yang 
[\[96a.3\]]dag pa'i lta ba/_sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa/_/theg pa chen po de 'degs pa'i tshul tshad ma nub par gyur phan chad du 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu zhes dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po cig 'di ji snyam du 
[\[96a.4\]]sems/_khyod mi shes sam/_yul tshad ma nyid kyis bka' stsal gyis kun dza ra chos kyi spun la bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/_rig pa 'dzin pa khyod kyi dri ba 'di lta ste/_de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa de ni gnas skabs gnyis dang bcur 'byung ba ste/_
[\[96a.5\]]gang rmongs pa gdung ba sel ba na yang 'byung /_/gang 'jig rten gyi sgron ma yongs su bkod pa na yang 'byung /_/gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang 'byung /_snying po byang chub nyid du nges pa na yang 'byung /_dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa na yang 'byung /_gdul 
[\[96a.6\]]bya skabs la bab pa'i ched na yang 'byung /_byin gyis brlabs las snang ba na yang 'byung /_brgyud pa thabs kyis grags pa na yang 'byung /_gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang 'byung /_lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang 'byung /_las rgyud yongs su 
[\[96a.7\]]gcod pa na yang 'byung /_dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang 'byung ste/_de dag ni thams cad dang thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su rnam par snang ngo /_/snang bar gyur to/_/snang bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang du grogs pa mi shes 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]sam zhes smras pa las/_lang ka'i bdag pos smras pa/_e ma'o gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ni bdag gis thos pa dam pa thos so/_/thos pa'i mchog thos so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po yongs su rmongs pa gdungs pa ni sangs pa lta na/_sgron ma yongs 
[\[96b.2\]]su bkod pa na yang 'byung zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin du grags pa lags/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir da ltar yongs su 'das pa 'di sgron ma bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ram/_'das pa 'di yang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi zhing khams 'di 'ba' 
[\[96b.3\]]zhig gi sgron ma sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das sam/_'on te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag na zhing khams ji snyed pa'i sgron ma bkod pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po 
[\[96b.4\]]de ji snyam du sems/_'di yang sgron ma zhes bya ste/_da ltar 'das pa ni zhing khams mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas lta zhog 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag sa ya'i sangs rgyas lta yang zhog_/'dzam bu'i gling gcig gi sangs rgyas gcig yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 
[\[96b.5\]]zung shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhing khams 'di ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi zhing khams yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa na sgron ma'i bya ba mdzad do/_/de dag 
[\[96b.6\]]ji lta ba de ltar sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rdul snyed kyang de bzhin du blta'o/_/de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dris pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po mi mjed kyi zhing khams 'dzam bu'i gling gcig gi sprul pa'i sangs 
[\[96b.7\]]rgyas nyag gcig mya ngan las 'das pa 'di sangs rgyas gang gi sprul par yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las sprul pa cha gcig 'ba' zhig kho 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]nar zung shig_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhing khams 'dir shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar grags na 'di ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]'ba' zhig go/_/lang 
[\[97a.2\]]ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'khor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpung gtan bcom pa'i phyir thub pa chen po zhes yongs su grags so/_/ji ltar 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur yang thub pa chen po zhes bya bar 
[\[97a.3\]]yang grags pa ni 'di lta ste/_lha'i gnas su thub pa chen po srid thub 'dzin zhes bya bar grags so/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas su thub pa chen po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so/_/mi'i gnas su thub pa chen po shAkya seng ge zhes bya bar grags so/_/
[\[97a.4\]]byol song gi gnas su thub pa chen po rnam par gnon pa zhes bya bar grags so/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas su thub pa chen po rnam par snang byed ces bya bar grags so/_/dmyal ba'i gnas su thub pa chen po chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/_/
[\[97a.5\]]kye lang ka'i bdag po der yang ma zad de/_de ji lta ba de ltar de bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na thub pa drug gi sgron ma yongs su snang ba de lta de ltar rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jig rten drug gi 
[\[97a.6\]]phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na rdul snyed kyi thub pa drug gi sgron ma mtha' yas par snang ba yang 'di lta ste/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa stong phrag bcu gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhing khams de 
[\[97a.7\]]thams cad rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/_de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams tshe dang longs spyod thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum dang mnyam pa/_bar ma dor 'chi ba med cing brdzus nas skye ba sha dag kyang 'dod pa thams cad bsams pas 'grub ste/_de na 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]sbyin pa yang med/_gtong ba yang med/_len pa dang slong ba po yang med de/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gtong slong yod pa dag gi gtam thos pa na de la yongs su smon pa yin te/_de na rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa thub pa'i dbang po de de bzhin gshegs 
[\[97b.2\]]pa shAkya thub pa dri med sgra zhes bya bar bstan nas theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba/_gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid sgron ma chen po yongs su snang ngo /_/de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang thub pa drug gi sgron ma 
[\[97b.3\]]snang bas 'gro ba drug gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal bar byed do/_/yang thub pa'i dbang po de lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[97b.4\]]thub pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya bar sprul nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid yongs su snang bar byed do/_/de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang thub pa chen po drug gi sgron ma snang bas 'gro ba drug gi 
[\[97b.5\]]sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed do/_/yang thub pa'i dbang po de nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag nyi shu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan shin tu bkram pa zhes bya ba na gang zag brdzus nas skyes pa sha dag ste/_tshe lo brgyad 
[\[97b.6\]]khri bzhi stong gnas pa'i zhing khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya bar bstan nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid ston to/_/de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang 
[\[97b.7\]]thub pa drug gi sgron ma snang bas sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed do/_/yang thub pa'i dbang po de byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag sum cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]thub pa seng ge sgra zhes bya bar bstan nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid ston to/_/de nyid kyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na yang thub pa drug gi sgron ma snang bas 'gro ba drug gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[98a.2\]]'od gsal bar byed do/_/de bzhin du thub pa'i dbang po de shar lho'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par mdzes pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mdzes pa'i tog ces bya bar sprul 
[\[98a.3\]]nas gong ma bzhin du chos ston to/_/lho nub mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bdun cu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de gzi brjid rgyan zhes bya bar bstan nas gong ma bzhin du 
[\[98a.4\]]chos ston to/_/nub byang mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag lnga bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dang ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de tsan+dan dri mchog dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas gong ma bzhin du chos ston to/_/
[\[98a.5\]]byang shar mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdung ba sel ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de snying rje'i rgyal po de zhes bya bar bstan nas gong ma bzhin du chos ston to/_/
[\[98a.6\]]de bzhin du rnam par snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas myur du 'dzin pa zhes bya bar bstan nas chos ston to/_/yang rin chen bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan sprin zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du 
[\[98a.7\]]chos ston to/_/yang rnam par bkram pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dgongs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang bai DUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]sangs rgyas gser gyi 'od zer zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang 'od dam pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang rnam par zhi ba zhes bya 
[\[98b.2\]]ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya bar bstan nas ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang sprin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang 
[\[98b.3\]]dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang yid mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa zhes 
[\[98b.4\]]bya ba na sangs rgyas me long gi 'od snang ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas zla 'od dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang 
[\[98b.5\]]nyi ma'i 'od zer brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying po'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang spos dri ngad ldan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes 
[\[98b.6\]]bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang rnam par spros pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas mngon par spro ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang rin po 
[\[98b.7\]]che spros pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang 'od zer 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas 'od zer dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang dka' ba rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas dka' thub rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang gtsug tor bkod pa zhes bya 
[\[99a.2\]]ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas gtsug tor snying po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang nges pa can zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas nges par gshegs pa zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[99a.3\]]du chos ston to/_/yang nges par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas nges par gsungs pa zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang bde spyod ces bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas bde ba chen po zhes bya 
[\[99a.4\]]bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas me tog dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang yongs su grags 
[\[99a.5\]]pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas grags pa'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas 
[\[99a.6\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang rnam par sbyangs pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad pa zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang sman gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing 
[\[99a.7\]]khams na sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang gser gyi 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas gser gyi 'od 'phro zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang gser gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas 
[\[99b.2\]]gser gyi gzu ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang dpal gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang 
[\[99b.3\]]snang ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas snang ba brtsegs pa'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya bar bstan 
[\[99b.4\]]nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang dga' ba'i mdangs zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas dga' mchog dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i zhing 
[\[99b.5\]]khams na sangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang sangs rgyas mang po 'du ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji 
[\[99b.6\]]lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad sbyong ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang tha dad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas 
[\[99b.7\]]'jig rten kun gyi slob dpon zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]chos ston to/_/yang me tog mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba'i zhing 
[\[100a.2\]]khams na sangs rgyas thams cad snang ba zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang tsan+dan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas tsan+dan dri zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston 
[\[100a.3\]]to/_/yang seng ge 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas seng ge 'bum gzugs zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mi mjed ces bya ba 'di na sangs rgyas thub 
[\[100a.4\]]pa chen po zhes bya bar bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston to/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba sa yar rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan bye ba sa yar bstan nas chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar mdzad de/_la lar 
[\[100a.5\]]ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_/la lar ni da dung du yum gyi lhums na bzhugs/_la lar ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs/_/la lar ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/la lar ni 'da' ba'i tshul bstan nas 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[100a.6\]]gzhan nas gzhan gyi sgron mar snang /_la lar ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs kyis theg pa chen po'i chos ston/_la lar ni nyan thos kyi cha byad kyis theg pa chung ngu'i chos ston/_la lar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[100a.7\]]chos ston/_la lar ni snying po byang chub na bzhugs/_la lar ni skul ba'i sa la gzhes/_la lar ni thar pa'i cha lugs kyis so/_/la lar ni khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis so/_/la lar ni lha'i cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni klu'i cha byad kyis so/_/la 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]lar ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni bdud kyi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni gnod sbyin gyi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni srin po'i cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni 'byung po'i cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byad kyis so/_/
[\[100b.2\]]la lar ni ya mtshan can gyi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni byol song gi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni bzod ldan gyi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni shan pa'i cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni smad 'tshong ma'i cha byad kyis so/_/
[\[100b.3\]]la lar ni na chung gi cha byad kyis so/_/la lar ni sku gdung lta bur snang ngo /_/la lar ni ring bsrel lta bur snang ngo /_/la lar ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid lta bur snang ngo /_/la lar ni rnam par snang mdzad lta bur snang ngo /_/la lar ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta 
[\[100b.4\]]bur snang ngo /_/la lar ni snang ba mtha' yas lta bur snang ngo /_/la lar ni don yod grub pa lta bur snang ste/_de dag kyang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to/_/gzhan yang gti mug gi rgyal po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i gzugs lta 
[\[100b.5\]]bur snang ngo /_/zhe sdang gi rgyal po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir khyab 'jug gi gzugs lta bur snang ngo /_/'dod chags kyi bdag po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir drag po'i gzugs lta bur snang ngo /_/nga rgyal gyi bdag po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir tshogs bdag lta bur 
[\[100b.6\]]snang ngo /_/phrag dog gi bdag po dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dbang po lta bur snang ngo /_/de bzhin du skye ba thams cad kyi gzugs su snang ba ni 'jug sred dang /_/sred med dang /_dbang phyug dang /_stobs ldan dang /_nor 'dzin dang /_spre'u dang /_ra dang /_
[\[100b.7\]]lu 'de dang /_khyi dang /_sbrang ma dang /_bya rog dang /_me khyer dang /_srog chags dang /_gang zin pa de dang de'i gzugs su snang bar mdzad cing de'i cha byad kyis gang dag ji ltar mos pa rnams la de bzhin du snang ste/_ji ltar nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]brnyan gzhal med khang las ma g.yos par chu tha dad pa'i nang du gzugs brnyan tha dad par snang ba bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid las ma g.yos bzhin du zhing khams dpag tu med par sangs rgyas mtha' yas par snang ngo /_/de ltar 
[\[101a.2\]]na gang ming sna tshogs su btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mtha' yas pa na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan sna tshogs par shes pa ni brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bskal par smras kyang shar phyogs gcig pu'i sangs 
[\[101a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bskal par smras kyang mtshan gyi mtha' ni mi rdzogs so/_/ji ltar 
[\[101a.4\]]sems can mos pa chung ngu rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams tshad med pa dang mtshan mtha' yas pa thos na blo ga chad pa dang myos par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams de dag thams cad na sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba 
[\[101a.5\]]gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de nyid 'ba' zhig yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu phyin ci ma log par rim gyis dang /_cig car bar ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams na 'khod pa'i sems can chen po de dag ni sems kyi 
[\[101a.6\]]rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i phyir/_blo shin tu zab pa dang /_mi zab pa dang /_yangs pa dang /_dog pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_'gyur ba dang /_rno ba dang /_rtul ba dang /_myur ba dang /_bul ba dang /_shas stag pas bsngags kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gtam rim 
[\[101a.7\]]gyis pa dang cig car bar thos nas de dag la yang mi skrag mi dbang gi dga' zhing mgu ba dang /_rangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sna tshogs su snang ba'o/_/de na gnas pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang thung ba dang /_ring ba dang /_dpag tu med pa dang /_brgya pa dang brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]stong thub pa yin no/_/longs spyod ni ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'gyur ba yang yod/_dka' bas 'byongs pa dang mi 'byongs pa yang yod/_/kun kyang lung bstan pa thob pa sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gang gis thos pa 
[\[101b.2\]]des rgyal ba mang po la sngon du bya ba byas pa yin no/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i zhing khams nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/_/theg pa chen por nges par 'byung ba dag yin no/_/mngon par shes pa 
[\[101b.3\]]dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi sras su nges pa dag yin no/_/lhag mthong gi mig dang ldan pa dag yin no/_/kye lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling gcig gi sangs rgyas nyag gcig 'di mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/de bzhin du rdo rje 
[\[101b.4\]]sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag la mya ngan las 'das pa yang yod ma 'das pa yang yod do zhes smras pas lus kyi sems dpa' de yid yongs su rangs par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rdo rje sems 
[\[101b.5\]]dpa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' zhes dngos gang la bgyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po rdo rje sems 
[\[101b.6\]]dpa' ni sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba gsang sngags kyi ngo bo ji bzhin pa'i de kho na la bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba ni gang /_de bzhin du 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba 
[\[101b.7\]]dang /_gsang sngags kyi ngo bo zhes bya ba dang /_ji bzhin pa'i de bzhin pa de kho na nyid ces gang la bgyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sems zhes bya ba ni ma byas ma bcos sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o/_/dkyil 'khor zhes bya 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]ba ni thig le gang yin pa nyid do/_/'od ces bya ba ni snang ba'o/_/gsal ba zhes bya ba ni gang mi shes pa las gzhan gang gis kyang ma bsgribs pa'o/_/gsang ba zhes bya ba ni smrar byed pa spyod yul du ma gyur pa la bya'o/_/sngags 
[\[102a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su brjod pa la bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med pa mi dmigs pa kun 'byung ba'i gzhi la bya'o/_/ji bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni ma bcos ma bslad pa la bya'o/_/de bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni ma byas ma btags 
[\[102a.3\]]pa la bya'o/_/de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni ma nor mi 'gyur ba la bya'o/_/yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_gsang ba ba'i bdag po ma byas ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni gang /_sna tshogs 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang 
[\[102a.4\]]ka'i bdag po byed pa po med la bya bas btsal du med pa'i phyir ma byas pa'o/_/gzhi ji bzhin pa'i phyir ma bcos pa'o/_/gang med pa las rgyun du 'byung zhing yul tha dad la 'gro ba legs pa dang /_nyes pa dang /_gnyis ka ma yin pa sna tshogs 'byung ba 
[\[102a.5\]]ste gang de nyid ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/de rgyun ni 'byung ba ste/_sprin dang khug rlangs dang 'ja' rlan la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/yang dris pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bgyi/_smras pa lang ka'i bdag po de kho na nyid ji 
[\[102a.6\]]bzhin pa de ni thams cad nas thams cad du gnyen po med pa/_'pho 'gyur med pa/_skye 'gag med pa/_de kho na nyid sems rang rig pa/_dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i dngos po med pa nyid du bcom pa'i phyir rdo rje 
[\[102a.7\]]sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes kyang bya'o/_/chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin nyid ces kyang bya'o/_/sems kyi stong pa nyid ces kyang bya'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/dbu mar mi 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]dmigs pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi zhes kyang bya'o/_/sprul pa kun gyi 'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes kyang bya'o/_/zhing khams kun gyi sgron ma zhes kyang bya'o/_/thugs rje thabs kyi 
[\[102b.2\]]'byung gnas zhes kyang bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba zhes kyang bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag kyang gang gi don du de ltar btags kyi de kho na nyid la ni ming du btags pa med de/_de dag ni [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i 
[\[102b.3\]]bdag po de'i phyir na sangs rgyas ni [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/chos kyang [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/byang chub kyang [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de bzhin du dbyings dang ye shes dang chos kyi sku dang /_sku tha dad pa dang /_sems can dang /_'jig rten la sogs pa thams cad du btags shing 
[\[102b.4\]]chags pa ji snyed pa dag [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]'ba' zhig tu rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]gang yin pa ni glo bur du btags pa ste ye nas ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/lang ka'i bdag po gal te ye nas ldan pa zhig yin ni/_gang glo bur pa thams cad 
[\[102b.5\]]mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lang ka'i bdag po glo bur ni sprin bzhin te ther zug pa ma yin/_ye nas ldan pa ma yin/_brtag bzod pa ma yin no/_/lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir ming dang /_brda dang tha snyad dang mtshan ma dang /_btags pa dang /_las 
[\[102b.6\]]dang las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad ni glo bur pa ste 'byung ba dang /_sangs pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_dang bar rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gal te las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la sogs pa glo bur du ma btags na ni de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de 
[\[102b.7\]]de ltar mi rung ba zhig na lang ka'i bdag po de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de'i phyir chos thams cad ming med/_tshig med/_brjod du med/_tshig gi lam chad pa'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bdag po gang ming du btags pa'i gzhil gzhi'i don tsam du yang mi rtog gam/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gzhi'i don tsam du yang mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhi'i don tsam zhig ni 'di zhes 
[\[103a.2\]]sangs rgyas nyid kyis btsal kyang mi brnyes so/_/de bas na glo bur gyi rtog pa dang /_mi rtog pa la sangs rgyas dang /_sems can zhes btags par zad kyi de bzhin nyid de la ni sangs rgyas sems can du cung zad kyang med de/_'on kyang byis pa rnams 
[\[103a.3\]]ni glo bur dag gi sprin gyis bsgribs pas glo bur gyi chos dag ched du byed cing 'khor ba dang byang chub gnyis su rtog par byed do/_/sems can dang sangs rgyas gnyis su rtog par byed do/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'o na sems can dang sangs 
[\[103a.4\]]rgyas 'di gnyis ji ltar shes par bya/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po stong pa nyid du shes par bya'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po stong pa nyid ci la gnas/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad la gnas so/_/smras pa/_gsang 
[\[103a.5\]]ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad ci la gnas/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po chos thams cad stong pa nyid kho na'i phyir ci la yang mi gnas so/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci la gnas pa lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po 
[\[103a.6\]]stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste gang stong pa nyid des sems can gyi don yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang sems can la stong pa nyid las don ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_
[\[103a.7\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas dang sems can kun stong na gang gi thugs rje chen pos gang la ji ltar mdzad/_thugs rje chen po de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis gnas pas 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]na gnyis su ma mthong bas snying rje'i yul med pa ni thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu yo bsgral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po yin la/_byis pa'i snying rje dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sems can srog bton pa dang gang thar bar bton pa de ni snying rje chung 
[\[103b.2\]]ngur rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de bas na snying rje chen po la rgyun du gnas pas gnas par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang snying rje chen po la gnas pa dag ni sems can 'ga' yang grol bar mi byed 'ching bar yang mi byed de/_rdo rje mtshon gyis 
[\[103b.3\]]dngos su bsad pa med par bsad pa kho na'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can med pa las sems can du btags pa'i phyir ro/_/snying rje chen po de ni de bzhin nyid dang glo bur gnyis kyi khyad par gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]su rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de lta 
[\[103b.4\]]bas na 'di lta ste/_mtha' yas ming du btags pa yi/_/yod mthong snang grags chos rnams kun/_/[{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]tsam du btags par zad/_/de la dngos gzhi ga la yod/_/gang la ming du btags pa'i gzhi/_/med rgyu btags chags bsgrubs 'grub cing /_/
[\[103b.5\]]gang du bltas par snang ba yin/_/des na bya med byas pa zin/_/mi snang ba las kun snang ba/_/thams cad thams cad glo bur snang /_/snang nyid med pa'i snying po ste/_/yod med gnyis su'ang dmigs pa med/_/sangs rgyas med las sangs rgyas dang /_/byang 
[\[103b.6\]]chub chos nyid la sogs pa'i/_/tha dad ming gi [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]rnams/_/mi shes rmongs la bstan phyir btags/_/de nyid la ni sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub chos nyid la sogs pa'i/_/tha snyad ming gi [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]rnams/_/ming med tshig tu brjod pa med/_/chos 
[\[103b.7\]]nyid nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas/_/ye shes nyi ma'i sku gsal bas/_/thugs rje sgron ma'i 'od zer gyis/_/gti mug mun bsal rnam par snang /_/zhes smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gzhan la re rtsol 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]med par dbugs phyin par 'gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gsang sngags rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las sgron ma yongs su bkod 
[\[104a.2\]]pa'i gtam rgyud brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa gnyis pa'o//_//bam po gnyis par zug pa/_de nas lang ka'i bdag pos yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i gang 
[\[104a.3\]]gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang byung zhes bstan pa dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su gang gis nges pa rnyed pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ba zhig 
[\[104a.4\]]tu rnyed de grags pa lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang gis gsang sngags kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid kyi nges pa phyin ci ma log pa rnyed pa de kho na nyid la bya'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems 
[\[104a.5\]]dpa' de gang nas byung /_gang na gnas/_gang du snang /_ji ltar byung de skad ces dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye lang ka'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje sems dpa' de ni 'khor ba dang bcas mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[104a.6\]]gnyis kyi khams nas byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang sems can kun gyi sems la gnas so/_/zhing khams mtha' yas par snang ngo /_/ye ji bzhin pa dang /_rgyud dag par rang byung ngo /_/yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_gsang 
[\[104a.7\]]ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du nges pa gang la gzhag par bgyi/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' ni gcig dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid las grol te chos rnams kyi chos nyid ma bcos ma bslad pa/_
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]snying po byang chub tu ye nas gnas pa de la ye ji bzhin pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so/_/sems can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid gang mthong ba'i gnas skabs la ni rgyud dag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes gdags so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas 
[\[104b.2\]]thams cad kyang ye ji bzhin pa dang /_rgyud dag pa'i sangs rgyas su rnam par snang ngo /_/de bas na rdo rje sems dpa'i nges pa ni thams cad kyi ye ji bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid la gzhag par bya'o/_/yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_gsang ba'i bdag po 
[\[104b.3\]]sems can kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid de gang lags/_/gang zhig mthong na de mthong ba lags/_de skad ces dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sems can kun gyi ji lta ba de mthong na mthong ba yin no/_/sems 
[\[104b.4\]]can kun gyi ji lta ba de ni bla na med pa'i byang chub yin no/_/de la ni chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs so/_/de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_de la ni byang chub pa yang med la byang chub par bya ba'ang med do/_/de la ni sems can yang med la 
[\[104b.5\]]sems can du gdags pa yang med do/_/chos can yang med la chos can du gdags pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid yin la byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_nam mkha'i ni mtshan nyid 
[\[104b.6\]]thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub ni sems las btsal bar bya'o/_/sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med gnyis kar yang mi dmigs so/_/sems de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang 
[\[104b.7\]]ma gzigs/_mi gzigs/_gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ji ltar ma gzigs na kha dog tu ma gzigs so/_/dbyibs su ma gzigs so/_/mun par ma gzigs so/_/snang bar ma gzigs so/_/pho mor ma gzigs so/_/ma ning du ma 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]gzigs so/_khams gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma gzigs so/_/lha'i sems su ma gzigs so/_/klu'i sems su ma gzigs so/_/de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi sems dang /_dri za'i sems dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[105a.2\]]mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_byol song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dmyal ba la sogs pa 'gro ba ris tha dad pa'i sems su ma gzigs so/_/rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[105a.3\]]zhe na/_sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin la ye shes de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro/_/yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gyi sems 
[\[105a.4\]]de ci'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i rang 'byung gi ye shes yin/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med 
[\[105a.5\]]do/_/de ji lta zhe na 'di lta ste/_gang chags pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang chags pa med pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje 
[\[105a.6\]]sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang zhe sdang gi sems kyi de kho na nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang byams pa'i sems kyi de bzhin 
[\[105a.7\]]nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang gti mug gi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang shes rab 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]chen po'i de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang the tshom gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang 
[\[105b.2\]]nges pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid de/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang mun pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na 
[\[105b.3\]]nyid do/_/gang snang ba'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang nga rgyal gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de 
[\[105b.4\]]bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang phrag dog gi sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/gang bsdu ba'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo 
[\[105b.5\]]rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni de kho na nyid do/_/de bzhin du spro ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_'byed pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_'khrug pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_zhi ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_'thab pa'i sems kyi de kho 
[\[105b.6\]]na nyid dang /_'jar ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_rtsod pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_mthun pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_brjod pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_brjod pa med pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_lha'i sems kyi de kho na 
[\[105b.7\]]nyid dang /_klu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_bdud kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_lha ma yin gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_mi'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_lto 'phye'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]'byung po'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_nam mkha' lding gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_dri za'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_grul bum gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_skyes pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_bud med kyi sems kyi de 
[\[106a.2\]]kho na nyid dang /_ma ning gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_bdag gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_gzhan gyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_pha'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_ma'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_phu 
[\[106a.3\]]nu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_dgra bo'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_dbang phyug gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_tshangs pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_gtogs 'dod kyi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_dbang po'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_
[\[106a.4\]]tshogs bdag gi sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_kun du rgyu ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_tshong pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_zhing pa'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_chu bo lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_lteng ka lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na 
[\[106a.5\]]nyid dang /_khron pa lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_bkod pa lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_'khor lo lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_zo chu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_bskol chu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_gser 
[\[106a.6\]]chu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_kun du bsrung ba'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_ser sna lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_gtong ba lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_byi la lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_lce 'bab pa lta bu'i 
[\[106a.7\]]sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_glog lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_sprin lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_byi ba lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_khyi lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_glu lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_gar lta 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_sil snyan lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_rma bya lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_rnga sgra lta bu'i sems kyi de kho na nyid dang /_dus kyi 'brug sgra lta bu'i sems dang /_seng ge lta bu'i sems dang /_bung ba lta bu'i 
[\[106b.2\]]sems dang /_sbrang ma lta bu'i sems dang /_chu srin lta bu'i sems dang /_rus sbal lta bu'i sems dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i sems dang /_ma he lta bu'i sems dang /_'ug pa lta bu'i sems dang /_spre'u lta bu'i sems dang /_bya rog lta bu'i sems dang /_
[\[106b.3\]]rta lta bu'i sems dang /_bzhad lta bu'i sems dang /_kang ka lta bu'i sems dang /_spyang ki'i sems dang /_wa'i sems dang /_glang po lta bu'i sems dang /_lug lta bu'i sems dang /_khra lta bu'i sems dang /_khyim gyi sems dang /_khyim 
[\[106b.4\]]med pa'i sems dang /_thar pa'i sems dang /_ma thar pa'i sems dang /_srin po'i sems dang /_mi rgod kyi sems dang /_na chung gi sems dang /_rgyal po'i sems dang /_smad 'tshong ma'i sems dang /_'phyon ma'i sems dang /_bram ze'i 
[\[106b.5\]]sems dang /_shen pa'i sems dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sems dang /_dmyal ba'i sems dang /_tsher ma'i sems dang /_shing bal gyi sems dang /_sa 'og gi sems dang /_nam mkha'i sems dang /_dra ba'i sems dang /_rgya'i sems dang /_
[\[106b.6\]]zhags pa'i sems dang /_lig ri'i sems dang /_lcags kyu'i sems dang /_tho ba'i sems dang /_ju thur gyi sems dang /_snod kyi sems dang /_khri mon gyi sems dang /_me lce'i sems dang /_thu lum gyi sems dang /_mar me'i 
[\[106b.7\]]sems dang /_nyi ma'i sems dang /_zla ba'i sems dang /_dngul gyi sems dang /_gser gyi sems dang /_me stag gi sems dang /_rlung gi sems dang /_chu'i sems dang /_mdung shing gi sems dang /_gtun shing gi sems dang /_sgo'i 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]sems dang /_shing leb kyi sems dang /_me'i sems dang /_sa'i sems dang /_'dam gyi sems dang /_rnyog chu'i sems dang /_tshon rtsi'i sems dang /_nor bu'i sems dang /_dug gi sems dang /_sman gyi sems dang /_
[\[107a.2\]]kha zas kyi sems dang /_chu dong gi sems dang /_mda'i sems dang /_ral gri'i sems dang /_'khor lo'i sems dang /_gzhu'i sems dang /_sgrog gi sems dang /_shing gi sems dang /_lan tshwa'i sems dang /_spu gri'i sems dang /_thig 
[\[107a.3\]]gi sems dang /_rdo rje'i sems dang /_ri rab kyi sems dang /_rgya mtsho'i sems dang /_pha bong gi sems dang /_zhang gi sems dang /_phug gi sems dang /_skye ba'i sems dang /_me tog gi sems dang /_'bras bu'i sems dang /_rtsa ba'i 
[\[107a.4\]]sems dang /_yal ga'i sems dang /_sdong bu'i sems dang /_mngar ba'i sems dang /_kha ba'i sems dang /_skyur ba'i sems dang /_tsha ba'i sems dang /_sla ba'i sems dang /_bska ba'i sems dang /_yi ge'i sems dang /_tsha tsha'i 
[\[107a.5\]]sems dang /_lde mig gi sems dang /_bya gag lta bu'i sems dang /_kun dga' ra ba lta bu'i sems dang /_dbyar sprin lta bu'i sems dang /_me long lta bu'i sems dang /_til gyi mar khu lta bu'i sems dang /_dgun chang lta bu'i sems 
[\[107a.6\]]la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ji bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid do/_/kye lang ka'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rdo rje sems 
[\[107a.7\]]dpa'i de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos ma bslad/_ma byas ma brtags ji bzhin pa yin la/_sems can kun gyi sems kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de yang ma bcos/_ma bslad ma byas/_ma brtags ji bzhin pa de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan gyis kyang de gnyis kyi rang bzhin so sor ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang rgyal tshab skyes bu rnams kyi so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis kyang so sor ma phyed mi phyed phyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye 
[\[107b.2\]]lang ka'i bdag po gang gsang sngags kyi nges pa rnyed par 'dod pa rnams kyis sems kyi de kho na nyid ngo shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa ltar sems tha dad par snang ba rnams bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor pa ltar sems de kho na 
[\[107b.3\]]nyid gcig tu snang la de kho na nyid gcig ni de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje sems dpas kyang sems kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas gsang sngags kyi nges pa brnyes so/_/de ji lta zhe na sems 
[\[107b.4\]]kyi de kho na nyid ni rnam par dag pa'i sgo yin no/_/chos snang ba'i sgo yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings yin no/_/chos kyi glegs bam chen po yin no/_/chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin chen po yin no/_/kye lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di lta ste/_gang gis 
[\[107b.5\]]sems kyi de kho na/_/gsang ba'i snying po des rnyed na/_/'dren pa'i tshig gis ma bkrol yang /_/sems la chos 'byung 'bum phrag yas/_/smra ba'i sgo mor thams cad gsal/_/don la nges pa'i gtan tshigs ni/_/tshig tu mtshon te 'byin 
[\[107b.6\]]par nus/_/chos rgyun ting 'dzin thob pa yin/_/kye lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na sems kyi de kho na nyid ni byang chub chen po yin la/_byang chub chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ste/_de yang sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsir gyur pa 'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[107b.7\]]sems kyi chu med na/_/rgyal ba rnams kyang skams par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems kyi chu bo 'dis/_/sngon zhen mtha' dang rngos skams rlan/_/sems kyi rang bzhin stong nyid pas/_/de las byung ba thams cad stong /_/de stong pas na byang chub kyang /_/
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]stong nyid snying po de kho na/_/rang 'byung ye shes chu chen po/_/rmad 'byung rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil nas/_/byang chub bdud rtsi'i chu byung bas/_/rgyal ba thams cad bsil bar mdzad/_/'di ni gsang ba'i snying po ste/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i de 
[\[108a.2\]]kho na/_/nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo yin/_/rgyal ba kun gyis dam par bsngags/_/de bas de'i phyir lang ka'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid ngo shes par bya ba ni yul gyi don srid chen po'o/_/zhes gsang ba pa'i bdag po des de skad smras pas thams cad rdo rje 
[\[108a.3\]]sems dpa'i de kho na nyid du rnam par grol ba'i lam du gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i de kho na nyid ston pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba ba'i bdag po la 
[\[108a.4\]]dris pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de sems kyi de kho na nyid de gang gi spyod yul du gyur/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur gyi sa dang sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/_/
[\[108a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris pa/_kye gsang ba ba'i bdag po sems kyi de kho na nyid gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de gang dam 
[\[108a.6\]]pa rnams kyi spyod yul las ma gtogs pa gzhan dang thun mong ma lags na ni 'o na gang bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang sems kyi de kho na nyid la lta zhing sems kyi rgyud kun du btsal na gang de'i tshe nang gi sems kyang ma mthong /_phyi'i sems 
[\[108a.7\]]kyang ma mthong /_nang dang phyi'i sems kyang ma mthong /_gang phung po la sems ma mthong /_khams la ma mthong /_skye mched la ma mthong /_des sems ma mthong ba dang /_sems 'di ga las byung zhes bltas na de 'di ltar sems so/_/gang 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]dmigs pa yod pas na sems 'byung ngo /_/de yang 'di ltar sems so/_/dmigs pa de yang gzhan nam ci/_/sems dpa' de yang gzhan nam gang /_/dmigs pa de nyid sems yin nam/_/sems dpa' de nyid dmigs pa'am/_/gal 
[\[108b.2\]]te dmigs pa de yang gzhan/_/sems dpa' de'ang gzhan na ni de kho na nyid mi gcig ste gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/'on te gcig pa zhig yin na ni sems la sems kyis rjes su lta zhing sems kyis sems mthong ba mi rigs so/_/'di lta ste dper na ral gri 
[\[108b.3\]]des de nyid gcod mi nus pa dang /_sor mo'i rtse mo des de nyid la reg par mi nus pa bzhin sems de la sems des dmigs mi nus so zhes bltas na 'di ltar mthong ste/_gang rag ma las pa/_sems la gnas med pa/_rten med pa/_chad par 
[\[108b.4\]]ma yin/_rtag par ma yin/_/spungs par ma yin/_rgyu las ma byung /_rkyen gyis ma bskyed/_de las ma yin/_gzhan las ma yin/_de nyid ma yin/_gzhan ma yin/_rigs med pa/_rgyu med pa/_mi 'phro ba/_mi snang ba/_ngo bo nyid 
[\[108b.5\]]med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du mthong ngo /_/yang dag pa/_mi g.yo ba/_dben pa/_cung zad kyang ma mthong /_rnam par ma mthong /_mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog_/mi bskyod/_mi sems/_mi spro/_sems gzugs med pa/_gang byung ba yang 
[\[108b.6\]]gzugs med pa/_gang la gzugs med pas byang chub la yang gzugs med do/_/sems kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo/_/byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad do/_/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni de kho na nyid do/_/sems 'di ni 'di ltar 
[\[108b.7\]]myur ba/_rab tu myur ba/_mi gnas pa/_rgyu ba/_spre'u lta bu/_rlung lta bu/_smig rgyu lta bu/_chu'i rgyun lta bu/_mar me lta bu/_lus gzugs lta bu/_ring du 'gro ba/_gar yang mi g.yo ba/_slar log pa/_yul la gnas pa/_drug gi 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]spyod yul ba/_kun shes pa/_gcig tu thub pa/_mi 'byung ba/_thams cad 'byung ba/_zhi gnas pa/_tha dad pa gcig pa mi g.yeng ba/_kun du g.yeng ba sems dus gsum du mnyam par shes pa/_sems de kho na par 
[\[109a.2\]]shes pa/_ji ltar rang gi sems shes pa de ltar gzhan gyi sems kyang rab tu shes so/_/rang gi sems ji ltar stong pa de ltar thams cad kyi sems stong par rab tu shes so/_/rang gi sems mnyam par shes pa de bzhin du thams cad kyi sems 
[\[109a.3\]]mnyam par rab tu shes so/_/des chos thams cad mnyam par rab tu shes so/_/chos thams cad mnyam pas byang chub mnyam par rab tu shes so/_/des sems chos thams cad kyi dbyings su rab tu shes so/_/thams cad kyi dbyings de ni 
[\[109a.4\]]kun gyi thun mong ma yin no zhes sems la gnas pa sems la spyod pa/_sems la dbang ba sems la lta ba/_sems mthong ba sems ngo shes pa lags na gsang ba pa'i bdag po ci'i phyir dam pa 'ba' zhig gi spyod yul yin gyis pa rnams kyi spyod 
[\[109a.5\]]yul ma yin zhes smra/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po de de ltar yin mod kyi/_de dag thams cad nas thams cad du sems kyi de kho na nyid la rgyu'i mtshan nyid 'ba' zhig tu nges par zad kyi 'bras bu nyid du yongs su mi shes so/_/
[\[109a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di lta ste/_gang sa dang sa pa rnams ni dra ba bzhi'i rgyar yongs su chud pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gang dra ba chen po dang dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /_dra ba gcig pa'o/_/de yang byis pa rnams dang /_smyon pa rnams dang /_'du shes chung ba rnams dang /_
[\[109a.7\]]'du shes gcig pa rnams kho na ste/_gangs pa rnams ni sems rgyu 'ba' zhig las mi shes pa'i phyir 'du shes gcig pa ste/_de dag ni dra bar chud pa/_dra bas bcings pa sha dag pas 'bras bu nges par rnyed par shin tu dka' ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]zhe na/_lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar sems 'bras bu'i de kho na gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung du med pa/_rdo rje sems dpas kyang mtshan du med pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lta ci smos/_yang lang ka'i bdag pos dris 
[\[109b.2\]]pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po ci nyid kyis kyang sems 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid du nges pa de ma rnyed dam de skad ces dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po kho bos da dung nges pa ma rnyed pa'i phyir gzhan la bstan par rab tu dka'o/_/
[\[109b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyag gcig gi dgongs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa'o/_/zhes gsang ba pa'i bdag po des de skad ces smras pas/_thams cad byang chub la 'khrul pa'i ye rngam yongs su chad par gyur to/_/sangs 
[\[109b.4\]]rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las khyad par dam pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs 'gro ba lus kyi sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du gyur te 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye gsang ba 
[\[109b.5\]]pa'i bdag po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba dam pa ma nor ba de kho na nyid the tshom thams cad gcod pa 
[\[109b.6\]]lags na/_'bras bu de kho na nyid gsang ba ston mi spyod pa de shin tu ngo mtshar che ba ltar na bdag cag gis nam nges pa rnyed par 'gyur zhig gu zhes smras pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams 
[\[109b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ma rnyed kyi bar du bskal pa grangs med gsum snyed du dpag tu med pa'i dka' ba spyad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma mkhyen no/_/de ji lta zhe na/_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]ji lta ji ltar rgyud yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa byung ba dang 'byung ba yang de kho na nyid kyi nges pa ma rnyed kyi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ste/_'di ltar bskal pa bzang po 'di'i 'og tu mtha' 'khob kyi bskal pa'i rigs ngan drug 
[\[110a.2\]]cu 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags ldan zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu rigs ngan gyi bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma bkram pa lta bu la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung 
[\[110a.3\]]ngo /_/de'i 'og tu mun pa'i bskal pa sum brgya 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa mdzes ldan rgyan bya ba la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du mtha' thug pa med par sgron ma'i bskal pa dang mun pa'i bskal pa rtag par rgyun 
[\[110a.4\]]gyi 'khor mor 'dren mar 'byung ngo /_/de ltar na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis 'byung ngo /_/bskal pa bzang po 'di'i sngon rol du mun pa'i bskal pa brgya byung ngo /_/de'i sngon du bskal pa rdzogs ldan zhes bya ba la sangs 
[\[110a.5\]]rgyas bye ba phrag brgya byung ngo /_/de 'das pa'i sngon du mtha' 'khob kyi bskal pa brgya byung ngo /_/de 'das pa'i sngon du bskal pa bzang rgyan zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byung ngo /_/de 'das pa'i sngon du mun pa'i bskal pa lnga brgya 
[\[110a.6\]]byung ngo /_/de 'das pa'i sngon du bskal pa mthong dga' zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu byung ngo /_/de 'das pa'i sngon du mun pa'i bskal pa bdun brgya byung ngo /_/de 'das pa'i sngon du bskal pa dga' ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas stong phrag 
[\[110a.7\]]drug cu byung ngo /_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas par mun pa dang sgron ma'i bskal pa 'dren mar thog ma dang tha ma med par byung zhing 'byung ste/_gang sgron ma ji snyed pa byung zhing 'byung ba rnams kyang gsang sngags kyi nges pa de kho na nyid ma rnyed kyi bar du dpag 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]tu med pa'i dka' ba spyad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma mkhyen mi mkhyen mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gsang sngags kyi nges pa de kho na nyid rnyed ma thag par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen to/_/mkhyen no mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sngon gyi 
[\[110b.2\]]bskal pa bgrangs pa las kyang grangs med par 'das pa mang po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa na bskal pa chen po mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas sum khri sum stong byung ba'i dus na tha ma'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i 
[\[110b.3\]]bstan pa la rgyal rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs dang /_gdol pa'i rigs dang lnga las mchog chen po lnga 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_khye'u bde skyob zhes bya ba dang /_khye'u tra li ta zhes bya ba dang /_khye'u dpa' 
[\[110b.4\]]sbyin zhes bya ba dang /_khye'u las byin dang /_khye'u dum bur zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' ni khye'u bde skyob zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas ni khye'u tra li ta zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[110b.5\]]sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba ni khye'u dpa' sbyin zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ni khye'u las byin zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas don yod grub pa ni khye'u dum bur zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u de 
[\[110b.6\]]rnams kyis sangs rgyas kun du bzang po de la rnal 'byor mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi skabs na sems brgyad bskyed cing 'jig rten pa'i lam brgyad nas bgrod de 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa par gnas so/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas 
[\[110b.7\]]sum khri sum stong la the tshom bcad kyang nges pa ma rnyed do/_/las dang po pa'i skabs na sems gsum bskyed cing mtha' bcu chub nas rten pas gzhi'i sar gnas so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas bzhi khri bzhi stong la the tshom bcad kyang nges 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa ma rnyed do/_/rigs chen 'byed pa'i skabs su sems bzhi rdzogs te/_/mtha' bcu chub nas bsod nams ster bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas lnga khri lnga stong la the tshom bcad kyang nges pa ma rnyed do/_/yang dbugs chen phyin 
[\[111a.2\]]pa'i skabs su sems gcig rdzogs te/_mtha' bcu chub nas 'jigs pa lnga las 'das te brten nas khyad par 'gro ba'i sa par gnas so/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas drug khri drug stong la the tshom bcad pas phyogs tsam shes te dbugs phyin par gyur to/_/
[\[111a.3\]]de yang 'di ltar sgyu ma sbyong ba'i skyes bu de/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du/_/rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis/_/dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa ston/_/yang lung chen thob pa'i skabs su sems bdun rdzogs te lhan cig gnas pa'i 
[\[111a.4\]]dri ma dag pas ri bo las rgal te dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa par gnas so/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas bdun khri bdun stong las lung thos pas rtog chen la gnas so/_/de yang 'di lta ste/_de'i tshe skyes bu dam pa de/_'bras bu nyid la lam shes pas/_/
[\[111a.5\]]lam gyi yan lag bde rdzogs te/_/gzhan dag smin par bya ba'i phyir/_/ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs mchog sbyor/_/yang rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skabs su sems gsum bskyed cing mtha' drug chub nas gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i sa par gnas so/_/
[\[111a.6\]]de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri brgyad stong las lung bstan pa thos nas gdeng du gyur to/_/de yang 'di ltar/_de nas rgyal tshab skyes bu de/_/chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi/_/gdung 'tsho ba dga' ldan theg chen ston/_/mi gnas bcu dus cho 'phrul snang /_/
[\[111a.7\]]lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag ni rigs lngar skye ba blangs pa de nas kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa brjod pa las 'das pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dus na sangs rgyas lnga la byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyi bu lngar skyes pa ni 'di lta ste/_mdzes pa'i me tog dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal dang /_nor sbyin 'dzin dang /_zla tshes dpal dang /_kun la mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba lngar gyur te/_de 
[\[111b.2\]]dag las kyi dang po 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor par gyur pa nyid la yid la byed pa zhes bya ba thob bo/_/des nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i ltas mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor par gyur pa nyid la 'phro 'du gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob 
[\[111b.3\]]bo/_/des bdag nyid yi ge'i phreng bar snang ba'i ltas mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor par snang ba nyid la yongs su mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/des 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po ches gang bar spyod pa'i ltas 
[\[111b.4\]]mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor du snang ba nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/des seng ge dag la zhon te thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i ltas mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du snang 
[\[111b.5\]]ba nyid la kun du snang gi ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_/des nyi zla'i 'khor lo bskor bas thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar byed pa'i ltas mthong bar gyur to/_/lang ka'i bdag po de ltar gyur du zin kyang gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid kyi nges pa rnyed pa ni ma 
[\[111b.6\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lang ka'i bdag po gang las dang po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag rgyal tshab skyes bur gyur pa na skyes bu dam pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang /_skyes bu dam pa rdo rje rin chen dang /_skyes bu dam pa rdo rje chos dang /_skyes bu dam pa 
[\[111b.7\]]las kyi rdo rje dang /_skyes bu dam pa rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar zhing khams thams cad du grags so/_/de la la lar ni/_rgyal tshab skyes bu zhes bya bar brjod cing de ltar grags so/_/la lar ni srid pa tha ma pa zhes bya bar brjod cing grags so/_/la lar ni 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]sa chen po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar brjod cing grags kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dam pa da dung nyams su ma myong ste mnyam pa la 'jog dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa de dag gis nam mnyam pa 
[\[112a.2\]]la ma bzhag gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa nyams su ma myong nas yang dag pa'i rtogs pas dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyam par bzhag pa dang ma bzhag pa mi 
[\[112a.3\]]mnga' bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen na bdag cag gis bskal pa dpag tu med par dka' ba dpag tu med par bgyi ba thams cad rdzogs par bgyis kyang mnyam pa la ma bzhag gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa myong bar ma gyur pa 'di ngo mtshar lags 
[\[112a.4\]]so/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'di ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje snying po des bka' stsal pa/_kye skyes bu dam pa rnams gang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du lhun gyis grub par 'dod pa rnams 
[\[112a.5\]]kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gsum las khyed rnams kyis gang bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byas/_bsrung ba yongs su dag par byas su zin kyang da dung blo gros kun du chub par ma byas so/_/de bas na 
[\[112a.6\]]gdod ma nas dam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid la blo gros kun du chub par gyis shig dang /_de yongs su chub pa bzhin dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/_skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis gsol pa/_e ma'o 
[\[112a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag cag rnams la shin tu ngo mtshar zhing rmad du gyur pa/_dpag par dka' ba the tshom skye ba/_som nyi 'tshal bar bka' stsal na/_blo gros kun du chub par bgyid pa'i dam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ces bgyi ba gang lags bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_zhes gsol pa las/_sangs rgyas kun gyi bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid des bka' stsal pa/_kye skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid 
[\[112b.2\]]'di ni thabs che la sgo yangs/_tshegs chung la don che/_thag nye la brtag dka'/_nyen che la bsrung dka' ba'i phyir ngas khyed la phyin ci ma log par bstan par rab tu dka'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/_skyes bu dam pa de rnams rmag chad par 
[\[112b.3\]]rab tu ngus so/_/shin tu rab tu ngus nas gsang ba'i sgo bye bar gyur te gsang sngags kyi dngos po brgyad du yongs su shes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rgyud dag pa'i skye rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//
[\[112b.4\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das dam pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' des skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/_kye skyes bu dam pa rnams ma ngu shig_/sdug bsngal gyi gdung ba ma bskyed cig_/
[\[112b.5\]]khyed ci'i phyir ngu /_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid la skyes bu dam pa de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yong ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/_bdag cag gis 
[\[112b.6\]]btsal ba tshi chad par ma gyur tam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi blo gros ji ltar bgyi/_bdag cag rnams kyi bshes gnyen dam pa mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag gis dpag tu med pa ji snyed gcig tu dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad kyang 
[\[112b.7\]]yongs su chub par 'dod na da dung gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid ming tsam yang thos pa'i skal ba ma mchis na yod ji ltar lags/_de skad ces gsol pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]nyid des bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa rnams de skad ces ma zer cig_/gsang sngags ni kun gyi thun mong ma yin te/_don de kho na nyid ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi dgongs pa dam pa smrar med pa/_rtog dpyod thams cad dang 
[\[113a.2\]]bral ba 'di zhes mtshon du med pa/_brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba/_dpe dang bral ba nam mkhas kyang bsgrun du yod pa ma yin pa/_tshad med pa tshad dang bral ba/_tshad ma'am/_gtan tshigs sam/_
[\[113a.3\]]dpag pas mi dpogs te/_khyod kyis ji ltar ma shes ma thos pa de ltar gang rgyud yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang da dung gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid mngon par mtho ba/_mngon par ma rtogs/_mngon 
[\[113a.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid rnam par yongs su dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi dmigs shing btsal du med pa las bcu la gnas pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis 
[\[113a.5\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid dam pa de rang la yod par ma shes te chos nyid du 'jog cing dpyod pa dang ma bral/_sangs rgyas rnams ni snying po byang chub la mi rtog pa'i ngang du mi g.yo bar gnas te mngon par 'tshang 
[\[113a.6\]]mi rgya bar gnas na khyed ci'i phyir ngu bar byed/_de skad ces bka' stsal pas/_skyes bu dam pa de rnams dga' mgu rangs te dbugs phyin nas 'di snyam du sems so/_/ji ltar sngon du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang da dung 
[\[113a.7\]]gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid mngon du ma gyur na bdag cag la sogs pa lta ci smos/_yod ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa nyid kho na bas bdag cag gi blo gros 'di la chub par gor 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas skyes bu dam pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags dam pa de kho na nyid de ni gang yongs su brjod pa las 'das te gsung bar mi mnga' bas bstan 
[\[113b.2\]]cing brtag par rab tu dka' ba lags zhe na/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid ni blo gros chen po rnams kyi yul du nges shing the tshom thams cad gcod pa/_dam pa rnams kyi dam pa nyid lags pas na bdag cag gis blo gros nges par chub pa dam pa'i 
[\[113b.3\]]phyogs dgongs pa dam pa'i mnyam pa nyid du bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa las/_bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid des bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa rnams legs so/_/nges so/_/'di lta ste/_gsang sngags dam pa de kho na nyid de ni dpyod pa 
[\[113b.4\]]thams cad dang bral ba/_mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs pa/_sgro skur med pa/_blang dor med pa/_rgyu 'bras las 'das pa/_ye nas dag pa/_ye nas zin pa/_bya ba med pa/_btsal ba med pa/_bsgrub tu med pa/_brtsam du med pa/_
[\[113b.5\]]gzhan nas mi 'byung ba/_gnyen po med pa/_byed pa po med pa/_ma byas pa/_ma brtags pa/_bdag med pa/_ma bcos pa/_ma bslad pa/_de yin par nges pa/_ma nor ba/_ji bzhin pa/_ma 'gags pa/_ma skyes pa/_mi nub pa/_
[\[113b.6\]]mi rlag pa/_mi snang ba/_ma byung ba/_mi 'gro ba/_ye nas gnas pa/_kun la khyab pa/_ming med pa/_gzugs med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_tha snyad med pa/_bltar med pa/_gzung du med pa/_mtshon du med pa/_dpe med pa/_tshad 
[\[113b.7\]]med pa/_brtag tu med pa/_rtog ge las 'das pa/_dpag tu med pa/_bsam du med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_kun gyi 'byung gnas/_thams cad nas thams cad du btang snyoms chen po stong pa nyid rang gi rig pa rang byung ba kho na'o/_/
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pas/_skyes bu dam pa rnams chos thams cad blang dor med par chud de ngo mtshar skyes nas the tshom du gyur to/_/e ma'o bdag cag gis dam pa rnams las/_sngon du thos pa ltar na sngon gyi dam pa rnams 
[\[114a.2\]]ni byang chub blang ngo /_/nyon mongs pa dor ro/_/de ni blo gros yongs su chub pa'o zhes thos na skyes bu chen po 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang byang chub la gnyis su med pas blang dor med do/_/zhes gsungs pa ngo mtshar to/_/snyam du cang mi smra bar gnas so/_/
[\[114a.3\]]de nas rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid des skyes bu dam pa de rnams kyi yongs su rtog pa bsal ba'i ched du yang gsungs pa/_kye skyes bu dam pa rnams gang khyed the tshom yongs su za ba na nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin/_gang las byung /_byang chub 
[\[114a.4\]]kyi rang bzhin gang yin/_gang las byung /_nges par rtogs shig dang /_gang yongs su mthong ba nyid na the tshom chad par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsungs pas/_skyes bu dam pa de rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dang /_byang chub de'i rang bzhin gang 
[\[114a.5\]]yin/_gang las byung ba brtags na rang bzhin stong par mthong /_rtsa ba sems las byung bar mthong /_sems nyid ma byung /_ma skyes skye ba med/_ye ji bzhin pa/_rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa/_rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems dam pa kho 
[\[114a.6\]]na nyid du des par chud de sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa nyams su myong ba ni 'di lta ste/_sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad nam mkha' lta bur gyur to/_/mnyam par bzhag pa dang ma bzhag pa las 'das te tha ma'i dbugs phyin nas yang dag pa'i 
[\[114a.7\]]nges pa yongs su rnyed do/_rnyed par gyur to/_/kun du rab tu rnyed nas yang skyes bu dam pa de rnams rma ga chad par ngus so/_/yang rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid des mkhyen bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/_kye skyes bu dam pa khyed cag 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]ci'i phyir du/_de dag gis gsol ba/_bshes gnyen dam pa 'di lta ste/_lam gyi nang na nye lam pa/_/thabs kyi nang na dam pa 'di/_/sngon du ma thos skal ba chung /_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/yun gyi don srid 'di lta bu/_/don 
[\[114b.2\]]rag gzhan la ma lus par/_/gzhan la re stsol e ma'o 'khrul/_/bya ba'i las la sha thang bar/_/mtshan ma'i rjes su g.yeng spyos te/_/ngal chad don med tshig mtha' yas/_/bsdu bas ma 'dus don re chung /_/bshes gnyen dam pa 
[\[114b.3\]]de gnyis las/_/nges par rnyed pas dbugs chen 'byin/_/sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyings su grol/_/de nyid chen por lhun gyis grub/_/ces gsol te/_ngo mtshar gyi dga' ba chen po las ye shes kyi 'od nyi ma 'bum lta bur byung bas gangs 
[\[114b.4\]]pa rnams ni rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs/_don gyi che ba byung /_sa rnams kun du g.yos pas spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag ngo mtshar bar gyur te rang rang gi ston pa la gsol pa/_'di lta bu'i ltas ya mtshan can 'di ji lta bu zhig lags zhes zhus pa las so 
[\[114b.5\]]so'i ston pa dpag tu med pas so so'i 'khor dpag tu med pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag ltas chen po 'di ni gang la khyab chen po zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya 
[\[114b.6\]]ba theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya ba'i chos ston te/_sangs rgyas de ni the tshom thams cad gcod cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nges par sangs rgyas par lung ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam 
[\[114b.7\]]par gyur pas skyes bu dam pa lnga gang gsang sngags kyi nges pa ma rnyed pas yongs su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de dag nges pa'i the tshom bcad de lung ston pas de dag gi ltas yin no/_/zhes ston par gyur to/_/lang ka'i bdag po de ltar 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]na skyes bu dam pa de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi nyams rnyed ma thag chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab skyes bu dam pa zhes bya bar nges par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las dbugs chen po yongs su phyin pa'i 
[\[115a.2\]]le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di skad ces dri ba yongs su dris pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag dam pa rnams kyi zhing du ji ltar grags pa lags/_
[\[115a.3\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po skyes bu dam pa de dag ni dam pa rnams kyi zhing du gang chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal tshab tu gyur pa'i phyir/_rgyal tshab skyes bu zhes bya bar yongs su grags par gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lang ka'i
