[\[140a.5\]]rtag pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de nas de nyid blar byung byung bas/_/dam pa dag la rmongs par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/_/de tshe 
[\[140a.6\]]sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu 'gog la brtson par 'gyur/_/shin tu 'gog pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/'gags shing yongs su 'das par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[140a.7\]]pa'i gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/_/de tshe sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur/_/shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yis/_/'o dod 'bod par ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas 'phos pa'i sems can de/_/
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]bag chags las kyis mtshams sbyar nas/_/shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur/_/blo yang bdud kyis byin brlabs nas/_/dug nad rims dang phra men ma/_/gnod pa'i zug rngu gzer mda' 'phro/_/bdud dang log 'dren rnam thar 'tshe/_/shin 
[\[140b.2\]]tu gtum rngam ma rungs pas/_'jig rten gsum dag 'jig byed cing /_/dam tshig dag la za ba dang /_/dam pa'i chu bo rka bzlog ste/_/lha mi 'jig rten 'pho bar byed/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin 
[\[140b.3\]]gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/_/de tshe sems can thams cad ni/_/log par lta la gnas par 'gyur/_/lta ba shin tu log pa yis/_/mnar med dmyal ba chen por ltung /_/de nas gal te slar byung na/_/dam 
[\[140b.4\]]pa'i lam nyid chad par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/_/de tshe sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu brkam zhing 'jungs par 
[\[140b.5\]]'gyur/_/shin tu gdungs 'jungs brkam pa yis/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gshin rje'i khams su lhung /_/de nas de nyid slar byung bas/_/shin tu skem po dbul por gyur/_/bkres skom shin tu gdungs pa yis/_/phan tshun gsod cing 'joms par 
[\[140b.6\]]'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/_/de tshe sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu le los g.yeng bar 'gyur/_/shin tu 
[\[140b.7\]]g.yeng ba'i le lo yis/_/mi khom gnas su ltung bar 'gyur/_/de nas de nyid slar byung bas/_/bskal pa gsum gyi bskal par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba/_/de tshe sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu gti mug rmongs par 'gyur/_/shin tu gti mug rmongs pa yis/_/gti mug byol song nyid du ltung /_/de nas de nyid slar byung 
[\[141a.2\]]bas/_/mthong snang lam yang chad par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/_/'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/_/de tshe sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu chags 
[\[141a.3\]]pas myos par gyur/_/shin tu chags pas myos pa yis/_/mngal gyi grong khyer nyid du ltung /_/de nas de nyid slar byung bas/_/'dod pa'i me yis gdung bar 'gyur/_/zhes thams cad du grag go/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 
[\[141a.4\]]'das pa sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po de ltar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]drag po des mi gang ji snyed pa dbang du gyur pa'i che ba bcom zhing /_e ma'o dbang phyug 
[\[141a.5\]]bdag las su dag che su dag yod ces nyid la dam pa dang /_lang ka yul gyi grong rdal mtsho rko rka thang mar gyi gling byan lag mchongs kyi rim la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse zhes bya ba na lang ka'i mnga' bdag srin po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas 
[\[141a.6\]]thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i slob mar gyur pa/_mthu dang rtsal rmad du byung zhing ngo mtshar che ba/_blo gros yongs su chub pa/_thabs rgya mtsho 'dra ba sprin lta bu 'byung ba zhig 'jig rten na che'o zhes grags pa las/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bya'i gshog pa can 
[\[141a.7\]]de rab tu 'khrugs 'khams nas ru tra'i me dpung du 'bar nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang 'phur rtsal gyis byan lag mchongs pa'i ri'i rtse mo la babs nas nga rgyal gyi gtum skad du ru tra ma tra ma ra tra zhes bsgrags pas/_lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdal shig shig/_
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]rab tu shig shig_/yam yom du gyur pas lang ka'i srin po kun dang srin mo kun kyang skrag cing dngangs nas/_e ma'o 'di ji ltar zhig mig rtsa rig rig dngangs yed yed gnas pa dang /_gnod sbyin bya'i gshog pa can gtum rngam 'khrugs pa 
[\[141b.2\]]zhig bdag cag gi 'khras sa na gnas pa mthong zhing thos par gyur to/_/de nas lang ka'i mnga' bdag chen po la sogs pa srin po'i tshogs kyis dmag gi tshogs kyi bsdu ba byas te gzhom par 'bad cing 'bad pa las/_yang srin po bya'i gshog 
[\[141b.3\]]pa can des srin po'i tshogs bag 'khum pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon du byas nas/_nga ni dbang phyug chen po ste/_/rgyal chen ris bzhi nga yi g.yog_/lha srin sde brgyad nga yi bran/_/gsang ba mchog gi bdag yin pas/_/su zhig 
[\[141b.4\]]nga la 'gran zla yod/_/ru tra ma tra ma ra tra zhes nga rgyal gyi gtum skad bsgrags pa las srin po zil gyis non zhing bag 'khums nas/_la la ni 'di ni srin po'i khams rgyal bar byed pa zhig ste bdag cag gi gtso bo'i 'os so zhes sgrogs/_la la ni 'di ni 
[\[141b.5\]]'jig rten 'jig par byed pa zhig ste bdag cag gi gnyen por 'gyur ba zhig go zhes sgrogs/_la la dag 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i dbang phyug chen po zhig go zhes sgrogs/_la la dag 'di ni mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi tshogs bdag go zhes sgrogs srin po'i 
[\[141b.6\]]rgyal po lang ka'i mnga' bdag ni 'di ni 'byung po'i bu gtogs 'dod can zhes bya ba yin te/_'jig rten gsum skrag pa de kho na nyid ma gtogs pa/_thams cad rlag cing dbang du byed pa log pa'i tshogs bdag ste/_'di gzhan gyis mi thul te/_'di'i 
[\[141b.7\]]gnyen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdzad de sprul pa rdo rje can gyis btul nas nges pa dam par bkod de/_yang dag par lung ston pa zhig pas 'di'i rgyus gsang sngags dam pa'i nges pa theg pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]bar 'gyur nges te/_bdag cag kyang 'di'i g.yog tu byas nas sangs rgyas rdo rje snying po'i zhal mthong zhing gsang sngags dam pa'i nges pa rnyed par 'gyur bas 'di la nges par 'dun pa 'dun cig ces bsgo bas/_srin po'i tshogs rnams yi 
[\[142a.2\]]rangs te rang gi sde dpon ci smra ba mi 'dor bar de ltar 'dun pas na kun srin po bya'i gshog pa can de'i g.yog tu dong ste kun gyis smras pa/_bdag cag kyang dbang phyug chen po kho na nyid ltar 'dun no/_/zhes grags te gtso bo dam par 'dzin to/_/des de 
[\[142a.3\]]dag 'khor du 'dzin par byas so/_/de nas yang srin po bya'i gshog pa can de srin po de'i ded dpon ma tang ka ru tra zhes bya bar grags pa de nga rgyal gyi che ba bcom ste bdag las che ba gang zhig yod yang su zhig yin ru tra ma tra ma ra tra zhes sgra sgrogs pa las/_
[\[142a.4\]]lha'i ded dpon ma tang ka ru na zhes bya ba mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thabs dang che ba khyad par du byung ba de dpags so zhes grags pa las/_bdud ru tra nag po de shin tu 'khams 'khrugs nas nga rgyal gyi gtum skad bsgrags/_rang gi rdzu 'phrul dang 'phur rtsal 
[\[142a.5\]]gyis ma tang ka ru na'i gnas su babs te yang sad par dzams na/_ja zha mar sad pa mi 'dra nas lus can yin pas 'ud nas 'thabs 'thabs su byung ba'i ngad la tsha grang dbugs ham nas nad kyi mtshon cha spros nas kho na de'i lus la khyab ste/_lus 
[\[142a.6\]]me dbal nag po'i 'brum pas gang nas mi bzod pa'i zug rngus gdungs te kho na ngo bo de 'ud thabs su bsad do/_/kho na de'i bam 'dzam bu'i gling du han pa las dge gnas kyi yul brgyad du snang ngo /_/'ud nas kho na nyid bsad pa'i khyo mo 
[\[142a.7\]]dang bu 'khor rnams ni gnod sbyin bya'i gshog pa can de'i 'khor du jen/_lha ma yin dang /_sha za dang /_ro langs ril bdud de'i sar jen/_rgyal po bzhi gang gi skyabs su brgyugs kyang yongs su ma thar bar de'i bran du jen/_brgya 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_drag po la sogs pa kun kyang gang gi skyabs su brgyugs kyang ma thar bar de'i bran du jen/_de dag gi khyo mo ril yang phrogs nas la la ni khyo mor byas/_la la ni slas su byas/_la la ni byi 
[\[142b.2\]]mor byas/_la la ni mdza' mor byas/_la la ni bran mor byas/_la la ni pho nya dang mngag par byas/_lha mi yongs su srid brlag nas thams cad nag po bkrag med kyi khams su gyur to/_/de yang 'di ltar grags shing grags te grags 
[\[142b.3\]]par gyur to/_/nag po khyung gshog 'phur rtsal can/_/gtum rngam shin tu ma rungs pa/_/mi sdug gdong mi sdug gzugs dang /_/mi snyan sgra yi tsham ngam dang /_/sha spungs rus spungs 'bu dang rnag_/khrag dang bshang gci'i khu ba la/_/
[\[142b.4\]]longs spyod byed cing rtag tu 'tsho/_/log pa'i sde dpon drag po des/_/'di na lha mi'i srid brlag nas/_/lha yi sde dpon ka ru na/_/kho na ngo bo nyid bsad nas/_/'khor yang rang gi phru mar byas/_/gdug pa'i zug rngu mer 'bar bas/_/kun kyang 
[\[142b.5\]]sde dpon bzhi la dong /_/de dag spu zing rab 'jigs par/_/dbang po dag la skyabs su dong /_/de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha/_/tshangs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong /_/tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas/_/gtogs 'dod la ni skyabs su dong /_/
[\[142b.6\]]tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha dbang bcas/_/drag po'i skyabs su nye bar dong /_/tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang po dag_/shin tu skrag cing 'jigs 'gyur te/_/rdo rje can la skyabs su dong /_/de bzhin gang la skyabs yod par/_/nye bar brgyugs 
[\[142b.7\]]kyang ma thar bar/_/'jigs byed de yi bran du jen/_/zhes thams cad du grags par gyur to/_/'ud nas bdud ru tra nag po lta zhig_/lha mi g.yo 'gul thams cad dbang du mdzad de/_lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdal mtsho rko rka thang mar byan lag 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]mchongs kyi ri bam ri thod pa mkhar zhes bya bar 'khras te/_bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ni phug tu btsugs/_bdud kyi ru mtshon ni sgor phyar te rang gi phru mas yongs su bskor/_drag po rang gi rdzu 'phrul bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul gyis ri 
[\[143a.2\]]rab mdzub mo'i rtse la bzhag ste/_spyi bo la 'gying bag tu bskor zhing nga rgyal gyi gtum skad sgrogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_ru tra ma tra ma ra tra sa khams na bdag las su zhig che gang zhig yod/_e ma'o sngon dpal shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas 'chi bdag 
[\[143a.3\]]gi bdud btul ba'i tshe de'i bstan pa la byung ba'i mchog chen po nyan thos rnams kyis thams cad zhi bar lhan pa'i smra bas smras te/_nga'i bka' nyon cig ces zer ba las kyang bu chung go zu 'phrag pa la khol la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar nos shig 
[\[143a.4\]]ces byas nas ma nyan nas des kyang bdag dbang du byed ma nus so/_/de'i drung na dpal rdo rje snying po ngag gi dbang phyug lha zhig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul nas hri zhes dbang rgyud du nyan na/_kho na nyid kyis tha kha brdab pa byas nas 'grun bu khyod kyang 
[\[143a.5\]]bde bar nos shig ces bsgo bas de yang thag khos te slar jen no/_/gnam rim pa bcu bzhi na dpal rdo rje snying po lha zhig 'gran gyi zla med par thos nas de yang bdag dbang du byas la thams cad 'ub la rjen rban zhes sgrogs shing 'gran gyi zla med 
[\[143a.6\]]rje btsan gcig pu nyid du lta'o/_/ji lta ji ltar thar pa nag po gang yin pa ru tra nag por smin par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gang thub dka' gzhon nu de ni snying po byang chub gang na bar rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid du gyur to/_/gang dan bag de ni de'i 
[\[143a.7\]]tshe de'i dus na rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba nyid du gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las ru tra nag po'i spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//bam po 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]bzhi par zug pa/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub gang na bar 'dus nas stong pa nyid du bshig nas skyes bu dam pa stong pa nyid la snang bar mdzad de/_de nyid kyi sgra de nyid la grag pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi zhing 
[\[143b.2\]]khams kyi bya ba yongs rdzogs par ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma rdzogs par ci'i phyir byang chub par bya snyam/_tha dad du rnam par snang bar ma mdzad par ci'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par byang chub 
[\[143b.3\]]par bya snyam/_de skad ces grag pa las stong pa nyid de las 'di skad du grag go/_/kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don gang gi dbang gis zhing khams kyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang tha dad 
[\[143b.4\]]du rnam par snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/_de skad du grag pa las/_yang thams cad kyi de kho na nyid las bskul ba gsum gyis bskul ba'i dang po 'di skad du grag go/_/stong nyid mi g.yo nam mkha' la/_/mi bskyod bde bar gshegs mdzad 
[\[143b.5\]]pa/_/mi dmigs mi rtog de bzhin nyid/_/rtog pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzod/_/ces grag go/_/de la yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/mi rtog ngang las rtag nyid du/_/brtags pas stong pa gang byung ba/_/de nyid rtog pa 
[\[143b.6\]]chen po ste/_/gang mi rtog pa rtog pa'i rgyu zhes grag go/_/yang thams cad kyi de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi snying po las/_/rang bzhin kun du snang ba'i 'od/_/yongs la khyab pa snying rje'i yul/_/mtha' yas rgyal 
[\[143b.7\]]srid skyed par mdzod/_/ces grag go/_/yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/kun 'byung kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings/_/ma skyes mi 'gag kun du snang /_/smra bsam rjod med yul las 'das/_/mtha' yas mtha' 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]yas bskyed pa'i yum/_/zhes grag go/_/yang thams cad kyi de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/tha dad rnam par snang mdzad na/_/gsung gi phyag rgya'i ye shes las/_/rgyal ba rnams ni yi ger snang /_/yi ge'i ye shes 
[\[144a.2\]]skyed par mdzod/_/ces grag go/_/yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/de nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/_/rang byung ye shes mu~M du gsal/_/sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/_/sna tshogs yi ge hU~M du snang /_/rgyal ba'i yi ge'i rang 
[\[144a.3\]]bzhin te/_/phyag rgya yi ge oM la sogs/_/thams cad yi ge'i rang bzhin te/_/ma skyes gsang ba'i yi ge a/_/zhes grag go/_/yang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/ye shes pha rol phyin rdzogs pas/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[144a.4\]]rig pa'i sgo mtshon pa/_/thugs kyi rtags snang snang ba mdzad/_/rnam grol ye shes bskyed par mdzod/_/ces grag go/_/yang skyes pu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni/_/rtag tu rnam rtog med las 'byung /_/
[\[144a.5\]]mi rtog rnam grol ye shes thugs/_/rtog la rnam rtog mtshan mar snang /_/zhes grag go/_/yang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/stong nyid mi rtog me long las/_/ma skyes mi 'gag gzugs snang ba/_/mkha' la 'ja' snang 
[\[144a.6\]]ji bzhin du/_/dbyings las phyag rgyar bzhengs su gsol/_/zhes grag go/_/yang skyes bu dam pa de nyid las 'di skad du grag go/_/de bzhin nyid du mi dmigs kyang /_/rang bzhin kun du snang ba'i dbyings/_/ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pas na/_/
[\[144a.7\]]phyag rgya'i gzugs mchog rnam par snang /_/zhes grag go/_/de ltar bskul ba dang po des yongs su rdzogs par bskul bas skyes bu dam pa de kho na nyid de stong pa nyid kyi dbyings de las stong pa nyid kyi sku rnam par snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar chu zla'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]snang ba'am/_/nam mkha' la 'ja' snang ba'i tshul du byung nas gang ma nges pa'i ye shes kyi gnas pas gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gnyis pa 'dis nges par bskul ba ni 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin ma byung ma bcos 
[\[144b.2\]]de bzhin nyid/_/ye nas mi g.yo bde ba chen po'i ngang /_/btsal zhing g.yo ba 'di la ci yang med/_/ye shes dbyings nyid tshig gi tha snyad de/_/de nyid dngos dang dngos min 'byung gnas nyid/_/cis kyang mi tshugs mi chod mi shigs pa'i/_/
[\[144b.3\]]ye nyid ji bzhin bde mchog mi g.yo ba/_/rdo rje sems mchog nam mkha'i snying po che/_/dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bshes gnyen po/_/'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas/_/kun gyi rang bzhin me long 'od po che/_/rgyal 
[\[144b.4\]]ba mtha' yas skyed pa'i yab yum mdzod/_/gang dag byang chub snying por mtshungs pa yi/_/rang dag dbyings las ma g.yos byang chub sems/_/gang du dang po rnam dag sangs rgyas kun/_/khams gsum nas byung rdo rje snying po'i lus/_/mtha' yas 
[\[144b.5\]]rtog las yi ge sna tshogs sprul/_/sras kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil/_/gzugs skur bstan nas nyon mongs sbyang du gsol/_/gang du dang po rdo rje snying po ni/_/khams gsum nas byung bde chen lhun gyis grub/_/gtum thung gdug 
[\[144b.6\]]pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/_/dri med sna tshogs blos ni hU~M du sprul/_/'od zer tshul gyi phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil/_/sngon gyi thugs dam smon lam dbang gis na/_/cis kyang mi bskyod gzugs sku bstan du gsol/_/gang du dang po rnam par 
[\[144b.7\]]snang mdzad ni/_/khams gsum nas byung cir yang snang bar mdzad/_/rmongs byed mun pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/_/rnam dag byang chub blos ni o~M du sprul/_/gzugs mang tshul gyis phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil/_/sngon gyi smon lam 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]thugs dam dbang gis na/_/cir yang snang ba'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol/_/gang du dang po yon tan 'byung gnas ni/_/khams gsum nas byung yid bzhin rin po che/_/'dod pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/_/
[\[145a.2\]]rnam dag 'byung gnas blos ni swa~M du sprul/_/rin chen phreng bas mdzes par bskor ba'i dkyil/_/sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na/_/'dod pa kun 'byung gzugs sku bstan du gsol/_/gang du dang po 'od dpag med pa ni/_/khams gsum 
[\[145a.3\]]nas byung gsung rab snang mtha' yas/_/chags pas rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/_/rnam dag dri med blos ni a~M du sprul/_/gsung snyan yi ge phreng bas bskor ba'i dkyil/_/sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na/_/sna tshogs ston pa'i 
[\[145a.4\]]gzugs sku bstan du gsol/_/gang du dang po gdon mi za ba ni/_/khams gsum nas byung sna tshogs cir yang mdzad/_/bya ba rmongs pa thabs kyis grol mdzad phyir/_/rnam dag nan tan blos ni ha~M du sprul/_/mdzad pa gar gyi phreng bas bskor ba'i 
[\[145a.5\]]dkyil/_/sngon gyi smon lam thugs dam dbang gis na/_/thams cad mdzad pa'i gzugs sku bstan du gsol/_/zhes bskul ba gnyis pa des yongs su rdzogs par bskul bas chos nyid sgyu ma las ye shes sgyu ma'i sku snang ba ni ji lta ji ltar me long gi 
[\[145a.6\]]dbyings su bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin du ye shes rang snang bar gnas pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba gsum pa 'dis mngon du rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs par bskul ba ni 'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid du gshegs 
[\[145a.7\]]pa khyod/_/'jig rten mngon rdzogs rgyas mdzod la/_/snying po byang chub ji bzhin pa/_/sems can don du snang bar mdzod/_/'jig rten khams ni dpag med du/_/ji snyed bde bar gshegs pa yi/_/sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang /_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]mtha' dag don du rnam snang mdzad/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa la/_/gzhan gyis phan pa'i sman ma mchis/_/yang dag bdud rtsi'i sman sbyar bas/_/'khor ba'i gcod rnying sbyang mdzad pa/_/sdug bsngal zug rngu'i nad sel ba'i/_/sman pa che 
[\[145b.2\]]mchog gtso bor gshegs/_/nad do cog gi dgrar gyur pa/_/bdud rtsi sman gyi rgya mtsho yis/_/log pa'i nad dgras gzir ba yi/_/nad pa'i tshogs kun bslang bar mdzod/_/rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i skyes bu nyid/_/snying po byang chub la dgongs la/_/
[\[145b.3\]]'od zer snang ba rgyas bkye ste/_/mun pa bsal ba'i dgongs pa mdzod/_/kye ma skyes bu don grub pa/_/bya ba byas shing byed pa byas/_/khur bor bdag don rjes thob pa/_/gang 'dir 'dul ba'i dus la bab/_/gtsang ma'i gnas mchog 'og min 
[\[145b.4\]]gyi/_/chos kyis mthong ba'i gzhal yas su/_/rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur gshegs te/_/snying po bskul ba'i bya ba mdzod/_/ces rnam par bskul bas/_/ji lta ji ltar sprin mthongs nas/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba ltar/_/mi 
[\[145b.5\]]g.yo ba yi dbyings nyid las/_/gzugs sku nyi ma shar ba ste/_/chos kyi mtho ba zhes bya ba'i gzhal yas su rnam par snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi cho 'phrul bskul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu 
[\[145b.6\]]gsum pa'o//_//de nas chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs longs spyod pa de rdo rje go 'byed yongs su bsdu ba'i mtshan ma mdzad pas mtha' thug pa med pa'i zhing khams stug po bkod pa nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba kun nas yongs su 'dus par gyur to/_/
[\[145b.7\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas snying rje yongs su rol pa'i tshogs kyis gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/_kye kye sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po 'byung ba'i tshogs/_/snang ngo kun du rab tu 'dir 'byung ba/_/srid pa log pa'i gdug pa can/_/'khor ba'i sa 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bon rtsub mos 'phangs/_/sdug bsngal chen po'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams/_/las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir byung /_/drag po log pa'i dka' thub kyis/_/srid pa gsum gyi bdag por smin/_/dregs pa ru tra'i gdug dpal gyis/_/
[\[146a.2\]]'gro rnams mthar rlog 'joms byed 'di/_/gdul ba'i zhing mchog rmad du byung /_/snying rje'i bdag po kun 'dus nas/_/las ngan las kyi rgyun bcad de/_/bde chen sa la gzhag par rigs/_/zhes bgros so/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje'i gdung dang 
[\[146a.3\]]sde'i tshogs kyis gcig par bgros pa/_/kye ma'o 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar/_/da ltar dus 'di nyid du byung /_/lung log mngon pa'i ri bor bsregs/_/rang rgyud bsregs pa'i bslad pa can/_/bdud kyis 
[\[146a.4\]]byin gyis brlabs pa yi/_/glang chen myos pa drag po che/_/shin tu mi bzad dug chen gyis/_/'o dod 'bod par gsad brlag pas/_/ro gling dur khrod mthar zhen pa/_/ji lta'i thabs kyis phan par 'gyur/_/zhes bgros so/_/sangs rgyas nor bu'i 
[\[146a.5\]]gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/_nag po'i gdug pa smyon pa 'di/_/ji ltar de dgar bzhag 'gyur na/_/mi bzad dug mtsho chu rlabs kyis/_/nag po'i khams su rgyas 'gyur bas/_/dam pa rnams kyi rgyun gcod cing /_/
[\[146a.6\]]nyi ma sgron ma 'jig par 'gyur/_/de tshe las kyi mun pa yis/_/thams cad mun nag smag tu 'khyams/_/zhes bgros so/_/sangs rgyas pad+mo'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/_gang 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung 
[\[146a.7\]]ba/_/las kyi 'khor los 'phangs pa yi/_/blo gros log pa'i ru tra de/_/snying po dbyings nas byung ba ni/_/skyes bu dam pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/bdud kyis bdud btul gnyer bkod ltar/_/da ltar 'di tshe byung ba ni/_/dug 'gyur brtsegs pa'i ri bo 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]'di/_/rdo rje khros pa'i tho chen gyis/_/brlag cing gzhom pa'i dus la bab/_/ces bgros so/_/sangs rgyas gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis mgrin gcig tu mthun par bgros pa/_khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug chen po/_/thar med mi bzad 
[\[146b.2\]]nad kyis zin/_/rtag chad khams su shi ba'i ro/_/lam log lam stor dmus long 'di/_/ye shes khros pa'i cho 'phrul las/_/'bar 'phro 'khrug pa'i gzer chen gyis/_/smag chen mun nag gzhom pa'i phyir/_/ye shes can gyi spyod yul 
[\[146b.3\]]nas/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus te/_/ye shes rdo rje khros pa yi/_/cho 'phrul sprin phung gtibs pa'i sa/_/mthun 'jug byis pa'i cha byad kyis/_/rnam par rol pa'i mngon spyod kyis/_/dug chen rgya mtsho ma bskams na/_/'dir ni snying rje rkyen 
[\[146b.4\]]'tsham mam/_/chos nyid snying rje chen po yi/_/gang 'dir dam tshig dam pa'i phyir/_/dngos po bzhi yi bstan pa mdzad/_/ces bgros so/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'dus pa chen pos rnam par bgros pa'i le'u ste 
[\[146b.5\]]nyi shu bzhi pa'o//_//de ltar 'dus pa chen po'i bka' bgros yongs su chad nas las rnam bzhi gang gis gdul ba'i skabs la bab par dgongs pa yis gang de rnam par brtag pa'i phyir thub dka' gzhon nu rdo rje snying por gnas gyur pa'i 
[\[146b.6\]]'od zer las sprul pa thub pa'i dbang por byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sprul pa de la bsgo ba/_thub pa'i dbang po dus 'di lags/_/ji bzhin bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/dngos po bzhi yi me dpung bzlog_/byang chub snying po bskul 
[\[146b.7\]]bar mdzod/_/ces yongs su bskul nas thub pa'i dbang po des dur khrod kyi bdag po de'i phru mar snang bar mdzad nas thams cad zhi ba'i smra bar smras pa las/_dur khrod kyi bdag po des tha'i kha brdabs nas 'di skad du smras so/_/bu chung khyod kyis bdag 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]thul ba ma yin te/_sngon nga gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon drag po zhes bya bar gyur pa na kho na nyid lta bu mang po byung nas nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig_/nga'i bka' nyon cig zer ba las kyang ma mnyan na da khyod kyi dbang du bdag ga la jen/_/
[\[147a.2\]]go zu se mo dor gzod la rang gi dka' thub la bde bar mnos shig ces bsgo nas bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa la zhugs nas phyir log go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 
[\[147a.3\]]yang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i sprul pa kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su bsgo ba/_rgyal ba kun gyi chos sku pad+ma'i gdung /_/chos rje 'od dpag med pa rdo rje chos/_/spyan ras gzigs sprul hri las rngam chen ston/_/ngag gi dbang 
[\[147a.4\]]phyug rta gdong zhal gyis gnon/_/zhes yongs su bskul bas sprul pa rdo rje rta gdong chen pos dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i gnas su snang bar mdzad nas ha ha hi hi hri hu lu hu lu hu lu zhes lhang lhang tsher tsher rta skad drag po'i dbyangs phyung ba las/_srid po'i 
[\[147a.5\]]phru ma yongs su spa zhum zhing bag 'khums pa tsam du gyur yang dur khrod kyi bdag po kho na ngo bo des rang gi nga rgyal gtum skad du ru tra ma tra ma tra zhes bsgrags nas rnam par brjid phyung ste 'gyings pa las zil gyis ma non te slar kho na ngo bo des slar bsgo ba/_
[\[147a.6\]]mgrin bu sngon yang khyod lta bus bdag ma non pas khyod kyis bdag rjen pa ma yin te nyid kyi gnas gang yin par bde bar nos shig ces tha'i kha brdab pa byas te/_yang bdud kyi dngos po bzhis yongs su zhams pas gtsang ma ris kyi 'phags pa rtog pa 
[\[147a.7\]]skyes nas phyir log snyam pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i lta bu la gtsang sme mi mnga' bas ma log par slar han pa las kho na ngo bo des thim par dzams nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngag gi dbang phyug des mthun 'jug tu kho na dga' lhar thim du han 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des dbu kho na'i gtsug tu phyung zhabs kho na'i mthil du byung nas rdo rje hU~M zhes rgyas pas lus kun du rgyas te kho na des ma bzod pa'i nga ro 'od kyi sgra mthar bton pa ni a tsa ma'o/_/ci mdzad myur bar mdzod ces bton no/_/de 
[\[147b.2\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kho na de'i sgrib pa sbyang ba mdzad nas bde ba kho nar kho na'i gtsug tu phyung ste nam mkha' la rta'i dbyangs phyung bas srin po'i tshogs bur mer thor shug tu gyur te zil gyis non cing bag 'khums nas gsol pa/_dpa' bo chen po'i 
[\[147b.3\]]'bangs su mchi/_/ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces zhus pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa/_ngas ni khyod ma btul gyis khyod kyi gnyen po rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang gis dbang bskur ba shin tu 
[\[147b.4\]]gtum rngam 'khrug pa ma rungs shing mi bzad pa bdud kyi bdud chen po 'jigs byed 'bar ba zhig 'byung gis de la skyabs su dong cig ces gsungs te/_chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du mi dmigs par gshegs so/_/de nas gsang ba 'dus pa'i de bzhin 
[\[147b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po rnam par bgros nas phrin las bzhi yi sgo gang gis gdul ba'i skabs la bab pa brtags na/_gang zhi rgyas kyis 'dul ba mi 'dra nas dbang drag gis 'dul bar bka' bgros dam par nges par bcad 
[\[147b.6\]]pa'i mdo yongs su gsung ba ni 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol spyod pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu 'gog pas zhi ba la/_/khros pas phan par mi 'gyur te/_/rnal 'byor ma bcos de nyid las/_/zhi 
[\[147b.7\]]bar de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod/_/rnal 'byor tshul can zhi bas kyang /_/srid pa'i myu gu 'gag nus na/_/rnal 'byor yod med stong pa'i mthus/_/'gog pa bslang ba smos ci dgos/_/shin tu rdo skams rlan pa la/_/gang du 'gog rnams 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]bslang ba'i phyir/_/'gag med stong pa'i chos nyid las/_/sna tshogs mi 'gog ji bzhin mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs 
[\[148a.2\]]pa/_shin tu stong pa rgyun chad la/_/dngos pos phan par mi 'gyur te/_/rgyun gyi byang chub stong nyid las/_/med 'gyur de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod/_/stong nyid tshul can stong pas kyang /_/ci yang med par gnas 'gyur na/_/med pa las 
[\[148a.3\]]byung rnal 'byor mthus/_/mthar zad mu zlog smos ci dgos/_/shin tu rgyun chad bzlog pa dang /_/gang du med las skyes pa'i phyir/_/rgyun dang bcas pa'i stong nyid la/_/che yon rgyun gyi 'chad par mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de 
[\[148a.4\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu ther zug rtag pa la/_/med pas phan par mi 'gyur te/_/snying po byang chub de nyid las/_/bdag nyid chen por thams cad mdzod/_/mi 
[\[148a.5\]]'gyur tshul can rtag pas kyang /_/dngos po brtan g.yor byed nus na/_/bdag nyid chen por lhun grub mthus/_/ther zug zlog pa smos ci dgos/_/bdag tu zhen pa zlog pa dang /_/dngos 'dzin rka mgo bsgyur ba'i phyir/_/bdag med rtag pa 
[\[148a.6\]]chos nyid las/_/byed med rang bzhin nyid du mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la/_/zhi bas phan par mi 
[\[148a.7\]]'gyur te/_/shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las/_/khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzod/_/khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang /_/'jig rten gsum dag skrag nus na/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis/_/khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/_/
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]gdul dka' ma lus gdul ba dang /_/dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/_/'bar ba chen po gar dgu las/_/dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying po de kho na nyid nges pa 
[\[148b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu log par zhen pa la/_/bden pas phan par mi 'gyur te/_/gsang chen sbyor ba'i ldem dgongs las/_/thams cad mthun 'jug nyid du mdzod/_/mdzad spyod tshul can spyod pas 
[\[148b.3\]]kyang /_/thams cad bka' zlog byed nus na/_/thugs rje mthun 'jug mdzad spyod kyis/_/lam log drang srong smos ci dgos/_/dngos pos dngos po dgrol ba dang /_/dug gis dug nad bsal ba'i phyir/_/thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i/_/
[\[148b.4\]]mdzad pa gar gyi phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu 'jungs shing brkam pa la/_/btang bas phan par mi 'gyur 
[\[148b.5\]]te/_/med la mi zad kun 'byung las/_/thams cad mi zad nor bur mdzod/_/dka' thub tshul can 'gags pas kyang /_/tshe gcig 'tsho bar byed nus na/_/med la 'dod dgur 'byung ba yis/_/khams gsum gdung ba smos ci dgos/_/'jungs 
[\[148b.6\]]pa tshim par bya ba dang /_/yongs su gdung ba bsal ba'i phyir/_/theg chen gsang ba'i longs spyod las/_/nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs 
[\[148b.7\]]kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu le lo g.yeng ba la/_/bskul bas brtson par mi 'gyur te/_/bya bcol med pa'i chos nyid las/_/thams cad bya ba med par mdzod/_/mi g.yo'i tshul can gnas pas kyang /_/dam pa'i las 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]lam gcod byed na/_/bya bral mi g.yo bde chen pos/_/'jig rten g.yeng ba smos ci dgos/_/mi khom lam rgyud bcad pa dang /_/le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra gzhom phyir/_/btang snyoms rnal 'byor chen po las/_/bya med gnas 
[\[149a.2\]]par phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bka' bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu gti mug rmongs pa la/_/bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur te/_/khyad par cir 
[\[149a.3\]]yang mtshungs pa las/_/thams cad gti mug chen por mdzod/_/gti mug tshul can rmongs pas kyang /_/thams cad mun par byed nus na/_/mi 'byed blang dor med pa yis/_/khams gsum rmongs pa smos ci dgos/_/mun pa'i skye mched gzhom pa 
[\[149a.4\]]dang /_rmongs pa nam mkhar bya ba'i phyir/_/gti mug rnam dag ye shes las/_/ma 'dres yongs rdzogs phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i gdung dang sde'i tshogs kyis bkas bcad pa'i mdo 
[\[149a.5\]]gsungs pa/_shin tu chags shing zhen pa la/_/gnyen pos phan par mi 'gyur te/_/chags rab chen po'i ye shes las/_/thams cad chags pa chen por mdzod/_/chags pa'i tshul can spyad pas kyang /_/khams gsum khrag tu byed nus 
[\[149a.6\]]na/_/'dod chags rnam dag chags spyad pas/_/khams gsum zhen chags smos ci dgos/_/'dod chags khrag mtsho bskam pa dang /_/chags pas chags pa gcad pa'i phyir/_/'dod chags rnam dag ye shes las/_/'dod chags gar 
[\[149a.7\]]gyi phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces nges pa dam par bcad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas bcad pa'i mdo gsungs pa/_shin tu dngos por zhen pa la/_/bkag pas phan par mi 'gyur te/_/shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]las/_/thams cad mthun 'jug spyod par mdzod/_/mthun 'jug tshul can mthun pas kyang /_/khams gsum log par byed nus na/_/thugs rje gar gyi mdzad spyod kyis/_/'jig rten blo log smos ci dgos/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas 
[\[149b.2\]]snyed/_/'jig rten 'jig rten mtha' yas kun/_/'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/_/drangs te yang dag gsang bar sbyor/_/khro la byams dang khro tshul mdzod/_/zhi la zhi ba slong spyod nyid/_/drag shul can la drag po nyid/_/g.yem la g.yem 
[\[149b.3\]]dang gnyen por mdzod/_/chags la chags dang rnam spong nyid/_/g.yeng la sems sdud g.yeng ba nyid/_/rmongs la khyab par mnyam pa nyid/_/ri la ting 'dzin ri bo nyid/_/phrag dog can la phrag dog tshul/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas snyed/_/kun 
[\[149b.4\]]gzhi mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/_/khyad par 'dod pa'i lus can gyi/_/kun gzhi kun gyi dbyings na dpa'/_/rdo rje snying po rab tu gnas/_/sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi dbyings/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de 
[\[149b.5\]]bzhin nyid/_/ye nas yin par nges pa na/_/mtha' thugs med pa'i sems can rnams/_/ji ltar dga' ba 'dod pa bzhin/_/ma bkag ma bcos ji bzhin par/_/nges pa nyid du gyur pa yi/_/thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ba'i/_/mdzad spyod 
[\[149b.6\]]gar thabs sprin phung gis/_/ji ltar spyad kyang de nyid la/_/ma g.yos mi gos dbyings na dpa'/_/nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo las/_/mtha' yas dpag tu med pa yi/_/sgo nas thams cad ma bkag par/_/ci dga' nyid du bde drangs te/_/dam pa rnams 
[\[149b.7\]]kyi nges par mdzod/_/'dir ni nan tan drag shul gyis/_/mi zad 'bar ba'i ye shes las/_/dur khrod bdag po rab 'jigs pa'i/_/che mchog 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar mdzod/_/ces des pa dam par bcad do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]pa'i mdo chen po las bka' bgros dam pa bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//_//lang ka'i bdag po de'i tshe de'i dus na kho bo 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa zhig gis shes bzhin du gang yongs su sad pa'i phyir yang 'khor der 
[\[150a.2\]]'khod par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba'i go cha blo gros thabs ldan zhes bya ba zhig la yongs su dris pa/_kye sems dpa' chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]chen po 'di rgyu ni gang las byung /_rkyen ni ci las byung /_'bras bu ni cir smin/_rigs ni gar gtogs/_
[\[150a.3\]]las skal gyi spyod pa ni ci spyod/_ma btul na ci gnod/_btul na ci zhig dgos/_de skad dris pa las/_bskul ba'i go cha chen po des smras pa/_sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]chen po 'di gang legs pa'i rgyu rkyen las ni ma byung /_
[\[150a.4\]]nyes pa 'ba' zhig gi rgyu rkyen las byung ste/_rgyu ni mun pa'i ri bo las byung ngo /_/rkyen ni bka' bsgo log pa'i dka' thub drag po las byung ngo /_/'bras bu ni sdug bsngal gyi ri bor smin no/_/rigs ni dmangs rigs 'khor ba gdol ba 'byung po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[150a.5\]]su gtogs so/_/las skal gyi spyod pa ni 'khor ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'jol nyag tu spyod do/_/'di ma btul na lus can gyi byang chub snying po ring du nub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro/_/btul na ni kun gyi snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du nye bar 'char 
[\[150a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/e ma'o sems dpa' chen po 'o na dus 'di ni dus la bab pa'o/_/las 'di las kyi mchog go/_/gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba'i yang gsang ba dam pa'o/_/thul kun du rab 
[\[150a.7\]]tu thul/_dus la bab pa'i skabs chen 'dir/_/las la bab pa'i sems can 'di/_/stongs la bab pa'i thugs rje yis/_/'du shes bsgyur ba thugs rje'i mchog_/stong gsum ma lus ston pa bas/_/'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/zhes nye bar 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bskul lo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngan bag gnas gyur pa skyes bu dam pa rdo rje 'dzin du snang ba nyid la yongs su bsgo ba mdzad pa/_rgyal ba kun gyi gsang mdzod pa/_/thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin/_/drag po brtul zhugs 
[\[150b.2\]]chen po can/_/dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/_/sngon gyi go cha chen po'i mthus/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/gdul dka' drag po 'dul mdzad pa/_/bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/_/sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i 
[\[150b.3\]]sku/_/'jigs su rung ba'i dpa' byad can/_/gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bo yis/_/dur khrod bdag po rab tu chom zhes yongs su bskul bas/_skyes bu rdo rje 'dzin pa de/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di/_/'byung po'i rgyal pos dbang du byas/_/
[\[150b.4\]]shin tu gtum rngam 'khrug pa des/_/lha mi 'jig rten brlag ma khad/_/bzhin dang mdangs kyang mi gsal bar/_/kun du mog mog por gyur nas/_/dus ma yin pa'i mun pa yang /_/mun nag smag tu gyur pas 'thibs/_/tsha dang grang dang nad 
[\[150b.5\]]dang rims/_/mi ngas sna tshogs kun du rgyas/_/rlung dmar 'brug dang ser ba dang /_/rnag khrag rdo dang mtshon cha'i char/_/dus ma yin par kun du 'byung /_/skye dman 'tsho ba'ang log par gyur/_/gdug pa sna tshogs sems can gyis/_/shin 
[\[150b.6\]]tu nyam thag gdungs 'gyur ba'i/_/mgon med pa yi 'jig rten te/_/mkhyen te thugs rjes gdung ba ni/_/rab tu rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/rdo rje chos kyi rta gdong la/_/rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad du/_/ngag gi dbang phyug rdo rje'i gdong /_/
[\[150b.7\]]lang ka'i yul gyi grong rdal gyi/_/dbus kyi ri bo ma la ya/_/rko rka thang mar rgya mtsho'i dngo /_/drag shul yod pa'i rtse la dong /_/rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul/_/dur khrod bdag po tshogs dang bcas/_/mi ngam skyabs lings chen po la/_/khams 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gsum rdo rje bya sprin thong /_/cis kyang mi bskyod mi 'khrugs pa'i/_/sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyis dngos/_/rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin nyid/_/rdo rje snying po srid gsum ma mgon/_/stong pa chen po'i nam mkha' la/_/'bar ba chen 
[\[151a.2\]]po gar dgur mdzod/_/thugs rje sa la gshegs nas kyang /_/mthun 'jug byis pa'i spyod pa mdzod/_/med la kun 'byung stong nyid las/_/ji bzhin pa yi rgyal ba dang /_/stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na/_/rnam dag lam gshegs rgyal ba rnams/_/
[\[151a.3\]]bdag ni bka' yi las mkhan te/_/bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba/_/de dag ma lus bdag gis btul/_/ma grol ba yang bdag gis dgrol/_/gang ma bsgral ba bdag gis bsgral/_/dbugs ma phyung ba 
[\[151a.4\]]dbugs phyung ste/_/yang dag nyid la dgod par bgyi/_/dgongs pa gsang ba kun 'dus la/_/rmad 'byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/_/mtha' thug med pa'i sems can rnams/_/snying po bskul ba'i byin brlabs mdzod/_/ces rdo rje 'dzin pa des 
[\[151a.5\]]drag tu bskul ba las/_chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye shes chen po'i me dus mtha'i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i thugs rje'i sprin phung nam mkha'i mtha' klas par 'thibs nas 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mngon 
[\[151a.6\]]spyod du mdzad nas rdo rje rta'i tshogs la bkas bsgo ba/_sod kun du rab tu sod/_/rta yi rdo rje stabs dgu yis/_/'jig rten blo dgu'i 'dod pa ston/_/'jig rten nag po gtum pa'i tshogs/_/dur khrod skyabs lings spyod pa la/_/rdo rje rtog pa'i bya sgron 
[\[151a.7\]]gyis/_/'khor ba ma bsgral bar du 'di/_/dam bcas go cha gyon pa yi/_/snying rje chen po'i rtog 'jug gi/_/'khor ba'i so mtha' chod par gyis zhes drag tu bsgo bas/_rdo rje chos rab dga' 'khor lo/_/gzigs dbang rdo rje spyan rab ste/_/rdo rje 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]pad+mo rab dga' ba/_/snang mdzad ngag gi dbang phyug tshogs/_/byang chub chen po cang shes gtso/_/thabs chen dgu yi rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/rdo rje rta gdong sprul pa'i tshogs/_/nam mkha'i khams kun yongs bkang nas/_/ma la ya yi rtse la 
[\[151b.2\]]lhags/_/'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni/_/thugs rje dbang gis spyan ras gzigs/_/stug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang /_/dgongs pa gsang ba gcig tu 'dus/_/khams gsum yo sgrol snying por dgongs/_/dus gsum gtan sprugs byin 
[\[151b.3\]]brlabs mdzod/_/'khor ba chos nyid spyan ras gzigs/_/sdug bsngal byang chub lam du mdzad/_/las nyid rang byung ye shes 'grel/_/rnam smin sun phyung rdo rje nyid/_/ye nas ji bzhin ma bcos pa'i/_/rang byung dkyil 'khor chen por dgongs/_/
[\[151b.4\]]gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa yang /_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las/_/sprul pa'i sras mchog rdo rje 'dzin/_/gzhon nu bye ba sa yar mdzad/_/thams cad dbyar gyi sprin phung bzhin/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas par/_/ma la ya yi rtse la 
[\[151b.5\]]lhags/_/mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha byad du/_/gang 'dir byis pa'i spyod pa yis/_/bdud kyi spyod yul kun mdzad de/_/'jig rten khams su byis par bstan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las las bzhi rdo rje skos kyi 
[\[151b.6\]]le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//de nas mthun 'jug skyes bu des/_/mthun pa'i spyan gyis gang gzigs na/_/las kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]drag po de/_/dngos po bzhes ni dbang byas pa/_/rnam par smin pa'i dngos po ni/_/bam ri thod pa mkhar gyi 
[\[151b.7\]]rtsar/_/khrag dang bshang gci sha chen dang /_/rkang dang klad pa klad rgyas dang /_/rnag dang chu ser la sogs pa'i/_/'dam gyis phru ma yongs su bskor/_/'bu dang shin tu 'bu chen po/_/sbrang ma sbrang rgod bung ba dang /_/sbrul dang sdig pa sdom la sogs/_/kang 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]ka khwa skeg 'ug pa'i tshogs/_/ce spyang stag seng la sogs pa'i/_/gdug pa can gyi 'khor gyis bskor/_/lha yi sde dpon ka ru ni/_/bu mo chung ma ma sring dang /_/'jig rten dbang phyug lha chen gyi/_/ma sring chung ma bu mo rnams/_/phrogs 
[\[152a.2\]]nas dbang du byas pa yi/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/_/bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad la sogs/_/ma mo phra men gnod sbyin mo/_/srin mo sha za khrag 'phrog ma/_/bdud kyi ming 'dzin bla rkun ma/_/blon mo dmag dpon sde dpon ma/_/ru dpon pho nya 
[\[152a.3\]]mngag par bcas/_/rang rang rten dang lag char bcas/_/ci bgyi bka' nyan bka' sdod 'khor/_/sbod gtong rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod/_/srin po'i bu mo dri za brgyad/_/stag seng wa spyang bzhad tshogs dang /_/dur bya bya rog 'ug pa'i tshogs/_/bstod cing 
[\[152a.4\]]rngam pa'i tshul du 'khod/_/srin po'i nye gnas chen mo brgyad/_/kau ri rtsau ri pra mo ha/_/bet+ta li dang puk+ka si/_/g+hasma ri dang sma sha ni/_/tsaN+Da li la sogs pa yi/_/gtum zhing rngam pa'i ma tshogs ma/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs su 'khod/_/dur 
[\[152a.5\]]khrod sa yi sgo srung bzhi/_/brtson mo gdong mo gar log mo/_/de bzhin 'jug mo chen mo bzhi/_/gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo srung /_/dur khrod bdag mo gru 'degs ma/_/brkam pa shin tu brkam ma dang /_/ra ro mo dang khrag 'thung ma/_/chags 
[\[152a.6\]]pas myos pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod/_/bam ri thod pa brtsegs pa'i dbus/_/gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer chen gyis/_/brtan par btab pa'i nang bdag mo/_/nye gnas kro d+hi shwa ri ma/_/thod skyogs khrag gis bkang ba dang /_/'bru mar rdzas lnga chang 
[\[152a.7\]]sbyar ba/_/rtag par rang gi longs spyod 'dzin/_/chags pas myos shing brkam pas na/_/'dod pa'i dbang mo brkam par grags/_/ru tra'i phrum grong rdal de/_/'bar ba chen po'i gar dgu yis/_/bcom ldan dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir/_/sde dpon 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]btul ba'i 'khor 'dus pa/_/'jig rten dbang phyug mthu chen rnams/_/phal cher las la gram skabs su/_/dpal chen rdo rje 'dzin pa de'i/_/de nyid yang dag dngos min pa'i/_/gzhon nu snam nas bton pa'i sras/_/rdo rje gzhon nu sme ba brtsegs/_/mthing 
[\[152b.2\]]gnag khro gnyer ral pa can/_/'bar ba chen po'i gar dgur mdzad/_/dur khrod bdag po ji bzhin du/_/dbu dang phyag zhabs der mdzad de/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis/_/bshud ba lnga ni bdud rtsir bsgyur/_/thams cad stong nyid bdud rtsir sbyangs/_/nye gnas 
[\[152b.3\]]la sogs 'khor mo rnams/_/spyod la ma chags ye shes dang /_/byas la mi sogs phrin las kyis/_/mthun 'jug khrid pa'i sbyor thabs kyis/_/dbang bsdus ngad sbyangs sprul pa ni/_/sems dpa' ye shes sprul pa'i tshogs/_/kau tsau la sogs ma tshogs 
[\[152b.4\]]dang /_/seng stag la sogs yul du snang /_/'dod pa'i dbang mo brkam pa des/_/chags pa'i dbang gis gang mthong ba/_/spyir ni rang gi khyo bdag lta/_/lhag pa'i gzi chen 'bar bar mthong /_/snyam pa'i dbang gi the tshom skyes/_/e ma'o bdag gi 
[\[152b.5\]]bdag po bas/_/shin tu 'od 'bar gzi byin che/_/'di ji lta bar sprul pa zhig_/snyam du yid gnyis rtog pa las/_/thabs mchog rdo rje gzhon nu des/_/srin skad thar gsum phyung ba las/_/the tshom rtog pa chad par gyur/_/chags pa'i dbang gis 
[\[152b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi/_/sku la nges par 'khril ba ni/_/tsan dan sbrul gyi sdong po la/_/tshad pas bdas pa'i sbrul 'khril bas/_/mi rtog tshad ma'i gdung sel ltar/_/gang la chags pa mi mnga' bar/_/gang gi gdung ba rnam par sel/_/de nas sme ba 
[\[152b.7\]]brtsegs pa des/_/thams cad ci dga' 'byung ba yi/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po de/_/nye ba'i rig pa 'di brjod pas/_/bya ba thams cad byed pa'i mchog_/oM b+hu ra kuM/_i tsi/_ki phi/_u ts+tshusma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_yang dag dngos min cho 'phrul 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]'dis/_/snang mdzad chen po'i cho 'phrul bsdus/_/gang du dang por sprul pa yi/_/oM gyi 'od zer mngon phab nas/_/dbang mo brkam pa'i lhums su bzhag_/gsang sngags mngon pa'i mthu can 'dis/_/srin po'i cha lugs ci 'dra bar/_/
[\[153a.2\]]yi ge de yang der bsgyur te/_/gang de mngon sum lhums su bzhag_/rdo rje lcags kyu 'od zer las/_/rak+Sha shrI he ru ka_/ru tra ma tra ha ha ha ma/_bskyed rdzogs 'joms byed yi ge yi/_/mthu yis byin brlabs brtan par byas/_/dngos min rig pa'i skyes 
[\[153a.3\]]bu de/_/rdo rje yab kyi sku la bsdus/_/drag shul stobs ldan skyes bu de/_/sgyu ma rdo rje cho 'phrul gyis/_/sangs rgyas gdul dka' rnams btul nas/_/bdud dang 'jig rten log pa'i cha/_/byis pa'i spyod pa de bor nas/_/thugs ni snying po byang chub la/_/dgongs pa 
[\[153a.4\]]nges par 'grel te bzhugs/_/sprul pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/_/sngar byung rgyal tshab skyes bu yis/_/lha gnas gsum du grags pa yi/_/gsang mdzod chen po dam pa'i lung /_/gsang ba 'dzin pa'i bdag po mdzad/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]drag po de/_/rang gi gnas 
[\[153a.5\]]su 'un pa las/_/rang gi gnas dang longs spyod dang /_/'khor rnams mi snang mi 'dra ba/_/sngon ma mthong ba phal cher snang /_/kho na shin tu ma rangs te/_/e ma'o bdag gi phru ma 'di/_/ji ltar 'gyur zhes rnam par rtog_/de tshe nye gnas dbang mo yis/_/
[\[153a.6\]]rang gi khyo bdag lon 'un te/_/e ma'o sgeg po dpa' bo khyod/_/gang 'dir ngan du rtog pa'i tshig_/'khor gyi nang 'dir gsung ngam ci/_/dpa' bo khyod kyi dgongs pa gang /_/deng hun han phan nyo pa ti/_/kho na 'am tsa sma ra tsa/_/dpa' po sgeg po zhe'am 
[\[153a.7\]]nyid/_/kun lan tra tso pu thra tha/_/gang du de ci ji ltar 'khrul/_/de skad tshig tu hon pa las/_/mdangs la chags pas 'dun pa dang /_/kho na'i rigs nyid nges 'dzin pa'i/_/snyam nas dga' ba'i thabs su bzung /_/de nas dbang mo brkam pa las/_/pu tra myu gu 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'thon 'byung ba'i/_/thabs gsum grag pa'i sgra phyung bas/_/dpal gyi rngam skad drag po yis/_/drag po drag mo la sogs brgyal/_/de las slar log mthong snang ba/_/'jigs byed chen po 'bar ba la/_/sngo gnag rngam pa'i ral pa can/_/dbu dgu phyag 
[\[153b.2\]]ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/rdo rje gshog pas bar snang khebs/_/ba spu lcags kyu bsregs 'dra ba'i/_/sdom dang sdig dang smigs dang sbrul/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis sa gzhi khebs/_/thod skyogs sti ra rgyu zhags dang /_/nyi zla khyung dang 'ug pa khra/_/rdo rje 
[\[153b.3\]]mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_/za ma tog dang rdul yab rnga/_/ri rab spyi skor stong gsum 'phen/_/klu dbang 'bum gyis brgyan cing bklubs/_/dus mtha'i bskal pa me ltar 'bar/_/khro gnyer sdang mig 'bar ba yi/_/nyi shu rtsa bdun spyan ras gzigs/_/zhabs 
[\[153b.4\]]brgyad 'bar bas lha brgyad gnon/_/rdo rje srin po khro bor gyur/_/lha dang bdud las rnam par grags/_/de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]drag po de/_/kho na'i sems rtog rtas nas kyang /_/nga rgyal drag po'i gtum skad kyis/_/'khor gyi dbang phyug rnam par bskul/_/
[\[153b.5\]]ru tra ma tra ma ra tra/_/'du 'du dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs/_/kun du rab tu dam la 'du/_/gram gram dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs/_/kun du rab tu las la gram/_/thud thud dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs/_/kun du rab tu 'di la thud/_/dbang phyug nga yi 
[\[153b.6\]]phru ma la/_/gang 'dir gdug pa chen po 'di/_/khyed kyis brlag pa'i dus la bab/_/gang 'dir bya mi bya rtog na/_/khyed ni shin tu brlag ma khad/_/mdza' bo gang la bya mi bya ba yi/_/yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/_/de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas 
[\[153b.7\]]na/_/de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer/_/rgol ba gang la bya mi bya ba yi/_/yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/_/de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas na/_/de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer/_/dam tshig gang srung mi srung ba'i/_/yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/_/de 'dra'i dam 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]tshig sgyu ma yin pas na/_/de la dam par su zhig 'dogs/_/thams cad bya mi bya ba yi/_/yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/_/de 'dra'i spyod pa sgyu ma yin pas na/_/de la byed ces su zhig zer/_/gang la gang 'dir gang gi las rnams dus la bab ces 
[\[154a.2\]]dbang phyug chen po rnams la bskul bas/_bdud kyi gzi byin ma bzod de bdud kyi cha 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu bye ba dung phyur gyi dmag tshogs dang dbang phyug chen po rnams shin tu dngangs 'khrugs rngam nas rod rod por gyur te/_mya ngan gyi dug lo 'tshubs pa bzhin bdud 
[\[154a.3\]]kyi phru mar 'dus te bdud kyi ru mtshon phyar/_mtshon cha'i sprin gtibs/_bdud kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba bkram ste bso dang cha'i sgra bsgrags nas spags pa las/_rdo rje rta'i tshogs kyis rdo rje stam pa na'i stobs kyis rdzu 'phrul myur ba'i 'dur shugs drag pos 
[\[154a.4\]]khro bo theg chen kun kyang 'dur thag gcod pa'i rta'i 'dur glu 'dis rnam par bskul ba/_hri sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs su rung ba dang /_/dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang /_/snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i/_/sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yi/_/
[\[154a.5\]]gar gyi phyag rgya 'bar bas dbang phyug gnon/_/hri myos byed stong bas lhag par 'dod pa'i gzugs ston la/_/'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong bas lhag par 'jigs gzugs ston/_/zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong bas lhag par rab tu ston/_/thams cad 
[\[154a.6\]]dkyil 'khor gsum du snang bar mdzod/_/hri rnam par 'dul ba'i ngo mthon thabs kyis gnon pas gnon/_/ho ho ha ha he he hi hi dgyes pa'i bzhad mos khong /_/dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig_/rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon dbang 
[\[154a.7\]]phyug gnon/_/hri rtsal chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs/_/hri rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu chen gnon/_/ru tra ma tra'i snying las dpal mos drongs shig rab drongs shig_/rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon tshangs 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pa non/_/tshangs las sgrol ma drongs shig sma ra tha/_/hri rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon dga' dbang non/_/sbyor chen kun gyis bdag la dga' drongs shig_/hri rab kyi rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon ru tra non/_/sbyor chen kro d+hi shwa ri dbang mo drongs shig 
[\[154b.2\]]rab drongs shig_/snying rje gang la bya mi bya ba yi/_/yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/_/de 'dra'i snying rje sgyu ma yin pas na/_/de la su zhig snying rje zer/_/gdul bya gdul bar bya mi bya ba yi/_/yongs su rtog pa de dag med kyang bla/_/de 'dra'i gdul bya sgyu ma yin 
[\[154b.3\]]pas na/_/de la gdul bar su zhig zer/_/hri ha ha ho ho sprul rab tu sprul/_/kun du rab sprul snang bar mdzod/_/gtum thung rngam 'khrug 'bar bar mdzod/_/rnam pa mang po sna tshogs khro bor log par lta ba yi/_/khro bo snang ba'i 'gro rnams rnam mang po/_/
[\[154b.4\]]khro bo rgyud kyi ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas par/_/rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu ma rab sprul rnam par sprul/_/khro la ma g.yos ye shes bzhi mchog kun du bzhengs shig bsnams/_/rnam pa mang po sna tshogs 'dod pa snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams/_/
[\[154b.5\]]rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyis ma lus lus pa med pa 'dul mkhas pa/_/rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu mar rab sprul rnam par sprul/_/spyod la ma chags ye shes bde mchog kun du myong mdzad bzhengs shing rol/_/rnam pa mang po sna tshogs 
[\[154b.6\]]rmongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams/_/rnam pa mang po gti mug rgyud kyis ma lus lus par 'dul mkhas pa/_/rgyal ba kun gyi thabs mchog sgyu mas rab sprul rnam par sprul/_/mnyam la ma rmongs ye shes ma 'dres yongs rdzogs bzhengs shing dgongs 
[\[154b.7\]]zhes khro mo ma rangs mi bsnyengs drag po dgyes pa'i sgra 'brug stong dir ba byung bas bdud kyi cha 'dzin pa'i bdud bye ba dung phyur rnams bag bzhi bskums te zil gyis non/_ru mtshon la sogs pa mtshon cha'i sprin phung ni stong pa nyid du sangs par gyur/_mi 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]snyan pa'i ngag rnams ni mngon du gyur te theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi sgra ni di ri ri sgrogs par gyur to/_/dur khrod kyi bdag po ru tra nag po lta zhig rang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bor te rje btsan dam pa de la skyabs su dong /_blo gros kun 
[\[155a.2\]]gyi yul dang bral/_/yi khos bsam pa chad cing thabs brlag nas kun nas 'khrugs te rnam par 'khams nas rang gi ru tra lnga yi sa bon mngon du phyung bas/_ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes brjod/_/mgo gsum lag drug rkang bzhi pa/_/khros pa'i tshul du gyur 
[\[155a.3\]]pa las/_/rje btsan rdo rje srin po des/_/kho na nyid du der mdzad de/_/byin brlabs yi ge mi phyed pa'i/_/dbang du 'khor ba'i sa bon lnga/_/byas nas ngag gi sprul pa phrogs/_/kho na ngag gi dbang po nyams/_/de nas dur khrod bdag po des/_/ra la ra la 
[\[155a.4\]]b+h+yo brjod pas/_/mgo dgu [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lag tu gyur/_/gang der rje btsan dam pa des/_/ngag gi sprul pa nges par bcad/_/yang der dur khrod bdag po des/_/hu lu hu lu b+h+yo brjod pas/_/mgo brgyad bcu drug lag tu gyur/_/dpal chen rje btsan srin po des/_/
[\[155a.5\]]kho na ci 'dra der mdzad de/_/der yang ngag gi brjod pa bcad/_/gang der dur khrod bdag po des/_/ha la ha la b+h+yo brjod pas/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig mgo bo la/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis lag tu gyur/_/yang du rdo rje srin po des/_/de ci kho nar der mdzad nas/_/gang 
[\[155a.6\]]'dir smra ba'i dbang po bcad/_/yang der kho nar de nyid kyis/_/ra li ra li b+h+yo brjod pas/_/lus ni tshad med chen po la/_/nad kyi bskal pa tshub mar gtong /_/gdug pa'i mtshon cha lus las 'gyed/_/rje btsan rdo rje srin po des/_/kho na de 'drar nyid mdzad 
[\[155a.7\]]de/_/ngag phrogs ngag gi sprul pa chad/_/dper na skyes bu gang la zhig_/lce bcad khrag gis por ba bzhin/_/shin tu myos te 'gyel bar gyur/_/kun gyis mnga' bdag chen po des/_/sa ma ya hUM gsung bsgrags pas/_/sngon byung dus na 'brel pa yis/_/
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]srog gi dbang pos ma bzod de/_/gang der mdun gyis phyogs pa dang /_/rtse gsum kha T+wAM 'bar ba yis/_/bu tra'i ri bo bcom dbang gi/_/phyag rgyas rol te phyal du sbyangs/_/nye gnas dbang gis mtshams sbyar ba'i/_/rang gi dam pa la sogs pa'i/_/mtha' 
[\[155b.2\]]thug med pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems/_/stug po bkod pa'i mthong ba'i mthus/_/thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/_/zhen pa'i mun nag sangs gyur te/_/skye ba dus mtha' med rnyed du/_/lus blangs las ni ci spyad dran/_/snam 
[\[155b.3\]]du bton te zhabs drung 'khod/_/rab dga' btud nas gnod tshul du/_/gang der shin tu ngus nas smres/_/e ma e ma'o e ma yang /_/dpa' bo lha rje thugs rje chung /_/shin tu bde ba'i gnas gcig nas/_/snam du bton pa thugs rje chung /_/da yang ci 
[\[155b.4\]]mdzad myur du mdzod/_/myur du bsgral na yun bde'o/_/'bangs su mchi'o bdag lus 'bul/_/'bangs la nan tan ma chud cig_/deng nas slan chad bka' bzhin du/_/bka' yi lung bzhin rjes su sgrub/_/gal te bka' bzhin ma bgyis sam/_/dam pa'i lung 
[\[155b.5\]]las 'gal gyur na/_/bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying /_/rul myags skams nas tshig par 'gyur/_/ma sring bu mo chung ma rnams/_/'bangs su 'bul lo tshis ma chung /_/dbus su mchi skal mi ldan gyis/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' la zhog_/
[\[155b.6\]]phud la 'tshal skal mi ldan gyis/_/lhag ma zhal chab bron la stsol/_/nye gnas gdung ba'i ma sring rnams/_/de nas rgyal ba'i 'bangs yin gyis/_/khyed ni ci bgyi bka' yi las mkhan te/_/bka' yi las byung rtag par myur du sgrubs/_/bdag kyang deng 
[\[155b.7\]]sngon lam log las spyad pas/_/dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brgyud/_/da ni thugs rje las 'phro gnyis phrad pas/_/bde ba can gyi zhing du myur 'gro yis/_/rjes su bstan pa'i bka' la nyams sa re/_/ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bzhin/_/dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bar gyis/_/gang du sing byams ming la gdung ba bzhin/_/yal gam can la lhang lhang brtse bar gyis/_/mdza' mo grogs la ji ltar gdung tshul bzhin/_/rnal 'byor can la kril kril brtse bar 
[\[156a.2\]]gyis/_/ji ltar g.yog byams dpon la snying brtse bzhin/_/dam pa rnams la nges par nye bar gyis/_/zhes 'khor nye gnas rnams la gdams ngag bor nas dpa' bo chen po la skyabs su dong ste bka' che ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir rang rtags srog gi snying po 
[\[156a.3\]]phul te mna' dor ro/_/ru lu ru lu b+h+yo zhes rang gi srog la tshad bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su gnang ba ni 'di lta ste/_oM ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ha zhes byin gyis brlabs te bsregs sbyangs btul nas dgongs khral chung bar bzhugs so/_/
[\[156a.4\]]sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bdud yongs su btul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams 'di ltar rtog ste/_e ma'o drag po chen po 'di/_/'di ltar mthu che ba/_
[\[156a.5\]]'di ltar dregs pa/_/'di ltar gti mug pa/_/'di ltar chags pa/_'di ltar nga rgyal ba/_'di ltar gtum pa 'di dpa' bo chen po 'dis rnam par non/_nges par yang dag par non/_/kun du rab tu non to snyam du rtog go_/de'i tshe de'i dus na de dag gi 
[\[156a.6\]]sems kyi rtog pas rtog pa drag po ru tra de'i sems kyis yongs su shes nas smras pa/_kye nye gnas dam pa rnams gang de ltar ma rtog shig_/sngon kho bo'i las kyi 'phro dang 'brel ba nye gnas dam pa kun gyis bshes gnyen de dang phrad pas las shes so/_/
[\[156a.7\]]skye ba shes so/_/las mthong ngo /_/skye ba mthong ngo /_/las mngon du gyur to/_/skye ba mngon du gyur nas rang gi las la rang thag khos par gyur/_gang skad cig mar bde ba chen po'i g.yung drung gi pho brang mthong bas gang 'di ltar bud med dag sbrum pa'i sdug 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]bsngal gyis nyen par gyur pa na 'di snyam du sdug bsngal 'di ni sngon du skyes pa bsten cing mang du spyad pa'i las 'ba' zhig kho na'o snyam du yid la byed pa bzhin kho bo yang las 'ba' zhig la kho thag chad nas ji ltar ri gzar rtse nas rbab 'dril ba gang gis mi 
[\[156b.2\]]zlogs pa bzhin gdung ba chen po'i shugs kyis 'thon pas shin tu gdung ba yin te/_nye gnas khyed kyang rang gi las yid la gyis shig dang /_gdung ba'i shugs rbab ltar 'dril bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas rma ga chad par ngus nas shin tu smres te yongs 
[\[156b.3\]]su gdung ba'i don bton pa 'di lta ste/_thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems/_/dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/_/rnam dag 'od gsal nyi zla 'bum bdal zhing /_/dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lham me ba/_/'jig rten gsum gyis 
[\[156b.4\]]mkhan ston par grags/_/khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig po/_/byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas/_/lam log lam stor srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams/_/sngon tshe las log 
[\[156b.5\]]srid pa spyad pas nongs/_/sdig pa'i las rnams ci spyad rab gnod 'gyod/_/dar cing dregs pa'i las dbang de btsan nas/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying 'gyur te/_/zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mes ni rang rgyud bsregs/_/gti mug mun pa 'thibs 
[\[156b.6\]]pos shes rab ldongs/_/'dod chags rgya mtsho'i 'dam du rnam shes bying /_/nga rgyal drag po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan/_/phrag dog rlung dmar tshub mas 'khor bar g.yengs/_/bdag tu lta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings/_/'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'obs su 
[\[156b.7\]]lhung /_/sdug bsngal drag po mi zad char du 'bab/_/'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' zhing /_/sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas/_/rnam shes dbang po myu gu gdungs 'gyur te/_/phung po sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na/_/byams mgon thugs 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]rje can gyis bzod lags sam/_/bdag ni blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che/_/las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams ru trar skyes/_/skyes pas 'gyod do las la yi re chad/_/yi chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med/_/las kyi 
[\[157a.2\]]shugs ni chu bo'i gzhung dang 'dra/_/las dbang chu klung 'phral du ga la zlogs/_/rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las byung /_/las kyi rlung dmar drag po des bdas pas/_/bdag ni deng sngon bskal pa grangs med du/_/'khor ba'i btson ra mun par 
[\[157a.3\]]'khyams pa la/_/nye gnas khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis/_/las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa gtan sbyangs nas/_/ma ltar byams pa'i zhabs drung da ltar 'khod/_/nyi ltar 'od 'bar zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i/_/thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bas mi 
[\[157a.4\]]ngoms pa'i/_/thog ma med nas ma rig ling thog gis/_/ldongs pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na/_/'gro ba'i mgon khyod deng snga gang na bzhugs/_/las dbang drag po shin tu mi bzad pas/_/shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas/_/dung dung gdungs 
[\[157a.5\]]pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing /_/nyam thag phongs pa'i nga ro gdon lags na/_/byams mgon thugs rjes dus 'dir ma dgongs na/_/nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus dang bral ba'i tshe/_/gnyen bshes grogs dang bral nas gshin rjes khrid/_/de tshe 'jig rten gyi dus 
[\[157a.6\]]mi stongs te/_/las kyi dbang gis bdag 'dra gcig pu khrid/_/dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis kyis/_/gang gi phyi shol dus la ma bzhes par/_/da lta nyid du bstun te mngon spyod mdzod/_/las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra la/_/thog ma 
[\[157a.7\]]med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas nas ma thar te/_/bskal pa grangs med skye ba de snyed du/_/gdos bcas lus blangs grangs med zhig 'gyur te/_/sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam/_/rnag khrag 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam/_/las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang /_/khams gsum bgrangs shing skye shi kha brgyud kyang /_/byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re zos/_/skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam la/_/skye ba gcig gcig 
[\[157b.2\]]kho na tsam gyi las/_/bla med byang chub don du rab spyad na/_/de tsam byas pa'i las la don yod pas/_/don gyi yang ye mya ngan 'das zin na/_/las kyi dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas/_/sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams/_/sdug 
[\[157b.3\]]bsngal bzod dka' srid pa'i btson rar chud/_/mi zad sdug bsngal drag po 'di lta bu/_/nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung /_/thugs rje chen pos las ngan rgyud bcad de/_/nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol/_/ma rig log pa las kyi 
[\[157b.4\]]dbang btsan pas/_/mi shes mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams na/_/ye shes sgron ma'i zer gyis mi stongs sam/_/nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na/_/thugs rje chen po'i phrin las mi mdzad dam/_/phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhung lags na/_/
[\[157b.5\]]thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam/_/dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na/_/thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis mi gso 'am/_/las kyi rnam smin sdug bsngal me 'bar na/_/thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun mi 
[\[157b.6\]]'bebs sam/_/sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying 'gyur na/_/thabs mkhas thugs rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyang sbyang nas/_/nam zhig rang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe/_/'phags pa'i thugs rje ci 
[\[157b.7\]]'tshal don ma mchis/_/bdag nyid las 'phro btsan pas bzhag na lta/_/thugs rje zhes na su la ci zhig bgyi/_/dpa' bo khyod la thugs rje stobs mnga' zhing /_/sngon byung 'brel pa las kyi 'phro btsan na/_/yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]snying nas da gzigs thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha/_/zhes rang gi nga rgyal gyi ri bo bcag nas lus seng ger mngon par sprul nas zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las tha ma dman pa'i gdung ba 
[\[158a.2\]]bton pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas rdo rje srin po des las kyi srin po de log par lta ba sun phyung bas las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcad pa'i phyir spyo ba'i brgyad chen pos rnam par spyos pa ni 'di lta ste/_sdig can log pa'i stobs ldan 'di/_/thog ma 
[\[158a.3\]]med pa'i dus mtha' nas/_/srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyams par nges/_/nyes byas rtsa ba rang nyid las/_/thams cad 'byung bar nyes par nges/_/bskal pa grangs med de snyed du/_/skye ba mang po lus blangs nas/_/gzugs phung grangs med zhig 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[158a.4\]]sha rus stong gsum 'jig rten tsam/_/rnag khrag rgya mtshor 'khyil 'gyur yang /_/don med par ni chud zos pa/_/sus kyang ma byas rang gi las/_/de tsam cha gcig don spyad na/_/da tsam don gyi sangs rgyas zin/_/lus rnams yongs su gtong ba yi/_/ma 
[\[158a.5\]]chags stobs ldan chen po rnams/_/bkres pas nyen pa'i 'gro ba la/_/sha rus khrag tsam btang bas kyang /_/zag med rnam thar bde thob na/_/zab mo'i don lta smos ci dgos/_/rang lus gtong bar ma phod cing /_/chags pa'i mtha' la mngon zhen pas/_/
[\[158a.6\]]khams gsum 'khor ba'i kha brgyud cing /_/zug rngu'i nad kyis gzir ba yin/_/srid pa'i btson rar chud pa 'di/_/mkha' la mdud pas nyes par nges/_/mun pa'i klong du 'khyams pa 'di/_/khyad par rmongs pas nyes par nges/_/thar med 'dam du bying ba 
[\[158a.7\]]'di/_/'dod sred 'dun pas nyes par nges/_/blo ngan tsha bas gdungs pa 'di/_/tsha ba'i las kyis nyes par nges/_/sdug bsngal ri bos non pa 'di/_/nga rgyal brtsegs pas nyes par nges/_/'khor ba'i rlung sgor lhung ba 'di/_/las kyi rlung gis nyes par nges/_/
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]rang gis mnar ba'i ru tra khyod/_/ye nas rgyal ba'i sras yin na/_/srid pa'i 'khor lor ci ste 'khor/_/des na rang gi las yin te/_/sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu la/_/gzugs snang glo bur sprin gyis bsgribs/_/gzugs snang rtog pa rnam sbyang phyir/_/shes 
[\[158b.2\]]rab bskal pa'i rlung gis gtor/_/dang po bka' bsgo log pas nyes/_/de nas mngon pa'i ri bo brtsegs/_/de nas yid bzhin nor bu bsregs/_/tha mar dngos po bzhi spyad pas/_/rnal 'byor theg pa chen po'i don/_/ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/_/
[\[158b.3\]]phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/_/ji bzhin ma spyad phra men gyis/_/ngan 'gro'i las lam rgyun btags pas/_/srid pa log pa'i 'bras bur smin/_/e ma'o las ngan snying re rje/_/nga ni bka' yi las mkhan te/_/bka' yi las kyi dus byung bas/_/
[\[158b.4\]]ngan 'gro gnas su 'khyams pa 'di/_/'khor ba'i gnas nas 'don pa'i phyir/_/las ngan las rgyun gcad par bya/_/dngos por smin pa'i sdig pa 'di/_/rdo rje nam mkha'i mtshon gyis bsad/_/shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na/_/yang dag thar 
[\[158b.5\]]lam gcod byed pa/_/'byung po gtum po gdol pa can/_/khyod ni de bzhin nyid la sgrib/_/yang dag nges pa'i blo gros kyis/_/khungs bcad rtsad bcad bdag las byung /_/bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa yi/_/phyin ci logs stobs brtson 'grus kyis/_/
[\[158b.6\]]gnas ngan len pa'i ded dpon byed/_/de nyid bdag rtog yin pas na/_/bdag med nam mkha'i stobs kyis gzhom/_/dbang sgyur gnon pa'i thabs chen dang /_/gcod pa mngon pa'i mthu can dang /_/gzir ba'i byin gyi brlabs can gyis/_/dus 
[\[158b.7\]]gsum bgegs kyi bdag po non/_/a na ya/_ma hA shU n+ya tA/_a ko ta ya nA~M/_sarba pA paM ma tang kha ru tra naM/_sarba pA paM kha T+wAM ka ru tra na~M/_thams cad stong nyid ma skyes pas/_/bsad pas bsad pa med pa'i phyir/_/sgyu ma sbyong ba'i cho 'phrul 'di/_/
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]snying rje chen po'i dam tshig go/_/nges par bsad pa'i dam tshig 'di/_/don ston bsad pa ma yin te/_/rnam shes gzugs bral rdo rjer bya/_/de nyid slar phab dam tshig mchog_/rnam shes hU~M gis bsdus nas ni/_/kho na de nyid gzugs la dbab/_/
[\[159a.2\]]sngon du gnas pa'i tshul bzhin du/_/mnyams bde ba chen por sbyangs/_/ro langs rdo rje dam tshig 'di/_/rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ste/_/rdo rje mtshon gyis gang bsad pa/_/srog ni log rtog rdo rjer shi/_/nams kyang ldang ba'i dus med pas/_/slar skye ba 
[\[159a.3\]]dag ga la yod/_/rnam shes gzugs dang ma bral na/_/'khor ba'i gnas las rnam thar 'phags/_/'chi med rdo rje byang chub sems/_/stong nyid ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu/_/dug chen 'thungs pa kun gyi gsos/_/shi ba kun slong sman pa'i mchog_/lang 
[\[159a.4\]]ka'i bdag po de skad ces bka' stsal pas/_/ru tra nag po rgyud yongs su byang ste lhag pa'i don nges par mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rgyud yongs su sbyangs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas de nyid du nges par 
[\[159a.5\]]phyogs pa'i phyir zhabs kyi 'khor lo spyi bos btegs pa'i 'dun pas 'dun nas/_'di skad du thams cad du brgyud pa rnam par grags pa sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo/_/o~M chos kun rang bzhin dag pas na/_/
[\[159a.6\]]bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/thugs dam dbyig mchog bdag nyid ni/_/sems can 'byam klas ma lus kun/_/mchog nyid sgrub par sbyor bas na/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas/_/sku yi dbyig tu 
[\[159a.7\]]bdag skyed cig_/ye shes rin chen dbu rgyan mchog_/gzi brjid phung po bla na med/_/sangs rgyas rin chen kun 'dus pa'i/_/rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbyig gi ye shes gtso mchog nyid/_/rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa/_/khyod ni dam tshig 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gtso lags kyis/_/dbang phyug rgyal por bdag skur cig_/bdag ni rdo rjes mngon du dbang bskur bas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis deng nyid bdag dbang bskur/_/bcom ldan thams cad mchog ni bdag lags te/_/mchog nyid sgrub phyir rdo rje blang bar bgyi/_/rdo rje 
[\[159b.2\]]rgyal por khyod bzhugs pas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/_/rdo rje dam tshig mchog nyid kyis/_/grub pa phun sum dbang skur cig_/chos kun rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de/_/rdo rje la yang mtshan nyid med/_/rdo rje lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas/_/don kun rdo rje nyid du gsal/_/
[\[159b.3\]]'di ni sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs nyid/_/ye shes sems dpa'i dam tshig bsnams/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dka' thub dam/_/rtag tu bdag gis bcang bar bgyi/_/hU~M rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig dam pa srung /_/ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyon/_/rig pa'i 
[\[159b.4\]]rgyal po bdag la brtan par dgongs/_/gsang ba'i dbang phyug bdag nyid gso bar gsol/_/rtogs pa mchog sbyin bdag la dgyes pa skyed/_/'dod pa kun zhen bdag la chags par mdzod/_/dang po sangs rgyas mnyam nyid thugs rje can/_/las rnams kun la 
[\[159b.5\]]bdag sems dge bar sgyur/_/dus gsum bder gshegs bdag gnas thams cad du/_/rdo rje can dang dam tshig sems dpa' bsgrubs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa dgyes pa kye/_/rdo rjes bdag yang gtan du ma btang zhig_/kye rdo rje chos dbyings 
[\[159b.6\]]kun gyi gtso/_/mi gnas chags pa chen mo ste/_/ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog_/bde ba mchog gi dam pa lags/_/khyod ni dam tshig kun gyi gtso/_/rdo rje sems dpa' skyed mdzad ma/_/sems can don bsgrubs phrin las la/_/thugs rje mnyam 
[\[159b.7\]]sbyor grub par mdzod/_/sangs rgyas yon tan kun 'byung phyir/_/rin chen rdo rje bla na med/_/rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/_/las kyi rdo rje byed gyur cig_/sa ma ya ho zhes dam tshig nye bar blangs so/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM/_zhes dam kun du bcas so/_/de nas 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]yang dag dngos min pa'i/_/rdo rje sme ba brtsegs pa'i sras/_/bdud 'dul rdo rje srin po des/_/rdo rje shugs kyi dam pa byin/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la ma Na Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la raM zhes gdul sbyong drag po'i dkyil 'khor du sbyangs so/_/ta keM ta 
[\[160a.2\]]keM phaT/_ha la ha la ra~M/_tIk+Sh+Na tIk+Sh+Na khaM kro d+ha kro d+ha yaM zhes dngos po thams cad stong par sbyangs so/_/oM zhes rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug go/_/muM zhes ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs so/_/hU~M zhes rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi 
[\[160a.3\]]dkyil 'khor du gnas so/_/i dan ti/_na ra gan te/_ba ri hr-i da ye/_nA ma bsti nAM/_sa ma ya rak+Sha si/_si ti pi na badzra/_a mr-i to ta kaM zhes dam tshig dam pa byin no/_/oM AHhU~M zhes sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dam pa byin no/_/oM badzra a mr-i ta/_e 
[\[160a.4\]]h+ye hi sarba ma na hU~M hrI tha zhes dbang dam pa byin no/_/de nas yang las kyi srin po des rang gi ris kyi lha la gsol ba btab pa/_sngon tshe gong nas 'brel ba yi/_/bdag gi nye gnas gang lags pa/_/las 'phro dang ni thugs rje yis/_/da lta nyid du 'bab par shog_/
[\[160a.5\]]ces bskul pas/_dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hU~M gi snying po 'od zer dang bcas pas kho na nyid kyi snying gar thim pas rang gi ris dam pa nyid du nges par gyur to/_/ha~M zhes mthong ba yongs su dag ste thams cad ma 'dres 
[\[160a.6\]]pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo /_/rdo rje zhes ming btags nas/_rdo rje theg pa'i gsang sgor bzhag go/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa bskul ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[160a.7\]]las kyi srin po de'i nye gnas 'dus pa'i tshogs phal po che rnams rang rang gi las dag pa dang /_/sangs rgyas mang po mthong ba dang /_byin rlabs kyi 'od zer gyis rgyud sbyangs pas las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyud dang /_skye ba snga phyi mtha' yas pa 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]dus gcig tu gshegs par 'gyur te/_the tshom chad pa'i sgo nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/_gar gyi dbang phyug gsan cing dgongs su gsol/_/bdag cag ru tra'i mtha' la zhen pa rnams/_/lus 
[\[160b.2\]]dang las kyi 'khor ba'i dra ba 'di/_/bka' yi gtan tshigs zhib mos ma bkrol zhing /_/shes rab zab mo dmigs bus ma phye bas/_/rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan zhing /_/nges par legs pa'i gros kyis mchod de/_/gar thabs glog gi zhags pas ma 
[\[160b.3\]]zin pas/_/rnam shes las kyi rgya mtsho'i dbas bsgribs te/_/de nyid de bzhin nyid du ngo ma 'tshal/_/gti mug rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs/_/shin tu 'gyod pas gnong pa'i tshul bzung bas/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod la skyabs su mchi/_/dngos po sbyang 
[\[160b.4\]]phyir bdag lus gdan du dbul/_/thabs mkhas thugs rjes lus 'di bzhes su gsol/_/zhes rang gi lus zhabs kyi gdan khrir phul lo/_/de nas [(]'grin [,]mgrin [)]nag po la sogs pa klu chen po rnams kyis ngus nas smres te gsol pa/_gzi brjid rgyal po mnga' 
[\[160b.5\]]bdag dgongs su gsol/_/srid pa'i dra bar 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/_/bcing ba lnga yis kun du bcings gyur pa/_/sus kyang ma bcings bcing bar byed med de/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog las kyis bcings/_/sna tshogs lus dang 'du shes 
[\[160b.6\]]gnas la sogs/_/bdag 'dzin grong khyer gsum gyi btson ra 'dir/_/'khor ba'i btson chas rnam shes bcings pa la/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa ma bkrol bas/_/kun du bcings pa'i mdud pa rgyun mi 'chad/_/mi shigs dgrol bar dka' yi 
[\[160b.7\]]sdug bsngal las/_/thugs rje'i mdud dgrol thabs kyis dgrol du gsol/_/zhes lus sku'i rgyan du phul lo/_/de nas srin po'i rgyal po sha trang gseng bu la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/_dpa' bo sgeg po chen po dgongs su 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gsol/_/mya ngan gling du 'khyams pa'i bdag cag rnams/_/me chen 'bar bas gdungs shing sreg 'gyur ba/_/sus kyang ma bsregs sreg par byed med de/_/mi zad rnam smin drag po nyid las byung /_/zhe sdang 'bar bas rang rgyud 
[\[161a.2\]]bsregs pa la/_/bdag 'dzin khong nas 'bar ba ma bsad pas/_/kun du sreg cing gdung ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/mi zlogs zhi bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/_/thugs rje bsil ba'i char rgyun dbab tu gsol/_/ji ltar khab len rdo la lcags 'du ltar/_/deng 
[\[161a.3\]]nas bzung ste dpa' bo'i 'bangs su mchi/_/zhes so so'i thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bstabs so/_/de nas log sred can gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/_kun snang mun sel sgron ma dgongs su gsol/_/mun nag smag tu 'khyams 
[\[161a.4\]]pa bdag cag rnams/_/lam nor lam stor kun du 'thoms 'gyur te/_/sus kyang ma bkag 'gog par byed med de/_/bdag tu rmongs pa'i ma rig mun pas bsgribs/_/rnam shes gti mug mun pas 'thibs pa la/_/bdag tu rmongs pas mun pa ma 
[\[161a.5\]]bsal bas/_/kun nas bsgribs pa'i mun nag rgyun mi 'chad/_/smag chen sangs par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/_/mkhyen rab gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan du gsol/_/zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo /_/de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs kyang shin tu ngus 
[\[161a.6\]]nas smres te gsol pa/_thabs mkhas thugs rje sman pa dgongs su gsol/_/grong khyer gsum du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/_/'khor ba'i gcong rnying nad kyis zin gyur pa/_/sus kyang ma bzung 'dzin par byed med de/_/bdag 'dzin nyon mongs ma 
[\[161a.7\]]rig nad kyis bzung /_/zug rngu bzod dkas rnam shes gzir ba la/_/dngos por 'dzin pa'i gcong rnying ma sbyangs pas/_/kun nas gdung ba'i zug rngu rgyun mi 'chad/_/thar med 'tsho bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/_/thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis sbyang 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]du gsol/_/zhes lus 'bangs su phul lo/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/_thabs mkhas thugs rje gru gzings dgongs su gsol/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[161b.2\]]dba' rlabs 'jings su bying gyur pa/_/sus kyang ma mnan gnon par byed med de/_/rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa'i ri bos mnan/_/las kyi chu bos 'khor bar g.yengs pa la/_/dngos por 'dzin pa'i rka mgo ma bsgyur bas/_/las dbang drag po chu bo 
[\[161b.3\]]rgyun mi 'chad/_/mi thar 'bog par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal las/_/thabs mkhas thugs rje'i gru yis bsgral du gsol/_/zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo /_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs kyis shin tu ngus nas smres te gsol pa/_rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i 
[\[161b.4\]]rgyal po dgongs su gsol/_/dug chen gling du 'khyams pa bdag cag rnams/_/kun nas myos pa myos shing nyams gyur pa/_/sus kyang ma sbyar sbyor bar byed med de/_/phyin ci log tu lta ba'i dug gis myos/_/dug chen nad kyis rnam shes gzir ba 
[\[161b.5\]]la/_/khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa ma bcad pas/_/dug nad 'bar ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad/_/mi zad bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal la/_/rang 'byung dag pa'i bdud rtsis byug tu gsol/_/zhes skyabs dam par dong ngo /_/de nas yang rdo rje 
[\[161b.6\]]srin po des bka' stsal pa/_yin no legs so rigs kyi bu/_/ru tra dag gis khyod re 'khor/_/ru tra dag gis khyod re 'tshog_/bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'khor/_/bdag tu 'dzin pas khyod re 'tshog_/zhe sdang dag gis khyod re 'khor/_/zhe sdang 
[\[161b.7\]]dag gis khyod re 'tshog_/gti mug dag gis khyod re 'khor/_/gti mug dag gis khyod re 'tshog_/'dod chags dag gis khyod re 'khor/_/'dod chags dag gis khyod re 'tshog_/chu bo bzhi yis khyod re 'khor/_/chu bo bzhi yis khyod re 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]'tshog_/log par lta bas khyod re 'khor/_/log par lta bas khyod re 'tshog_/ji ltar khyod ni thams cad du/_/ye nas rgyal ba'i sras yin na/_/grong khyer gsum du ci ste 'khor/_/rang rang rnam rtog las kho na'o/_/las kyi rgya mtsho 
[\[162a.2\]]dba' rlabs dang /_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dang /_/khong nas 'bar ba'i me chen dang /_/kun nas 'thibs pa'i mun nag dang /_/dngos po rtog pa'i gcong rnying dang /_/rnam par g.yeng ba'i chu bo dang /_/khong nas 'khyil ba'i dug rtsa rnams/_/rang 
[\[162a.3\]]byung rdo rjes ma byas na/_/gzhan la re gsol gdung smres pa/_/chu 'dod smig rgyu snyegs pa 'dra/_/gang 'dir nyid bder ma sbyar na/_/gzhan gyis bde bar ga la 'gyur/_/ye nas bde bar gnas bzhin du/_/da gdod gang du bde tshol ba/_/btsal bas 
[\[162a.4\]]rnyed par yong mi 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyu/_/'o ma dag las mar byung ba/_/de nyid ye nas mar med pa/_/thabs mchog dpag med rgyal bas kyang /_/bsrubs pa ma gtogs de mi rnyed/_/de bzhin rang gi de nyid las/_/btsal 
[\[162a.5\]]kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes na/_/khyed ci gzhan las bde 'dod dam/_/mi shes blo chung snying re rje/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_lang ka'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'dus pa phal po che'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/_kye skyes bu chen po bdag cag 
[\[162a.6\]]rnams rang rang gi de kho na nyid blta bar 'tshal na/_de ji ltar yongs su blta bar bgyi zhes gsol pa las skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/_kye 'dus pa'i tshogs rgyal ba'i sras rnams rang rang gi de kho na nyid mthong bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor chen 
[\[162a.7\]]po gsum gyi sgo 'ba' zhig tu 'jug par bya'o/_/de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig gi sgor 'jug par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dkyil 'khor chen po gsum dang rang rang gi de kho na nyid so so ma yin tha mi dad do/_/de yang rtsa ba 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/_'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/_dpa' bo chen po bdag cag dkyil 'khor gsum du gzhug tu gsol/_skyes bu chen po yang dag par gzhug tu gsol/_
[\[162b.2\]]de skad ces gsol pa las/_skyes bu chen po des bka' stsal pa/_rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i byis pa khyed/_/'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang /_/'das dang ma 'das sa mtshams kyi/_/'gyur dbang ma nges sa la gzhag_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas 
[\[162b.3\]]'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad gsol to/_/dpa' bo chen po dgongs su gsol/_/bdag cag skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs/_/sgo 'dir 'jug par 'tshal lags na/_/rgyal ba'i sras su gzung du gsol/_/zhes gsol ba las/_skyes bu chen pos 
[\[162b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_/skal ldan 'dus pa'i tshogs chen khyed/_/bde bar 'ongs so legs par 'ongs/_/grub pa lung gi gsang sgo 'dir/_/su dag 'ongs pa slar mi ldog_/ces gsungs so/_/de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs de dag byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i
