[\[188a.1\]]pa'i zhabs kyi gdan khri'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rmongs pa'i sel ba spyod mthun dgrol ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//_//bam po drug par zug pa/_de nas 
[\[188a.2\]]lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gis gang la brgyud de grags pa'i gsang ba dam pa de sngon du byung ba spyad pa spyod pa grags pa'i 
[\[188a.3\]]gtam rgyud ji skad brjod pa rnam par brjod pa lags zhes smras pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sngon du byung ba'i gtam rgyud gsang ba dam pa spyad pa spyod par grags pa ni 'di lta ste/_gang 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis bcom 
[\[188a.4\]]ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba dam pa gang gis spyad pas legs pa dang /_nyes pa'i spyod pa ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 
[\[188a.5\]]'das des bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngags dam pa gang gis spyad pa spyod pa ni rab tu dka' bar shes par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang ba dam pa ni shin tu me dang 'dra ste/_ji ltar me ni rgyun du bcangs shing 
[\[188a.6\]]spyad legs na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun du spyad pa 'dod pa 'byung ngo /_/me nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du spyad nyes na me'i phung po chen por gyur te/_gang spyod par byed pa de yang bsregs/_khyim nas khyim yang bsregs/_rdzas kyi dngos po thams cad kyang 
[\[188a.7\]]tshig par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/_chu gang gi thabs kyis zin na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung ngo /_/gang chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la mi mkhas pa ni gang spyod par byed pa de nyid g.yang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]gsang ba dam pa 'di ni gdug pa'i gcan gzan dang 'dra ste/_gang gdug pa'i gcan gzan ni gzhan gyi srog gcod par byed cing gzhan dag 'joms par byed na yang /_gang thabs la mkhas pa de ji lta ba bzhin dbang du 'du'o/_/gang thabs 
[\[188b.2\]]kyis ma zin na ni rang gi srog la 'bab par byed do/_/gzhan yang gsang sngags 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste/_gang ji ltar thabs kyis zin na rin po che de la dga' ba der spyad du yod la/_gang gi thabs kyis ma 
[\[188b.3\]]zin na tshe dang bral bar byed do/_/gzhan yang ldum bu lang tang tshe dang 'dra ste/_gang gi thabs kyis zin na tshad nad drag po yang gcod par byed la/_gang thabs kyis ma zin na srog dang 'bral bar yang byed de/_de ltar na gang thabs kyis zin pa ni 
[\[188b.4\]]dug 'gyur rtsi dang /_gser 'gyur rtsi dang /_mun gyur gyi sgron ma bzhin du chung ngus chen po 'joms par nus te/_gang phyin ci ma log par nges pa nyid kyis thams cad de kho na nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de lta bas na gsang ba dam pa 
[\[188b.5\]]'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon du byung bar spyad par spyod pa dag gsang ba dam pa ngos ma zin pas log pa'i lam du byung ba yang yod do/_/gang thabs la mkhas pas ngos zin pa ma nor ba'i lam du byung ba yang yod pas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gang 
[\[188b.6\]]gsang ba dam pa ngos zin pa'i thabs kyi sprin chen pos spyad pa spyod pa la mkhas par gyis shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang du gsang sngags log pa'i lam ni gang 
[\[188b.7\]]lags/_gang ma nor ba'i lam pa ni gang lags/_bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]'di lta ste/_brgyud de grags pas gang spyod pa/_/gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/ji lta de ltar gtan la dbab/_/'di ni yang dag gsang ba'i lam/_/gang du log pa'i chos rnams dang /_/gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 
[\[189a.2\]]gnyis/_/btags pa ming gi sgra gcig phyir/_/nges pa'i rtags de zin par bya/_/theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags 'di/_/mthun 'jug thabs kyi sgrar bstan pas/_/phyi rol gzhan du 'gyur srid phyir/_/tshig dang sgra la don mi bzhag_/dam pa rnams 
[\[189a.3\]]kyi dgongs pa 'di/_/dpe 'am tshad ma'am gtan tshigs sam/_/rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis/_/rtogs par nus pa ma yin no/_/dgongs don gsang ba'i snying po la/_/gang gi blo ni ma 'byor par/_/su zhig smra bar brtson pa de/_/ma smras na ni mi 
[\[189a.4\]]'tsho 'am ci/_/de bzhin spyod dang ldan pa dang /_/sgrub dang rtog dpyod byed pa rnams/_/don la nges blo ma rnyed par/_/ma spyad na ni ci zhig nyes/_/ci phyir gsang sngags rgya mtsho 'di/_/dper na gang gi sbrid bsangs bzhin/_/dam pa'i bka' tshig re re la'ang /_/
[\[189a.5\]]don ni tha dad du mar 'byung /_/des na gsang sngags dam pa'i don/_/ma rtogs bzhin du gang smra ba/_/gang gis mtshams med lnga byas pas/_/log smra'i sdig de de bas lci/_/gsang ba nyid la gol ba yi/_/gsang bar smra ba'i log sred can/_/gsang 
[\[189a.6\]]sngags cho gas zin gyur na/_/gang gis 'tsho ba srog bcad kyang /_/de ni nyes pas mi 'gyur zhes/_/log par kha lo sgyur ba 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bram ze 'tsho ba'i log sred can/_/log smra rgyu spyod dbang 
[\[189a.7\]]sgyur ba'o/_/gang 'dir log par spyod rgyas pas/_/kun kyang log pa nyid la 'jug_/de la gsang bar sgra mtshon nas/_/gsang sngags de la mngon spyod 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gang du gzhan 'byung log sred can/_/
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]de min 'dra gzhan spyod pa'o/_/gang du 'di ltar log pa'i chos/_/gsang sngags dam pa'i tshig dang sgra/_/gcig la mi gcig so so la/_/rmongs pa'i mun par gang spyod pa/_/sngags pa bdud kyi las byed de/_/shi nas dmyal ba chen por 'gro/_/ci phyir lta 
[\[189b.2\]]bas ma zin phyir/_/bdud dang srin po'i spyod pa la/_/dga' mgur spyod cing 'dod dgur 'jol/_/de la bag chags zhen pa'i mthus/_/dmyal bar 'bar ba brgyad kyi yang /_/rdo rje dmyal ba chen por lhung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon 
[\[189b.3\]]byung ba/_/log pa'i stobs ldan ya mtshan can/_/log zhen sdug bsngal spyi gtsug pa'o/_/e ma'o 'gro ba rnam mi grol/_/ci phyir 'ong ba'i dus rnams su/_/g.yo can bcos pa'i gsang tshig gis/_/dri med gsang ba'i bstan pa rnams/_/dkrugs 'gyur 
[\[189b.4\]]bka' bslad gzhung bor nas/_/don med log chos rgyas par 'gyur/_/gzhan nas byung ba ma yin te/_/rtsa ba nyid las gyur par zad/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/'di bar ma gyur bslad pa can/_/de rgyud ngan pas de nyid 
[\[189b.5\]]bslad/_/nga yi yid bzhin nor bu 'di/_/cir yang ston la dpag dka'i phyir/_/ma 'ongs dus na log spyod kyis/_/log brtags log sde mang po 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/lam log lam stong lam nyes 
[\[189b.6\]]pa/_/log zhen log sde drug brgyud pa'o/_/gang la log zhen log dbang gis/_/log blos log mthong gtsor bzung nas/_/lta sgo kun du mi 'jug cing /_/rmongs pa'i lta bas brtan par gnas/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon 
[\[189b.7\]]byung ba/_/log lta gcig tu zhen sems pa/_/char ka nag po kun rmongs pa'o/_/gang 'dir bcing ba lngas bcings nas/_/rang gi che ba'i thabs bzung ste/_/rtog dpyod tsam yang mi 'jug pa/_/glang chen myos pa rmongs 'dra 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bdag nyid gcig pur chos smra ba/_/log phyogs gcig pur spyod pa'o/_/gang du dmus long lam zhugs pa/_/yid kyis gom pa'i tshad dpags nas/_/nyam nga'i lam du rgyug pa ltar/_/tshod 
[\[190a.2\]]dpags tsam la gtsor 'dzin 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gang du mun pas zin pa yi/_/brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin lnga sde pa'o/_/lung med rnal 'byor sgom pa dang /_/chos med chos su smra ba dang /_/sdig can smyon pa'i 
[\[190a.3\]]brtul zhugs la/_/dpal brtul spyod pa cher spyod 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gang gi tshad mas ma gzhal ba'i/_/mu cor smra ba sde bzhi pa'o/_/don med 'dug la brtson pa dang /_/lugs ma la sogs gzugs brnyan dag_/
[\[190a.4\]]dmigs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa yi/_/gang du rigs pa'i ri bo 'byung /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gang du rgyu ba kun bkag pa/_/mnyam par 'jug pa bdun sde pa'o/_/sbas pa'i don rnams sgrar bsgyur nas/_/dpyod khongs 
[\[190a.5\]]tsam du byed pa rnams/_/steng du mi 'bab gol sar 'gro/_/sku gsung thugs kyi spu byed yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na/_/de skad gsang ba mchog des bshad/_/gzhan yang thabs ldan 'di lta ste/_/de nas 'khor der 'dus gyur pa'i/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[190a.6\]]theg pa mchog spyod pa'i/_/tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba la/_/gang der mos pa chung spyod pa'i/_/rnal 'byor grags ldan zhes bya bas/_/'di skad gal du dri ba dris/_/dam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i 'od/_/gang 'dir dam pa spyod do zhes/_/shin tu dman pa'i las 
[\[190a.7\]]spyod pa/_/de yi sman pa tha dad phyir/_/mun pa snang bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/dman pa dam par ga la 'gyur/_/dper na mtho sar bgrod 'dod pa/_/gzhol phyogs lam du 'bab pa bzhin/_/go 'phang chen po mthong 'dod pa/_/ngan 'gro ya nga'i rgyud du zhugs/_/
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]gang zhig btung ba'i chu 'dod pa/_/smig rgyu bsnyags pas tshim med ltar/_/dman pa dam par smin 'dod pa/_/mnyam la dman spyod 'gyur ma yin/_/sbrul 'bras khyung gis brnos 'gyur yang /_/phyin ci log 'gyur mi srid pas/_/de nyid kho nar snang ba 
[\[190b.2\]]bzhin/_/dman pa dam par 'gyur mi srid/_/gang gi gsang ba las log pa'i/_/gang 'dir log spyod dman pa dag_/thams cad rang bzhin med stong pas/_/nyon mongs byang chub stong mnyam zer/_/'tsho ba'i sman dang 'chi ba'i dug_/'byung bas bskyed par 
[\[190b.3\]]rgyu gcig kyang /_/'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa'i mthu/_/de nyid mi mthun so sor snang /_/des na gang 'dir la la zhig_/'byung bas bskyod pas gcig mnyam zhes/_/dug kyang za zhing btung ngam ci/_/de bzhin dam pa dman pa'i las/_/rang bzhin med par don 
[\[190b.4\]]gcig kyang /_/mnyam zhes dam pa nyid bzhag cing /_/dman pa ched du spyod dam ci/_/des na dam pa dman pa dang /_/gtsang dang mi gtsang che chung gnyis/_/bzang ngan bde sdug la sogs dang /_/bsti gnas spyad byar snyoms med pa/_/mnyam sbyor rtags spyod 
[\[190b.5\]]yin zhe na/_/dug dang kha zas bde sdug rnams/_/mi mnyam mnyam par ga la snyoms/_/ma bcos mnyam pa'i chos nyid la/_/glo bur las kyis mi mnyam ste/_/nam mkha' dri med ye nas gsal/_/dag par bya phyir 'khru 'dod 'dra'o/_/gang du nad rnams 
[\[190b.6\]]'joms pa'i sman/_/nad med rnams kyi dug tu 'gyur/_/lta log 'jig rten drang ba'i thabs/_/rnal mar spyod na nyes par nges/_/mthun 'jug spyod pa drang ba'i thabs/_/gang gi dbang du spyod byed pa/_/gang stobs rig dang ldan pa yis/_/mi mthun bcos 
[\[190b.7\]]nas mthun 'gyur bzhin/_/tshig mthun don ldan dam pa yis/_/ji ltar rigs pa de ltar nges/_/ji ltar zhum pas khe brkam gyi/_/grags pa 'dod phyir gdeng med par/_/g.yul zhugs stobs rig 'gran bzlas na/_/gzhan dbang de nyid brlag par 'gyur/_/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]de bzhin dam par bcos pa yis/_/khe dang grags pa rlom sems phyir/_/log sred drang ba'i mthun spyod la/_/yang dag dam par nges bzung nas/_/tshig gi lam nyid sgrar spyad na/_/bdag phung gzhan brlag dman par nges/_/thams cad gang 
[\[191a.2\]]gi thig tshad dang /_/go dang rtogs dang nus tshad dang /_/gang du 'dul tshad ma gtogs pa/_/tshad las 'das na yul med de/_/'das na 'das pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gang yang tshad las 'das pa ni/_/zas kyang dug du 'gyur bzhin du/_/dug chen za ba'i smyon pa de/_/dam 
[\[191a.3\]]pas kyang ni mi rigs so/_/gang dag gang gis bcings pa las/_/de nyid ma grol ma thar par/_/thams cad thams cad sgrol ba yi/_/slu ba chen po de ci zhig_/de nyid ma rig ma grol zhing /_/de yi sems dag ma byung na/_/sangs rgyas sa la des bzhag 
[\[191a.4\]]kyang /_/de nyid mthong ba dmyal ba'i gnas/_/de rig de yi don ldan na/_/dmyal chen de dag zhing khams dag_/gsang ba'i snying po kun khyab kyang /_/de rig de dang ma ldan na/_/long ba'i mdun du gzugs bstan ltar/_/gti mug 'khor ba'i mun pa 
[\[191a.5\]]yin/_/de skad gal du dris pa las/_/tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba yi/_/rnal 'byor dam pa theg chen pos/_/rnal 'byor mos pa chung spyod pa/_/grags pa'i tshul ldan bya ba la/_/dam par nges pa'i tshig smras pa/_/gang 'dir mos pa chung 'dzin gyi/_/
[\[191a.6\]]grags pa'i tshul 'dzin bya ba khyod/_/gsang sngags gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/sangs rgyas nyid 'di ma gtogs pa/_/gang gi spyod yul ma yin pas/_/tshul 'dra tsam gyis mi 'grub po/_/gang 'dir dad mos 'dod nus na/_/de nyid de la der bltas na/_/
[\[191a.7\]]de la de sbyor de nyid de/_/de dag tsam ni theg tshad yin/_/gang 'dir theg pa mang bshad pa/_/tha dad yod pa ma yin te/_/mos pa tha dad drang ba'i phyir/_/thabs kyi sgo ni mang por bshad/_/de kun mos pa ma bkag pa'i/_/dran pa'i thabs su sbyar bas 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]na/_/kun la nges pa'i blo mi bzhag_/gang du nges pa gcig nyid la'o/_/kun shong kun 'jug 'di bde bas/_/theg pa chen po brjod pa yin/_/theg pa che dang thabs mang bas/_/thams cad gang yang 'gog pa med/_/gang mi 'gog par 'jug 
[\[191b.2\]]lam bde/_/bde ba nyid la spyad par sla/_/thabs dang theg pa'i bye brag rnams/_/so so mi mthun tha dad kyang /_/thabs kyi nges pa spyod pas na/_/nges pa nyid na khyad par med/_/dam tshig bsgrub pa spyod pa dang /_/lta ba sna tshogs tha dad kun/_/dud 
[\[191b.3\]]'gro [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mi ma yin/_/ngan skyugs ched du byed las sogs/_/phyin ci log tu bltas pa rnams/_/dam pa'i don la gzud pa'i phyir/_/rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad kyang /_/yid nyid rdo rjer gcig dgongs nas/_/sna tshogs kun dang mthun 'jug phyir/_/
[\[191b.4\]]sbyar nas bsten brid drang ba dang /_/khrid pa'i thabs su sbyar bar zad/_/'jig rten kun gyi dman pa rnams/_/sna tshogs dam par drang ba'i phyir/_/dman pa'i lta spyod mtha' yas pas/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed par zad/_/sbrul sgong khyung du mi 'gyur yang /_/
[\[191b.5\]]'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman bzhin du/_/dman pa kun gyi de bzhin nyid/_/ma bcos shes na dam par 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la/_/ngan 'gro go 'phang mtho dman med/_/snyon rmongs byang chub tha dad kyang /_/stong pa nyid la de gnyis 
[\[191b.6\]]med/_/dug dang sman gnyis so so yang /_/'byung ba dag la de gnyis med/_/ma 'dres sna tshogs tha dad kyang /_/kun gyi rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs/_/gang 'dir dam par 'gyur nges na/_/dman pa'i las rnams ched du spyad/_/de nyid ma mthong gang dag 
[\[191b.7\]]gis/_/tshig brda lam gyi rjes 'brangs pas/_/yang dag lam las gol ba yi/_/log pa'i lam pa sha dag 'byung /_/lang ka'i bdag po de skad du/_/tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba des/_/grags pa'i tshul dang ldan pa yi/_/dri ba chung ngu the tshom bcad/_/ces 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]gsang ba'i bdag po des lang ka'i mnga' bdag la smras pas/_gang du mos pa chung ngu'i sems can rnams theg pa chen po nyid du nges par grol bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gang gi dri ba the tshom 
[\[192a.2\]]bcad pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye lang ka'i bdag po kho bo dran pa thog ma'i tshe/_kho bo'i ston pa 
[\[192a.3\]]gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor dam pa de'i nang du gsang ba brgyud pa'i grags pa'i gtam rgyud brjod pa ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_nga yi dgongs pa skabs gcig na/_/gsang ba'i bdag po don 'di dag_/ma nor ba nyid nub par gyur/_/
[\[192a.4\]]tshul lam bcos tsam gang dag la/_/phal cher don du spyod mod kyi/_/don du nges pa ngas ma mthong /_/kun kyang log pa'i lam la spyod/_/gang du log pa ji gang na/_/'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang /_/'di la log dang log tshul spyod/_/'di tshul ma yin 
[\[192a.5\]]'dir ma nges/_/g.yo sgyus bden 'drar bcos log gam/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bskal pa kun bkod bya ba la/_/sangs rgyas mngon 'byung rgyal po de/_/mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og tu/_/byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang ldan de/_/
[\[192a.6\]]mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la/_/tshul bcos log pa'i sngags bstan pas/_/lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa de/_/don las gol cing 'khor bar log_/de 'dra'i tshul 'byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon/_/rmad 'byung gsang 
[\[192a.7\]]ba'i snying po 'di/_/rnal 'byor dbang sgyur tshad ma rnams/_/phal cher mi gnas skabs dag tu/_/mi shes ngan rtog can rnams kyis/_/log brtags don bslad gzhung bor te/_/nor bas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing /_/'di yin gzhan rtogs ma yin zhes/_/
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa log_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/bskal pa de yi dus nyid la/_/rnal 'byor dpal byin bya ba zhig_/don la blo shed ma bye zhing /_/gros kyi thabs la mi mkhas pas/_/blo gros nges pa'i gzhung bor nas/_/chos ma yin pa'i chos 
[\[192b.2\]]spyod cing /_/nges pa'i gros ldan gzhan dag la/_/de ltar ma nges blo gros ni/_/bdag gi blo gros 'di yin zhes/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal cher spyod pa/_/'di ni srid pa log pa'i lam/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gnod 'dul 'di lta ste/_/sngar 
[\[192b.3\]]byung rgyud kyi rjes gnas pas/_/gdeng med bzhin du dpon bstabs nas/_/tshig gnyer dregs pa'i dbang des ni/_/mi shes bzhin du ras spyod pa/_/tshul 'chos sems kyi gya gyu can/_/smyon thabs blun po'i sdig can yin/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i 
[\[192b.4\]]dus na sngon byung ba/_/kun bkod grags pa de nyid la/_/tshul brtags 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/dri med spyod ces bya ba zhig_/sngar byung mkhas pa rjes su gnang /_/khri phrag bcu yi 'khor rnams kyis/_/rgyud kyi rjes su byung ba yi/_/don med rnal 'byor de nyid 
[\[192b.5\]]la/_/tshig gi khur chen ljid phab nas/_/rigs rgyud 'dzin par dpon bstabs te/_/che bas che ba'i dregs pa skyed/_/mi shes bzhin du tshul 'chos te/_/'dra tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas/_/'khor bcas dregs pa'i ru trar lhung /_/de 'dra'i tshul 
[\[192b.6\]]byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gnod 'dul gsang ba'i bdag_/mdza' 'drin bsdang ster zhing rnams dang /_/rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba'i 'khor/_/gzhan dbang nyid du 'gyur dogs nas/_/ris dang tshom sde so sor gcod/_/'di dag bdag gis gdul 
[\[192b.7\]]bya yi/_/'byor pas 'tsho ba'i zhing yin gyis/_/gang dag gang 'dir ma 'du zhes/_/nyon mongs tshig gis sgo byed nor/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gang du grags pa de nyid la/_/na zhi na zhes bya ba zhig_/rnal 'byor 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas/_/shin tu gsang sngags cher spyod ces/_/dgon pa'i rgyun du dben gnas te/_/gang gi ljongs chen de dag na/_/gnas pas gnas pa de dag kun/_/kha gsag thabs rgyud zhing du spyod/_/gzhan gyi sde 
[\[193a.2\]]par gyur pa yi/_/rnal 'byor mig ldan don mthong zhing /_/gang de ched du gnyer 'ongs nas/_/don dam nges lam de kho na/_/rgyas par bstan du brtsams pa las/_/dgon pa'i rgyud du dben 'dzin pas/_/nyon mongs log pa'i sgo ba byas/_/'di khams 
[\[193a.3\]]bdag gi zhing yin gyis/_/kho na ngo bo nyid deng shig_/tshan dang gzhan gyi ris bcad pas/_/nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam du lhung /_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gdul dka' 'dul ba yi/_/rnal 'byor dam par bsngo rgyu la/_/bdag 
[\[193a.4\]]gir 'dod spyod gsog 'jog byed/_/gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa/_/nam zhar log spyod thob pa min/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/grags pa kun bkod de nyid la/_/bder shis zhes ni bya ba yi/_/rnal 
[\[193a.5\]]'byor zhen chags 'khor dang bcas/_/sngags tshig sgra yi rjes spyod las/_/de yi 'khor der 'dus gyur pa'i/_/bud med bzang rgyan bya ba zhig_/'tsho ba 'dzin par sbyar ba las/_/ser snas gsog 'jog byas pa yis/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]khyi yi lus blangs te/_/
[\[193a.6\]]dman pa'i lus su gtan du 'khyams/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyad/_/gzhan yang gsang bdag gnod 'dul la/_/log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni/_/log lta spyi brtol gtum khro che/_/sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang /_/bdag 'di nges pa kho na zhes/_/
[\[193a.7\]]bab chol bka' rkun slu byed byed bslad/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/chos skyong ba yi rnal 'byor pa/_/pra ma ta zhes bya ba zhig_/don dang lam la ma mthong bar/_/bdag ni lam mkhan kho na zhes/_/kun la rgya cher grags pa las/_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]rgyal ba'i bka' rkun 'gro gang rnams/_/bslu par gyur pa'i smin pa yis/_/ngan 'gror bying gyur gnas de nas/_/thar nas log pa'i 'jig rten pa/_/bdag 'dzin spyod pa'i gnas su ltung /_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang bdag 
[\[193b.2\]]'dul ba bo/_/tha tshig nyams shing don la rmugs/_/grags pas de la khas 'che phyir/_/rgyal po'i rgyal sa thob 'dod pa/_/khrel med spyi brtol mun sprul 'chal/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gang du grags pa de 
[\[193b.3\]]nyid la/_/rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa/_/pe na pa ya bya ba zhig_/brgya yi sde dang bcas pa byung /_/rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs/_/dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis/_/don dang ldan par tshul 'chos phyir/_/rgyal po'i rgyal thabs che blangs 
[\[193b.4\]]pas/_/ri bos srog chags mnan pa bzhin/_/nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis/_/'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa/_/gti mug phag gi lus su ltung /_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon/_/mnyam pa'i don nyid 
[\[193b.5\]]ma chub par/_/mnyam zhes tshig gi lam 'byin zhing /_/chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'chel ba/_/rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/grags 'byung bskal pa de nyid la/_/bde sbyin zhes ni 
[\[193b.6\]]bya ba zhig_/rnal 'byor stong gi 'khor dang bcas/_/gsang ba dam par nges so zhes/_/sten khrid chags sdang gnyis la 'chel/_/de nyid yongs su smin pa yis/_/rak+Sha srin po'i khams su ltung /_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang bdag 
[\[193b.7\]]'di lta ste/_/rnal 'byor gang dag blo chung rnams/_/rnal 'byor gang dag don glengs na/_/de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te/_/spa zhum mi dga' 'byol byed blun/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/grags 'byung bskal pa de nyid 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]la/_/lha sbyin de zhes bya ba zhig_/rnal 'byor las kyi dang po'i tshe/_/rnal 'byor nges don mang po gzhan/_/nges don gsang ba'i don glengs na/_/lha sbyin 'khor bcas de las byol/_/nor ba'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes/_/rang gi gnas 
[\[194a.2\]]dor ngan du brjod/_/de yis bskal pa dpag med du/_/yang dag don gol log par 'khyams/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon/_/rnal 'byor nyid kyi rnal 'byor la/_/rnon po gdug pa'i dug mda' gtong /_/
[\[194a.3\]]tha tshigs btsan po rdzong lta bu/_/'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bgegs yin/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/rnal 'byor blo gros bya ba zhig_/mi 'jigs zhes bya'i rnal 'byor pa/_/don med bcos par spyod pa der/_/blo gros dam pa 'dus par gyur/_/bzod 
[\[194a.4\]]ldan de la ngan sems kyis/_/skur btab kha na ma tho brjod/_/des ni mi 'jigs mnar med ltung /_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang bdag 'jig nyon cig_/lta ba'i dmigs bu dang bral nas/_/yang dag dbu ma'i lam mi gsal/_/
[\[194a.5\]]spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa/_/de ni rnal 'byor long ba'i tshogs/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/rgyal po rab tu gsal 'dzin pa/_/rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rjes zhugs te/_/shes rab lta ba mig med par/_/rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul bzung nas/_/sgra 
[\[194a.6\]]thos rjes su tshul spyad pas/_/gti mug mun pa'i khams su ltung /_/de 'dra'i tshul byung der ma spyod/_/de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog_/thams cad 'khor ba'i lam par ltung /_/des na gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/gol sa che bar rgyal bas 
[\[194a.7\]]bshad/_/des na thabs la mkhas pa dang /_/blo gros dam pa shin tu gces/_/thabs mkhas blo gros ldan pa yi/_/nges par legs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi/_/rtsal chen rnams kyi bcad rgyud 'di/_/skyes bu dam pa'i spyod yul 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]te/_/yon tan sgra bsgrags sus thos pa/_/ming tsam gyis kyang bde thob cing /_/dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob yin/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/shin tu gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/ma byung ba yi sngon dus na/_/lha gnas gsum du grags pa 
[\[194b.2\]]las/_/lha yi bu ni 'od ldan te/_/mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas/_/sngon byung snga ltas byung ba na/_/mi bde bar ni 'du shes gyur/_/ma 'ongs 'du shes bzhag pa las/_/mi gtsang zas kyis 'tsho ba yi/_/srog chags blun pa'i lus 
[\[194b.3\]]len par/_/rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong /_/shin tu skrag pa'i 'du shes kyis/_/skyabs kyi yul ni yid la byas/_/gang der gang dran ma byung bar/_/theg chen gsang ba'i snying po'i mtshan/_/tshig gi lam du grags pa bzhin/_/thos 
[\[194b.4\]]pa yid la byas pa yis/_/ngan 'gror 'gro las slar log ste/_/bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khod/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung de bzhin spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang ba'i bdag po nyon/_/theg chen gsang bar rab nges na/_/rnam smin drag pos gar 
[\[194b.5\]]'phangs kyang /_/ji ltar pho long brdabs pa bzhin/_/'phen 'gro don gyis der mi gnas/_/ci phyir thams cad stong nyid pas/_/sdug bsngal gnas su bcas de yang /_/sems can bcas te stong pa'i phyir/_/reg 'gyur myong bar 'gyur ma 
[\[194b.6\]]yin/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/dmigs pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa/_/theg chen zab mo'i tshig thos pas/_/shin tu skrag cing dngang 'gyur te/_/skur btab rgyab phyogs snying ral nas/_/ngu 'bod gnas ltung ma myong 
[\[194b.7\]]bar/_/bde 'gro thar pa'i gnas su thon/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung shes par gyis/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang 'di la/_/gang dga' gang zhig 'dun skyed pa/_/gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar/_/ji ltar mos pa de myur thob/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/bram ze byams ldan zhes bya bas/_/gsang chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/mthong bas mos te kun la bltas/_/de yang rnyed par ma gyur te/_/gang gi phyogs su gnas nas ni/_/shin tu ngus nas 
[\[195a.2\]]gdungs sngags smres/_/e ma'o bdag ni las re pham/_/skyes nas rgas par gyur bar du/_/yang dag gsang ba'i don btsal na/_/gang 'di ma mthong las re ngan/_/da yang ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/_/btsal bas rnyed par yod min te/_/bdag la ston 
[\[195a.3\]]pa gang su zhig_/sgra cher ngus te smras pa las/_/nam mkha'i khams nas sgra byung ste/_/skal dang ldan pa'i rigs can khyod/_/'di ltar nges pa'i blo brtan pas/_/khyod ni don gyi bgo skal ba/_/dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis/_/khyod la byin gyis 
[\[195a.4\]]brlab pa mdzad/_/de bas mos pa ma g.yel bar/_/don dang phrad pa'i thabs dag la/_/mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te/_/gdos pa'i lus ni gdod bor nas/_/snying po don la nges bltas na/_/de ma thag tu mthong bar 'gyur/_/de skad lung bstan 
[\[195a.5\]]thos nas ni/_/dga' bas mos pa cher g.yos te/_/ji ltar bstan pa der bltas pas/_/rigs chen 'dzin pa'i sras su gyur/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung mos par spyod/_/gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs te/_/thams cad du 
[\[195a.6\]]yang de bzhin te/_/tog gi rtse mor gyur pa bzhin/_/yongs kyis nub pa ma yin no/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/dge ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/_/lha bu khri tsho bcu dang bcas/_/snying po gsang bar rnal 'byor la/_/rin chen 'od ldan gtsug 'dzin du/_/shin 
[\[195a.7\]]tu dang bas dger g.yos te/_/lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang /_/bcas nas dam pa'i drung du dong /_/dga' bas 'dun pa'i tshul bzung nas/_/snying po gsang ba'i don la zhugs/_/cho 'phrul chen po bzhi thob ste/_/lha gnas kun du bgrod pa dang /_/'byung 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]chen lus las sprul pa dang /_/ri bo 'degs dang 'phang ba dang /_/yun gyi tshe la gnas pa thob/_/rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du/_/mthong ba dag gi chos nyid de/_/bskal par nub par ma gyur to/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung 'jug par gyis/_/gzhan 
[\[195b.2\]]yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste/_/mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pa/_/ye shes sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas/_/bla med snying po can rnams kyi/_/lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa yin/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/theg chen gsang 
[\[195b.3\]]bar rab nges pa/_/lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa yi/_/rigs chen 'dzin pa'i sa nyid thob/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung mthong bar gyis/_/gzhan yang gsang chen 'dzin pa nyon/_/gang dag theg chen mngon spyod la/_/dga' bas rjes su yi rang bas/_/
[\[195b.4\]]de ni de dang 'dra ba ste/_/'bras bu dag la mtho dman med/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan pa/_/rnal 'byor can gyi 'khor dang bcas/_/theg chen zab mo'i don la zhugs/_/gsang sngags gsang 
[\[195b.5\]]ba'i byin brlabs dag_/ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po rnams/_/thog ma kun du grags par gyur/_/de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/bram ze dge slong bya ba zhig_/shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/_/dam par nges pa'i bslab pa zhus/_/byis 
[\[195b.6\]]pa'i spyod yul ma yin phyir/_/gsang chen gsang bar rab tu gsungs/_/bram ze ma log yo byad dag_/de la de bsngos dag par sbyar/_/skyes bu dam pa de yul du/_/yid kyis phyogs der smon par brjod/_/'di la mos pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/
[\[195b.7\]]snying por nges pa'i dam pa dang /_/rjes su yi rang dam pa gnyis/_/thob pa mnyam pa nyid du gyur/_/'di ltar tshegs med don po che/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i rigs chen 'dzin/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung mkhas par gyis/_/gzhan yang gsang 'dzin 'di lta ste/_/
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bsam yas bsam gyis khyab pa yi/_/rgyal bas 'di gzigs 'di mkhyen pas/_/srid gsum 'khor ba'i bshes gnyen du/_/dam pa gsang ba'i bdag por gyur/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/gsal 
[\[196a.2\]]byin bya ba'i khyim bdag zhig_/theg chen gsang ba 'dir gnas pas/_/rang gi gsang ba nyid mthong bas/_/gsang chen gsang ba'i nges rnyed de/_/kun gyi gsang ba nges par mthong /_/chos rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste/_/de las de byung 'bum phrag yas/_/
[\[196a.3\]]chos kyi rgyal por gyur nas ni/_/smra ba kun gyi seng ge zhes/_/zhing khams kun du grags par gyur/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung bslab par gyis/_/gzhan yang gsang 'dzin gnod 'dul nyon/_/theg chen gsang ba'i tshig lam gcig_/khong du chud par gyur 
[\[196a.4\]]pa ni/_/skye bo nyan thos bsam yas dang /_/rgyal ba mtha' yas sras bcas la/_/mchod yon tshogs chen spel bas ni/_/'bum gyi char yang mi phod do/_/ci'i phyir theg chen 'di shes pas/_/rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchog 'di yin/_/nam mkha' kun 
[\[196a.5\]]khyab rgyal ba dang /_/theg chen gsang ba'i snying po gnyis/_/so so ma yin tha mi dad/_/des na rgyal ba gcig mnyes pas/_/rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin/_/sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med/_/'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par las/_/
[\[196a.6\]]bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/skal ldan yongs su dag pa'i rigs/_/dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis/_/gang du mos pa so sor skyes/_/gcig la gcig 'dir tha chig bcas/_/gcig 
[\[196a.7\]]gis dman pa'i theg pa la/_/spyad nas bya ba'i las chen byas/_/gcig ni theg chen gsang ba'i don/_/rgya cher nges par chub pa las/_/theg chen zhon pa'i gsal ldan ni/_/rigs chen gcig gis mngon par chub/_/bya ba byed pa'i dge ldan ni/_/grangs 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]med bskal pa gsum gyis chub/_/des na theg chen gsang ba la/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung tshul bzhin spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang 'dzin bdag po nyon/_/gsang 'di rtag tu gang 'chad pa/_/mi bskyod rgyal po la sogs pa'i/_/che yon rtag pa'i ci 'dra ba/_/don 
[\[196b.2\]]gyi gzungs dang bcas pa thob/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/khyim bdag mes byin bya ba de/_/brgya yi 'khor dang bcas pa zhig_/rtag par theg chen 'dir gnas pas/_/sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs rgyal po yi/_/'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra ba/_/rigs chen 
[\[196b.3\]]'dzin pa gcig gis thob/_/de 'dra'i tshul byung dag par spyod/_/gzhan yang gsang bdag 'di lta ste/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/don du nges par bsgrub pa rnams/_/rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa/_/goms pas brjod dang smon pa yis/_/chos 
[\[196b.4\]]kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhing /_/yon tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/_/drang srong rnal 'byor kal ya nas/_/drang srong rnam pa mang sde la/_/theg chen gsang ba'i bsngags pa brjod/_/don rnams 
[\[196b.5\]]nges par bkod pa las/_/mang pos rigs chen 'dzin pa thob/_/gang der bsngags pa rjod byed pa/_/gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/des na theg chen gsang ba 'di/_/kun la bsngags pa brjod par gyis/_/des ni nga yi dgongs pa 
[\[196b.6\]]thob/_/rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam yang /_/theg chen gsang ba'i snying po yin/_/rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pas/_/skad cig thang cig yud tsam la/_/gsang chen gsang bar nges bzhag na/_/rgyal ba kun kyang rigs 'dzin gyi/_/gsang chen 
[\[196b.7\]]gsang bar rab nges pa'o/_/gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar na/_/gsang chen gsang ba'i snying po gang /_/nges par legs pa'i bcad rgyud dang /_/log par nges pa'i bcad rgyud rnams/_/sngon byung brgyud pa grags pa yin/_/de skad gsang ba mchog 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]nyid gsung /_/zhes gsang ba'i bdag pos sngon byung ba'i gtam rgyud ji ltar brgyud cing grags pa brjod pa'i bya ba byas pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa mngon du snang ba'i sems dpa' dman pa'i lus can rnams gang du ma nges 
[\[197a.2\]]pa'i som nyi yongs su chad par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sngon du byung ba gtam rgyud yongs su brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//_//theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las brgyud pa thabs 
[\[197a.3\]]kyis grags pa na yang byung bya ba gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon du byung ba'i tshig 
[\[197a.4\]]bcu gnyis pa'i dgu pa gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang byung zhes pa byung ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabs su gang gi ched 
[\[197a.5\]]du mdzad pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta ji ltar mdzad de yongs su grags pa lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang ma bcos pa de kho na bzhin mdzad pa la bya'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba ba'i bdag po gang ma bcos pa de kho na bzhin du mdzad pa 
[\[197a.6\]]de gang lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po chos rnams kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid la bya'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de kho na nyid la ni sangs rgyas kyang med/_sems can yang med/_pho mo yang med/_
[\[197a.7\]]rigs rgyud kyang med/_gzugs med/_bstan du med/_mtshon du med/_dpe yang med/_mdzad pa yang med de/_dpag par rab tu dka' la gang gis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang ci yang med pa las sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sems can dang /_pho mo dang /_rigs rgyud dang /_gzugs sna tshogs dang /_bstan pa sna tshogs dang /_mtshon pa dang /_dpe tha dad pa dang /_mdzad pa sna tshogs dang /_rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa ji snyed pa mang po 'di dag gang gi ched du mdzad pa 
[\[197b.2\]]snang ba lags zhes yongs su dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye lang ka'i bdag po yongs su dri ba chen po 'di ni legs so/_/rab tu legs so/_/gang ci yang med pa las cir yang snang ba'i don 'di ni de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i 
[\[197b.3\]]phyir te/_grong khyer chen po gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa tha dad par snang ba 'ba' zhig go/_/grong khyer gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyed snang gi grong khyer dang /_kun snang gi grong khyer dang /_mi snang ba'i grong khyer ro/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong 
[\[197b.4\]]khyer gsum nyid chos nyid yin pas na de la ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /_grong khyer gsum gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'dir gcig pa'i phyir te/_thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo dang /_gnas su gyur 
[\[197b.5\]]pa kho na'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sgo gsum du snang ba ni 'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_rig pa'i sgo dang /_gsang ba'i sgo'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzungs kyi sgo yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang ba mdzad pa ni 
[\[197b.6\]]'di lta ste/_de nyid kyi rkyen gyis zhi gnas dang /_de 'dzin gyi rkyen gyis lhag mthong dang /_de 'jug gi rkyen gyis las mtha'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po rig pa'i sgo la yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang ba mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/_mi snang ba'i ched 
[\[197b.7\]]du zhi gnas dang /_/snang ba'i ched du lhag mthong dang /_zhen pa'i ched du las mtha'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gsang ba'i sgo la yang grong khyer gsum gyi ched du gsum snang bar mdzad pa snang ba ni 'di lta ste/_/snang ba'i ched du zhi gnas dang /_snang ba'i ched du 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]lhag mthong dang /_zhen pa'i ched du las mtha'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sangs rgyas gsum snang ba mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/_mi snang ba'i ched du 'dus ma byas kyi sangs rgyas dang /_snang ba'i ched du 'dus byas kyi 
[\[198a.2\]]sangs rgyas dang /_zhen pa'i ched du gzugs kyi sangs rgyas dang gsum mo/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi rkyen gyis sems can gsum ste/_de nyid gol ba'i rkyen gyis gzugs med pa'i sems can dang /_de 'dzin gol ba'i rkyen gyis 
[\[198a.3\]]gzugs kyi sems can dang /_de 'jug zhen pa'i rkyen gyis 'dod pa'i sems can no/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi rkyen gyis/_/lus gsum bstan pa ni med pa dang /_rags pa dang /_pho mo dang /_ma ning ngo /_/lang ka'i bdag po 'dod 
[\[198a.4\]]pa'i rkyen gyis gang gi yab yum dang /_sras rgyud dang /_'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa ltar snang ngo /_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum du de bzhin gshegs pa nyid mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad 
[\[198a.5\]]de/_lhums su zhugs pa dang /_de na yang de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa the tshom gcod pa dang /_slar log pa dang /_zhu ba dang /_zhu bar sdog pa dang /_gnang ba dang /_bye ba dang /_bye ba snyed du 'jug par mdzad do/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer 
[\[198a.6\]]gsum gyi ched du bstan pa gsum ste/_de nyid kyi rkyen gyis theg pa chen po dang /_de 'dzin gyi rkyen gyis theg pa sna tshogs dang /_de 'jug gi rkyen gyis theg pa chung ngu snang bar mdzad do/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du ting nge 'dzin 
[\[198a.7\]]gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/_de nyid kyi ched du de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_de 'dzin gyi ched du kun du snang gi ting nge 'dzin dang /_de 'jug gi ched du rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du mchod rten gsum snang 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]ba ni 'di lta ste/_thugs kyi mchod rten dang /_sku'i mchod rten dang /_gsung gi mchod rten no/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du dkyil 'khor gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 
[\[198b.2\]]'khor dang /_gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ro/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi ched du sngags gsum snang ba ni 'di lta ste/_gsang sngags dang /_rig sngags dang /_gzungs sngags so/_/lang ka'i bdag po grong khyer gsum gyi 
[\[198b.3\]]ched du 'bras bu dang /_rkyen dang /_rgyu'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag la sogs pa grong khyer gsum gyi ched du mdzad pa yongs su snang bar mdzad de/_de dag ni thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su snang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo 
[\[198b.4\]]chen po las thugs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi ched du yang dag pa'i gsang ba 'di yongs 
[\[198b.5\]]su gsung bar mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam pa ni/_/thams cad nyid las mi gzhan phyir/_/ci yang blang dor med pas na/_/rdo rje nam mkha' gdon mi za/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang rang sangs rgyas kyi ched du snang ba rdo rje bstan pa 'di gsung bar 
[\[198b.6\]]mdzad do/_/ngag gi rdo rje yi ge med/_/lus kyi rdo rje snang ston pa/_/gang gi yid ni 'dir bcug ste/_/gsang ba nyid du rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/_nyan thos kyi ched du bslab pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung 
[\[198b.7\]]ba mdzad do/_/sgo gsum rdo rje bye ba bcu/_/bsrung ba yongs su dag pa'i mtha'/_/zhi ba phyogs yid 'dir bcug ste/_/dam pa nyid du rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des rnal 'byor sems dpa'i ched du lta ba rdo rje gsang ba 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/thams cad rnam rig 'khrul snang ba/_/gzhan med de nyid dam par yod/_/rnam shes gang yin 'dir bcug ste/_/gsang ba dam par rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gang gi 
[\[199a.2\]]mtha' yongs su sel ba dag gi ched du nam mkha' rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/gang 'dir yod dang med pa yi/_/mtha' gnyis nges par rab bsal te/_/sems nyid gang yin 'dir bcug ste/_/dbu mar mi dmigs rab nges pa'o/_/
[\[199a.3\]]lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des tshangs pa la sogs pa gang gti mug can gyi ched du gti mug rdo rjer mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/'jig rten kun gyi gti mug las/_/byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'byung /_/gti mug rdo rje yid bcug 
[\[199a.4\]]nas/_/gsang chen theg par rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gu lang la sogs pa gang 'dod chags can gyi ched du chags pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung ba mdzad do/_/'jig rten g.yo rdul pho mo gang /_/ji snyed gu lang u ma 
[\[199a.5\]]nyid/_/chags pa rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/gsang chen theg par rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des bi snu la sogs pa gang zhe sdang can gyi ched du gsod pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/ji snyed g.yo rdul sems can rnams/_/
[\[199a.6\]]rdo rje mtshon chen gcig gis bsad/_/zhe sdang rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/rdo rje theg par rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang phrag dog can gyi ched du 'khrug pa rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/sha za rtag 
[\[199a.7\]]tu gzhan 'dod spyod/_/kun sdom rdo rje go cha bgos/_/kun 'khrug rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/gsang chen snying por rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des klu la sogs pa gang phra ma can gyi ched du phra ma rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rdo rje dam pa dbye ba'i mchog_/log lta yang dag lta dbye byas/_/phra ma rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/rdo rje gsang bar rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des lha ma yin la sogs pa gang nga rgyal can gyi ched du gdul dka' rdo rje mdzad pa 'di 
[\[199b.2\]]gsung bar mdzad do/_/rdo rje gdul dka' ma lus pa/_/gnon pa brtsegs pa'i ri bo che/_/nga rgyal rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/rdo rje theg par rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des srin po la sogs pa sha za rnams kyi ched du rngam pa rdo rje mdzad pa 
[\[199b.3\]]'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/rdo rje za ba ma lus pa/_/thams cad za bar byed pa nyid/_/rngam pa rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/theg pa chen por rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des mkha' 'gro la sogs pa gang /_/phra men ma dag gi ched du rdo rje a mr-i 
[\[199b.4\]]ta mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad do/_/rdo rje bshang gci a mr-i ta/_/btung ba ma nges pa yi thabs/_/phra men rdo rje yid bcug nas/_/rdo rje gsang bar rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yang skyes bu dam pa des mtha' yas rdo rje mdzad pa 'di gsung bar mdzad 
[\[199b.5\]]do/_/mtha' yas 'jig rten rdul snyed na/_/log rtog mi mthun rdul phran snyed/_/gnyen po rtog 'dul de snyed kyis/_/rdo rje theg chen dbyings su sbyor/_/mtha' yas g.yo rdul sna tshogs pa/_/gang la mos pa de gsungs pas/_/sems can rdo rje yid 
[\[199b.6\]]bcug nas/_/sems nyid theg can rab nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gsung gi mdzad pa gang gi ched du mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gsung gi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi 
[\[199b.7\]]bcu pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi don du thabs ji ltar yang mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/_gang gi yul tha dad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_/mdzad pa yang tha dad 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]mtha' yas par snang ba ste/_/yul la la ni dag pas smin par mdzad do/_/la la ni ma dag pas smin par mdzad do/_/la la ni dag pa spangs pas so/_/la la ni gdams ngag gis so/_/la la ni bla 'khyal gyis so/_/la la ni 'jam 
[\[200a.2\]]pas so/_/la la ni rtsub pas so/_/la la ni gnyis kas so/_/la la ni 'jigs pas so/_/la la ni thar pas so/_/la la ni 'dam gyis so/_/la la ni 'khrugs pas so/_/la la ni 'thibs pas so/_/la la ni 'thabs pas so/_/la la ni non pas so/_/la 
[\[200a.3\]]la ni bsregs pas so/_/la la ni bslangs pas so/_/la la ni ma bslangs pas so/_/la la ni gnod pas so/_/la la ni mi gnod pas so/_/la la ni 'tshe bas so/_/la la ni mi 'tshe bas so/_/la la ni smad pas so/_/la la ni bstod pas so/_/la la ni 'gyod 
[\[200a.4\]]pas so/_/la la ni mi 'gyod pas so/_/la la ni 'thing slad kyis so/_/la la ni kha gsag gis so/_/la la ni nan tur gyis so/_/la la ni bzhabs pas so/_/la la ni byin pas so/_/la la ni blangs pas so/_/la la ni ci yang chog shes pas so/_/la la 
[\[200a.5\]]ni ming smos pas so/_/la la ni gzugs smos pas so/_/la la ni gzugs bstan pas so/_/la la ni smras pas so/_/la la ni spyos pas so/_/la la ni rgyan gyis so/_/la la ni sgras so/_/la la ni dris so/_/la la ni ros so/_/la la ni reg gis so/_/
[\[200a.6\]]la la ni chos kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/la la ni gzugs yid du mi 'ong bas so/_/de bzhin du la la ni sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg yid du mi 'ong bas yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/gang la la ni thub pas so/_/la la ni rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[200a.7\]]par smra bas so/_/la la ni skad cig smra bas so/_/la la dag ni ci yang mi brjod pas so/_/la la dag ni dam pa mthong bas so/_/la la ni dam pa'i sgras so/_/la la ni bshes gnyen dam pa'i sgras so/_/la la ni mi rtog pas so/_/la la ni rtog pas so/_/la 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]la ni sdug bsngal bas so/_/la la ni bde bas so/_/la la ni bdag med pas so/_/la la ni bdag yod pas so/_/la la ni mngon spyod kyis so/_/la la ni zhi bas so/_/la la ni rgyas pas so/_/la la ni dbang gis so/_/la la ni mthar phyin pas so/_/la 
[\[200b.2\]]la ni dug gsum sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras smin par mdzad do/_/la la ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras so/_/la la ni bde ba mi myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras so/_/la la ni srid pa'i longs spyod spangs te/_dka' thub drag pos so/_/la la ni srid 
[\[200b.3\]]pa'i longs spyod blangs te 'jol nyog tu spyod pas so/_/la la ni bkag pa'i thabs kyis so/_/la la ni gang la yang ma reg pa'i thabs kyis so/_/la la ni bya ba rdzogs pa'i thabs kyis so/_/la la ni sbyin pas so/_/la la ni snyan pas so/_/la la ni mthun pas 
[\[200b.4\]]so/_/la la ni spyod pas so/_/la la ni nang yongs su gtong bas so/_/la la ni phyi yongs su gtong bas so/_/la la ni thams cad gtong bas so/_/la la ni thams cad chags pas yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/la la ni rnam par g.yeng bas so/_/la la 
[\[200b.5\]]ni nang du yang dag 'jog gis so/_/la la ni 'dod pa bkag pas so/_/la la ni 'dod pa spyod pas so/_/gang de ltar mos pa tha dad la spyod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_lta ba dang /_thabs dang /_'dod pa dang /_don tha dad par bstan pas yongs su smin 
[\[200b.6\]]par mdzad do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni thabs kyis mdzad par rig par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las thabs kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i 
[\[200b.7\]]bdag po des lang ka'i bdag po la smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang gi ched du sku'i mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/_ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa 'jig rten du bkod pas thams cad kyi gzugs su snang ba des thams cad smin par mdzad pa de kho na'o/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]de ltar na gang gi ched du mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[201a.2\]]pa'i thabs rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sprin phung la ni 'di 'am/_gcig ces gang la yang gzung du med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_sems can mos pa tha dad pas/_/mtha' yas skye bo mgu dka' ba/_/rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu bas/_/gang 
[\[201a.3\]]la 'ang mos pa mtha' yas gsungs/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang dam pa rnams de kho na nyid las ma g.yos par sems can gyi khams 'du shes mtha' thug pa med pa dang /_sgra dang /_gzugs dang /_spyod ma mtha' thug pa med pa rnams mi mkhyen pa 
[\[201a.4\]]dang /_ma gsan pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_mi 'grel ba ni gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams cad nas thams cad du snying po byang chub nyid du ma 'dres par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir gang gi snying po byang chub na mi g.yo ba na mi rtog pa nyid 
[\[201a.5\]]dang /_sems can gang til 'bru na gnas pa de la ring ba dang /_nye ba dang /_gcig dang /_so so ma yin te/_de kho na nyid gcig pa'i phyir dbyings gcig tu gnyis su med par gnas so/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gang gi ched du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[201a.6\]]pa'i sku'i mdzad pa ched du mdzad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sku'i mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//_//theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gi ched du mdzad pa na yang 
[\[201a.7\]]byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i bcu pa'i lung chen 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes byung ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam po byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du brjod pa'i skabs su lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes 
[\[201b.2\]]bkod pa de ji lta zhig tu lung bstan te grags pa lags/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang dri ba de ni legs so/_/shin tu legs so/_/rab tu legs so/_/de ni 'di ltar 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dbyings su bskal pa thog 
[\[201b.3\]]ma dang tha ma med pa'i skabs la sangs rgyas thog ma dang tha ma med par gang gi sgron mar snang ba dag gi thabs gcig gi bya bas gang phyogs gcig tu phan pa nyid du bya ba yongs su smin par byas te/_thabs dam pas gar phyogs med par phan pa 
[\[201b.4\]]nyid du yongs su smin par bya ba dag gang gi rjes su gang 'gro bar dam bcas pa nyid des byung zhing snang bar lung bstan pa de yongs su grags par 'gyur gyi/_sgron ma gang gis nyid kyi yul snang ba las ma gtogs pa thams cad snang ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir 
[\[201b.5\]]ro/_/lang ka'i bdag po lung bstan pa de yang ji lta ji ltar 'di lta ste/_bskal pa thog ma med pa la/_/ji snyed gang 'byung brjod mi lang /_/skabs las gcig byung 'dir brjod kyis/_/dam bcas go cha bgos khyod nyon/_/bskal pa kun bkod bya ba la/_/
[\[201b.6\]]sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya 'byung /_/kun gyi tha mar byung ba yi/_/bder gshegs mngon 'byung rgyal po des/_/'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/'jig rten gcig gam gling gcig tu/_/bskal pa gcig gi gnas skabs la/_/yul gcig rdo rje gdan 
[\[201b.7\]]gcig tu/_/mdzad pa mthar phyin sangs rgyas gnyis/_/'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong /_/byung na mi srid chos dang 'gal/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das 'og tu/_/rmad 'byung gsang ba'i snying po nyid/_/rgya cher grags par 'gyur ro zhes/_/sangs rgyas kun 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gyis lung chen ston/_/ji ltar 'di yang de bzhin te/_/nga ni mi bzhugs 'das 'og tu/_/kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa nyid/_/brgya mthar 'dul ba snang bar 'gyur/_/de skad dam pa de lung bstan/_/gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon/_/bskal 
[\[202a.2\]]pa mtha' yas bya ba la/_/sangs rgyas sum khri lnga stong 'byung /_/kun gyi tha mar 'byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas pa des/_/'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/khri phrag phyed dang bzhi 'byung ba'i/_/sangs rgyas snga ma 'das rnams kyis/_/smin byas ma smin gang 
[\[202a.3\]]ched du/_/dam pa byung bar lung bstan bzhin/_/'dir yang yongs su gzung bar gyis/_/nga 'das na ni mi snang na/_/brgya phrag gcig na don snang 'gyur/_/drag shul can gyis byin lung bstan/_/bskul ba chen po gzhan yang nyon/_/bskal pa grags ldan bya ba la/_/
[\[202a.4\]]sangs rgyas bzhi khri drug stong byung /_/kun gyi tha mar byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bshes gnyen des/_/'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/stong phrag bzhi bcu drug byung ba'i/_/dam pa de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/gang gi ched du lung bstan bzhin/_/nga ni 
[\[202a.5\]]bde bar gshegs phyi na/_/brgya phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lngar gyur pa na/_/'bras bu chub par snang ba yi/_/rdul bral dri med dam pa nyid/_/mchog gi zhing khams dam pa 'dir/_/snang ba thob pa'i skal ldan can/_/bram ze shes pa mo zhig la/_/gnod 'dul nyid kyis grags 
[\[202a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon/_/bskal pa bzang rgyan bya ba la/_/sangs rgyas bye phrag brgyad cu byung /_/de dag mtha' zad byung ba yi/_/sangs rgyas bzang rgyan dpal gyis kyang /_/'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/bye phrag brgyad cu byung ba yi/_/
[\[202a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma yis/_/theg pa 'byung bar lung bstan bzhin/_/nga yi snang ba 'di nub nas/_/brgya phrag phyed kyi dus dag la/_/'di tshe gcig la 'grub pa yi/_/chos kyi me long dam pa zhig_/nga 'das gling gi 'jig rten 'dir/_/'byung ba'i dge 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]slong skal ldan can/_/nyi ma'i snying po bya ba la/_/bstan pa'i char chen phab nas ni/_/kun du mthun par grags par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang bskul ba chen po nyon/_/bskal pa rdzogs ldan bya ba la/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya byung /_/de kun mthar zad byung 
[\[202b.2\]]ba yi/_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dpal gyis kyang /_/'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/bye ba phrag brgya byung ba yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis/_/nges pa dam par lung bstan bzhin/_/nga snang mi gnas de rjes la/_/lo ni brgyad cu rtsa gnyis la/_/
[\[202b.3\]]gsang 'dus theg chen snying po 'di/_/byang chub snying po can zhes pa'i/_/sa le gser gling bya ba der/_/rgyal po bde skyob skal yod la/_/las dang thugs rje mthun pa yi/_/chos kyi mig gcig 'bye 'gyur te/_/rigs ldan kun gyis thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[202b.4\]]bskul ba chen po gzhan yang nyon/_/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/_/sangs rgyas brgya phrag bcu 'byung ba'i/_/bzhi par byung ba'i sgron ma nyid/_/thub pa'i dbang po de nyid kyis/_/'khor gyi nang du lung bstan pa/_/bye phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi/_/mngon 
[\[202b.5\]]rdzogs rgyal po de nyid kyis/_/gang gi phyogs dag smin byas nas/_/theg chen rdo rje snying po nyid/_/rgya cher grags par 'gyur ro zhes/_/kun gyi lung chen bstan pa bzhin/_/nga ni 'di nas mi snang nas/_/lo ni brgya dang bcu gnyis na/_/lha gnas gsum du 
[\[202b.6\]]grags pa yi/_/bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig_/'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi/_/mi las skal ldan rigs can de/_/rgyal po dza zhes bya ba la/_/sngon du ltas snang gnang 'gyur ba/_/drag shul can zhes bya ba'i rtse/_/grogs kyi sems dpa' 
[\[202b.7\]]dman pa'i lus/_/lang ka'i bdag po la sogs la/_/lag na rdo rje snang bar 'gyur/_/dam pas de skad lung bstan gnang /_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas par/_/thog ma tha ma med pa'i bar/_/de lta de ltar grags pa yin/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]ces gsungs pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa'i dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams nges par yi rangs par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rjes su byung bar lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu 
[\[203a.2\]]gsum pa'o//_//theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las lung chen nges par bstan pa na yang byung zhes bya ba'i gtam rgyud brjod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa bcu pa'o//_//de nas yang lang 
[\[203a.3\]]ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_sngon du byung ba'i tshig bcu gcig pa'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa 'byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam rgyud du 
[\[203a.4\]]brjod pa'i skabs su las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang byung zhes bkod pa de ji lta bu zhig tu grags shing byung ba lags/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang gi dri ba de ni 'di lta ste/_gang zhig 'degs pa'i yul rnams 
[\[203a.5\]]las/_/gsum du nges par snang ba ni/_/'dod la zhen dang nges par 'byung /_/gdul dka' drag po gdul bya gsum/_/gang gis 'degs pa'i rtsal gsum ni/_/'khor lo rgyun dang don dam nges/_/cho 'phrul mngon par 'byung ba gsum/_/rang bzhin ye 
[\[203a.6\]]nas snang ba yin/_/ji ltar 'degs pa'i thabs rnams ni/_/bsam gyis mi khyab gsum nyid du/_/snang ba de nyid gang yin pa/_/rang bzhin shugs dang gnyen po'i thabs/_/las rgyud gcod pa 'ba' zhig go_/'khor lo rgyun du snang ba yang /_/ye nas 
[\[203a.7\]]sangs rgyas grags pa lngar/_/gdul bya 'dul byed thams cad kun/_/lngar byung lngar snang lngas 'dul sgrol/_/skyed dang 'tsho dang brten pa'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen dang gnas pa yi/_/mi rtog ngang gis kun 'byung ba/_/med la mi zad rnam pa gsum/_/gang gi dbyings 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]dang mngon sum pa/_/bdag nyid chen po de nyid ni/_/thams cad du yang sangs rgyas med/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/gang bdag dbyings su sangs rgyas pa/_/chen po lngar snang gang 'di dag_/'byung ba rgyun gyi bcom ldan 'das/_/thugs rje rtag pa'i 
[\[203b.2\]]sangs rgyas te/_/rang bzhin kun la khyab par gnas/_/ji ltar 'dod dang 'dod par snang /_/snang srid ston pa'i sgron mar grags/_/'byung ba rgyun gyi rtag pa ste/_/rang bzhin stong pas mdzad par ston/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /_/mngon sum pa 
[\[203b.3\]]yi sangs rgyas ni/_/mkha' dbyings kun du mu med dbyings/_/khams gsum dngos dang dngos med kun/_/phyogs mtshams kun gyi lus dang gnas/_/kun gyi go skabs stong yod gnas/_/'gro dang mi 'gro'i rten sa ni/_/dngos po thams cad skye 'byung 
[\[203b.4\]]gnas/_/kun la dga' bar sbyor ba ni/_/bskal pa'i 'khor lo gcig tu gnas/_/gnyen sdug gzhan skyed rang bzhin gsal/_/gyes 'dzin mi ldog rgyun mi 'chad/_/dgon dung kun rlan rnam par g.yo/_/bskal pa'i 'khor lo gcig tu gnas/_/kun 
[\[203b.5\]]smin mun sel kun ston snyoms/_/sreg mnyen kha dog gsal byung ba/_/bcud 'dzin yongs su rtas snang ba/_/bskal pa gcig gi 'khor lor gnas/_/mi gnas thogs med shugs kyis 'byung /_/gzugs med gzugs kyi mthu bas drag_/yang 
[\[203b.6\]]g.yo khyab 'jug kun gyi rten/_/bskal pa 'khor lo gcig tu gnas/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/bdag nyid chen po'i sangs rgyas ni/_/kun shong yel 'phyo kun du bzang /_/kun theg lhun stug ye shes gzugs/_/kun sdud mnyam sbyor ting nge 
[\[203b.7\]]'dzin/_/sgrib sel lhag mthong shes rab 'bar/_/thogs med ma rmongs shes bya rdzogs/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang ni/_/de nyid yin pa'i sangs rgyas ni/_/nam mkha' rnam par snang ba mdzad/_/sa ni mi g.yo rdo rje 'dzin/_/me nyid rin chen 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]'byung bar ldan/_/chu ni mnyen gsal snang mtha' yas/_/rlung ni kun 'byed gdon mi za/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/gang 'dir sangs rgyas med pa ni/_/thams cad stong par ye sangs te/_/des khyab ma 'dres sangs rgyas nyid/_/
[\[204a.2\]]ma bcos ye nas sangs rgyas pa/_/'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni/_/'khor lo rgyun gyi theg pa ste/_/ngang gis rgyun gyi 'khor lor 'byung /_/brtan g.yo kun la rang bzhin gnas/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang 
[\[204a.3\]]gang /_/don dam nges pa'i theg pa ni/_/gsum du nges par snang ba ste/_/kun 'byung 'dren dang dka' thub rig_/dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa'o/_/gang 'dir 'dren pa 'di lta ste/_/yul gsum nges par snang ba ni/_/tha ma 'bring dang rab tu snang /_/
[\[204a.4\]]tha ma'i yul du gyur pa ni/_/shin tu ya nga'i las spangs te/_/yid 'ong 'dul ba'i tshul bzung nas/_/rang gi rtsa ba der bsgrun pa/_/so sor thar pa'i lam du snang /_/'bring gi yul du gyur pa ni/_/'di kun rten cing 'brel byung la/_/bdag med chos 
[\[204a.5\]]gcig med mthong bas/_/brjod med sprul pa'i chos rnams ston/_/rang gi rtsal gyis bder gnas pa'o/_/rab kyi yul du gyur pa ni/_/bdag med byams snyoms rtog las 'das/_/yul med ma skyes phyogs dang bral/_/sa dang rnam thar bder 
[\[204a.6\]]bsgrun pas/_/dngos med ngo bo nyid sku thob/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /_/dka' thub rig byed theg pa ni/_/'di yi yul gyis gsum nyid de/_/tha ma dag la snang ba ni/_/dka' thub sdom dang brtul zhugs dag_/mnyam nyid mi 
[\[204a.7\]]g.yo skye med la/_/bkur 'os 'dun pa'i tshul bzung nas/_/rigs kyi rdo rje 'dzin gnas pa'o/_/'bring la rnam par snang ba ni/_/bya ba dag pa'i las spyad de/_/rnal 'byor ting 'dzin mar ldan na/_/mi g.yo'i sems pas mngon sum du/_/rigs 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]bzhi rdo rje 'chang gnas pa'o/_/rab la nges par snang ba ni/_/sems nyid yul la rtsal rdzogs te/_/yul nyid rig pas mngon mthong na/_/de nyid der ni mngon byas nas/_/rdo rje rigs 'chang gnas pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /_/dbang 
[\[204b.2\]]sgyur thabs kyi theg pa yang /_/yul gyis rnam pa gsum snang ba/_/bskyed dang rdzogs dang yongs su rdzogs/_/tha ma bskyed pa gang snang ba/_/thabs dang shes rab rnam dag las/_/bsten pa lnga la sogs pa'i chos/_/rgyal ba lnga las rdzogs sangs 
[\[204b.3\]]rgyas/_/rnal 'byor rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa/_/'bring la rdzogs par gang snang ba/_/mnyam pas mnyam pa'i don mthong na/_/mnyam rdzogs yul shes dbyings ye shes/_/kun rig kun rdzogs kun du snang /_/chos nyid mi 'gyur bdal ba'i sa/_/
[\[204b.4\]]rab la yongs su rdzogs pa ni/_/ye shes dbyings zhes bya ba'i don/_/tha snyad tsam du rtogs chud nas/_/rtsal med rdzogs bral bsam yul 'das/_/thams cad rdzogs pa'i spyir chib sa/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /_/cho 'phrul mngon 
[\[204b.5\]]byung theg pa yang /_/yul gyi rnam pa gsum snang ba/_/zhen dang rmongs dang 'khrug pa yi/_/las ngan 'du shes ngan pa rnams/_/rgyun gcad bsgyur ba'i phrin las ni/_/srid gsum dra ba'i 'khor lo dag_/las kyi 'khor lo rgyun bcad phyir/_/dam 
[\[204b.6\]]pa'i 'khor lo bskor byas nas/_/bskal pa'i 'khor lo gcod par 'gyur/_/ci phyir sems can kha cig ni/_/chags pas zhen cing gdung bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe sems can kha cig ni/_/shin tu rmongs shing 'thibs par 'gyur/_/gang gis sems 
[\[204b.7\]]can kha cig ni/_/shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur/_/'di ltar dug gsum smin pa la/_/gang gis phan par mi 'gyur te/_/mi rtag mtshan nyid bstan nas kyang /_/las ngan las rgyud gcad pa'i phyir/_/rang bzhin cho 'phrul mngon 'byung ba/_/
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]khros na za byed lnga khros pas/_/ma lus bsgral nas stongs mdzad phyir/_/nam mkha' khro bo za byed che/_/thams cad thim pas stongs par mdzad/_/de bzhin nyid du bsgral ba'i mchog_/srid zhi 'tsho bral bskal pa yis/_/zhen pas chags 
[\[205a.2\]]pa'i las rgyud gcod/_/bzod ldan rmongs pa'i bskal pa yis/_/sems dang yid kyi las rgyud gcod/_/thabs 'dzin mtshon cha'i bskal pa yis/_/dngos po dngos po thams cad gcod/_/lhag mthong me yi bskal pa yis/_/nyon mongs dngos po thams 
[\[205a.3\]]cad sreg_/zhi gnas chu yi bskal pa yis/_/nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'khru/_/thogs med rlung gi bskal pa yis/_/shes bya thams cad kun du bskyod/_/shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pa yis/_/mtshan ma'i rgas rgud thams cad stongs/_/las 
[\[205a.4\]]ngan myur du rgyun bcad na/_/gnas ngan dag las myur du sgrol/_/thabs dang theg pa gang dag las/_/tha ma'i tha ma yin par bshad/_/snyigs mar gyur pa'i skabs rnams su/_/'dul ba rnam gnyis nub pas na/_/nyon mongs rnams ni dngos por snang /_/
[\[205a.5\]]'das nas nub po zhes pa la/_/ma 'das ma nub de nyid ni/_/dus der shugs kyis 'dul ba yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na/_/'di kun gsang ba dam pa yi/_/dbyings las gar yang ma g.yos shing /_/stong pa kho na'i dbyings nyid las/_/stong pa'i 
[\[205a.6\]]chos rnams byung bar zad/_/stong nyid gsang ba de kho na/_/theg chen gsang ba de nyid do/_/gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad ces brjod pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams thams cad gsang ba dam pa nyid du nges pa'i som 
[\[205a.7\]]ni med par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las cho 'phrul sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//_//theg pa chen po nges par byung ba'i tshul las las rgyud yongs su gcod pa na yang byung bya ba'i gtam rgyud 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste byung tshul bstan pa bcu gcig pa'o//_//bam po bdun par zug pa/_de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon byung ba'i tshig bcu gnyis pa'i 
[\[205b.2\]]tha ma dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na yang byung zhes snang ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyis theg pa chen po gsang ba dam pa byung ba'i tshul ston pas lung bstan pa gtam du brjod pa'i skabs su dgongs pa rnam par bgro ba na 
[\[205b.3\]]yang byung zhes bkod pa de lta zhig tu bgros te grags pa lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang yongs su dri ba de ni 'di ltar zab pa/_ches zab pa/_'di ltar dka' ba/_ches dka' ba/_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/_brtag par rab tu dka' 
[\[205b.4\]]ba/_dpag pa las 'das pa ste/_gang rgyud yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_gang sa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang rab tu bgro bar mi nus pa yin na bdag gis yongs su bgro bar lta ci smos te/_gang gi spyod yul yang ma yin no/_/de skad 
[\[205b.5\]]ces smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu chen po gsang ba'i bdag po nyon mongs par snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba'i slad du mi chen po rnams kyi spyod yul/_chos thams cad 
[\[205b.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/_gang du ma bkag pa'i chos nyid du longs spyod pa/_thabs kyi theg pa chen po dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid de rnam par bgro zhing smra ba'i seng ge khyod kyis phyin ci ma log par bgro ba'i dus la bab bo/_/skyes bu 
[\[205b.7\]]chen po shin tu rab tu dus la bab bo/_/nges pa dam par bgro ba'i dus la bab bo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_skyes bu chen po khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' gsang ba chen po'i bdag por dbang gis dbang bskur ba lags te/_gang 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]rmongs pa rnams go 'byed pa dang /_gang 'thoms pa drang ba'i thabs sprin phung gi dra bas thams cad bde blag tu drang ba'i slad du dgongs pa dam pa'i lus dgrol du gsol zhes bskul ba las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po des 'di skad ces 
[\[206a.2\]]smras so/_/bskul ba'i go cha chen po khyod/_/kun la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir/_/gang la bskul bar khyod brtson na/_/bgro ba gleng bslang legs so legs/_/'di ltar 'di skad bdag nyid kyis/_/nges pa'i don de kho na nyid/_/thos pa snang ba'i dus gcig 
[\[206a.3\]]na/_/thams cad nam mkha' lta bu las/_/rab byung rang snang nyid du thos/_/gsang ba'i tshig ni 'di skad du/_/thos par gyur pa'i dus gcig na/_/mthun 'jug thabs kyi cha mthun du/_/bstan nas drang ba'i thabs su thos/_/lung gi gtan tshigs 'di 
[\[206a.4\]]skad du/_/bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_/ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis/_/bstan nas bkri ba'i thabs su thos/_/'dod rkyen tshig ni 'di skad du/_/rtogs par gyur pa'i dus gcig na/_/'dod chen pa la 'dod pa ni/_/thabs kyis 
[\[206a.5\]]drang ba nyid du thos/_/gsang sngags rdo rje nam mkha' che/_/tshig gi spyod yul ma yin pas/_/brjod pas rtogs par mi nus te/_/bdag gis bgro bar rab tu dka'/_/dpe'am tshad ma'am gtan tshigs sam/_/rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis/_/
[\[206a.6\]]rtogs par nus pa ma yin te/_/dmus long mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra/_/'on kyang bka' yi gnyer gtad cing /_/log zhen thabs kyis drang ba dang /_/bskul ba khyod kyi dam tshig kyang /_/sngon gyi go cha gyon pa'i mthus/_/ma rtogs pa rnams tshig 
[\[206a.7\]]tsam gyis/_/mtshon nas rnam grol sa dag la/_/brgyud de drang ba'i thabs nyid du/_/ci rigs tsam du bgro bar bya/_/rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas pa/_/mthong dang ma mthong rnam gnyis la/_/dman pa'i skabs na de mthong min/_/mthong ba dam pa'i skabs 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]na'o/_/mthong ba mngon thos rnam gnyis la/_/mthar phyin dam pa mngon sum pa/_/blo gros rnal 'byor spyod yon can/_/thos pas mthong bar 'gyur phyir ro/_/stug po bkod pa'i rgyal ba yang /_/chos sku snying por gyur pas na/_/de yi 'gro ba mi smin phyir/_/
[\[206b.2\]]gzugs sku bstan nas tshig lam brjod/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/dpag tu med pa'i dus rnams su/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa gang /_/ji ltar rnam par bgros pa nyon/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la 'jug 
[\[206b.3\]]par 'dod na mdzod du 'jug par bya'o/_/rang bzhin ma bcos par bya'o/_/ljon shing bskyed par bya'o/_/dam par 'jug par bya'o/_/sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o/_/khyad par du 'gro bar bya'o/_/yul la 'jug par bya'o/_/me long brtag par bya'o/_/mthun par 'jug par 
[\[206b.4\]]bya'o/_/nad gso bar bya'o/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po chos kyi rnam grangs bcu po de dag las dang po dam pa rnams kyi mdzod du 'jug par bya na sgo gsum 
[\[206b.5\]]nas zhugs pas gang med la mi zad pa'i mdzod du 'jug pa nyid do/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po sgo gsum gang lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sgo gsum 'di lta ste/_spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo dang /_thabs kyi sbyor sgo dang /_nges pa'i gsang sgo 
[\[206b.6\]]dang gsum mo/_/smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po sgo de dag gang gis 'byed pa lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sgo de dag ni lde mig gsum gyis 'byed par rig par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'byed pa dang /_'grol ba dang /_'byin pa'o/_/
[\[206b.7\]]lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di lta ste/_yan lag drug dang /_mdo bzhi dang /_rtsa ba gsum gyi lde mig gis/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa'i mdzod/_/nges par 'byed ces rgyal bas bshad/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo lde mig gsum gyis 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]'byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_yan lag drug dang /_mdo bzhi dang /_rtsa ba gsum mo/_/de la yan lag drug gang zhe na/_rgyu'i yan lag dang /_sbyor ba'i yan lag dang /_'bras bu'i yan lag dang /_dngos gzhi'i yan lag dang /_bzung ba'i yan 
[\[207a.2\]]lag dang /_mtshan nyid kyi yan lag go/_/de la rgyu'i yan lag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'byung ba'i yan lag dang /_smin pa'i yan lag go_/lang ka'i bdag po de la 'byung ba'i yan lag gang zhe na/_gang yongs su tshogs na brjod pa 'byung ba nyid la 
[\[207a.3\]]bya ste/_tshad ma dang /_blo gros dang /_'dzin pa dang /_mchod rten dang /_'dus pa dang /_nges pa'o/_/smin pa'i yan lag ni gang dam par smin pa'i rgyu ste/_gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam gyi yan lag go/_/lang ka'i bdag po sbyor 
[\[207a.4\]]ba'i yan lag ni yul la sbyor ba ste/_gang blo'i yul la sbyor ba dang /_snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la blo'i yul sbyor ba ni gang blo gros 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gleng slong ba la sbyor ba dang /_blo gros rnyed pa'i rtsa ba sa'i khyad par la sbyor 
[\[207a.5\]]ba dang /_blo gros nges pa'i rtsa ba rnam par thar pa la sbyor ba dang /_blo gros gzhag pa'i rtsa ba de kho na nyid la sbyor ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po snying rje'i yul la sbyor ba yang 'di lta ste/_gang gi rgyu la sbyor ba dang /_'bras bu la sbyor ba dang /_de dag rang 
[\[207a.6\]]bzhin la sbyor ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la 'bras bu'i yan lag ni gang dang 'brel ba'i dgos ched dam pa 'byung ba ste/_thob pa dam pa de kho na nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la dngos gzhi'i yan lag ni gang gi dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa ste/_
[\[207a.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang la chos rnams kyi dngos gzhi gsum du bsdu ba ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi dang /_rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi dang /_thams cad kyi dngos gzhi'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la rang bzhin gyi dngos gzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]'di lta ste/_thos pa dang /_dong ba dang /_gzung ba dang /_chub pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gdags pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_yongs su byang ba 
[\[207b.2\]]dang /_sna tshogs dang /_byed pa dang /_bya ba dang /_rgyan no/_/lang ka'i bdag po thams cad kyi dngos gzhi gang zhe na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa la snang ba 'di lta ste/_bsdu ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_gang zag dang /_chos so/_/yongs su dag pa las 
[\[207b.3\]]snang ba ni 'di ltar 'dogs pa dang /_rtsol ba dang /_gnas dang /_bde ba dang /_thabs dang /_shes pa dang /_shes pa'i gnas dang /_nan tan dang /_nga rgyal med pa dang /_bag chags dang /_mngon du bya ba dang /_bsgom pa dang /_snying po dang /_
[\[207b.4\]]rnam pa dang /_dmigs pa dang /_dpyod pa dang /_g.yeng ba dang /_mi g.yeng ba dang /_btsal ba dang /_yon tan dang /_brtan pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_phyogs bsdu ba dang /_rtogs pa dang /_thob par bya ba dang /_spyir phyin pa dang /_yongs su bri ba'o/_/lang 
[\[207b.5\]]ka'i bdag po de dag ni dngos gzhi'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la gzung ba'i yan lag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_blang ba dang /_pha ma pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_rang bzhin dang /_med pa'i rang bzhin dang /_'byung ba dang /_yongs su gtang ba 
[\[207b.6\]]kho nar shes par bya ste/_lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzung ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la mtshan nyid kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_kun rdzob dang /_dam pa dang /_dmigs pa dang /_rnam pa dang /_rang bzhin dang /_
[\[207b.7\]]'bras bu dang /_bsnyad pa dang /_bar du gcod pa dang /_mthun pa dang /_nyes dmigs dang /_yon tan no/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la kun rdzob gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang zag dang /_brtags pa dang /_las su bstan pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]dam pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bral ba dang /_brtan pa dang /_rdzogs pa'o/_/dmigs pa ni thams cad du bstan pa'o/_/rnam pa ni thams cad du brtags pa ste/_bden pa dang /_gzhag pa dang /_nyes pa dang /_yon tan dang /_tshul 
[\[208a.2\]]dang /_'jug pa dang /_rigs pa dang /_bsdus pa dang /_rnam par spros pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la bden pa ni gang zhe na/_de kho na nyid gang yin pa'o/_/gzhag pa ni gang zag dang /_brtags pa dang /_gcig pa dang /_dbye ba dang /_dri ba dang /_
[\[208a.3\]]gzhag pa dang /_rnam par gzhag pa dang /_gsang ba dang /_bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa gzhag pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po nyes pa gang zhe na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rnam grangs so/_/yon tan gang zhe na/_yongs su byang ba'i rnam grangs so/_/lang 
[\[208a.4\]]ka'i bdag po tshul gang zhe na/_don dang /_thob pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_mtha' spong ba dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dgongs pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'jug pa gang zhe na/_dus dang /_'dus pa dang /_rkyen rnams so/_/lang ka'i bdag po rigs pa 
[\[208a.5\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ltos pa dang /_bya ba byed pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_/chos nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la ltos pa gang zhe na/_gang 'dus pa dag skye ba dang /_tha snyad kyi phyir rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa'o/_/bya ba byed pa gang zhe na/_de la chos gang thob pa'i 
[\[208a.6\]]phyir ram/_grags pa'am/_skyes nas las su bya ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa'o/_/bsgrub pa gang zhe na/_de la gang go cha bgos pa ste/_gang smra ba dang /_gang nges par shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa rnams so/_/lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di 
[\[208a.7\]]ltar dag pa dang /_ma dag pa la gang dag pa ni dmigs pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_dpe dang /_grags pa dang /_nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la thams cad mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa ni dmigs pa'o/_/thams cad 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]skad cig ma dang /_gzhan yod pa dang /_las rnams mi rtag pa dang /_las la gnas pa dang /_de'i 'bras bu la gnas pa ni gnas pa'o/_/thams cad la grags pa ni grags pa nye bar sbyor zhing dmigs pa nye bar sbyar ba ni dpe'o/_/de dag grags 
[\[208b.2\]]pa ni grags pa'o/_/gang gi tshad mas tshad ma nyid du snang ba ni nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar byung ba dang /_brtags pa dang /_gcod pa dang /_bral ba dang /_snang bas na tshad mar nges pa'o/_/de ni mngon sum dang /_dpag pa dang /_tshad 
[\[208b.3\]]mas dag pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po ma dag pa ni 'di ltar gzhan dang mthun pa dang /_mi mthun pa dang /_thams cad dang mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dang /_gzhan gyi dpe nye bar sbyar ba dang /_ma grags pa dang /_ma nges pa dag go/_/lang ka'i bdag po 
[\[208b.4\]]de la yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid lnga pa ma yin pa'i tshad ma gzhan dang mthun par dmigs pa dang /_'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa ji lta ba la rtag pa dang /_bdag la sogs pa gzhan du dmigs te phyin ci log bzhir lta bas 'dus 
[\[208b.5\]]ma byas kyi mtshan nyid dang mthun par dmigs pa 'di ni mthun pa'o/_/tshad ma gzhan dang mi mthun pa dang /_yul gyi mtshan nyid gzhan dang mi mthun pa 'di ni gzhan dang mi mthun pa'o/_/thams cad yid kyi bya ba dag go zhes bya ba ni thams cad dang 
[\[208b.6\]]mthun pa'o/_/mi mthun pa gang gcig gi mi mthun pas phan tshun mi mthun pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mi mthun pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang mthun pa dpe dang sbyar ba la mthun pa yod pas de ni ma nges pa'o zhes bya ba ni ma grags pa'o/_/mi mthun pa 
[\[208b.7\]]dpe dang sbyar ba la mthun pa yod pas de ni ma nges pa'o zhes bya ba ni de yang ma grags pa'o/_/gang ma grags pas gang gis brtags pa ma dag pa'o/_/gang rang bzhin gyis ma dag pa ni ma nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni bsgrub pa'o/_/lang ka'i 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bdag po chos nyid gang zhe na/_gang du ma bcos pa nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang du bsdus pa dang /_rnam par spros pas ni thams cad kyang bsdus te/_gcig la khyad par gyis phye ste mthar phyin pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po dmigs 
[\[209a.2\]]pa ni 'dzin pa'o/_/rnam pa ni dbye ba'o/_/byang chub ni rang bzhin no/_/gang spangs pas gang thob pa ni 'bras bu'o/_/gang chub cing gang la brjod pa ni bsnyad pa'o/_/gang gi phyogs dang mi mthun pa ni bar du gcod pa'o/_/gang gi phyogs la nan tan du byed pa ni 
[\[209a.3\]]mthun pa'o/_/gang dang mi mthun pa'i dbang du jen pa ni nyes dmigs so/_/gang du mthun par jen pa ni yon tan no/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni mtshan nyid kyi yan lag ste/_yan lag drug po de dag ni 'byed pa'i lde mig ste/_/gang spyod pas 
[\[209a.4\]]'dren pa'i sgo gang yin pa de ni des 'byed cing gang de nyid du dgongs pa nges par 'grel to/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la mdo bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgongs pa gzhan gyi mdo dang /_ldem po dag gi mdo dang /_mthun 'jug sbyor ba'i mdo dang /_don 
[\[209a.5\]]dam nges pa'i mdo'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la dgongs pa gzhan pa'i mdo 'di lta ste/_rang bzhin dang /_dus dang /_don dang /_yul la dgongs pa'i lang ka'i bdag po de la rang bzhin ni 'di ltar/_ji ga khyad par du snang ba la gang de ltar rtog pa 
[\[209a.6\]]zhen pa dag bsal ba'i phyir rang bzhin la dgongs te/_de gang yin pa ni 'di nyid do zhes gcig tu zhal gyis rtsal ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po dus ni 'di ltar sgyid lug pa gang dag mngon par spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir gang gi rgyu 'bras mi slu ba la dgongs te/_
[\[209a.7\]]gyin da tsam 'dis/_myur ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes ston pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po don 'di ltar/_gang gis gang la rlom sems pa/_/de yi mun pa bsal ba'i phyir/_/gang gis mthong lam ma thob par/_/de nyid mi mthong la dgongs te/_/'di dag ni dpag 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]tu med pa'i dam pas ma bsnyad par shes par mi nus so zhes sgo'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po yul la dgongs pa ni 'di ltar gang phyogs gcig tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag blo skye ba'i phyir gang gi phyogs kun bkod de yongs su bsngags pa brjod cing 
[\[209b.2\]]phyogs gcig gis mi chog pa la dgongs te/_sngon du goms pa'i phyogs la smod pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la ldem po dag gi mdo ni 'di lta ste/_sbyor ba dang /_dbye ba dang /_zil gyis gnon pa dang /_slu ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la sbyor ba ni 
[\[209b.3\]]gang 'di ltar gang skrag cing dngangs pa dang /_tshi chad par rtsol ba dang /_gang mngon par zhen pa dag ci la yang mi 'jug pa de dag gang gi don la nges par gzhug pa'i phyir gang dang gang gi 'bras bu yod pa dang /_kun kyang rang bzhin med pa la dgongs te/_
[\[209b.4\]]thams cad yod do zhes bya ba dang /_stong pa nyid do zhes gang gi 'du shes gzhug pa'i phyir ro/_/lang ka'i bdag po dbye ba ni 'di ltar gang dang gang la mos pa de ltar kun brtags pa dngos po med par bshad pa dang /_gzhan gyi dbang rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[209b.5\]]'byung ba bshad pa dang /_yongs su grub pa mi 'gyur ba phyin ci ma log par bshad pa gsum la dgongs te gsum bstan pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po zil gyis gnon pa ni 'di ltar gang phun sum tshogs pa'i grags pa dag_/rdzogs longs spyod pa dag 
[\[209b.6\]]bstan pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir gnyen por gyur pas 'dul bar dgongs te rgya chen po dag ston pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po slu ba ni 'di ltar gang 'du shes log pa dag sbas pa'i thabs kyis nges par bsgyur ba'i phyir don mi 'gyur ba la dgongs te/_
[\[209b.7\]]rgyu gzhan du ston pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la mthun 'jug sbyor ba'i lung 'di lta ste/_rang rkyen gnyer gyi lung dang /_thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i lung dang /_cha mthun sbyor ba'i lung dang /_gdams ngag nan tan gyi lung ngo /_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di la 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]rang rkyen gnyer gyi lung ni 'di ltar gang la gang ltar rkyen du 'tsham pa de la de ltar nyid ston pa'o/_/thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i lung ni 'di ltar gang bsdu ba'i thabs kyis gang gi cha dang 'dren mas de dag bsgyur ba'o/_/cha mthun sbyor ba ni 'di ltar gang 
[\[210a.2\]]gi cha bzhin spyod pas 'di ltar sbyor ba'o/_/gdams ngag nan tan gyi lung ni 'di ltar gang la gang gces spras byas te 'jog pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la don dam nges pa'i lung ni 'di lta ste/_dogs pa dang /_nges pa dang /_ngo bo dang /_gal po'o/_/lang 
[\[210a.3\]]ka'i bdag po de la dogs pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang byung ba dag gang gi phyir brtags te/_de ltar de'i phyir ngos zin pa'o/_/nges pa ni 'di ltar gang la gtan la phab pa de'i nges pa rnyed pa'o/_/rang gi ngo bo ni 'di ltar gang brtags pa brjod pa'i dngos 
[\[210a.4\]]gzhi'o/_/gal po ni 'di ltar gang la gang gis gal du gtod pa nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nges pa dam pa'i lung ste/_mdo bzhi po de dag ni dgrol ba'i lde mig ste/_gang spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo gang yin pa de ni des dgrol zhing gang de nyid du gsal
