[\[210a.5\]]bar byed pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_blo'i rtsa ba dang /_gros kyi rtsa ba dang /_thabs kyi rtsa ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la blo'i rtsa ba ni 'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i de bzhin nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog lhan ne ba'o/_/lang 
[\[210a.6\]]ka'i bdag po gros kyi rtsa ba ni 'di ltar gang thams cad nas thams cad du ma 'dres pa la ma rmongs pa nyid sa le ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po thabs kyi rtsa ba ni 'di ltar gang yongs su rdzogs pa la rnam par dag pa nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsa ba ste/_rtsa ba 
[\[210a.7\]]gsum po 'di dag ni 'byed pa'i lde mig ces bya ste/_gang spyod pas 'dren pa'i sgo gang yin pa de ni des 'byed cing de nyid du gsal bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bkod pa rnam par 'grel pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]lnga ba'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sgo gnyis kyi dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang sgo gnyis 'byed cing /_rnam par 'grel pa ji ltar 'byed 
[\[210b.2\]]pa lags/_smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po sgo gnyis ni 'di ltar 'di yang lde mig gsum gyis rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa ste/_thun mong gi yan lag dang mdo dang rtsa ba'o/_/gang 'di ltar yan lag drug ni 'di lta ste/_bya ba'i yan lag 
[\[210b.3\]]dang /_thabs kyi yan lag dang /_sbyor ba'i yan lag dang /_spyod pa'i yan lag dang /_rig pa'i yan lag dang /_rdzogs pa'i yan lag go_/lang ka'i bdag po yan lag drug po 'di dag kyang gcig tu yan lag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su 
[\[210b.4\]]rdzogs shing yan lag drug gis gsal bar 'grel pa ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sgo'i yan lag dang /_dam pa'i yan lag dang /_nges pa'i yan lag dang /_bsam pa'i yan lag dang /_dmigs pa'i yan lag dang /_bzlas pa'i yan 
[\[210b.5\]]lag dang /_sbyor ba'i yan lag dang /_spyod pa'i yan lag dang /_thob pa'i yan lag dang /_gnas pa'i yan lag dang /_sa'i yan lag dang /_lta ba'i yan lag go/_/lang ka'i bdag po drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu'i yan lag dang /_rtsa ba'i 
[\[210b.6\]]yan lag dang /_'brel ba'i yan lag dang /_'dren pa'i yan lag dang /_nges pa'i yan lag dang /_sbyor ba'i yan lag go/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni gang thams cad nas thams cad du thun mong du shes par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 
[\[210b.7\]]yan lag ste/_gang sgo de dag de dag gis 'byed cing gsal bar 'grel bar shes par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la mdo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye ba med pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_ji bzhin pa dang /_btsal ba med par lung ston pa'o/_/lang 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzhan gyi skye ba med pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_ji bzhin pa dang /_btsal ba med pa dang /_ma 'dres pa gang yin pa de kho na nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de kho na nyid gang yin pa 
[\[211a.2\]]dang /_dam par nges pa dang /_yongs su zin pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsa ba ste/_des sgo de dag gi ji lta ba nges par 'byin par shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsdu ba rnam par 'grel pa'i le'u ste 
[\[211a.3\]]bzhi bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la bos te smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po de dag las khyad par du nges pa'i gsang sgo lde mig gsum gyis 'byed pa yang 'di lta ste/_dam pa rnams kyi gsang ba'i sgo/_/yan 
[\[211a.4\]]lag mdo dang rtsa ba yi/_/'byed 'grol nges par 'byin pa yis/_/de nyid nges par mthong ba'o/_/'byed pa rgyu dang rtsa ba dang /_/'brel pa'i tshig dang nges pa dang /_/sbyor bas yan lag rdzogs pa yin/_/brjod 'byung kun la nges par 'gro/_/rgyu bzhi gang byung 
[\[211a.5\]]ched phyir na/_/rgyu yi ngo bo byin gyis brlabs/_/lung bstan nyid du nges par snang /_/rtsa ba'i yan lag gang dag gis/_/mdun bsu gus dang dri ba dris/_/skabs las gleng du langs pa'o/_/'brel pa yan lag rnam pa bzhi/_/rjod dang brjod bya 'brel dgongs 
[\[211a.6\]]las/_/tha ma gnyis bzhir 'dren pa'o/_/'dren pa gang 'dir rnam pa bcu/_/lta nyid de bzhin sgo 'byed dang /_/spyir sdud pa dang 'byor par 'dren/_/rang rkyen ldem dgongs gal po nyid/_/ma bcos de nyid mtshon pa'i dpe/_/cho rol snrel zhi rnam pa bcu/_/
[\[211a.7\]]me long bcu dang rnam sbyor bas/_/sgron mas mun pa'i rdzas tshol sbyar/_/nges pa bzhi bzhi bzhir sbyar bas/_/bcu gnyis yan lag bzhir kun snang /_/sbyor ba bzhi pa lnga gnyis bzhi/_/yan lag lngar snang de sbyar lnga/_/rtog 'jug drug cu gcig thabs dang /_/
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]yan lag drug tu rdzogs pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang 'dir yan lag drug ni 'di lta ste/_rgyu'i yan lag dang /_rtsa ba'i yan lag dang /_'brel pa'i yan lag dang /_'dren pa'i yan lag dang /_nges pa'i yan lag dang /_sbyor ba'i yan lag go/_/lang ka'i 
[\[211b.2\]]bdag po de la rgyu'i yan lag ni gang 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa ste/_'di lta ste/_yongs su rdzogs pa drug go/_/lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar 'di skad bdag gis thos pa kho na nyid nges par snang ba'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[211b.3\]]pa thams cad kyi thugs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba tha snyad dang bral ba/[ {]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]thams cad las 'das pa/_nam mkha' chen po kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid mngon sum mi gnas mtshon du med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 
[\[211b.4\]]rgyal po des yongs su khyab pa'i gnas rdzogs pa'i spyir chib ces bya ba nam mkha'i dbyings bde ba chen po'i ngang /_thams cad sangs rgyas pa mkhyen par dgod pa/_kun gzhi chos kyi pho brang ye 'byam rmad du grags pa/_rgya phyogs su yongs su ma chad pa/_chos 
[\[211b.5\]]nyid kyi nam mkha' brjod du med pa la ye shes kyi nyi ma dpag tu med par shar ba/_mtha' dang dbus med cing kun du rgya mnyam pa bdal khyab chen po zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na/_gang du yang mi gnas pa chen po/_gang la yang mi chags chags pa'i bdag 
[\[211b.6\]]nyid/_ci la yang mi mdzad mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub/_mi skye mi 'gag rnam grol rnam dag_/dngos por ma yin nam mkha'i rang bzhin/_ma bcos ma byas ye nas ji bzhin/_'khor ba mi spong ye bdal khyab pa/_dug gsum mi spong sman pa chen 
[\[211b.7\]]po/_cir yang mi dmigs dmigs pa kun 'byung /_tshig gi lam chad brjod pa kun 'byung /_gang dang ma 'dres gcig tu yongs su rdzogs pa/_kun nas kun du ngang bzang po mi nub pa'i tog chen por ye shes brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba dang /_
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]'du 'bral med par kun du 'ub chub ste/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzhugs so/_/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi tshig 'di skad mthun 'jug thabs su thos pa'i dus gcig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 
[\[212a.2\]]'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de blang dor mi mnga' byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang phyug_/'dod pa kun 'byung mi zad mdzod kyi bkod pa/_che ba kun spyod dam par rol pa'i gzi brjid dang /_brlabs su gcod pa'i spyod pa chen pos skyod pa de rmad du byung 
[\[212a.3\]]don 'di nyid gleng ba'i gnas/_tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i gzhi/_rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa/_bde ba can zhes bya ba'i zhing khams na 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang mtha' dang dbus med cing rtse mo kun du rgya mnyam 
[\[212a.4\]]pa/_rin po che'i rgyal bos rnam par brgyan pa/_mu tig gi lcang lo dang /_chun 'phyang dang /_lda ldis mdzes pa/_rtsibs kun du nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang /_ma rangs pa 'phyo bas gsal btab cing 'phra bkod pa/_skar ma dang shin tu skar ma dag 
[\[212a.5\]]gis gzer spras pa/_rin po che'i ka ba brgyad zug pa/_nyi ma dang zla bas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i ka rgyan las/_rin po che'i gtsar dang 'od zer kun du 'phro ba/_gdung chen po brgyad re'u res bres pa/_chos nyid kyi bla re la rdo rje'i shar bu byung ba/_rdzu 
[\[212a.6\]]'phrul gyi sprin phung gtibs pa/_byang chub kyi char mngon par 'bab pa/_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sangs par gyur pa/_ye shes kyi myu gu mngon par bskyed pa dang /_chos nyid sgra mngon par sgrogs pa las kun gzhi ye 'byam rmad du grags pa'i gleng 
[\[212a.7\]]slong ba/_tshig gi brjod pa dang bral zhing bzhin dang me long gi tshul ltar snang ba/_gzhal yas khang rdo rje mngon par dga' ba/_rdo rjes rnam par brgyan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/_gser gyi sa gzhi bdal ba/_me long ngam/_chu shel lam/_chu 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]dang ba'am/_gser shin tu sbyangs pa ltar mnyam zhing snyoms la gsal zhing 'tsher ba las gzugs brnyan byung ba/_nem pa/_'phar ba/_'jam pa/_dag pa/_dang ba/_ldem pa/_mnyen pa/_'bar ba/_'phro ba/_rtog pa med pa/_rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[212b.2\]]kyi 'od rang bzhin gyis byung zhing zer kun du 'phro bas/_phyi nang gi mun pa yongs su sel ba/_dbu rtse 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir 'bar ba/_rdo rjes kun du smras pa/_sgo gsum kun du gsal ba la/_ba ti 'od kyi mu khyud yongs su ma chad pa/_nyi zla'i ga'u 
[\[212b.3\]]sum brgyud zung sgril du 'bar ba/_them skas dang rta babs kyis brgyan pa/_gru chad bzhis brgyan pa/_bar khyams kyis mdzes pa/_ha ra dang /_ha ra chen pos brgyan pa/_twa ra na yis bzung ba/_phreng bas mdzes pa/_dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan 
[\[212b.4\]]pa/_za ra tshags kyis bklubs pa/_rdo rje rin po che 'bar bas kun du mdangs phyung ba/_dril bu g.yer ka las theg pa chen po chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/_chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba/_gzhi yongs su mdzes pa'i rgyan rdo rje mu khyud ma chad pas rdo rje 'greng bu 
[\[212b.5\]]dang dra bas brgyan pa/_ta la'i shing ljon pa skyes pa la gser gyi tsong tsong bres pa/_rin po che'i phra mig gis spras pa/_bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa/_phyi dang nang med kun yang nang du gyur pa na/_gar yang ma 'gags snang ba chen po/_ci yang ma gsungs rgya 
[\[212b.6\]]cher bshad pa/_gang la yang mi dgongs ting nge 'dzin chen po mnga' thang yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal po de rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba la 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po mi bskyod pa la sogs 
[\[212b.7\]]pa rdo rje gdung dang /_sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po btang snyoms chen po la sogs pa nor bu'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]pad+ma'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po sems dpa' chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po rnam mi rig la 
[\[213a.2\]]sogs pa glang po'i gdung dang sde'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun kyang thabs sprin phung lta bu dang /_shes rab nam mkha' lta bur 'brel ba sha dag dang /_gtso bo dang 'khor gyi tshul du rdzogs longs spyod par bzhugs so/_/rgya cher brjod pa ldem dgongs sbyor ba'i tshig 'di skad 
[\[213a.3\]]du bkri ba'i thabs su thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul chen po cir yang snang ba'i rgyal po rnams ni bya ba rdzogs pa'i gnas bsod nams gter zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gnas ji bzhin pa mos pa can zhes bya ba'i 
[\[213a.4\]]zhing khams na/_'khor ba 'dren pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_snang srid ston pa'i sgron ma/_gdul ba sel ba'i sems dpa'/_'gro don mdzad pa'i 'phags pa/_thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sprul pa/_'byung ba rgyun gyi bcom ldan 'das thugs rje rtag pa'i 
[\[213a.5\]]bdag nyid chen por sprul pa de 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang bdag dang /_ston pa dang nyan pa'i tshul du rnam par bshad pa chen por bzhugs te/_thams cad bden pa gnyis kyi tshul du snang bar ston 'dod pa rang rkyen gyi tshig 'di skad du ma bkag 
[\[213a.6\]]chos nyid du dgongs pa rang snang thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sku bde ba chen po de cho 'phrul yongs su rdzogs pa'i gnas/_gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i khyad par zab mo gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa yum gyi lhums 
[\[213a.7\]]pad+ma'i snying po rgyal ba kun gyi skrun pa'i pho brang /_gang gi don la gshegs pa'i shul srid pa gsum gyi sems can smin par byed pa'i gzhi/_chags pa'i rten 'byung ba'i gnas/_'gro ba'i lam du gyur pa de dang cha mthun du bstan pa pad+mo can zhes bya bar 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]grags pa'i zhing khams na/_thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i sku ste/_gsang ba'i 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba 'di lta ste/_gsang ba'i sems dpa' chen po rdo rje myur ba dang /_rdo rje chen po mgyogs pa dang /_rdo rje chen po rnon po dang /_
[\[213b.2\]]rdo rje chen po 'byung ba dang /_rdo rje chen po 'byed pa dang /_rdo rje chen po che ba dang /_rdo rje chen po yangs pa dang /_rdo rje chen po zab pa dang /_rdo rje chen po brtan pa dang /_rdo rje chen po sna tshogs la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i 'khor 'byung 'jug dang 
[\[213b.3\]]bcas te/_gang the tshom gcod pa dang /_chod pa dang /_zhu bar sdog pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/_/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad re re la yang sku'i bye brag 'di ltar snang zhing tha dad du snang ba yang med do/_/gcig dang tha dad pa'i ngo bo las 
[\[213b.4\]]kyang grol la/_lhan ne lhang nge lham me lhag ger kun nas kun du snang ngo /_/de'i tshe de'i dus na mi chen po'i spyod yul thabs kyi theg pa chen po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di sku bzhi rnam par snang ba la thos pa phyin ci ma log pa'i don rgyal ba'i sras dag la de 
[\[213b.5\]]kho na nyid ltar bgro ba ni 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so/_/gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes 
[\[213b.6\]]bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs so/_/thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te/_'jug pa'am/_ldog pa'am/_rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so/_/lang ka'i bdag po gnyis ni gang byung brjod pa gnyis nyid do/_/lang ka'i 
[\[213b.7\]]bdag po de dag ni rgyu'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o//_//lang ka'i bdag po rtsa ba'i yan lag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]brjod pa 'byung ba'i rtsa ba gang gis gang gleng bslang ba gang yin pa la bya ste/_'di ltar de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dbyings kyi ngang las mi g.yo bar mnal bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[214a.2\]]ngang las bskul ba chen po'i sgra 'di byung ngo /_/yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus/_/nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs/_/ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong /_/mi gnas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas bzhengs/_/
[\[214a.3\]]zhes sgra byung ba las/_bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos thams cad byang chub snying po la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las nyi ma rdo rje byung ste/_dper na nam mkha' dang ba las/_nyi ma'i snying po shar ba lta bu'o/_/de nas nyi ma'i snying po de las 'od zer 
[\[214a.4\]]bye ba mang po bkye bas dper na nyi ma stong las 'od zer bye ba bkye ba lta bu'o/_/'od zer de dag las thugs rje byang chub sems kyi sprin mngon par 'khrigs te/_rol pa'i char mngon par bab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang /_
[\[214a.5\]]rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang /_dung dang /_ke ra go dang /_gling bu dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi mnyes pa dang /_rol pa sna 
[\[214a.6\]]tshogs kyi shes rab dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi ye shes dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi tshor ba dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba chen po dang /_rol pa sna tshogs kyi btsun mo stong pa 
[\[214a.7\]]chen po de bzhin nyid la rnam par 'jug par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa nyid kyi ngang de las chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi sgra 'di byung ngo /_/tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha/_/longs spyod rdzogs mdzad 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rol pa chen po'i sku/_/rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag_/thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs/_/zhes sgra des bskul bas bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen po'i rnam par bzhengs te/_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_
[\[214b.2\]]rnam par 'khyil ba dang /_rnam par 'gying ba dang /_rnam par brjid pa dang /_gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /_rnam par bzhad pa sna tshogs pa dang /_thugs rje'i 'phro 'du dang /_yon tan gyi khyad par dang /_'od zer gyi 'bar 'phro la sogs pa sprul pa 
[\[214b.3\]]glog gi phreng bas nam mkha' thams cad kun du khyab par mdzad de/_thams cad nas thams cad du mtshan ma dang /_rnam pa dang /_yod pa dang /_med pa la gsang sngags kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid kyi ngang gis yongs su khyab ste/_rang bzhin gsang ba nyid 
[\[214b.4\]]do/_/de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum stong pa chen po de kho na nyid las bskul ba tha ma'i sgra 'di byung ngo /_/ye shes sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i sku/_/thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i/_/'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung 
[\[214b.5\]]ba'i gnas/_/bder gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/_zhes bskul bas/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ci yang mi gsung bar 
[\[214b.6\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngang las rnam par bskul ba chen po'i sgra byung ba de dag las 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du gyur te/_de dag thams cad mgrin 
[\[214b.7\]]gcig tu rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid las glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo/_/e ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog nam mkha' lta bu las/_/khyab pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing /_/gzi brjid sprin phung rol pas bsgyings pa'i sku/_/thogs med rdo rje rol 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]pa'i cho 'phrul ston/_/e ma'o yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las/_/snyan pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing /_/yan lag rgya mtsho mi bzad bkod pa'i gsung /_/seng ge sgra yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston/_/e ma'o ye 
[\[215a.2\]]shes snying po nyi ma lta bu las/_/'bar ba'i byin brlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing /_/thig le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs/_/rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston/_/mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams/_/sdug bsngal dra bas bcings pa 
[\[215a.3\]]thabs kyis khrol/_/ma rig mun pas long ba don gyis phye/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i gru yis sgrol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po/_/ye shes don gyi snying po mchog dang ldan/_/rnal 'byor theg chen rdo rje kun 'dus lung /_/'dus pa'i 
[\[215a.4\]]tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol/_/a ho zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pas 'khor thams cad la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad 
[\[215a.5\]]pas/_thugs rnam par dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang mi lang ba 'od zer 'byam klas pa kun nas kun du khyab par mdzad do/_/'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /_rdo rje srin po lta bu'i gzugs sna tshogs 'byung 
[\[215a.6\]]ngo /_/de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa 'khor so so'i zham ring dang bcas pa zhing khams mtha' yas par khyab cing snang bar gyur to/_/de las rig pa'i nyi ma'i 'od nam mkha'i khams khyab par byung bas mun pa mun nag smag tu 
[\[215a.7\]]gyur pa thams cad yang dag par bsal lo/_/rig pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra dang /_chos kyi char dang /_chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang /_chos kyi gar sna tshogs dang /_chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/_'byam klas pa'i nam mkha' la phan tshun dang /_yan 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]man dang /_snrel zhi la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long phyed par byung ngo /_/rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer 'bar 'phro 'khrug cing ling long phyed do/_/rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lha nge'o/_/rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis 
[\[215b.2\]]mi khyab pa yang a ho zhes sgrogs so/_/sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa yang gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu e ma'o rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo zhes sgrogs/_'khor 'bum phrag dang gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar bskyed/_rig pa'i 
[\[215b.3\]]rtsal sbyangs/_don gyi che ba phyung /_ngam zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te/_thams cad nye bar gnas so/_/zhi bar gnas so/_/dga' ba dang ldan par gnas so/_/de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[215b.4\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shangs kyi hU~M [{]rings [,]ring [}]las/_rdo rje mngon pa'i mthu can 'di dag mngon par byung ngo /_/hU~M hU~M hU~M rdo rje 'dus par 'dus pa yi/_/theg chen dam pa'i rigs can rnams/_/bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod 
[\[215b.5\]]de/_/rigs ma yin pa rigs med 'gyur/_/rigs can rnams kyi dam tshig ni/_/rigs med rnams la 'bab mi 'gyur/_/de las 'das na de rlag byed/_/hU~M kro d+ha dz+wa la sa ma ya/_rak+Sha sh+ka dz+wa la sa ma ya/_yak+Sha dz+wa la sa ma ya/_tsit+ta dz+wa la sa ma ya/_
[\[215b.6\]]zhes sgra phyung bas zhal ljags kyi dbang po'i 'od phung las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang /_srin po 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro ba dang /_gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrugs pa dang /_za byed 'od kyi phreng ba tshub ma brgyud mar 'byung bas ru tra dang /_bdud dang /_srin po 
[\[215b.7\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_'jug sred dang /_sred med dang /_dbang phyug dang /_stobs ldan dang /_spre'u dang /_ra dang /_lu 'de dang /_sbrang ma dang /_bya rog dang /_me khyer dang /_'khor ba dang /_chu dang /_sa dang /_nam mkha' dang /_me dang /_sgra dang /_rtog 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]dpyod la sogs pa mtshan mar mi gnas chos nyid du zhi bar gyur to/_/de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang /_'khor mang po de dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa/_e ma'o e ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis snod du rung bar 
[\[216a.2\]]byin gyis brlab tu gsol theg pa chen po'i rigs su gzung du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs phyung bas 'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od zhi zhing 'khyil ba dang /_mdzes shing bde bas thams cad rangs par byas nas 
[\[216a.3\]]snod rnam par sbyangs te/_'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to/_/lang ka'i bdag po de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng ge rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus/_don gyi bkod 
[\[216a.4\]]pa/_rtags kyi rol pa/_gsang ba'i nges pa/_bka'i 'grel ba/_chos kyi me long /_gtan tshigs kyi 'byung gnas/_dgongs pa kun 'dus rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po'i sgra 'di byung ngo /_o~M hU~M mU~M zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung /_rab tu mi 
[\[216a.5\]]gsung /_gsungs pa mi 'gog_/'gog pa ma yin/_ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs so/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsa ba sbyor ba'i yan lag ces bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rtsa ba sbyor ba'i 
[\[216a.6\]]yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o//_//lang ka'i bdag po de la 'brel pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/_gang dang gang dag tu 'brel ba ste/_de ni 'di ltar ched du 'gro ba ched du brjod par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po nas bdag de'i tshe 
[\[216a.7\]]de'i dus na dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpar gyur pa la/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des theg pa chen po gsang ba'i don bdag nyid kyis rgya cher ched du rjod cig par dgongs pa'i phyir bdag la nyi tsher zhal 'dud pas gzigs te/_'dzum pas 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]bskul ba rnam par mdzad do/_/de nas bdag dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bar snang ba des yang dag par bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs te rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas nas theg pa chen po de kho na 
[\[216b.2\]]nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i ched du lce pad+ma'i steng du bzhag ste/_shin tu gus pas lus kyi bag bzhi sa la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas seng ge'i lta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas te/_'di skad du gsol to/_/rdo rje rgyal po tshogs 
[\[216b.3\]]bdag dgongs su gsol/_/chos kyi rgyal po mi g.yo rgyal tshul mdzad/_/rgyal mchog bde chen sa la rab bzhugs te/_smra ba'i las mchog rdo rje lce 'bar bas/_/sgra dbyangs rgyal po rnams kyis bdag byin rlobs/_/gsang sngags rgyal po chos kyi me 
[\[216b.4\]]long 'di/_/rgyal mchog chos kyi rgyal po nyid kyi mthus/_/'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher brjod par 'os/_/a ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las/_gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bdag rdo rje las kyi bka' bar bsgo ba de rdo rje brjod pa chen por byin gyis 
[\[216b.5\]]brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ljags kyi 'od zer las/_badzra karma sa twa tsa kra ha ha ha~M/_rdo rje rgya gram gyi 'khor lo 'bar ba sems dpa' rdo rje kho na bdag de'i lag tu babs par gyur nas las kyi rdo rje'i 
[\[216b.6\]]dbang thob ste/_rnam par smra ba chen po shin tu bla bkyal ba'i spobs pa can du byin gyis brlabs nas kun du mi gzo ba rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen por gyur to/_/de nas bdag sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de lag tu blangs nas rdo rje tshig sna tshogs 
[\[216b.7\]]kyis lan lnga ste/_rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas/_grangs gnyis dang lngar bsgyur bas zhing khams mtha' rnam par dag par g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]kun du rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur rab tu 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur/_chem rab tu chem/_kun du rab tu chem/_mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/_shar mtho na ni 
[\[217a.2\]]nub dma'/_nub mtho na ni shar dma'/_lho mtho na ni byang dma'/_byang mtho na ni lho dma' bar gyur te/_zhing khams thams cad bdag rdo rje sems dpa' sha dag lta bur gyur nas gsang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis rgya cher brjod pa'i 
[\[217a.3\]]sgra rnam par brjod do/_/bdag sems dpa' rdo rje nyid rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logs su seng ge rdo rjes mtshon pa'i khri la 'gying bag gi tshul gyi rnam par gnas so/_/de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs 'khor phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[217a.4\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/e ma'o bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar byin gyis brlabs che ba/_'di ltar rgyu che ba/_'di ltar mkhas pa/_'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang 'bral cing 
[\[217a.5\]]thugs las skyes pa/_de kho na nyid dang 'brel cing de kho na nyid las skyes pa lags so zhes gsol pas kho bo la bstod pa dang /_lang ka'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das des de dag la bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa chen po'i tshogs sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub 
[\[217a.6\]]kyi sems kyi ngo bo/_/snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po/_thabs thams cad kyi mchog_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsan/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yab/_rnal 'byor kun gyi rnal 'byor/_/mya ngan las 'das pa kun gyi ded dpon/_bdud 
[\[217a.7\]]thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang gdul dka' 'dul ba/_chos thams cad kyi mdzod/_gsang ba thams cad kyi bdag po/_ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]med par mnyam pa'i dus pha mtha' las kyang pha mtha' dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa 'byam klas pa'i dus na/_bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te/_de ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor zhing chos thams cad kyi 
[\[217b.2\]]rang bzhin du 'brel bas rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thugs dang 'brel pa/_thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te/_de 'dra'o zhes kho bo la bsngags pa brjod pa bka' stsal pa las/_'dus pa'i tshogs 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te 
[\[217b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags so zhes gsol te/_sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de la logs su btud nas lus kyi bag bzhi sa la phab pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs 
[\[217b.4\]]su byas nas rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa sna tshogs byas te/_'di ltar rmad 'byung ngo mtshar khyod/_/sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa/_/ji ltar zhing 'dir snang zhig gu/_/rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras/_/rang bzhin 
[\[217b.5\]]kun dang gcig 'brel ba'i/_/bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas/_/rnam dag lam mchog dam pa dag_/tshig gis mtshon te gsal bar mdzod/_/a ho zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/lang ka'i bdag po de nas dam pa rdo rje bdag gis rdo rje bskor te bsgyur 
[\[217b.6\]]nas brjid bag tu rdo rje tshig tu smras pa/_o~M hU~M mu~M a ho/_rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung /_/mi gsung bas na rgya cher bshad/_/bshad du med pa'i chos nyid 'di/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de/_/de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang /_/rnam par 
[\[217b.7\]]bshad par mi bzhed de/_/rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa'o/_/skye ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/_/ma skyes pas na snying por bshad/_/snying po don de gang yin pa/_/tshig tu smra bar yod ma yin/_/spros pa nyid na gol ba zhes/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]bshad/_/de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid/_/bka' ma stsal ba'i dgongs pa'o/_/dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa/_/ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar/_/dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa/_/ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na/_/tshig tu spros 
[\[218a.2\]]pa ma yin na'ang /_/mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa/_/tshig la zhi ba la don la rtsing /_/tshig phyir blo 'brel rtsal zhan rnams/_/bkri bas bsam pa rangs bya'i phyir/_/mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi/_/cho 'phrul tshig gis de mtshon dgos/_/bder 
[\[218a.3\]]gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs/_/gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don/_/mnyam nyid byang chub theg chen po/_/gsal bar kun la khyab snang ba'i/_/kun gyis de nyid mthong bya dgos/_/nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste/_/stong 
[\[218a.4\]]par sbas pa'i don 'di la/_/brda dang dpes mtshon lde mig gis/_/mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye'o/_/sbas pa'i don mtshon 'byung ba'i rigs/_/ma mthong rnams la bstan par bshad/_/de mthong de bzhin nyid du 'thad/_/ces gsang ba'i bdag po 
[\[218a.5\]]des chos thams cad dgos 'brel yan lag bzhir 'dus par cho ga bgos so/_/de nas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang dgos 'brel yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas chos thams cad yongs su chub par 
[\[218a.6\]]gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'brel pa dgos ched kyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos lang ka'i bdag po la bos te smras pa/_lang ka'i 
[\[218a.7\]]bdag po de la 'dren pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/_gang las gang du yongs su 'dren pa ste/_de yang 'di ltar bgro ba rnam par yongs su bgro bar bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag ni/_/bcu phrag gcig gis 'dren pas 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ni/_/smra brjod tshig gi yan lag rdzogs/_/gang la lta dang sgo 'byed dang /_/sdud dang 'byor par 'dren pa dang /_/rkyen dang gzhan dmigs 'dzin pa'i tshig_/ma bcos me long snrel zhi rnams/_/me long bcu dang mthun sbyar bas/_/tshig don rnam par sbyar 
[\[218b.2\]]ba yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/gang la lta dang lta ba ni/_/gang 'dir mkha' la 'gro ba ni/_/rtsal gyis nam 'phang rlabs su gcod/_/de bzhin de nyid 'dir 'gro ba/_/ma 'dres lta 'phang rlabs su gcod/_/bgrod par bya ba'i sa tshigs dag_/
[\[218b.3\]]rtsal tshad dag gi tshad du gcod/_/de bzhin don dang tshig mtshams dag_/don gyi tshigs dang tshoms su gcod/_/ji ltar gang gi khobs 'og tu/_/sa khams mang po chud pa ltar/_/brjod pa'i rnam grangs mang po kun/_/gang gi ngo bo gcig tu sdud/_/gang 
[\[218b.4\]]dang gang ltar 'gro ba dag_/drang por 'brel rjes gnon par snang /_/brjod dang brjod pa'i tshig mtshams dag_/gang 'dir mi 'khrug 'brel par sbyor/_/gang 'gro gnas su bgrod pa ni/_/g.yo 'gul mi mngon shugs kyis 'gro/_/yi ge brjod dang rang 
[\[218b.5\]]gnyer gyis/_/gang gi ngo bo de bzhin sbyor/_/gang zhig gang ltar gang 'gro ba/_/mi 'tsham pa la der 'tsham snang /_/brlang po zher 'debs skyon tshig rnams/_/gang mi 'tsham pa der 'tsham sbyor/_/gang dag yid la btags pa'i zas/_/khong 
[\[218b.6\]]nas 'dod pa'i bcud 'byin byed/_/gang du dmigs su 'dzin pa yis/_/gang mi gsal bar mngon par ston/_/ji ltar sgra brnyan rgyun byung na/_/gang skye'i dus su yid ches 'gyur/_/de bzhin tshad ma'i yul byung na/_/ma bcos de nyid yin par nges/_/
[\[218b.7\]]gang 'dir dag pa'i me long gis/_/bzhin dang gzugs brnyan ston pa ltar/_/nye bar mtshon pa'i me long gis/_/gang mi mthong ba gsal bar byed/_/ji ltar snrel zhi 'chol 'khrugs pa/_/snol mtshams 'phen sdud 'chol mtshams sbyor/_/rtsal 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]chen rol pa'i stobs chen ltar/_/de nyid rig pa nyid du sbyor/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni/_/gang smra brjod du 'dren pa yi/_/yan lag kho nar shes par gyis/_/zhes gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag 
[\[219a.2\]]po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la gang du smra ba'i sgo yongs su 'byed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las yongs su 'dren pa'i yan lag rnam par bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//_//
[\[219a.3\]]de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po de la nges par bos te rnam par smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/gang du nges pa'i yan lag ni/_/gang la gang gis gang brjod pa/_/'brel bzhi bshad sbyor 
[\[219a.4\]]brjod pa'i sgo/_/yongs su dag pa lha nge ba'i/_/gang la spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/_/mtha' thug med pa'i 'gro gang dag_/'di na snod bzhi kho nar gzigs/_/zhen chags can dang log sred can/_/rigs rgyud can dang blo gros can/_/thams cad 
[\[219a.5\]]cha bzhir snang ba ste/_/'dod khrid sbyor dang nges par snang /_/de dag res 'ga' cha bzhi ste/_/gang du dgos pa gang nges pa/_ngo bo dmigs dang bcas pa las/_/bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pa bzhir/_/snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad sbyar/_/
[\[219a.6\]]thams cad med rgyu brtags chags pa/_/bsgrubs 'grub ji ltar bltas par snang /_/gang dag gang la brda phrad pas/_/gang gi don len nyid du nges/_/zhes nges pa dam pa nyid du bgros pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad 
[\[219a.7\]]brda tsam gyis gang gi nges pa rnyed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las nges pa dam pa'i yan lag bgros pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i las 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]kyi sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po la yid yongs su 'jug pa'i thabs kyis bos te smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po yan lag gi/_/mthar zad rtogs 'jug thabs nyid ni/_/rang bzhin 'byung sgo dbang sbyor dang /_/nges pa khong du chud pa yis/_/yang 
[\[219b.2\]]dag don la nges gzhag bya/_/shes dang 'jug dang 'bras bu dang /_/lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/de 'brel de dgos de mtshon dgos/_/de yi rjes su byed dgos yin/_/thos chung goms dang nges par gyur/_/phye mthong zhugs dang thob pa yin/_/
[\[219b.3\]]de tshol de rnyed 'jug mngon gyur/_/bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub dang 'grub/_/de bzhin mnyam 'gyur rnal 'byor par/_/lhun grub las su rung ba'o/_/de ni nges par 'jug rim yin/_/gzhan gyi don du 'byung rim bzhi/_/g.yo dang cho 'phrul snang mdzad 
[\[219b.4\]]pa'o/_/ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar ba yin/_/de shes de ma skyes par shes/_/de dus dngos med shes pa dang /_/ye nas shes pa'i rim bzhin no/_/thams cad mnyam nyid de nyid dang /_/bsgrub dang mi 'da' spyod mthun rdzas/_/rang bzhin rnam pa 
[\[219b.5\]]lngar snang ba'o/_/gang mkhas che dang mang yas yangs/_/sgyur dang rlabs chen cir ston dang /_/kun shong kun spyod bder 'jug pa'o/_/bcom dang zhi dang mtha' rgyas dang /_/chub par 'dus pa las bzhi'o/_/gang du sbyor ba'i yan lag 'dis/_/yan 
[\[219b.6\]]lag thams cad rdzogs pa yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni yan lag yin te/_yan lag des gang ltar brjod pa thams cad rnam par 'byed par shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pas/_dman pa'i lus 
[\[219b.7\]]kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad khong du yongs su chud par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las 'jug pa thabs kyi yan lag las thabs rnam par 'grel ba'i le'i ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdo yongs su dgrol ba zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/_de skad ces dris pa las gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po mdo 'di ni 'di ltar gang 
[\[220a.2\]]du gang ltar brjod pa thams cad mdo bzhi po 'di dag kho nar zad do/_/lang ka'i bdag po bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba dang /_gang gis mthong bas nges par 'byung ba dang /_gang gis mngon sum par 'byung ba dang /_gang nas 
[\[220a.3\]]gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la gang thos pas nges par 'byung ba ni/_/kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid/_/gang gis thos pa de nyid du/_/dngos po med par kun khyab rgyas/_/de shes de bzhin nyid du chub/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang 
[\[220a.4\]]gis mthong ba nges par 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/_gang gis de bzhin de mthong na/_/mthong bas snang srid yongs su dag_/gang la'ang nyam nga yod ma yin/_/de bzhin nyid der kun sangs rgyas/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang gis mngon sum par nges par 'byung ba ni 
[\[220a.5\]]'di lta ste/_gang gis stong nyid de shes pa/_/der ni thams cad mngon sum du/_/stong pa nyid du nges par zad/_/de nyid mngon sum sangs rgyas yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang nas gang du nges par 'byung ba med pa ni 'di lta ste/_/thams cad de bzhin nyid 
[\[220a.6\]]dbyings su/_/ye nas rnam rtog med sangs rgyas/_/gdod sangs rgyas su ga la yod/_/de bzhin de nyid kho na'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni mdo ste/_/gang gis gang la gang ltar brjod pa mtha' yas pa mdo bzhi bo de dag 'ba' zhig kho nar zad do/_/de 
[\[220a.7\]]dag ni gang gi mdud pa rnam par 'grol ba ste/_chos thams cad rnam par grol cing rgya cher 'grel ba nyid du shes par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams cad gsal bar yongs su 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]chub par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las mdo rgya cher 'grel ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 
[\[220b.2\]]rtsa ba'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi rtsa ba ni gang /_nges par 'byin pa ni gang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po go dbye bar gsol/_smra ba'i seng ge shin tu go dbye bar gsol/_de skad ces smras pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[220b.3\]]pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang gi rtsa ba dri ba de ni legs so/_/shin tu rab tu legs so/_/'di lta ste/_rtsa ba ni me long dang /_mi mthun pa dang /_nges pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po me long ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i chos mthun pa'i dpe nye bar bzung ba 
[\[220b.4\]]ste nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar gang gis nges pa yang de ltar lta'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la nam mkha' gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gcig pa dang /_mi gos pa dang /_go 'byed pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_dbyibs med pa 
[\[220b.5\]]dang /_kha dog med pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_gzung ba med pa dang /_'dzin pa med pa dang /_mtha' med pa dang /_dbus med pa dang /_'phel ba med pa dang /_'grib pa med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_g.yo ba 
[\[220b.6\]]med pa dang /_'gul ba med pa dang /_chags pa med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_'jig pa med pa dang /_stong pa med pa dang /_'gyur ba med pa dang /_ma khyab pa med pa dang /_mi 'byung ba med pa dang /_ma chub pa med pa dang /_skyo ba med 
[\[220b.7\]]pa dang /_nub pa med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_rgyu med pa dang /_rkyen med pa dang /_'bras bu med pa dang /_rtsol ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yin no/_/lang ka'i bdag po nam mkha' ni yod pa las med par gyur 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa ma yin/_med pa las yod par gyur pa ma yin/_de bzhin du gsal ba las mi gsal bar gyur pa dang /_mi gsal ba las gsal bar gyur pa dang /_tha dad pa las gcig tu gyur pa dang /_gcig pa las tha dad du gyur pa 
[\[221a.2\]]dang /_yin pa las min par gyur pa dang /_min pa las yin par gyur pa dang /_nye ba las ring bar gyur pa dang /_ring pa las nye bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du che ba dang /_chung bar gyur pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_ngan par gyur pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug 
[\[221a.3\]]bsngal bar gyur pa dang /_khyab pa dang /_ma khyab par gyur pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_mi 'byung bar gyur pa dang /_dag pa dang /_ma dag par gyur pa dang /_grub pa dang /_ma grub par gyur pa dang /_mtho ba dang /_dma' bar gyur pa dang /_yangs pa dang /_dog 
[\[221a.4\]]par gyur pa dang /_dbyibs dang /_dbyibs med par gyur pa dang /_kha dog dang /_kha dog med par gyur pa dang /_phyi dang nang du gyur pa dang /_skye ba dang 'gag par gyur pa dang /_'pho ba dang /_mi 'pho bar gyur pa dang /_'gyur ba dang /_mi 'gyur bar gyur pa 
[\[221a.5\]]dang /_mun pa dang /_snang bar gyur pa dang /_sngon dang /_phyi mar gyur pa dang /_mtha' dang /_dbus su gyur pa dang /_bdag dang /_gzhan du gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du blangs nas dor bar gyur pa dang /_dor ba las blangs par gyur pa med pa'i phyir nam 
[\[221a.6\]]mkha' ni thams cad nas thams cad du ma bcos pa'o/_/de bzhin du 'di nyid kyang sbyar te/_de'i phyir ma bcos pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni sus kyang ma byas/_byed pa po med/_rgyu las ma byung /_rkyen las ma 
[\[221a.7\]]bskyed/_dang por ma skyes/_tha mar mi 'jig_/thog ma dang tha mar mi dmigs/_thob pa dang /_ma thob pa med/_re ba dang /_brtsal ba med do/_/de'i phyir nam mkha'i ni sus kyang ma byas/_byas pa med pas gnyen po med do/_/de bzhin du de nyid kyang byed pa 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]med pa'i phyir ma byas pas gnyen po med do/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_gang zhig nam mkha'i mtha' tshol ba/_/tshol bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_/go skabs yod par gang shes pa/_/de ni nam mkha' rnyed pa'o/_/sems kyi sems nyid rtsad gcod pa/_/
[\[221b.2\]]rtsa ba med pas rnyed ma yin/_/gzhi rtsa med 'byung gang shes pa/_/de ni sems nyid rnyed pa'o/_/sems kyis sems btsal sems mi rnyed/_/su zhig sems kyi gting rtsa tshol/_/gang zhig sems kyi dbus mtha' 'byed/_/btsal bas rnyed pa ga la yin/_/
[\[221b.3\]]sems kyis sems la ji ltar mtshon/_/sems la dngos po yod ce'am/_/sems kyi dngos po gang gis bya/_/dngos med dngos sprul byang chub sems/_/phyogs bral chen po gang su zhig_/phyogs gcig bral bas phyogs kun bral/_/brtags pa'i spyod yul 
[\[221b.4\]]las 'das pa/_/de nyid rtogs na de kho na/_/sems kyis sems btsal drod cig rnyed/_/drod de rnyed na byang chub sems/_/ci yang yin no gang yang rung /_/de nyid chos kyi don po mchog_/des na 'khor ba'i chos nyid 'di/_/gnyis su yod pa ma yin te/_/
[\[221b.5\]]'khor ba'i de bzhin nyid de ni/_/chos nyid yin par lung du bstan/_/'khor bar 'khrul pa'i sgyu ma dang /_/rnam dag rnam byang sgyu ma gnyis/_/sems can sangs rgyas tha dad kyang /_/de bzhin nyid las yong ye med/_/dper na ras snam rgyu gcig las/_/
[\[221b.6\]]tshon gyi rkyen gyis bsgyur byas nas/_/kha dog sna tshogs tha dad kyang /_/ras snam nyid las ga la yod/_/log rtog yang dag rtog smin pa/_/sems can ye shes can 'di dag_/rgyu gcig rkyen gyis bsgyur ba las/_/rig dang ma rig gnyis su snang /_/
[\[221b.7\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rmi 'dra ba/_/dbugs chen phyin nas rmi sangs ltar/_/thams cad bde chen byang chub sems/_/mkha' ltar khyab gdal nyid du snang /_/klo bur las zhes brtags pa kun/_/'dus byas yin te ma skyes pas/_/de bzhin nyid des 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]khyab gdal chu ba/_/brtsal med ye shes rang 'byung che//_//bam po brgyad par zug pa/_lang ka'i bdag po 'di nyid ni/_/yin par nges pa'i rtsa ba bdun/_/de brtag de nyid de rtogs na/_/de nyid rnam par nges pa yin/_/gling dang ri bo mu khyud 
[\[222a.2\]]bcas/_/lhun po'i rtse mo nyid nas gsal/_/de rnyed theg pa'i rnam grangs kun/_/de nyid chen po nyid mthong gsal/_/'jig rten 'od kyi rgyal po ni/_/gzi ldan gsal ba'i nyi ma yin/_/chos kun yongs su rdzogs gsal ba/_/kun snang chen po de nyid do/_/
[\[222a.3\]]go skabs chen po nam mkha' ni/_/chen po bzhi yi go 'byed ltar/_/gsang nyid 'dus pa de nyid kyis/_/brjod pa'i brjod kun gsal bar 'grel/_/gang gis bka' yi gsang thob na/_/mi gang gzhan la rag ma lus/_/gsang ba'i snying po kun chub 
[\[222a.4\]]na/_/smra brjod gang la'ang btsal mi dgos/_/rgyun dang bcas pa'i 'byung ba rnams/_/nam mkha'i ngang las 'byung zhing snang /_/de bzhin smra brjod 'byung ba rnams/_/de nyid zab mo'i dbyings nas 'byung /_/don du bya ba'i rnam grangs kun/_/mthar gyis 'bras bu 
[\[222a.5\]]grub par sdud/_/grangs mang rgya cher brjod mod kyang /_/de kun de bzhin nyid du 'dus/_/me long gsal ba'i snying po ni/_/bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan ston pa ltar/_/de nyid chos kyi me long gis/_/kun gyi rang bzhin gsal bar byed/_/kun gyi rtsa ba rang byung 
[\[222a.6\]]bas/_/rang bzhin cis kyang ma bcos pa'o/_/kun shes rig pa mi nub pas/_/'od gsal snang bas phyogs kun mthong /_/thams cad de nyid der 'dus pas/_/dngos med ngo bo nyid du zad/_/de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas/_/gnyis su bya ba'i 
[\[222a.7\]]tha snyad med/_/rgyu nyid 'bras bur ye rdzogs pas/_/re dogs gnyis bral de kho na/_/dor bar bya ba'i dngos med pas/_/blang bar bya ba ga la yod/_/mthong zin sbyangs zin byas pa zin/_/'dod pa grub zin spyom pa zin/_/de bzhin dngos po grub zin pas/_/
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]de nyid rnyed pa nyid las byung /_/kun brtags kun nyid dben na snang /_/kun la sbyor bas don byed nus/_/the tshom chad pas mthun par snang /_/mdor na gsum nyid kho na la/_/lar na gnyis nyid kho nar zad/_/nges par gcig las med pa yin/_/thams cad 
[\[222b.2\]]'dir 'dus 'di las byung /_/kun gyi rtsa ba 'di shes na/_/kun kyang ma bcos ji bzhin pa/_/de bzhin nyid de kun gyi mdo/_/sgyu mar kun snang dngos gzhi med/_/chags pa med pas yid mi 'khrug_/nam mkha'i ngang la rang bzhin med/_/brtag tu 
[\[222b.3\]]med pas dngos dang bral/_/snying po nyid las gzhan pa med/_/sna tshogs dag gi rgyun du 'char/_/sgron mar snang bas mun pa sel/_/yid bzhin nor bu nyid las byung /_/skye 'gag med pas 'jigs dang bral/_/cir yang ma nges nyam mi nga /_/chub na 
[\[222b.4\]]bya brtsal kun dang bral/_/go ba'i yul na bgrod pa med/_/de nyid chen po'i tshig re rer/_/rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa brgyud/_/gzhan du rtsa ba gsum bcad kyang /_/gsang ba'i don nyid nyid las 'byung /_/gang zhig gzhan du gang tshol ba/_/de ni gol 
[\[222b.5\]]ba'i lam du zhugs/_/rnam rtog mun pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs/_/gang ma rig pa de bsgribs yin/_/rnam par rtog pa de nyid bgegs/_/bgegs ni de nyid de las byung /_/gang la rnam rtog ma byung na/_/bdud ces bya ba ga la yod/_/bdud ni gang 
[\[222b.6\]]las byung zhe na/_/rtag tu 'grus las byung ba yin/_/'grus med nyid las bdud mi 'byung /_/ci phyir mi 'grus de nyid bdud/_/de bzhin skyon dang gol sgrib ni/_/yon tan mnyam du mthong las 'byung /_/gal te yon tan mnyam mthong med/_/skyon dang 
[\[222b.7\]]gol sgrib ga la yod/_/de nyid skyon dang gol sgrib yin/_/gang nyid mngon du ma gyur na/_/gsang ba'i don byung gang bsrel yang /_/nad pa sman srel thabs med bzhin/_/nges pa'i thabs med gnas ngan 'khyam/_/yul dang mtshan ma dngos po dang /_/dran 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]rtog thos mthong ji snyed kun/_/yid la ji ltar 'gyus pa bzhin/_/de nyid skad cig de ltar snang /_/rtag pa mi gnas skad cig ma/_/mi nub ma chags bde chen sems/_/sems kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan zhes gang yang med pas na/_/
[\[223a.2\]]gol sgrib bya ba ga la yod/_/su zhig gol sgrib don du gnyer/_/gang gis gol sgrib ji ltar rnyed/_/gol sgrib nyid kyang de nyid dbyings/_/btsal bas de yang de la thug_/gzhan du btsal zhing de las byung /_/bltas pas mthong ba rtogs pa med/_/'ja' snang mun 
[\[223a.3\]]khung ji bzhin no/_/de nyid mthong ba'i khyad par las/_/spyod lam dngos bzhi gang spyad kyang /_/'ching bar mi 'gyur 'grol 'gyur thabs/_/thams cad der sbyangs lam gnas mchog_/gang nyid don gyi rjes tshol zhing /_/gol sgrib yongs su gcod 'dod pa'i/_/mtha' 
[\[223a.4\]]sel rnal 'byor sems dpa' pa/_/gang la zhen pa'i phyogs bzung ste/_/dbus mthar lta ba de bzung bas/_/cho ga'i nges blo brtan pa can/_/de kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi/_/yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor/_/spyod lam rnal du 'byor mod kyi/_/yang dag don du yang 
[\[223a.5\]]ma 'byor/_/phyogs su lta la zhen mod kyi/_/dam pa'i don du yang ma zhen/_/glo bur las ro tshor mod kyi/_/chos nyid kyi ni ro ma tshor/_/bdag med phyogs bral zer mod kyi/_/phyogs su lta dang yang ma bral/_/brtul zhugs rtog pa choms mod kyi/_/gzung 'dzin 
[\[223a.6\]]rtog pa yang ma choms/_/dbus mthar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/brjod pa tshig lam sgron ma yis/_/yang dag dbu ma'i gser tshol ba/_/rtog 'dod spre'u 'di gzung byas nas/_/rkun mo byi la gdags par bya/_/gser khung skar khung kun bkag ste/_/re'u 
[\[223a.7\]]cha phang phung bshig nas ni/_/rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na/_/de dag longs spyod rdzogs bdag po/_/yang dag dbu ma'i lam tshol ba/_/rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya/_/rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang /_/mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang /_/byung tshor 'byung ba rnam pa lnga/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]de yang 'di ltar rtog par byed/_/rtog pa la yang gnyis yod de/_/rags pa dang ni phra ba'o/_/de bzhin mtshan ma che chung gnyis/_/rgyu ba ring po thung ngu gnyis/_/tshor ba gsal ba mi gsal ba/_/byung tshor myur ba bul ba'o/_/'di ni don la sgrib pa yi/_/rtog pa 
[\[223b.2\]]chen po bgegs chen yin/_/ci phyir dbus nyid mi mthong phyir/_/mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang /_/kun du 'thibs dang sprin phung dang /_/na bun lta bur sgrib pa yis/_/dpung nyid mi gsal mthong mi 'gyur/_/'di yang rnam pa gnyis gnyis te/_/mun pa mun 
[\[223b.3\]]nag chen po dang /_/kun nas 'thibs pa lta bu ste/_/yongs su 'khrigs dang bsgribs pa dang /_/'thibs pa chen po chung ngu gnyis/_/sprin chen 'thibs dang 'al 'ol dang /_/na bun gtams dang ban bun gnyis/_/gnas ngan gsum dang phyed snang gnas/_/'dod 
[\[223b.4\]]pa bzhi yi bde gnas dang /_/bsam gtan gnas dang rgyun bzhi gnas/_/nyan thos rang rgyal sems dpar ltung /_/sgrib par gyur pa'i mun nag ni/_/mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba drug tu snang /_/rang bzhin phyi nang mtshan ma dang /_/yid la byed dang gnas ngan len/_/
[\[223b.5\]]'di dag rab tu gsal bar 'dod/_/gang du dbu ma nyid lta che/_/dbu ma'i lam la sgrib pa'i skyon/_/rnam pa lnga byung gang sgrib pa/_/byung tshor bying rmugs 'dzin chags dang /_/ther zug phyal ba'i dbang gis ni/_/g.yang dang 'thibs dang 'gog pa dang /_/rtag tu med 
[\[223b.6\]]pa kho na yin/_/'di dag dbu ma'i skyon yin zhes/_/dbu mar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor 'dod/_/dbu ma nges pa'i lam tshol ba/_/dgon pa'i rgyun du dben bzung ste/_/tshad ma gnyis kyis gzhal ba'i ba'i blos/_/rnam par rtog pa'i rjes gcod pa/_/yod med sngon rtog 
[\[223b.7\]]gang las byung /_/brtags pas rtog pa rtas las 'byung /_/rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur/_/des ni gnas ngan gsum du min/_/rtogs pa gang las byung zhe na/_/mtshan ma nyid las byung ba yin/_/mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na/_/mtshan ma'i chos 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]rnams zhi bar 'gyur/_/des ni 'dod khams tha mar min/_/mtshan ma de yang ji ltar na/_/de yang 'byung ba dag la 'byung /_/dran pa skyon dang zhir shes na/_/rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed/_/'dod khams gnyis par de dag 
[\[224a.2\]]min/_/rgyu ba de yang gang de bzhin/_/de yang de ltar byung ba yin/_/de nyid de ltar shes gyur na/_/skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed/_/'dod khams gsum par de yang min/_/de nyid de ltar der brtsad na/_/gang de phyi dang nyid kho na/_/de nyid skyon du rab shes na/_/
[\[224a.3\]]'gag dang skye ba ga la yod/_/de ni 'dod khams bzhi par min/_/de yang gang las skye mched na/_/sems kyi chos las gyur pa ste/_/sems nyid sgyu mar rab shes na/_/sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur/_/phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la/_/
[\[224a.4\]]sems ni smig rgyu lta bur 'dod/_/yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las grol/_/de shes 'dod khams lnga par min/_/sems nyid yod pa'i dngos po'am/_/med ces bya bar mi lta bas/_/ya mtshan can du ltung mi 'gyur/_/bying rmugs can du ma gyur pas/_/
[\[224a.5\]]bsam gtan skyon du de mi 'gyur/_/'du shes rjes su ma 'brangs pas/_/sems can gnas su de yong min/_/kun 'byung kun gzhi nyid mthong bas/_/zhi ba'i gnas su yang ma yin/_/zhi bas zhi bar mi lta bas/_/rang rgyal gnas su'ang ga la yin/_/
[\[224a.6\]]rnam rig tsam du 'ang min pas na/_/sems dpa' de yang der ma yin/_/stong nyid mnyam pa'i dbu ma la/_/so so tha dad dbyer med pas/_/sa yi rim pa sbyong ma yin/_/phyogs lta mtha' 'das dbu ma nyid/_/rang bzhin med pa de nyid la/_/sems nyid kyi nad 
[\[224a.7\]]skad cig mas/_/mi g.yo rgyun du dran par bya/_/de ltar de la mnyam gzhag na/_/rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung /_/drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang /_/mngon par dang ni ye shes 'byung /_/drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang /_/rtags ni 'byung dang brtan pa 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]dang /_/cho 'phrul 'byung dang rdzogs pa dang /_/gang du rig pa thams cad gsal/_/der ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin/_/dper na mun pa sangs pa dang /_/snang ba byung dang nam mkha' dang /_/kun du mthong dang thams cad gsal/_/des na de yi khyad par gyis/_/
[\[224b.2\]]gang du chags pa'i mun bsal te/_/ji ltar rlung gis sprin phyags ltar/_/skad cig tsam gyi rnal 'byor gyis/_/mun pa'i khams de 'phyag par 'gyur/_/ji ltar mar mes mun bsal na/_/de nyid snang bar gyur pa bzhin/_/skad cig ma yi de rig na/_/sngon nas 
[\[224b.3\]]zhen pa'i mun pa sel/_/de gang rig pa de dag ni/_/de nyid de yi sgo phye zhing /_/de bzhin mig dang de ldan pas/_/mthong thos tshig lam le'u bzhir bsdebs/_/sa pa yin pas de la ltos/_/de yi mig dang ma ldan na/_/mu mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis/_/
[\[224b.4\]]de la tha snyad ci brjod kyang /_/nges ma nges kyi dmigs mi phyed/_/tshig phyir blo 'brangs dmu rgod dag_/bslab pa'i sa dang lam ma yin/_/tshig lam 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang /_/gzhan la smra bar bya ma yin/_/gal te gang zhig gang smra ba/_/log smra rdo rje bka' 
[\[224b.5\]]rkun pa'o/_/thar med rdo rje de ltung 'gyur/_/dor sgyu tshul 'chos mkhan dag gis/_/nges pa'i blo shed ma bye bar/_/tshig lam yi ges khrid nas ni/_/gang ma nges par lam brjod na/_/srog chags kun gyi srog phrogs pas/_/ma nges chos smra de bas lji/_/
[\[224b.6\]]des na mtha' dbus mnyam nyid la/_/bdud de cig car gang 'jug pa/_/rnal 'byor gnas yun ring thung dang /_/gang 'phro yod dang med pa dang /_/nam zhig mnyam pa'i khar ma lus/_/de la de bzhin der bzhag na/_/de ma thag tu de nyid snang /_/de las de bzhin 
[\[224b.7\]]ma g.yos na/_/grong khyer snang bar de mi 'gro/_/de la de ltar ma chags na/_/snang ba med par ga la 'gro/_/de nyid mngon du gyur pas na/_/zhi ba'i gnas su de dag min/_/yod dang med pa'i mtha' chod na/_/mtha' las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/gang 'dir 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]nges pa dam pa'o zhes/_/gang dag 'di ltar dam 'cha' ba/_/gang la re dogs med pa yi/_/gol sgrib nyid du nges par snang /_/ci phyir dbus mtha' 'byed pas na/_/dbus yod mtha' yang rang bzhin 'byung /_/dbus med mtha' yang ngang gis 
[\[225a.2\]]med/_/dbus mtha' 'byed pa de nyid nang /_/mtha' dang dbus bral de kho na/_/mi gnas mi len mi 'byed cing /_/ci yang ma yin mthong thos med/_/ci yang mi 'byed bya dang bral/_/snang med snang ba'i tha snyad bral/_/bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni/_/mi 
[\[225a.3\]]bsam de bzhin nyid du gzhag_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams kun/_/bsam med de bzhin nyid las med/_/sa dang rnam thar la sogs pa/_/chos sku byang chub dkar po'i phyogs/_/kun kyang bsam du med pa yi/_/gol sgrib chen por gyur pa yin/_/
[\[225a.4\]]'da' dka' chen po'i dka' thub ni/_/ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na/_/dpag med rgyal ba 'da' bar dka'/_/gang gzugs med las gang 'dzin gol/_/bdal khyab chen po'i sa 'di ni/_/ye nas ma bgrod rang bzhin bkod/_/sa 'dir ma chub gang yang 
[\[225a.5\]]med/_/gang 'dir sa bkod gang bgrod gol/_/de bzhin de rig ye 'byung la/_/khyad par rim par 'byung 'dod gang /_/gang 'dir rmongs pa kho na'o/_/rang byung de las nges par grol/_/bsam yul dmigs su med pa la/_/btang snyoms chen po'i rnal 'byor 
[\[225a.6\]]pa/_/ji bzhin pa nyid yin bzhin du/_/lus dben sems 'chos gol sar zhugs/_/kun grol chen po de nyid la/_/bcing grol med par nges bzhin du/_/gang 'dir dka' thub rtogs pas bcings/_/rnam grol chen po nyid las gol/_/ye nas ma bcos nyid 
[\[225a.7\]]kho na ra/_/gang gnas de nyid de kho na/_/de la gol sa ga la yod/_/gol sgrib nyid kyang de kho na/_/de skad ces bgros pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gang gi bcing ba las yongs su grol te re rtsol gyi the tshom chad 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi me long bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[225b.2\]]po la gang gi rtsa ba dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos thams cad kyi rtsa bzhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de skad ces dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye lang ka'i bdag po gang 
[\[225b.3\]]du dri ba dam pa 'di ni legs so/_/shin tu rab tu legs so/_/gang chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems la bya'o/_/de ni 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya ste/_sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi chos nyid dang /_sems can kun gyi 
[\[225b.4\]]sems kyi chos nyid du shes par bya'o/_/de ni mun snang gnyis su snang yin te/_lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de gsang ba'i gnas pad+mo can zhes bya ba gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i sprul pa'i lhums/_
[\[225b.5\]]gsang ba mchog gi pho brang na skad cig bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_gang skyes bu dam pa dpag tu med pa dag de kho na nyid gsang ba dam pa'i the tshom gcod pa dang /_yongs su zhu ba dang /_zhu bar sdog pa dang /_the tshom chad nas slar dong ba dang /_gang 
[\[225b.6\]]kho bo 'khor der 'dus par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ma mthong ma dmigs lags so/_/yang dag par ma rnyed nges par ma 'tshal ba lags 
[\[225b.7\]]so/_/bgrod pas ma khyab lags na 'di gang na mchis/_gang du btsal/_gang zhig lags/_gang la bgyi/_gang du stor/_bcom ldan 'das dus kyi skad cig ma 'di nyid du bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa 'di bstan du gsol/_zhes zhus pa las/_
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba de ni sgrib pas ma mthong /_med pas ma dmigs/_zab pas ma rnyed/_dka' bas ma shes/_myur bas ma 
[\[226a.2\]]slebs/_yangs pas ma khyab pa yin te/_'di mun pa'i khams na yod/_grong khyer gsum du btsal/_'di yan lag dang mdo dang rtsa ba yin/_ngo bo de kho na nyid la bya/_mun pa'i khams su stor/_sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na mun pa 'di bsal ba'i 
[\[226a.3\]]phyir 'di'i rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o/_/de bzhin du ngo bo dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_yan lag dang /_ji srid pa'i yun dang /_las dang /_mun pa'i rnam grangs dang /_dpe la sogs pa dang /_bsal ba'i thabs rnams la mkhas par bya'o/_/'di la nan tan 
[\[226a.4\]]du bya'o/_/gang mun pa'i khams pa dag dang /_cha gcig tu shes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mun pa 'di ci las byung /_mun pa 'di'i rang bzhin ci/_mun pa 'di'i ngo bo gang /_mun pa 'di'i 
[\[226a.5\]]mtshan nyid ci/_mun pa 'di'i yan lag tu/_mun pa 'di'i rtsa ba gang /_mun pa 'di ji srid cig gnas/_mun pa 'dis ci la sgrib/_mun pa 'di'i bye brag du/_mun pa 'di gang dang mthun/_mun pa 'di gang du 'thibs/_mun pa 'di gang gis sel/_mun 
[\[226a.6\]]pa zhes ci'i phyir bgyi/_'di ci phyir 'thibs/_dra ba gang du 'dus/_'di bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa 'di bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_sems dpa' chen po mun pa dang snang bas 
[\[226a.7\]]bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni gzhi dang rtsa ba med par 'dus par shes par bya'o/_/de ltar ston pa'i mdo ni 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas byang chub 'byung ba yi/_/bskyed cing snying po de nyid de/_/pad+mo kha 'bus snying po ltar/_/rtsa ba 'khor ba'i 'dam na yod/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]rtsa ba thams cad 'byung ba yi/_/rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/_/khams gsum 'di dag nyid du 'dus/_/chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'/_/rtogs par yang ni mi nus te/_/mthar phyin sa la gnas pa yin/_/skyes bus kyang ni 
[\[226b.2\]]mthong ma yin/_/med pas stong pa'i chos nyid 'di/_/yod pa'i dngos por yang mi dmigs/_/dmigs dang mi dmigs tshig lam chad/_/rnam par mi rtog skye ba med/_/gsal bas dus mtha' med pa ru/_/ma lus khyab par kun btsal yang /_/'di zhes bya 
[\[226b.3\]]ba'i dngos po zhig_/mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/mkhas pas dus mtha' med pa ru/_/shin tu bsgrims te cir brtags kyang /_/gang 'dir ci yang mthong ba med/_/mgyogs pas dus mtha' med pa ru/_/nyam thag chad pas brgyugs kyang ni/_/da dung 
[\[226b.4\]]de nyid dbyings 'di las/_/gar yang ma phyin phyin pa med/_/skye med chos kyi sdong po la/_/rnam pa bzhi yi yan lag gel/_/byang chub bla med snying por smin/_/de ni kun 'byung byang chub shing /_/'jug pa don la 'dod pa'i khams/_/mngon med 'dzin pa 
[\[226b.5\]]gzugs khams so/_/snang med ma chad gzugs med nyid/_/gang de ched las byed las 'gyur/_/yul du gang 'gyur 'jug pa nyid/_/gang la 'jug pa de rnams shes/_/de yul mun pa'i khams gyur kyang /_/mun pa'i khams na de nyid snang /_/snang dang snang 
[\[226b.6\]]ba'i 'od byung ba/_/skye 'byung rtsa ba'i snying po nyid/_/phyogs rig des mi rig pa yi/_/ngo bo nyid med de nyid do/_/mun khung gser stor ji bzhin du/_/'khor ba mun pa mun nag tu/_/rin chen gser dang 'dra ba yi/_/byang chub sems 'di stor bar 'gyur/_/
[\[226b.7\]]mun pa'i khams su gyur pa dag_/mun pa'i 'du shes nyid du 'byung /_/mun pa'i khams pas gang shes pa/_/phra mo'i cha shas tsam yan cad/_/gang 'di blo chung byis pa rnams/_/ched du gleng zhing gang brjod pa/_/blo ldan kun la 'di brjod kyis/_/blun po'i 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]ched du shes par gyis/_/'di yang 'di ltar yongs su snang /_/yan lag mdo dang rtsa ba ste/_/'byed dang 'grol dang 'byin pa yin/_/yan lag drug tu gang grags pa/_/mthong thos tshor myong reg shes drug_/'byung 'jug gcod pa'i yan 
[\[227a.2\]]lag yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po mdo bzhi ni gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzhi'i mdo dang /_dmigs pa'i mdo dang /_snang ba'i mdo dang /_'jug pa'i mdo'o/_/de yang 'di ltar/_mdo bzhi gzhi dang dmigs pa dang /_/snang dang 'jug pa lung bzhin bshad/_/lang 
[\[227a.3\]]ka'i bdag po de la gzhi'i mdo ni 'di lta ste/_gzhi ni byis pa 'di ltar 'dod/_/gzugs med ming la mngon zhen pa/_/med pa'i khams nyid de kho na/_/shes pa kun gyi ngo bor 'byung /_/shes bya nyid de yul du snang /_/thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/ye 
[\[227a.4\]]nas ngang gis ma skyes la/_/ma bcos yang gis 'od gsal ba/_/rgyu rkyen med pas 'dus ma byas/_/yongs su ma chad yul kun la/_/shes la mi gsal lhan cig 'byung /_/khyab 'jug btang snyoms dngos med nyid/_/rnam par mi rtog dpyod dang bral/_/mi 
[\[227a.5\]]rtog de yi de nyid la/_/skad cig snga phyi ji snyed pa/_/rgyun dang bcas pa'i chu bo bzhin/_/rgyun 'byung skye 'gag bcas pa'o/_/gcig tu chad pa med pa yi/_/so so ris ltar mi snang ba/_/bye brag rnam par 'byed pa ni/_/'di dang 'di zhes ga la yod/_/tha snyad gnyis 
[\[227a.6\]]kyis bsdus pa'i chos/_/thams cad thams cad pa nyid de/_/kun 'gro kun 'jug kun la sbyor/_/dngos rig sna tshogs dbyer mi rig_/g.yo ba nyid dang rnam par bkod/_/yongs myong gcod dang de 'dzin byed/_/lnga ldan mdun du ldan pa la/_/de ni kun la snyoms 
[\[227a.7\]]pa yin/_/gang zhen de 'dzin kun mi gtong /_/go skabs yod pa'i nam mkha' ltar/_/chos kun gnas 'byung go yod pa/_/skyed min sogs dang len pa yin/_/rkyen ni gnyis dang mi ldan te/_/ma nges de nyid kho na la/_/thams cad du ni gnas pa yin/_/rkyen ni 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]gang phrad de nyid du'o/_/chos rnams rtsa bar gcig pa la/_/de rgyun dbang gi rnam pa gnyis/_/gzhi dang rten zhes grags pa la/_/rmongs dang shes pa'i khyad par snang /_/gzhi la kun 'gro kun la rmongs/_/rnam pa zhen pa'i bsti gnas med/_/rten ni gzhi sbyor snang 
[\[227b.2\]]ba dang /_/'gyur med rnam dag btsal med gnas/_/de dag re zhing rgyu 'bras gnyis/_/snga ma snga ma gang dag gang /_/phyi mi phyi ma smin pa'i rgyu/_/de bzhin kun du 'khor bar 'byung /_/rten lnga de rgyun de dbang gis/_/rnal 'byor lngar snang gnyen po lnga/_/smin 
[\[227b.3\]]pa'i dpe lnga sbyor dpe bzhin/_/skabs lnga lam lnga de bzhin sa/_/lnga lnga bsti gnas dus lnga dang /_/gnas lnga mthar phyin rnam pa lnga/_/'dir dbye ba las lnga bcu drug_/rdzogs par snang bas lngar bshad do/_/chos rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur pas/_/nor 
[\[227b.4\]]ba'i rkyen gyis 'khor bar snang /_/rang bzhin ji ltar yin pa'i don/_/nges par mthong na mya ngan 'das/_/kun gyi gzhi dang gang de shes/_/chos kyi phung po srid gsum 'byung /_/de byung rtsa ba sna tshogs len/_/dbyings dang 'byung gnas rgyu zhes grags/_/
[\[227b.5\]]stong pa nyid dang mtshan nyid med/_/de bzhin nyid de ma nor ba/_/ma bcos gzhan ma yin pa nyid/_/ting 'dzin rtog pa stong nyid grags/_/lhag mthong zhi gnas rnam par thar/_/dbu ma mtha' bral gzung ba med/_/'dzin med chad med rtag pa med/_/
[\[227b.6\]]skye med 'gag med rtog pa med/_/rnam par rtog med mtshan ma med/_/de bzhin bdag med gzhan med pa/_/'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/_/dri med 'du ba 'bral ba med/_/phung med khams med skye mched med/_/yul med las med rgyu 'bras med/_/ma 
[\[227b.7\]]skyes snying po byang chub med/_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems/_/de ni mi skye mi 'gag la/_/de ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/chos kyi dbyings nyid chos kyi sku/_/mi rtog ye shes yin zhes grags/_/ma byung ye nas rang bzhin snang /_/ji srid len pa'i srid pa 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]dag_/gang sangs gang dag byung 'gags pas/_/sdug bsngal de rgyun zad bsregs pas/_/'gyur ba'i skabs lngas nges par 'byung /_/gzugs med mthong med yod ma yin/_/yod pas mthong ba'i yul du gyur/_/mthong med yul du ma gyur pa/_/
[\[228a.2\]]yod ces bya bar ga la rigs/_/mu mtha' med par 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/dngos med gzhi rten ngo bo nyid/_/de bas tha dad sna tshogs snang /_/dbyings 'di med na kun dang 'gal/_/gal te med pa gcig yod na/_/'dzin pa phyogs kyang de lta bas/_/nams kyang grol 
[\[228a.3\]]bar mi 'gyur te/_/'ching ba'i mdud pa de na yod/_/gang zhig mur 'dzin mthar lta ba/_/des ni mu med don ma mthong /_/mur 'dzin mkha' la mthos 'jal 'dra/_/mu med nyid na grol bar bshad/_/mur 'dzin grol 'dod grol ma yin/_/bye ma skyed kyang 'brur 
[\[228a.4\]]mi smin/_/shel sgong bsgyur yang gting mi 'gyur/_/mching bu bsgyur yang rin chen min/_/sa rdo bsres kyang 'drir mi rung /_/glog 'gyus gzhi la mun pa med/_/mtshal zi gser zhun gcig mi srid/_/skyes bus nyid la mchod mi srid/_/chu bo snga phyi rgyun 
[\[228a.5\]]mi 'phrad/_/chos mthun pa na rigs mtha' yas/_/des na de bzhin nyid ces bsngags/_/de nyid med na thams cad du/_/gang de len yod ga la srid/_/de nyid med na rgyun bkag nas/_/ji srid cig na slar ldang ba/_/gang las byung de gang las min/_/gang 
[\[228a.6\]]med de med gnyis med na/_/gang las ldang ste gang mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gang gis 'gags 'gyur na/_/skad cig ji srid de nas ldang /_/des na de nyid kun gyi gzhi/_/lus dang dug sman ji bzhin no/_/'jug pa lnga ni rmi lam 'dra/_/de ltar na 'di gcig 
[\[228a.7\]]pa'am/_/'on te tha dad pa zhig yin/_/gcig dang tha dad ngo bo las/_/grol te dbyibs sam kha dog gam/_/rnyog chu 'o ma'i chu bzhin no/_/de na de nyid de btsan nam/_/gal te de yi gzhi 'di btsan/_/mi g.yo mi 'gyur g.yo dang 'gyur/_/ma 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]byung ba dang de bzhin 'byung /_/nam mkha' 'byung ba ji bzhin no/_/thog ma tha ma dus mi dmigs/_/ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/rang bzhin kun du snang ba'i dbyings/_/ma byung rang bzhin ye nas gsal/_/gzhi 'am de rgyun zhes bya ba/_/shes rgyun 
[\[228b.2\]]thams cad skye 'byung ba'i/_/rtsa ba mthu can gzhir gzhag pa/_/sna tshogs 'byung rgyu de nyid do/_/dang ba'i mkha' la rgyu ba'i sprin/_/gser gyi grangs tsam byung tshun chad/_/khug rlangs sprin phung 'thibs zhes bya/_/'byung ba'i skad cig de sngon cad/_/dang 
[\[228b.3\]]ba'i mkha' nyid snang zhes bya/_/de bzhin de nyid de gzhir gzhag_/mtshungs pa yin phyir der snang ste/_/so so'i bye brag de tsam mo/_/de nyid de yi rgyu ba las/_/'jug pa'i tshogs rnams rtsal du snang /_/rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel 'gyur bas/_/gang dang gang du 
[\[228b.4\]]gang nyon mongs/_/mtshan mar snang 'dzin g.yo 'gul bskyod/_/rang snang gang la de gsal rig_/gang du lta dang gang 'dzin pa'i/_/de rgyun de las der 'di 'byung /_/gang tshor gang shes gang de shes/_/skrag cing dngang 'jigs dngos po nyid/_/me long me shel 
[\[228b.5\]]me 'byung gsum/_/gang dang phrad na de bzhin 'byung /_/me long mtsho rlabs sa rlabs gsum/_/ji srid de rgyun byung tshor rnams/_/de nyid rgyu yis rang bzhin lnga/_me 'dzin de 'dzin 'dab 'dzin ltar/_/de nyid de yis de rgyun la/_/gang zhen de 'dzin byed pa yin/_/
[\[228b.6\]]ras dkar la sogs de dag ni/_/gang sgo'i dbang du de dag 'du'o/_/de nyid de la de rgyun rag_/gang nyid bsgos pa de nyid du'o/_/gangs dreg la sogs de dag ni/_/sogs pas de dag nyid du snang /_/de rgyun 'byung gang de dag ni/_/de yang de dag nyid du'o/_/'o ma chu 
[\[228b.7\]]dang sa bon las/_/de mi 'dra bas de rtas yin/_/de nyid de yi rgyun de las/_/de yang de ltar snang ba yin/_/gnas pa de dag gang yin pa/_/der 'byung ba de nyid du'o/_/myur smin dus smin dus gnyis min/_/sa bon che chung 'phel 'grib de'o/_/sprin dang ling 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]thog mun pa yis/_/rdzas gang mi mthong sgrib pa ltar/_/de yi rgyun 'khrigs mun pa yis/_/blta bya de nyid mthong ma yin/_/dang po gnyis dang phyi ma la/_/gsal dang 'gags dang tha dad snang /_/de nyid kun la 'gro ba'i phyir/_/gcig 
[\[229a.2\]]gis sna tshogs tha dad len/_/de nyid rtsal las 'jug pa drug_/slar 'jug pa yang de nyid las/_/char rgyun smig rgyu ji bzhin no/_/mig nad dbang gis yul dag la/_/tha dad ma yin ngo bo tsam/_/gang dang 'di gcig 'dres pa las/_/sgyu rtsal de 'byed de 
[\[229a.3\]]dag len/_/de nyid las byung de rnams 'byed/_/gang 'dir sbyor zhing mi snang yang /_/gang gi dbang gis tha dad snang /_/de las de 'byung de nyid las/_/de bzhin de dag 'byung ba'o/_/dri nga'i dri 'byung gang gi dri/_/gang med gang la zhen pa ni/_/mi 'dra mi gcig de 
[\[229a.4\]]nyid las/_/de nyid gzhan la de rgyun gzhan/_/gang gi ngo bo de gcig la/_/de yang gnas dang skabs kyis 'gyur/_/gang la bag chags rnam dag pa/_/dang bas thams cad gsal ba bzhin/_/gang gi rgyun sangs kun khyab rgyas/_/dbu ma rnam dag de nyid ces/_/
[\[229a.5\]]mun pa'i spyod yul ba dag 'dzin/_/mun pa'ang de nyid de la 'byung /_/mun pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo dang /_/mtshan nyid yan lag rtsa ba dang /_/gnas dang sgrib pa bye brag chos/_/gang du gang gis gang phyir gang /_/de dag nges par dbye bar bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag 
[\[229a.6\]]po de dag ni gzhi yi mdo zhes bya ste/_gang mun pa'i spyod yul ba las kyi bsgyings pa rnams la dgongs te mun pa'i chos rnams gsungs pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la dmigs pa'i mdo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs khams de 'dzin gnas gcig 
[\[229a.7\]]nyid/_/de 'dzin de nyid de la lta/_/de 'dzin der byed mun pa can/_/phyogs 'dzin phyogs med rnam dang gcig_/ma nges spyir 'gro gnyis mi dmigs/_/sna tshogs med de bdag nyid 'dzin/_/dri med 'dzin med gzhan 'dra med/_/de 'jug rten med khyad par med/_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]dus gsum dus su de 'dzin med/_/de 'dzin de la der 'dzin pas/_/gzugs ming gnyis la chags khams so/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la snang ba'i mdo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod khams de 'jug de 'brang gnas/_/gsum pa yin te de dag ni/_/de nyid 
[\[229b.2\]]'byung rten de ma thag_/'dod pa lnga dang chos gnyis so/_/byed pa kun dang rtag tu gcig_/rigs gsum dag dang phrad rigs 'dzin/_/de 'jug tshol gcod 'bebs pa'o/_/ma 'gags gang du rgyun khyab 'jug_/dus gsum skabs gsum 'jug med pa'o/_/
[\[229b.3\]]sna tshogs de nyid de la 'debs/_/de yang 'jug pa rnam gnyis te/_/lnga dang thun mong de khyad par/_/yul rig pa dang mtshan nyid rig pa dang /_dus rig pa dang /_skad cig ma'i rgyun rig pa dang /_las la 'jug pa dang /_gang gi 'bras bu yongs su myong 
[\[229b.4\]]ba'o/_/drug gnyis lnga gsum bcu gnyis gcig_/thams cad de 'jug byed pa yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de/_/gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/_/dgongs te yul 'di rgya cher bshad/_/dang po rnam rtog bdun 
[\[229b.5\]]rtog pa/_/mtshan ma can dang mtshan ma yin/_/rang gi ngang gis 'jug tshol ba/_/so sor rtog dang nyon mongs can/_/de min rnam par rtog pa'o/_/gnyis pa nye bar sems gsum ste/_/rigs bskyed rigs min gnyi ga min/_/gsum pa rmongs byed 
[\[229b.6\]]dpa' byed rkyen/_/gang 'dir 'byung 'gyur dbang rten 'gyur/_/dbang po 'byung 'gyur rnam shes kyi/_/de dang cha mthun 'byung cha mthun/_/nyam chung ba dang ma goms dang /_/rno dang tshad las 'das pa'o/_/bzhi pa bla 'khyal snying khrin dang /_/gang ma snyoms 
[\[229b.7\]]dang 'jigs skrag dang /_/gnad du gyur dang gzhan gyis brlams/_/lnga pa nad 'jug nyam chung ba/_/ngal dang drags dang 'thibs pa dang /_/gtad dang goms dang gzhan rkyen 'gyur/_/lnga gnyis dang po phyir byung ba/_/rtas dang gang 'dir sangs pa dang /_/gang 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]de blong bas kun dkris zad/_/gza' gtad rkyen gyis de 'joms dang /_/gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gyur ba'o/_/thang gcig 'gags dang de sangs pa/_/de yang der 'jug de nyid do/_/gnyis pa gnyis byed la 'jug pa/_/'di'o snyam du sngon 
[\[230a.2\]]'gro dang /_/bdun pa skyed dang 'bad rtsol sbyor/_/thams cad 'byung ba g.yo bar byed/_/gsum pa chags dang bral byed pa/_/chags pa yul gnas las skyo zhing /_/gzhan gyis bral dang bar gcod dang /_/yang dag yid la byed pas byed/_/bzhi pa 
[\[230a.3\]]chags pas nyams gyur pa/_/rmongs pa'i lta bas brtan par gnas/_/gang 'dir goms pa chung ba dang /_/rnam pa rtags dang mtshan ma dang /_/de byed yid nyams sogs 'gyur bas/_/yang dag blangs te der 'jug dang /_/sgribs dang gzhan gyis zin 
[\[230a.4\]]pa'o/_/lnga pa don rgyun chad byed pa/_/gsal dang log pa'i stobs ldan dang /_/longs spyod mthun pa'i grogs rnyed dang /_/de dag rgyun mi 'chad 'gro dang /_/rgyun du gcod ldog mi byed pa/_/log rgyun gnas byed don rgyun bcad/_/lnga gsum dang po 
[\[230a.5\]]mtshams sbyor ba/_/de las ldog pa'i don rgyun ldan/_/gnyis pa nying mtshams sbyor ba yi/_/'chi ba'i chos la gnyis yod de/_/dus dang dus ma yin de la/_/kha cig dus min 'chi ba yi/_/de rkyen zad dang de gzhan rkyen/_/de tshe yun ring rgyu yod kyang /_/
[\[230a.6\]]yun ring gnas pa'i rkyen ma tshang /_/ya nga ma spangs las kyi rkyen/_/tshad las 'das dang mi 'phrod dang /_/gang ma sangs par gang non dang /_/rnying 'khrigs 'byin par mi byed dang /_/gang de 'gags par rgyun 'gog dang /_/so so'i gnyen po sten mi byed/_/ma 
[\[230a.7\]]goms mthun 'phrod mi shes dang /_/dus min 'gro dang spyod pas nyes/_/de nas 'du shes gsum ldan te/_/don dang log pa btang snyoms ldan/_/don de gang ldan gar 'gro ba/_/sngon du de bsten de dran nas/_/gzhan gyis gsal bar byas kyang ni/_/rags pas 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'byung ba de bar du'o/_/'du shes phra bar rgyu ba'i tshe/_/de las ldog cing btang snyoms ldan/_/de sngon de bsten de 'byung la/_/bsal bar mi nus gzhan dag gis/_/bskul yang dran par yang mi nus/_/de dang gang ldan bde 'gro ste/_/mi bzad drag po'i tshor ba 
[\[230b.2\]]yang /_/nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de yi dus na gang mthong ba/_/gang du ma mthong de nyid mthong /_/ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od rkyen gyis/_/snang ba khad kyis 'byung ba bzhin/_/mun pa'i khams nas snang bar 'gyur/_/rmi lam lta bur gzugs snang ba/_/yid 
[\[230b.3\]]'ong sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur/_/de yi de kun shes pa des/_/gang 'dir smad nas 'dor bar byed/_/drod dang steng du yal bar 'gyur/_/gtsug tor gang 'byung bde ba'o/_/gang du log par de 'gro ba/_/gong las bzlog pa ji bzhin te/_/mi bzad drag 
[\[230b.4\]]po'i tshor bas ni/_/shin tu zug gzer mi bzod de/_/g.yo 'gul mi snyan nga ro gdon/_/'khrul pa'i gang snang mthong ba na/_/byams pa la sogs gang zhig ni/_/gshed ma la sogs mi 'dod pa/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs su/_/mthong bas rdul 
[\[230b.5\]]'byung ba spu gzing /_/yan lag g.yob cing mkha' la rnyob/_/bshang gci 'byung zhing mig kyang ldog_/snang ba'i khams nas mun par byung /_/de yi de kun shes 'byung ltung /_/gang de mthar 'byung mi bde'o/_/btang snyoms de yis ma gsal lam/_/gzhan 
[\[230b.6\]]gyis gsal bar ma byas pa'o/_/gnyis su mi gsal btang snyoms so/_/'di dag gang ldan gang 'gro yang /_/gang ltar goms pa kho nar nges/_/goms pa la gzhol de stobs ldan/_/gang ma goms pa gsal byas kyang /_/ma zhen dbang gis 'gag 
[\[230b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/gang de gnyis la mtshungs goms na/_/der ni dang por gang gsal lam/_/gzhan gyis gsal bar byas pa las/_/log par mi 'gyur gzhan mi 'jug_/btang snyoms kha cig 'gyur ba yin/_/kha cig mi 'gyur rdzogs mi 'byung /_/thams 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]cad kyang ni 'pho ba'i tshe/_/gang 'dir rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i/_/skabs su ma bab bar dag tu/_/yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]dus na goms pa yi/_/gang la gang chags de 'byung ngo /_/de las de yi de dbang gis/_/'dir de med par 'gyur shes nas/_/de 'di nyid 
[\[231a.2\]]la zhe sdang skye/_/gang ma 'ongs la 'jug par 'gyur/_/zhe sdang me yis zil mnan pas/_/gnas pa 'di yi rgyun 'gags te/_/gang ma byung la chags pa de/_/srid pa gsum gyi bar bdun pa/_/mngon par bsgrub pa'i rten yin no/_/de yi dus na rnal 
[\[231a.3\]]'byor pa/_/de bzhin de la goms ched che/_/de tshe chags pa 'byung mod kyi/_/goms par gyur pa'i don stobs kyis/_/chags pa de zil gnon pa ni/_/mi gang rtsal dang ldan pa yis/_/shugs med gang dag gnon bzhin no/_/byang chub rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor 
[\[231a.4\]]la/_/gang chags de 'byung mi 'gyur ro/_/gnad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i/_/gang la mtho dman ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan dag kun la 'byung ba yin/_/shin tu nyen dga' med phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal che chung gnyis kho na/_/gang 'gags gcig dang 
[\[231a.5\]]rim gyis 'gags/_/de nyid goms te gang ma 'gags/_/gtso bas de la der zhen gces/_/gsum pa srid gsum bar bdun pa/_/brdzus skye dbang ldan las kyi 'gro/_/gang mthun mthong yin gang mthong min/_/shin tu bde dang bde sdug bsngal/_/
[\[231a.6\]]de sogs gang du skye 'gyur de'i/_/de dbyibs 'dzin cing thogs pa med/_/de yi lus sam spyod yul ni/_/dri ma can du gyur pa rnams/_/mtshan mo mun nag rdzas nag ltar/_/thams cad thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/_/gang dag dri med pa dag rnams/_/zla 
[\[231a.7\]]'od dkar dang rdzas dkar ltar/_/de gnyis de mig dag pas mthong /_/gang de'i de tshad tha ma pa'i/_/sprul pa 'byung gnas lnga tshad par/_/gang skye gnas ma blangs bar du/_/de mig de yi mig lta bur/_/gang las thogs med skal mnyam pa'o/_/gang 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ltar kun la ma yin no/_/gang skal mnyam pa'i skye gnas dang /_/de dag nyid gnas mthong bar gyur/_/gang dag dri mig thur du gsal/_/spyi tshugs 'gro la gzhan mthong min/_/dri med mthor gsal gzhan de bzhin/_/gang gi thad du de nyid snang /_/gzhan 
[\[231b.2\]]ni gong ma nyid bzhin no/_/bar bdun pa yi snying po can/_/skye ba de ma rnyed bar du/_/ring ltar thogs na bdun pa'o/_/gang de ldan na nges med de/_/gcig gam gnyis sam gsum na 'pho/_/gang ma ldan na de rjes nas/_/yang bdun bar du de na gnas/_/gang 
[\[231b.3\]]yod de gang mi ldan na/_/bdun phrag bdun gyi bar dag tu/_/bdun nyid re na de rje zhing /_/de rdzogs srid du de na gnas/_/des ni gnas pa de zad nas/_/gzhan du gnas pa de 'dzin pa'i/_/gang de ji srid zil gyis gnon/_/bdun nyid bdun rdzogs de phyin 
[\[231b.4\]]cad/_/nges par de med ga la srid/_/gang nub gang snang de skabs na/_/skad cig gnas pas bar ma do/_/bdun zhing nub pa'i rang bzhin pas/_/nub pa'i srid pa zhes kyang bshad/_/bdun pa'i bar du gnas pas na/_/gang de bar bdun pa zhes bya/_/dri yi phyir 
[\[231b.5\]]'brang dri rta bas/_/dri za nyer 'gro zhes kyang bya/_/de la brten nas de byung bas/_/de las byung ba zhes kyang bya/_/skye ba'i dbyibs tshugs de 'dzin pas/_/sngon dang phyi ma'i tshul bzhin can/_/skye ba sngon du byed pas na/_/mngon du grub pa zhes kyang bya/_/rtag tu 
[\[231b.6\]]zas la nye 'khor bas/_/nye bar 'khor ba zhes kyang bya/_/gnyis kyi bar skabs yin pas na/_/srid pa mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya/_/de ni gzugs can yin pas na/_/gzugs med pa yi gnas med do/_/de na gnas pa'i srid pa de/_/sngar 'gags 
[\[231b.7\]]pa yi srid pa la/_/de dang de min btang snyoms pa/_/gsum la chags sdang zhen goms pas/_/gang sngon gang la zhen pa bzhin/_/dus der de la mngon par dga'/_/sngon tshe legs nyes spyad pa'i yul/_/klung du gang gyur de nyid snang /_/de dag rmi lam 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]bzhin mthong nas/_/mthong nyid yul du mngon par gyur/_/de tshe 'khrul pa'i gzugs mthong ltar/_/gang gis snga ltas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bde rkyen mi ldan pa zhig na/_/de na gnas dang de nub na/_/dman par 'byung ba'i snga ltas ni/_/
[\[232a.2\]]srog chags ldem bu la sogs pa'i/_/gang du 'byung ba'i rigs mthun mthong /_/ca co'i sgra dang 'dam bu'i thibs/_/nags tshal thibs po la sogs pa/_/ldum bu'i tshal dang dri sna tshogs/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rdzing dang 'khrigs sprin gyis/_/nang du 'jug pa'i 
[\[232a.3\]]mtshan ma 'byung /_/gang 'dir dag pa ba zhig na/_/rigs mthong gyur pa'i snga ltas ni/_/zhi ba'i yul dang snyan pa'i sgra/_/yid 'ong dbang po tshim pa dang /_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni gzhal med khang /_/skyed mos tshal dang snang yul du/_/'byung ba'i mtshan ma snang 
[\[232a.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur rgyal la sogs pa'i/_/dag pas dag pa de rigs mthong /_/de na gnas pa'i snying po de/_/'dod la zhen pas zhen pa'i phyir/_/gang du dri byung der 'brangs pas/_/nga dang mi nga dri 'byung yul/_/de la zhen pas tshim 'gyur te/_/
