[\[232a.5\]]'khrigs pas de la zhe sdang 'byung /_/des ni bar bdun rgyun 'gags byed/_/de zhen bar du de zad nas/_/des ni de nyid de rtas te/_/gang du rtas pa'i snying po las/_/sogs pa'i lus can tha dad snang /_/drod rkyen rlan rnams de rigs 'dzin/_/de med khams 
[\[232a.6\]]su de mi 'byung /_/de med ma yin mkha' rdul 'dra/_/gang de ldan pa'i yul rnams ni/_/dpag par gang ni ring gyur kyang /_/thogs med mig ris mthong tshor phyin/_/gang gi dbang gis de 'gro bas/_/rig la nyid na phyin pa yin/_/de la de ring tha snyad med/_/
[\[232a.7\]]ci phyir khyab 'jug gdos med de/_/lus can rnams kyi spyod yul min/_/la la gang la zhen pa'i mthus/_/mthun par snang ba'i rigs can dag_/gang du 'phrod byed mthong bar 'gyur/_/de na nyid na der 'khyims nas/_/de la de 'khor rtog dpyod 'dzin/_/zhen 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]pas zhen pa'i rang bzhin ldang /_/gang de'i dbang gis der rmongs nas/_/phyin ci log tu mthong gyur te/_/sgyu ma lta bur 'khrul par snang /_/gang du gang zag de 'du 'phrod/_/byed par de la de snang gsal/_/gal te gnas pa'i cha len na/_/'byung la chags pa'i 
[\[232b.2\]]'dod pa 'byung /_/de las bzlog pa de bzhin te/_/gnas 'gyur gnas dang bral bar 'dod/_/'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin te/_/gang du mi 'phrod de mthong 'gyur/_/de la de bzhin de dbang gis/_/gnas 'byung mtshan ma 'ba' zhig las/_/gang 
[\[232b.3\]]gzhan snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de yis de mthong de 'khyims nas/_/de la de ma rangs ltar 'byung /_/de yis de yi rgyun 'gags nas/_/gang gis gang zin ji bzhin du/_/zhen pas srid pa de 'dzin byed/_/gang de de yi gdos kyis bsrung /_/dman 'gro 
[\[232b.4\]]gang de bar bdun pa/_/gsod la zhen goms de brtsegs pas/_/gang gnas gang yin de gnas na/_/bsad la sogs pa de snang 'gyur/_/gang de de yis mthong ma thag_/sngon du goms pas de rig nas/_/gsad bya snyam du de rgyug byed/_/gsad 
[\[232b.5\]]yul skye ba'i gnas mthong nas/_/gsad la sogs pa'i las brtsams pas/_/de dag 'khyims nas zhe sdang 'byung /_/de yis bar bdun rgyun 'gags nas/_/dman pa'i lus blangs nyon mongs myong /_/de ltar gang du 'byung ba yi/_/gnas ris rnams 
[\[232b.6\]]kyi bar bdun pa/_/gang du 'byung ba'i gnas de na/_/gang zhig goms pa'i yul snang 'gro/_/de la zhe sdang spyod 'khyims pas/_/sdang ba'i dbang gis de rgyun 'gag_/de snang byung ba ma byung len/_/bzhi ba'i skye gnas 'jug chos bzhi/_/shes bzhin 
[\[232b.7\]]'jug gnas 'byung ba dang /_/de bzhin 'jug gnas mi shes 'byung /_/shes 'jug mi shes gnas 'byung dang /_/mi shes bzhin du 'jug gnas 'byung /_/'dzin dang 'dres pa'i nyer gnas pa/_/gnas gsum mthun pas skye 'dzin byed/_/skye gnas 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]sa bon las rnams kyis/_/nyes pa'i bar chad gsum med na/_/mngal du thams cad smin par 'gyur/_/de yang 'byung gnas gcig la gcig_/zhen pa drag po 'byung skabs su/_/mthar 'dzin pa yi bcud 'byung 'gyur/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[233a.2\]]gnyis ka las/_/gang bcud thig le re re dag_/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nyid gang der 'dres 'gyur nas/_/gang drod zhabs bzhin 'du ba yin/_/thams cad pa de der 'jug 'gyur/_/gang la ngo bo med pa de/_/dngos po ci phyir 'dzin par 
[\[233a.3\]]'gyur/_/dper na mkha' 'gro 'dod dbang gis/_/sa khus bris pa'i rnyis 'dzin bzhin/_/gang med chags pa'i rnyis 'dzin to/_/thams cad pa yi dbang des na/_/mi 'drul dngos smin rta ba yin/_/de dag med nur phyogs gang du/_/de zhugs pa nyid snying rten 
[\[233a.4\]]pa'o/_/gnas ma thag pa btang snyoms ldan/_/de mtshams de ni gnyis su 'gyur/_/'du mched drug 'dod skabs dag tu/_/gang gi dus na dngas sla ba/_/shin tu rtas par gyur pa yin/_/de bzhin 'dril dus 'dul ba de/_/'dren pa nas 'jug des rta ba'o/_/
[\[233a.5\]]lnga gang gang 'di 'byung bas bskyed/_/gcig tu gang rten 'byung ba nyid/_/de nyid rten zhugs snying po'o/_/tha ma gnyis la dbang 'byung skye/_/khams bzhin rgyas sra sdud smin 'dzin/_/yan lag rnams 'byed 'byin pa yin/_/gang dang gang gis bzhin mdog 'gyur/_/
[\[233a.6\]]gnas yin bzhin phyogs mthun ltar g.yon/_/'byung nyid snrel zhi phan tshun g.yas/_/gnas na gnas dus brgyad nyid de/_/mer nur ltar mkhrang yan lag 'gyur/_/de la de phyir 'byung ba dang /_/dbang po dang ni mtshan dod pa'o/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus de na/_/
[\[233a.7\]]bdun phrag pa yi rlung byung ste/_/gang gi nad ni skyed par byed/_/'byung ba'i char gtogs rlung 'byung bas/_/g.yo 'gul can du 'gyur ba ste/_/srid 'byung lugs su ji bzhin bzlog_/de dag de na gnas pa'i yun/_/bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad kyis/_/thams cad des 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ni rdzogs pa yin/_/gang gi rtsa drug bzhi rdzogs nas/_/gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin/_/lnga pa 'byung ba'i chos bzhi la/_/gang las rnal 'byor 'byung gnas nyid/_/gang 'di de dag bzhi phrag bzhi/_/bcu drug chos su grags pa la/_/gang skye bdag kun 'dus 
[\[233b.2\]]pa'o/_/'di dag las kyi skye ba ste/_/thams cad thams cad byed pa ni/_/ngang ring mgyogs pa'i las yin zhes/_/mun pa'i spyod yul pa yis mthong /_/las kyis bsgyangs pas bsgribs pa la/_/dgongs de de ltar mdor gsungs pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag 
[\[233b.3\]]ni snang ba'i mdor shes par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang 'jug pa'i mdo gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de 'dod byed pa rnam gsum gnas/_/go 'byed rgyun gcig rgyun gzhan byed/_/so so ris su bcad dbang byed/_/de nyid ldan pa de kho na/_/gang gi ngo bor byung 
[\[233b.4\]]tsam nyid/_/gang yang ma yin de dbu ma/_/kun du mi 'chos rang bzhin blun/_/gsum gsum gnyis dang rkyen gsum dus/_/'dod khams yongs su rdzogs pa yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni mdo bzhi zhes bya ste/_des de yongs su dgrol bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[233b.5\]]lang ka'i bdag po de la rtsa ba gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dngos po'i rtsa ba dang /_brjod pa'i rtsa ba dang /_thams cad pa'i rtsa ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la dngos po'i rtsa ba ni ci yang med pa las cir yang snang ba'o/_/brjod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yang med pa las cir yang 
[\[233b.6\]]'gyur ba'o/_/thams cad pa'i rtsa ba ni gang ci yang med pa las cir yang rig pa nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rtsa ba ste/_/des thams cad nges par 'byin pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 'di lta ste/_chos kyi rgyal pos gang gsungs pa/_/thugs dang zhal 
[\[233b.7\]]dang zhus lan gsum/_/don dang lung dang rgyud ces pa/_/gang 'dir gsum du grags pa la/_/gang dag 'di la rnam rtog pa/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung gcig la/_/rgyud dang lung dang don dam zhes/_/gsum du snang ba 'di ji lta/_/snyam du rtog pa de gang drug_/nyid kyis 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]mkhyen te de gsal bar/_/dgongs te gsum nyid rnam par gsungs/_/gang de skabs dang skabs 'phros pa'o/_/skyes bu'i thugs la gang gnas pa/_/zhal du ma byung don dam nyid/_/gsung gi 'gyur bas de mtshon na/_/skyes bu rgyal po'i 
[\[234a.2\]]bka' lung yin/_/zhus lan phra men 'phel rgyas na/_/skyes bu rgyal po'i bka' rgyud yin/_/thabs che tshegs chung don dpag med/_/bya sla dpag dka' man ngag dam/_/de nyid nges pa de kho na/_/ma bslad ji bzhin bcad pa lung /_/bcas gzhi gtam rgyud 
[\[234a.3\]]las rgyud dang /_/rtog chen yan lag 'brel bcas rgyud/_/gsum du snang la gcig tu zad/_/dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin la/_/rtsal dang rnam par snang ba dag_/gcig ste rnam pa yongs kyis med/_/de skad gsang ba mchog des bshad/_/las 
[\[234a.4\]]kyis bsgyangs pa gang dag la/_/gang 'dir mun pa'i phyogs bshad pa/_/go cha bgos pas shes par gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba gang gi mun pa'i spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu 
[\[234a.5\]]lnga pa'o//_//de nas lang ka'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yang yongs su dri ba dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po rtsa ba gang la gang gi snang ba yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul gang lags/_de skad 
[\[234a.6\]]ces gsol pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po gang yongs su dag pa'i dri ba de ni legs so/_/shin tu rab tu legs so/_/lang ka'i bdag po de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa ste/_yongs su dag pa zhes bya 
[\[234a.7\]]ba'i zhing khams na ngang gis bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i dus na gang dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba dag dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa dag la gang snang ba yongs su dag pa'i spyod yul du dgongs te/_de kho na nyid snang ba de kho bos phyin ci ma log par yongs su bgro bar 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_mun khung gser stor sgron mas rang snang ltar/_/ma rig mun par sems stor rang snang ba/_/dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa'i rtsa ba 'di/_/snga rabs 'das pa'i dgongs pa 'dus nas gsungs/_/chos kun rtsa ba sems 'di 
[\[234b.2\]]nyid la 'dus/_/sems nyid gnas 'gyur ye shes lngar snang ba/_/de nyid don la nges par bzhag pas na/_/sems nyid gnas 'gyur ba yang de nyid yin/_/ye shes lnga nyid de la rdzogs pas na/_/ye shes lnga yang gcig tu 'dus pa yin/_/sems kyi chos 
[\[234b.3\]]nyid ji bzhin de rtogs na/_/ye nas sangs rgyas ma nor ma bcos par/_/bdal khyab sa nyid non pas 'dus par gsungs/_/gnas skabs de na yod med lta mthar thug_/sems kyi de bzhin ji ltar yin pa dang /_/deng rgyun yod med shes par bya/_/de bzhin 
[\[234b.4\]]nyid la gang 'dir ji ltar blta/_/de nyid snang ba yin nam mi snang ba/_/'o na sangs rgyas yin nam sangs rgyas min/_/de las gzhan na sangs rgyas yod dam med/_/'di ltar cir bzhag gros kyis chod par bya/_/'di ltar nges nas de ltar gyur na yang /_/blo 
[\[234b.5\]]bur las lam mi dgag de bzhin spyad/_/des na kun gyi rang bzhin de nyid 'dus/_/de la bsam med dmigs med der bzhag na/_/cir snang cir srid mtshan med de gcig pa/_/skye 'gag med pa'i de nyid ye sangs rgyas/_/de nyid ma yengs pas na ma 
[\[234b.6\]]bsal yang /_/rdzogs pa spyir chib sa nyid ye nas non/_/de nyid nyam drod nyams su gsal na yang /_/chos kun sgo dang mi 'gal bstan pa'i phyir/_/ting 'dzin gsum ldan gol sa'i sgo bkag nas/_/drod chen gsum gyis dam pa'i dgongs pa myong /_/des 
[\[234b.7\]]na ting 'dzin rnam gsum nyams rnyed pas/_/'bras bu pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin rdzogs/_/sems nyid ma bcos nam mkha' ngang la gzhag_/des na dran cing rtog pa ci byung yang /_/de bzhin ma bcos nyid kyis la bcad pas/_/ngang gis ma bcos yang gis 'od 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gsal ba/_/gsang ba 'dus pa rnams kyis yin par bsngags/_/ma yengs skye 'gag med nyid ting 'dzin te/_/rnal 'byor gsum don de yi skabs na rdzogs/_/des na kun gyi bshes nyen dgongs brgyud nas/_/dam pa'i don du sems nyid shes 
[\[235a.2\]]par bya/_/de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas na/_/gang gis 'di mthong de yi zhal mthong yin/_/de mthong phan chad dam pa nyid yin pas/_/des na kun gyi bshes nyen yin par grags/_/de lta'i don mthong gang dang gang zhig gis/_/ci la'ang mi lta de la zhen par bya/_/
[\[235a.3\]]des na byas zin btsal med der nges nas/_/rang 'byung ye shes yongs su dag ces bya/_/des ni zin chags bde sdug ci byung ba/_/tshogs gnyis ma bsags rdzogs par dam bca'o/_/mi rtog ting 'dzin mtshan ma rnam dag pa/_/chos nyid mngon 'gyur che yon rgyun mi 
[\[235a.4\]]'chad/_/sgrib pa gnyis byang tshogs chen rdzogs pas na/_/gang gi phyogs rnams mthun par sa rnams non/_/'di ni kun 'dus dgongs spyod zab mo yin/_/gang dag kun gyi spyod yul ma yin no/_/gang gis gang ltar de yi don mthong ltar/_/gang dag 'khrul 
[\[235a.5\]]pa rnams kyis ma mthong bas/_/gdod nas zhen pa'i mun pa sangs dka'o/_/sa dang sa yi khyad par yod ces pa/_/mthong dang ma mthong gnyis med gsal dus na/_/dam pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis grub nges pa'o/_/stong dang ma skyes rang bzhin khyad par ci/_/
[\[235a.6\]]yod med rtag chad bya btsal la sogs pa/_/kun nas lhun gyis grub par ye gnas pa'o/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu cir snang cir srid kyang /_/chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi rgyan du snang /_/de nyid ma bkag yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshul/_/gong 'og la sogs skyon yon gnyis po 
[\[235a.7\]]dag_/mthong dang ma mthong re rtsol rkyen tsam gyis/_/rgyu 'bras so sor gsal zhes smra ba yang /_/thams cad de bzhin nyid du gcig par zad/_/de la ye nas 'du 'bral med bzhin du/_/mi mnyam mnyam pa'i spyod yul cir snang yang /_/ji bzhin nyid 'di ma yin 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]gang yang med/_/de nyid de la tshogs rdzogs thabs shes 'brel/_/nges na dam pa 'dus pa'i dgongs pa rnams/_/don dam ma bcos sems nyid de la 'dus/_/sems kyi rang bzhin ma byas rang byung bas/_/ting nge 'dzin zhes dmigs pa kun dang bral/_/'di 
[\[235b.2\]]ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems de la/_/bgrod pa'i gnas dang lta ba'i gzugs med pas/_/mtshan ma kun mkhyen skyon yon yang ye med/_/theg chen gnyis rdzogs the tshom kun bcad cing /_/bla med rdzogs pa chen por la bzlas pa'o/_/des na mtha' dbung 
[\[235b.3\]]'byed ba cha phra ba/_/mtha' dbung 'byed pa nyid du kun gcig ste/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i don du kun 'dus gsungs/_/rgyur 'dod las sogs phyi nang yul dag la/_/dga' ba'i mtshan ma tsam du gnas pa dang /_/gang dag spyod pas chos rnams sems su 
[\[235b.4\]]'dus/_/mtha' gnyis ngang gis gsal zhes smra ba yang /_/la bcad mthong bas gud na yod med do/_/gal te yod par 'dod na skyon chen yin/_/des na bsam gtan so so ci snang yang /_/byis pa'i spyod yul 'khrul pa nyid snang yin/_/dam pa dman pa 
[\[235b.5\]]sgyu ma smig rgyu'i tshul/_/rang bzhin skye 'gag med pas nam mkha' bzhin/_/der ni kun 'dus kun la mthong ba med/_/ci yang mi snang ba nyid skyon med 'dod/_/de ni 'khrul pa yin pas btub ma yin/_/mthong dang ma mthong snang la rang bzhin med/_/kun 
[\[235b.6\]]'dus gsang ba'i dgongs spyod zab mo ni/_/rang byung rang rig mngon sum snang dus na/_/rang byung ye shes de nyid mthong zhes bya/_/de ltar dgongs pa dam pa mthong ba'i tshe/_/rtog chags kun sangs mthong yul 'das pa ste/_/bya med snang med mi btsal bzhag 
[\[235b.7\]]pa'o/_/dmigs pa'i yul med chos la ma chags pa spangs/_/mthong tshor bde lam mu med bdal ba'i dbyings/_/gang 'gyur gang snang de las gar ma g.yos/_/de yi gtan tshigs de bzhin nyid kyis gsal/_/de yi don la kun 'dus dpyod mi mdzad/_/
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]chos kun rang 'byung rang rig ye shes snang /_/de don ma skyes ma byung ma skyes te/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur btags pa yang ye med/_/de ltar gang rig de nyid tshogs gnyis rdzogs/_/don la mnyam bzhag blo bcos skyon nyid ni/_/de dang 'gal zhing de dang 
[\[236a.2\]]phrad mi 'gyur/_/de las nges blo khyab par btang ba ni/_/de dang mi 'gal de nyid nges pa ste/_/rang rig dus na de la gnyis su med/_/snying po de nyid rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub/_/de yi dus na don dam nyam drod rdzogs/_/snang dang mi snang rtag chad la sogs pa/_/nyam drod 
[\[236a.3\]]nges pas don gyi gting phol te/_/tha dad phyogs kyi the tshom 'di bcad pa'o/_/de nyid de la zhen nges blo brtan zhing /_/gang dang 'brel pas lta ba'i thag chod na/_/dman pa'i lus la dam pa'i go 'phangs can/_/dbang phyug yin pas de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/g.yo sgyu med 
[\[236a.4\]]pa'i yo byad chen po lngas/_/dbang po'i spyi gtsug nor bu bzhin du lta/_/kun nas 'dus pa'i dgongs pa tshig gsum po/_/yid ches nges pas blo yi gdeng du bya/_/tshig gsum don la nges rnyed mngon du 'gyur/_/nges pa'i don ni rang rig kho nar zad/_/gsang ba'i 
[\[236a.5\]]bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba gtan la nges par phebs par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad 
[\[236a.6\]]kyi rtsa ba gang snang ba dag pa'i spyod yul bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o//_//bam po dgu par zug pa/_de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i 
[\[236a.7\]]bdag po la yang gang gi dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'dir nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bcur bkod pa las rang bzhin ma bcos par bya'o zhes thos na de ji ltar yongs su shes par bya/_rang bzhin ni gang /_gang ltar na ma bcos/_
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]de gang gi rang bzhin lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye dman pa'i grogs po dag gang rang bzhin ni mi 'gyur ba'o/_/ma bcos pa ni rnal ma'o/_/'di dag ni gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin dang /_de la lta ba'i rang 
[\[236b.2\]]bzhin dang /_de las mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin dang /_de ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin no/_/grogs po dag 'di la gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ni 'di lta ste/_nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/_/rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtog_/de bzhin sa yi rang bzhin 
[\[236b.3\]]pas/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no/_/me yi rang bzhin lta bu bas/_/dngos po thams cad med par byed/_/rlung gi rang bzhin lta bu bas/_/g.yo rdul mi g.yo'i rdul kun sel/_/chu yi rang bzhin kho na bas/_/gzhan med de bzhin nyid du 'dus/_/sman 
[\[236b.4\]]gyi rang bzhin yin pas na/_/'khor ba'i gcong rnying rnam par 'byin/_/'di ltar 'tsho ba'i rang bzhin pas/_/'tsho ba dag pa kun gyi gsos/_/gcod pa'i rang bzhin lta bu bas/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod/_/nyi ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/_/mun khang 
[\[236b.5\]]snang ston gsal ba nyid/_/ri rab lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/_/cis kyang bskyod cing g.yo ba med/_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas/_/mi g.yo ba las byin brlabs 'byung /_/de bzhin rtsi yi rang bzhin pas/_/dug la sman 'gyur ji bzhin no/_/de la sogs pa 
[\[236b.6\]]mtha' yas mchog_/rnam par rtog bral thams cad 'byung /_/ma bcos ma bslad de bzhin pa'o/_/grogs po dag de dag ni gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o zhes thos pa rnam par bgros pa'o/_/grogs po dag de la lta ba'i rang bzhin ni gang zhe na/_
[\[236b.7\]]'di lta ste/_ma nor mi 'gyur nges bcad de/_/ma chags mi rtog nyam mi nga /_/dper na nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/_/sprin dang na bun khug rlangs dang /_/zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dag_/snang yang nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/_/de bzhin nyid kyi nam 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]mkha' las/_/mtshan ma'i rnam rtog ci byung yang /_/chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin gnas par/_/rnal 'byor can gyis blta bar bya/_/ji bzhin ma bcos de bzhin la/_/mthong dang ma mthong khyad par gyis/_/lta ba'i khyad par so sor blta/_/rnam 
[\[237a.2\]]par rtog la rnam rtog nyid/_/log sred can la log rtog nyid/_/phyogs 'dzin tsam la tha snyad rdzas/_/phyogs shes dag la sgyu mar snang /_/de nyid der nges nam mkha' mthong /_/nam mkha' bzhin gnas nam mkha' la/_/nam mkha' nyid du snang bar 
[\[237a.3\]]zad/_/grogs po dag de dag ni lta ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/zhes thos pa nges par bgros pa'o/_/grogs po dag de las mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu 'dir/_/thams cad yongs kyis gcig pa la/_/bsrung 
[\[237a.4\]]dang mi srung phyogs dang bral/_/bsrung ba'i tshad gzung ga la yod/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i dam tshig bsrung /_/gang 'dir bsrung mtshams med na bde/_/des ni thams cad bsrungs pa yin/_/ci phyir thams cad thams 
[\[237a.5\]]cad kun/_/dam par nges pa yin pas na/_/tshang 'dzin tshad yod byed nyid nyams/_/gang la bsrung dang mi srung ba'i/_/rnam rtog de dag med kyang bla'i/_/de 'dra bsrung ba'i mtshams 'dzin pa/_/sgyu ma yin pas dam pa yin/_/de la bsrung zhes su zhig zer/_/bsrung 
[\[237a.6\]]dang mi srung tshig med de/_/chos nyid de la blang dor byed/_/dam par gyur pa ga la yin/_/bsrung dang mi srung chos rnams ni/_/srung du med pas de bzhin gzhag_/de bzhin nyid kyi don dam la/_/ji bzhin pa yi blo bzhag ste/_/brjod pa med pa'i dam tshig gis/_/
[\[237a.7\]]bsrung mtshams med pa'i dang du bsdam/_/bsrung med nam mkha'i dam tshig 'di/_/ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la/_/sdom dang tshul khrims so sor snang /_/'jig rten pa la chad mdo btsan/_/byis pa rnams la tshul shes pa/_/nar son pa la sdom par 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]grags/_/bla med mchog la dam par snang /_/gcig gi don las ma g.yos kyang /_/'dul ba'i ngo la so sor grags/_/de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste/_/de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur/_/gcig bsrungs pas na kun bsrungs pa'i/_/dam pa'i dam tshig 
[\[237b.2\]]chen po 'di/_/kun dang 'gal bar mi bya zhing /_/gang gi don du 'gyur bar bya/_/grogs po dag de dag ni mi 'da' ba'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o zhes thos pa yongs su bgros pa'o/_/kye grogs po dag de ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[237b.3\]]lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi/_/mtha' gsum yongs su dag rdzogs na/_/dam pa'i spyod pa yin pas na/_/dman min dam pa'i rigs shes bshad/_/rdo rje lus kyi spyod pa ni/_/phyin pa med las lus mi bcos/_/gcig pu nyid pas gcig tu gnas/_/
[\[237b.4\]]glang po'i lta stangs ji bzhin dang /_/de bzhin rnal mas gnas par bya/_/gang du gnas pas rtag par gnas/_/gnas pa de la chags mi bya/_/spyod lam rnam bzhir gar ldan pa/_/ma bcos rnal mar gnas par bya/_/gang gis gdung ba mi nyen pa'i/_/gnod 
[\[237b.5\]]pa skyob pa dag tsam las/_/bzang dang rgyan phyir bcos mi bya/_/gang du ji ltar bde ldan sbyar/_/rdo rje sngags kyi spyod yul ni/_/bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/mchod rten dag gi las mi bya/_/glegs bam bklag par mi bya zhing /_/gzugs brnyan brtsam 
[\[237b.6\]]pa'i las mi bya/_/lag gi phyag rgya mi bcing zhing /_/ngag gi bzlas pa de la sgrib/_/rnal 'byor lus kyi phyag mi bya/_/rnyed dang bkur sti blta ma yin/_/khe phyir ma yin grags phyir min/_/ci phyir phyi rol g.yeng ba dang /_/shin tu g.yeng ba yin pa'i phyir/_/
[\[237b.7\]]de la nye ba ma yin pas/_/lus 'di rnal mas gnas par bya'o/_/rnal 'byor nges pa'i bsam gtan pas/_/rdo rje sngags kyi kha zas ni/_/lus zungs 'dzin pa'i rten tsam du/_/gar ldan 'byor ldan ma gtogs pa/_/zas phyir ched du bsgrub mi bya/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]mtshag dang nyam phyir ga la yin/_/ma bcos rnal ma ji bzhin bza'i/_/'tsho ba'i ched du bcos mi bya/_/chags dang ma chags spang blang med/_/blang bar bya ba ma yin zhing /_/slong mos 'tsho bar yong mi bya/_/ci'i phyir de ni mi 'gyur phyir/_/
[\[238a.2\]]'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa'o/_/mtshams med pa las mtshams gcod pa/_/'di ni rnal 'byor can gyi las/_/shes bya nang gi chos nyid la/_/rnal 'byor don du 'jug pa na/_/phyi yi 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba yis/_/bar du gcod pa bsal ba'i phyir/_/phyi dang 
[\[238a.3\]]nang gi so mtshams su/_/'gro 'ong 'drul rnams gcad par bya/_/gang la gnas gzhi rten med pas/_/gnas bder lus bcos kha na med/_/zhen pas spyod lam bcos byed pa/_/des ni lus bcos bslad pa yin/_/bsam gtan lus dben bcos mi 
[\[238a.4\]]bya/_/de la de dben ma bcos pa/_/de nyid ye nas dben pa'i gnas/_/'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gi yul/_/ri phug gzhal med bcos mi bya/_/de nyid dpag med ma bcos pa'i/_/'di ni ye nas rmad 'byung gzhal/_/byed pa med par rang byung ba'o/_/rdo rje 
[\[238a.5\]]ngag gi spyod yul yang /_/dam pa'i ched du snyan smra las/_/gzhan du kha gsag ga zha min/_/brjod pa thams cad nges pa nyid/_/gsong por smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin bya/_/thams cad kun du smra ma yin/_/gang brjod don dang 
[\[238a.6\]]'brel bar bya/_/skabs dang dgos ched ma gtogs pa/_/rnam par 'chal bar bya ba min/_/kun la dpes mtshon thog tu dbab/_/thams cad tshad pas tshad mar bya/_/ma bcos ngang gi rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje ngag gi spyod par bshad/_/rdo rje yid kyi spyod 
[\[238a.7\]]yul ni/_/ma bcos ma g.yos bsam dang bral/_/mi g.yeng ma rmugs gsal zhing gnas/_/'dod la ma chags sgro skur bral/_/blang med dor med chags sdang med/_/'chab bcom med de rnyed 'byor min/_/phyogs bral mu med yongs su dag_/go bgos lam 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]nyid drang por song /_/dug 'gyur sman bsrel mtshon char ldan/_/rdo rje rdzong la zhen pa dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu blo gros ldan/_/gang du mi 'gyur gang mi 'gyur/_/dbyings 'dir kun dang gcig pa dang /_/gang gi blo la mngon pa'i phyir/_/yongs su mdzes dang bag 
[\[238b.2\]]yod dang /_/de nyid dbang las khrel yod dang /_/de la nga'am nga med pas/_/kun la yongs su ldan pa dang /_/thams cad bde bas nges pa dang /_/gang 'di stong bas cir mi rtog_/de nyid zhi bas 'khrug med dang /_/gang nas ci yang mi 'byung bas/_/gzhan du tshol 
[\[238b.3\]]ba med pa dang /_/zang zing med pa tshul mi 'chos/_/gdung ba med pas 'dod pa med/_/ma chags 'byung bas chog par 'dzin/_/gang la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pas/_/gtsang sme med cing dus gsum med/_/de bzhin dam pa yod ma yin/_/sems nyid nam 
[\[238b.4\]]mkha'i snying po de/_/glo bur sprin gyis gtibs spungs pas/_/shes rab rlung gis ma gtor bar/_/ga zha mkhan gyi spyod 'dra yis/_/sgrib bsal chos nyid gsal 'dod pas/_/ji ltar chus gsher byas pa dag_/nyi ma sprin ltar grib ma yis/_/shin tu bsgribs 
[\[238b.5\]]par gyur pa na/_byis pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pas/_/sprin chen 'dus pa'i phung po la/_/kha yi dbugs kyis bus byas nas/_/sprin bsal nyi 'od gsal 'dod 'dra'o/_/grogs po dag de dag ni de ltar spyod pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/zhes thos pa phyin ci ma 
[\[238b.6\]]log par sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i 
[\[238b.7\]]bdag po la dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po ljon shing bskyed par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar gsungs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de gang gi ljon shing lags zhes dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye grogs po 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]dag shing ni byang chub kyi ljon shing ste/_bla na med pa'i 'bras bur smin pas gang mtha' dag gi gsos su 'gyur ba'i phyir ljon shing de bskyed par bya'o/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_de nyid rdo rje snying po las/_/gang gi zug rngu kun byang der/_/ma lus 
[\[239a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs pa la/_/gang gi dgongs pa nges 'grel pa/_/sbyor ba'i skabs su bshad pa dag_/de nyid rnam par 'gro bar bya/_/de la dgongs 'grel sbyor skabs bcu/_/'dun pa skyed dang rtsol ba sbyor/_/bslab par 'jug dang 'du shes 'gyur/_/sbyor nas ro tshor 
[\[239a.3\]]yul la 'jug_/rtogs chen gdeng 'gyur las su rung /_/rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems skabs bcu/_/snying po de dag rgyun bcas phyir/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i skabs bcu yis/_/rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i khyad par la/_/bcu drug rgyun gyis nges par rdzogs/_/de bzhin 
[\[239a.4\]]ye shes thams cad la/_/rnam pa bcu yi khyad par gyis/_/dang po nas bzung rdzogs bar du/_/sbyar ba gang de sgrib pa nub par 'gyur/_/gang zag gis gang mthong der na/_/rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung /_/de nyid de nub gang zhe na/_/g.yo dang smon dang ldang ba 
[\[239a.5\]]dang /_/sbyor ba 'jug dag mi 'gyur ba/_/rig dang gnas dang rdzogs pa'o/_/gang gi gzugs brnyan gang snang ba/_/dngos med rang snang mthun pa'i dpe/_/phra mo tha mal chen po yi/_/skar ma zla tshes gnyis pa dang /_/gsum dang bzhi dang lnga pa dang /_/brgyad dang 
[\[239a.6\]]bcu drug lta bur snang /_/'dun pa skye ba'i skabs dag la/_/g.yo ba lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/_/mun pa'i sprin rum lta bu yi/_/gzer 'phro skar ma rab rib snang /_/rtsol ba sbyor ba'i skabs dag la/_/smon pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/_/shin tu skar ma phal pa 
[\[239a.7\]]dag_/gang la rab rib lta bu'o/_/bslab pa 'jug pa'i skabs dag la/_/ldang ba byang chub sems 'byung ste/_/ji ltar me yi gzer chen dang /_/skar chen lta bu rab rib snang /_/'du shes 'gyur ba'i skabs dag la/_/sbyor ba lhag pa'i sems skye ste/_/ji ltar mgal me'i 'khor 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]lo dang /_/gcig pa'i zla tshes lta bur snang /_/sbyor chen 'jug pa'i skabs dag la/_/'jug pa lhag pa'i sems skye ste/_/ji ltar sgron me lta bu dang /_/zla tshes gnyis pa lta bur snang /_/ro myong ba yi skabs dag la/_/dga' ba lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/_/snod 
[\[239b.2\]]kyi sgron ma lta bu'am/_/gsum pa lta bur de snang ngo /_/yul la 'jug pa'i skabs dag la/_/mi 'gyur lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/_/thob dang bstan la nye ba yin/_/bzhi pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang /_/rtog chen dag gi skabs dag la/_/rig pa lhag pa'i 
[\[239b.3\]]sems 'byung ste/_/rtags chen dang po nye bar bsnyen/_/lnga pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang /_/gdeng du gyur pa'i skabs dag la/_/gnas pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/_/shin tu brtan pa'i sgron ma dang /_/brgyad pa lta bu'i rang bzhin snang /_/rtags thob nyid na 
[\[239b.4\]]'grub ces bya/_/las su rung ba'i skabs dag la/_/rdzogs pa lhag pa'i sems 'byung ste/_/gnyen po med pa'i sgron ma dang /_/cha la rdzogs pa lta bur snang /_/brtan par nges pas grub pa yin/_/sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la/_/rtog pas bsgribs 
[\[239b.5\]]pas de ma shes/_/byang chub sems kyi ljon shing las/_/bla med 'bras bu smin pa yin/_/des na grogs po dam pa dag_/dam pa rnams kyi byang chub sems/_/kun du rgyun dang bcas pa ste/_/rgyun med chad pa dam pa min/_/rgyun nyid kyis ni nges 
[\[239b.6\]]smin pa/_/gang du smin pa'i skyed shing de/_/byang chub dam pa ljon pa'i shing /_/'bras bu dam pa smin nges pa'o/_/grogs po dag de dag ni ljon shing dam pa bskyed pa'i dgongs pa nges par bgros pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo 
[\[239b.7\]]chen po las de kho na nyid gsang ba'i dam pa ljon shing bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]po dam pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de dam pa rnams kyi rjes su ji ltar 'jug par bgyi/_de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de skad ces yongs su dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_
[\[240a.2\]]kye grogs po dag de ni 'di ltar dam pa rnams kyi rjes ni gang nges par shes pa'i lam dam pa la bya'o/_/grogs po dag lam dam pa gang zhe na/_de ltar de kho bos mthong thos pa'i skabs gcig na bshes gnyen dam pa nyid kyis nges par gsungs pa ngo bo nyid 
[\[240a.3\]]kyi sku gnyen po med pas rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang ldan te/_rtag pa nyid dang chad pa nyid dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa nyid dang /_dmigs pa dang /_'dod chags pa nyid dang /_zhe sdang ba nyid dang /_gti mug pa nyid dang /_nga rgyal ba nyid dang /_phrag dog pa nyid 
[\[240a.4\]]dang /_'dod pa lnga dang /_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub mo dang /_tshig 'khyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba nyid do/_/mtshams 
[\[240a.5\]]med pa lnga dang /_de dang nye ba lnga dang /_lci ba bzhi dang /_log pa brgyad dang /_sme sha dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_khrag dang /_khu ba la sogs pa dag la nges par spyod pa ni dam pa rnams kyi lam dam pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes nges pa dam par gsungs 
[\[240a.6\]]pa las/_kho bos de la 'di skad du/_e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smra rnams kyi/_/yang dag tshad ma'i gsung dag las/_/phyin ci log kun 'byung ci lags/_/de skad zhu ba 'dun pa las/_/bshes gnyen dam pas bka' stsal pa/_
[\[240a.7\]]phyin ci log la zhen pa rnams/_/thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang bas/_/nges pa'i don la gzud pa'i phyir/_/khrid pa'i thabs su bstan pa yin/_/log zhen gang la nges brtan yang /_/'jug par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur rnams/_/log spyod thabs kyis de drangs na/_/
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/slu ba'i thabs kyis gzung ba'i phyir/_/so so mos pa sna tshogs kyis/_/lta spyod rnams dang mthun 'jug tu/_/sbyar nas bsten 'brid thabs su gsungs/_/dper na log spyod byis pa rnams/_/pha mas sdigs bred thabs 
[\[240b.2\]]kyis ni/_/bya ba'i las la gzud pa ltar/_/brtse bas don la 'dren pa'o/_/de yang ji ltar la la zhig_/chu bo pha mthar 'gro 'dod pa/_/gru ba dag la brten pas 'gro/_/mthar son pas na 'bor ba bzhin/_/thabs sam theg pa'i bye brag rnams/_/brten 
[\[240b.3\]]pas drang ba'i thabs yin yang /_/don gyi nges pa rnyed ma thag_/chu bo rgal ba'i gru bzhin 'dor/_/des na de bzhin nyid shes na/_/thams cad thams cad gang yang rung /_/dam pa'i lam du nges pas na/_/lam gyi nang na nye lam yin/_/de skad ces gsungs nas cang 
[\[240b.4\]]mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/kye grogs po dag de bas na dam pa rnams kyi rjes lam dam pa 'dir zhugs na thams cad nas thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shes pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_
[\[240b.5\]]'khor ba yongs su shes par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su shes par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang cho 'phrul chen po nyi shu thob par 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongs su shes par 
[\[240b.6\]]bya'o/_/rtog pa'i ri bo brgyad cu gzhil bar 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongs su shes par bya'o/_/ltung ba'i sgo dgu chad par 'dod pas kyang lam dam pa 'di yongs su shes par bya'o/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/_/thams cad thams cad 
[\[240b.7\]]yongs rdzogs pa'i/_/shes par 'dod pa gang dag gis/_/dam pa'i lam 'di shes par bya/_/sems nyid dam pa'i lam nyid de/_/mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin/_/nyam nga log med dam pa'i lam/_/'di ltar nges pa'i lam 'di yang /_/kun gyis shes 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_/tshig gi lam gyis nyer mtshon te/_/brjod med tshig gi yul bral ba/_/de yi rang bzhin de nyid na/_/rang bzhin ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/de la ming med ming btags rgyus/_/mthong dang ma mthong tha dad 'gyur/_/de las 
[\[241a.2\]]spyod pa'i gzhir gyur te/_/brjod pas de nyid mthong bya'i phyir/_/tshig gi lam ni rnam grangs las/_/tshig lam sgo mo dpag med 'gyur/_/de las dam pa'i rjes bcad pa/_/gang gi thugs las byung ba'i lung /_/sgron mas nye bar gter btsal ba/_/nye lam 
[\[241a.3\]]byang chub dam pa ni/_/gang byung rjes su de 'brangs na/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor bar 'gyur/_/gang 'byung g.yo ba gang bkag pa/_/rgyun gyi 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gang 'byung med pa'i blun po pa/_/mur 'dzin mun pa'i lam du 'gyur/_/'di zhes 
[\[241a.4\]]gcig tu gang bzung ba/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin/_/snga phyi med ces mu bcad na/_/de med chad pa'i mu can yin/_/ma bcos nyid la yud tsam zhig_/cir g.yos skye 'gag 'byung ba de/_/de las gang 'byung gang 'phel ba/_/rnam grangs lam de 'phel 
[\[241a.5\]]'gyur gyi/_/dam pa'i lam nyid rnyed ma yin/_/dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag_/grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol/_/gang las byung ba de nyid kyis/_/btsal yang 'grib 'phel dag mi rnyed/_/de nyid ye nas de bzhin du/_/gang 'dir sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis/_/
[\[241a.6\]]sha thang bar ni lam tshol ba/_/don med bdud kyi las yin no/_/de la tshig tu gang brjod pa/_/nam mkha' dag la rtsod pa 'dra/_/tshig tu sman dang dpyad bshad kyang /_/nad pa'i tshogs la mi sman no/_/de nyid de bzhin ma gyur na/_/tshig lam de brjod de ma 
[\[241a.7\]]yin/_/gang 'dir gang spangs gang tshol ba/_/gzugs spangs nas ni grib tshol 'dra/_/sems nyid dam pa'i lam nyid pas/_/ma rig ye shes tha dad min/_/mi rtog pa ni lam 'dir gcig_/sems nyid sna tshogs bar snang bas/_/sna tshogs lam 'dir 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gcig pa yin/_/dper na gser gyi rgyu gcig las/_/dbyibs dang gzugs ni tha dad par/_/byas pas de dag ming re grags/_/gang grags gser gyi ngo bor gcig_/de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin la/_/mthong dang ma mthong khyad par gyis/_/gang ltar bltas dgu de 
[\[241b.2\]]ltar snang /_/snang yang de las gzhan mi dmigs/_/sgron ma 'bar ba'i rin chen ni/_/ji ltar ngan khung sbas gyur yang /_/de yi rang bzhin rang snang bas/_/'od ni mkha' la gsal bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin sems nyid rin chen sgron/_/lus ngan 'dam du bying gyur 
[\[241b.3\]]yang /_/rang byung rang zhi rang snang bas/_/ma bcos rang bzhin yongs kyis gsal/_/sems 'di nam mkha' ji bzhin te/_/kun khyab stong gsal sna tshogs 'byung /_/byung tshor g.yo 'gog thams cad kyang /_/rang bzhin gyis 'byung ngang gis zhi/_/mdor na ji ltar 
[\[241b.4\]]brtags bsams bzhin/_/'gyur bas thams cad ngo bo snang /_/ma bcos g.yo ba med nyid las/_/sna tshogs rgyu 'byung mi skyon zhing /_/cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med/_/ji bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/_/blo bzhag ma yengs kho nar zad/_/de ni tshegs 
[\[241b.5\]]med don po che/_/de nyid dus gsum thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin/_/de yi don la ji snyed gnas/_/mthong bas de nyid der goms na/_/lam rnyed lam mthong nyam drod ni/_/don gyis nges par 'byung ba yang /_/gang ma yin la zin 'byung ba/_/
[\[241b.6\]]byang chub dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la/_/nges pa'i blo gros 'byung ba yin/_/chos kun 'di ltar yin pa la/_/de ltar ma mthong ngo mtshar che/_/de mthong de yang ngo mtshar che/_/e ma'o ci ga snyam du 'byung /_/de nyid ma mthong gang 
[\[241b.7\]]su dag_/rtsol grub dka' ba'i tshegs chen gyis/_/dam pa'i lam tshol lam re ring /_/de yi don 'byung de yod kyang /_/lam de rnyed par yang mi 'gyur/_/dam pa rnams kyi lam rnyed pa/_/dam pa nyid las dam pa yin/_/de ni rten brnyan mtshungs ma yin/_/zhi 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]lus mthar 'gog gnyis mtshungs min/_/slob pa'i sa dang de mi mtshungs/_/rnal 'byor sems pa rtog mtha' dang /_/gang mtshungs de 'dra de mi mtshungs/_/des na rnam dag lam chen ni/_/sems kyi gsang 'di yin pas na/_/dgongs pa kun 
[\[242a.2\]]las 'dus pa yi/_/gsang ba'i lam 'di shes byas pas/_/btsal ba'i bya ba rgyu med de/_/lam 'di mthong ba de nyid kyis/_/dka' ba rtsol ba gang med par/_/thams cad thams cad grub pa yin/_/sems kyi gsang ba gar gnas pa/_/de ni dben pa dam 
[\[242a.3\]]pa ste/_/dgon pa chen po mchog nyid du/_/dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa gsungs/_/de nyid dpag med gzhal yas mchog_/rmad 'byung nor bu yid bzhin khang /_/ma byas rang byung phyi nang med/_/kun du nang du gyur pa yin/_/gang 'dir gang 'dus tshogs ma 
[\[242a.4\]]yin/_/de la de nyid tshogs 'dus mchog_/chos kun bsdus pas 'byung ba med/_/dpag med rgyal ba dgyes pa'i mchog_/gang 'dir 'dod spyod yo byad yin/_/de nyid yo byad chen po ste/_/lhag pa'i yo byad 'di shes na/_/yo byad kun gyi rtsa ba yin/_/sgom par 
[\[242a.5\]]byed pa bsgom pa min/_/bsam bya dmigs su med pa ste/_/dam pa'i gsang lam 'di shes na/_/bsgom lam dam pa 'di nyid do/_/bsrung zhes bsrung bar bya mi dmigs/_/stong nyid med 'byung gsang lam 'di/_/dbus mthar che bas tshig shes na/_/bsrung 
[\[242a.6\]]ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o/_/tshig lam mnyam brjod mnyam mi dmigs/_/gsang 'di thams cad gcig pa la/_/mnyam zhes lhag par ga la yod/_/dgongs pa kun nas 'dus dang mnyam/_/gang gzhan brtul zhugs spyod pa yin/_/de la de gzhol rol spyod pas/_/
[\[242a.7\]]thams cad 'dir brtul 'dir zhugs pas/_/brtul zhugs mchog tu kun 'dus gsungs/_/lam 'di dngos nyid sems kyi gsang /_/ye grub zin pas gsol thob med/_/dngos grub rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes/_/dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus gsungs/_/de ltar 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]sems kyi gsang mthong na/_/sngon ma mthong ba'i lam mthong bas/_/mthong ba ci yang med pa nyid/_/gang la snang ba lam mthong yin/_/grogs po dag de dag ni dam pa rnams kyi rjes lam dam pa zhes bya ba 'di skad thos pa yongs su bgros pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[242b.2\]]kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor rjes 'jug gi le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag la sogs pa grogs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la yongs su dri ba dris pa/_kye gsang 
[\[242b.3\]]ba pa'i bdag po 'dir rin po che 'bar ba'i sgron ma bsrel bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de skad ces dri ba yongs su dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye grogs po dag rin po che 'bar ba ni 'od 
[\[242b.4\]]kyi 'byung gnas lags te/_/'thor rlung tshogs kyis kyang mi sod pas mun pa sel bar byed pa kho na bas sgron me zhes bya'o/_/de ni 'di ltar mi shes pa sel ba'i shes pa nyid yin te/_nyi ma'i snying po'am rin po che'i sgron ma la mun pa'i gzhi med pa bzhin gang 
[\[242b.5\]]shes pa'i rang bzhin la mi shes pa'i gzhi med do/_/de yang 'di ltar sgron ma dam pa nub par gyur pa na kun gyi de nyid gcig kho na la khyad par gyi rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/_mun pa'i shes pa dang /_ya mtshan can gyi shes pa dang /_byis pa 
[\[242b.6\]]rnams kyi shes pa dang /_phyogs su rigs pa'i shes pa dang /_mtha' dbus 'byed pa'i shes pa dang /_dam pa nyid kyi shes pa'o/_/kye grogs po dag gang mun pa'i shes pa ni gang 'di las log par shes pa'o/_/log sred can gyi shes pa ni tha dad smra zhing 
[\[242b.7\]]gnyis su 'dod pa'o/_/byis pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/_gang med par smra zhing thams cad yod par 'dod pa'o/_/de yang 'di ltar rdul nas dpag tshad skad cig ma/_/bskal pa skar ma nyi zla dang /_/ri bo khor yug lus can lus/_/sems dang tshe la longs spyod tshad/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dus gnas 'jig nub mtshan nyid las/_/tha dad bye brag thams cad du/_/bshig nas med smra yod ces 'dod/_/mos pa chung bas de las min/_/gang 'dir rnal 'byor phyogs rig pa/_/'di kun gang 'dir kho na bas/_/dngos med rnam shes nyid 
[\[243a.2\]]du snang /_/de nyid ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/yod pas chos sku rtag par 'dod/_/nges par 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/gang dag sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du/_/snang bas kun rdzob bya ba byed/_/nges par dbye ba med pa'o/_/la la de ltar de nges te/_/de las ma gtogs de 
[\[243a.3\]]'ong min/_/de nyid des ni dngos med phyir/_/dam pa nyid du med pa'o/_/la la gang ma zin pa'i phyir/_/de snang ba ni gang na'ang rung /_/phra rab sa ni rnam kun mkhyen/_/slu 'drid pa ltar yod ma yin/_/dam pa nyid kyi dam pa gang /_/chos nyid ye nas sangs rgyas la/_/
[\[243a.4\]]de min lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir/_/ye nas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa/_/tha snyad tsam du brjod par zad/_/ye nas brjod pa tshig gi lam/_/tha snyad gnyis dang bral ba la/_/sgro skur tshig gi snyad mi gdags/_/brjod pa'i tha snyad tshig lam 'das/_/nam mkha' 'di ni 
[\[243a.5\]]yod med ces/_/blun po rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa rnams ni de lta min/_/gang de rtsod la ngo mtshar che/_/de bzhin nyid 'di yod med ces/_/byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur/_/skyes bu gang dag de lta min/_/rtsod pa shes rab 'chal par zad/_/'di 
[\[243a.6\]]ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad/_/ye 'am ngang gis sangs rgyas la/_/min las yin par 'gyur ma yin/_/ngo bo nyid kyi de nyid la/_/yin dang min zhes ci byar yod/_/nam mkha' 'di ni med do zhes/_/mi shes gang gis rtog par byed/_/gang shes ye nas yang mi 
[\[243a.7\]]rtog_/min par mi rtog tshig mi brjod/_/rgyu dang las dang rnam grangs la/_/mtshan nyid nges pa ngo bo dang /_/'bras bu dgos ched re re 'byung /_/'di ltar 'dir ni gang gi rgyu/_/rang 'byung de nyid rtog dpyod bcas/_/gang dag gang la skye mched pa/_/gnyis po 'di 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]dag nyid kyi rgyu/_/gang las gang min ji snyed pa/_/khyad par bye brag tha dad pa/_/nges 'byed 'jug 'brel sbyor bcas pa/_/de 'dzin phyin ci ma log pa/_/mngon 'byin don 'dod 'brel pa'o/_/rnam grangs rnam gnyis don bzhin no/_/kun la nges par 
[\[243b.2\]]byed pa yin/_/de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pa/_/dngos med mi rtog yongs su rdzogs/_/so so tha dad bsam mi khyab/_/ma 'dres de ltar ji bzhin byed/_/gang 'dir phyin ci ma log par/_/yongs su chub pa phul nyid do/_/kun nas ma rmongs thams cad 
[\[243b.3\]]gsal/_/gang la ma 'gags thogs pa med/_/kun 'jug gang ma rig pa gcod/_/skye mched kun du gyur pa nyid/_/gang mched gang gi rlung zhugs pa/_/mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'o/_/gang la log pa de nyid dag_/de nyid phul du phyin pa'i phyir/_/
[\[243b.4\]]dmigs bu gsal ba'i sgron ma yis/_/de nyid de la blta bar bya/_/sgron ma'i snang ba mi shes pa/_/mthong bya kun la mun pas bsgribs/_/nams kyang snang bar mi 'gyur te/_/long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro/_/sgron ma 'bar ba gang srel ba/_/kun la mun 
[\[243b.5\]]pas sangs gsal ba'i/_/ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/sgron ma dmigs bus mthong bar 'gyur/_/de ltar dam pa'i grogs po dag_/rin chen sgron ma 'bar ba'i me/_/mun snang dmigs bur ma bsrel bar/_/de nyid gser mthong ga la rigs/_/grogs 
[\[243b.6\]]po dag de dag ni sgron ma dam pa bsrel bar bya'o zhes dgongs pa dam pa legs par bgros par shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor mig gi sgron ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[243b.7\]]yang lang ka'i mnga' bdag la sogs pa dman pa dam pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dri ba yongs su dris pa/_/kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyad par du bla mar 'gro bar bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de skad 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ces gsol pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye grogs po dag khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba de ni legs so/_/shin tu rab tu legs so/_/sa de ni 'di ltar sa mkhan dam pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor gyis yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba'i sgron ma 
[\[244a.2\]]legs par bkod pa ni 'di lta ste/_sa dang sa yi khyad par ni/_/gang 'dir yongs kyis med pa la/_/shes bya gcod pa'i khyad par gyis/_/rang rig mtho dman rim par zad/_/dper na rgyal po'i dkor mdzod nas/_/che chung thabs 'dod gang su dag_/
[\[244a.3\]]dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis/_/spyod sgo 'jug pa'i las thabs las/_/mtho dman rtsal gyis gang len pa/_/rgyal po gcig la spyod na yang /_/rin chen sna 'ga' khyad par dag_/thabs chen sgo dgu so sor spyod/_/rgyal por gyur na de nor kun/_/dbang 
[\[244a.4\]]bskur byed pa'i bdag po yin/_/mi gnas ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/shes bya de las med pa la/_/gang 'di rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/so so'i 'jug sgo kun nas spyod/_/de yi de nyid de gcig la/_/rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis/_/sa yi go 
[\[244a.5\]]'phang khyad par du/_/rig pa de ltar snang ba yin/_/gang 'dir thams cad gcig pa la/_/de mthong mi mthun de dbang gis/_/dper na 'byung gnas sgo [{]mangs [,]mang [}]bzhin/_/sa dang rnam thar so so'i sgo/_/gcig la sna tshogs de ltar snang /_/sa dang rnam thar gang 
[\[244a.6\]]dag la/_/'jug pa la sogs sa sbyangs kyang /_/kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bcad pas/_/gcig ste tha dad yongs kyis med/_/de ni ri dang lhun po dang /_/kun du rgyu dang gzhon nu ltar/_/mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni/_/don gyis de ltar yod pa yin/_/des na chos rnams 
[\[244a.7\]]thams cad kyi/_/gnas pa'i sa nyid sems yin pas/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe mtshon te/_/kun gyi sa 'dir shes par bya/_/'di ltar gang shes rnal 'byor pa/_/lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa yi/_/lam stor lam btsal lam rnyed pas/_/nye lam bder rnyed 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]grub pa'o/_/gang rnyed de rnyed der gnas pa/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa pa ste/_/sa kun gcig tu yongs rdzogs la/_/rig pa mchog 'bring tha ma'i phyir/_/gcig pa'ang khyad par bcur snang ba/_/gang gi ched du bgrang bar bya/_/'di dag gnas 'dzin spyod 
[\[244b.2\]]pa'i sa/_/rnam pa bcu phrag gcig gis rdzogs/_/'gyur dbang ma nges sa 'di la/_/bcos ma phra men spyod pa dang /_/tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang /_/legs par 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lnga/_/'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yi/_/kun du 'khor zhing ma 
[\[244b.3\]]nges pa'o/_/'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/gnas shing sbyong ba'i sa zhes bya/_/brten pas gzhi yi sa 'di la/_/dang po las can rnal 'byor pa/_/bslab pa spyod dang nges pa la/_/dag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o/_/bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor pa/_/gnas 
[\[244b.4\]]shing sbyong ba'i sa zhes bya/_/gal chen spyod pa'i sa 'di la/_/rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor nyid/_/gnas shing sbyong ba'i sa yin te/_/yang mi nga yi sa rnams kun/_/gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis/_/legs nyes stobs chen 'gyed pa'o/_/
[\[244b.5\]]bslab pa rgyun gyi sa 'di la/_/g.yo dang thob dang brtan pa'i drod/_/de bzhin rtags chen g.yo ba dang /_/thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi/_/rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po dag_/bslab pa'i mtha' bcu mthar phyin cing /_/ji ltar zla ba yar gsal bzhin/_/bslab 
[\[244b.6\]]pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te/_/don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye/_/sbyong sems 'jug pa'i sems dpa' des/_/ngan 'gror mi ldog dgon par 'jug_/bar chad dag kyang de la 'byung /_/gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang /_/spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang /_/
[\[244b.7\]]mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor gsum/_/gnas shing sbyong ba'i sa zhes bya/_/bsod nams gter gyi sa 'di la/_/spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor nyid/_/mos pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas/_/rtsal chen blo yi bsti gnas sa/_/bslab pa'i mtha' bcu spyir chib ba'o/_/
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]brten pas khyad par 'gro 'di la/_/dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs che/_/nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyor/_/yul la 'jug dang rig pa sbyor/_/bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste/_/bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras 
[\[245a.2\]]mtha' bcu la/_/goms par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor/_/ngal bso ba las thams cad mthong /_/mi ldog sa la goms byar med/_/'di dag sbyor ba'i gzhi gcig kyang /_/so so thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/sgrib pa las zhes rtsi byed cing /_/ye shes re re 'char 
[\[245a.3\]]pa'o/_/des na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig la/_/mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams/_/gang der bden pa re re la/_/rtsal 'byung re re 'char ba ste/_/tha ma rang 'byung nyid kyis rdzogs/_/mthar phyin pa dang thob pa dang /_/mi ldog rnams la rim pa bzhin/_/
[\[245a.4\]]rmi lam dang ni sgra brnyan dang /_/mngon sum nges pa ci rigs par/_/rnal 'byor rdo rje lung ston pa/_/rdo rje rdo rje rnal 'byor pa/_/zhes byar nyid dang sa khams dang /_/zhing khams kun du bsgrags byas nas/_/rnal 'byor dam par 'byin pa'o/_/dmigs pa'i 
[\[245a.5\]]'bras bu skye 'di la/_/grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/_rdzogs par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gsum/_/rgyal ba'i thugs lam rgyal skyes shing /_/rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshob pa/_/khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing /_/gang la ting 'dzin sbyor ba'o/_/
[\[245a.6\]]gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la/_/rmad 'byung rol pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_/tshogs chen 'dus dang rtsal chen rdzogs/_/gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste/_/phyag rgya chen po sgyu ma yin/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po/_/mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug sa/_/
[\[245a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs spyod pa'o/_/bdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la/_/rol pa rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang /_/bde ba chen dang thig ler rdzogs/_/gsum nyid du ni snang ba la/_/yul don ye shes des sbyar na/_/shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs/_/sgyu ma'i 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]sgyu ma yin spyod pa'o/_/rdzogs pa spyir 'chib sa 'di la/_/bcu pa tha ma dang po las/_/mthar rdzogs kun gyi rtog yin te/_/klong yangs nam mkha'i snying po la/_/sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis bdal/_/ci snang ci yang ma yin pa/_/mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo la/_/ji ltar 
[\[245b.2\]]bltas dgu der snang ba/_/bdal khyab mi rgya rlabs kyis bcad/_/de yang dam pa'i khyad par gyis/_/bdag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang /_/lhun gyis grub dang klong yangs chub/_/gsum rdzogs rang 'byung bdal ba'o/_/'di dag rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa/_/khyad par 
[\[245b.3\]]gang la khyad par snang /_/gang khyad med la de khyad med/_/rtsal 'phang mtho dman rnal 'byor pas/_/mtho dman go 'phang sa bgrod bya/_/gang 'dir dri ba'i mchog snang ba/_/dam par gyur pa'i lang ka'i bdag_/gang 'dir rnal 'byor kun sbyor ba/_/nges pa'i 
[\[245b.4\]]sa bcu rtsa ba 'dir/_/gang gi rtsa ba yan lag las/_/bcu gnyis bdun gnyis rdzogs pa'o/_/des na sa yi khyad par las/_/rgya che ba dang grangs mang yang /_/rnal 'byor sa 'di sbyar bar bya'o/_/sa dang sa yi 'byung gnas pa/_/kun gzhi kun gyis chen te/_/
[\[245b.5\]]gang gi sa chen 'di non na/_/sa rnams skad cig tsam bgrod pa'o/_/grogs po dag de dag ni khyad par bla mar 'gro bar bya'o/_/zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 
[\[245b.6\]]'byor sa'i sgron ma bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po yul la 'jug par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar 
[\[245b.7\]]dgongs pa ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de skad ces yongs su dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos yongs su smras pa/_kye grogs po dag yul ni 'di ltar gang gi zhing yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa rnams kyis gang du dgongs pa'i yul de kho na nyid dang /_/
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]gang la 'byung ba'i yul mtha' yas pa'i 'khor ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o/_/de ni dper na btso blag mkhan dag gis/_/ras sbyangs gang du bya ba 'jen pa ltar/_/gang 'dir las kyi dang po las/_/gang de sbyar ba rab tu gces/_/de skad ces smras pas/_
[\[246a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lang ka'i bdag po des 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang thams cad nas thams cad du ye nas sangs rgyas pas nad gdod sangs rgyas par byar med phan cad dgongs pa'i yul la sbyor ba dang /_snying rje'i 
[\[246a.3\]]yul du gyur pa gang yang med lags na/_'dir snying rje'i yul du gyur pa gang lags/_su zhig snying rje'i yul du gyur de skad ces smras pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye lang ka'i bdag po de de ltar kun kyang ye sangs rgyas phan chad de kho na nyid pas snying 
[\[246a.4\]]rje'i yul dang dgongs pa'i yul gang yang med na yang gang ji ltar yang chos nyid las mi 'da' ba'i tshul gyis gang dang yang 'gal zhing 'gal bar mi bya'o/_/nang gi don nyid byed pa ni dam tshig chen po yin la/_ye nas sangs rgyas pas don byar med pa ni snying rje 
[\[246a.5\]]chen po yin no/_/dgongs pa dam pa la 'jug mi dgos par shes pa ni dgongs pa dam pa'i yul de kho na nyid la zhugs pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_dgongs pa dam par gang bzhugs pa/_/zab pa bas kyang ches zab pas/_/de nyid 
[\[246a.6\]]gting nas thag gcad phyir/_/gsang ba'i yul bzhi skye bo dang /_/lhan cig ci la'ang mi brnal lo/_/de yang yongs su rdzogs pa gang /_/bya bas bya ba med na yang /_/de yi rang bzhin phan gzhan pa/_/yin pas gang 'dir phan par bya/_/gang gi don dang 'gal 
[\[246a.7\]]'gyur ba/_/de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag_/rus sbal mgo la 'ongs pa ltar/_/mu mtha' med pas bshug par bya/_/ci phyir kun du rnal 'byor pas/_/rnal 'byor dam pa nyid las min/_/gal te gang gi dbang gis na/_/dam pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur te/_/de dang 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]mi mthun nyen chen 'byung /_/gal te de la de 'byung na/_/mgon btsun de la de las med/_/de gang ma zin 'ban thag chad/_/gang gi don du gang 'gyur na/_/phra mo'i phra mo phra yan chad/_/thams cad thams cad ji lta bar/_/nan tan gyis ni dga' nas bya/_/slong 
[\[246b.2\]]mo pa dang slong la dga'/_/slong la 'tsho ba'i tshe spyod rnams/_/sde dang tshan dang grar byas te/_/snying rje khud pa'i zhing du bya/_/sman dang 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang /_/bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag_/btags sam phye mar byas nas kyang /_/klung ngam chu gang mtsho chen 
[\[246b.3\]]du/_/dor te chags med sbyin par bya/_/gang gi rten du khas blangs te/_/nad gso gang slob spyod sgom gra/_/btsugs te bsti gnas mchog bya zhing /_/dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod sbyin bya/_/gang la dam pa'i lung byung ba/_/gsung gi mchod rten kun rten te/_/brjod 
[\[246b.4\]]dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis/_/rgya che yangs pa'i lam rnams bya/_/gang gi dam pa 'phel 'gyur ba/_/'di ltar nges pa'i dam pa dag_/smra'am sbyin nam bstan nam khrid/_/de yi ye shes tshad med 'gyur/_/goms dang goms par byed pa yis/_/gang de 
[\[246b.5\]]dag par bya ba'i phyir/_/bsam yul bya ba mang po la/_/de nyid yul gyi rtsal rnams sbyang /_/dam pa'i 'khor lo rab bskor te/_/rgyud sbyang lhag pa'i shes rab blta/_/sho gam srang dang sho gam lam/_/mi bde'i gnod pa kun bsal te/_/tshad med 
[\[246b.6\]]snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor/_/sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad/_/chu 'am sa 'am nam mkha' 'am/_/me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la/_/sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams/_/brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lor bya/_/mtshams med zlog par byed pa 
[\[246b.7\]]yi/_/lus sems rgyud la rdul rlags te/_/'phags pa'i sprin tshogs pho brang du/_/rdul snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags/_/rgyal mnyes las kyi shing bsregs pa/_/thabs chen sbyor ba'i lam chen las/_/rnam bzhi me yi las mchog bya/_/
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]des ni mtshams med bzlog pa yin/_/snying rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dag_/gang ltar goms ltar nan tan bya/_/de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dag_/don du mi 'gyur kun spangs te/_/nan tan tshogs kyis dpung chen bskyed/_/'di ltar las kyi ldang 
[\[247a.2\]]sogs pa/_/gzhan du spyod pa ma yin te/_/rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor pa/_/rgyud sbyong don ldan bya phyir dang /_/gal te rtsal zhan ma ldan na/_/dge bsags stang chen kun bsdongs te/_/gang 'dir bsags pa'i don bgrangs shing /_/gdung ba'i shugs phyung 
[\[247a.3\]]rtsal sprugs na/_/nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar/_/rang bzhin shugs kyis 'byung bar gces/_/de phyir chung ngu yan chad kyang /_/dam pa'i don du 'gyur bar bya/_/gang 'dir zin dang ma zin pa'i/_/dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs kun/_/de bzhin nyid du blo bzhag na/_/
[\[247a.4\]]snying rje chen po de nyid do/_/lang ka'i bdag po de ltar na/_/yul gang med pa'i tshul gyis ni/_/'jug pa med las gang 'jug pa/_/yul la 'jug pa dam pa'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams gang gi 
[\[247a.5\]]rgyun du yul la 'jug pa'i nges pa dam pa rnyed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las yul dam pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i sems dpa' de 
[\[247a.6\]]dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la mtshon pa'i dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po me long brtag par bya'o zhes dam bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi/_de skad ces dris pa pas/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye 
[\[247a.7\]]grogs po dag gang la gang gis mtshon pas shes par 'gyur ba'i me long ni 'di ltar/_snang dang brtags dang 'byung ba dang /_/mi chags 'byung snang dag pa dang /_/gnas 'byung mthun pa rnam pa bcu/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla dang /_/rmi lam sgra brnyan mig yor dang /_/
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]mgal me dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/sprul pa gzugs brnyan me long bcu/_/mthun pa'i dmigs bcu mtshon par gzhag_/dngos po med kyang dngos por snang /_/dngos por snang du btub pa'i dpe/_/ji ltar sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ni/_/skyes bu gang gi rtsol ba dang /_/sman 
[\[247b.2\]]dang sngags kyi sbyor ba las/_/dbang po yid 'phrog cir yang snang /_/de la 'gro 'ong dngos po med/_/'di ltar gsang ba'i rang bzhin yang /_/med rgyu 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las/_/ji ltar snang 'byung rang bzhin med/_/gang 'dir smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni/_/'jig 'byung 
[\[247b.3\]]g.yo ba'i dus dag la/_/de dang de yi rang bzhin las/_/byis pa gdungs pa'i 'du shes kyis/_/chu yi 'du shes nyer gzhag kyang /_/tshim pa'i rgyu der ga la 'gyur/_/de bzhin de yi khyad par yang /_/kun nas rang bzhin stong pa la/_/tha snyad mtshan ma ming du 
[\[247b.4\]]btags/_/de nyid stong pas de mi dmigs/_/gang 'dir chu yi zla ba ni/_/sgrib med mkha' la zla shar ba/_/gzugs brnyan dang ba'i chu na snang /_/de la brtags pa'i dngos po med/_/de bzhin gang yang bkod med par/_/de nyid mkha' las gang gsal ba/_/gang 
[\[247b.5\]]'dir snang ba de nyid de/_/de nyid dngos med 'dzin rtog bral/_/ji ltar rmi lam rang bzhin ni/_/gang zhig gnyid kyis non pa na/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang /_/lo la sogs pa ji snyed du/_/bde sdug sna tshogs myong bar snang /_/de sangs ci yang mi 
[\[247b.6\]]dmigs ltar/_/stong nyid cir yang med pa la/_/spyod pa'i khyad par cir spyad kyang /_/spyod la ma chags ji bzhin pas/_/brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral/_/sgra brnyan 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni/_/rang gi gnas la sgras rkyen pas/_/de bzhin de ltar sgra brnyan 
[\[247b.7\]]'byung /_/de nyid ci yang med 'byung yin/_/gsang sngags gsang ba'i byin brlabs dag_/gang gi ched du med 'byung ba/_/ci yang med la ci yang 'byung /_/med rgyu btags chags bltas par snang /_/gang 'dir mig yor rang bzhin ni/_/mig nad can la rdzas snang ba/_/
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]'khrul pa'i ngo la snang bar zad/_/ji ltar snang ba gang yang med/_/spros bral rang bzhin stong nyid las/_/cho 'phrul rnam pa ci snang ba/_/cho 'phrul nyid du snang bar zad/_/snang ba de dag gang yang med/_/chu dang nam mkha' dang ba las/_/chu bur sprin tshogs 
[\[248a.2\]]tha dad 'byung /_/rang 'byung rang zhi'i rang bzhin pas/_/chu nyid nam mkha' nyid du dag_/snang dang mi snang ji snyed pa/_/thams cad thams cad de nyid las/_/rang 'byung rang gi ji bzhin par/_/dag pa nyid du nges pa'o/_/dri za'i gnas de nges med pa/_/de yi gzugs ni gar byung 
[\[248a.3\]]bar/_/grong khyer de yang de bzhin 'byung /_/'byung ba nyid na der mi brtag_/ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid/_/gnas pa gnas pa gar gnas par/_/de nyid gzhal med khang chen snang /_/snang ba de ltar gnas ma yin/_/ji ltar sprul pa'i rang bzhin ni/_/med 'byung 
[\[248a.4\]]gcig las du mar 'byung /_/gang 'byung 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang /_/snang ba'i 'byung rgyun 'chad ma yin/_/mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las/_/ji lta ba ltar de 'byung ba/_/gang 'dir 'byung ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/de la zad med 'phel ba med/_/gang 'dir gzugs 
[\[248a.5\]]brnyan gang snang ba/_/bzhin dang bzhin 'byung dang ba las/_/brten nas de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'byung /_/de nyid de gnyis tha dad min/_/gang 'dir rgyu 'bras so so bas/_/rgyu nyid 'bras bu de nyid rgyu/_/de bas de la de gnyis med/_/de bzhin nyid do de kho na'o/_/des na ji 
[\[248a.6\]]snyed pa yi chos/_/ji bzhin nyid du gcig pas na/_/gang ltar ci snang ci byung yang /_/mi g.yo ba las 'byung snang med/_/zab mo gsang ba dam pa 'di/_/mkha' la rtog 'dra gting dpag dka'o/_/rnal 'byor mi ldan gang rtog pa/_/brtags pas rtogs par mi 'gyur 
[\[248a.7\]]ro/_/dper na nyi ma'i snying po ni/_/mig gi dbang pos rab brtags na/_/snying po de gang mi rtogs kyi/_/'od 'bar zil gyis mig rdzil 'gyur/_/de bzhin byis pa blo zhan pas/_/snying po don la cir brtags kyang /_/gsang ba'i snying po mi mthong gi/_/blo zhan byis pa ga 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]chad rgyal/_/des na gsang ba dam pa 'di/_/mtshon pas shes par mi nus kyang /_/gang la rmongs pa'i tshogs mtshon phyir/_/rnal 'byor can la phyogs tsam mo/_/bsam du med pa'i chos nyid 'di/_/bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag_/mi brtag gzhag 
[\[248b.2\]]pa'i chos 'di gang /_/byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan/_/brjod pas mtshon pa las 'das pas/_/'di zhes bstan du ga la yod/_/med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi rnyed/_/mi dmigs chos la tshig lam med/_/chos kun nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' 
[\[248b.3\]]la yang mtshan nyid med/_/nam mkha'i dbus mtha' mi dmigs bzhin/_/chos kun mtha' dbus mu dang bral/_/nam mkha' gang ming rjod byed pa/_/brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste/_/de yi tha snyad ming brjod kyang /_/nam mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur/_/'di la mi 
[\[248b.4\]]rtog gang brjod pa/_/brjod pa de nyid rnam rtog ste/_/rnam rtog rnam rtog ci brjod kyang /_/de la gnyis med 'gag mi 'gyur/_/gang 'dir gnyis su 'dod pa dang /_/dbus mtha' 'byed pa thams cad gol/_/mnyam zhes bya ba'i tha snyad kyang /_/gnyis dang dbus 
[\[248b.5\]]mtha' rnam 'byed las/_/kye ma 'di gcig chos kyi spun/_/thams cad de las med bzhin du/_/gnyis 'di phan chad rnam rtog yin/_/kun kyang nges pa 'di ltar zhog_/grogs po dag de dag ni me long brtag par bya'o zhes dgongs pa dam pa nges par bgros par 
[\[248b.6\]]shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams yang dag par nges par 'jog par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las nye bar mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug 
[\[248b.7\]]cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gang du 'dir mdo bcu bkod pa'i dgu pa dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po cha mthun par sbyar bar bya'o zhes dam 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bca' bar dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_de skad ces dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su shes par bya ste/_mun pa chen po mun 'khrigs pa'i/_/byis pa'i khams 
[\[249a.2\]]kyi grong khyer du/_/rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor mor 'dir/_/nges par 'jug pa'i bya ba dag_/dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus pas/_/gang gi spyod yul gang gyur pa/_/ji ltar gsungs pa ji snyed pa/_/'dir ni gsum du shes par bya/_/cha mthun mthun 'jug thabs 
[\[249a.3\]]'dzud pa/_/sbyor dang spyod pa bsre ba yis/_/thams cad thams cad ci rigs par/_/dam pa'i don du nges par sbyor/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/_/cha mthun sbyor ba gang 'jug pa/_/gang zhig gang du der nges la/_/de dag nyid dang mthun par spyad/_/yongs kyis 
[\[249a.4\]]de dang mthun bstan na/_/de nyid de la 'gyur bar bya/_/de dag dam par bya ba'i phyir/_/de dag mthun pas gang sbyar bas/_/yid kun drangs te bcug cing bya/_/gang gi yid 'phrog 'dren 'jug pa/_/ji ltar yid 'ong de kho na/_/nan tan gyis ni de nyid do/_/dper na 
[\[249a.5\]]mun pa'i khams dag na/_/gang gis gang dag gang gyur pa/_/de yi yid la de zhugs te/_/de dang de gcig mi gzhan pas/_/de nas de yi de rig nas/_/de yi dbang sgyur thabs thob ste/_/de nyid sgyur ba'i tshig lam 'byung /_/de 'das dam pa kho na yi/_/yid la zhugs 
[\[249a.6\]]pas e ma'o 'khrul/_/'dir nyes 'dir log ldang sogs bsngo/_/de nang 'di ni kho nas byas/_/gang 'dir dam par 'jug 'di la/_/dam pa kho nar 'jug par 'os/_/des na de yi de nyid de/_/'on pas gang gi de nyid kyang /_/'on cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug_/lang 
[\[249a.7\]]ka'i bdag po ji ltar na/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/kho bos mthong thos skad cig na/_/bdag gi bshes gnyen dam pa des/_/'dus pa phal mo che dag la/_/lam 'di rgya cher bstan pa'i tshe/_/'khor der 'dus par gyur pa yi/_/lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/_/bu mo drug 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]gi 'khor 'dus pas/_/dga' bas glu bro gar gyis bstan/_/dgyes pa chen po'i gnyis pas bstabs/_/de tshe dam pa'i yul min yang /_/dam pa gsang ba mchog nyid kyis/_/de nyid spyod mthun dgrol ba yis/_/yul gyi dam pa nyid du dgongs/_/gang des sras kyi 
[\[249b.2\]]tshogs 'dus la/_/kye ma 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/_/nga yi gdung rgyud rigs byung gang /_/lha yi rol mo glu bro gar/_/snyan dang 'jo sgeg mdzes pa'i stabs/_/gang gi yid 'phrog 'jug 'dren thabs/_/glu yi yan lag sum brgya dang /_/stabs dang gar thabs mi 
[\[249b.3\]]zad pas/_/kun sdud kun mnyes cha mthun sbyor/_/dam pa de yis de gsungs pa/_/de nas sras kyi de kho na/_/blo gros thabs ldan nyid kyis 'dir/_/gang dag gang 'dul rig nas ni/_/'jig rten drug dang mthun sbyor phyir/_/gang gi gnas nas mthun g.yos te/_/
[\[249b.4\]]gar mchog glog ltar 'gyur ba yi/_/dpal ldan lag pa bye ba yis/_/nam mkha'i khams 'di yongs bkang nas/_/gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed cing /_/glu yi yan lag sum brgya'i sgra/_/srid gsum 'brug sgras gang ba ltar/_/mtha' thug med pa'i 
[\[249b.5\]]'jig rten drug_/gang bas yid 'phrog 'dren par byed/_/theg chen rmad 'byung gsang ba'i tshig_/tshig gcig bsgyur bas tshig mtha' yas/_/tshig lam rab tu bral ba'i don/_/zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ston/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/_/rmad 'byung 
[\[249b.6\]]rol pa'i don 'byung ngo /_/cha mthun sbyor ba'i khyad par las/_/'jig rten drug tu rol pa 'byung /_/'khor ba'i lam rgyud gcad pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten drug gi snying po la/_/thugs rje thabs kyi 'od 'phros pas/_/rgyud drug dngos po thams cad bsregs/_/spyod lam 
[\[249b.7\]]ma chags ye shes kyis/_/cha mthun thabs su sbyar ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten byis pa'i spyod pa bzhin/_/'jig rten bu mo drug dang rol/_/stabs drug bskyod pas 'gro drug bsgral/_/glu drug blangs pas yul drug drangs/_/tshig drug bsgrags pas don drug rdzogs/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]le lo g.yeng ba'i sa gzhi la/_/brtson 'grus myur ba cang shes stabs/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi snyan pa'i glu/_/don grub rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig_/nga rgyal ri bo'i sa gzhi la/_/dpa' bo tsham ngam gyad kyi stabs/_/sil snyan 'bum gyis snyan pa'i glu/_/zhi 
[\[250a.2\]]gnas mi rtog nam mkha'i tshig_/kun nas 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la/_/khyu mchog lnga yis rol pa'i stabs/_/glu gar yid 'phrog snyan pa'i glu/_/'dzin pa'i rtod phur 'byin pa'i tshig_/gti mug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la/_/seng ge rngam pas rol pa'i stabs/_/ka la 
[\[250a.3\]]ping ga'i dbyangs snyan glu/_ye nas don gyis gsal ba'i tshig_/chags pa 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la/_/rdo rje khyung chen ldings pa'i stabs/_/'brug chen 'dir bas snyan pa'i glu/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba'i tshig_/zhe sdang 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la/_/khro bo ma rungs khros pa'i stabs/_/srin 
[\[250a.4\]]mo ma rungs khros pa'i glu/_/rdo rje bu yug skar mda'i tshig_/rmad 'byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/_/ye shes 'bar ba'i me 'byung bas/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i bud shing bsregs/_/srid gsum 'khor ba'i khrag mtsho bskams/_/nga rgyal ri bo rmang nas bshig_/zhe sdang 
[\[250a.5\]]'bar ba'i me dbal gsad/_/gti mug mun pa gtan nas bcom/_/'khor ba 'dus pa'i 'dam rdzab bskams/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni/_/gang gi cha dang mthun sbyar bas/_/dam pa'i don la sbyar ba yis/_/byis pa 'drid pa'i rol pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 
[\[250a.6\]]gzhan yang gang /_/thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i brtul zhugs ni/_/'jig rten log sred ji lta bar/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa'i khyad par spyod/_/wa dang cang shes gyi ling dang /_/shin tu glang chen myos 'dra ba/_/dpa' brtul za byed gtum rngam 'khrug_/mkha' lding khyung 
[\[250a.7\]]chen gang mi lta/_/gtum thung sdong chen 'jigs 'dril ba/_/gang thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser/_/mun ltar lkugs pa'i blo tshul ldan/_/lhun po mi 'gyur brtan pa che/_/mkha' ltar yangs dog kun dang bral/_/gnam lcags lce yi drag shul can/_/drag 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]shul chen po brtul zhugs bdag_/khu 'phrig lta bu zan can blo/_/nges pa'i nga rgyal glang chen brtun/_/zla med seng ge gcig brjod pa/_/reg 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs pa/_/sgyu ma sgyu ma'i tshul 'drid pa/_/gang la rtogs med kun spyod nyid/_/thogs med za 
[\[250b.2\]]byed myur spyod za byed kha/_/yud ltar myur 'gyogs glog ltar 'gyur/_/gang gi gang bsrung nam mkha' lding /_/sa thub bag len rgyal 'khor skyod/_/rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni/_/bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan/_/gang 'dir nyams su len byed 
[\[250b.3\]]pa/_/rnal 'byor gsang ba'i thabs mchog ste/_/gang la 'dzud pas bsre ba yi/_/tshul khrims thams cad gcig spyod pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /_/mthun pas 'jug par spyod pa ni/_/de nyid de ltar de bzhin te/_/gang dang 'dra tshul gang yin 
[\[250b.4\]]pa'o/_/'dod chags pho mor gyur pa la/_/pho mor 'dod las pho mor snang ba gang yin la/_/pho mo med las pho mo snang ba mthun 'jug spyod/_/'dod la chags pas khro 'gyur la/_/khro bar 'dod las khro bar snang ba gang yin la/_/khro ba med las khro bar snang ba 
[\[250b.5\]]mthun 'jug spyod/_/'dod la chags pas mun snang la/_/mun par 'dod las mun par gyur pa gang yin la/_/mun pa med las mun par snang ba mthun 'jug spyod/_/ji ltar gang ltar de bzhin du/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas par/_/thams cad thams cad der 
[\[250b.6\]]snang ba/_/mthun 'jug spyod pas don byed yin/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni mthun par 'jug par bya'o zhes de skad ces smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtha' thug pa med pa'i lta spyod la yongs su rtog pa med par gyur 
[\[250b.7\]]to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sgyu ma rol pas rnam par rol pas rnam par grol ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang lang ka'i bdag pos gsang ba pa'i bdag po la dri ba yongs su dris pa/_kye gsang 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ba pa'i bdag po nad gso bar bya'o zhes dam bca' dgongs pa de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/_/de skad ces yongs su dris pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_lang ka'i bdag po 'di ltar grong khyer gsum gyi nad pa gso bar 
[\[251a.2\]]bya'o/_/nad kyi gzhi rtsal mkhas par bya'o/_/nad sbyang ba'i thabs la brtson par bya'o/_/sman pa dam pa rnams bsten par bya'o/_/gnyen po dam pa'i sman bsrel zhing spel bar bya'o/_/sman sbyar ba la mkhas par bya'o/_/sman gyi lam bsrung bar bya'o/_/nad 
[\[251a.3\]]pa'i tshogs dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/_/nad kyi rgyun gcad par bya'o/_/nad kyi gnyen por 'gyur bar bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la grong khyer gsum ni mi snang ba'i grong khyer dang /_kun snang ba'i grong khyer dang /_phyed snang ba'i grong khyer ro/_/nad kyi gzhi rtsa 
[\[251a.4\]]ni mun pa chen po las byung ba'i zug rngu'o/_/nad sbyang ba'i thabs ni sman dang sman par sbyor ba'o/_/sman pa dam pa ni bshes gnyen dam pa'o/_/gnyen po dam pa'i sman ni zhi gnas lhag mthong ngo /_/sman sbyar ba ni de dag de nyid du sbyor ba'o/_/sman gyi 
[\[251a.5\]]lam gsung ba ni de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba'o/_/nad pa'i tshogs dang mi 'bral ba ni 'khor ba la mi skyo ba'o/_/nad kyi rgyun gcad par bya ba ni thams cad de nyid du nges pa'o/_/nad kyi gnyen por gyur pa ni 'khor ba yongs su sgrol ba'o/_/lang ka'i bdag 
[\[251a.6\]]po de yang gang /_/kho bos mthong thos skabs shig na/_/kun gyi bshes gnyen dam pa des/_dur khrod bdag po btul ba'i tshe/_/'jig rten gtso bo kun 'dus nas/_/sras kyi tshogs su bkod pa yi/_/'dus pa phal mo che dag las/_/'khor der 'dus 
[\[251a.7\]]par gyur pa yi/_/zhar las gyur pa'i log sde pa/_/sman gyi brtul zhugs cher spyod pa/_/drang srong nag po ka la yis/_/gang der 'dun nas don gsol pa/_/che mchog sman gyi rgyal po khyod/_/dug 'joms sman gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin/_/nad do cog gi 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]dgrar gyur pas/_/zug rngu'i nad rnams zhi bar mdzod/_/de skad zhu ba 'dun pa las/_/che mchog sman gyi rgyal po des/_/drang srong de la rjes dgongs nas/_/sngon 'dus gsungs pa gang gsungs pa/_/khams gsum za ma tog nang du/_/srid gsum sems can dug 
[\[251b.2\]]chen rnams/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsi sbyar bas/_/rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/de skad nges par gsungs pa las/_/nag po ka las don gsol pa/_/rang bzhin snang ba'i lus 'di las/_/yo byad chen po lnga byung ba/_/dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste/_/
[\[251b.3\]]drang srong rnams kyi sman gyi mchog_/de skad nges par 'dun pa las/_/sman pa dam pas 'di skad gsungs/_/rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa ste/_/rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman/_/rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos/_/ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas/_/rgyud lnga'i 
[\[251b.4\]]sems can kun sgrol phyir/_/dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi mchog_/de skad ces gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas ka la nag pos yang gsol pa/_/rang las byung bas gzhan byung min/_/dngas snyigs kho nar zad pas dag_/rtsa ba brgyad dang 
[\[251b.5\]]yan lag stong /_/nyis sbyar lnga dag rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de skad zhu ba 'dun pa las/_/'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i sras/_/blo gros thabs ldan khyod nyid kyis/_/zhen pa 'grol ba'i thabs 'di smras/_/zag pa phyi ma rdzas lnga po/_/'byung ba dang ni zas khams 
[\[251b.6\]]kyi/_/rgyun gyi rgyu las byung bas na/_/rang las ma byung gzhan 'byung yin/_/grogs po dam pas de smras pas/_/ka la nag pos yang smras pa/_/ji ltar gal te de ltar na/_/'gal ba nyid du yin zin na/_/rang 'byung rang 'byung zhes bya ba'i/_/chos de gang nas rnyed par 
[\[251b.7\]]'gyur/_/de skad dri ba dris pa las/_/dam pa nyid kyis des blan pa/_/rgyu dang rkyen las ma brten par/_/gang zhig 'byung ba'i chos yod na/_/gzhan las ma byung byed med pas/_/chos de rang 'byung nyid du 'dod/_/de skad smras pas de lan du/_/ka la nag pos 'di skad 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]du/_/spangs pas spong bar mi 'gyur te/_/bdag las rgyun du 'byung ba'i chos/_/gzhan las ma byung rgyu 'bras med/_/chos de gang yin rang 'byung yin/_/de la de yis 'di skad du/_/mi spang dang du blang ba'i chos/_/dus dang rnam pa thams cad du/_/
[\[252a.2\]]'du 'bral med par gnas 'os na/_/'byung rgyun 'gags na de rgyun 'gag_/de la 'di ltar 'di skad du/_/nag po ka las slar blan pa/_/bdud rtsi yin pas rang gnyer gyi/_/las rnams so sor byed par nus/_/'jig rten dag na phan 'dogs pa/_/gang nus de la rtsi 
[\[252a.3\]]zhes grags/_/de la 'dir ni 'di skad du/_grogs mchog dam pas de lon pa/_/bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa las/_/bdud rtsi'i las ni gnyis yod de/_/nad gso shi ba slong byed na/_/de gnyis mthu dang yang mi ldan/_/de smras lan du 'di skad du/_/ka la nag pos de 
[\[252a.4\]]blan pa/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba grangs med kyis/_/brtul zhugs 'di lnga gtsor spyad na/_/dam tshig dam par bzung bas na/_/sngon gyi dam tshig yin par grags/_/de la dam pas 'di skad du/_/sangs rgyas dam tshig yin nges na/_/dang po nas bzung rdzogs par du/_/
[\[252a.5\]]de dang mi 'bral ldan dgos na/_/zag rgyun chad na 'bral 'gyur 'gal/_/de la ka las 'di skad du/_/bdag de rtag par 'gyur ba yis/_/zag pa de yang rtag pa ste/_/kun nas kun du mi 'bral zhing /_/zad nas bral ba ga la yod/_/de la dam pas 'di skad du/_/phyi dang 
[\[252a.6\]]nang gi zag pa rnams/_/thams cad thams cad kun zad pas/_/sa dang rnam thar las rnams lta/_/ci smos kun snang zag lam zad/_/de la ka las 'di skad du/_/ji ltar gal te de ltar na/_/'gal ba nyid du yin zin na/_/thams cad mnyam par 'ches pa rnams/_/
[\[252a.7\]]mnyam pa nyid du mi 'gal lam/_/de la dam pas 'di skad du/_/kun du ma 'dres mi shes par/_/bzang po'i tshig la blo gtod cing /_/kun du bzang por khas 'ches pa/_/mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur/_/yongs su rdzogs par kun mnyam yang /_/ma 'dres par 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]yang kun du snang /_/yongs rdzogs don du ma mthong bar/_/rdzogs spyod log pa'i lam pa yin/_/gsang chen theg pa'i tshig dang sgra/_/gcig la mi gcig so sor snang /_/ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par phye/_/gang nyid nges par grol bar snang /_/nges par zag 'byung 
[\[252b.2\]]rtsar 'dod na/_/de dag de bzhin ma bcos par/_/ye nas stong nyid rtog med pa/_/yin par nges pa de kho na'o/_/de dag ci phyir rtsi zhe na/_/rnal 'byor nad ni rnam rtog ste/_/rtag par 'khor ba'i gting mthar 'chi/_/rtog pa'i rtsa ba phyi nang gi/_/kun nas zag pa 
[\[252b.3\]]rnam lnga yin/_/de kun de bzhin nyid stong du/_/rtog bral mu mtha' med 'byung bas/_/nad gso shi ba slong ba'o/_/dam pa mchog des de blan pas/_/mtshan mar zhen las de 'grol te/_/de nyid der nges rnyed gzhan min/_/de nyid che mchog sman par 'gyur/_/
[\[252b.4\]]lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nad gso bar bya'o zhes nges par thos pa rnam par bgros pa ste 'di ltar nges par shes par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pas/_lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtshan pa'i rtog pa las 
[\[252b.5\]]yongs su grol bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rang 'byung bdud rtsi'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o//_//kham po bcu pa ste tha mar zug pa/_de nas yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems 
[\[252b.6\]]dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa/_kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyi rgya cher bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ji skad du brjod par bgyi/_mdo ni gang du 'dus pa lags/_/de skad ces gsol pa las/_gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras 
[\[252b.7\]]pa/_kye lang ka'i bdag po kho bos ji lta ba bzhin bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ni brjod pa'i rnam grangs brgyad du brjod par bya'o/_/mdo ni bcur 'dus par shes par bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la rnam grangs brgyad gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kun gyi 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po zhes kyang bya'o/_/snying po zhes kyang bya'o/_/rdo rje dgod pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya'o/_/rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i lung zhes kyang bya'o/_/kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o/_/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/
[\[253a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkod pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/theg pa chen po byung tshul bstan pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lang ka'i bdag po gang la dgongs pa de nyid las mi 'da' ba dang /_gang gi spyod yul ma yin zhing /_med pa las thams cad 'byung 
[\[253a.3\]]ba dang /_gang gi ye shes yongs su bkod pa dang /_'di ltar gang nges pa rnal 'byor du lung ston pa dang /_'dir kun nas rngub pa dang /_dam pa rnams kyis mngon par chud pa dang /_gang la ma 'dres par bkod pa dang /_gnas skabs bcu gnyis su nges par 
[\[253a.4\]]byung zhing 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/lang ka'i bdag po mdo bcur 'dus pa gang zhe na/_gang mtha' bcu kho nar 'dus pa ste/_de yang 'di ltar gzhi gzung bar bya'o/_/rgyud dgrol bar bya'o/_/sgo dbye bar bya'o/_mthar phyin par bya'o/_/thams cad 'du bar bya'o/_/la dor 
[\[253a.5\]]bar bya'o/_/sa gcad par bya'o/_/nyams rnyed par bya'o/_/tshegs chung bar bya'o/_/mdo gcig tu bya'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po de la chos thams cad kyi gzhi ni dam tshig yin par shes par bya'o/_/dam tshig gnas ni 'di lta ste/_/bsrung bya bsrung du med pa ni/_/chos nyid 
[\[253a.6\]]dam tshig dam pa yin/_/kun kyang dam pa nyid yin pas/_/gang la'ang 'gal bar mi bya'o/_/su la dam pa 'di gnas pa/_/rig 'dzin dam pa'i sa pa yin/_/bsrung bar bya ba'i yul rnams la/_/sgyu gsog g.yo med dam pa nyid/_/zab sangs rgya che dam pa 'dir/_/'di 
[\[253a.7\]]skad grugs pa'i tshul khrims dang /_/rtog pa'i bya ba ji snyed par/_/kun 'dir dam bsrungs rnam par dag_/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/_/kun gyi thun mong ma yin phyir/_/mos pa chung ngu thams cad la/_/bsrung ba'i mtshams dag gzung bar bya'o/_/theg chen yongs su 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]gsang ba dag_/snod ma yin par gyur pa la/_/phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi/_/sba ba'i thabs su bsrung bar bya/_/bstan pa'i gnas min snod gang dag_/rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams/_/ma 'ongs rab 'byor dam pa yis/_/brtags nas gsang bar 
[\[253b.2\]]bya phyir bshad/_/gsang chen yid bzhin nor bu 'di/_/skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te/_/blo chung rnams la phan don du/_/thugs rje thabs kyis shin tu gsang /_/'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang /_/log sred log la phyogs la zhen/_/dad med blo zhan g.yeng 
[\[253b.3\]]rmugs shing /_/gang la mi brtson mun par mtshungs/_/'di log dam nyams 'di las log_/byang chub thag pa gting nas chad/_/sems kyi myu gu rtsa tshig pa/_/ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha spub yin/_/gsang ba'i don rnams sgrar smra yang /_/gab pa'i gsang ba 'di 
[\[253b.4\]]mi shes/_/g.yon can shes rlom grogs rnams la/_/gsang bar 'os pa lhag par smra/_/yan lag rnam bzhi de nyid la/_/sgra thos don med nyams mi len/_/gang gis gang gtad mi thub pa/_/bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin/_/lta dang dam tshig spyod pa 
[\[253b.5\]]yi/_/dam pa'i mdzod gsum sgrar smra yang /_/zhen pa'i mtha' med gnas ma gyur/_/g.yo sgyu phrag dog ser snas gdungs/_/bya med chos la nges 'dzin cing /_/de la de nyid de med par/_/rnal 'byor can la dman zer ba/_/dam pa pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'bo/_/tshul 
[\[253b.6\]]rtog tshod len khyad tshig 'dren/_/kha gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing /_/gang la dmod rmongs dam can te/_/tshe gcig dregs pa'i ched phyir rung /_/rku g.yo sgyu ldan slu 'drid pa/_/zang zing phyir 'breng tshig la dga'/_/rlom sems brjod 'dod tshul 'chos pa/_/log smra 
[\[253b.7\]]dug can tha mar ltung /_/'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la/_/gsang chen gsang ba de kho na/_/zab cing gting dpag dka' bas na/_/bstan kyang pham ltung gnas su 'gyur/_/de bas bstan par bya ba min/_/gal te bstan par gyur na ni/_/ston smra nyan byed de dag 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]gang /_/mthong yun phung byed gnyis sreg 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor mkhas gsal don ldan la/_/rnal 'byor mi shes gang dag gis/_/dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog gis/_/bsam pa'i rnam grangs ci bskyed pa/_/de snyed bskal pa'i grangs
