[\[254a.2\]]mnyam par/_/'bras bu mi bzad myong bar 'gyur/_/gal te bde bar rjes len pa/_/de snyed bskal par gzod 'jug dgos/_/mkhas gsal don ldan gyis kyang ni/_/gong ma bzhin du nges bsams na/_/de yang gnas ngan len pa ste/_/mkhas pas de la skyob mi 
[\[254a.3\]]nus/_/rnal 'byor tshul byung dam pa la/_/mtshon cha'i tshig gis de dkrugs shing /_/sgro skur glu gleng ngan brjod na/_/dmyal ba'i rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur/_/zhar las byung ba'i rnam smin yang /_/ji lta ba nyid de ltar 'gyur/_/skal ba dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rtsa nyams 
[\[254a.4\]]skyon can rang bzhin ni/_/ngan rgyu khro gtum ldan pa dang /_/mi bzad phra men las spyod byed/_/gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can/_/byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhan pas/_/shin tu dman pa'i lta ba yis/_/tshul 'chos pa la ltos par byed/_/gang dag dam pa'i dam par 
[\[254a.5\]]ldan/_/byams tshul rtag tu bzod gnas pa/_/tshul shis don rnams de bzhin slong /_/de la gang dag 'dun pa med/_/dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du/_/byang chub snying po thob pa yi/_/sangs rgyas nam yang mi 'byung ngo /_/'byung bar yang dag ngas ma 
[\[254a.6\]]mthong /_/rgyal ba'i sras gyur rnal 'byor pa/_/lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la/_/gang dag kha cig dregs dbang gis/_/de spong thabs kyis de dmar byed/_/de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste/_/nams kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung /_/mi shes rmongs pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[254a.7\]]pa/_/yang dag dam par nges 'gro ba'i/_/rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing /_/zang zing 'dod par gang lta ba'i/_/rjes su 'gro zhing der 'dun byed/_/de ni log pa'i lam pa yin/_/rnal 'byor lta dang byang chub khe/_/'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung /_/zang zing 'dod dang 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]g.yo sprul khe/_/chung ngu'ang ci sgrub srog dang sdo/_/rnal 'byor dam pa'i rang bzhin can/_/bum snod nang gi sgron ma ltar/_/rig pa mdzod kyi don ldan yang /_/srog chags rkun po'i sder mo ltar/_/khong nas gang sbas don ston la/_/gang 'dir blun pos cir mi mthong /_/
[\[254b.2\]]dper na 'di 'dra tshul gcig ste/_/gang gi lus la gter 'chang mi/_/blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnyis/_/gnas gcig gnyis mtshungs khyad med 'dra/_/gsang 'di sngags pa rjod byed cing /_/gsang ba don du gnyer ba med/_/ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod 
[\[254b.3\]]byed cing /_/ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med/_/yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/yang dag don du gnyer ba med/_/dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing /_/dam tshig don du gnyer ba med/_/ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag_/nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste/_/'dod 
[\[254b.4\]]pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes/_/de yi yon tan rgya cher brjod/_/de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis/_/de ltar 'dod pa 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de dag cung zad yod dam zhes/_/dris kyang med pas slar smras pa/_gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi/_/yon tan [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]smos 
[\[254b.5\]]par zad/_/de nyid bdag la med ces smra/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas/_/bslab par bya ba'i chos bral bas/_/dam pa'i bsngags pa rjod byed kyang /_/de dag la ni dam pa med/_/de la sogs pa'i longs spyod rnams/_/dam pa nyid dang phrad par dka'/_/
[\[254b.6\]]rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis/_/rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can/_/gsang ba 'jigs pa'i sgrar bltas nas/_/de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar/_/'chad cing sa bcing gang byed pa/_/skyes bu de ni dam pa'i sras/_/dper na gang de gang dag gis/_/
[\[254b.7\]]gang gi rgyal khrims 'das 'gyur na/_/rang dga' mi gtong lugs dang sbyor/_/bka' yi yo srongs dka' ba de/_/rgyal po'i thugs mnyes dam pa zhes/_/kun la snang ba grags par 'gyur/_/ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes na/_/ldum pas dug de shes ma thag_/
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed/_/ci phyir ldum zas de dag la/_/dug 'phel gyur na 'chi phyir ro/_/gang dag nyams 'gyur dug can de/_/brtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor pas/_/gnas sam lo yis shugs te spang /_/gang dag mi spong mgon byed 
[\[255a.2\]]pa/_/de dag gsang ba'i dam sri yin/_/don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/_/tha tshig zab mor bcas rnams la/_/bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin/_/rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams la/_/gal te ma tshor zhig 'gyur yang /_/rnam smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams/_/
[\[255a.3\]]ji ltar glang po e na ya/_/shi nas ror ni gyur mod kyang /_/gi wang rtsis ni don byed ltar/_/rnal 'byor nyams te ror gyur kyang /_/gzhan gyi dam par de 'gyur zhing /_/de yi don byed nus pa yin/_/de lta mod kyang 'di kun rnams/_/rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/_/
[\[255a.4\]]ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig_/rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin/_/rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur gcig gis ni/_/rnal 'byor can kun ma rungs 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi/_/log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun/_/don dam nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/
[\[255a.5\]]thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya/_/gal te ma spangs log spyod na/_/'khor ba'i g.yul ni rgyal 'gyur te/_/bden pa'i byin brlabs mthu chung 'gyur/_/kun kyang dge spyad don chung zhes/_/yang dag don la yid 'byung zhing /_/log pa'i chos la gzhol bar 
[\[255a.6\]]'gyur/_/kun gyis log pa'i las spyad pas/_/yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung /_/des na sgro skur gnyis byas pas/_/bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa/_/ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis/_/nam yang gnod pa yang mi mdzad/_/de yi 'khor na gnas pa yi/_/de 
[\[255a.7\]]dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams/_/rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi/_/skyon mthong tsam na chad pas gcod/_/thams cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs lhung /_/sgrub pa'i gnod mchog gcig yod de/_/'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i/_/rgyud ldan don ldan dang tshul 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bzang /_/ci la'ang chags med stong ldan sems/_/shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis/_/gti mug tha ram blo phye nas/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i mig ldan pas/_/mtha' dang dpung bral dam pa'i yul/_/ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas/_/sdong chen sdong por rab tu dul/_/tha 
[\[255b.2\]]tshig lung las 'byung ba bzhin/_/drang srong dka' thub dam pa de/_/dam pa'i dam pa nyid yin pas/_/de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya/_/ji ltar dka' thub thub pa ltar/_/de ltar yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung /_/rig 'dzin rgyal ba kun 
[\[255b.3\]]yum mo/_/de bzhin dka' thub dam pa 'di/_/gnas pas rten pa'i gzhi yin te/_/dka' thub kun gyi srog kyang yin/_/dam pa kun gyi nor mchog go/_/dam pa 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs/_/dam pa'i bgrod pa'i lam mi mchog_/dam pa chu bo sgrol ba'i gru/_/de 
[\[255b.4\]]bzhin dngos grub dam pa yin/_/dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te/_/dam tshig long ba'i dmigs bu yin/_/gzhan sde 'joms pa'i dmag dpung yin/_/'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed/_/des na dam pa'i gtan tshigs yin/_/ci nas gang gi sgo 
[\[255b.5\]]gsum po/_/dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas/_/gang 'dir dbang bzhi sun mi 'byung /_/sgo gsum mi gnod dang bcas gzung /_/yongs su ma nyams mdo bzhi'o/_/mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas/_/mdo dran pa la bgrang zhing bsngo/_/'dul ba'i rgyun 
[\[255b.6\]]ldan tha tshig can/_/mos pa chung ba'i bu rnams kyis/_/phra mo'i phra mo phra yan cad/_/nan tan gyis ni bsrung bar bya/_/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/_/gsung dang spyod dang yid 'ong dang /_/mi 'dor shes bya grub pa dang /_/med dang phyal ba gcig po dang /_/lhun 
[\[255b.7\]]gyis grub pa rnam pa bcu/_/lta ba 'di las 'bum phrag 'byung /_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thams cad kyi/_/spyad par bya yi nor mchog yin/_/rnal 'byor dam pa'i rigs rgyud las/_/nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu/_/zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi/_/blo la 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]nges pa'i lung 'di bstan/_/'di yi sngon 'gro dam tshig ste/_/zab mo la sogs kun sngon du/_/rdo rje tha tshig drag po yi/_/gcan 'phrang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/_/spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams/_/nges pa'i don gyis btsan red na/_/de ni dbyig 
[\[256a.2\]]gi snod chen yin/_/de ltar dam pa'i sdom pa la/_/gnas nas dus kyi skabs dag tu/_/bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig dag_/dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro/_/don du mi 'gyur kun spangs nas/_/kun dang mthun phyir de ltar spyad/_/
[\[256a.3\]]mi shigs pa ni seng ge ste/_/gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so/_/za ma tog ni rgyal po'i mdzod/_/dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs/_/rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag_/bregs te 'byung rgyun gcad ma yin/_/gangs kyi zhun chu phal pa yang /_/mkhas pas btung bar mi 
[\[256a.4\]]bya'o/_/pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha mi dbye/_/zla zer ma yin dbye mi bya/_/ma brtags bug rdol can snod du/_/bdud rtsi sman blugs zag par 'gyur/_/don med bcos ma'i tshul rtags can/_/bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min/_/shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag_/'dam khung 
[\[256a.5\]]rdzab tu bsnub mi bya/_/seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag_/gser snod ma yin blugs mi bya/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/bsreg par bya ba yang ma yin/_/khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba/_/de dag gcag par bya ba min/_/gnam lcags me yi dur mo dag_/
[\[256a.6\]]brdab par bya ba ma yin no/_/stag seng rol pas las byas pa'i/_/las kyi rjes la bzlas mi bya/_/rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi/_/gzhig par bya ba ga la yin/_/rdo rje rwa ba'i re ga de/_/bsdam bya dral bar bya ba min/_/bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma de/_/'thor 
[\[256a.7\]]rlung drag pos bskyod mi bya/_/rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag_/'ol kar gcad par bya ba min/_/rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dag_/rnam zhar dbyi bar mi bya'o/_/rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar/_/rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o/_/gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu de/_/
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]rgyal mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya/_/rnal 'byor thabs kyi khyad par can/_/rtsal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste/_/skal ldan dag gi nor mchog yin/_/rgyun du sbyang ba'i nor mchog ni/_/rdo rje las kyi bsam gtan dag_/rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis/_/srog 
[\[256b.2\]]la bar chad byed pa'i dgra/_/nyon mongs thibs po de gzhom bya/_/snyom las le lo'i gzhir gyur pa/_/thugs thub ra cod nga rgyal ri/_/dregs byed dbang po nyams pa'i bcud/_/dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya/_/theg chen gsang sngags ma gtogs pa/_/mtshan 
[\[256b.3\]]ma gang dag byis pa'i tshig_/zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing /_/thams cad de nyid kho nar bya/_/ji ltar gsad pa'i mi gang dag_/gshed ma mis ni gsod pa'i tshe/_/thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa ltar/_/le lo dgra bcom brtson par 'bad/_/rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i 
[\[256b.4\]]gags bsal ba/_/dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can/_/'dod spyod zhen dang mi mthun dang /_/gcig la gang 'dir mi gcig pa/_/phyi nang can dang gnod sbyor can/_/'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dag_/dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yeng can/_mkhas 
[\[256b.5\]]pa yongs kyis spang bar bya/_/de ni rnal 'byor bgegs yin te/_/rnal 'byor bar du gcod par byed/_/rnal 'byor nges par zhugs pa la/_/rgyun gyi bar du gcod pa'i bdud/_/rnam rtog 'phrig pa chen po dang /_/gang la btang snyoms le lo dang /_/longs spyod 
[\[256b.6\]]'du 'dzi g.yeng ba dang /_/tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po dang /_/khro gtum ngang thung shin tu 'khrug_/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bdud lnga yin/_/yang dag don la sgrib pa ste/_/gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis/_/zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog_/rnal 'byor nor 
[\[256b.7\]]la 'phrog pa'i dgra/_/thabs la mkhas pas dul bar bya/_/gang gi rnal 'byor rang bzhin bcos/_/drang srong nyid las nyams 'gyur te/_/kha na ma tho grags pa yis/_/de dag bcas dgar 'gyur ba'i dgra/_/lta dman spyod rtsing 'chol ba yis/_/lugs por 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'di las log par spyod/_/bka' log phra men las spyod/_/bka' log phra men las spyod pas/_/don du mi 'gyur 'chal ba'i dgra/_/'da' ka rdo rje dka' thub dam/_/klong du ma gyur phyal bas 'chal/_/rtsa ba rul ba'i ljon shing bzhin/_/'chad pas drug por 'byung ba'i dgra/_/rnal 
[\[257a.2\]]ma nyid la sbyor ba de/_/gang la nges pa'i tshig med na/_/don rnams grub pa ma yin te/_/'bras bur mi 'gyur gol ba'i dgra/_/rnal 'byor rnal 'byor spyod pa la/_/dam pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i dgra/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i blo gros kyis/_/skyon gyi dgra bzhi 
[\[257a.3\]]bzlog par bya/_/srid gsum snang ba'i zhing 'di dag_/rnam dag zhing du nges pa ste/_/sa rnams cig car sbyangs pas na/_/zhing rnams dam pa'i mchog yin no/_/'dod spyod mchod pa'i tshogs 'di dag_/yo byad chen po'i mchog yin te/_/dgongs pa dam pa kun mnyes 
[\[257a.4\]]pa'i/_/rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o/_/'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag_/bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te/_/ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings/_/rtsol med lhun gyis grub pa'i sa'o/_/kun gyi rtsa ba dug chen lnga/_/ye shes chen po lnga nyid de/_/kun shes rang rig 
[\[257a.5\]]rang byung bas/_/rnal 'byor rang rig mig ldan pa'o/_/lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni/_/dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog yin te/_/dam pas gdams pa'i tshig 'di la/_/gang dag nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin/_/ji ltar sa gzhi gshin pa la/_/brten nas sa bon btab 
[\[257a.6\]]pa las/_/dam pa kho na 'jug par 'os/_/'un pas gang gi de nyid kyang /_/'un cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug_/lang ka'i bdag po ji ltar na/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/kho bo mthong thos skabs gcig na/_/bdag gi bshes gnyen dam pa des/_/'dus pa phal 
[\[257a.7\]]po che dag la/_/lam 'di rgya cher bstan pa'i tshe/_/'khor 'dir 'dus par gyur pa yi/_/lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/_/bu mo drug gi 'khor 'dus pas/_/'bras drug smin par gyur pa yis/_/gang dag 'tsho ba'i srog 'dzin ltar/_/chos rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pas/_/dam tshig 'di la gnas pa ni/_/bla med byang chub rnam smin pas/_/dge ba'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o/_/gal te nyams par gyur pa na/_chad pa'i skye gnas dmyal chen brgyad/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po yis/_/'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du 'khor/_/lang 
[\[257b.2\]]ka'i bdag po gang 'di las/_/nyams par gyur pa gang zhe na/_/kun du nyams pa chen po dang /_/rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams/_/de bzhin bzlas nyams zhar nyams lnga/_/rtag par rgyun gyi khor mor 'byung /_/gang de bkang bar bya ba'i thabs/_/rnam pa 
[\[257b.3\]]lngar ni bshad par bya/_/las dang rdzas dang 'dun pa dang /_/ting nge 'dzin dang de nyid do/_/las ni rnam lngas skong 'gyur te/_/dang po 'bum khri gsum pa ste/_/rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo/_/yan lag nyams par gyur pa la/_/stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya/_/
[\[257b.4\]]bzlas nyams brgya lnga bcu gsum mo/_/zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la/_/bco lnga gcig gsum dag gis skongs/_/rdzas ni rin chen sna lnga yis/_/rigs kyi dam tshig gang nyams las/_/bla ma rigs lnga gang dag la/_/tha tshig gang rlag nor des bslu/_/'dun 
[\[257b.5\]]pa dad pa dang ba yis/_/gdung ba'i shugs kyi nga ro yis/_/rtag par rma ga chad pa ni/_/dmyal chen gnas na spyod bzhin du/_/gnyen po mchog tu de 'gyur te/_/de ni skong ba dam pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs chen yang /_/'jig rten sreg la me dgos kyang /_/bag 
[\[257b.6\]]chags sreg la me mi dgos/_/rig pa'i ye shes me byung bas/_/sgrib pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs/_/'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang /_/mtshan ma 'bud la rlung mi dgos/_/rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas/_/mtshan ma'i rdul kun rnam par 'phyag_/
[\[257b.7\]]lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang /_/sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos/_/rig pa'i ye shes chu byung bas/_/bag chags ljan ljin thams cad dag_/stong nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing /_/de bzhin nyid kyi nam mkha' nas/_/'bar 'phro me yi bskal par tshig_/de ni skams pa 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dam pa'i mchog_/de nyid de yi thabs mchog kyang /_/rnal 'byor dam pa gang zhig dag_/nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la/_/de bzhin de nyid ma g.yos kyang /_/mgon skyabs de las gzhan med de/_/nyams dang ma nyams tha snyad med/_/bkang 
[\[258a.2\]]ngam mi bkang tshig lam bral/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzhi yongs su gzung ba rnam par bgros par shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa rnams dam pa rnams kyi nor la yongs su spyod par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 
[\[258a.3\]]dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste drug cu drug pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/_kye grogs po dam pa dag rgyud yongs su grol ba ni dam pa la rag las pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_
[\[258a.4\]]'di lta ste/_bla med snying po smin pa'i rkyen/_/blo gros chen po dri ba'i yul/_/lam stor sa mkhan bshes gnyen mgon/_/mun sel sgron ma'i rin po che/_/mthong mig dbang po yid rnam shes/_/chu bo rab med sgrol ba'i gru/_/'jigs pa'i rdzong chen rten pa'i 
[\[258a.5\]]mkhar/_/'khor ba'i gcong 'byin sman pa'i mchog_/mtsho gling rin chen len byed pa'i/_/ded dpon dam pa'i bla ma de/_/sngon du nges par shes par bya/_/sde mdzod gter khyim khang chen dang /_/rnam 'grel lde mig bcu gnyis dang /_/nges mdo dam pa de nyid 
[\[258a.6\]]bcu/_/mtha' bcu yan lag mdo rtsa ba/_/gang 'dir skabs bcu rdzogs ldan nam/_/skyon gyi mtha' rnams zad 'gyur zhing /_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin/_/dam pa'i tshad la bab ma bab/_/de la bshes gnyen mgon bltas na/_/mthar chub yongs su 
[\[258a.7\]]rdzogs zhe'am/_/gang rig de yul ma yin par/_/thabs dang yan lag bcas pa yis/_/gzhan gyi yul nas brtag par bya/_/brtags pas bsngo ba kun ldan na/_/gzhan gyi yul la 'gro mi bya/_/dam pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs na/_/dman pa'i yo byad med 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]la min/_/nges par kun du bzang nyid na/_/gang gi blta yul ngan la min/_/sgron me 'tshub rlung bskyod la min/_/'dod 'chal tshig 'chal dman la min/_/blun rmugs rmongs la ga la srid/_/'jig rten pa'i skyon de bzhin du/_/dam pa de dag ji ltar 
[\[258b.2\]]yang /_/sa mkhan lam la mkhas nges na/_/ji ltar bzod par bya dka' yang /_/thams cad thams cad bzod par bya/_/dam pa 'di ni sa mkhan te/_/'di ni bdag gi mgon yin pas/_/'jig rten pa yi tha snyad kun/_/nges par thams cad sgyu ma yin/_/gang 
[\[258b.3\]]'dir gyi na tsam 'di dag_/dam par gang la 'gog ma yin/_/skad cig tsam gyis mthong 'di la/_/de lta zhig na 'di lta la/_/de srid tsam du bzod par zad/_/ci gar gar cig 'byung 'joms sgrubs/_/log pas gyin da gyin da 'di/_/dam pa'i don du mi sbyor ram/_/
[\[258b.4\]]snyam du brtags te dam par bya/_/yun gyi don srid chen po la/_/dmigs nas blo gros phyir bskyed de/_/bde mchog bde ba'i dam pa dang /_/skad cig tsam gyi tha snyad 'dis/_/btang snyoms bya ba ga la srid/_/gang 'dir mgon med bdag 'khyams na/_/gang 
[\[258b.5\]]gis phyogs 'di dag la ni/_/phan 'byung rigs can su ga na/_/dam pa ma gtogs gcig 'ga' med/_/'di na phan dang mgon mang zhing /_/dman par 'brel ba gang yod kyang /_/log par bsgrub pa'i blo gros mkhan/_/g.yang sar mchongs pa'i snga bgros 
[\[258b.6\]]mkhan/_/don la 'gog snyam yod min te/_/bshes gnyen skyabs med ci slad du/_/kun kyang dmangs rigs grong khyer 'gro/_/byams blo'i yul du ga la rung /_/gang 'dir mun par 'khyams pa la/_/bde mchog snang ba'i lam ston pa/_/skyabs chen dam pa 
[\[258b.7\]]gang de lags/_/gzhan gyis bskyab par nus ma yin/_/des na dam pa gang dag la/_/bsnyen pas shin tu bsten par bya/_/gang 'dir snang ba'i tshul 'byung na/_/dam pa nyid du 'dun par gsol/_/dam par snang ba thob phan chad/_/dam pa de las 'gal 'gyur 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]las/_/rdul gyi cha yang mi bya'o/_/rgya mi bcag cing lung mi bor/_/'dun pa nas bzung las rung ba'i/_/bar du de la ltos dgos so/_/gang 'dir ngo gang ma zin pas/_/btang snyoms tsam du tshul bsad na/_/de la dam pa'i don med de/_/de rkyen de dang 
[\[259a.2\]]mi ldan pas/_/bslab pa'i yul bzlas the tshom zos/_/le los yul la mi brtson zhing /_/phyal bas de la ma gus pas/_/shes bya mun pa'i tshogs kyis bsgribs/_/gang gis nam mthong thibs kyis 'gags/_/gang la byis pa shed mi 'bye/_/mdud pa'i 
[\[259a.3\]]bcing ba de las byung /_/shes rgyud grol bar ga la srid/_/dam pa'i yo byad lnga dbul ba'i/_/phongs pa de yis gzhan bsgral na/_/de yang dbul po nyid du 'gyur/_/'tsho ba dam pa dang bral bas/_/longs spyod chen pos phongs pa yi/_/mu ge'i dgon pa nyid du ltung /_/
[\[259a.4\]]de lta'i gang zag dman pa de/_/dam par gzung bar gyur phan chad/_/dam par nges dang ma nges kyang /_/bka' bcag lugs por ga la srid/_/gal te de yi rgya nyams na/_/dmyal ba rdo rjer de 'gro ste/_/mi bzad sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/dmyal bsrung khyi 
[\[259a.5\]]ni lu de zhes/_/grags pa seng ge gzugs 'dra ba/_/mche ba gzangs [{]rings [,]ring [}]dbal rno bas/_/rbad cing mtshon cha'i lam du bdas/_/spu gri rno dbal ral gri nags/_/nang du ga chad rgyugs skyabs med/_/khro chu khol mo thal skyo yi/_/chu bo rab med nang du 
[\[259a.6\]]'bying /_/rtse gsum mdung dang mda' bo che/_/khab 'dra dbal rno gzangs [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/chu gri ral gri rnos gang ba'i/_/mun dong me 'bar nang du ltung /_/sdug bsngal rgyud pa de dag las/_/thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do/_/slob mar gyur na sems ldan pas/_/dam pa 
[\[259a.7\]]de la nyes byed gang /_/sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas/_/de dag rtag tu spyi'u tshugs 'gro/_/dam pa kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/_/dam pa nyid las gang 'das pa/_/rnal 'byor dam pa dbang gyur pa/_/thams cad 'khrugs nas khrag chen 'thung /_/dam pa'i yi 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]ge 'bru bkod pa/_/dbugs chen nang du shar nas kyang /_/lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa/_/rag sha yag shar gyur pa des/_/bsad nas dmyal ba chen por brgyud/_/rnam par 'tshe dang nor 'phrog dang /_/bgegs dang sdig pa'i dug dbal gyis/_/nyams 
[\[259b.2\]]pa de la 'tshe bar byed/_/sdig can yin te 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa/_/'jigs pa brgyad rnams de la 'byung /_/sho gam gcan chen la sogs pa/_/gnod sbyin gyis bsad mi bder 'gro/_/ci phyir lha srin sde brgyad las/_/gtum pho 
[\[259b.3\]]gtum mo dam can kun/_/chos srung bka' yi las mkhan yin/_/bka' yi las la dus mi 'dor/_/des na chos la spyod pa yi/_/dam par 'jug pa'i bu rnams kyis/_/nam yang zhabs la mi smod cing /_/bka' zur gcag par mi bya'o/_/gang gis rtse gcig 
[\[259b.4\]]chos bsrungs na/_/chos la bsrung ba'i srung ma rnams/_/gtum po mthu chen rnams kyis kyang /_/bu bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed/_/chos srung ba yang gang zhe na/_/chos rnams kun la ma rmongs shing /_/nges par shes pa gang yin pa/_/chos srung ba la mkhas 
[\[259b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/gang zhig kun la mi mkhas shing /_/rmongs pa'i lta ba brtan pa can/_/bsgyur bas cis kyang mi 'gyur te/_/nams kyang chos ni srung mi 'gyur/_/gal te dus ni thams cad du/_/dam pa de dang de gcig na/_/rgyud zhan skyo ngas snyom las kyis/_/
[\[259b.6\]]de dang 'gal na ltung grib rgyu/_/des na dam pa'i lung mi gcag_/tshad mar nges pa dam pa'i lung /_/thams cad ldem dgongs can yin te/_/yul dang 'tsham par sbyor ba yin/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/ji ltar log sred can dag gis/_/su dag 'jig 
[\[259b.7\]]rten 'dren gang lags/_/kye ma 'jig rten dga' byed khyod/_/thams cad dga' bar ston shes na/_/bdag ltar dga' ba'i don bstan nas/_/'bras bu gdon mi za shes na/_/thams cad mkhyen ces de la bya/_/de ltar mos pa gang bstan pa/_/pha ma bram 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ze rgyal po rnams/_/bsad brlag yongs su bcom byas na/_/de dag rtag tu bde ba'i mchog_/de bstan de yis de spyad nas/_/bde mchog bde dang ldan pa yin/_/de bzhin bka' yi ldem dgongs la/_/mdo dang don gal che yod pas/_/
[\[260a.2\]]skyabs chen dam par bzung ba de/_/tshad ma dam par yid ches na/_/de yi lugs kyang dam par bya/_/lang ka'i bdag po gang gi tshe/_/gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des/_/kho bo la ni 'di skad bsgo/_/sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon/_/bskal pa 'bum gyi 
[\[260a.3\]]sangs rgyas pas/_/slob dpon gnyan par shes par bya/_/ci'i phyir bskal pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/slob dpon dag la brten nas byung /_/slob dpon dag la ma brten par/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ste/_/'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong /_/byung 
[\[260a.4\]]na dam pa'i lugs dang 'gal/_/don dang ldan pa'i dam pa la/_/dus gsum dus ni thams cad du/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa yi/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba kun byon na/_/sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do/_/sems dpa' lha dang mi dag dang /_/de 
[\[260a.5\]]bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po log lta can dag gis/_/rig pa 'dzin pa kun 'dus nas/_/sprul pa'i me tog kun 'thor zhing /_/bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod/_/bdag cag rnams kyi pha lags so/_/bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod/_/
[\[260a.6\]]bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so/_/bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod/_/bdag cag rnams kyi mgon lags so/_/mi shes rmongs pa'i blo gros mkhan/_/lam stor rnams kyi sa mkhan lags/_/mun khung 'khyams pa'i sgron ma lags/_/gdung ba sel 
[\[260a.7\]]ba'i rin po che/_/nyi ma'i zhal la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/nam mkha'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/zla ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/pad+ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/'di ltar dga' dang gus pa yis/_/sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do/_/de'i phyir 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rgyal ba thams cad dang /_/sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa rnams/_/dam pa'i dam pa las byung bas/_/dper na ma yis bu bskyed ltar/_/de bzhin dam pa shes par gyis/_/dam pa de yi rang bzhin yang /_/yid brten sems dang dul ba dang /_/tshad med 
[\[260b.2\]]yangs pa'i blo gros dang /_/rkyen thub bzod ldan kun du drang /_/gsong por spyod la gya gyu med/_/sems can nyen can thams cad la/_/thabs kyis mi 'jigs sna tshogs sbyin/_/dpa' bo mthur ldan brtson 'grus che/_/shes bya'i yul ni thams cad 
[\[260b.3\]]la/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung /_/srid par zhus kyang zad mi shes/_/brtags shing yon tan phyi phyir 'byung /_/bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/legs dang nyes pa'i las rnams la/_/dga' dang mi dga' rtog 
[\[260b.4\]]'dzin med/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po seng ge ltar/_/gzi ldan brjid che yul mi 'jug_/'du 'dzi dman pa'i las rnams spangs/_/'phyo dang g.yeng bral gang na rtag_/seng ge lta bur gcig pur gnas/_/dgon pa'i rgyu dang dben lam bsten/_/'di dang gang ldan dam pa'i 
[\[260b.5\]]'os/_/dam pa thams cad bkur gnas so/_/rang bzhin de dang mi ldan yang /_/dam pa'i mdzod dang gnyer ldan na/_/dam par gzung zhing dam par bya/_/chos kun mi shes ma rtogs kyang /_/dam par gyur pa'i bla ma la/_/bkur gnas rim gro cher byas pas/_/
[\[260b.6\]]'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal 'gyur/_/ci phyir zhing rab gshin pa la/_/sa bon btab na rgyas 'phel bzhin/_/bsod nams dam pa'i zhing rab la/_/til 'bru mi stor 'phel mi 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i mtha' las skyob pa yi/_/bshes gnyen dam pa bzhi yod 
[\[260b.7\]]de/_/khungs dang lung dang dbang 'gyur dang /_/blo gros nges pa'i tshad ldan bzhi/_/de las gnyen po bzhi 'byung ste/_/sems bskyed stobs dang 'gyod stobs dang /_/las kyi stobs dang dmigs pa'i stobs/_/log pa'i stobs rnams 'joms par byed/_/chu bo 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]bzhi las rgal bar 'gyur/_/rgyud kun yongs su grol 'gyur te/_/dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur/_/de skad gsungs nas cang mi gsung /_/des na lang ka'i bdag po 'dir/_/blo ldan dga' dang gus pa yis/_/dam par gyur to 'tshal 
[\[261a.2\]]rnams la/_/'dun sar lan gsum gus byas te/_/zhabs la spyi bos gtug par bya/_/dam pa'am yang na ma nges rnams/_/dam pa'i chos sogs 'dus byas te/_/kha na ma tho gzhom bya'i phyir/_/'jig rten sri zhu'i 'dun pa bya/_/lung 'byung gang smod 
[\[261a.3\]]'phel gtam la/_/yang du 'dun pas 'dun thabs sbyar/_/sri zhu sgra yis mtshams bzung ste/_/gang de rnams ni ci bder dran/_/bde dang blang ba langs pa dang /_/don byed zhu sogs skabs rnams su/_/rgyud mnyen sri zhu gus ldan pas/_/gyong sems med sdo nan 
[\[261a.4\]]tan bya/_/kun nas gzem mdog bag la gnas/_/gsong por smra zhing gya gyu med/_/ci phyir dam par gyur pa la/_/ma nges gya gyu'i las byas pas/_/dam par gyur pa kun bslus te/_/dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur/_/brtson dang 'grus ldan ngang tshul bzang /_/
[\[261a.5\]]brdeg cing gsang thub spyod pa dag_/ya bag bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mdzes thabs ldan/_/sbo gsum bzang spyod mtha' gsum bsdam/_/dam pa nyid dang mthun bzhin spyod/_/gsal la dag pas go rnams dbye/_/dam pa'i nang na bder 'dug tshe/_/kun gyi tshig lam la mi 
[\[261a.6\]]'byung /_/gang dag bzang dang ngan spyod la/_/'thing slad smod pa yang mi bya/_/bdag la bzang dang ngan brjod cing /_/kun mthong kun brjod sgro skur dang /_/gang dag tshig lam 'dren 'dod na/_/tshig lam bcad na bde ba thob/_/dam pa'i yul na gnas rnams su/_/
[\[261a.7\]]khong khro tshig rtsub khyal mi smra/_/bag yangs tshul gyis bya ba min/_/tshul med tshul dang mi ldan pa'i/_/nyam nga med par smra mi bya/_/phod dang lcogs dang gang mthong dang /_/stong 'phyor rngom la sogs mi bya/_/gzhan la khyad kyis gsad pa'i tshig_/gang ris gcad par 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]mi bya'o/_/dam pa'i gnas su gyur pa la/_/rjes su rigs dang 'thad pa'i yon/_/nor gyi dbyig dang na bza'i mchog_/rtsi mchog zas la sogs pa rnams/_/dbul dang gsol bas mnyes par bya/_/des ni nad dang dbul la sogs/_/bkres dang tsha ba'i sdug 
[\[261b.2\]]bsngal gyis/_/nams kyang 'debs par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhu ba dbul ba nad pa dang /_/lung byang 'dun par 'dug pa dang /_/dam pa'i spyod pa ma rtogs pa/_/dam pa dag dang gnas gcig tu/_/zhabs 'bring ma rtogs nams kyang min/_/'di ltar ma byas nyes byas 
[\[261b.3\]]so/_/sku yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing /_/zhabs rjes brlam par mi bya'o/_/na bza' chags gdan rten la sogs/_/nams kyang 'gom par bya ba min/_/dam pa'i lung byung ming gis bsgrub/_/ming lcogs ma yin ma lcogs na/_/sgyu sogs med pa gnas dor ro/_/
[\[261b.4\]]dam pa'i dkor rnams srog bzhin bsrung /_/de yi nye gnas dam pa bzhin/_/de yi 'khor g.yog nye du bzhin/_/rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems kyis blta/_/khri mal stan bde bla ma'i thabs/_/mi gus la sogs mi tshul rnams/_/dam pa'i thad du yong mi 
[\[261b.5\]]mdzes/_/byas na sri zhu dam tshig nyams/_/mgo la zer ldir gdugs thogs dang /_/lag rten lus brten de bzhin stod/_/gang 'dir ma rab thor bu'i thabs/_/snang ba'i yul nas bya ma yin/_/dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung mo'i tshul/_/dam pa'i gzigs 
[\[261b.6\]]yul nams kyang min/_/khu ljo smyon pa kun du rgyu'i/_/spyod pa dam pa'i yul du min/_/snang ba'i lung la gang 'byung spyod/_/ji ltar spyod byung spyod pa byung /_/'jam dal thos 'phrigs dogs bzhin spyad/_/dam pa'i spyod pa'i snang yul nas/_/bag med che ba'i 
[\[261b.7\]]thabs mi bya/_/bsgrubs nas mdzes pa'i tshul bzung ste/_/bag dang ldan pas gnas par bya/_/lus kyi dor ba gang dag kun/_/mthong tshor yul nas yod mi bya/_/snang ba lus kyi bya byed rnams/_/blo gros ldan pas bya ba min/_/'dus nas 'du gang byed spyod rnams/_/
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]dam pa'i 'dun sar rigs ma yin/_/'phyo g.yeng brkam dang ma zhi ba'i/_/spyod tshul yul nas mi bya'o/_/khams las byung ba'i lus spyod rnams/_/bsgribs sam phag gam bskyor bkab nas/_/thams cad bde bskyung 'jam byas te/_/
[\[262a.2\]]dam pa de la ci mdzes bya/_/dam pa gdan bskyod gang phyogs nas/_/bdag nas bsgrims te sri zhu bya/_/bskyod bcag brdzi sad gdan thabs sbyar/_/ma ldan nyid las ci bder sbyar/_/sngon rtsol lung 'byung sri zhu bsdu/_/de rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin no/_/blo ldan 
[\[262a.3\]]spyod lam bzhi spyod na/_/sri zhu gus pas de bzhin sbyar/_/gang ma gus dang btang snyoms dag_/nam yang bya ba yang ma yin/_/sri zhu bsti gnas rim gro rnams/_/bya ba'i mdun dang de zan du/_/sri zhu bcug ste ci bder 'gro/_/bde shes la sogs sri zhus zhus/_/
[\[262a.4\]]yang dag dka' thub mdun nyid du/_/gar spyod gar skabs sri zhu dbul/_/mtshan nas nam yang mi brjod cing /_/dam pa bla ma bshes gnyen zhes/_/brjod pa'i tha mar zhus sgra gzhug_/khyad par cir yang dbye bar bya/_/lung byung bka' bzhin zhus zhes brjod/_/
[\[262a.5\]]thal sbyar gsung ba gzung bar bya/_/dam pa'i lung yul byung rjes 'brang /_/de kun sri zhus mtshon pa yin/_/mdzes pa'i tshul bzung gus 'dun nas/_/spobs pa nod pa gsum du zhu/_/gyong khengs med pa'i mnyen lcug gis/_/zhabs 'bring dgongs pa thams cad 
[\[262a.6\]]bya/_/dge slong sar pa'i spyod pa yis/_/bsgegs pa la sogs bya byed dang /_/rgyan dang mtshon thogs spang bar bya/_/blo gros gus pa de nyid kyang /_/nyid kyis nyid la dpyas bcug ste/_/gzhan gyis dpya ba'i gzhi rnams spang /_/kun du mthun par bzang brjod pa'i/_/
[\[262a.7\]]skyes bu gang yin de ltar bya/_/kun gyis mthun par ma bsngags pa'i/_/tha shal gang yin de spyod spang /_/dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyin sreg dang /_/slob ma gzung dang chos smra ba/_/lung ma byung bar mi brtsam ste/_/dam pa'i yul nas de mi rigs/_/gal te 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]gzhan gyi don byas na/_/de yi yo byad mi spyad de/_/de kun dam pa de la dbul/_/dam pas ci blangs lhag ma blang /_/dam pa'i slob ma slob mar yang /_/dam pa'i mdun du mi rigs so/_/bkur sti sri zhu la sogs min/_/gang yin dam pa de nyid mnga'/_/snying 
[\[262b.2\]]rjes dam pas ci gnang ba/_/sri zhu mdun bsu lag gnyis kyis/_/blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya/_/rmugs med dran gsal rab bsgribs nas/_/rang gi spyod lam 'da' mi bya/_/blo gros ldan pa'i nyi ma des/_/dam pa lha ltar mchod bya'i phyir/_/mnyes par bya 
[\[262b.3\]]ba'i yo byad brgyad/_/dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul/_/skyo dub med pa'i dad pa dang /_/gyong khengs med pa'i mnyen lcug dang /_/ser sna med pa'i zang zing dang /_/som nyi med pa'i sri zhu dang /_/g.yo sgyu med pa'i drang dkan dang /_/kha gsag med pa'i rang rgyud dang /_/
[\[262b.4\]]rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab dang /_/dri ma med pa'i lhag sems brgyad/_/dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul/_/dam pas bsgo ba bslab pa'i mtha'/_/chub par rdzogs pas rgyud dgrol te/_/shes bya kun la thogs med 'gro/_/rang rgyud mdud pa dgrol ba yi/_/
[\[262b.5\]]shes rab mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu/_/mthar chib rgyud dgrol yul spangs te/_/rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/_/bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig_/rab tu gces dang yid 'thad pa'i/_/nor mchog dam pa de la dbul/_/rang gi lus kyang ci rigs par/_/rin thang gang yin 
[\[262b.6\]]nor gyis bslu/_/de nas ji bzhin gar bde bar/_/rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog la zhugs/_/sngon gyi dam pa dam pa rnams/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro/_/sngon gyi dam pa bder gshegs rnams/_/ded dpon dam pa mnyes byas nas/_/kun spangs 
[\[262b.7\]]dgon pa'i mthar gshegs pas/_/nyid las dam pa mnyes par 'gyur/_/des na ded dpon dam pa dang /_/nam du'ang 'bral ba ma yin te/_/ji ltar lus dang grib ma bzhin/_/blo gros dris na dam par 'gyur/_/ji ltar cang shes gyi ling dag_/sdom byed sgrog 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]gis bcings 'gyur ba/_/bkrol byas bde blag byung 'gyur na/_/ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar/_/sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di/_/mi shes bcing bas bcings 'gyur ba/_/dam pas rnam grol sgo phye bas/_/shes rgyud kun 'grol thogs 
[\[263a.2\]]med 'gro/_/'di ni mi shes rgyud 'gro ba'i/_/mdud pa'i bcing ba 'grol ba ste/_/rgyud rnams grol ba'i bslabs pa ru/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rgyud yongs su dgrol ba'i bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[263a.3\]]de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams slob dpon dam par bsgrun par shes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po les bsnyen bkur dam pa mchog gi le'u ste drug cu bdun 
[\[263a.4\]]pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag sgo dbye bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_ji bzhin pa yi de kho na/_/nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo la/_/rig dang ma rig rnam pa yis/_/kun shes 
[\[263a.5\]]spyod dang kun du rmongs/_/rnam pa gnyis su snang ba la/_/tha dad du ma mang por 'gyur/_/rmongs pa rnam pa gnyis snang ba/_/mi shes pa dang log par shes/_/mi shes phyal pa rgyang phan gnyis/_/log rtog mur thug mu stegs pa/_/de yang zhen chags log sred 
[\[263a.6\]]can/_/'jig rten 'jig rten pa zhes bya/_/mu stegs log dang gzhan rkyen log_/zhar las 'byung ba zhes kyang bshad/_/mi shes 'di gnyis gzhir snang ba/_/dman rigs dang ni rigs ma nges/_/rigs chad 'du shes can 'di dag_/kun nas dkrigs pa'i 
[\[263a.7\]]mun pa yin/_/'du shes can bzhi chags pa dang /_/gang la g.yeng dang ya nga can/_/mos pa can zhes grags pa rnams/_/sa bon 'dzin pa'i zhing du snang /_/log par rtog 'di ya mtshan can/_/brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu gnyis/_/nyi shu 'am bcu ste lnga gnyis 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dang /_/tha dad rnam pa du mar snang /_/yo byad med pa'i phyogs 'dzin las/_/'jig pa'i tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang /_/log par 'dzin dang lta khyad dang /_/rang gi brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin te/_/rigs mi mthun pa sde lngar grags/_/rang bzhin log pas log pa 
[\[263b.2\]]nyid/_/gzhan rkyen log pa phra med spyod/_/lung la brten dang rtags tsam 'dzin/_/bcos mar spyod dang mu cor smra/_/lung gi phyogs tsam brten pa dang /_/phyogs log gol dang bslang bas 'chal/_/phyogs ltos gcod pa rnam bzhir grags/_/bcos ma gzhan 
[\[263b.3\]]las gyur pa dang /_/'di las gyur pa gnyis kho na/_/gnas dang 'khor dang yo byad nor/_/longs spyod lnga ldan gzhan las gyur/_/dran pa rtag lta ltos 'dzin rgyu/_/med pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med shes/_/kun nas rnam par mi g.yeng lta/_/gong du shes pa 
[\[263b.4\]]yod smra lta/_/de bzhin med par lta ba dang /_/'di gang 'di las gyur lta ba/_/gang du yod min med min lta/_/bdag shi 'di tshe mya ngan 'das/_/gang 'dir phyogs tsam brten pa ni/_/gang ma yin pa ma yin nyid/_/phyogs log gol bar gang gyur pa/_/drug 
[\[263b.5\]]ste so so tha dad dang /_/spyir lta gang rig skyon med pa'o/_/rgyur lta byams pas dag par lta/_/'tsho ba bcos pas dag lta dang /_/rgyan la lham dang gos bcos pa/_/skra spungs bcas dang rgyan can dang /_/dka' thub sten pa drug pa'o/_/bslad pas 
[\[263b.6\]]'chal pa gang 'di la/_/brten pas bdag lta rten rtog dang /_/rten chags byin chags bkra shis mtshan/_/skyabs log yongs su 'chal pa'o/_/phyogs ltos gcod pa gang zhe na/_/phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa/_/gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa'o/_/gang 
[\[263b.7\]]'dir phyi rol rnam pa gsum/_/bye brag pa dang tha snyad pa/_/rang snang gcig phyogs gcod pa'o/_/yang dag phra dang zab pa dang /_/rgya che yangs pa de kho na/_/gsang sngags rig byed rig spyod dang /_/rigs sbyor dam par phyogs ltos gcod/_/gsang chen brtul 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]zhugs cher spyod dang /_/rgyal dbog pa dang rgyal thabs pa'o/_/zhar las byung ba gang 'di dag_/mtha' yas sde bcur rdzogs pa ste/_/gang mu zin pa de rtags 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi nye gnas so/_/lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang /_/
[\[264a.2\]]zhal nas byung ba ji lta ba/_/'jig rten sgron ma nub rjes na/_/gang dag mos pa tha dad pas/_/zhar las byung ba'ang de bzhin no/_/kun shes spyod pa'ang rnam pa gnyis/_/rim gyis pa dang gcig pa'o/_/rim gyis 'jug pa rnam gsum du/_/phyin ci ma log pa 
[\[264a.3\]]nyid dang /_/bsgrub spyod mngon rtogs gsum nyid do/_/'di yang khyad par rnam gnyis kyis/_/gsum gsum gnyis su dam pa yis/_/gsung ba khyod ci mi shes sam/_/des na che chung gnyis gsum drug_/sgrub pa zab pa phra ba gnyis/_/blo che zab pa dman pa 
[\[264a.4\]]nyid/_/spyod pa rlabs chen cha shas can/_/rgya che ba dang mtshan mar spyod/_/de ni gsang chen gsang bar bshad/_/mngon rtogs rnam gnyis phyi nang 'jug_/mi mthun phyogs kyi gal bzung nas/_/cha gnyis so sor 'dod pa 'byung /_/phyi rol bye brag tha 
[\[264a.5\]]snyad gnyis/_/cha gnyis gcig las rtsod pa 'byung /_/nad 'jug sems snang dbus mtha' med/_/phyi nang snrel zhir phyogs 'dzin cing /_/gang 'dir nges par gcod pa 'byung /_/mtha' dbus 'byed dang nges par 'jug_/gtan la 'bebs pa de 
[\[264a.6\]]bzhin 'byung /_/rang dang lta ba'i phyogs 'dzin cing /_/brtsod pas the tshom 'byung ba dang /_/dbus mtha' 'byed dang nges par 'jug_/gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung /_/cig car 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/bya dang bya thabs bya med pa/_/skyes dang 
[\[264a.7\]]ma skyes skye 'gag med/_/'di kun ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs/_/ma 'dres mkha' la gza' skar bkram/_/yongs su rdzogs pa mkha' khyab bdal/_/'ja' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres gcig_/rmongs rim cig car 'jug spyod pa/_/'dod pa'i yul la zhen spong dang /_/
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]spyod sgyur shes rtogs spyod dbang byed/_/shes pa 'jig rten rtog 'phags pa/_/spyod pa blo ldan dbang sgyur thabs/_/gang 'di'i snod kyang bzhir gzigs te/_/zhen chags log sred rigs rgyud can/_/blo gros can gyi snod rnams la/_/bstan bya rnam pa bzhir 
[\[264b.2\]]gsungs pa/_/'dod rkyen bkri drung brgyud pa'i tshig_/ldem dgongs don dam nges pa bzhi/_/snod kyi rkyen dang sbyar ba yin/_/'di kun shes bya'i gzhi gcig la/_/'dod pas mthong ba tha dad pa'o/_/'di ltar mthong sgo tha dad bzhin/_/rnam par snang 'byung 
[\[264b.3\]]bkod pa la/_/gang gis kun la zhugs bltas nas/_/gcig tu 'bebs pa dam pa'o/_/ji ltar bung ba khung tshol ba/_/kun du 'jug cing byung nas ni/_/rang gi gseng khung gang yin par/_/nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol 
[\[264b.4\]]ba/_/spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu/_/lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bsdur nas/_/don dam nges pa'i gsang nyid la'o/_/de nyid don gyi rjes gcad phyir/_/sgo mo kun nas bsdur ba yi/_/bslab par bya ba'i thabs yin te/_/goms par bya bar ba tu gces/_/lang 
[\[264b.5\]]ka'i bdag po de dag ni phyis 'byung bar snang ba'i sgo yongs su dbye ba yin te/_kun nas bsdur bar bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi sgo rang snang bar 
[\[264b.6\]]shes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs 
[\[264b.7\]]po dag mthar phyin par bya ba ni gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa ni bsam du med pa mthar phyin par bya'o/_/bsam du med pa ni sems kyi de kho na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o/_/sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid la mkhas na sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas na bsam du med pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[265a.2\]]bsam du med pa la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/_de ni dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa nyid du shes par bya'o/_/grogs po dag de bas 
[\[265a.3\]]na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis yongs su 'grel pa ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang /_bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/_/grogs po dag bya ba'i 
[\[265a.4\]]rnal 'byor yang gsum du shes par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_phyi'i rnal 'byor dang /_nang gi rnal 'byor dang /_phyi nang gi rnal 'byor ro/_/grogs po dag de la phyi'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /_de bzhin 
[\[265a.5\]]du chu rdo rje dang /_me rdo rje dang /_rlung rdo rje dang /_nam mkha' rdo rje dang /_gzugs rdo rje dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/_/grogs po dag 
[\[265a.6\]]nang gi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/_sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /_de bzhin du rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa la sogs pa gang zin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/_/grogs po 
[\[265a.7\]]dag phyi nang gi rnal 'byor gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad dang /_dkar po dang /_nag po dang /_nges pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_dman pa dang /_dam pa dang /_'byung ba dang /_mi 'byung ba dang /_byas pa dang /_ma byas pa dang /_bcas pa dang /_ma bcas pa dang /_
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]spyi mthun dang /_khyad par gyi rnam pa rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/_/grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba'i rnal 'byor du shes par bya'o/_/bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rten pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_mig dang /_
[\[265b.2\]]khyad par dang /_mi 'gyur ba dang /_rtsal gyis gnon pa dang /_kun nas rig pa'o/_/grogs po dag de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_sbyor ba dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_bskyod 
[\[265b.3\]]pa dang /_bsgyur ba dang /_rtsal dang /_'byung ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_sgo dang /_shes pa dang /_gnas dang /_rig pa dang /_lam dang /_'jug pa dang /_ye shes dang /_khyab pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa 
[\[265b.4\]]yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang mthong ba dang /_ma yengs pa dang /_don dang /_tshig dang /_sngags dang /_yi ge'i sgo rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/_/grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor du shes par 
[\[265b.5\]]bya'o/_/kye grogs po dag bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa dang /_bslab pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_rtog pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_ma nor ba dang /_nges pa dang /_dgongs pa dang /_ye shes dang /_tshogs dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_dngos grub dang /_ting nge 
[\[265b.6\]]'dzin dang /_chen po dang /_ye shes dang /_byung tshul dang /_che ba dang /_rol pa dang /_rngom pa dang /_brjid pa dang /_mthu dang /_cho 'phrul dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa dag dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid mthar phyin cing phul du gyur par bya'o/_/de yang ji lta 
[\[265b.7\]]zhe na/_grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_ji ltar mthon ri rtse dag la/_/sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na/_/mthon sar snang mthong kun gsal bas/_/thams cad kun snang lam la mkhas/_/de bzhin shes rab mthon ri la/_/brtson pa dam pas kun bltas na/_/kun 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gyi phul du shes rab phyin/_/mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do/_/don la mkhas par bya ba ste/_/phul du byung ba'i bslab pa ste/_/dgongs pa dam pa de nyid la/_/mkhas par bya ba rab tu gces/_/grogs po dag de dag ni mthar phyin par bya ba rab tu 
[\[266a.2\]]shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_/dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kun gyi phul du gyur par dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[266a.3\]]bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu dgu pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag thams cad du 'du bar byas pa ni 'di lta ste/_bya ba dang /_rang bzhin dang /_bsgyur bas so/_/grogs po dag de la bya 
[\[266a.4\]]ba ni bsdu ba'i bya bas so/_/rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis so/_/bsgyur bas 'dul bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_rgyu dang /_dus dang /_tshad dang /_grags pa dang /_gags dang /_rtags dang /_thob pa'o/_/grogs po dag de la rgyu ni yo byad chen po lnga kho na'o/_/dus ni 
[\[266a.5\]]mtha' bcu rdzogs pa dang /_nye bar dris pa dang /_rigs can 'du ba dang /_gsal ba thob pa dang /_las su rung ba dang /_mtshan ma 'byung ba dang /_mang po sngags pa dang /_nyams rnyed pa dang /_bya ba rdzogs pa'o/_/grogs po dag tshad ni 'di lta ste/_ded dpon dang /_
[\[266a.6\]]snga ltas dang /_smin pa'o/_/grogs po dag ded dpon gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_goms pa dang /_rig pa dang /_'du ba dang /_thob pa dang /_rdzogs pa'o/_/grogs po dag snga ltas ni 'di lta ste/_mthong ba dang /_'byor pa dang /_nus pa dang thos pa'o/_/grogs po dag smin pa ni 
[\[266a.7\]]'di lta ste/_mngon spyod dang /_mi bskyod pa'o/_/grogs po dag grags pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang chu bo bzhi'i rgyud du byung ba dang /_gang dag las 'phags pa dang /_gang dang ldan pa dang /_gang la mkhas pa dang /_gang thob pa nyid do/_/grogs po dag gags gang zhe na/_
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]'di lta ste/_thob pa dang /_mi chags pa dang /_mi gos pa dang /_sreg pa'o/_/rtags gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_grags pa dang /_'gyur ba dang /_btsan pa dang /_'byung ba'o/_/grogs po dag thob pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bskur bas thob pa dang /_rtsal gyis thob pa'o/_/
[\[266b.2\]]grogs po dag de yang 'di ltar thob par rig par bya ste/_gang 'dir snying rje'i yul rnams la/_/byin brlabs 'byung ba gang yang rung /_/'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag la/_/glegs bam bcu gnyis sbyin par bya/_/gang sbyor ba yi rnal 'byor la/_/nyi zla gnyis ni 
[\[266b.3\]]sbyin par bya/_/dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/rin chen bdun nyid nges par 'thob/_/lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/g.yung drung brgyad dag thob pa yin/_/rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/rtsal bcu'i khyad par de nyid 'thob/_/kun 
[\[266b.4\]]gyi bla ma dam pas ni/_/rtog stong 'bar ba bla med 'thob/_/dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang chen 'di/_/ma thos gzu lums rang bshad pas/_/rab 'byam bstan pa kun brtsal yang /_/dam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba/_/mang pos 
[\[266b.5\]]dbang por dpon bstabs te/_/'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis/_/kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba/_/chos kyi rgyal por dbang bstabs te/_/rtog stong 'bar ba la sogs pas/_/khyad par bla ma dam par 'gro/_/'di ni bla ma'i 
[\[266b.6\]]khyad par te/_/rgyal sar nges par 'byung ba yi/_/rtsal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i thabs/_/goms par bya ba rab tu gces/_/kye grogs po dag de dag ni thams cad 'du bar bya ba yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_dman pa dam 
[\[266b.7\]]pa dag lung dam pa bstan pa'i drod thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]dpa' rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag la dor bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_gang go cha gyon pa'i rjes su mi ldog par 'gro ba ste/_'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i rjes su ji snyed pa 'gro ba/_nam mkha'i rjes su 'byung ba 'gro ba bzhin sems nyid kyi rjes 
[\[267a.2\]]su sems las byung ba 'gro ba yin/_chos nyid kyi rjes su chos thams cad 'gro ba yin/_de bzhin du dgongs pa dam pa'i rjes su gang gsung ba dang /_gang mdzad pa thams cad 'gro bas na/_dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du gang du spyod 
[\[267a.3\]]pa de ltar ro/_/kye grogs po dag de yang 'di lta ste/_mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam/_/kun nas mi mnyam yongs su mnyam/_/gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyad par yang /_/gang dang don gyi mnyam par spyad/_/byin gyi brlabs kyis spyod pa 'am/_/dbang sgyur 
[\[267a.4\]]thabs kyi spyod pa ste/_/dper na nam mkha' rgyal po 'am/_/ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra/_/de yang de yul che chung gis/_/khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin/_/rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis/_/dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la/_/che chung rim pa yod pa bzhin/_/
[\[267a.5\]]rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang /_/thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang /_/bab tshod thad du 'jug pa ste/_/dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa/_/rab dang glang chen bab mi lta/_/de yang rtsal sgyid drag zhan gyis/_/la la thad du gcod pa la/_/la la chu yi gzhol 
[\[267a.6\]]phyogs so/_/de ltar rnal 'byor spyod 'jug pa/_/'bras bu don la bab gcod kyang /_/rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis/_/ji ltar nus tshad de spyod phyir/_/sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang /_/sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang /_/spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin 
[\[267a.7\]]dang /_/dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang /_/lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur nas/_/thams cad gcig las med na yang /_/grangs sam dbye ba grags phrag rnams/_/snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni/_/khyad par ci yang bstan pa yin/_/de yang rtsal gyi khyad par 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gyis/_/dang po las kyi khyad par las/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams/_/rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni/_/rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul/_/spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa/_/sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang /_/
[\[267b.2\]]btsal ba'i yul ni chad ma yin/_/nor bu las kyi 'phang dmas pa/_/rang skal 'tsho ba'i tshod bor nas/_/rgyal po thabs kyis 'phang mtho ba'i/_/longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang /_/de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral zhing /_/skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag_/
[\[267b.3\]]skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o/_/de phyir dgongs pa kun 'dus la/_/gang 'dir rnal 'byor dman don du/_/gso dang sbyong ba'i spyod pa dag_/dman pa dag dang mnyam par gsungs/_/gso dang bslang ba'i rtog pa 'di/_/rtog pa can dang mthun par 
[\[267b.4\]]spyad/_/gso ba rtog pas zin pa'i nad/_/lta spyod nyams pa'i sman gyis gso/_/shi bslang ba yi rtog pa 'di/_/khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa rnams/_/rtag chad mthar shi ro gling nas/_/gti mug bam chen ro blangs te/_/skye 'gag med par blang ba'i phyir/_/
[\[267b.5\]]ro la yid bzhin nor bu yi/_/sngags kyis btab ste gnon par bya/_/ro yi gnyen por bdag gyur nas/_/ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas/_/ro yi gzi byin byung ba na/_/bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus bya/_/ro de 'gul bar gyur pa dang /_/gang gi 'gyur rtsis 
[\[267b.6\]]byug par bya/_/ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas/_/bzlas pa drag po rgyun mi gcad/_/gang der langs par gyur pa dang /_/cho 'phrul 'jigs tshal ston par byed/_/brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis/_/de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas/_/ro la brdabs na gser du 
[\[267b.7\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi/_/rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur/_/lce bshad ral gri mtshon cha dang /_/ro yi mgo bo gcad pa des/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste/_/mgo thod go char bzung nas ni/_/lce yi ral gri mtshon thogs nas/_/lha min g.yul 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]yang bzlog par 'gyur/_/ro langs grub pa'i rkang 'gyogs ni/_/dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste/_/skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa yis/_/phyogs bzhir bltas te dus gcig tu/_/mda' 'phangs sa lam babs par/_/mtha' blangs skad cig 
[\[268a.2\]]'jig rten bskor/_/skyes bu lag tshod ma yal bar/_/de ma thag tu gnas su slebs/_/yud ltar shin tu myur ba 'thob/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/_/ro la 'dod pa thams cad 'byung /_/ro la ror bsgrubs ro grub na/_/ro yi dngos po mi snang bar/_/gang 
[\[268a.3\]]ltar bsgrubs pa de snang phyir/_/ro la rnam rtog ga la yod/_/ro la ro yi rang bzhin dag_/med par shes pas thag chod bzhin/_/spyod pas de ltar mnyam spyad na/_/lta spyod mnyam zhes dam pas bshad/_/'di ni shi ba slong ba yi/_/bdud rtsi dam pa'i spyod 
[\[268a.4\]]pa'o zhes/_/dgongs pa dam pa'i kun 'dus gsungs/_/grogs po dag de dag ni shi ba slong ba'i rtog pa yongs su spyod par shes par bya'o/_/grogs po dag de la sbyong ba'i spyod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rtog pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba dang /_rgyud yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/
[\[268a.5\]]de la rtog pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba ni gang rtog pa'i dngos po sbyong ba'o/_/grogs po dag rgyud yongs su sbyang ba ni bkod pa'i bya bas sbyang ba dang /_me'i bya bas sbyang ba'o/_/de la bkod pa'i bya bas sbyang ba gang zhe na/_brtsam pa las kyi dang po dang /_/dam pa'i don la 
[\[268a.6\]]'jug pa na/_thabs mchog lngas ni sbyang bar bya/_/rdo rje dus tshigs bsnyen pa dang /_/gang 'dir nye bar bsgrub pa dang /_/sgrub po chen pos sbyor ba la/_/grangs dus mtshan mar bcas par bya/_/rnal 'byor bcad pa'i bka' sgo 'dir/_/gsang sgo mi dbye skrag 
[\[268a.7\]]par 'gyur/_/ci phyir dang po yin pas na/_/byis pa blo shed ma bye ba/_/ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis/_/theg chen don las gol bar 'gyur/_/gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag_/'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang /_/'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ste/_/ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar/_/rdo rje thabs chen tshom bu lnga/_/rdo rje 'dzin tshogs bcu drug ldan/_/dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/_/bri bya yang na bsam pa'am/_/brjod dam dngos sam mtshan ma la/_/'jig rten dbang po chos lugs kyis/_/
[\[268b.2\]]mos pa la bskyed dran byas te/_/rang bzhin yul las phan nas ni/_/phyag bya la sogs mchod na ni/_/rdo rje dman dang rtsir sbyar ba/_/yo byad chen po la sogs pas/_/rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs la dbul/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te/_/mnyes byas las grub 
[\[268b.3\]]grangs rdzogs nas/_/mnyes nas rgyud sbyangs 'dod par bya/_/snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag_/dbang mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis/_/'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol/_/rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga yis/_/bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rigs par/_/rtsal gyi rnam 
[\[268b.4\]]par byin nas kyang /_/rdo rje gal chen mna' bor ro/_/de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams/_/ji ltar 'dod pa nan tan gyis/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor dka' bya'o/_/mi nus la sogs mi snang ba'i/_/rdo rje'i tshig gis nan chags bya/_/rmongs pa gang phyir sems bskyed de/_/ngo 
[\[268b.5\]]mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur/_/shes rab mig can shes bya'i yul/_/thams cad rim bzhin bstan par bya/_/drod can blo dkyel che rnams la/_/rnal 'byor nang par gsang sgo dbye/_/rtsing po 'gros kyi dmu rgod la/_/gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams 
[\[268b.6\]]bstan/_/rdo rje lung gi tshig can la/_/ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur/_/rtsal med mi nus gang dag la/_/phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin/_/gnas 'dir gsal dang mi gsal dag_/'od mi dbab cing ljid mi dbab/_/rdo rje blo yi yul can la/_/rtsal chen 
[\[268b.7\]]sbyong zhes gdam par bya/_/rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du/_/rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher/_/rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye/_/so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dag_/spyi 'am yang na re re'o/_/gzhan yang shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs/_/ji ltar thabs kyi tshogs sbyor ltar/_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams/_/rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa/_/lha mo tshogs su bkod nas kyang /_/gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa/_/thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar sbas/_/rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la/_/mnyam pa'i mchod 
[\[269a.2\]]pas mnyes par bya/_/bro gar glu tshig la sogs pas/_/rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub/_/gzhan yang dus bzhi mnyam rig na/_/dus zhes bya bar ga la rigs/_/dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na/_/de nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no/_/rdo rje lha mo dus kyi 
[\[269a.3\]]tshogs/_/'das dang da ltar byung ba dang /_/mi 'byung ma nges cha rnams la/_/dbang sgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams/_/'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang /_/stongs par gyur pa de dag tu/_/rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang /_/sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi/_/shes rab 'khor 
[\[269a.4\]]dang dam pa'i dkyil/_/ji ltar rim par rdo rje yi/_/glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis/_/mchod dang 'jug tshul ji lta bar/_/cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar/_/lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o/_/bde ba chen po la sogs pa/_/tshom bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams/_/spyir 
[\[269a.5\]]ram re rer sbyar bar bya'o/_/'das pa rnam thar tshogs bskrun te/_/da ltar 'byung dang mi 'byung la/_/tshad med sems dang rnam thar bskrun/_/de ni mnyam pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rnal 'byor byang chub sems/_/rdzogs pa bcu drug zla rgyas tshul/_/snying 
[\[269a.6\]]rje ye shes shar ba na/_/mkha' la nyi shar tshul bzhin du/_/dam pa'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/yang dag nges pa'i sa pa yin/_/bcu gsum la la bgrod pa ni/_/rdo rje dus kyi rgyun tshogs sbyar/_/skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba/_/bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs 
[\[269a.7\]]pa bzhin/_/bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa/_/bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas na/_/brjes pa'i zla ba bcu drug gis/_/nyi gsal 'od kyi phyag rgya la/_/mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de/_/bcu drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pa bskrun/_/rdzogs pa nyid na mi dmigs 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]pa/_/de bzhin nyid du sbyangs pas na/_/mnyam pas stong par gyur pa la/_/thams cad chos skur rdzogs byang chub/_/sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de/_/rmad byung sems bskyed las chen spyad/_/phra mo drod du gyur pa na/_dam pa spyad na nyi ma 'char/_/dus 'di rgyun 
[\[269b.2\]]gyi bar chad na/_/snyan pa dag gis bzlog par dka'/_/bar chad byung na bskang gso bya/_/mkha' la zla gsal grwa rgyas bzhin/_/sa la rnal 'byor grwa rgyas spyad/_/gang 'di rgyas na bsod nams dang /_/bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya/_/des ni nyi zla zhon 'gro ba'i/_/
[\[269b.3\]]rig 'dzin sa la gnas phan chad/_/bde chen bcu gsum sa la 'grub/_/gzhan yang rgyun du bya ba ni/_/chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te/_/rgyal ba sku gsung thugs su snang /_/sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag_/yi ge phreng ba nyid la rdzogs/_/yi ge phyag rgya'i 
[\[269b.4\]]ye shes rnams/_/rgyun gyi rgyun du bya ba yin/_/des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob/_/rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa/_/rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la/_/yi ge'i tshogs ni bskyed sbyar la/_/mchod bsnyen bcas sbyar de bzhin no/_/'di ni don dam nye ba'i lam/_/dam pa bskrun 
[\[269b.5\]]par 'gyur phyir ro/_/'dir ni rgyun gyi rgyun tshogs des/_/dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings/_/thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'di/_/rdo rje rdo rje yin pas na/_/rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pas ni/_/thams cad 'byung bas dbyings zhes 
[\[269b.6\]]bya/_/rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin rdzogs bcas/_/'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te/_/gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas/_/ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar byas na/_/ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni/_/'dod pa'i khams ltar mnyam par gsungs/_/gzhan yang gang 
[\[269b.7\]]du gang 'brel pa'i/_/gsang chen dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/_/phan tshun dra bas 'brel pa la/_/stong nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/_/sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang /_/gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel/_/rnal 'byor chen 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]po'i yul de nyid/_/rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo ba/_/'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya'o/_/gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams ni/_/blo gros chen po thabs ldan pas/_/mi skrag dga' ba'i ngo mtshar skye/_/gsang chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/_/
[\[270a.2\]]rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas/_/lnga gnyis zung du 'khril ba ni/_/g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril tshul sbyor/_/g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang /_/rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o/_/g.yon nyid sgra brnyan dril bu dang /_/rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la/_/'phyo zhing 
[\[270a.3\]]'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas/_/chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/seng chen g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa/_/sems pa dman pa'i lus khri la/_/rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te/_/kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar ba/_/
[\[270a.4\]]bcu gsum cha lugs bsgegs pa rnams/_/rim gyis sam ni cig car bskyed/_/gang 'dir 'dod khams chags zhen pa'i/_/dbang po rim par sbyang bar bya/_/de min yab yum yang mi dmigs/_/gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang /_/gnas 'gyur 
[\[270a.5\]]ba yi rang bzhin gyis/_/phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal mor bcas/_/brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'byung sbyor/_/sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje/_/byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal/_/nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni/_/bzhi gnyis dag gis mnyer sbyor ba/_/bsam bya la 
[\[270a.6\]]sogs de bzhin no/_/rdo rje sgo dang bcas par ni/_/rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs/_/rnal 'byor longs spyod cher sbyar bas/_/mnyes nas sbyar phyir rim bzhin dbul/_/gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis/_/gsang ba'i don rnams bsgrub par bya/_/
[\[270a.7\]]'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba mthun/_/thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi/_/rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs/_/mdza' 'phrod rkyen dang dgyes sbyor ldan/_/lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril/_/ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad/_/skad cig yud tsam thang cig 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]gam/_/yud tsam nyin gcig zla re 'am/_/lo yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi/_/dus la bab pa'i dus chen dag_/byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin/_/ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams/_/dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis/_/gtsang ma kha zas la sogs dang /_/rnam rtog 
[\[270b.2\]]nad 'joms bdud rtsi rnams/_/rgyal ba'i tshogs dang 'byung po la/_/ji ltar 'byor ldan nan tan bya/_/bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang /_/chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i/_/skyon bzhi spangs te bzlog tshul sbyar/_/rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur/_/gdung ba'i 
[\[270b.3\]]'du shis nyer gzhag ste/_/ji bzhin 'dod ltar bde bar sbyar/_/lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang /_/bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang /_/don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir/_/las 'di spyad par shin tu gces/_/'di dag blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i/_/mdun du 
[\[270b.4\]]brjod par bya ba'i rigs/_/rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang /_/cis 'dul de ltar rtsal dang sbyar/_/des na las 'di khyad par yang /_/tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te/_/bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas/_/bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin 
[\[270b.5\]]pa'o/_/de skad sems dpa' rdo rje des/_/'dus pa phal mo che la bshad/_/'dus pa kun gyi don mthong ba/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa de la gsol/_/sems dpa' chen po bdag cag gis/_/chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/_/thabs nyid shes rab nyid bkod 
[\[270b.6\]]dang /_/kun nas mnyam dang bcu drug cha/_/yi ge tshogs dang 'byung ba'i dbyings/_/gnyis med dra bar 'brel la sogs/_/rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du/_/snang bar nges par mthong lags so/_/de skad gsol pas des gsungs pa/_/gang 'dir 
[\[270b.7\]]'dus pa'i tshogs med kun/_/ji ltar mthong ba de ltar yin/_/ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin nyid/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de kho na/_/dgongs pa dam pa lhun grub pa/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid/_/de dag rtsa ba sems nyid pas/_/sems can gzugs 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal/_/rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du/_/thams cad ye nas zhugs bkod rdzogs/_/de las khyad par skal ldan mi/_/spyod yul gyur pa gzugs brnyan te/_/ras 'jam khod snyoms bzang la sogs/_/kha dog 
[\[271a.2\]]lnga 'am nyi shu lngas/_/ma mthong rmongs la bsten phyir mtshon/_/ma nyams mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur/_/bsten zhing des 'jam khang bu la/_/kha dog 'bar bar gzugs mtshon te/_/phyag rgya ma nyams mdzes ldan na/_/mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ston par nus/_/
[\[271a.3\]]gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs la/_/gang blugs rgyal ba'i sku byas te/_/phyag rgya ma nyams dang ldan na/_/de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/_/shel rdo dung la sogs pa la/_/'bur las rgyal ba'i sku byas na/_/de bzhin ma nyams rgyas mdzad na/_/mtshan 
[\[271a.4\]]ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur/_/blag sha byang chub shing sogs la/_/mkhas pas bzor bzhogs gzugs brnyan gyis/_/phyag rgya ma nyams kun rdzogs na/_/'di yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/_/sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas/_/kha dog mdzes dang ldan byas la/_/
[\[271a.5\]]mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten yin te/_/mtshan mas mtshan ma grol rig pa/_/gang dag sa las rgyal ba'i dbyibs/_/kun du lham par byas pa la/_/tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes bkod na/_/rnam grol rig pa'i rten du 'gyur/_/gang gi gzugs brnyan gang yin dang /_/de yi 
[\[271a.6\]]rang bzhin gcig pas na/_/'di la khyad par cung zad med/_/'di yis rnam grol rig par 'gyur/_/bder gshegs pho brang gang yang rung /_/dkyil 'khor tshul du gang byed pa/_/yid 'ong mtshan ldan dben phyogs su/_/kun nas lham par mdzes byas la/_/srad bu brgyad dang 
[\[271a.7\]]ldan byas te/_/bsdu ba'i bya bas mdzes byas pa/_/de nas srad bu gcig gis bskor/_/dkyil 'khor tshul du gyur pa dang /_/nang du lham bu srad bu brgyad/_/le'u tshe ldan pa dgur 'gyur te/_/mtha' zad sum char byas pa la/_/kun gyi nang du srad bu gsum/_/phra mo dag 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gis mdzes par brgyan/_/dgu yi char ni bgos pa la/_/sgo dang sgo khyud sum cha bya/_/ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas la/_/rin chen ka ba'i nang logs su/_/sangs rgyas pho brang dbu rtser bya/_/bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo/_/rim pa gsum gyis mdzes pa la/_/rta 
[\[271b.2\]]babs them skas kyis kyang brgyan/_/dbus kyi pho brang le'u tshe 'am/_/'khor lo dpal be'u pad+ma dang /_/rin chen zur brgyad la sogs pa/_/ji ltar rigs pa de bzhin bri/_/rgyan ni rin chen sna tshogs dang /_/pany+tsa ra ka twa ra na/_/phreng ba dang ni dra bas brgyan/_/za ra tshags 
[\[271b.3\]]dang chun 'phyang dang /_/dril bu g.yer ka the'u chung 'phyang /_/rol mo sgra sgrogs lha yi bu/_/mang pos phyi nang nam mkha' las/_/mchod pa sna tshogs 'bul ba bri/_/theg chen gdung bzhes rab brgyan te/_/rin chen kha bad mchod rten dang /_/rgyal mtshan rin chen 'od 
[\[271b.4\]]'bar bas/_/gzhal yas mdzes par brgyan pa ni/_/chos kyi pho brang ci 'dra bar/_/de 'dra de nyid mtshon par bri/_/gzhal yas khang du gang rgyur ba/_/kun gyis mdzes dang legs par brgyan/_/mchod pa bla na yod med kun/_/ji ltar 'byor ltar nan tan dbul/_/
[\[271b.5\]]rgyal srid longs spyod bcas pa dang /_/glu bro gar dang rol mor bcas/_/dug 'joms sman dang bdud rtsi rnams/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho snyed la dbul/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi mchod sbyar bas/_/rgyud byang thams cad mnyam par 'gyur/_/de skad smras pas 'dus pa kun/_/
[\[271b.6\]]thams cad rgyud byang rnam grol rig_/grogs po dag de dag ni bkod pa'i bya bas yongs su sbyang bar shes par bya'o/_/grogs po dag 'di la me'i bya bas yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad chos nyid du sbyang ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad 
[\[271b.7\]]me'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ste/_shin tu ngam nas ngo mtshar du bstod pa/_/e ma'o sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/che ba'i che ba byin brlabs che/_/ting 'dzin chen po 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]snang ba che/_/cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che/_/thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ste/_/chos kun me dpung 'bar bar snang /_/de nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong /_/'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pa ni/_/mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs/_/bde 
[\[272a.2\]]chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par/_/dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags/_/'bar ba chen po a la la/_/gzi brjid zer 'phro a la la/_/mtha' yas kun sdud a la la/_/thams cad sreg byed a la la/_/za byed chen po a la la/_/mtha' dang dbus med a 
[\[272a.3\]]la la/_/thugs rje bde mchog a la la/_/dbang phyug 'jigs byed a la la/_/gsang mchog rmad 'byung byin brlabs kyis/_/me yi rang bzhin chen po dag_/bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol/_/de skad 'dus pas gsol pa las/_/de nyid dgyes 
[\[272a.4\]]pas 'di skad du/_/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag_/nges par bshad kyis gus par nyon/_/khyad par bla ma'i lam mchog 'dis/_/rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas/_/rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsregs sbyangs/_/don grub 
[\[272a.5\]]las kyi mchog tu sbyangs/_/ji bzhin pa yi hom khung du/_/ji snyed pa yi yam shing la/_/de bzhin nyid kyi me byung bas/_/thams cad thams cad bsregs sbyangs thim/_/skye med rnam dag hom khung du/_/skye ba rnam bzhi'i yam shing la/_/ma skyes spros bral 
[\[272a.6\]]me byung bas/_/mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/_/bsam du med pa'i hom khung du/_/bsam gyis mi khyab yam shing la/_/'od dpag med pa'i me byung bas/_/mtha' yas rdul snyed bsregs sbyangs thim/_/chos nyid rnam dag hom khung du/_/chos 
[\[272a.7\]]can sna tshogs yam shing la/_/stong nyid ye shes me 'bar bas/_/dngos po'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/_/sems nyid rnam dag hom khung du/_/sems can skye 'gro yam shing la/_/rang 'byung ye shes me 'bar bas/_/'khor ba'i bag chags bsregs 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]sbyangs thim/_/kun gzhi b+ha ga'i hom khung du/_/nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la/_/ye shes lnga yi me byung bas/_/gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs sbyangs thim/_/snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du/_/'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la/_/phyag rgya 'bar ba'i me byung bas/_/
[\[272b.2\]]snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim/_/rnam bzhi las kyi hom khung du/_/bzhi 'am bzhi yi yam shing la/_/rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i me byung bas/_/mchod sbyin dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim/_/'di yang so so'i khyad par gyis/_/phyogs dang kha dog 
[\[272b.3\]]dbyibs dang rdzas/_/gang ltar rigs pa de ltar sbyar/_/shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar/_/mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar/_/zlum po pad+ma le'u tshe bzhi/_/'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas/_/zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang /_/gru gsum b+ha ga'i mkha' mngon 
[\[272b.4\]]spyod/_/gsum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes/_/las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis brgyan/_/ye shes rdo rje las rgyud ldan/_/bla ma gsum gyi thabs mchog sbyar/_/dag pa'i mtha' mnyes mchog 'dzin pa/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar/_/mchod pa nges pa'i 
[\[272b.5\]]'byor tshogs sbyar/_/rdo rje las kyi byin brlabs sbyor/_/gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas/_/bsher btab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang /_/rgyas dang dbang bshad rgyud bshad pas/_/lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang /_/de bzhin glu yi rgyud 'byor bya/_/rigs kyi rigs 
[\[272b.6\]]rgyud lnga rnams ni/_/so so rigs su bsher btab ste/_/klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du/_/dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/_/sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os/_/dpag med rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/_/che ba sngags pa'i yon tan dag_/rdo rje glu yis 
[\[272b.7\]]brjod nas kyang /_/mnyes par bya ba'i thabs chen brtsam/_/mnyes pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang /_/gang yang ma byang don chen rnams/_/grub dang ma grub de rnams dag_/mi la mkhas pas brtag par bya/_/me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis/_/'bar tshul 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]gnyis dang dbyibs rnams drug_/de dag yongs su shes par bya/_/gal te mtshan la mi sdug na/_/yid du mi 'ong rtags yin pas/_/sreg sbyang chen pos rgyas par bya/_/de nas yid 'ong 'dod 'byung ba/_/me la 'dod pa'i mtshan ma rnams/_/rnam 
[\[273a.2\]]gsum gang ltar 'grub pa blang /_/'dus pa chen po gzhan yang gang /_/ro yi rdzas rnams sreg sbyang na/_/ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang /_/shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/_/ro la byug cing bkru bar bya/_/bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis/_/ras la byugs pas 
[\[273a.3\]]ro dkris pas/_/ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par/_/sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas/_/phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa gang /_/de yi mtshan pa'i phyag rgya rnams/_/gang du bkod pa de nyid du/_/snying po grangs kyang de ltar 
[\[273a.4\]]bya/_/snying po dag la so so yi/_/ma nor rtsa ba'i yig 'bru dag_/ras sam shing la bris te dgod/_/ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang /_/ro yi phyi rgyab thams cad du/_/nyon mongs 'khor ba kun bkod de/_/ras sam shing shun gang dag la/_/'khor ba'i sa bon thams 
[\[273a.5\]]cad dgod/_/nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas/_/skye bzhi las lnga rgyud drug rnams/_/ming dang gzugs su byas nas ni/_/gnas gnas dag tu dgod par bya/_/sa bon 'du byed dngos po lnga/_/gzung 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams/_/brda yi tshul du bkod 
[\[273a.6\]]nas ni/_/ro rnams khyab par dgod par bya/_/de nas ro yi phung po de/_/rten nas glegs ma stegs bu yi/_/steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya/_/thab kyi cho ga bya ba yang /_/maN Dal khor yug ran tsam la/_/brko dang kha khyer lugs bzhin bya/_/phyag rgya bzhugs 
[\[273a.7\]]pa'i pho brang dag_/thig gis yul gtsad so sor dbye/_/de yi steng du bsreg shing brtsigs/_/dbyibs ni rigs bzhir gtams pa la/_/grwa zur ka bas brtan par brten/_/sum brtseg yang thog bar khang bcas/_/tha ma yam shing brdzangs pas gtams/_/
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bar khang dag gi glegs bam la/_/ro yi bzhin phyogs ro bzhir bstan/_/ro yi steng khang yang thog tu/_/ras la sogs la bris pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod/_/ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la/_/rdo rje gzungs kyi rgyud thag bzhis/_/btags nas bla 
[\[273b.2\]]ma'i phyag tu phul/_/shing gi bya ba rdzogs pa dang /_/de yi phyi mtha' stegs bu la/_/rnam bzhi las kyi lha rnams dgod/_/stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_/rdo rje las kyi sgos btab pa/_/rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la/_/'khor ba sreg par mnga' gsol te/_/mi g.yo 
[\[273b.3\]]me chen rtse gcig pas/_mi yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya/_/rdo rje sngags kyi las sbyar la/_/rnam bzhi las kyi mnga' gsol te/_/las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya/_/bla ma rdo rje dam pa zhig_/ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas/_/las kyis bsags pa bgrang zhing 
[\[273b.4\]]gshegs/_/skabs sbyor rdo rje bla ma yis/_/bla med mchod pa rgyun du bya/_/bro gar glu tshig stabs chen gyis/_/mchod pa rol mo sna tshogs dbul/_/rdo rje las kyi smon lam gdab/_/mchod skabs las kyi mjug tu bya/_/rdo rje las kyi lta 'dzin pas/_/dkar byang 
[\[273b.5\]]las kyi lta bzung ste/_/legs mtha' dam pa rnams la dbul/_/ro yi nyes mtha' gang 'dzin pas/_/mtshan ma nag po bud shing dag_/ye shes me yi klong du sreg_/me sbyor me la gnas pa'i lha/_/me yi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/_/me yi lha mo gos dkar 
[\[273b.6\]]mo/_/rgyal ba kun gyi 'od yin te/_/'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur zhing /_/thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin/_/srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis 'ches/_/dngos po sreg pa'i phrin las ni/_/thugs dam dbang gis yang mi 'da'/_/gang gi sgrib sreg de nyid mkhyen/_/
[\[273b.7\]]ro yi rnam shes byang ma byang /_/me la mkhas pas de bzhin brtag_/mi sdug tshul 'byung sreg sbyang bya/_/gal te legs na me dbang bskur/_/thal ba sku gdung ring bsrel dang /_/phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la sogs bya/_/dam pa zhig na gdung btags te/_/bla ma'i 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rten du dbul bar bya/_/'di ni sbyor ba kun gyi mchog_/de skad sems dpa' mchog des smras/_/grogs po dag de dag ni me'i bya bas yongs su shes par bya'o/_/rdo rje gsang ba chos kyi spun/_/me yi bya ba las byung ba/_/gdung zhes grags pa'i sha ri ram/_/dpag med 
[\[274a.2\]]ji srid dus dag nas/_/grangs med sprul pa'i rgyal ba dag_/mya ngan 'das par gyur phyi na/_/med pa las byung sku gdung ni/_/sku yi gdung dang ring bsrel zhes/_/'gro ba'i bsod nams rten du grags/_/rgyal ba rnams ni dngos med pas/_/sku gdung ring bsrel mi 
[\[274a.3\]]srid na/_/sems can rnams la phan don du/_/med las thugs rje'i cho 'phrul bzhag_/de bzhin gang du gang byung ba'i/_/gang 'dir snang ba sgron ma dag_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung yang /_/sha ri ram zhes grags par 'gyur/_/de yi las kyang de bzhin no/_/de 
[\[274a.4\]]la sogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/rang 'byung rjes gnas 'byung bcas rnams/_/tshul mthun gcig par gyur pa yi/_/sku gdung sa bon byin brlabs kyi/_/yon tan cha las rtsir 'phel ba/_/'dzam gling sa khams khyab par snang /_/gdung las byung phyir sra mkhregs zlum/_
[\[274a.5\]]tha skad rdo rje rab tu grags/_/lgang bu zur gsum til lgang 'dra/_/gzhon tshe'i mar ram 'o mar snang /_/nar son smin rtags sra zhing mkhregs/_/tsa na ka yi 'bru bzhin du/_/dkar la tsan dmar kha dog gsal/_/zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/bdud rtsi sman gyi 
[\[274a.6\]]mchog tu grags/_/de bzhin rig 'dzin sems dpa' rnams/_/mi yi lus su sprul pa dang /_/gang zag sa pa chos mig ldan/_/bsod nams dpal zhing dag pa dag_/sdong bu snying por sbyangs phyi na/_/skal ba can la snang ba ni/_/la la dag la sha ri ram/_/la la dag la 
[\[274a.7\]]ring bsrel sku/_/skal ngan dag la snang mi 'gyur/_/la la snang bar gyur na yang /_/sbyor ba dag la yun du rtag_/ma dag nub cing 'bros par 'gyur/_/yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong ba'i/_/'byung ba'i ltas ni ston par byed/_/yod par rtag pa ma yin la/_/med pa rlag par yang 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]mi 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor las dang 'byor ba rnams/_/dag dang ma dag tshul la sbyor/_/de yang bsod nams dag pa yis/_/gang lam rgya cher mos pa dang /_/rnal 'byor rtse gcig rmog btud na/_/rdo rjes sbrel dang las mthun na/_/rgyud rnams yongs su dag la 'bab/_/de yang 
[\[274b.2\]]khyad par rim pas ni/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung sha ri ram/_/zhing khams kun du khyab par ni/_/mgar dang bzos ni bzlums pa bzhin/_/byas pa med las snang ba dag_/dkar 'tsher mdog gsal 'dzag 'dra ba/_/tsan dmar mdangs su gsal ba yi/_/nam mkha' gang bar 
[\[274b.3\]]char bzhin 'bab/_/rig 'dzin sems dpa' sprul pa'i gdung /_/dka' gsal 'ga' 'ga' tsam du 'byung /_/gang zag sa pa'i rtags chen ni/_/mdog mnyam gcig gsum gnyis gsum gcig_/la lar lnga 'am bcu 'byung zhing /_/yon tan de ni de ltar ro/_/de 
[\[274b.4\]]yang sra mkhregs rdo rje 'dra/_/lcags kyi gtun gyis yang mi chogs/_/'di dag phebs pa'i yon tan yang /_/gang dang gang du babs pa yi/_/yul khams de dag thams cad du/_/nad dang mi ngas bgegs rnams zhi/_/gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs pa/_/drag po gtum po'ang 
[\[274b.5\]]lhan ner 'gyur/_/rgyal po 'khrugs dang khams 'khrugs dang /_/yul khams 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur/_/'bras bu lo tog 'phel smin cing /_/yid du 'ong ba thams cad 'byung /_/yul de dmangs dang rgyal po yi/_/sa bon thams cad bu phor 'gyur/_/bder bcas 
[\[274b.6\]]mtshan ldan rigs mthon ni/_/bu pho kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'di dag su la 'chad pa rnams/_/rig 'dzin sa dang skal ba mnyam/_/'jig rten 'di yi bsod nams kyang /_/'khor los sgyur rgyal dag dang mnyam/_/de yi dgongs pa kun du 'grub/_/tshe dang skongs 
[\[274b.7\]]dang las 'grub 'gyur/_/phyin cad bla med byang chub ni/_/sa la reg pa'i rtags chen yin/_/gzhan yang yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/de dag rang gi rang bzhin du/_/gnas pa'i yon tan de dag go/_/bsgrubs na yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/sems can rnam pa thams 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]cad la/_/byang chub snying po nyid yod pas/_/me yi las kyi bya ba yis/_/lnga phung sbyangs na med mi srid/_/'di dag bsgrub par bya ba yang /_/shel gyi za ma tog nang du/_/bsdus te phyag rgya'i rgyas btab nas/_/shel gyi ga'u'i nang du bca'/_/bsgrub 
[\[275a.2\]]pas de la smon lam dang /_/sgrib sbyang gso la 'phro 'du bya/_/'phro 'du bya ba'i cho ga yang /_/nam mkha' gang ba'i sha ri ram/_/zhing khams gang ba'i rgyal ba las/_/char gyi rgyun bzhin de la 'bab/_/rtse gcig bzlas pa gsung gi rgyun/_/ma hA sha ri ram gyi li 
[\[275a.3\]]hU~M/_/grangs med bar chad med par bzlas/_/mchog tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba dang /_/'od kyi zer phreng nyi zer bzhin/_/zang zing brang breng snang bar 'gyur/_/za ma tog gi phyi rol na/_/gsal ba de la 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'gul zhing mang por 'phel ba dang /_/rgyal ba 
[\[275a.4\]]sems dpa' rig 'dzin gyis/_/gzugs brnyan shel dang de las ni/_/gsal bar bdag la ston par 'gyur/_/dang po snod de khengs pa yin/_/gnyis pa phyed dam brgya rtsa brgyad/_/tha ma'ang grangs 'gas 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de dag grub pa rtags chen te/_/de tshe 
[\[275a.5\]]dngos grub blang bar bya/_/thob pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/tshe 'dir rig 'dzin sa la gnas/_/rgyal ba dag dang mnyam par 'gyur/_/zhar las byung ba'i yon tan yang /_/'gro ba kun gyi don spyod pa/_/sems dpa' che ltar 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyun du de la mchod 
[\[275a.6\]]dgos te/_/mchod na yon tan dam pa 'byung /_/mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yang /_/sgrib sbyangs bsod nams dpung bskyed de/_/rang rgyud dag par byas nas ni/_/zla ba dus ni thams cad kyi/_/bcu drug cha la rdzogs pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid gcig pu sems yul du/_/gyur par 
[\[275a.7\]]byas nas mchod pa ni/_/za ma tog dang bcas pa dag_/rgyal mtshan rtse mor btags byas te/_/ji ltar 'dod par smon lam btab/_/des ni 'dod pa thams cad skongs/_/de ni rnal 'byor skal ldan gyis/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/_/rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i rdzas 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]mchog tu/_/ming gis med du mi rung ngo /_/ji ltar ro dag gser 'gyur dang /_/de bzhin me yis bsregs sbyangs bzhin/_/dngos por spyod pa ji snyed pa/_/de nyid dam pa la mi g.yo/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas spyod/_/dngos po bzhi la gnas spyod pa/_/rdo rje sems 
[\[275b.2\]]dpa'i chos nyid de/_/spyod pa rmad 'byung dam pa yi/_/ji ltar glang po chur zhugs pa/_/thogs chags 'jigs pa yong med par/_/dga' ba'i longs spyod brod tshul gyis/_/mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar/_/rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa yang /_/brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'i 
[\[275b.3\]]chur 'jug pa/_/rtsal chen sbyong ba'i brod tshul gyis/_/thogs chags med par la dor ba'o/_/spyod pa gang bar bya ba'i thabs/_/goms pa klong du gyur pa gces/_/grogs po dag de dag ni la dor bar shes par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo
