[\[275b.4\]]chen po las rnal 'byor spyod 'jug gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag gang gis gcad par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[275b.5\]]zhe na/_dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig bslabs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bslabs pa'o/_/de kho na nyid gcig la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'o/_/de kho na nyid de la goms na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sgom pa'o/_/de kho na 
[\[275b.6\]]nyid de las ma 'das na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dam pa bsrungs pa'o/_/de kho na nyid de la zhugs na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o/_/de kho na nyid de la spyod na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yo byad la spyod pa'o/_/de kho na nyid mngon du byas na bsam 
[\[275b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i rgya mtsho snyed byas pa'o/_/de kho na nyid de ma nor bar bstan na chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa bstan pa'o/_/de kho na nyid de phyin ci ma log par thos na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi sgo thos pa'o/_/de kho na nyid de mngon du gyur na/_dpag tu med 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]pa'i rgyal ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag thams cad kyi bcud du bya ba 'am snying por bya ba ni de kho na nyid de de las med pa'i phyir ro/_/grogs po dag de bas na 'di ltar/_de bzhin nyid kyi don mthong na/_/mthong bas thams cad 
[\[276a.2\]]sgyu ma yin/_/de nyid go 'phang mchog 'phags na/_/bla med mtho btsun mtha' dag [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_/de bzhin nyid du nges phan chad/_/gang dman spa gong zhum pa med/_/de bzhin nyid du thag chod na/_/'jig rten gnas kyang chos kyi sku/_/dam par nges kyang 'jig rten 'jug_/'khor 
[\[276a.3\]]ba'i mtha' la'ang skyo ba med/_/mu mtha' yas kyang gcig tu rdzogs/_/bdud kyi khams la nyam mi nga /_/mi bzad khams la bag mi tsha/_/'dod pa'i dngos po dbyings la sbyor/_/cig car nges pa'i don mthong na/_/rim gyis sbyor ba slu 'drid 'dra/_/de la mos pa tsam gyis 
[\[276a.4\]]kyang /_/khams gsum zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_/klong du gyur pa smos ci dgos/_/dper na seng phrug khyung sgong dag_/mig ma bye zhing mar blangs kyang /_/kun skrag sgo nga'am mkhar 'gro ltar/_/de nyid nges par gang gyur pa/_/de dag 'jig rten gnas 'jug kyang /_/
[\[276a.5\]]go 'phang dam pa de nyid du/_/des pa ci la'ang bag mi tsha/_/rim gyis mtshan mar spyod pa dang /_/med dang dmigs dang mi dmigs dang /_/bsgrub dang bgrod par byed pa yi/_/bye brag med par rtog 'jug pa/_/blun po de dag stongs pa ste/_/dam par nges pa ga la yin/_/gcan 
[\[276a.6\]]gzan tha ma'i phru gu 'dra/_/skrag cing dngang ba'i rang bzhin no/_/mtha' yas ji snyed chos kun gyi/_/rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa bzhin/_/ma bcos phyin ci ma log pa/_/de bzhin nyid du thag chod pa'o/_/ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding ba/_/'dab gshog rtsal gyis nam 'phang 
[\[276a.7\]]spyod/_/ri brag chu klung mtha' yas kyang /_/'phur rlabs 'og tu kun chud ltar/_/rnal 'byor chos nyid mkha' 'gro ba/_/theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang /_/ji bzhin ma bcos don gyis na/_/go 'phang rlabs kyis thag bcad pa/_/'di ni re dang dogs pa yi/_/the tshom gcod 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]pa'i nges pa ste/_/dam pa nyid la lta ba yi/_/go 'phang gcod pa nges par gcas/_/grogs po dag de dag ni sa yongs su gcod par bgros par shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_dman pa rnams re dogs med par thag gcod pa'i go 'phang thob par gyur to/_/sangs 
[\[276b.2\]]rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las the tshom yongs su gcod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa rnams la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag gang nyam rnyed par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dgongs pa dam pa 
[\[276b.3\]]kun 'dus la/_/'jug pa'i gtsor ni bsam gtan te/_/'khor los dbang sgyur ji bzhin du/_/chos kun dbang sgyur bsam gtan yin/_/rnal 'byor bsam gtan chen po 'di/_/dug dang mun pa gser 'gyur bzhin/_/thams cad dbang sgyur bsam gtan yin/_/des na 
[\[276b.4\]]dam pa'i bsam gtan bya/_/gal te bsam gtan 'di med na/_/rgya mtsho mjing gi pha bong ltar/_/dpag tu med pa'i sgo bcad kyang /_/don med snying po skams pa yin/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan ni/_/ji bzhin pa yi de nyid la/_/ma bcos pa yi blo bzhag ste/_/ma 
[\[276b.5\]]yengs skye 'gag med pa'o/_/rnal 'byor dam pa ji bzhin pa/_/sems kyi chos nyid de nyid do/_/de bzhin nyid ces mi dmigs pa/_/rtsa ba'i kun shes kun gzhi nyid/_/ci phyir ma byas ma bcos pa/_/rang 'byung de bzhin nyid ces bshad/_/thams cad kun du snang ba ni/_/'jug 
[\[276b.6\]]pa'i rnam shes yud tsam nyid/_/ci phyir kun du snang 'jug pas/_/phyi nang kun du snang bar bshad/_/rgyu yi rnam par bkod pa ni/_/'jug pa'i rnam shes sgo lnga nyid/_/thams cad gang gi rgyur bkod pas/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bshad/_/gang gi dgongs pa 
[\[276b.7\]]dam pa ni/_/stong pa ma yin ther zug med/_/dbu mar mi dmigs kun rig gsal/_/yod min med min las kyang 'das/_/gang 'dir tshor 'gro ma rabs dang /_/gang 'gog byis pa'i spyod yul dang /_/'di gang nyams pa'i log sred can/_/yal ba phyal ba dmigs 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]pa gcig_/gang 'dir lta bas mdongs pa dag_/bdag la brten nas mtha' sgrub ste/_/med mos des 'gro med snyam nas/_/de ma thag tu ngan 'gror 'gro/_/mos pa chung ngu thams cad ni/_/gang la bdag med rten bzhin mthong /_/gang bkag rtog yod 
[\[277a.2\]]dpyod med pa/_/bsam gtan dang po kho na'o/_/kun stong phra ba'i stong pa las/_/gnas rtog med la dpyod pa gnyis/_/stong pa nyid la nges bzhag ste/_/dga' ba bskyod pa gsum pa'o/_/bdag gam gzhan gyi mthus bstan te/_/skyon med mi g.yo gnas bzhi ba/_/gang 
[\[277a.3\]]yod mthar yang 'gyur srid kyi/_gang med gnas med mthar mi 'gyur/_/gang med mi mthong mi shes bzhin/_/btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur yang /_/de nyid med par mi 'gyur bas/_/rgyu 'bras med kyang don med min/_/dper na lcags bsregs dpal med bzhin/_/
[\[277a.4\]]chen po bzhi med stongs 'gyur kyang /_/de dang nam mkha' med min bzhin/_/de nyid mi rlag med min 'gyur/_/drug gi spyod yul mtshan ma ste/_/mtshan ma dngos por snang bas na/_/ci dgar bzhag pas de bzlog med/_/de stong spang zhing bzlog tu med/_/thams cad sems 
[\[277a.5\]]kyi chos nyid du/_/tshig med lta bas thag chod na/_/ma bcos ma yengs yengs thub snyoms/_/rtsol sgrub re dogs ga la yod/_/mi mthun gnyen po sgom mi dgos/_/skyon yon spong len bying rgod rnams/_/gang 'dir dbyer med zung 'brel na/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong sems 
[\[277a.6\]]las byung /_/zhig pas nam mkha' med mi 'gyur/_/'khyams pas byang chub sems mi stor/_/spangs pas mi spong mtha' yas chos/_/bkrus pas mi 'dag stong nyid dbyings/_/gang stong yod pas chad rtag pas/_/thams cad rig pas stong ma yin/_/dngos po med 
[\[277a.7\]]pas rtag ma yin/_/ci yang med pas spyad du med/_/bya ba thams cad yongs btang na/_/ye nas ma bcos der bzhag na/_/de med pas na de yang med/_/de ni dam pa'i nyams rnyed pa'i/_/'dir ni theg chen dam pa yi/_/nad ni rim gyis 'thob ma yin/_/rim gyis pa yi dug rgod 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ni/_/cig car 'char ba'i de kho na'o/_/des na gang dang gang dag gis/_/ji ltar go dang mos bzhin du/_/bstan pa gang dang gang dag la/_/so so yid brtan yul du bya/_/de bas sgron ma dpag med kyis/_/dam pa ji snyed gsungs pa rnams/_/gcig tu chad dam nges med de/_/
[\[277b.2\]]ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar nges/_/'di la gang 'jug par gcod pa/_/le lo bya mang rgod pa dang /_/g.yeng dang rmugs dang 'dod pa dang /_/gnyid dang re dogs the tsom dang /_/'du 'phro spyod dang dga' ba'o/_/de yang rang bzhin de bzhin nyid/_/dug lnga la sogs kun 'byung nyid/_/rang 
[\[277b.3\]]'byung rang zhi de bzhin nyid/_/dam pa'i don la gang sgrib pa/_/mi g.yo gsal bde sdug bsngal dang /_/skye ba gsal ba 'byin pa dang /_/des dang khyad snyem 'byung zhi nyid/_/bsam gtan chen por des snang ba/_/kun du mi nyams re dogs med/_/dang ba mi skye mi g.yo dang /_/ma 
[\[277b.4\]]chags mi 'chad len pa med/_/'khrug pa med na rang bzhin nyid/_/rnal 'byor bdud kyi spyod yul ni/_/dam par 'dun mthong dam par smra/_/sprul pa grangs med 'gyed mthong dang /_/dam pas smras kun gsal mthong dang /_/dus kun shes gsal mthong ba dang /_/rgyud 
[\[277b.5\]]drug lam nas kun snang dang /_/de la gdung ba'i shugs 'byung dang /_/kun snang gsal bar mthong ba dang /_/ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang /_/mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro 'dug dang /_/dam pa'i phyag rgya lung ston dang /_/kun gyi skad du chos smra dang /_/dngos po bstan 
[\[277b.6\]]g.yo bsti gnas mthong /_/thams cad mnyam par bkod pa dang /_/de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang /_/las su rung ba thogs med dang /_/dam pa'i don la bsgo ba dang /_/'jig rten gtso bos mchod pa dag_/rang bzhin shes na dam pa'i rtags/_/gang mi shes pa log 
[\[277b.7\]]pa'i bdud/_/sgo drug mtshan ma ci skyes dang /_/rang 'byung rang zhi ci dgar gzhag_/ma skyes pas na bzlog tu med/_/de yang de bzhin de nyid do/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/_/nyes dang legs pa gang la yang /_/dgal dang 'gyod pa'i rtog pa med/_/rang 'byung rang zhi 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]de nyid do/_/'dir ni dam pa gang nges pa/_/rnal 'byor mtshan ma'i snga ltas yin/_/chu klung me gser ga na bar/_/'du 'phro 'byung rtsi nges pa bzhin/_/dam par nges na dam par 'byung /_/dam par ma nges thams cad bdud/_/dam par nges na chung ngu tsam/_/
[\[278a.2\]]gang 'byung dam pa'i snga ltas so/_/gang gi dam pa nyid thos na/_/mi skrag mi dngang dga' ba skye/_/gang zhig dam pa nyid lta ba/_/thams cad dam pa nyid du mthong /_/dam pa'i klong du gang gyur pa/_/rnam grangs mang po dam par sdud/_/dam pa nges pa mthong ba na/_/tshig lam 
[\[278a.3\]]rjes su de mi 'gro/_/de mthong thams cad dam par gsal/_/snang ba med pa'i dam pa ni/_/snang ba med pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nyid kun gyi rgyu yin te/_/cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung /_/g.yo dang drod thob brtan pa dang /_/gsal dang rtags thob brtan pa 
[\[278a.4\]]dang /_/nyi zer rdul phran smig rgyu dang /_/mtsho rlabs rlung dang char gyi rgyun/_/sprin lding ta la gang 'phar 'gro/_/sa g.yo 'byung ba'i skye mched snang /_/'byung rgyun zug rngu la sogs pa/_/gang gis yongs su nad zhi ba/_/mun pa'i skye mched choms pa dang /_/lus kyi 
[\[278a.5\]]bzod pa thob pa dang /_/kun la bde blag ji bzhin pa'o/_/gang min gang du sgyur ba dang /_/gang med pa las gang 'byin pa'o/_/yid 'ong 'dod grub rdzas mchog rnyed/_/kun dga' kun 'dud kun yid dang /_/kun la dbang sgyur mchog 'grub ltas/_/yud las sngon 
[\[278a.6\]]du 'byung ba'i ltas/_/sgren mor byung dang rtag par 'khru/_/rnam dag chu bor 'bogs dang rkyal/_/char rgyun bum chu 'byung ba dang /_/gseg dang g.yeng dang rnam par 'thor/_/'di gang sbyong ba dag pa'i ltas/_/gang 'dir 'jigs dang bral ba yang /_/g.yul 'gyed zhi dang 
[\[278a.7\]]zug rngu byang /_/tha mar grol dang gshed las thar/_/gdug pa'i tshogs bral dug nad zhi/_/bcing grol btsad ltas bzang po yin/_/khyad par dam pa'i sngon byung ba/_/khri rkang shing dang ljon shing skas/_/'dzeg dang gyen du 'gro ba dang /_/ri rtse'i mchod rten nam mkha'i 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]skas/_/gong nas gong du 'phar ba'i ltas/_/gang la gnas dang non pa yang /_/khri mthon la 'dug glang chen zhon/_/seng chen khyung lding 'dab chags dang /_/mchod rten rtse dang ri bo'i spo/_/nam mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang /_/lus las sprin byung nyi zla la/_/'dug 
[\[278b.2\]]pa gang la gnas pa'i rtags/_/dam pa rigs kyi sngon byung ba/_/bka' rtags dbang por dbang sgyur byed/_/'jig rten skas la 'bebs pa dang /_/dbang sdud g.yul rgyal bar 'gyur/_/mgo la me tog thod skyes pa'o/_/chos gang dbang sgyur sngon byung ba/_/
[\[278b.3\]]glegs bam rnyed dang 'dri spyod dang /_/gzhan la ston dang gtan la 'bebs/_/me long bum gang lta rtog 'thung /_/nor bu thu dang 'khor lo babs/_/nyi zla zin dang ri rab skor/_/gang la sgra brgyas stong gsum gang /_/dngos po mtha' dag yi ger mthong /_/grags pas 
[\[278b.4\]]ngo mtshar kun skyed dang /_/mkha' las me tog char 'bab pa'o/_/dam pa mthong ba sngon byung ba/_/sngon ma mthong ba yul mthong dang /_/stong gsum mthong zhing gling rnams bgrod/_/ri rab rtser phyin thams cad mthong /_/nam mkha' mtha' yas mthong ba dang /_/rgya mtsho 
[\[278b.5\]]gting du phyin pa dang /_/sgron me thogs dang snang srid dpyod/_/nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o/_/lung chen thob pa sngon byung ba/_/rol mo 'brug sgra seng ge dang /_/chos kyi bgro ba thos pa dang /_/gzugs brnyan zhal 'dzum 'od 'byung dang /_/dam pa'i gsung thos sku mi mthong /_/lha mo 
[\[278b.6\]]glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang /_/gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung dang /_/grogs po dam pa zhes 'byung zhing /_/de nyid 'gro bar byed pa'o/_/rig 'dzin dam pa'i ltas shar na/_/byin brlabs mthu yi cho 'phrul yang /_/nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang /_/ri rab rked nas gsor ba dang /_/
[\[278b.7\]]'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_/sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba la/_/sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kyang /_/khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus/_/'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la/_/so so skad du chos mthun par/_/'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su/_/gang la de ltar 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]ston par nus/_/rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/'jig rten khams kun g.yos nas kyang /_/thams cad ngo mtshar cher 'gyur te/_/dga' mgu rangs pa'i ro myong 'gyur/_/gser pa'i yi ge phreng ba las/_/rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra bsgrags pas/_/
[\[279a.2\]]yid mthong rnam grangs chos rnams kun/_/sngags snang sngags su ma gyur med/_/rnal 'byor che chung rim pa dag_/rtsal gyi khyad par dag las byung /_/rim gyis 'jug dang cig car ba/_/dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang /_/thos dang mthong ba la sogs te/_/sems 
[\[279a.3\]]kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/_/rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/_/yan lag yi ge so so yi/_/rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas/_/'phro 'du'i tshad dang phyag rgya'i khyon/_/tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhin no/_/'di ni dang 
[\[279a.4\]]po'i 'jug rims te/_/mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o/_/yi ge ye shes las bskrun te/_/don byed pa'ang phyag rgyar 'byung /_/rgya mtsho gnon dang nam mkha'i skas/_/rlung 'ching ba dang rgyun bzlog pa/_/sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba dang /_/nyi zla zhon nas 
[\[279a.5\]]'jig rten 'phang /_/sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs/_/stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul dang /_/gzhig dang spar ba la sogs te/_/bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/goms pas las su rung ba yi/_/rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad/_/bzlas pa mthar phyin 
[\[279a.6\]]grub pa dang /_/bcing ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/bsam pa las su rung ba dang /_/don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa/_/bya ba yongs su dag pa dag_/don gcig yul la so sor snang /_/des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang /_/de nyid gcig la sgom mod kyi/_/rnal 'byor 
[\[279a.7\]]rtsal gyi khyad par ni/_/bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te/_/dang po sa la gnas pa yi/_/btsal ba las ni rnal 'byor pa/_/'dun pa'i sems pa'i rnal 'byor la/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po/_/shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dmas pas/_/ting 'dzin rtsal yang 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]chung ba ste/_/de nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur bas/_/rang gi mos pa gang dmigs na/_/de yis bon gang yin pa/_/kha dog dbyibs kyis phye nas ni/_/sna yi dbugs la rgyu byas te/_/de yi yul du gyur tshad du/_/'od zer 'bar 'phro gsal ba las/_/'phro 'du gnas su 
[\[279b.2\]]bskyed par bya/_/rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'i/_/sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/_/gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/_/bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor la/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po/_/ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/_/sa bon rang bzhin yi ge la/_/'od zer 
[\[279b.3\]]'bar ba bcas pa de/_/dri 'byung sgo ni tshun chad du/_/'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las/_/rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i/_/sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/_/gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/_/rnal 'byor lung gi bka' sgo la/_/sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gsum 
[\[279b.4\]]po/_/dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod/_/lha yi sa bon gang yin pa/_/rang bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te/_/'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa yis/_/thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du/_/'phro 'du gsal bar byas pa las/_/rang gi chag tshad bzhi 'gyur tsam/_/sku yi khyon 
[\[279b.5\]]yang de tsam mo/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin/_/lha yi khyad par gang yin pa/_/yi ge'i rim pa bzhin sbyar nas/_/'phro 'du tshad kyang de bzhin te/_/rim pa ji bzhin sbyar nas kyang /_/'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/sems kyi yul ni ji tsam du/_/sku yi 
[\[279b.6\]]khyon gyi khyad par yang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas/_/sku yi khyon gyis gang ba'o/_/ji ltar gser sbyangs 'tsher ba bzhin/_/sems nyid sbyangs pas de nyid gsal/_/'phro 'du sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'di/_/rim gyis sbyong la cig car drod/_/lang ka'i bdag 
[\[279b.7\]]po 'di lta ste/_/chos rgyun chen po 'di 'dzin 'di/_/sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas bshad/_/'di kun 'phro 'du'i rgyun zhes bya/_/nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la/_/sna tshogs rig pa'i yi ge bris/_/'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas/_/theg chen gsang sngags rgyun 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]mi 'chad/_/chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni/_/de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pas/_/thams cad bdud rtsir rgyun mi 'chad/_/'khor ba rgya mtsho yo byad rnams/_/mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin te/_/srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun/_/kun bzang mchod 
[\[280a.2\]]sprin rgyun mi 'chad/_/kun gyi de bzhin nyid dbyings las/_/sems can sangs rgyas snying po bshad/_/'gro gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/rang 'byung sangs rgyas rgyun mi 'chad/_/dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa'i/_/sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/kun kyang 
[\[280a.3\]]gsang sngags gsang ba'i tshig_/bzlas pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad/_/de dang de yi dbyings nyid la/_/gang dang gang gi thabs sbyor ba/_/ye nas 'du 'bral med pas na/_/sbyor ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad/_/srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag_/stong pa'i mtshon cha'i rgyal 
[\[280a.4\]]po yis/_/dngos po med par bsad pas na/_/ye sgrol chen po rgyun mi 'chad/_/snang srid dag pa'i gzhal yas su/_/kun gzhi dpal gyi maN+Dal la/_/rnam shes thig chen srad bu brgyad/_/ye btab dkyil 'khor rgyun mi 'chad/_/'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la/_/
[\[280a.5\]]gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan/_/gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas/_/gdung chen chos sku rgyun mi 'chad/_/nam mkha' me chu sa rlung rnams/_/rmang bzhi ri rab rten du snang /_/bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams/_/de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brtan/_/ri bo 
[\[280a.6\]]bum rten bum par bcas/_/'di yang gdung chen rgyun mi 'chad/_/'dzugs pa'i yan lag gzhi rmang rten/_/'khor lo tshigs rten khri 'phang brtan/_/yan lag dang po bum rten bcas/_/lcang lo cod pan phreng bas bklubs/_/de bzhin nyid kyi sa gzhi la/_/ji bzhin pa yi 
[\[280a.7\]]gzhal yas khang /_/ma nor ma bcos rmang chen brtan/_/byang chub sems kyi rtsig chen gtams/_/ye shes lnga yi skar mthongs gsal/_/bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo/_/dran pa yang dag them skas brgyad/_/rdzu 'phrul rta babs dag gis brgyan/_/mi 'jigs rig pa'i 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]gdung chen la/_/yang dag brgyad kyi ka bas mdzes/_/rang 'byung ye shes dbu rtse 'phags/_/bden gnyis khyams kyis nges par mdzes/_/ye shes thugs rje yon tan las/_/byin brlabs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan/_/chos nyid rlabs kyi bla re bres/_/sil snyan 
[\[280b.2\]]sgra sgrogs theg chen sngags/_/ji bzhin chos kyi pho brang 'dir/_/rgyal ba bzhugs pa 'di ltar rim/_/kun bzang sems kyi chos nyid las/_/kun gzhi ma 'dres yongs rdzogs chos/_/sems dpa' yud kyis nges thob pas/_/bstan pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad/_/rdo rje nam 
[\[280b.3\]]mkha'i skas bgrod nas/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/_/snang srid mtha' thug med la lta/_/des ni de yul yangs par 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams byas te/_/de la gnas pa'i sems can la/_/rdo rje sems dpa' brtan byas te/_/thams cad dam pa'i 
[\[280b.4\]]rdo rjer byas/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi ling ga la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/myur mgyogs chu zla'i 'phen shugs kyis/_/zhing khams kun du bgrod par bya/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi ling ga la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/_/shin tu nges 
[\[280b.5\]]par gyur pa dang /_/mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal/_/rnal 'byor sdigs mdzub rtse mo la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal 'bar/_/shin tu brtan par red pa dang /_/chu des sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil/_/rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor du/_/stong 
[\[280b.6\]]gsum 'jig rten khor yug bcas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phangs nas ni/_/sa nas sar ni spar bar bya/_/rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba las/_/zer las nyi ma 'bum 'phros pas/_/phyi nang mun pa thams cad bsal/_/
[\[280b.7\]]rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor las/_/chu zla'i dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas/_/bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun byung bas/_/sreg pa'i dmyal ba'i me chen bsad/_/gzhan yang lang ka'i bdag po ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo ni 'di kho nar 'dus par gsungs pas/_'di kho na ltar 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]shes par bya'o/_/sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/_/ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang /_/de ma thag par ma gyur kyang /_/de nyid gang brtags de ltar snang /_/gdos bcas yul na mi snang yang /_/yid gzugs mngon shes kun mkhyen snang /_/gang 
[\[281a.2\]]brtags de ltar de ltas nas/_/mngon sum gsal por red par 'gyur/_/yod med legs nyes rang bzhin rnams/_/chu khams rtas pa lta bur zad/_/thams cad 'di yis byed par 'gyur/_/des na ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso/_/dper na rgya mtsho nor len mi/_/sbrul dang 
[\[281a.3\]]chu srin sbrang ma la/_/sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun/_/dka' bas nyams su blangs pa 'grub/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor rnal tshol ba/_/rnam rtog bying rmugs 'phyar g.yeng dgra/_/gzhom par dka' ba'i las 'di dag_/nyams su blangs na bde thob rnyed/_/'di ni 
[\[281a.4\]]ting 'dzin dam pa yin/_/nyams su blangs pa'i bslab pa ste/_/sems nyid goms par bya ba las/_/'dris par byed pa rab tu gces/_/grogs po dag de dag ni nyams rnyed pa nyid du shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_dman pa rnams gang gi dgongs pa dam 
[\[281a.5\]]pa'i nyam drod rnyed par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dbang sgyur gyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad 
[\[281a.6\]]ces smras so/_/grogs po dag gang 'di la tshegs chung bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ci la yang bya ba med pa nyid do/_/gang la bya ba med pa de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad gang la'ang 
[\[281a.7\]]gnod par byed mi nus/_de bzhin nyid kyis zin pa yi/_/dug gsum dug lngas gnod mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid kyis ma zin na/_/lam gyi phyogs rnams kun spyad kyang /_/bde 'gro tsam du nges 'byung gi/_/go 'phang dam par ga la 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyid kyis kun 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]gnas par/_/gang shes nyon mongs rnam par grol/_/gang de zin par ma shes na/_/dam pa'i lam rnams grol mi 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor de nyid blo ldan pas/_/nyon mongs zin pas gang spyad kyang /_/rnam grol rang 'byung mya ngan 'das/_/tshegs med gyin da don po 
[\[281b.2\]]che/_/gang 'di blo dang mi ldan pas/_/blo ldan tshul du gang byed pa/_/dam par grol bar mi 'gyur gyi/_/'ching ba thar ram 'khor ba'i dngos/_/thams cad stong par shes pa yi/_/blo can mya ngan 'das pa ste/_/bya ba'i las la sha thang ba'i/_/tshegs chen dka' ba las dang 
[\[281b.3\]]bral/_/dam pa'i blo gros thabs med de/_/skyes bu dam pa rnams dang ni/_/'dul ba'i dbang gis dman pa'i lus/_/sten par byed pa'ang ltung bar 'gyur/_/dam pa'i blo gros thabs yod na/_/'khor ba dman pa'i dngos po yang /_/skyes bu dam par grol 'gyur te/_/
[\[281b.4\]]grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min/_/grol dang ma grol la sogs pa/_/gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha'/_/kun mkhyen rnams ni dbus la'ang min/_/de ni grol med grol ba'o/_/'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/_/ma rtogs blo chung kun la gsang /_/skyon yod 
[\[281b.5\]]nyes pa ma yin te/_/blo chung rnams la phan phyir ro/_/de phyir blo gros thabs ldan la/_/rtsol sgrub yo byad gtsor ma gsungs/_/gal te byas na'ang 'gag pa med/_/ma byas na yang de ltar nges/_/de ltar blo gros thabs ldan na/_/mtshams med lnga yi sems can kun/_/
[\[281b.6\]]byang chub snying rje mtshon gyis bsad/_/dpag med dger 'gyur ma bsad na/_/kun gyis don du gnyer ba ni/_/gang gi sems kyi dbyings nyid kyi/_/gang gis bskal pa dpag med du/_/srid gsum dkrugs pas de rig min/_/'dir ni blo gros thabs ldan pas/_/bya 
[\[281b.7\]]med gyin dar rang rig pas/_/don chen rnal 'byor nyal mo btsun/_/ma bral lhun gyis grub pa yin/_/ji ltar mun pa dug dang rdzas/_/sman snang gser du gyur pa na/_/'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis/_/dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pa/_/sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]'grub ste/_/su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mis/_/tshegs med gyin da'i tshul gyis na/_/bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar/_/rnal 'byor chen po don 'grub pa/_/de nyid blo gros thabs dag dang /_/gang dang mi ldan pa dag gis/_/dka' ba spyad kyang 
[\[282a.2\]]'grub min te/_/sems kyi gsang 'di sus mthong ba/_/blo gros thabs dang ldan pa ste/_/'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa/_/de dag tshegs med gyin das 'grub/_/don rnams grub par gang byed pa/_/blo gros thabs kyis grub pa'i phyir/_/don rnams 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[282a.3\]]ba yi/_/bslab pa 'di dag rab tu gces/_/grogs po dag de dag ni tshegs chung la don che ba nyid du zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_dman pa rnams blo dang ldan gros kyis chod de thabs kyis zin par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen 
[\[282a.4\]]po las don nges par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des/_lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la shin tu rngom brjid tshul du bos te smras pa/_kye grogs po dag 
[\[282a.5\]]mdo gcig tu bsdus pa ni gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur par 'dus nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[282a.6\]]cad kyis dgongs pa gcig tu 'dus par bshad pa/_chos nyid rnam par dag pas na/_/chos kun rang bzhin rnam par dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/_/thugs dam dbyig mchog rab nyid do/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa las de skad ces 'byung 
[\[282a.7\]]ba'o/_/de ltar na yang 'di lta ste/_/mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni/_/rdo rje de bzhin nyid las byung /_/chos nyid rdo rje dam tshig ni/_/grub na 'jig pa'i dus med do/_/grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las de skad ces gsungs so/_/grogs po dag yang 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'di lta ste/_rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ni/_/thams cad dam pa de nyid las/_/mi gzhan gzhan med yod ma yin/_/de las gang yang 'da' mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das rdzogs longs spyod pa ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/yang grogs po dag 'di 
[\[282b.2\]]lta ste/_dam pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i tshig_/rdo rje go cha dam bcas pa/_/shin tu dam pa'i tha tshig 'di/_/gal te 'das na tshig par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sku ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_rgyal ba 
[\[282b.3\]]rnams kyi dam pa 'di/_/gsungs pas dam tshig mtha' yas kun/_/thams cad thams cad bsrungs pa ste/_/bsrung ba 'di ni rnyed par dka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyun gyi 'byung ba ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_zhe sdang 
[\[282b.4\]]ngo bo tha dad pa/_/byang chub sems su mnyam pas na/_/de bzhin nyid las gzhan pa yin/_/ma spangs ma dag rdo rje dam/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_'dod dang chags pa'i yul nyid ni/_/rang 
[\[282b.5\]]bzhin gang yin de bzhin nyid/_/longs spyod myong tshor rnam par dag_/spyod la ma chags rdo rje dam/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od mtha' yas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/yang 'di lta ste/_thams cad de bzhin der mtshungs pas/_/khyad par bye brag dbyer med 
[\[282b.6\]]pa'i/_/rdo rje nam mkha' 'od gsal bas/_/rmongs pa'i mun nag rnam dag gsal/_/bcom ldan 'das snang mdzad ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/yang 'di lta ste/_rnam dag thug mtha' mu med pas/_/yangs dog tshig gi mtha' dang bral/_/kun bzang 
[\[282b.7\]]yangs pa'i lam du gcig_/bde chen klong yang rdo rje dam/_/bcom ldan 'das thams cad grub pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/yang 'di lta ste/_de bzhin nyid las med pas na/_/yin dang ma yin gnyis las 'das/_/bdag med rdo rje de bzhin nyid/_/nga med mi 'gyur 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]rdo rje dam/_/bcom ldan 'das yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_yod mthong snang grags chos so cog_/tha dad sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang /_/rang bzhin ma bcos de 
[\[283a.2\]]bzhin nyid/_/ma bsgribs 'od gsal rnam dag zhing /_/bcom ldan 'das dri med sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/de bzhin du 'di lta ste/_kun du bzang po'i ye shes 'di/_/sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i rtsa bas na/_/rang las 
[\[283a.3\]]byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog sprin ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/gzhan yang dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/_ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin pa/_/chos so cog gi snying bo ste/_/med pa las byung sna tshogs snang /_/
[\[283a.4\]]snang med de bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs/_/bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_rang 'byung rig pa'i sems nyid kyis/_/ma bcos chos nyid dbyings kyi don/_/lhun grub thabs dang shes rab las/_/yang 
[\[283a.5\]]dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i tog ngo bo nyid dag pas gsungs pa/_'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/bde dang mi bde rnam pa kun/_/de bzhin nyid du ro 
[\[283a.6\]]gcig pas/_/tshor ba bde sdug gang yang med/_/ces gsungs so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i rgyan ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_de bzhin nyid du don bstan du/_/de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas/_/gang gis gang la gang zhig bstan/_/nyid la nyid gleng kho 
[\[283a.7\]]nar zad/_/ces gsungs so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la/_/dus gsum dus bzhir mi rigs te/_/ye shes rig pa'i khyad par las/_/skad cig bskal pa de skad cig_/ces gsungs so/_/gzhan 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]yang bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_'khor ba mya ngan 'das rtag pa/_/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid du/_/ye nas mya ngan 'das pas na/_/rang bzhin lhun grub tshogs gnyis rdzogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag 
[\[283b.2\]]pas 'di skad du/_chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni/_/ma skyes pa las thams cad skye/_/skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/_/rigs mchog rdo rje skye gnas dam/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das yongs su dgongs pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_de bzhin nyid 
[\[283b.3\]]du kun rig na/_/des khyab gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing /_/yon tan rin chen sprin bkod pa/_/dgod par bya ba ci yang med/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od zer ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/_/ji bzhin 
[\[283b.4\]]de bzhin nyid la bzhugs/_/de bzhin nyid dang thams cad kyang /_/gnyis med de bzhin de nyid do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/so sor snang ba ma yin te/_/ji bzhin de 
[\[283b.5\]]bzhin nyid des na/_/de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di bzhin du/_de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni/_/dpag cing gzhal bar mtha' yas pas/_/dpag med rgyal po'i pho brang yin/_/de nas 
[\[283b.6\]]kun bkod der gcig nas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sprin gyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_thams cad 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yang /_/cir yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes te/_/gdos par gyur pa'i chos med pas/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin 
[\[283b.7\]]du 'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das yid 'ong dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_/'jig rten 'khor ba'i kha brgyud pas/_/ma rig ngo bo de bzhin nga /_/gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/_/de nyid rig na bde chen gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]yang bcom ldan 'das me long 'od snang ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_nyon mongs ye shes lngar rtog pa/_/ji bzhin de la gnyis ka sgrib/_/rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med de/_/rtog pa de nyid yang dag lam/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das zla 'od 
[\[284a.2\]]dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_theg pa dpag med bstan pa yang /_/ji ltar mos pa tha dad pa/_/khrid pa bya ba'i thabs su zad/_/rdo rje theg pa nyid las med/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i snying po dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_gang 
[\[284a.3\]]gis de mthong mthong ma thag_/mi shes chod pa'i dra ba chod/_/khyung dang seng ge ji bzhin du/_/mngal ltar lus kyi mngal gyis bsgribs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das spos kyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_dbang sgyur thabs kyi ye shes 
[\[284a.4\]]kyis/_/sgyu ma'i chos la dbang thob pas/_/mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du/_/thams cad dbang sgyur rang rig yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sngon spro ba'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma dang /_/log rtog mtshan ma'i 
[\[284a.5\]]sgyu ma gnyis/_/rang bzhin de nyid dag pas na/_/gnyis su shes pa nyid tshogs rdzogs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_bsam gyis mi khyab chos 'di rnams/_/de bzhin nyid du gcig pas na/_/gang gi 
[\[284a.6\]]de bzhin de shes pa/_/kun la dbang sgyur thob pa yin/_zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di/_/shes nas de la gang gnas pa/_/rang rig nyid la dbang thob pa'i/_/de bzhin 
[\[284a.7\]]rig pa 'dzin pa nyid/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das dka' thub rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_de nyid ji bzhin mngon gyur na/_/med la mi zad 'byung ba yi/_/che ba'i yon tan rgyun mi 'chad/_/cir snang kun 'byung rin chen gter/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor snying po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_ji bzhin ma bcos de nyid la/_/de bzhin pa yi blo gnas pa/_/de bzhin de nyid ma yin pa'i/_/sgrub dang bsgrub pa ga la yod/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das nges par 
[\[284b.2\]]gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_mkha' la glo bur sprin 'thibs ltar/_/de bzhin glo bur rtog pas bsgribs/_/mkha' dag nang du sprin sangs ltar/_/rnam rtog sangs pas ngang gis sangs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das nges par gsungs 
[\[284b.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_ji snyed dag pa'i gsung brjod kyang /_/rdo rje gsung la spros pa med/_/spros med gsung nyid kun gsal khyab/_/ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_thams 
[\[284b.4\]]cad yul la 'jug pa yi/_/thogs med ma chags de bzhin blos/_/ji snyed ji bzhin nyid du bsgyur/_/zad med gter ldan rin chen 'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das me tog dbang po dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_ji bzhin nyid la bzhugs pas 
[\[284b.5\]]na/_/'di zhes tshig tu ma gsungs kyang /_/khyab pas gcig pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/ji ltar 'dod pa so sor mjal/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das grags pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas sems can la sogs pa/_/thams cad ma 
[\[284b.6\]]lus lus pa med/_/rang rig ma rig rtog pa nyid/_/kun kyang rang byung ye shes nyid/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_yi ge phyag rgya ye shes kyang /_/tshig las 'byung ba'i gzhi yin te/_/de nyid dag pas 
[\[284b.7\]]thams cad dag_/gsung la gsung nyid mi gnas pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sgra dbyangs mi zad pa nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_de bzhin nyid kyang rang bzhin du/_/lnga phung nyon mongs rnam par dag_/rnam rtog rdul bral skye 'gag med/_/thams cad 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ngo bo nyid du bcom/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sman gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_dpag med 'jig rten rdul snyed na/_/'gro ba rdul phran bsam yas la/_/khyad par de bzhin nyid snang bas/_/til 'bru mar gyis khyab 
[\[285a.2\]]ltar gnas/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od 'phro ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_rdul phran gcig tsam gang zag la/_/dgongs te mdun du gsung brjod pa/_/dpag med mtha' yas rdul snyed tsam/_/de snyed kun du thos par grol/_/zhes 
[\[285a.3\]]gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_gsung gcig mi zad mtha' yas gsung /_/mtha' dang dbus med kun du khyab/_/khyab dang khyab med rdo rje gsung /_/sna tshogs dngos med de bzhin nyid/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[285a.4\]]gser gyi gsung ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_gang yang ma bcos de nyid la/_/phyogs dang snga phyi dus med de/_/thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings/_/de nyid rang rig rang nyid do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di 
[\[285a.5\]]skad du/_de nyid de snyed rang bzhin te/_/de snyed de nyid yin pa la/_/byis pa rnams kyis gnyis su bzung /_/de la gnyis su dbye byar med/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das snang ba brtsegs pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_stong nyid nam mkha'i 
[\[285a.6\]]rang bzhin du/_/mi mthun pa dang gnyen po gnyis/_/ye nas dbyer med gcig pas na/_/gnod pas 'jigs pa ga la yod/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa'i dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_/
[\[285a.7\]]dag pa dag la dag pa nyid/_/rtog pa dag la rtog par snang /_/cis 'dul der snang ci yang med/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das dga' mchog dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_rang bzhin rang gis ma bcos pa/_yang gis 'od gsal de bzhin nyid/_/
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]kun gyi snying po de nyid pas/_/cis kyang ma bsgribs nam mkha' che/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_ji bzhin pa nyid sa mchog ste/_/de rig ye shes bla ma yis/_/ye nas de bzhin nyid la gnas/_/da 
[\[285b.2\]]gdod bgrod du ga la yod/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_stong pa nyid kyi snying po la/_/sna tshogs snang ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ba/_/ji bzhin 
[\[285b.3\]]pa yi dkyil 'khor nyid/_/ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i ngo bo nyid dag pa gsang bas 'di skad du/_zad med ye shes dngos grub ni/_/de bzhin nyid du dngos grub pas/_/zad pa med cing 'phel ba med/_/da 
[\[285b.4\]]gdod bsgrub tu ga la yod/_/ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten kun gyi ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_chos kun rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya/_/stong nyid rang bzhin rnam dag la/_/de nyid mi gnas byang chub sems/_/
[\[285b.5\]]zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_rnam rtog chu bo'i rka mgo ste/_/stong nyid zhing du ma bsgyur na/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho g.yeng 'gyur ba/_/de mi shes la de ltar snang /_/zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang 
[\[285b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das me tog bkod pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin nyid/_/thams cad 'byung ba'i ma yin pas/_/kun bzang shes rab pha rol phyin/_/sems can sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas/_/zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom 
[\[285b.7\]]ldan 'das thams cad snang ba ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/sems can rnam pa thams cad dag_/dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa/_/de nyid las byung dngos med sku/_/zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das yid dang ngo bo 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_rang 'byung ye shes rtsa ba ni/_/byang chub sems nyid yin pas na/_/de yi rtsa ba snying rje ste/_/pha rol phyin par thabs kyis so/_/zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge 'bum gzugs ngo bo nyid dag 
[\[286a.2\]]pas 'di skad du/_ji snyed ji bzhin nyid kyi don/_/yi ge ming tshogs sgra mtshon pa/_/ming tshogs sgra la ma brten par/_/nyam drod blo yis rig pa med/_/ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/yang bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/_chos kun 
[\[286a.3\]]chos kyi rang bzhin ni/_/de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan pas/_/de nyid byang chub lam nyid des/_/lam de stug po bkod pa'i gnas/_/zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/_/kye grogs po dag gzhan yang de dag la sogs pa/_rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sgron ma bye bas ya 
[\[286a.4\]]snyed ngo bo nyid dag pa dang /_chos kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa mtha' thug pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dag pas gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad du/_la la ni 'di ltar/_rtog med rang rig skad cig ma/_/sems can sangs rgyas gnyis kyi dbyings/_/rig dang ma rig gnyis kho na/_/
[\[286a.5\]]dag dang ma dag gnyis su snang /_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid smra brjod med pa las/_/de mtshon phyir na tha dad brjod/_/gang brjod pa nyid de bzhin nyid/_/de nyid spros med rdo rje don/_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la 
[\[286a.6\]]la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid cir yang mi snang na/_/glo bur rnam rtog tha dad pa'i/_/rnam rtog de nyid snang bar zad/_/snang ba nyid na snang ba med/_/ces gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ji bzhin pa yi de kho na/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang byar med na/_/gang gis 
[\[286a.7\]]bcos te su yis byas/_/byas pa po zhig ga la yod/_/ces gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ye shes can gyi spyod yul ni/_/de bzhin de nyid yin pas na/_/de khyab gang gi chos rnams kun/_/rang bzhin dag pas bsgribs pa med/_/ces gsang ba dam 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid mtshan nyid med pa las/_/mtshan nyid sna tshogs par snang bas/_/kun 'byung dbyings kyi rang bzhin pas/_/med la zad mi shes par mdzod/_/ces gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_sna tshogs 
[\[286b.2\]]theg pa'i lta ba dang /_/sdom pa srung ba'i bya ba kun/_/spyad par bya ba ma yin yang /_/kun kyang ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs/_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de la phyogs dang dus med par/_/gang gis phyogs dang dus brtags pa'i/_/de nyid de 
[\[286b.3\]]la rnam par snang /_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de mi mkhyen/_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_bsam gyis mi khyab kun shes nas/_/bsam du med par de bzhag na/_/dpag tu med pa'i yon tan 'byung /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin/_/
[\[286b.4\]]zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_bsam gyis mi khyab mi shes par/_/bsam med ngang du gang 'jog pa/_/byis pa de ni blun pa ste/_/mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes kun nas brtse ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_
[\[286b.5\]]bsam med bsam gyis mi khyab chos/_/lhag par mthong nas zhi gnas pa/_/rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa/_/de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas/_/zhes bshes gnyen dam pa nyid du gdams so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_sna tshogs so so kun rig kyang /_/kun grol 
[\[286b.6\]]rnam dag lam med na/_/dam pa nyid las shin tu gol/_/nam yang nges pa rnyed pa min/_/zhes bka' dam par gdams so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_/sna tshogs rim gyis 'jug pa dang /_/bsam spyod blo yi nang du 'gyur/_/bsam med yongs su rdzogs pa'i don/_/
[\[286b.7\]]rim gyis pa yi dug chen yin/_/zhes khyad par dam par gdams so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_sna tshogs so sor ma rig par/_/de bzhin nyid du nges mi rnyed/_/de nyid nges pa ma rnyed na/_/sna tshogs smra ba rung ma yin/_/zhes nan tan dam par gdams so/_/la la ni 'di skad 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]du/_mkha' la 'ja' snang ji bzhin du/_/bsam yas bsam snang de bzhin no/_/gcig tu nges pa med pa'i gsung /_/ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar yin/_/zhes dpag dka' ba dam par gsungs so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir bshad 
[\[287a.2\]]pas/_/'di don gang rig thos pa'i mchog_/thams cad 'di las 'byung bas na/_/'di shes kun shes shes rab mchog_/ces shes rab mchog dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_gsang ba'i nang na gsang chen 'di/_/nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong 
[\[287a.3\]]bar/_/gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la 'gyur/_/de nyid dam pa rnams kyis bsngags/_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di/_/gser dang mkha' bzhin mi 'gyur bas/_/mi nub stong bral med pa'i phyir/_/chos 
[\[287a.4\]]kyi dam pa don po mchog_/ces dam pa chen por bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_thog ma med nas bsags pa yi/_/rnam rtog sprin phung dpag med pa/_/stong nyid cig car rig pa yis/_/de bzhin nyid du rnam par sgrol/_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 
[\[287a.5\]]'di skad du/_ji snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/chos kun stong par rig nges na/_/sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan yin/_/zhes rnal 'byor dam par gdams so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_'khor ba ji srid yod par du/_/
[\[287a.6\]]bstan pa'i snying po nyi ma shar/_/rang bzhin chos nyid 'khor lo 'di/_/mi nub rgyun mi 'chad par bskor/_/zhes gsang ba dam pa'i theg par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_mi 'gyur mi 'jig rdo rje don/_/sna tshogs kun 'byung rin po che/_/ma chags rnam dag 
[\[287a.7\]]pad+mo nyid/_/thams cad lhun grub mdzad pa che/_/ma nor ma bcos de bzhin nyid/_/ces yang nges pa dam par bstan to/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_stong nyid gzugs med chos kyi sku/_/smon med yid las 'das pa'i gsung /_/mtshan med rtog las 'das pa'i thugs/_/
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]rtog med re skong yon tan mdzod/_/thabs kyi gar thabs phrin las mdzod/_/ces cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung bar bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_mi rtog chos kyi me long gsal/_/gnyis su med pas thams cad mnyam/_/sna tshogs mtshan nyid ma 'dres mkhyen/_/
[\[287b.2\]]nan tan chen po khyab grub mdzad/_/ye nyid kun gyi rang bzhin mkhyen/_/zhes ye shes rgyun du 'char bar bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_snang stong go 'byed kun khyab mkha'/_/theg dbyings la ni kun gnas sa/_/zhi gnas rnam dag chu chen po/_/lhag mthong ye 
[\[287b.3\]]shes 'od 'bar me/_/shes bya thogs med 'thor ba'i rlung /_/zhes thams cad 'byung bar bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs/_/khyab gsal rang bzhin 'gro ba'i sgra/_/dang bas sim byed chos kyi dri/_/don bcu nyams 
[\[287b.4\]]su myong ba'i ro/_/bde mchog don la reg pa nyid/_/ces yon tan dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ci yang mi sems gti mug la/_/dngos po kun bcom zhe sdang nyid/_/ye 'byam nga rgyal bdag nyid che/_/bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/_/gang 
[\[287b.5\]]du ma 'gyur gzhan phrag dog_/ces blang dor med par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_kun gyi rang bzhin gcig shes pas/_/de nyid dbang du thams cad 'dus/_/kun la dbang sgyur thos pas na/_/ye dbang chen po rdzogs pa'o/_/zhes dbang dam par 
[\[287b.6\]]bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_thams cad kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo/_/kun la khyab gnas brtag dka' ba/_/zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul yin/_/rdo rje kun bkod rnal 'byor lung /_/zhes bka' dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid 
[\[287b.7\]]der ni kun gcig pas/_/bdag dang gzhan du snang ba med/_/stong nyid rnam dag nam mkha' la/_/gtsang smer dbye ba rdul yang med/_/ces bdud rtsi dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_byang chub snying po dam pa la/_/rnam rtog rdul gyis ga la 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]'go/_/de nyid chen por 'ub chung bas/_/cis kyang mi bskyod nyam mi nga /_/zhes re dogs med par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ri bo 'di/_/seng ge'i khog pa rang zhig ltar/_/stong nyid rang nyid ma zhig na/_/gzhan gyis 
[\[288a.2\]]'jig par ga la 'gyur/_/zhes rang bzhin dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_bde chen rnam dag rtog byed pas/_/legs nyes gnyis ka rnam par rtog_/bde chen nges pa'i rlung zhugs na/_/gang 'dir rnam par rtog pa med/_/ces yongs su rtog pa las 
[\[288a.3\]]'das par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid phyin ci ma log par/_/bsrung bya mi rtog mi gnas pa/_/le lo g.yeng ba'i dgra bsrung ste/_/de bzhin de las 'da' mi bya/_/zhes dam tshig dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[288a.4\]]du/_/sgron ma bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/ji snyed pa yi chos bstan pa/_/mtha' yas don ni gcig tu 'dus/_/zhes par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid de las ma nyams na/_/dran bsam sgyu ma med pa yi/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab nyid/_/bslab 
[\[288a.5\]]pa rnam gsum yongs su rdzogs/_/zhes bslab pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid las mtha' zhi gnas dang /_/lhag pa'i don mthong 'dres pa yi/_/sde gsum nges par rdzogs pa na/_'bum phrag mtha' yas brjod mi lang /_/zhes bkri drang 
[\[288a.6\]]brgyud pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_tshig la dbang bas tshig bsgyur na/_/tshig mtha' yas pas bsdus na 'dus/_/tshig gcig rnam par spros gyur na/_/brjod pas de ni zad mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsung mi zad pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad 
[\[288a.7\]]du/_smra brjod tshig la gang dag pas/_/gang gis dgongs pa dpog mi nus/_/tshig tshogs rgya mtsho thos pa min/_/tshig gcig thos pa thos pa'i mchog_/ces thos pa rgya mtsho'i dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_khyab dang mi gnas rnam mi rtog_/ma bral mi g.yo 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]ma chags pa/_/de nyid las ni gzhan med de/_/pha rol phyin pa de kho na/_/zhes mthar son pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_'don brjod 'dri klog don byed pa/_/dmus long dmu rgod rgyug pa 'dra/_/dbyings kyis dbyings la bris pa'i don/_/gang rig 'don brjod 
[\[288b.2\]]'dri klog mchog_/ces spyod pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_mtshan mar byas dang snang ba'i mchog_/ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/mkha' dang 'ja' ltar rnam rig pa/_/bsngo ba bla med byang chub nyid/_/ces bsngo ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di 
[\[288b.3\]]skad du/_chos gang sems kyi de nyid la/_/gnyis dang mtha' ru gang lta ba/_/ma rig 'khrul pas phyin ci log_/theg chen gsang sngags lam las log_/ces gdams ngag dam par gsungs so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rim gyis pa/_/blo chung rmongs pas 
[\[288b.4\]]khrid pa'i thabs/_/ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la/_/rten 'brel rgyu 'bras rim gyis med/_/ces nges par dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ma bcos de bzhin nyid 'di la/_/yid bzhin cir yang 'byung ba yi/_/cho 'phrul 'byung bas sems can rnams/_/ji ltar 
[\[288b.5\]]'dul ba mthong thos snang /_/zhes thams cad rgyu med pa la bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/_/gsang ba'i dbyings na gnas pa yi/_/thams cad gsang ba'i snying po nyid/_/mthong bas 'gro don rgya mtshor rdzogs/_zhes thams cad lhun 
[\[288b.6\]]gyis grub par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/de mthong ngo bo nyid mi dmigs/_/dran med bya dang byed med pa/_/gnas gsum mnyam nyid rjes su dran/_/zhes ting nge 'dzin dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_gnas gsum 
[\[288b.7\]]dmigs pa'i 'du shes med/_/ming med tshig gi lam dang bral/_/bla med 'dus ma byas pa yi/_/mchod pa yang dag mchog tu bshad/_/ces mchod pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_bskal pa bye ba dpag med du/_/log cing zhen pa'i mun pa gsum/_/
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]de nyid tshul bzhin skad cig ma/_/kun gsal gcig gis yongs su sangs/_/zhes gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_mun pas 'thibs pa de dag gis/_/mi g.yo mi rtog de nyid blta/_/de mthong mun pa rnam dag sangs/_/'gyod 
[\[289a.2\]]sangs kun gyi mchog tu bshad/_/ces tshangs pa dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_/mi mthun gnyen po mi dmigs pa/_/stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la/_/gnas pa gang yin de dag gis/_/gnyen po bstan du ci yang med/_/ces la gcad pa dam par bsngags 
[\[289a.3\]]so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_thams cad rang bzhin ma bcos pa/_/ji bzhin pa yi de bzhin du/_/rang rig bla na med pa yi/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/zhes sems bskyed pa rnam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ci yang mi sems mi g.yo zhing /_/
[\[289a.4\]]mi rtog rnam par mi g.yeng ba/_/kun la khyab par bdal ba'i dbyings/_/kun shong bya med theg chen mchog_/ces theg pa chen po'i gsang ba dam par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_theg chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di/_/dbu mar mi dmigs mtha' las 'das/_/gang 
[\[289a.5\]]'dir dbu mar 'dod pa dag_/mtha' las 'das par ga la 'gyur/_zhes dbus mthar mi dmigs par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_chos kun mi mthong chos nyid kyang /_/mi mthong sems can sems mi mthong /_/sangs rgyas mi mthong gang mthong ba/_/de 
[\[289a.6\]]yi don dam yang dag mthong /_/zhes mthong ba yongs su bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin pa/_/mi skye mi 'gag rnam kun mkhyen/_/sus kyang ma byas rang byung ba/_/rnam par rtog pa'i glo bur yin/_/zhes ma bslad par dam 
[\[289a.7\]]par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_de nyid de dang gang ldan pa/_/dman pa'i lus la sangs rgyas yin/_/de la ma gtogs gang zhig na/_/sangs rgyas bya ba ga la yod/_/ces ye nas sangs rgyas par bsngags so/_/la la ni 'di skad du/_brtan g.yo dkyil 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]'khor phyag rgya rdzogs/_/rtog 'dzin sgra mtha' ting 'dzin bsngags/_/med rgyu rtags chags mtshon pa'i tshig_/bsgrub 'grub bltas snang 'bras bu'o/_/zhes gsang sngags dam pa'i tshig go/_/grogs po dag de ltar ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dam 
[\[289b.2\]]pa de kho na nyid las 'di skad du/_thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa/_/tshig gi tha snyad tsam dag las/_/'di la bya ba ci yang med/_/rang bzhin de nyid ye sangs rgyas/_/a ho zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las 'das te bde ba chen po lhun dang bar gyur 
[\[289b.3\]]to/_/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_dper na kun du rgyu ba'i mi/_/'dod pa'i yul du gang 'gro ba/_/yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang /_/bgrod yul lam gnas gcig las med/_/de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/rnam 
[\[289b.4\]]grangs chos sgo ji snyed kyang /_/bkrid pas drang ba'i tshig yin te/_/bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o/_/don rnams gcig tu bsdus pa yi/_/bslab par bya ba dam pa ste/_/nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir/_/kun 'dus dam pa'i bslab par gces/_/dam 
[\[289b.5\]]pa 'dir 'dus kun shes na/_/de yi ye shes mtha' yas te/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid pas/_/mdo don gcig tu bsdus par gsungs/_/grogs po dag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig tu 'dus par 
[\[289b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas bshad pa ste/_thams cad kyi mdo de kho na nyid du 'dus par shes par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pas/_dman pa rnams gcig tu nges pa dam pa rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid la dman pa 
[\[289b.7\]]rnams yi rangs te/_mngon par bstod pa/_e ma ho skyes chen gsang ba'i bdag_/rtsal chen smra ba seng ge'i sgra/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs/_/sangs rgyas kun sngon ye nas byung /_/khyod ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mes/_/che mchog rje btsun 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dam pa'i sku/_/bde gshegs kun gyi bshes gnyen mchog_/sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/_/kun gyi 'byung gnas me long gsal/_/phyogs kun gsal 'grel nges pa'i mdo/_/theg chen rmad grags ngo mtshar che/_/gsang 
[\[290a.2\]]chen byung tshul ngo mtshar che/_/a ho zhes nges pa dam par mngon par bstod/_/de nas cang mi dmigs par gyur te/_gang du nges par bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa dag lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du rgya cher grags shing yongs su grags par gyur to/_/sangs 
[\[290a.3\]]rgyas kun gyi dgongs 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu lnga pa'o//_//theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i tshul las gang gi dgongs pa rnam par bgros pa na yang byung ba'i gtam rgyud brjod 
[\[290a.4\]]pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes rnam par bgros pa ste/_byung tshul bstan pa'i bcu gnyis pa'i tha ma'o//_//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa chos thams cad kyi me long /_bka' thams cad kyi 
[\[290a.5\]]'grel pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa dam pa gsang ba/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes drag shul can gyi ri ma la ya'i rtser lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la rgya cher yongs su 
[\[290a.6\]]bgros pa/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma bo d+hi dang /_ring lugs chen po dA na rak+Shi ta dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba che btsan skyes kyis bru sha'i yi ge las bru sha'i yul gyi khrom du bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//_//bka' 'di la dbu zhabs su byung tshul bcu 
[\[290a.7\]]gnyis pa/_le'u bdun cu rtsa lnga pa/_bam po bcu dang /_sha lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so//_//ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba dad/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH//_//
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]{D830}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sarba ta thA ga tagu h+ya ma hA gup+ta ko Sha ak+Sha ya ni d+hi dI pa ma hA pra ta sA d+ha na tan+t+ra dz+nyA nA sh+tsar+ya d+yu ti tsakra na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/_gsang ba'i mdzod chen po mi zad pa 
[\[290b.2\]]gter gyi sgron ma/_brtul zhugs chen po bsgrub pa'i rgyud/_ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[290b.3\]]'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun du bzang po chen po ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba phyogs bcu dang dus bzhes bsdus pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid chen po/_gsang 
[\[290b.4\]]ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/_lhun gyis grub pa'i longs spyod chen po/_chos ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin chen po/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i bdag nyid de 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus brjod du med pa na rang bzhin 
[\[290b.5\]]lhun gyis grub pa'i gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba yum gyi mkha' rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/_chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal 
[\[290b.6\]]ba/_spros pa med pa'i tshul gyis pho brang gi snying po zlum por gyur pa/_dbyings dang ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'i thabs las byung ba'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/_bsod nams dang ye shes 
[\[290b.7\]]kyi tshogs thugs rje rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gsal ba/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo bzhi na rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi lam stegs su shar ba/_phyi dang nang med par lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang de na nyi ma dang zla ba rangs pa dang phyed kyis 'od gsal 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bar snang ba dang /_che ba'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu dang mu tig gi chun mdzes 'phyang ba dang /_shar bu'i rgyan dang /_bla re dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi ta la'i ljon shing 
[\[291a.2\]]dang /_re ba skong ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_'jig rten pa'i lha dang /_lha'i bu mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo dang glu dbyangs kyi tshigs su bcad pas brgyan pa'i gnas khyad par rgyu rin po che sna tshogs las 
[\[291a.3\]]grub pa'i gnas de nyid na thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla dang ma chags ma gos pa'i pad+ma dang mi zad pa'i rin po che 'bar ba'i gdan khri dang gzims cha dang snam rten du ldan par gnas so/_/gzhan yang khrag 'thung gi tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas su 
[\[291a.4\]]yang 'gyur te/_dur khrod kyi rgyan gyi khyad par gyi bye brag zhing gi gdan dang sbrul nag gi chun 'phyang dang thod pa rnam gsum gyi mtshan ma dang /_rlung nag gi phung po spungs shing rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mi bzad par 'khrug pa dang /_me ri ser nag tu 'khyil cing 'bar ba/_keng rus 
[\[291a.5\]]kyi ri rab las rak+ta'i khrag zhag gi chu 'bab pa/_'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug pa'i gnas na dregs pa khyo shug dang /_sems can chen po'i gdan dang bcas pa'i gnas kun du bzang po'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs las grub pa/_rnal 'byor gyi dbang 
[\[291a.6\]]phyug chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gyur pa na rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor tshogs brjod pa las 'das pa'i yang brjod pa las 'das pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed 'khod pa ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /_khrag 'thung rol pa'i tshogs dang /_
[\[291a.7\]]dad pas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa dang /_btsun mo dam pa dbyings phyug ma dang /_btsun mo dam pa sangs rgyas spyan dang /_btsun mo dam pa mA ma kI dang /_btsun 
[\[291b.2\]]mo dam pa gos dkar mo dang /_btsun mo dam pa sgrol ma dang /_gzhan yang rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyi 'khor btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa rnal 'byor chen po sems dpa'i rdo rje dang /_rnal 'byor chen po rin chen rdo rje dang /_rnal 'byor 
[\[291b.3\]]chen po chos rdo rje dang /_rnal 'byor chen po las rdo rje dang /_rnal 'byor chen mo rdo rje sems ma dang /_rnal 'byor chen mo rin chen sems ma dang /_rnal 'byor chen mo chos kyi sems ma dang /_rnal 'byor chen mo las kyi sems ma dang /_gzhan yang nam 
[\[291b.4\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa byang chub chen po sa'i snying po dang /_byang chub chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang 
[\[291b.5\]]chub chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang /_byang chub chen po sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub chen po byams pa mai tri dang /_byang chub chen po kun du bzang po dang /_byang chub chen mo sgeg mo dang /_byang chub chen mo phreng ba dang /_byang chub chen mo dbyangs 
[\[291b.6\]]dang /_byang chub chen mo gar ma dang /_byang chub chen mo pog me ma dang /_byang chub chen mo me tog ma dang /_byang chub chen mo mar me ma dang /_byang chub chen mo dri dang /_gzhan yang 'joms pa chen po'i 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa nam mkha' dang mnyam 
[\[291b.7\]]pa 'joms pa chen po gshin rje gshed po dang /_'joms pa chen po stobs po che dang /_'joms pa chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang /_'joms pa chen po rta'i rgyal po dang /_'joms pa chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang /_'joms ma chen mo lcags kyu ma dang /_
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]'joms ma chen mo zhags pa ma dang /_'joms ma chen mo lcags sgrog ma dang /_'joms ma chen mo 'bebs ma dang /_gzhan yang thub pa'i sras kyi 'khor rdul phra rab snyed dang mnyam pa/_thub pa chen po lha'i dbang po dang /_thub pa chen po lha ma yin 
[\[292a.2\]]gyi dbang po dang /_thub pa chen po mi'i dbang po dang /_thub pa chen po dud 'gro'i dbang po dang /_thub pa chen po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi dbang po dang /_thub pa chen po dmyal ba'i dbang po dang /_de dag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sras kyi tshogs grangs med pa dang /_
[\[292a.3\]]yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang khrag 'thung rol pa'i dpal he ru ka btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa 'di lta ste/_khrag 'thung chen po dpal bud+d+ha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_khrag 'thung chen po dpal badzra he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_khrag 'thung chen po dpal 
[\[292a.4\]]rat+na he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_khrag 'thung chen po dpal pad+ma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_khrag 'thung chen po dpal karma he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_btsun mo bud+d+ha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_btsun mo badzra kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_btsun mo rat+na kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_btsun mo pad+ma 
[\[292a.5\]]kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_btsun mo karma kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan yang gsang ba chen po 'khor btsun mo dang bcas pa gsang ba chen po rak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba chen po yak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba chen po bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba 
[\[292a.6\]]chen po sa ma ya he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba chen mo rak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba chen mo yak+Sha kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba chen mo bi shwa kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_gsang ba chen mo sa ma ya kro d+hi zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan yang phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs 
[\[292a.7\]]kyi 'khor dkar mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_rkun mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_sbos mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_gtum mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_rmongs mo'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_thal byed ma'i tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_sme sha can gyi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_ma 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_seng gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_stag gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_wa gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_khyi gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_bzhad gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_kang ka'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_dur 
[\[292b.2\]]bya'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_bya rog gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_rta gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_phag gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_seng gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_spre gdong gi tshogs zhes bya ba 
[\[292b.3\]]la sogs pa/_phra men ma'i tshogs shin tu mang ba dang /_gzhan yang rdo rje srin po khro bo'i tshogs rdo rje srin po khro bo rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /_dbyug pa sngon po zhes bya ba dang /_gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang /_mi g.yo mgon po zhes bya ba dang /_rta mgrin 
[\[292b.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba dang /_bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhes bya ba dang /_khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /_hU~M kA ra zhes bya ba dang /_stobs po che zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan yang rdo rje srin mo'i khro mo'i 'khor rdo rje srin mo snyems ma zhes 
[\[292b.5\]]bya ba dang /_sder mo zhes bya ba dang /_dur khrod ma zhes bya ba dang /_gtun khung ma zhes bya ba dang /_gtum mo zhes bya ba dang /_mda' snyems ma zhes bya ba dang /_sgra 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang /_gsod ma zhes bya ba dang /_bskyod ma zhes bya ba dang /_rlung 'byin ma zhes 
[\[292b.6\]]bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje gzhon nu'i 'khor rigs 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi mthu dang /_ston pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyis rang dbang med par 'khor du 'dus pa'i dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa 
[\[292b.7\]]brgyad la sogs pa kun bran dang yang bran/_g.yog dang yang g.yog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs kyi 'khor 'dus pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan gyi shes pa'i rgyud ni thams cad zhi ba dang /_rgyas pa dang dbang dang drag po dang dgug pa dang bcing ba dang gtang 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]ba dang dgrol ba dang drang ba dang rengs pa dang rmugs pa dang dbral ba dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang 'jib pa dang nyams pa dang gsad pa dang /_gnon pa dang spar ba dang pham pa dang /_rgyal ba la sogs pa byed cing thabs cig tu rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 
[\[293a.2\]]'khod do/_/de nas yang dpal 'bar yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i sku la 'khril te bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang po dang /_btsun mo bya ba mo kun du bzang mo yang gnyis su med par mdun 
[\[293a.3\]]gyis bltas te bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dpal kun du bzang po ye 
[\[293a.4\]]shes rngam pa'i rgyal pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas phyi snod kyi khams nam mkha' dang sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang ri dang /_tshal la sogs pa thams cad la rnam 
[\[293a.5\]]par gzigs so/_/de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas yang nang bcud kyi khams sems dang sems las byung ba'i g.yo ba dang /_'gul ba dang /_dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_byol song dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lha'i rigs so so'i khams 
[\[293a.6\]]dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_mu stegs kyi khams dang /_bdud chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_ru tra dang /_ru tra can la 
[\[293a.7\]]sogs pa'i khams la rnam par gzigs so/_/de dag thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas yang nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang /_rig 'dzin sa pa'i bsti gnas dang /_phyogs bcu dus 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad sa la rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas smra bsam las 'das pa de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi mdzad/_rnam par mi mdzad/_mdzad pa mi 'gog_/mdzad pa rnam par 
[\[293b.2\]]yang mi 'gog_/mi mdzad pa yang mi gnas/_cang mi gsung /_rnam par mi gsung mi sgrogs/_gsungs pa yang mi 'gog_/gsungs pa rnam par yang mi 'gog_/mi gsung mi 'gog pa la yang mi gnas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_snod kyi khams 
[\[293b.3\]]thams cad dang /_sa'i khyad par thams cad la yang mi gzigs mi dgongs/_gzigs shing dgongs pa la yang mi 'gog_/rnam par yang mi 'gog_/mi 'gog pa la yang mi gnas so/_/de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi 
[\[293b.4\]]dkyil 'khor de dag dang /_snod kyi khams de dag dang /_bcud kyi khams de dag dang /_sa'i khyad par de dag thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid tsam du yang dmigs su med do/_/dper na nam mkha' ni chos thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la ji lta bu'i 
[\[293b.5\]]ngo bor yang gdags su med pa de bzhin du don dam pa byang chub sems de yang chos thams cad la yang khyab la smra bsam las kyang 'das so/_/de ltar chos kyi sku'i ngo bor brjod du med pa la brnal bzhin du yum kun du bzang mo rngam pa'i kro d+hi'i rgyal mos stong 
[\[293b.6\]]nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul lo/_/o~M snang stong stong pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sku/_/smra bsam las 'das don dam byang chub sems/_/stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis/_/snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gsol/_/zhes bskul bas/_bskul bar 
[\[293b.7\]]thugs su chud nas stong nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ngang las rig pa'i ye shes snying rje chen po yis kun du klong bdal bar khyab ste/_snying rje chen po des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par mdzad do/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par mdzad nas yang snod 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas yang bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad do/_/bcud kyi khams kun la khyab par mdzad nas sa'i khams kun la khyab par mdzad do/_/dper na nyi ma bar snang la shar ba'i 'od kun la snyoms 
[\[294a.2\]]pa bzhin du rig pa'i nyi ma snying rjes byang chub kyi sems kyis kyang stong nyid kyi ngang kun la snyoms par khyab bdal to/_/de'i tshe gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid yang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[294a.3\]]snyoms par zhugs so/_/zhugs ma thag tu snying rjes kun la khyab par gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu yin no/_/de nas yum kun du bzang mo rngam pa kro d+hi'i rgyal mos yang glu 'dis bskul lo/_/ma ltar byams pa'i thugs rjes kun du khyab/_/mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 
[\[294a.4\]]'phrul 'byung gnas las/_/longs spyod rdzogs dang thugs rje sprul pa'i sku/_/'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol/_/a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad don dam pa byang chub sems 
[\[294a.5\]]la shar bar mkhyen nas mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i mngon du phyung ste/_dper na zla ba dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang ba la shar ba bzhin no/_/rdo rje'i sku de las rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni dper na nyi 'od kyi 'od zer dus gcig shar ba 
[\[294a.6\]]lta bu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'dod chags chen po'i tshul rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhugs nas kyang yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mo la gzigs te 'dzum 
[\[294a.7\]]pa rnam par mdzad do/_/de nas yum kro d+hi'i rgyal mos kyang spyan zim bag gi tshul gyis gzigs nas lan stong du brkyang phyag btsal te g.yon pa slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul lo/_/e ma'o yid bzhin sku mchog tshogs chen mngon rdzogs lha/_/rdo rje gar 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]gyi tshul gyis gar mdzad cing /_/dga' mchog rdo rje'i byang chub sems chen de/_/'dzum zhing 'khyil pa'i pad+ma'i gnas su phob ho/_/e ma'o/_/dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin dang /_/chags pa dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du/_/gnyis med 'phros 
[\[294b.2\]]pa'i byin brlabs bsam yas las/_/ye shes lha tshogs sprul sku bsam yas 'thon/_/ma rig mun pas ldongs pas don gyis phye/_/dgon gdungs gnas nas byang chub myu gu skyed/_/zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slong /_/zhes rnam par bskul bas 
[\[294b.3\]]gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rol pas rol zhing brjid pa dang bcas nas gar mdzad pa dang /_zhal 'dzum pa dang /_'dor ba dang /_skum pa dang /_'gying ba dang /_spyan mdzes pa'i smin ring bskyod cing sgyur ba dang /_dung gi phur pas g.yan pa slong ba dang /_'dor 
[\[294b.4\]]zhing skum pa dang /_'jog cing 'deg pa dang /_rnam par 'dor ba'i rol pa'i gar gyis nam mkha'i khams kun du khyab par mdzad do/_/rnam par rol pa des 'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la khyab par mdzad do/_/des sems dang 
[\[294b.5\]]sems las byung ba kun la khyab par mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems zhi zhing 'khyil bas rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas snod kyi khams dang /_bcud kyi khams dang /_bsam gtan pa dang /_'gog pa pa dang /_sa'i khyad par 
[\[294b.6\]]thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang /_steg pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_'khyud pa dang /_sdom pa dang /_bstim pa dang /_mnyes pa dang /_gsol ba dang /_myang ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_sprod pa dang /_'jog pa la sogs 
[\[294b.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis kun du rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so/_/de nas de'i tshe thugs rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong nas rig pa byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer brjod kyis mi lang ba 'byam klas pa shar ba de las gsung 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]gi yig 'bru 'khor lo'i tshogs su yang snang ngo /_/yig 'bru de nyid thugs phyag mtshan du yang gyur/_thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'od du 'phros shing rnam par 'du ba'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi 'khor rgyal ba yab yum dang /_sems 
[\[295a.2\]]dpa' dang /_sems ma dang /_thub pa dang /_'joms pa dang /_'joms pa rnams kyi skur yang rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las snang bar byas te gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la mdun gyis bltas nas rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod de/_de ltar re re la'ang sangs rgyas 
[\[295a.3\]]kyi 'khor zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa lhun gyis grub bo/_/yang 'od zer de dag re re las he ru ka mang po'i tshogs kyang shar to/_/he ru ka re re la yang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gi 'khor so so'i zhabs 'bring dang bcas 
[\[295a.4\]]pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do/_/he ru ka re re las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab ste mun nag gi klong gsal bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi glu dang gar dang /_chos kyi char dang /_mchod pa dang /_chos kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rngam pa'i cho 'phrul yan man 
[\[295a.5\]]dang snrel zhi thams cad du ling long phyad do/_/de'i tshe he ru ka 'od kyi phreng ba des ru tra can dang /_bdud dang srin po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa rang rang gi che ba'i nga rgyal rab tu ston pa rnams zhi zhing dul bar gyur te/_rang rang 
[\[295a.6\]]gi dbang phrogs nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di la dad par gyur nas 'dus rab tu 'dus so/_/de'i tshe na byang chub sems kyi 'od zer kun du khyab pa des 'du shes med pa dang 'gog pa la gnas pa'i mur lhung ba rnams sa bon mes tshig pa dang 'dra ba de yang dri ma 
[\[295a.7\]]med pa'i byang chub sems rin po che'i chu des dbang bskur bas byang chub sems kyi dbang thob ste 'gro ba'i don byed par gyur to/_/gzhan yang sa'i khyad par la gnas pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sa la skyo sems skyes te las kyi tshe bkag nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]'di la rab tu dad do/_/de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur te 'dus nas shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa/_e ma'o e ma'o ya mtshan che/_/gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che/_/'od zer 'phro 'du ya mtshan che/_/byang chub 
[\[295b.2\]]char sprin ya mtshan che/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che/_/sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che/_/khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che/_/byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che/_/dgon gdungs spangs pa ya mtshan che/_/'gog pa gsos pa ya mtshan che/_/bdag 
[\[295b.3\]]cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams/_/dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzod/_/bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod/_/ces gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des sku gsung thugs gnyis su med 
[\[295b.4\]]pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang po la gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang po des bskul bar rnam par rig nas btsun mo bya ba mo 
[\[295b.5\]]kun du bzang mo dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing rang gi stan las rnam par langs te byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma gnas lngar btab nas lce pad+mo'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/_brkyang phyag btsal nas mi 'jigs pa'i lta bas ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas don 
[\[295b.6\]]bsdu bar gsol ba btab pa/_gsang ba'i bdag po yab yum dgongs su gsol/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po dgongs su gsol/_/gsang mdzod ye shes glog gi 'khor lo 'di/_/chos kyi rgyal po chen pos bshad du gsol/_/zhes gsol ba btab pas 
[\[295b.7\]]gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos byed pa po kun du bzang po rdo rje las kyi bka' bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir thugs gsang ba'i mkha' las byang chub sems sprin spros pas las kyi 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram gcig lag tu bzhag ste/_las kyi dbang bskur nas ming yang 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]las kyi sems dpa' byed pa po kun du bzang por btags te las kyi dbang thob par gyur to/_/chos kyi 'khor lo pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa lce stengs su bzhag ste/_smra ba'i seng ge chos kyi sems dpa' zhes ming du dbang bskur te chos smra ba'i dbang 
[\[296a.2\]]thob bo/_/de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang po de btsun mo bya ba mo kun du bzang mo la 'jug cing spobs pa can du gyur to/_/de nas smra ba'i seng ge kun du bzang po des 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir las kyi 'khor 
[\[296a.3\]]lo dang chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du bskor te cho 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te/_zhing khams mtha' dag kyang g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_yan man dang snrel 
[\[296a.4\]]zhi'i zhing khams mtha' dag kyang ling long phyad par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems kyi mtshan mas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi gnas lngar reg par byas so/_/hU~M badzra sa ma ya/_gu h+ya sa ma ya kro d+ha sa ma ya/_rdo rje 'du bar 'dus pa yi/_/'dus pa chen po'i rig 
[\[296a.5\]]'dzin rnams/_/gong 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/_/rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gnos/_/bskal bzang dam tshig chen po ste/_/de las 'das na brlag par 'gyur/_/zhes bsgo bas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang gi sems rangs par byas te dam tshig thob nas 
[\[296a.6\]]rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod rnam par 'khod do/_/de nas byed pa po kun du bzang po las kyi bka' ba des bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la gtsug gis 'dud phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te phyi dang /_nang dang /_gsang ba mchod pa 
[\[296a.7\]]de kho na nyid kyis mchod de gsol ba btab bo/_/'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod/_/sangs rgyas yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras/_/ya mtshan chen po ston par spyod/_/bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de/_/smra brjod yul las rab 'das kyang /_/ngag gi lam nas 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]rab brjod cing /_/dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis/_/gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod/_/a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[296b.2\]]zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun du bzang po de la lugs su btud de brkyang phyag btsal nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas gsol ba btab pa/_smra ba'i seng ge byed 
[\[296b.3\]]pa po rdo rje kun du bzang po khyod la bdag cag zhu bar spobs na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/_smra ba'i seng ge kun du bzang pos bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa bdag la zhus shig_/bdag gis gnang ba'i skabs dbye'o/_/
[\[296b.4\]]'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/_smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po dang kun du bzang po khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rje btsan/_rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi lha phud/_chos thams cad kyi mdzod lags na/_
[\[296b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bdag cag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/_gsang ba'i tshig lam gyis ston par mi snang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol/_smra ba'i seng ge legs par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa 
[\[296b.6\]]dang /_smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/_o~M AHhU~M a la la ho/_rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung /_/mi gsung ba nyid rgya cher bshad/_/bshad du med pa'i don de ni/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de/_/de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang /_/rnam 
[\[296b.7\]]par brjod par mi mdzad de/_/bka' mi stsal bar dgongs pa'o/_/'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig_/de bas na gsang ba don dam pa'i byang chub kyi snying po de smra bsam las 'das shing brjod du med pas de la tshig tu smra ba legs pa ma yin te/_tshig tu 
[\[297a\]]
