[\[297a.1\]]smos pa'i dus nyid na gol ba yin par phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bshad de/_da ltar ston pa nyid kyang don de nyid dgongs nas ma gsungs so/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams de bas na ma skyes pa'i snying po byang chub 
[\[297a.2\]]sems tshig tu spros pa dang bral gyis kyang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i dbang du mtshan ma'i tshig gi rnal 'byor pa rnams tshig gi phyir 'brang ba'i phyir don rtogs pa'i bkri ba'i phyir rgyal ba rnams kyi tshig gi sgo nas gsungs pa yin no/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs 
[\[297a.3\]]rnams kyis gsol pa/_smra ba'i seng ge de ltar na bdag cag dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi don du/_rdo rje tshig gi lam du brjod pas don gsal bar byed pa de smra ba'i seng ge las kyi bka' ba khyod nyid kyis zhu bar spobs 
[\[297a.4\]]shig_/smra ba'i seng ge dbang bas na bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la zhus shig dang /_de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog 
[\[297a.5\]]gi bdag po la lan stong du bskor ba byas te rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis mchod nas 'di skad gsol ba btab bo/_/e ma ho ston pa'i ngo mtshar khyod/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de/_/
[\[297a.6\]]tshig tu brjod pa ma lags na'ang /_/mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa/_/don la rtsing la tshig la zhib/_/tshig gis bsam pa rangs bya'i phyir/_/snying po byang chub don 'di la/_/dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis/_/gsang ba de nyid bshad du gsol/_/
[\[297a.7\]]zhes gsol ba btab pa las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po smra ba'i seng ges gsol ba btab pa yang mkhyen/_'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa yang mkhyen pa dang /_tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor yang thugs su 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]chud nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum phyung ste/_ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse dgu pa yang nas yang du gsor zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sgra chen po rab tu bsgrags so/_/o~M AHhU~M swA hA/_bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya sa ma ya/_'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[297b.2\]]grags pa chen po kun/_/rab tu sngangs te brgyal bar gyur/_/'khor tshogs gzhan la smos ci dgos/_/de nas gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu rnams nyon cig_/gang tshig gis brjod du rung ba thams cad ni 
[\[297b.3\]]kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o/_/ji srid brjod du rung ba ma yin pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o/_/gang tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o/_/gang tshig dang yi ges brjod du rung ba thams cad ni gzugs kyi sku'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[297b.4\]]bu sngags kyi lta ba dang spyod pa yang de nyid yin te/_gang don dam pa'i bden pa dang /_chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi lta ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/de nyid rgyu'i tshul du gnas pa las/_'bras bu'i tshul du kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_gzugs kyi skur 
[\[297b.5\]]snang ste/_ji ltar spyad pa dang spyad du rung ba thams cad ni spyod par rnal 'byor can gyis blta'o/_/de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos a la la ho zhes pa'i sgra brjod de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[297b.6\]]de ltar lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi lta ba la blo gnas pa gang lags/_lta ba dang spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni gang lags/_spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas pa ni gang lags/_gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_smra ba'i seng ge legs so/_/
[\[297b.7\]]de'i don khyod nga la zhu ba ni legs so/_/smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi dgongs pa'i yul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don dam pa'i bden pa tsam kyang spangs na kun rdzob kyi bden pa lta ga la yod de 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]bden pa gnyis su yang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/lta ba dang spyod pa la blo gnas pa ni rnal 'byor pas thob pa dang /_sa la bsnyen pa rnams te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnal 'byor pa blo mnyam pa nyid du blo chung ba rnams la ni/_/bden pa rnam pa gnyis 
[\[298a.2\]]kyi tshul yod de don dam par ma skyes pa'i tshul du blo chung la/_kun rdzob tu mtshan ma thabs kyi phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du yang med pa ma yin te/_mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/slob pa'i rnal 'byor de ni 
[\[298a.3\]]bden pa rnam pa gnyis la brten nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la goms pa che chung gis grub pa yin no/_/sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor/_don las ring du gyur pa rnams ni spyod pa 'ba' zhig la blo gnas te/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_log pa'i kun rdzob 'ba' 
[\[298a.4\]]zhig la rtog gi yang dag pa'i kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/smra ba'i seng ge de bas na log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo lta bu'i chos la brten nas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du chos thams cad 
[\[298a.5\]]shes par bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par nus pa ni rig pa'i skyes bu zhes grags so/_/smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i 
[\[298a.6\]]rang bzhin gang lags/_dper brjod na ji skad du brjod pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul rnams ngas bshad kyis nyon cig_/ngas yid tshim par bya'o/_/smra ba'i seng 
[\[298a.7\]]ge gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste rab tu brjod par dka' na mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcur 'dus so/_/bcu gang zhe na/_gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi ming gi khyad par dang /_gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang /_gsang 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]sngags kyi dngos grub dang /_gsang sngags kyi grub pa'i gnas dang /_gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_gsang sngags kyi lta ba dang /_gsang sngags kyi cho 'phrul lo/_/smra ba'i seng 
[\[298b.2\]]ge de dag gi dper brjod pa yang rnam pa bcu ste/_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_brag ca dang /_chu zla dang /_chu'i chu bur dang /_mig 'khrul dang /_mgal me bskor ba lta bu'i rnam par snang ngo /_/smra ba'i 
[\[298b.3\]]seng ge de yang ji lta zhe na/_sgyu ma zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang /_sman dang sbyor sngags kyi sbyor ba las/_dbang po'i yid 'phrog pa'i rnam pa cir yang snang yang slu ba'i bdag nyid can de snang ba med do/_/de bzhin du gsang sngags sgrub pa'i 
[\[298b.4\]]mtshan nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin dang yig 'bru dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba las grub pa'i rtags dag snang yang de la rang bzhin med do/_/smig rgyu zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang 'gro ba skom gyis gdungs pa'i dus su nyi ma dro ba las smig rgyu la chur mthong yang de la chu'i rang 
[\[298b.5\]]bzhin med do/_/de bzhin du gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang gdags pa'i gzhi med pa la ming dang tha snyad btags pa yang ming nyid dmigs su ga la yod/_rmi lam zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni skyes bu gnyid log pa'i tshe bde sdug gi rnam pa mang po rmis 
[\[298b.6\]]kyang sangs nas ci yang dmigs su med do/_/de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi spyod pa yang ji ltar spyad na yang spyad pa'i dmigs pa kun dang bral lo/_/gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang chu'am me long ngam 'bru mar la brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs 
[\[298b.7\]]su snang yang bzhin de nyid du 'phos pa med do/_/de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang bsgrub pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_yo byad la brten nas 'byung yang dmigs pa dang bral lo/_/dri za'i grong khyer zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni bar snang na dri za gang na 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]gnas pa der grong khyer yang de na gnas te de byung ma thag tu rtag pa ma yin pa dang gsang sngags kyi gnas kyang rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyis kyang bskyed par 'byung la/_de yang ther zug ma yin no/_/brag ca zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni brag gi ngos 
[\[299a.2\]]la sgra ji skad rkyen pa skad brag ca la yang de bzhin du 'byung ngo /_/'byung yang sgrar mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'i sgra yang bzlas pa tsam nyid na stong pa'o/_/chu zla zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni zla ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du snang yang chu la zla ba med do/_/
[\[299a.3\]]de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la yang gzung 'dzin kyi rtog pa med do/_/chu'i chu bur zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu'i rlabs chen gcig las chu bur mang du 'byung zhing slar yang 'du ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa yang gcig tu ma chad do/_/mig 
[\[299a.4\]]'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni mi mig nad can gyis bar snang la bltas na zla ba gnyis su snang yang zla ba la gnyis su gyur pa med do/_/de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi lta ba yang 'dzin rtog gi lta ba cir rnam par rtog pa rnam mang yongs su grub par yongs 
[\[299a.5\]]su mi lta'o/_/mgal me bskor ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang dag lag na mgal me thogs nas bskor na dbyibs kyi rnam pa ji ltar yang snang ste/_de la dbyibs med do/_/de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi cho 'phrul cir yang snang zhing 'byung la dngos 
[\[299a.6\]]por ma grub pa'o/_/smra ba'i seng ge de ltar na gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni de ltar shes par bya'o/_/smra ba'i seng ge de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten nas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par bya'o/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi 
[\[299a.7\]]rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par phye ba'i sgo nas gleng bslang ba dang sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]gsang ba mchog gi rgyal po la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa rgyas pa de kho na nyid kyis rab tu mchod de kun du rab tu mchod nas gtsug gi 'dud pas phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/_/e ma'o bder 
[\[299b.2\]]gshegs kun du bzang /_/e ma'o ye nas dag pa'i don/_/e ma'o gsang ba mchog gi bad ga_/e ma'o ye shes rngam pa'i glog_/e ma'o gnyis med dgyes chen po/_/e ma'o bde ba bde chen mchog_/e ma'o rnam dag dpal khyod la/_/e ma'o bdag 
[\[299b.3\]]cag gsol ba 'debs/_/byang chub sems 'di ji ltar skyed/_/dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar lags/_/phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ci/_/bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi ji ltar lags/_/dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnam grangs ci/_/sngags kyi sdom pa ji ltar bsrung /_/
[\[299b.4\]]rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad/_/dregs pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar gdul/_/rnam bzhi'i las ni ji ltar bgyi/_/brnag pa'i nan tur ji ltar bgyi/_/rnal 'byor rnams la brtse ba dang /_/bdag cag rnams la sman slad du/_/bcom ldan snying pos bshad du 
[\[299b.5\]]gsol/_/a la la ho zhes gsol ba las bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/smra ba'i seng ge gsang sngags mdo'i don rnams phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa la phan gdags pa 
[\[299b.6\]]dang /_dad pa can gyi 'gro ba rnams yid ches par bya ba'i phyir nga la zhu ba legs so/_/smra ba'i seng ge legs so/_/phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas sngar 'das pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /_slad kyis byon 
[\[299b.7\]]pa rnams kyis gsung bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi don thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_rgyud kyi 'brel pa/_don gyi bkod pa/_rtags kyi rol pa/_ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor los rnam par bsgyings pa gzhung chen po 'di ngas 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]bshad par bya yis skal ba dang ldan pa rnams gsang sngags kyi don zab mo mi thos par dka' na thos nas de'i don la gnas par dka' ste phal gyi thun mong du ma gyur pa'o/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i 
[\[300a.2\]]mdo zhes bya ba las sngags kyi mdo bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de snying po byang chub la nges par 'grel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/zhugs nas yang 'dus 
[\[300a.3\]]pa'i 'khor tshogs la bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu rnams chos thams cad ni byang chub sems su 'dus shing byang chub kyi sems nyid snang ba shes par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni lus dang ngag dang sems su 'dus la/_lus dang ngag 
[\[300a.4\]]dang sems nyid chos thams cad kyi rnam par snang ngo /_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/_lus dang ngag dang sems bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rnams lus dang 
[\[300a.5\]]ngag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni sems kyang lus dang ngag gi rnam pa lta bu/_ngag kyang lus dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bu/_lus kyang tshig tu brjod pa dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bur rang rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rtogs shig_/'on tang byang chub tu sems 
[\[300a.6\]]bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/_/phung po khams dang skye mched dang /_/gzung 
[\[300a.7\]]dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/_/chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas/_/rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa/_/stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/_/chos kun skye ba med pa las/_/skye ba 'di ni rab grags pa/_/skye dang mi skye gnyis med pa/_/byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[300b.2\]]so/_/de nas yang me long lta bu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/_/chos kun 'gag pa med pa las/_/'gag pa 'di 
[\[300b.3\]]ni rab tu bsgrags/_/'gag dang mi 'gag med pa ste/_/byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o ngo 
[\[300b.4\]]mtshar ya mtshan gyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/_/chos kun gnas pa med pa las/_/gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/_/gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste/_/byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang chos thams cad so so 
[\[300b.5\]]kun du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/_/chos kun dmigs pa med pa las/_/dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/_/
[\[300b.6\]]dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste/_/byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba la nan tan du sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan 
[\[300b.7\]]gyi/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs/_/chos kun spro bsdu med pa las/_/spros dang bsdus par rab tu grags/_/spros bsdus yod dang med pa ste/_/byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]pos a la la ho zhes sgra phyung ste byang chub sems la bstod pa/_e ma'o bde chen kun du bzang /_/e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems/_/e ma'o dag pa dri ma med/_/e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che/_/e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos/_/e ma'o 
[\[301a.2\]]so sor rang rig sems/_/e ma'o byang sems lhun gyis grub/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das nyid khyad par du gyur pa yang byang chub sems nyid yin zhing byang chub kyi sems thugs su chud pa'o/_/bdag cag rig 'dzin gyi 
[\[301a.3\]]tshogs su gyur pa rnams kyang byang chub sems la smon par 'tshal/_'jug par 'tshal/_ldang bar 'tshal/_gnas par 'tshal te/_bdag cag kyang rang rang gi sems g.yos par bgyi/_reg par bgyi/_nye bar bgyi/_nyams su myong bar bgyi bar 'tshal na/_
[\[301a.4\]]bdag cag de 'dra ba'i bsam pa can la snying rje chen por dgongs par mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa dgongs pa mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas snying rje byang chub 'byung ba 
[\[301a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/gnyis su med par mngon par 'du mdzad pas byang chub sems kyi sprin kyis thams cad rgyas par khyab pa ni til 'bru mar gyis khyab pa bzhin no/_/de nas yang 'di gsungs 
[\[301a.6\]]so/_/e ma'o ye shes rnam dag chos/_/sna tshogs snang yang rtog par gsang /_/ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med/_/snod ma yin la bstan pa dka'o/_/e ma'o srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin la/_/bdag tu rtog pa srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs kyis/_/
[\[301a.7\]]yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams/_/mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor gzung /_/log rtog nor ba'i dbang gis kun brtags kyang /_/rang bzhin nyid las mnyam pa rdul tsam med/_/e ma'o yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]dus nas rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/_/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]ye nas don gyis sangs rgyas yin mod kyang /_/rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams/_/log rtog nyid la dngos med byang chub sems/_/'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che/_/snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su gsal/_/phung po lnga nyid 
[\[301b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku/_/srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs nyid kyang byang chub snying por gnas/_/phyi nang snod bcud yab yum ngang du gsal/_/zhes gsungs pas chos thams cad byang chub sems su gnas so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa'i glog gi 
[\[301b.3\]]'khor lo'i mdo las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag nyid sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung bar bzhed nas btsun mo dang gnyis su med par 'du 
[\[301b.4\]]mdzad do/_/mngon par 'du mdzad nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mdo 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig_/gsang sngags byin brlabs bsam 
[\[301b.5\]]yas la/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas brjod mi lang /_/mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te/_/rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang /_/ting 'dzin gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/bkri drang rdul tshon dkyil 'khor te/_/gsum po dag tu rgyal bas 
[\[301b.6\]]gsungs/_/zhes ched du gleng ngo /_/de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gsum du brjod par mthong lags so/_/de yang 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/_/
[\[301b.7\]]e ma'o gsang mchog bde ba che/_/ye nas lhun grub dag pa'i bdag_/dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso/_/rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i/_/rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med/_/rang bzhin lhun grub zab mo'i don/_/
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol/_/a la la ho/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des gsol ba btab pa'i don thugs su chud nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[302a.2\]]'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/zhugs nas yang rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor spros pa dang bral ba 'di gsungs so/_/e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/_/bla na med pa rtogs 'gyur ba'i/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang /_/de 
[\[302a.3\]]ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang bzhin don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni spyir bsdus pa'o/_/sems can kun gyi sems chen po/_/
[\[302a.4\]]rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med/_/phung po lnga don sangs rgyas lnga/_/'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum/_/khams dang skye mched mang po kun/_/sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/des na srid gsum dkyil 'khor che/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de 
[\[302a.5\]]la phung po lnga sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa yang /_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzugs rnams kun/_/chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na/_/dbyer med don gyi gti mug pas/_/rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin 
[\[302a.6\]]yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad/_/bde sdug tshor ba'i phung po kun/_/mnyam nyid dbyings la snang bas na/_/nga rgyal chen po'i rang bzhin pas/_/myong ba rin chen 'byung ba yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_yul dang shes 
[\[302a.7\]]pa phra rags kyi/_/byed pa'i phung po thams cad kun/_/ma 'dres dbyings la snang bas na/_/shes rab rlabs kyi 'dod chags pas/_/snang ba mtha' yas rang bzhin no/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_dge dang mi dge gnyis ka min/_/sems 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]las byung dang ma byung ba'i/_/'du byed phung po thams cad kun/_/spro bsdu dbyings las byung bas na/_/rnam par grol ba'i phrag dog pas/_/don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/rnam smin rang sems rnam rig pa'i/_/
[\[302b.2\]]shes brgyad rnam shes phung po kun/_/rig pa'i dbyings la shar bas na/_/zhe sdang chen po'i ye shes pas/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni chen po lnga dbyings phyug lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_snod bcud 'gro ba 
[\[302b.3\]]thams cad kyi/_/gsal stong mi sgrib go 'byed pa'i/_/snang stong nam mkha'i khams rnams kun/_/stong nyid dbyings la shar bas na/_/thams cad gnas pa'i klong yin pas/_/bde gshegs dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams 
[\[302b.4\]]cad/_/sra brtan skyed bskrun rten rnams kun/_/sa yi khams su grags pa rnams/_/mi 'gyur dbyings la shar bas na/_/thams cad skyed pa'i rten yin pas/_/rdo rje dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/gyes sdud gsher 
[\[302b.5\]]ba'i mtshan nyid kun/_/chu yi khams su grags pa ste/_/kun sdud dbyings su shar bas na/_/yon tan tshogs chen kun sdud pas/_/rin chen dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/gsal dro'i ngo bo thams cad kun/_/me yi 
[\[302b.6\]]khams su grags pa rnams/_/snang gsal dbyings la shar bas na/_/gsal dro sreg pa'i rang bzhin pas/_/pad+ma'i dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/yang g.yo 'degs bskyod thams cad kun/_/rlung gi khams su grags 
[\[302b.7\]]pa ste/_/bskyod chen dbyings la shar bas na/_/thogs med shugs bskyod rang bzhin pas/_/las kyi dbyings phyug rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rnam par shes pa bzhi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_srid 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/kha dog dbyibs la spyod pa kun/_/mig gi rnam shes zhes su grags/_/mthong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/sa yi snying po'i rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/sgra rnams 
[\[303a.2\]]kun la spyod pa kun/_/rna ba'i rnam shes zhes su grags/_/thos pa'i ye shes yin pas na/_/lag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/dri rnams kun la spyod pa kun/_/sna yi rnam shes zhes su grags/_/tshor ba'i ye shes 
[\[303a.3\]]yin pas na/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/ro rnams kun la spyod pa kun/_/lce yi rnam shes zhes su grags/_/myong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[303a.4\]]de la yul bzhi byang chub sems ma bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad/_/kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma kun/_/gzugs kyi skye mched nyid du grags/_/mthong bar bya ba'i yul yin pas/_/gzugs mdzes lA s+yai'i rang 
[\[303a.5\]]bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/zin dang ma zin gnyis ka las/_/byung ba'i sgra yi khams su grags/_/thos par bya ba'i yul yin pas/_/nir t+ya ma yi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/lhan cig skyes dang sbyar 
[\[303a.6\]]dang gyur/_/zhim dang nga dang de bzhin gzhan/_/dri yi khams dang skye mched de/_/bsnam par bya ba'i yul yin pas/_/mA lai nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/kha mngar la sogs ro rnams kun/_/ro yi skye mched nyid du 
[\[303a.7\]]grags/_/myang bar bya ba'i yul yin pas/_/gI ti nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dbang po bzhi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/mthong byed dang ba'i bdag 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]nyid de/_/mig gi khams zhes bya bar grags/_/mthong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir/_/byams pa mai tri rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/thos par byed pa'i bdag nyid de/_/rna ba'i khams zhes bya bar grags/_/thos pa'i bya ba 
[\[303b.2\]]byed pa'i phyir/_/sgrib pa kun sel rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/snom byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de/_/sna yi khams zhes bya bar grags/_/tshor bar bya ba byed pa'i phyir/_/'jam dpal nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum 
[\[303b.3\]]sems can thams cad kyi/_/myong byed dag pa'i bdag nyid de/_/lce yi khams zhes bya bar grags/_/myong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir/_/kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la dus bzhi mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_
[\[303b.4\]]snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/rgyu 'bras kun du rnam par spyad/_/sngon 'das dus su rnam par grags/_/sngon 'das dpyid kyi rang bzhin yin/_/spos me'i rang bzhin nyid yin no/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/rgyu spyad 'bras bu ma spyad kun/_/
[\[303b.5\]]da ltar dbyar gyi rang bzhin yin/_/me tog nyid kyi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/rgyu 'bras yongs kyis ma spyad pa/_/ma 'ongs dus su rnam par grags/_/'ong ma rag ston rang bzhin ni/_/A lo ke yi rang bzhin yin/_/snod 
[\[303b.6\]]bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/rgyu 'bras nges par ma tshogs pa/_/'byung bar ma nges dus zhes grags/_/ma 'ongs dgun gyi rang bzhin ni/_/gan d+he'i rang bzhin yin par nges/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni lus kyi dbang po dang /_rnam par 
[\[303b.7\]]shes pa dang /_yang de'i yul dang de las byung ba'i byang chub sems khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/reg byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de/_/lus kyi khams zhes bya bar grags/_/reg byed bya ba byed pas na/_/gshin 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]rje 'joms pa'i rang bzhin no/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/reg bya kun la spyod pa kun/_/lus kyi rnam shes zhes su grags/_/reg pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin yin/_/srid gsum sems can 
[\[304a.2\]]thams cad kyi/_/byung dang 'byung 'gyur reg bya rnams/_/reg bya'i skye mched nyid du grags/_/reg par bya ba'i yul yin pas/_/rta mchog dpal gyi rang bzhin no/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/tshogs drug 'gags pa'i de ma thag_/go 
[\[304a.3\]]'byed gsal ba'i bdag nyid de/_/yid kyi khams zhes bya bar grags/_/des spyod bya ba byed pa'i phyir/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa bzhi lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/_snod bcud 'gro 
[\[304a.4\]]ba thams cad kyi/_/'jig dang skad cig mi rtag pa/_/rtag par ma yin zhes su grags/_/sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir/_/lcags kyu ma yi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/kun rtog gzhan dbang med min pa/_/chad par ma yin zhes 
[\[304a.5\]]su grags/_/rmi lam lta bur sems snang phyir/_/zhags pa ma yi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/gzung 'dzin dngos por ma grub pa/_/mtshan mar ma yin zhes su grags/_/smig rgyu lta bur sems snang phyir/_/lcags 
[\[304a.6\]]sgrog ma yi rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/skyes bu byed pa ma grub pa/_/bdag tu ma yin zhes su grags/_/sgra brnyan lta bu'i sems snang phyir/_/dril bu ma yi rang bzhin yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni yid dang chos 
[\[304a.7\]]gtso gzungs gnyis kyi rang bzhin du bstan te/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/chos rnams kun la nges spyod pa'i/_/yid kyi rnam shes zhes su grags/_/rtog pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir/_/kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin yin/_/snod bcud 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi/_/'dus byas ma byas chos rnams kun/_/chos kyi skyed byed yin par grags/_/rnam par shes pa'i yul yin pas/_/kun du bzang mo'i rang bzhin yin/_/de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog_/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam 
[\[304b.2\]]pa/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/_/ji snyed rnam grangs yod pa'i chos/_/kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin pas/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po yi/_/rnam grangs yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/zhes ched du brjod pa gsungs so/_/de nas 
[\[304b.3\]]yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/kun rdzob mtshan ma'i gnas chen kyang /_/'og min bla med gnas mchog gam/_/lcang lo can nam bde ba can/_/pad+ma can la sogs pa 
[\[304b.4\]]yi/_/rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor de/_/mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor ngo la snang /_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la/_/'byung chen brtsegs pa'i lhun gyis grub/_/de steng rin chen sna bzhi las/_/lhun gyis grub pa tshad dpag 
[\[304b.5\]]med/_/de la brten pa'i sa gzhi ni/_/rin chen sna tshogs gcal du bkram/_/mnan nem bteg 'phar mdzes pa'i gzhi/_/de la pho brang gzhal med khang /_/gru bzhi lham pa mdzes par snang /_/rin chen sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub/_/glo 'bur bzhi yang mkhar 
[\[304b.6\]]thabs tshul/_/bum pa'i rtse mo chos kyi tog_/rma bya'i mdongs dang ldan pa'o/_/sgo bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/_/rta babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan/_/dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/_/lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan/_/gru chad bar khyams mdzes par ldan/_/
[\[304b.7\]]rin chen 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs/_/sems can pad+ma nyi zla dang /_/rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan mchog ldan/_/rin chen khri rkang rnam rten ldan/_/pho brang de yi gdan mchog kyang /_/nyi zla nor bu rin chen 'bar/_/bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/_/dar 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]dang ba ra mu tig phreng /_/dril bu dang ni rnga yab sogs/_/rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs brgyan/_/'jig rten lha tshogs mdzes pa dang /_/de la sogs te rgyan rnams kyang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog_/gzhal yas de yi sgo 
[\[305a.2\]]bzhi na/_/glang seng rnams kyis mdzes par byas/_/rta babs rnams kyi tsong tsong dang /_/gser gyi dril bu 'bar ba dag_/dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yang sgrogs/_/sgo drung de dag re re na/_/ta la'i skyed shing tsong tsong 'khril/_/dri dang gzugs dang 'od du ldan/_/
[\[305a.3\]]ta la'i skyed shing de dag la/_/khu byug la sogs bkra shis pa'i/_/bya rnams snyan pa'i skad kyang 'byin/_/sgo drung de dag re re na/_/khrus kyi rdzing bu dbyibs legs pa/_/blo mchog yan lag ldan pa'i chu/_/grangs med de dag re re na/_/lha dang lha mo bsam mi 
[\[305a.4\]]khyab/_/phyi rol kho ra khor yug na/_/rtse sa 'chag sa brjod mi lang /_/de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog_/ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub/_/lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis/_/rgyu las grub par rgyal bas gsungs/_/pho brang de na gnas 
[\[305a.5\]]pa yi/_/ye shes lha tshogs mang po rnams/_/gtso gzungs zung du 'khril ba ste/_/dbus kyi pho brang snying po la/_/rnam par snang mdzad snying po che/_/'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od 'dra/_/rang rtags lag na 'khor lo bsnams/_/dpa' bo de yi spyan snga na/_/
[\[305a.6\]]rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yang /_/dung dang shel gyi kha dog 'dra/_/rang rtags lag na rdo rje 'dzin/_/g.yas su rin chen 'byung ldan te/_/bai DUr+ya yi kha dog 'dra/_/rang rtags rin chen zur brgyad 'dzin/_/rgyab na snang ba mtha' yas gtso/_/pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 
[\[305a.7\]]'dra zhing /_/rang rtags pad+ma dmar po 'dzin/_/g.yon du don yod grub pa ste/_/in tra nI la ljang gu'i mdog_/rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin/_/kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te/_/thor tshugs rigs lnga dbu la brgyan/_/rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhugs/_/
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/_/phyag gdub snyan chas kun la mdzes/_/mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs/_/de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/_/kun du bzang dang lo tsa na/_/ma ma gos dkar sgrol ma rnams/_/g.yas pas thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud/_/g.yon 
[\[305b.2\]]pas rang rtags dril bu 'dzin/_/sku mdog cha lugs yab dang 'dra/_/'khor lo rtsibs la lhun gyis grub/_/spyan snga'i glo 'bur mdzes pa la/_/lag na rdo rje sngo skya'i mdog_/rang rtags rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin/_/g.yas na sa yi snying po ste/_/ljang sngon rin chen 
[\[305b.3\]]myu gu 'dzin/_/rgyab tu nam mkha'i snying po ste/_/mthing ga rang rtags ral gri 'dzin/_/g.yon du mdzes pa'i glo 'bur la/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar skya ste/_/rang rtags pad+ma dkar po 'dzin/_/thor tshugs ye shes sems dpas brgyan/_/sems dpa'i 
[\[305b.4\]]skyil mo krung du bzhugs/_/rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan/_/de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/_/gar dang sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs/_/g.yas pas thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud/_/g.yon pa gar dang me long phreng /_/pi wang 'dzin cing cha lugs gzhan/_/gtso bo 
[\[305b.5\]]nyid kyang mthun pa yin/_/mdzes pa'i gru chen rnams la ni/_/byams pa mai tri dkar ba ste/_/mdzes pa'i klu shing 'gun+d+he bsnams/_/shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la'o/_/sgrib pa rnam sel mthing ga ste/_/chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste/_/lho nub mtshams 
[\[305b.6\]]su mdzes par gnas/_/'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar skya'i mdog_/rang rtags ut+pal mthing ga 'dzin/_/nub byang mtshams su mdzes par gnas/_/kun du bzang po ljang ser mdog_/rang rtags rin chen snye ma 'dzin/_/byang shar mtshams 
[\[305b.7\]]kyi gru la gnas/_/de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/_/spos dang me tog bdug pa dri/_/g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud/_/g.yon pa rang rtags 'dzin pa'o/_/cha lugs thams cad snga ma bzhin/_/sgo khyud rnams la 'joms pa ni/_/gshin rje gshed po 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]mthing nag 'bar/_/nir mgo gdengs pa lag mtshan thogs/_/shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas/_/rnam par rgyal ba ser nag 'bar/_/rdo rjes gnod pa lho sgor ro/_/rta mgrin dmar nag 'bar ba ste/_/thod sbrul thogs pa nub sgor 
[\[306a.2\]]gnas/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag 'bar/_/rgya gram gyis gnon byang gi sgor/_/stang stabs tshul du rab tu gnas/_/dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lta/_/me dpung 'bar ba'i klong du 'khyil/_/hU~M dang phaT 
[\[306a.3\]]kyi sgra chen sgrogs/_/de dag gi ni g.yon rol na/_/gshed mo dang ni rgyal ma dang /_/rta mgrin mo dang 'khyil mo rnams/_/lag mtshan lcags kyu zhags pa dang /_/sgrog dang dril bu thogs shing rngam/_/cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang 'dra/_/sgo khyud dag tu lhun 
[\[306a.4\]]gyis grub/_/mdzes pa'i bar khyams de nyid la/_/sprul sku thub pa chen mo drug_/ci 'dul thabs kyi skur ston pas/_/cha lugs ma nges 'dul bar ston/_/mdzes pa'i bar khyams de nyid las/_/mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol la/_/byed pa po dang bya ba mo/_/nam 
[\[306a.5\]]mkha' yi ni mdog 'dra la/_/ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gnas/_/de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog_/brjod med rjod du med pa yi/_/lha yi tshogs kyis gang bar gnas/_/dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/_/lha yi tshogs chen de dag gi_/thugs 
[\[306a.6\]]kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas/_/tshon gang 'od dang bcas pa'o/_/ljang la rang rtags yi ge rnams/_/rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal/_/de lta'i sku mchog re re la/_/tshul dgu dag dang ldan pa ste/_/mnyen dang lcug dang 'khyil bag dang /_/ldem 
[\[306a.7\]]bag chags dang gzhon tshul can/_/gsal dang 'tsher dang lhun stug dang /_/gzi brjid 'bar bar rab tu gnas/_/de ltar rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas/_/phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas/_/spyan drangs mchod pa dbul ba'i 'os/_/zhes gsungs pas 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub bo/_/de nas smra ba'i seng ge la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang gi bsam pa rangs par gyur te/_a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/a ho 
[\[306b.2\]]dmigs dang mi dmigs brtan g.yo chos kun lhun grub dpag mi lang /_/rang rig yon tan dpag med bsam yas mang po de kun brjod mi lang /_/gsang sngags rgya mtsho thugs rje bsam yas bsam khyab ji snyed dpag mi lang /_/sprul pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i 
[\[306b.3\]]bye snyed 'gro ba chos ston zhing khams khyab ces ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des mi g.yo ba rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[306b.4\]]la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur du rung tsam du rtogs shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar 
[\[306b.5\]]dbang bsgyur ba'o/_/'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste/_gsang sngags ya mtshan chen po 'di/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang /_/mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de/_/bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang /_/bskyed dang lhag pa'i 
[\[306b.6\]]ting 'dzin no/_/thog ma'i rnal 'byor nyid bsgoms te/_/dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na/_/ting nge 'dzin kyang rnam gsum ste/_/dang por de bzhin nyid kyi dang /_/de bzhin nyid la gnas bca'i phyir/_/stong pa chen 
[\[306b.7\]]po'i ting 'dzin bsgom/_/gnyis pa kun snang nam mkha'i ngang /_/snying rje yum gyis khyab pa'i phyir/_/mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom/_/gsum pa rang gi sa bon nam/_/rab tu brtan pa'i yig 'bru a/_/de las phra mo a 'phros 'dus/_/spros 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]shing bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med/_/de las bdag nyid chen por bsgom/_/ma lus thams cad rdzogs par gsal/_/rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur bas/_/rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bar du rdzogs/_/de bzhin dbyings las shar bas 
[\[307a.2\]]na/_/bdag nyid chen po g.yon du ste/_/mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad+mor ldan/_/de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/skyed pa yang ni 'di lta ste/_/lha tshogs bdag gis sras su skyed/_/de nas bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na/_/thog 
[\[307a.3\]]mar yab yum mkha' rnam gnyis/_/rdo rje pad+mar byin gyis brlab/_/gnyis med dgyes par 'khril ba las/_/b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a/_/'phro 'du dbyings su thim pa las/_/dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur/_/e ya~M ba~M su bru~M/_e nyid 'dus pas nam 
[\[307a.4\]]mkhar gsal/_/ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed/_/ba~M las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bskyed/_/su las gser gyi bris mar bskyed/_/bru~M las ri rab gzhal med khang /_/dbyibs dang kha dog tshad dpag med/_/'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs/_/
[\[307a.5\]]rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra ba'o/_/de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni/_/brtan 'byung mkha' yi yi ge a/_/'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ste/_/gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du la/_/bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar/_/ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_
[\[307a.6\]]Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha dad+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_ya wa ra la/_sha Sha sa ha/_k+Sha/_i I u U e ai o au/_gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/_/spro bsdu gsal bar gyur pa las/_/thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar/_/de las 
[\[307a.7\]]mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba/_/Tha la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/_/phung po lnga yi sa bon yin/_/tha la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga/_/bskyed pa'i sa bon yin par grags/_/ka la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/_/rnam shes lnga yi sa bon yin/_/tsa la sogs pa'i 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]yig 'bru lnga/_/mig gi khams la sogs pa lnga/_/pa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga/_/gzugs sogs skye mched rnam lnga'i yin/_/ya la sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/_/dus bzhi sa bon rab tu grags/_/sha la sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/_/phyin ci ma log 
[\[307b.2\]]dus bzhir bshad/_/i la sogs pa'i yig 'bru drug_/rdul snyed thub pa drug tu bshad/_/o~M ni yid kyi khams yin te/_/k+Sha ni yid kyi rnam shes khams/_/o~M ni chos kyi khams su bshad/_/so so thugs mtshan gsal ba las/_/sa bon rnams kyis 
[\[307b.3\]]mngon rdzogs bskyed/_/o~M hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika/_swA rat+na d+h+r-ika_/oM A ro lika/_hA pradz+nyAd+h+r-ika/_rmaM d+hA twI shwa ri/_lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/_mA~M mo hA ra ti/_pA~M ra ga ra ti/_tA~M badzra ra ti/_k+Shi hi rA dza ya/_t+na~M a gam+b+ha aH/_hriHha hU~M pad+ma/_dzIM ku ru pan+na hrIH/_hU~M lA s+ye/_trA~M mA la/_hrIHgi ti/_
[\[307b.4\]]a nr-i t+ya/_mai d+ha ra Ni/_th+l+hIMni swa raM b+ha ya/_swa ra tsa ya/_mu~M shrI A~M ra ga ya/_dzaHd+hU pa/_hU~M puSh+pa/_/pa~M dI pa/_hoHgan+d+he/_hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita/_hU~M pad+mAM ta kr-ita/_hU~M bi g+h+nan ta kr-ita/_dzaH/_badzra kro d+hi/_hU~M rat+na kro d+hi/_pa~M pad+ma kro d+hi/_hoHkad+ma kro d+hi/_hU~M badzra tsit+ta/_a badzra 
[\[307b.5\]]sa ma ya/_mu ne kriM/_mu ne sru~M/_mu ne tra~M/_mu ne braM/_mu ne k+Sha/_mu ne ye/_de ltar so so'i snying po yis/_/mngon rdzogs skur ni gsal ba dang /_/ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur te/_/sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/_/oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba 
[\[307b.6\]]at+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_oM ma hA saman+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_oM ma hA kr-i t+ya nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba 
[\[307b.7\]]At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/_de ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/sku mchog thugs mtshan bzhugs tshul dang /_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]thor tshugs la sogs cha lugs kun/_/rang bzhin kun rdzob dkyil 'khor 'di/_/rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsu bsam/_/yang na gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor la'o/_/lhag pa'i ting 'dzin zhes 
[\[308a.2\]]bya ba/_/de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun/_/yum gyi mkha' las gsal bar bsgom/_/rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par ro/_/zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur bar mthong ngo /_/
[\[308a.3\]]'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gzugs brnyan lta bu rnam par 'phro 
[\[308a.4\]]ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/_'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam pa yin 
[\[308a.5\]]par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam par snang zhing de las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar bya yis nyon cig_/de la 'di ni rgyud kyi rnam grangs so/_/mi 
[\[308a.6\]]shes pa yi 'gro ba la/_/mtshon pas gsal ba'i don ston phyir/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/_/de yang ji lta bu zhe na/_/brtan zhing mdzes pa'i khang bu la/_/'jam por zhal zhal byas nas ni/_/kha dog lnga yi gzugs bris pa/_/
[\[308a.7\]]de yang dngos grub rten du bshad/_/ras sam gro ga 'am shing shun nam/_/ta la'i lo ma'am dur khrod ras/_/zhing chen ras la sogs pa la/_/phyag rgya'i gzugs su bris na yang /_/mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du bshad/_/rdo dang shel rdo la 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]sogs dang /_/dung ngam ba so'i rgyu las ni/_/phyag rgya 'am gzugs su 'bur btod nas/_/de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten/_/gser dngul zangs khar la sogs la/_/mkhas pas legs par lugs byas te/_/yan lag ma nyams gzugs byas na/_/
[\[308b.2\]]de yang mtshan ma'i rten du bshad/_/blag sha byang chub shing bu 'am/_/rgyu shing mnyen las gzugs byas na/_/de rnams mtshan ma'i rten du bshad/_/sbyin zhing mnyen pa'i rgyu rnams las/_/phyag rgya'i gzugs su legs byas na/_/de yang mtshan 
[\[308b.3\]]ma'i rten yin no/_/sa stengs dbyibs legs mdzes pa la/_/rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams kyis/_/brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor byas na yang /_/de yang dngos grub rten du bshad/_/re zhig las kyi dang po las/_/sa stengs dkyil 'khor byas par shis/_/
[\[308b.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de/_/sa stegs bya ba'i gnas mchog kyang /_/skyon yon bye brag shes pa las/_/spang blang gnyis su shes par bya/_/ri bo ri bran 'dus pa'i spyi/_/gangs ri brag dkar 'dab rtsa ni/_/seng gcan 
[\[308b.5\]]'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/_/zhi ba'i las la de shis so/_/phug chen dgon pa chen po dang /_/brag chen rdo rje gtams pa'i dkyil/_/gcan can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/_/mngon par spyod pa sgrub pa'i gnas/_/dur khrod gnas dang ngam grog dang /_/
[\[308b.6\]]sum mdo grog le bshung ba'i gnas/_/dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas bya'o/_/dbang du bsdu ba sgrub pa'i gnas/_/nags tshal mang po gtibs pa dang /_/shin tu btsan dang 'jigs pa'i ngos/_/stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/_/'dod pa sgrub pa'i 
[\[308b.7\]]gnas yin no/_/mtsho gling chu mdo rgya mtsho'i 'jings/_/chu yi gle ma btsan pa'i gnas/_/chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/_/las rnams kun la de shis so/_/ri bo 'dun pa'i rtse rnams dang /_/tsan+dan nags tshal me tog tshal/_/yid 'ong bkra shis 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]nyams dga' yi/_/gnas su dkyil 'khor bri bar shis/_/gnam dang sa dang bar snang rnams/_/legs par brtags te dkyil 'khor bya/_/mtshon cha lnga yi dbyibs dag tu/_/brtags na mngon pa'i nam mkha' shis/_/bar snang kha 
[\[309a.2\]]dog rnam lnga po/_/so sor ma 'dres gsal ba shis/_/sa gzhi shin tu ma nyams dang /_/ma grum mnyam par gnas pa la/_/tshwa sgo sa slan ba tshwa med/_/de ltar brtags par las bya'o/_/spang bar bya ba'i gnas ngan no/_/gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung 
[\[309a.3\]]rjes dang /_/srin po ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang /_/khro bo gnod sbyin lcam rjes dang /_/ma mo rngam pa'i spar rjes dang /_/'byung po rku ba'i 'jol sa dang /_/gdug pa klu yi rgyun srang dang /_/skyon can rgyu ba'i lam srang dang /_/zhang blon gdug pa'i 'dug sa 
[\[309a.4\]]dang /_/kha nas ma tho'i 'dun sa dang /_/nyen dang 'brel ba'i gnas rnams ni/_/sbrul gdug pang du 'ongs pa ltar/_/wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/lo yi bshugs te rab tu spang /_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni sa bslang ba'i las te/_/
[\[309a.5\]]de nas bslang ba'i las rnams kyang /_/mngon dang mi mngon bdag po la/_/rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir/_/ser sna spangs pa'i sems kyis ni/_/rin dang bden pas bsgo la bslang /_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni sa gzung ba ste/_de nas slob dpon bdag 
[\[309a.6\]]nyid kyis/_/rdo rje dril bur ldan pa yis/_/rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun du bskor/_/khros pas hU~M gi nga rgyal bya/_/dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs/_/dengs shig ces su bsgo nas kyang /_/seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pa/_/khro bor byin brlabs 
[\[309a.7\]]gdab par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni sa'i lha mo spyan drangs pa'o/_/de nas dbang gyur lha mo de/_/spyan drangs bskyed dang gnyis min par/_/mchod bstod tshul bzhin byas nas ni/_/bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/_/bdud btul mngon 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i tshe/_/ru tra tshogs kyis rgal ba la/_/dgyes pa'i las kyi don bgrangs te/_/bdag cag sa la bgrod pa'i tshe/_/ru tra'i rgol ba byung ba na/_/spyan ldan de la dpang bcol lo/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rtags brtag pa'o/_/mtshan 
[\[309b.2\]]mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir/_/ro lnga mtshan nyid brtag par bya/_/dge ba'i rtags na dngos grub 'byung /_/gal te shes par ma gyur na/_/thabs la mkhas pas spang bar bya/_/yang na sbyin sreg bya bar brtag_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni 
[\[309b.3\]]rin chen gter sba ba'o/_/gnas de bsod nams gter ldan phyir/_/rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang /_/spos lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga/_/ga 'u'i nang du blugs nas su/_/sa gzhi gter dang ldan par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'o/_/sa zhag spos 
[\[309b.4\]]chen rnam lnga yi/_/khu ba bsres nas kun du ni/_/gru bzhi dbyibs su legs byas te/_/ba ko tsam du skyong nul bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya/_/des kyang dngos po kun sbyangs te/_/rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas 
[\[309b.5\]]rang bzhin du/_/ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang bar bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/_/de nas lha rnams ji snyed pa/_/rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drangs te/_/spos kyi dkyil 'khor lha grangs bzhin/_/gdan sar byas te yon 
[\[309b.6\]]mchod la/_/lan cig gshegs zhes sta gon bya/_/de nas 'dus pa'i sems can kun/_/gsang dang snying gar bram pa dang /_/ku sha brim dang srung skud gdags/_/so shing brim dang rmi ltas brtag_/mchod pa'i yo byad ji snyed dang /_/rgyan du 'os pa'i 
[\[309b.7\]]rnam pa kun/_/tshang bar bsogs te byin gyis brlab/_/'dus pa'i sems can de dag kun/_/chos gtam rim pas dbugs phyung ste/_/gsang sngags che ba'i yon tan bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus so/_/rig byed 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]dag gi yan lag las/_/dus rnams shes par bya ba ni/_/bkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang /_/'byor ldan dus tshod bzang ba ni/_/mtshan ma'i rtog pa yin mod kyang /_/brtags na dngos grub mtshan ma 'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 
[\[310a.2\]]'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/_/tshon dang thig skud rnam lnga la/_/sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te/_/sprul pa 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/_/spos sam lce pog dkar po yi/_/dud pas rgyun mi bcad par bdug_/khros pas drag po'i sngags zlos shing /_/
[\[310a.3\]]khro bo khro mo'i stangs kyis bskor/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul/_/thig skud sar pa gtsang ma 'am/_/gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril mdangs sam/_/rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs la/_/yum gyi grangs dang mthun par bsgrim/_/rdo rje rtse lnga'i lu gu 
[\[310a.4\]]rgyud/_/byang chub sems su byin gyis brlabs/_/thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste/_/mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni/_/phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa yis/_/rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam thig gdab/_/de nas sa thig gdab pa yang /_/'dul 
[\[310a.5\]]ba'i dbang gi bye brag las/_/maN+Dal tshad ma nges pa med/_/sor bzhi pa nas brtsams nas su/_/ji srid dpag tshad thub par ro/_/o~M dz+nyA na tsakra su tra ma ti kra ma hU~M zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o/_/rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra dang /_/
[\[310a.6\]]ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de 'dra bar/_/brnyan ma yang ni de 'dra bri/_/tshon sna 'bras dang 'byung khungs sam/_/rdo khams rin chen dag la bya/_/sna gsum sna lnga dag dang ni/_/rin chen phung po'i tshon gyis ni/_/dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin/_/sgo la rnam 
[\[310a.7\]]lngas bskor bar bya/_/phyag rgya gzhan la rkyang pas so/_/dkar dmar ser ljang nag po rnams/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de yis bkod par bya/_/gtso bo gzugs su rdzogs par bri/_/'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya/_/phal pa dag la yig 'brus so/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]so/_/de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dgod pa'i cho ga'o/_/de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la/_/bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan dang gdugs/_/pi bang gling bu brdab pa dang /_/rdza rnga mu kun rnga chen dang /_/da rnga ra dang mu tsar dang /_/dbyangs dang gar dang 
[\[310b.2\]]bzhad pa che/_/rol mo'i yo byad ji snyed pas/_/dga' byed dkyil 'khor dag la brgyan/_/bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/gser dang dngul las byas pa'o/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i gos kyis dkris/_/me tog 'bras bus brgyan pa la/_/bdud rtsi 
[\[310b.3\]]lnga yis gang byas pa/_/sman dang rin chen 'bru rnam lngas/_/gang ba brgyad dam bcu drug gzhag_/dkyil 'khor bdag pos mngon bsngags pa'i/_/rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du/_/dbus nyid du ni gzhag par bya/_/yang na bum pa'i skyin par ro/_/
[\[310b.4\]]zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang /_/btung ba rab tu snum po dang /_/dbang po kun nas 'byung ba rnams/_/sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pas/_/gang ba'i ban da de bzhin gzhag_/rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog_/ci rigs 
[\[310b.5\]]rnams kyis mdzes par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di dag ni 'phan sdud kyi las spyir bstan pa'o/_/de nas sngags pa mnyam bzhag ste/_/ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/_/gsal ba gnyis med dkyil 'khor du/_/rang bzhin kun 
[\[310b.6\]]rdzob spyan drangs dang /_/dbab dang bzhugs dang brtan pa dang /_/mi g.yo dam tshig zil gnon dang /_/phyag 'tshal mchod pa brjod pa dang /_/gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/_/'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang /_/dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya/_/
[\[310b.7\]]des ni tshe 'di nyid la yang /_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na/_/dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rim par 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya las mi 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya dam tshig gi mtshan nyid 
[\[311a.2\]]rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po 'di/_/phyag rgya bsam yas ji snyed pa/_/mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus/_/dang por phyag rgya chen po ste/_/gnyis pa dam tshig rgya yin no/_/gsum pa chos kyi 
[\[311a.3\]]phyag rgya ste/_/bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya ste/_/phyag rgya chen po sku yi rgya/_/rang bzhin chos sku dngos med rgya/_/gzugs sku mtshan ma'i rgya zhes bshad/_/gzugs sku rang bzhin kun rdzob dang /_/bsgom dang bskyed pa yin par bshad/_/gnyis pa'i rgya la 
[\[311a.4\]]gsum yod de/_/bsgom dang gzung dang bcing ba'o/_/bsgom pa dam tshig gsung yin te/_/gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs pa'o/_/gzung ba thugs mtshan nyid bzung ba'o/_/dam tshig lag rgya bcing bar bshad/_/yang na so so'i gtso gzung rnams/_/
[\[311a.5\]]sbyor thabs phyag rgya nyid yin no/_/gsum pa'i rgya la gsum yod de/_/rang bzhin bsgom dang bzlas brjod do/_/rang bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya ni/_/chos kyi dbyings su rgyal bas gsungs/_/bsgom pa mtshan ma'i yig 'bru dag_/lce steng snying ga mkha' 
[\[311a.6\]]sogs su/_/mtshan ma'i rnam par gsal ba'o/_/rtsa ba bskyed dang bzlas pa yis/_/snying po tshig brjod bzlas pa'i rgya/_/bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya la/_/rnam pa gsum du dpa' bos gsungs/_/bsgom dang 'phro 'du bcing ba'o/_/las kyi lha yi rnal 'byor 
[\[311a.7\]]gang /_/bsgom pa sgom pa las kyi rgya/_/lta 'og mkha' 'am thugs ka nas/_/rnam bzhi las kyi 'phro 'du ni/_/'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya'o/_/phyag rgya bca' dang stangs tshul rnams/_/bcing ba las kyi phyag rgya bshad/_/lag rgya dam tshig phyag 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]rgya rnams/_/rang gi sku ru rnam bsgoms nas/_/bcings shing mkha' la rnam bkrol na/_/sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing /_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na/_/dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/bdag nyid phyag rgya cher bsgom pa/_/dbu ni rnam par 
[\[311b.2\]]snang mdzad de/_/lag g.yas rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya/_/lag g.yon rin chen 'byung ldan rgya/_/rkang pa g.yon pa snang mtha' yas/_/rkang g.yas las kyi sems dpa'i rgya/_/yan lag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bas/_/bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/_/
[\[311b.3\]]sor mo rnams la bsgom bya ba/_/gung mo gnyis la o~M dang la~M/_/'dzub mo gnyis la hU~M dang mu~M/_/dbang mo gnyis la swa dang ma~M/_/chung ngu gnyis la o~M dang ba~M/_/sbom po gnyis la hU~M dang tra~M/_/g.yas pa'i 'bru gdan nyi ma ste/_/g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[311b.4\]]ro/_/o~M dang mu~M du rtse sbyar te/_/de bzhin hU~M dang la~M du sbyar/_/hU~M dang pa~M yang de bzhin te/_/a~M dang rta~M du sbyar ba la/_/rgyab sbyar swa dang ma~M bsgreng ba/_/'di ni yab kyi spyi rgya yin/_/lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las/_/o~M dang mu~M sbyar hU~M dang ni/_/la~M sbyar swa dang pa~M 
[\[311b.5\]]du sbyar/_/o~M dang ma~M sbyar ha~M rta~M bsgreng /_/yum gyi spyi rgya yin par ba shad/_/rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bcangs/_/o~M bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya yin/_/
[\[311b.6\]]rin chen khu tshur snying gar bcangs/_/la~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/bder gshegs dbyings phyug ma yi rgya/_/rdo rje khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/hU~M bsgreng rtse la rdo rje 'bar/_/rin chen 
[\[311b.7\]]dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/mu~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/rdo rje dbyings 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]phyug phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/swa bsgreng rtse la rin chen 'bar/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/ma~M 
[\[312a.2\]]bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/rin chen dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/oM bsgreng rtse la pad+mo 'bar/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i 
[\[312a.3\]]mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/ba~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/pad+ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur 
[\[312a.4\]]snying gar brtan/_/ha~M bsgreng rtse la ral gri 'bar/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/_/rta~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/_/rdo rje thal mo las 
[\[312a.5\]]la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/_/las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur thugs ka na/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen gar thabs 
[\[312a.6\]]bskor nas su/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa'i tshul/_/gar gyi phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad/_/rdo rje thugs kar rin chen 'dzin/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/sa 
[\[312a.7\]]yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa ni/_/dku yi thad kar 'dzin pa dang /_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/_/sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/rdo rje ral gri thugs ka na/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje rin chen rna lhag gzhag_/rin chen phreng ba bzung nas su/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/_/phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags/_/rdo rje pad+ma thugs ka na/_/rin chen dril gsil chos 
[\[312b.2\]]la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen pi bang 'dzin pa la/_/rdo rje len par byas nas ni/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/_/dbyangs kyi phyag rgya yin par grags/_/rdo rje klu shing thugs ka na/_/
[\[312b.3\]]rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/byams pa mai tri'i phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen bdug spos thugs kar 'dzin/_/rdo rje las la rab tu 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/_/bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/
[\[312b.4\]]rdo rje po ti thugs kar 'dzin/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/sgrib pa kun sel phyag rgya yin/_/rdo rje rin chen rna ltag tu/_/me tog snod bcas 'dzin pa la/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/_/me tog phyag 
[\[312b.5\]]rgya yin par ba shad/_/rdo rje ut+pal thugs ka na/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/'jam dpal gyi ni phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen mar me thugs ka na/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 
[\[312b.6\]]'dud pa ni/_/mar me'i phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad/_/rdo rje snye ma thugs ka na/_/rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/_/kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya yin/_/rin chen dbyug pa thugs ka na/_/rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/_/
[\[312b.7\]]rdo rje nyug par byed pa ni/_/dri yi phyag rgya yin par bshad/_/nir mgo gdengs ka gshed po'i rgya/_/rdo rje gnon pa stobs po che/_/thod sbrul gnon pa rta yi rgya/_/rgya gram gnon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/mdzub gnyis 'khyud pa lcags kyu'i rgya/_/mdzub gnyis rtse sprad 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]zhags pa'i rgya/_/mdzub gnyis 'khyud pa lu gu rgyud/_/bskyod par gyur pa 'bebs ma'o/_/pi bang len pa lha yi rgya/_/mi yi gseg par 'dzin pa ste/_/lha min phyag rgya go cha yin/_/chos kyi dkyil 'khor byol song rgya/_/za ma tog ni yi 
[\[313a.2\]]dgas rgya/_/me chu gnyis ni dmyal ba'i rgya/_/yab kyi spyi rgya kun bzang gi'o/_/yum gyi spyi rgya bzang mor bshad/_/yang na kun bzang yab yum gyi/_/rdo rje thal mo gnyis su bshad/_/bder gshegs rnams la rdzogs dkyil lo/_/sems dpa' 
[\[313a.3\]]rnams la sems dpa'i dkyil/_/'joms dang thub pa langs te bcing /_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de 
[\[313a.4\]]nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po he ru ka rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu lags pa bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol/_gsang ba mchog gi bdag 
[\[313a.5\]]pos bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/_bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_
[\[313a.6\]]nyid kyi sku khro bo chen por 'du mdzad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten na dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i dbang du 'gro ba rnams gyur te/_khams gsum 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab zer bar ston pa dang /_'jug pa dang /_bstan pa 
[\[313a.7\]]la gnas shing dkon mchog gsum la 'jug pa ni 'ga' yang med/_khros pas gtum po rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang /_'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis bsgribs pa gtum zhing 'khrug pa dang /_gzhan gyi srog dang sems 'phrog pa dang /_mi dge ba 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]bcu'i las kyis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang /_gcig sha gcig gis za ba dang /_log pa'i lam la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[313b.2\]]rnams dang /_gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen pos rnam par gzigs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor glog rnam par 'phro ba 'di phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa/_bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la/_
[\[313b.3\]]phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la/_'di phyung ma thag tu khro bo chen po'i mthus khams gsum 'di dag thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos so/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig_/rab tu shig shig_/
[\[313b.4\]]kun du rab tu shig shig_/gtor gtor/_rab tu gtor gtor/_kun du rab tu gtor gtor ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_srin po la sogs pa rnams 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to/_/de nas 'jigs 
[\[313b.5\]]pas nyen pa de dag brgya byin la skyabs su song /_brgya byin yang 'jigs pas nyen te tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/_tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug thad du song /_khyab 'jug kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du song /_dbang phyug chen po rang gi mthu yod yod pa ston cing 
[\[313b.6\]]lha rnams ma skrag_/klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin dang /_'khor du gtogs pa rnams ma skrag cig_/nga'i mthu 'di la gzhan gang gis kyang brdzi bar mi nus so zhes spro bsrings so/_/kwa brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug rnams 
[\[313b.7\]]khyed kyang 'jig rten na mthu che ba'i chen po yin pas rang rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas rang rang gi 'khor gdug pa de dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug rnams de ma thag tu rang rang 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]gi mthu ci yod pa ston cing rdo rje'i skad dang gad mo drag po 'byin cing rang rang gi 'khor rnams la ma skrag ma dngangs shig_/bdag cag gi mthu 'di lta bu gzhan gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so zhes spro bsring ngo /_/de nas bcom 
[\[314a.2\]]ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas yum rngam pa'i kro d+hi'i rgyal mo mngon par phyung ste/_hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyi rol pa'i dgyes pas thim par mdzad nas/_byang chub sems kyi sprin las phaT phaT badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la 
[\[314a.3\]]ha la ha la zhes pas stong gsum khro bo chol pas gang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid ni dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad zhabs rnam pa brgyad kyi rnam par snang ngo /_/de nas dgyes te hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad las 'dul 
[\[314a.4\]]ba'i dbang gis dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/_khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil na keng rus kyi steng na rnam par gnas so/_/khro bo chol pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ji snyed pa kun bsgral te slar 'dus nas/_la la ni rdo rje khrag 
[\[314a.5\]]'thung chen por gyur nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/_la la ni rin chen khrag 'thung du gyur te tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/_la la ni pad+ma khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/_ma hA de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/_la la ni las kyi khrag 'thung chen 
[\[314a.6\]]por gyur te/_khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/_khro bo de dag gis dregs pa can de dag gi nang grol kun drangs/_khrag 'thungs/_rus pa kun 'chos so/_/de nas dgyes te o~M ru lu ru lu dza dza zhes brjod pas/_dbang phyug chen po bcu gnyis dang brgyad 
[\[314a.7\]]kyi 'khor tshogs ma lus pa yud tsam cig gis dbang du 'dus par gyur pa ni dper na rdo khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i sku la rnam pa brgyad kyis 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas so/_/khrag 'thung bzhi la rnam pa lnga lngas 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]'khril ba'i tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa dang /_dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las dkar mo'i tshogs dang /_rkun mo'i tshogs dang /_spos mo'i tshogs dang /_gtum mo'i tshogs dang /_rmongs mo'i tshogs dang /_thal byed ma'i tshogs dang /_
[\[314b.2\]]sme sha can gyi tshogs dang /_ma mo'i tshogs rnams 'thon to/_/de nas yang dgyes te he he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las seng gdong gi tshogs dang /_stag gdong gi tshogs dang /_wa gdong gi tshogs dang /_khyi gdong gi tshogs dang /_
[\[314b.3\]]bzhad gdong gi tshogs dang /_dur bya'i gdong gi tshogs dang /_bya rog gi gdong gi tshogs dang /_'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs rnams 'thon to/_/de nas yang dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas byang chub sems las rta gdong gi tshogs dang /_
[\[314b.4\]]phag gdong gi tshogs dang /_seng gdong gi tshogs dang /_sbrul gdong gi tshogs 'thon nas nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang rang gi gdan ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par phaT ces spros so/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med 
[\[314b.5\]]pa rnams na dregs pa gang ji snyed yod pa thams cad tshul ji ltar 'dul ba dang /_thabs cis 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus btul bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo de dag la dregs pa'i tshogs slar gsol cig ces 
[\[314b.6\]]bka' stsal pas/_khro bo de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gso bar gsol zhes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis khro bo de dag gcig tu hU~M zhes pas bsdus te/_dbu dgu phyag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so/_/de nas ye 
[\[314b.7\]]shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des phyag bco brgyad bsnol te btsir bas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam chen por 'khyil to/_/de nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba gnam nas rnam par phyung ngo /_/o~M badzra a mr-i tam hA kro d+hi shwa ri 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]u spri dz+wa/_badzra a mr-i ta hU~M a/_de nas khro mo bdud rtsi chen mo de smin ma sgyur zhing shin tu rngam pa'i bzhad pas ru lu ru lu khA hi khA hi zhes bdud rtsir bsgrubs te gsol bas gdug pa can thams cad snga ma bzhin du rang rang gi lus sos par gyur te 
[\[315a.2\]]sems dran nas dpal chen ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po'i sku dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya/_zhabs brgyad brgyar gnas shing yab la khro bo brgya rtsa brgyad lhun gyis grub par mthong ngo /_/phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs kyang shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs rang rang gi stan 
[\[315a.3\]]dang lag char gnas pa mthong nas/_shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas zhum pa'i nga ros gsol ba btab pa/_bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/_/rngam chen rgyal po'i 'bangs su mchi/_/'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/_/mgo lus rnying yang rul nas ni/_/
[\[315a.4\]]btso bsreg gnas su 'bod sgrogs shog_/bdag cag rnams kyi ma dang sring /_/mchis brang dang ni bu mo rnams/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhes su gsol/_/bdag cag rnams kyi mgo bcad la/_/'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes/_/bdag cag 
[\[315a.5\]]rnams kyi snying phyung la/_/dpal chen nyid kyi zhal du gsol/_/bdag cag rnams kyi lpags shus la/_/dpa' bo chen po sku la gsol/_/a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab ste/_la las ni rang gi lus gdan khrir phul/_la las ni rang gi mgo bcad nas 
[\[315a.6\]]'bar ba'i tshogs kyi zhal bur phul/_la las ni rang gi snying phyung nas zhal du gsol/_la la ni rang gi pags pa bshus te sku la g.yang gzhi gsol to/_/dbang phyug chen po rnams dpal chen po'i sku la sbrul ltar 'khril bas des dregs pa'i tshogs 
[\[315a.7\]]rnams kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang ste/_bden pa mthong nas dam tshig dang ldan par mthong bar gyur te/_de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyang rab tu spro ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma dang ldan te/_la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ma ring du 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]'phan/_la la ni ri rab klad la skor/_la la ni nyi zla zhabs 'og gnon/_la la ni 'jig rten rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma ston cing a la la zhes pa'i sgra rnam par 'byin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi 
[\[315b.2\]]bdag po des 'jigs byed tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du/_/rak+ta'i rba rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil/_/keng rus ri rab 'bar ba'i steng /_/me 'bar sreg pa'i klong 
[\[315b.3\]]dkyil na/_/dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /_/tshad dang rgya yongs ma chad pa/_/phyi nang med par gsal ba'i 'od/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs bzhi pa/_/gru chad bar khyams bzhes brgyan pa/_/gru bzhi sgo khyud 'bar bas mdzes/_/
[\[315b.4\]]bar khyams gnyis ni 'bar bar gsal/_/nyi zla sbrul dang thod pas brgyan/_/khyu mchog dang ni ma he gzig_/stag dang gtum thung dom dag gis/_/sder mos dregs pa brgya byin dang /_/tshangs pa dbang phyug bzung ba ni/_/gdan chen rnams 
[\[315b.5\]]kyang bzung ba'o/_/dbus su 'jigs byed chen po ni/_/smug nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/dbu dgu phyag kyang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_/spyan 'bar ba ni nyi shu bdun/_/zhabs brgyad thur du gtams pa'o/_/rtsub pa'i phyag mtshan skal bar thogs/_/rdo rje 
[\[315b.6\]]gshog pa phyogs bcur gtams/_/dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu bzhugs/_/btsun mo rngam pa kro d+hi yang /_/cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po ltar/_/de yi phyogs kyi khro bo yang /_/khrag 'thung rdo rje rin chen dang /_/pad+ma las kyi he ru ka/_kun kyang 
[\[315b.7\]]dbu gsum phyag drug ste/_/zhabs bzhi dag tu rnam par bgrad/_/kro d+hi'i tshogs kyis rab tu 'khril/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mtshan la/_/dkar mo la sogs ral pa can/_/rang stan lag char chas te gnas/_/phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas/_/
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]seng gdong la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs/_/stan dang lag cha de bzhin chas/_/sgo srung gdong mo la sogs gnas/_/rang gi lag mtshan stan dang chas/_/'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis pa la/_/rdo rje srin po khro bo bcu/_/hU~M chen rnam 
[\[316a.2\]]rgyal dbyug sngon can/_/gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin rgyal/_/gzhan gyis mi thub bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal stobs po che/_/de dag rnams dang gnyis med pa'i/_/rdo rje srin mo khro mo bcu/_/rlung 'byin snyems ma sder mo dang /_/dur khrod 
[\[316a.3\]]gtun khung gtum mo dang /_/mda' snyems sgra 'byin gsod ma dang /_/skul byed rnams kyis rab tu 'khril/_/kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste/_/zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/_/'jig rten skyong bas btud tshul lo/_/de dag rnams kyi bka' sdod ni/_/
[\[316a.4\]]rdo rje phra men gtum bag can/_/mche gshog 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'khor/_/slas dang byi mo bran mo dang /_/ci bgyi la sogs pho nya'i tshogs/_/phyi rol mu ran dag lag nas/_/zhes gsungs pas snang srid thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gyur 
[\[316a.5\]]to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/oM b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra d+hu~M/_oM oM oM oM oM/_ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_ma ma ma ma ma/_hA hA hA hA 
[\[316a.6\]]hA/_bud+d+ha/_badzra rat+na/_pad+ma karma/_shrI shrI shrI shrI shI/_he he he he he/_ru ru ru ru ru/_ka ka ka ka ka/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_o~M o~M o~M o~M oM/_ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_bud+d+ha badzra/_rat+na/_pad+ma/_karma/_kro kro kro kro kro/_d+hI d+hI 
[\[316a.7\]]d+hI d+hI d+hI/_shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/_ri ri ri ri ri/_ba ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_gau rI/_rtsau rI/_tsau mo hA/_bait+ta lI/_puk+ka sI/_g+hasma rI/_sma shA nI/_tsaN+Da lI/_ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/_ba ba ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_sid+ha/_byA g+h+r-i/_
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]sr-i gla/_shwa na/_kr-i D+ha/_kAng+ka ka_/kha ga_/U lu/_mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/_kha kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/_he he he he he he he he/_ba ba ba ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra/_Ar+yA te dza te/_dzaHa mu kha/_lo ka b+hasmi pa lA ya/_dzaHhU~M pa~M hoH/_ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba 
[\[316b.2\]]ba/_dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/_kro kro kro kro gro kro kro kro kro kro/_d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/_hU~M kA ra/_bi dza ye/_nI la daN+Da/_ya mAn+ta ka_/Ar+ya a tsa la/_ha ya grI wa/_a pa rA dzi ta/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_tri lo kya bi dza ya/_ma hA ba la/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M 
[\[316b.3\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ba ya be sha~M bar+t+ti/_le no ki/_tra ta hri sta na pa ta/_mu ha la/_tsaN+Da lI ya ti/_sha ya ba ti/_ba ya be mA ra Na/_tsun+d+ho/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M 
[\[316b.4\]]hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/_ru lu ru lu ru lu/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[316b.5\]]thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das rngam 
[\[316b.6\]]pa'i rgyal po des stang stabs kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stang stabs 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/chos kun mnyam pa'i ngang rtogs na/_/bsgul zhing bsigs pa thams 
[\[316b.7\]]cad kun/_/phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos bshad/_/rang gi lha yi ting 'dzin gyis/_/stang stabs 'di la gang gnas pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang skrag 'gyur na/_/dregs pa'i tshogs lta smos ci dgos/_/lag gnyis thal sbyar spyi gtsug bzhag_/rkang 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]gnyis mthil sprad rtse mo btsugs/_/mgo mtshan rdo rje snying por bsgom/_/rtse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga dang /_/rtse dgu bcu gcig rdo rje bsgom/_/sa stengs kun du mchod byas pa/_/'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/_/de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs 
[\[317a.2\]]nas mchong /_/'jigs byed ma yi phyag rgya bshad/_/lag g.yas gung mo snying por bya/_/gung mdzub srin lag rtse gsum tshul/_/mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan par bya/_/lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje'i tshul/_/g.yon pa ban d+ha ltar byas nas/_/dkrugs nas 
[\[317a.3\]]zhal du gsol ba ni/_/rdo rje khrag 'thung phyag rgya yin/_/g.yas pa gtso la 'khyud tshul du/_/g.yon pa rak+ta stobs pa ni/_/rdo rje kro d+hi kun gyi rgya/_/lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/_/g.yon pa dung dmar rak+ta 'thung /_/'di ni rin chen khrag 
[\[317a.4\]]'thung rgya/_/de nyid gung 'dzub srin lag gzhibs/_/ral gri 'degs pa ltar byas pa/_/pad+ma khrag 'thung phyag rgya yin/_/de nyid g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs/_/mthe bo gung mdzub mthe'u chung rnams/_/so sor brkyang ba rgya gram tshul/_/las kyi khrag 
[\[317a.5\]]'thung phyag rgyar bshad/_/khrag 'thung g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul/_/kro d+hi g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum tshul/_/stabs su mchod par dpa' bos bshad/_/g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas bsgreng /_/g.yon pa 'dzin pa ltar byas pa/_/
[\[317a.6\]]g.yas dang g.yon du lta zhing sgyur/_/gau ri tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'i tshul du ni/_/'bur tshugs mi 'gyur lta byed pa/_/rkun mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/g.yas pas khu tshur bcangs pa ni/_/mthe bo mthe'u chung brkyang bar byas/_/
[\[317a.7\]]g.yon pas 'dzin pa'i khro tshul lta/_/pra mo'i phyag rgya dpa' bos bshad/_/g.yas pa'i gung mo rtse mo brkyang /_/sor bzhi rtse bsdus rdo rje 'phyar/_/g.yon pa dku ru brten pa ni/_/'bur tshugs lta ba be ta'i rgya/_/g.yon pas nyon mongs mnan tshul la/_/g.yas 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]pas rgyu 'dren za ba'i tshul/_/pu ka'i phyag rgyar bshad pa yin/_/g.yon pa dung khrag 'dzin pa la/_/g.yas pas 'khrug cing rngam tshul ston/_/gasma ri yi phyag rgya yin/_/g.yon pas byis pa'i lus mnan nas/_/g.yas pas snying 'dren za tshul du/_/sgrol 
[\[317b.2\]]tshul lta ba sma sha'i rgya/_/g.yas pas mgo bcad phyir nas kyang /_/g.yon pas lus 'dzin stobs pa ltar/_/tsaN+Da li yi phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis brang la bsnol nas ni/_/kha na ro thogs ral gsigs pa/_/seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis 
[\[317b.3\]]thur du bsnol nas ni/_/zhing la 'bur tshugs mche ba bsnyer/_/stag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis zhing khong kha phye nas/_/lce yis ldag pa ltar byed na/_/wa gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis zhing khong kha phye nas/_/'bur tshugs 
[\[317b.4\]]lta ba shwa na'i rgya/_/lag gnyis spu gri thogs tshul du/_/g.yon pas rgyu ma gzung zhing za/_/bzhad gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/zhing chen phrag la bkal nas ni/_/keng rus thogs pa ltar byas pa/_/dur bya'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/g.yon pas ban da 
[\[317b.5\]]g.yas pa gri/_/glo snying 'dren pa ltar byed pa/_/khwa kha ma yi phyag rgya yin/_/g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur la/_/lcags kyu 'dzin pa hu lu'i rgya/_/mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas/_/rta skad 'tsher ba ltar byas pa/_/rta gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/
[\[317b.6\]]mdzub gnyis rtse sbyar phag gdong gis/_/tha rgod log pa'i tshul bstan pa/_/phag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud du 'khyud/_/seng ge'i tshul du ral gsigs pa/_/seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis rab tu 
[\[317b.7\]]bskyod bya zhing /_/phyogs bcur lta bar byed pa ni/_/sbrul gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas shing /_/rkang pa 'jog tshul stabs su mchong /_/g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub nam mkhar 'phyar/_/g.yon pa dgu ru brten pa ni/_/
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]hu~M ka ra yi phyag rgya yin/_/lag pa g.yas pa sder mor gdengs/_/g.yon pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal rgya/_/g.yas kyi sor mo dbyug par brkyang /_/g.yon pa gar thabs skor bar byed/_/dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin/_/g.yas pa'i 
[\[318a.2\]]khu tshur nam mkhar 'phyar/_/g.yon pas gru mo brten pa ni/_/gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin/_/g.yas pa'i gung mdzub srin lag brkyang /_/mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan par bya/_/g.yon pa'ang de bzhin shugs su bya/_/mi g.yo ral gri'i phyag 
[\[318a.3\]]rgya yin/_/lag gnyis mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud/_/lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa las/_/dpral ba'i thad kar bzung ba ni/_/rta mchog dpal gyi phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis khu tshur mdun du bcangs/_/zhags pa'i tshul du drangs pa ni/_/gzhan gyis mi thub 
[\[318a.4\]]phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis khu tshur gyen du bsnol/_/dril bu gsil tshul bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur 'phyar/_/brdeg pa'i stabs su byas pa ni/_/khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin/_/lag gnyis khu tshur thur du brkyang /_/gnon pa'i 
[\[318a.5\]]stabs su bgrad pa ni/_/stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin/_/gyad kyi dor stabs tshul du gnas/_/stobs su mchong ba khro bo'i rgya/_/srin mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/_/rkang lag gar thabs bskor ba yin/_/yang na khro bo'i phyag rgya las/_/g.yas g.yon bzlog pa 
[\[318a.6\]]yin par gsungs/_/ci bgyid bka' nyan phyag rgya ni/_/g.yas g.yon sor mo drag sprugs pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i 
[\[318a.7\]]le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bsnyen bsgrub rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang bsnyen bsgrub zab mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]phyung ngo /_/bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bsam yas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la/_/rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i don gyi phyir/_/mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhir bshad do/_/thog mar bsnyen pa yin par bshad/_/gnyis pa dag ni nye bsnyen pa/_/gsum 
[\[318b.2\]]pa bsgrub pa zhes su brjod/_/tha ma bsgrub chen po zhes bya/_/bye brag tu ni shes byas la/_/de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/_/bsnyen bsgrub bye brag shes bya zhing /_/de la gnas pa rab tu gces/_/de dag mi shes mi gnas pas/_/bsgrubs kyang 
[\[318b.3\]]'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/las rnams brtsams kyang don med 'gyur/_/de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/_/bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor bas/_/byang chub sems ni shes par bya/_/nye bar bsnyen pa la gnas pas/_/bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por 
[\[318b.4\]]bsgom/_/de yang gsang sngags bdag po nyid/_/rig ma bskyed dang bskul bya ba/_/bsgrub pa zhes su rgyal bas gsungs/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las/_/rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gsungs/_/gang yin rdo rje 'grub 'gyur ba/_/bsgrub pa
