[\[318b.5\]]chen po zhes su bya/_/byang chub sems zhes bya ba yang /_/dam pa'i don gyi sems yin te/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas/_/rang gi sems kyis shes bya ba/_/bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yin par gsungs/_/bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ni/_/
[\[318b.6\]]sngags kyi bdag po'i cha lugs su/_/ting 'dzin nan tan khugs par bsgom/_/thams cad lha yi rang bzhin pas/_/bdag nyid lha yi mtshan nyid de/_/phyag rgya bzhi dang rnam ldan par/_/shes pa nye bsnyen dam tshig yin/_/rig ma bskyed dang 
[\[318b.7\]]bskul bya ba'i/_/rten du bya ba shes rab ma/_/mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i gzungs/_/b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+mo ni/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi pho brang ste/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba'i gnas/_/slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul/_/de ltar 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rten/_/rnal 'byor ngo la de ltar snang /_/ma rtogs pa la 'khor ba'i lam/_/sgrub pa rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i rten/_/rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya/_/chen po lngas bsdus thams cad kun/_/de nas yum du gnas 
[\[319a.2\]]mod/_/mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/bsgrub phyir rigs kyi dbye ba bya/_/smin ma'i dkyus ring lag sor phra/_/tshigs pa zlum la rked skabs phyed/_/phra bshad ut+pal dang ldan zhing /_/so dkar skra 'jam mthon mthing 'khril/_/mig 
[\[319a.3\]]kyang zar ma'i me tog 'dra/_/skra mtshams 'khyug la mdog kyang gsal/_/sna bzang ske ring sems ma 'dra/_/lus drang nu ma'i dkyil na mtho/_/khong dal 'gro na 'jab pa 'dra/_/skad ni ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dra/_/cir yang mdzes pa'i stobs ldan pa/_/spyi 
[\[319a.4\]]yi rigs dang mtshan du bshad/_/bzhin dbyibs sog ka mdog kyang dmar/_/mig [{]rings so [,]ring ngo  [}]thags rab tu dam/_/so la shel chags kos ko phra/_/lus la zhim pa'i dri 'byung ba/_/pad+ma can zhes bya bar bshad/_/zla ba'i mdangs ltar dkar la 
[\[319a.5\]]gsal/_/gtsug phud g.yas 'khril skad kyang che/_/bong chung lus mdzes tshig tu snyan/_/dung ltar lus bzhin g.yas su 'khyil/_/dung can ma zhes bya bar grags/_/'dod pa che la brtul zhugs che/_/shes pa gsal la byad bzhin yangs/_/bu mo 
[\[319a.6\]]mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ma ru bshad/_/sbas pa'i brda dang thabs la mkhas/_/phyi nang rlung khar gser ltar lci/_/bsdig cing kun gyis drod mi lon/_/don la gzhol la rtog pa med/_/zla gsang dkar dmar rlung khar lci/_/rigs dang mtshan du bshad pa yin/_/
[\[319a.7\]]skra ni mthon mthing lcang lor bshad/_/srid du ring la phra la ldem/_/lcug phran mang po 'dab rgyas pa/_/ljon pa ma zhes bshad pa yin/_/phra zhing bshan la gzangs ring ba/_/bcu gnyis nyi shu lnga yi bar/_/mU la rak+ta 'dzag pa la/_/rdo rje mtshon 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]gyis ma phog pa/_/lcug phran ma yi rigs su bshad/_/sor mo gru bzhi skra yang kham/_/smin tshogs che zhing mig kyang 'bur/_/'gram glad ring la skra mtshams dma'/_/sha mdog che zhing rna ba ring /_/ba lang can zhes bya bar bshad/_/bzhin 
[\[319b.2\]]mdog gru gsum kha dog gnag_/skra rtsub shel la khro gnyer mang /_/ri mo can zhes bya bar bshad/_/skye rgyud med cing bkra mi shis/_/gcig pur 'dug pa gdong gcig ma'o/_/yan lag thams cad mes tshig bzhin/_/gtan du 'phel ba'i rgyu 
[\[319b.3\]]med pa/_/me reg ma yi rigs su bshad/_/gzhan yang lha 'am lha min nam/_/gnod sbyin srin po la sogs pa/_/mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams na/_/mo yi rigs can gang yang rung /_/yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams/_/dngos grub bsgrub pa'i 
[\[319b.4\]]rten yin te/_/thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya'o/_/de dag gang rnyed byin gyis brlab/_/de yi spyi bo gtsug tu ni/_/zla dkyil ma~M las kun bzang mo/_/snying gar zla dkyil la~M bsams te/_/yangs pa'i spyan du bsgom par bya/_/lce stengs 
[\[319b.5\]]zla dkyil yi ge pa~M/_/gos dkar ma yi lte ba la/_/zla dkyil ma~M las mA ma kI/_/yan lag bzhi yi dkyil 'khor la/_/rta~M las sgrol ma'i phyag rgyar gsal/_/lag g.yas lcags kyu'i sku ru bsgom/_/lag g.yon dril bu lcags sgrog kha/_/zhags 
[\[319b.6\]]pa pad+ma dag la'o/_/rdo rje thabs la yab rnams bsgom/_/de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang /_/b+ha ga'i dbyibs su me ri bsgom/_/byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las/_/lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom/_/gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs bya'o/_/
[\[319b.7\]]mtshan ldan shes rab de nyid la/_/rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags/_/gser gyi rna cha gdu bu dang /_/do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/_/'jam zhing gsal bar byas pa yi/_/chos gos lnga dang ldan par bya/_/a ga ru dang du ru ska/_/dri spos tsan+dan sbyar ba yin/_/
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]khrus kyi cho ga dag par bya/_/dri zhim byug pas lus la byugs/_/rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas/_/nang yang dag pa'i khrus bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems bskyed de/_/mi dmigs don la sems sbyar phyir/_/skye med byang chub sems kyi 
[\[320a.2\]]don/_/rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/_/snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/_/lhun gyis grub par yid ches bya/_/de nas bskul bar bya ba'i phyir/_/gsang ba'i brda yis bsre bar bya/_/sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na/_/sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes pas bsre/_/rA ga yA mi 
[\[320a.3\]]zhes brjod na/_/ra ho ha~M zhes kyang ni bya/_/ti pa su ke zhes brjod na/_/gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon/_/a ti pu ho zhes brjod na/_/pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon/_/g.yas pa smin ma bskyod na ni/_/g.yon pa'i smin mas de bzhin mtshon/_/de bzhin 
[\[320a.4\]]brda sna tshogs pas bsre/_/de nas bskul bar bya ba ni/_/shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/_/thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer la/_/bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do/_/mi g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongs su gsol/_/rnam par rtog bral shin tu dri med sku/_/
[\[320a.5\]]'od zer zla rgyas 'dra ba'i mdangs ldan zhal/_/dgyes pa'i rol pa'i don la gshegs su gsol/_/thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/_/shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer la/_/bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do/_/'byor ldan yid 'ong rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings/_/
[\[320a.6\]]shes rab zab mo rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs/_/rdzu 'phrul thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma/_/'byor ldan yid 'ong cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston/_/ho/_nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba/_/e ma'o pad+ma 'bar ba'i ze'u 'bru 'di/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 
[\[320a.7\]]'bul lags na/_/dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas/_/byang chub sems sprin dbab tu gsol/_/zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba/_/e ma'o/_'od zer dga' ste yid 'ong ma/_/sems 'phreng gdungs pa'i shes rab gzungs/_/ga'u 'khril pa'i pad+ma la/_/rdo rje 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]bde ba'i byang chub 'bar/_/a la la ho/_de nas gnyis med bde mchog sems/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyi tshogs chen la/_/dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa dbul/_/grub pa nyi zla'i snying po de/_/rnal 'byor rdo rje chen pos blang /_/'gro drug sems 
[\[320b.2\]]can bag chags sreg_/zhi ba'i mtha' la shi ba bslang /_/phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam bskul/_/de ltar bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/bsgrub pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/de dag dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu/_/rig pa'i dam tshig bsgoms 
[\[320b.3\]]pa'i lam/_/sngags kyi bdag po bdag 'grub ste/_/gang yin las la 'jug nus pa'i/_/dam tshig sgrub po chen po yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las bsnyen bsgrub rnam 
[\[320b.4\]]bzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid las dngos 
[\[320b.5\]]grub kyi bye brag 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/de la 'di ni phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgrub pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/rang sems shin tu sbyangs pas na/_/phra mo'i dngos 
[\[320b.6\]]grub bsgrub pa gces/_/rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/_/bdag nyid nam mkha'i dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/_/rang gi lhar ni rang bsgoms nas/_/phra mo'i sbyor ba kun du brtsam/_/rin chen rgyu las grub pa yi/_/bsnyen ma'i 
[\[320b.7\]]dkyil 'khor de bzhin du/_/so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams/_/che chung yungs kar 'bru tshod tsam/_/snying ga'i dkyil du gsal ba las/_/hU~M gis khong du drangs nas ni/_/khong nas kha ru byung bar bsam/_/hU~M gi dbugs la zhon nas su/_/sna yi rtse 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]mor byung ba dang /_/sna rtse nyid du gsal bar bsgom/_/ting 'dzin gsal bar khugs pa dang /_/sna yi rtse nas nam mkha' la/_/je ring je ring phaT kyis spro/_/ring du spro ba goms pa dang /_/'od dang bcas pa'i yig 'bru des/_/phyogs 
[\[321a.2\]]bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/_gsung gi yi ge ji snyed pa/_/dbyar gyi sprin spung 'dus pa bzhin/_/hU~M gis snying ga nyid du bsdu/_/yungs kar 'bru tshod de nyid la/_/stong gsum 'jig rten kun bcug kyang /_/de yi nang du sa le gsal/_/sngags 
[\[321a.3\]]kyis brtags pa'i lha rnams kyi/_/gnas su'ang de nyid gsal bar bsgom/_/de lta'i 'phro 'du yang dang yang /_/goms par ci nus dag tu bya/_/de ni gsung gi phra mor bshad/_/so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru las/_/phyag mtshan yungs kar tsam du 
[\[321a.4\]]gsal/_/snying ga nyid du gsal ba nas/_/rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dus kyi bar/_/gong ma'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de yis bya/_/de ni thugs kyi phra mor bshad/_/so so'i thugs mtshan gsal ba las/_/rang rang lha yi rnam par gsal/_/thugs kar yungs kar 'bru tshod 
[\[321a.5\]]tsam/_/gong ma'i tshul du bya bar bshad/_/de ni sku yi phra mo yin/_/de ltar lha tshogs ma lus par/_/rim gyis yang na cig car ro/_/cig car bsgom pa shin tu dka'/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod 
[\[321a.6\]]yul min/_/rnal 'byor can gyis rim gyis ni/_/gtso nas 'khor gyi bar dag tu/_/yang nas yang du gsal bar bsgom/_/'di dag bsgoms pa'i yon tan ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par nges/_/thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i mchog_/
[\[321a.7\]]sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor kun/_/'di las 'byung bar gdon mi za/_/'di thos dngos grub gzhan rnams kun/_/bsgrub mi dgos par grub pa yin/_/rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom byas na/_/zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub/_/zas su 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]bshang gci za ba'am/_/sha rnams zos na 'grub pa yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/dgon pa'i gnas sam ri bo dben/_/me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa ru/_/rang gi lus ngag sems rdo rje'i/_/snying gar zla 
[\[321b.2\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/'jam dpal sa bon mu~M du bsgom/_/bdag lus dang ni zla ba dang /_/mu~M rnams rim par je zhi la/_/stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa las/_/snying rje mu~M dang zla ba las/_/rdo rje 'jam pa'i phyag rgya bsgom/_/lus dang ngag sems rdo rje las/_/
[\[321b.3\]]rdo rje 'jam pa rab 'phros pas/_/'jam dpal nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/_/rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dang bcas/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan pa'i/_/'jam dpal nyid du kun gyis mthong /_/mngon shes ldan pa'i lha 
[\[321b.4\]]rnams kyis/_/lus kyi rnam pa mthong mi 'gyur/_/de nas slar ni bsdus pa las/_/thugs ka'i mu~M la thim bsams na/_/mchog tu shes rab rno ba dang /_/mkhyen rab kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'ang thob 'gyur na/_/'jig 
[\[321b.5\]]rten shes bya smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus dag tu/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas su/_/rang nyid gang 'dod lhar bsgoms te/_/sku gsung thugs su byin 
[\[321b.6\]]brlabs pa'i/_/dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la/_/sran ma tsam gyi ril bu bya/_/lcags gsum ga 'ur bcug nas ni/_/khar bcug rang gi snying po las/_/rab tu goms par 'di byas na/_/gang 'dod rigs 'dzin gdon mi za/_/mtha' yas zhing khams 
[\[321b.7\]]thams cad kyi/_/rdul snyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/_/de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_/de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog_/ces gsungs so/_/yang na rang gi phyag rgya ste/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus dag tu/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]bdag nyid gang 'dod lhar bsgoms te/_/rang gi phyag rgya brnyan mar bya/_/lag tu thogs la rang rig sngags/_/bzlas na rig 'dzin gang yin 'gyur/_/rang gi lha ni gang yin pa'i/_/yon tan dag ni de thob 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[322a.2\]]de la 'di ni rdo rje lha dang /_/lha mo dgug pa'i cho ga'o/_/shing gcig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am/_/mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su/_/bdag nyid gtso gzung ldan byas nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid bsam/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/lag 
[\[322a.3\]]na kyo ba thogs pa yi/_/sprul pa bsam yas 'phro bar bya/_/dza yA ra Na phaT/_gang dgug lha 'am bud med dam/_/ya~M las rlung gis bteg bsams te/_/kyo bas gdan nam snying ga nas/_/gzung ste hU~M gis bsdus byas na/_/sangs rgyas grags pa 
[\[322a.4\]]chen po yang /_/rang dbang med par khugs 'gyur na/_/'jig rten bu mo smos ci dgos/_/gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ni 'di ni rdo rje lce bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/bdag nyid sngags kyi skyes bu yi/_/rdo rje'i skur ni rab bsgoms 
[\[322a.5\]]la/_/lce la pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/_/rdo rje'i sbyor bas o~M du bsam/_/de las rdo rje gsung du gyur/_/bsam yas a~M gi 'phro 'du las/_/sangs rgyas gsung dang sems can dag_/bdag gi lce la 'dus pa ru/_/yang nas yang du goms par bsdu/_/
[\[322a.6\]]'jig rten tshig gam chos kyi sgra/_/ngag brjod bden zhing nyan pa dang /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang phra ma tshig rtsub sogs/_/ngag gi nyes pa ci brjod kyang /_/lce sgrib spangs par gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni sha rnam pa lnga'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs 
[\[322a.7\]]so/_/bdag nyid lus ngag sems rdo rje/_/rdo rje gsum du rnam par bsgom/_/mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan/_/ye shes dam tshig snying gar bsgom/_/dbu rgyan rdo rje gsal bar bya/_/sha chen dag ni thams cad la/_/sa bon oM gyis rnam par sbyang /_/
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_sha chen ji snyed yod pa kun/_/o~M gyi 'phro 'dus bsdus nas ni/_/spyod tshe bdag la thim par bsgom/_/glang po dag gi sha rnams la/_/hU~M lce'i dam tshig rdo rje la/_/rdo rje can gyi hU~M du bsgom/_/ye shes 
[\[322b.2\]]lnga yi sbyor ba yis/_/zos na dam tshig sku gsung thugs/_/rdo rje thob par gdon mi za/_/phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs 'grub/_/cho ga [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]de yis ni/_/glang po dag gi sha rnams la/_/hU~M gi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs te/_/zos na mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/_/
[\[322b.3\]]rta sha dag ni thams cad la/_/swa yi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs te/_/zos na mi snang kun gyi mchog_/khyi sha dag ni thams cad la/_/ha yi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs na/_/dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma kun/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur/_/gnyid kyi dgra yang 
[\[322b.4\]]mod la 'joms/_/ba glang sha ni thams cad la/_/a~M gyi 'phro 'dus sbyang byas te/_/cho ga bzhin du zos na ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi longs spyod 'phrog_/mthu chen kun gyi bu mo yang /_/spyod par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni 
[\[322b.5\]]rdo rje mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/_/bdag nyid rnam pa kun ldan pa'i/_/sngags kyi lus su rnam sbyangs nas/_/mig gi dbang po thams cad la/_/yig 'bru lnga yis rab sbyangs te/_/'od zer lngar ni 'phro 
[\[322b.6\]]ba las/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad/_/mig gi mngon shes kun bsdus nas/_/dbang po de la thim pa dang /_/zos sam mig la rtag bskus na/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/_/spyod yul ji snyed yod pa kun/_/shing thog 
[\[322b.7\]]lag tu bzhag pa bzhin/_/rdo rje mig gi gsal bar mthong /_/cho ga gong ma'i tshul gyis ni/_/rna ba'i dbang po thams cad la/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/_rna ba'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas/_/zos sam rna ba'i nang bzhag na/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi/_/sgra rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/_/rna ba'i drung du 'dod pa bzhin la/_/snying gi bye brag thams cad la/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/_/dran pa'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas/_/zos sam snying gar 
[\[323a.2\]]bzhag na ni/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/_thugs dang sems kyi rgyud dag ni/_/mkhyen cing rig pa kun shes 'gyur/_/yum gyi mkha' las byung ba yi/_/rak+ta dag ni thams cad la/_/sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/_/gnas 
[\[323a.3\]]rnams ma lus kun bsdus nas/_/zos sam snying gar bzhag na ni/_/sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams/_/zhag gsum lon bzhin gsal bar 'gyur/_/snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/_/phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/
[\[323a.4\]]bkug nas de dag rdzu 'phrul rnams/_/phrogs nas snying gar bsdu byas na/_/sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje rdzu 'phrul thams cad kun/_/'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje bsrung ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/sku gsung 
[\[323a.5\]]thugs ni rnams bsgoms la/_/snying gar nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor las/_/khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba yis/_/bsrung bar bya ba'i zug rngu rnams/_/phyung ste med par bsams nas ni/_/lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/_phyag rgya dag ni thams cad dam/_/yang na rdo rje 
[\[323a.6\]]rgya gram mam/_/rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis/_/lus dang ngag sems rab bsrungs na/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs na/_/phal pa rnams kyis smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/las 'di sbyar bar bya ba yang /_/ljongs sam grong khyer grong dag tu/_/
[\[323a.7\]]sngags kyi bdag por rab gnas la/_/nad kun spong ba'i las 'di bya/_/rdo rje rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba/_/bskal pa'i me bzhin bsams nas su/_/spros pas nad rnams bsregs nas ni/_/slar yang rdo rje nyid la bsdu/_/de nas rdo rje de nyid las/_/'od zer 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]ser po spros pa yis/_/nad rnams stong pa'i gnas de dag_/bskal pa yun du gang bsams te/_/goms par yang dang yang bsams na/_/nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed/_/de na 'khor ba'i skye bo rnams/_/sprul pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[323b.2\]]bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/_/tshe ring lang tsho bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar/_/rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa ni/_/nam mkha'i dbus su zla ba la/_/
[\[323b.3\]]dkyil 'khor zlum po bsams nas su/_/rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor bskyed/_/snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/bud d+ha lo tsa'i snying po bsam/_/de las lha mo'i skur spros pas/_/mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom/_/slar 'dus 'od kyi 
[\[323b.4\]]thig ler gsal/_/de nyid bdag gi lus la dbab/_/bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas/_/sangs rgyas sprin chen rab 'phros te/_/'dod pa'i lus nang gang bar bya/_/sangs rgyas sprin gyis de lus la/_/dbang bskur ba ni rab tu stsol/_/de yis skad cig de yi tshe/_/
[\[323b.5\]]drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rgyas pa'i bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha'i dbus su zla ba la/_/chos kyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya/_/snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/gos dkar can gyi snying po bsam/_/
[\[323b.6\]]de las gos dkar nyid 'phros pas/_/mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom/_/de las 'od kyi gong bu ni/_/gru bzhi lam par gsal bar bsdu/_/ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/_/rin chen sprin chen rab spros pas/_/rdo rje chos su bsgoms nas su/_/'dod 
[\[323b.7\]]par bya ba'i lus nang dgang /_/yang nas yang du 'di byas na/_/bar snang ci 'dod rgyas par 'gengs/_/nor bu rin chen bzhin 'drar 'gyur/_/dgos pa phra mo smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/rdo rje dkyil 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]'khor zla gam ni/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/_/rdo rje chos mchog gzugs su bsam/_/snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/nyid kyi snying po bsam par bya/_/rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/_/mkha' dbyings 
[\[324a.2\]]thams cad gang bar bsgom/_/'od zer sna lnga 'phros pa yis/_/'dod pa la ni dbab par bya/_/de nas bsdus te bdag nyid kyis/_/sku gsung thugs kyi byin bsdus na/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyang dbang 'du na/_/'gro ba dbang med smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[324a.3\]]de la 'di ni rdo rje drag po bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/khros pa'i gzugs rnams bsgom bya ste/_/bskal pa'i me dpung 'phros pa las/_/khros pa'i rdo rje srin po dang /_/sna tshogs wa dang bya 
[\[324a.4\]]rog dang /_/bya rgod khyi la sogs pa yi/_/phra men bsam yas mi bzad pas/_/mkha' dbyings gang bar bsgoms nas su/_/sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed na/_/dngos sam yang na bsams nas kyang /_/mtshon cha thogs pa de dag gis/_/snying dang 
[\[324a.5\]]nang grol dbang po kun/_/drangs te zos par rab bsgoms na/_/dgra rnams 'chi bar nges pa ste/_/de ltar rab tu bsgoms na ni/_/rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yang /_/zla ba phyed kyis 'chi 'gyur na/_/dam tshig nyams pa smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni 
[\[324a.6\]]skye 'gro 'dul ba'i phur bu bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/sdig pa byed dam gnod byed pa/_/rdo rje phur bus gdul bar bya/_/dur khrod gnas sam rkang gcig tu/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'am ki li'am/_/gang yang rung bar gnas byas la/_/rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom/_/
[\[324a.7\]]me stag 'phro ba'i 'od 'phro bas/_/ri rab gling bzhi'i gzugs byas la/_/rang gi sngags kyis gdab par bya/_/de ltar rab tu gdab byas na/_/'gro dang mi 'gro thams cad kun/_/dul bar gyur par gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni gzhan gyi rig 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]sngags gnon pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni/_/las kyi sems dpar bdag gnas la/_/g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bzhag_/rig sngags byed pa bsams nas ni/_/las kyi rdo rje'i rkang 
[\[324b.2\]]pa dag_/de yi spyi nas mnan par bsgom/_/rig sngags nyid kyang mnan par bsam/_/des ni mu stegs can dag dang /_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kun/_/mnan par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni gzhan gyi dpung mnan 
[\[324b.3\]]pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che/_/pad+ma dmar ser mdog 'dra ba/_/shin tu che zhing brjid pa bsgom/_/pha rol dmag dpung 'og dag tu/_/rlung dang 
[\[324b.4\]]mtsho dang sa skyed la/_/de la gnas pa'i dpung rnams kyis/_/steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/de steng rdo rje rgya gram gyi/_/steng du ri rab rnam par bsgom/_/de yi steng du mnan bsams na/_/sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon par nus/_/mi rgyal dpung 
[\[324b.5\]]la smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dgra'i dpung rmongs par bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/dgra 'am dpung gi gzugs brnyan dag_/bsams sam gzugs su byas nas ni/_/rdo rje phur bu tshad ldan la/_/hU~M las khro bo'i skur bskyed nas/_/
[\[324b.6\]]rang gi rig sngags rab bzlas te/_/snying gar btab par rab bsgoms nas/_/khros pas byas na sangs rgyas kyi/_/dpung yang myos par gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni chu la 'bying ba med pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings 
[\[324b.7\]]kyi dbus su ni/_/sngags kyi bdag po rab tu bsgom/_/chu yi steng ni thams cad du/_/sangs rgyas dag gis gtams par bsgom/_/steng nas dal gyis bcag par bsam/_/sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi/_/spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom/_/de ltar 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]rab tu goms pa dang /_/sa la 'gro bzhin nus par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni thogs med rlung gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkhar rdo rje dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/lha yi rnal 
[\[325a.2\]]'byor bsgom par bya/_/'og gi phyogs su ya~M las ni/_/rlung gis rab tu bteg par bsgom/_/de ltar rab tu bsgom byas na/_/mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro bar nus/_/zhing khams kun du bgrod par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nyi ma gsal ba 
[\[325a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/_/snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/_/de las 'od du 'phros pa las/_/mun pa'i gnas rnams bsal bar nges/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rlung bcad pa bsgrub pa'i 
[\[325a.4\]]thabs so/_/bdag nyid rlung gi phyogs song la/_/stegs bu gru bzhi lham par bya/_/spos kyi thig le bdun byas te/_/ya~M las rlung bdun bskyed par bya/_/rlung lha dgug pa byas nas su/_/kham phor gyis ni dgab byas te/_/de steng la~M las ri rab bsgom/_/
[\[325a.5\]]ri rab rtse la khro bo ni/_/'bar ba dag gis mnan par bsgom/_/des ni 'jig pa'i rlung rnams kyang /_/bcings par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni char pa dbab pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/
[\[325a.6\]]pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom/_/dbus su khro bo stobs po che/_/'dab ma la ni klu brgyad po/_/bsgoms sam yang na bris kyang rung /_/khro bo'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/_/klu rnams rab tu mnan nas su/_/hU~M gnyis bar du klu rnams kyi/_/snying po spel 
[\[325a.7\]]cing gzir nas su/_/klu rnams gnas pa'i sa phyogs su/_/hU~M zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya/_/khro bos mnan pa'i klu rnams kyi/_/kha nas char pa skyugs bsams na/_/'jig dus lta bu'i char pa'ang 'bab/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni char pa dang 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]ser ba gcad pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/rta mchog dpal ni rnam par bsam/_/nyi ma'i mdog 'dra 'od bzang zhal/_/nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs/_/lce yi steng du hU~M 
[\[325b.2\]]bzhag ste/_/me ri 'od dang bcas pa yis/_/char chus gang ba'i sprin rnams kun/_/bskam zhing lce yis blangs bsams na/_/skam par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/yang na lce stengs de nyid du/_/ya~M las rlung du bsgoms nas ni/_/bus pas sprin rnams 
[\[325b.3\]]gtor bar 'gyur/_/yang na ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/_/char sprin dang ni klu yi gzugs/_/bcad cing dum bur gtubs bsams te/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i sdigs mdzub kyis/_/bsdus te rang rig sngags bzlas na/_/'jig pa'i char che de rnams kyang /_/skad cig 
[\[325b.4\]]na ni med par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni bgegs bsal ba'i thabs so/_/nam mkha'i dbus su nyi ma yi/_/dbus su khro bo rnam bsgom pa/_/mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya che/_/rig pa mang pos bskor ba'o/_/rang rig sngags dang 
[\[325b.5\]]stangs tshul gyis/_/hU~M dang phaT ces rnam bsgrags na/_/khams gsum dregs pa thams cad kyang /_/rdul phran bzhin du rlag par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni chom rkun bcing ba'i thabs so/_/rkang rjes sa dang khyi khrag las/_/mtshan 
[\[325b.6\]]ma ming du bcas par bya/_/mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la/_/'od zer can gyi sngags bzlas pas/_/lan grangs nyi shur bsngags nas ni/_/mig gnyis su ni gdab par bya/_/gzugs brnyan tshogs la phul nas ni/_/rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung /_/
[\[325b.7\]]oM sum b+ha badzra mu sa le na tsur+NA ya na ra big+h+nan hU~M phaT/_las 'di brtsam pa byas na ni/_/mi rgod bzlog par gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni me bsad pa'i thabs so/_/me ni mched pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mkha' lding rgyal po bya khyung ni/_/stang 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]zil lta bu'i kha dog la/_/sbrul nag stong gis rab brgyan pa'i/_/gshog pa mkha' la gdengs pa bsgom/_/klu rnams dang ni sprin dag la/_/rdo rje tshig tu bsgo ba ni/_/char chen phob la me sod ces/_/thos nas sprin tshogs bum pa 
[\[326a.2\]]yi/_/char gyis me yang gsod par 'gyur/_/gshog pas me nyid bkab nas su/_/mchus brkos chus ni mtshams bcad na/_/bskal pa'i mes kyang 'tshig mi nus/_/oM badzra na ra ya Na/_ni rba ba ya ti na ba~M bu me g+he hU~M zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni thog 
[\[326a.3\]]bzlog pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/_/zhal gsum phyag bzhir rnam par gnas/_/ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba/_/snyems ma dang ni byams ma dang /_/chu srin rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_/me tog 
[\[326a.4\]]rol pa zhes bya yi/_/lha mo bzhi yis rnam par bskor/_/g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor/_/g.yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa/_/phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste/_/sku las sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin/_/thor tshugs gsal ba rnam par bsgom/_/
[\[326a.5\]]nam mkha' las ni babs pa yi/_/thog ni rang rig sngags kyis bzlog_/a~M ma hA su kha badzra che ge mo dza/_o~M su ra ta ban+d+ha hU~M phaT ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni gzhan gyi lce gnon pa'i thabs so/_/mar gyi tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/_/dur khrod sol ba blangs 
[\[326a.6\]]nas su/_/sngags kyi bdag por bsgoms nas su/_/dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni/_/mi snyan smra ba'am shags rgol ba'i/_/lce yi gzugs su bris pa yi/_/steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/_/rdo rje rgya gram bsgoms pa yi/_/dbus su ri rab bskyed 
[\[326a.7\]]par bya/_/de steng bdag gis mnan bsams na/_/tshig dbang lha yang dbang 'gyur na/_/shags la sogs pa smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni pra dbab pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi/_/khye'u bu mo gang yang rung /_/
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/dbab pa'i snod du rab tu brtag_/ting 'dzin rtsal dang ldan pas bya/_/gzhan gyis byas na dpyas par 'gyur/_/dang por phyi nang khrus byas te/_/sdig pa sbyang phyir 'dul khrims dbog_/'od kyi 'phro 'dus byin gyis brlab/_/
[\[326b.2\]]rgyan gyi khyad par rnams kyis brgyan/_/snying gar hU~M ni bsgom par bya/_/spyi bo gtsug tu ha bsgom mo/_/a ni kha ru de bzhin te/_/de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/_/'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs te/_/de las 'od zer bskul zhing dbab/_/ng+ha ni bskul 
[\[326b.3\]]ba'i sngags tshig ste/_/gang dbab dz+hau yis bskul bar bya/_/byis pa'i lus la thim par bsam/_/byis pa'i tsit+ta gzhal med khang /_/dbab pa'i lha nyid bzhugs bsams te/_/lag rgya rdo rje thal mo las/_/sor mo phyir bsnol kha sbub la/_/mtheb gnyis so so'i 
[\[326b.4\]]mthil bkug pa'o/_/rdo rje tshig tu bzlas pa'i sngags/_/che ge mo zhig a a zhes/_/brjod cing rab tu bskul byas na/_/'gul ba dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur/_/khru gang tsam nas lnga yi bar/_/'jigs skrag nas ni 'phar bar 'gyur/_/snying la gnas pa'i 
[\[326b.5\]]lha des ni/_/smra gsung kun dang ldan pa ste/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/_/ci 'dod gtam ni smra bar 'gyur/_/rtog pa thams cad bral ba yi/_/rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yang /_/cho ga 'di yis 'bab 'gyur na/_/'jig rten pa lta smos ci dgos/_/
[\[326b.6\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dug gtang ba'i thabs so/_/sbrul ni mi sdug gdug cing khro/_/'jigs byed nag po rab tu 'bar/_/dug gi lce gnyis mche ba can/_/sol ba rdo rgyus dag gis bri/_/bskul ba'i yi ge snying po 'di/_/sbrul gyi khong par rab 
[\[326b.7\]]tu bsam/_/khaM kha de nang mi zad dug_/'jigs par bde ba rab bsgoms na/_/sbrul de rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/_/de nas zos shig ces bskul te/_/mtshan ma nas ni zhugs nas ni/_/khong du song ste zos bsams na/_/dug gis gzung bar 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dug dbyung ba'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/spyan ras gzigs ni bsgom par bya/_/kha dog dkar po hri spros te/_/dug can 
[\[327a.2\]]khong du zhugs pa yis/_/dug rnams hri la 'dus nas ni/_/hU~M gis khong nas phyir phyung dang /_/phaT kyis bar snang khams su gtor/_/yang na gzhan gyi khong du spo/_/des ni de ma thag tu yang /_/dug rnams dbyung bar gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de 
[\[327a.3\]]la 'di ni dug spo ba'i thabs so/_/dug can snying gar o~M dkar las/_/'od zer dkar pos dug bsdus pas/_/o~M nyid nag por snang byung nas/_/gzhan gyi lce 'am mtshan ma 'am/_/khong du zhugs par rab bsgoms na/_/'pho ba rtag tu gdon mi za/_/
[\[327a.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug gso ba'i thabs so/_/mdze 'bras shu ba phol mig dang /_/'brum bu la sogs nad rnams kun/_/a dkar dag gi 'phro 'du yis/_/gong ma bzhin du dbyung bar bya/_/spo ba yang ni de bzhin no/_/de ni khams las 
[\[327a.5\]]gyur pa yi/_/nad rnams thams cad nges par sel/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni bkres skom zhi ba sgrub pa'i thabs so/_/bkres skom can gyi nyon mongs pa'am/_/yang na bsgrub pa'am gang yang rung /_/sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya/_/rnam par snang 
[\[327a.6\]]mdzad gzugs chen po/_/nam mkha'i dbus su bsgom par bya/_/ba ni kha yi nang du bsgom/_/o~M ni lce la rnam bsams te/_/yid bzhin bdud rtsi lta bu yi/_/bza' ba'i gnas su de nyid bsam/_/des ni bkres skom sdug bsngal sel/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[327a.7\]]so/_/de la 'di ni rnam par dag pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/o~M ni mig la rab bsams te/_/yul kun rnam snang mdzad du bsgom/_/de ltar rtag tu goms pa dang /_/chos kun sku gsung rdo rje mthong /_/de nyid rnam dag spyan du grags/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]de la 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i lha mthu bo che rnams zil gyis gnon cing tshig nyan pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bsam/_/b+hi zhes bya ba'i snying po 
[\[327b.2\]]yis/_/mthu chen rnams ni drangs nas su/_/bsdigs pa dag kyang byas nas ni/_/zil gyis gnon cing nyan par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_de la 'di ni lha mo tsun d+ha bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/sngags kyi bdag por bdag gnas pa'i/_/snying gar nyi ma'i 
[\[327b.3\]]dkyil 'khor la/_/tsa~M zhes bya ba'i 'phro 'du las/_/bdag nyid tsun d+ha'i gzugs su bsgyur/_/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/_/kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom/_/'di ni chos dbyings bsgrub pa ste/_/bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[327b.4\]]zhes bshad do/_/de la 'di ni dza~M b+ha la nor bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/_/snying gar dza~M gyi 'phro 'du las/_/dza~M b+ha la yi gzugs dag gis/_/bar snang khams kun gang ba ni/_/
[\[327b.5\]]mdog sngon thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/_/gsus po che la mi thung gzugs/_/yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa yis/_/dbul ba thams cad sel bar bsam/_/'dod pa la ni de dag dab ba/_/des ni dbul ba sel bar byed/_/nor dang gter gyi bdag por 'gyur/_/
[\[327b.6\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje any+dza na bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/shing gcig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am/_/ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/_/rdo rje any+dza bsgrub par bya/_/pad+ma ban d+ha kha sbyar du/_/tshil chen bshang gci khu ba dang /_/ma hA ra k+ta las 
[\[327b.7\]]byung ba'i/_/du ba ban d+har chags pa dang /_/bshang gci rak+tas sbrus nas ni/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/gsum du byas na de nyid la/_/rang gi gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad/_/nyi shu dgu yi nam phyed na/_/btab na dngos grub grub 'gyur 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]te/_/mig la bskus na ci yang mthong /_/mi snang ba dang rkang mgyogs dang /_/de la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams/_/thob par 'gyur te gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje ro langs bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[328a.2\]]dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnam par bsgom/_/dur khrod ri brag gnyan pa'i sar/_/ro yi rdzas btsal de nas kyang /_/ro yi gnyen por bdag bsams te/_/de yi steng du bdag gnas la/_/
[\[328a.3\]]de la dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom/_/de sngags rgyun du bzlas bya zhing /_/dgug pa'i pho nya drag tu bskul/_/mdog mdangs bkrag snum byung ba dang /_/bdud rtsi yis ni bsku bar bya/_/de nas 'gul bar gyur pa dang /_/phyag rgya bzhi yis gzhum par 
[\[328a.4\]]bya/_/sngags kyi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/_/de nas rab tu 'phar ba dang /_/'gro ba ris drug gang yin pa/_/rdo rje drag tu gdab par bya/_/rdo rje so yis gcad bya zhing /_/sngags zlos khong du bstim par bya/_/de nas langs par gyur pa dang /_/rdo rje byin 
[\[328a.5\]]nas dbang yang bskur/_/bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par bya/_/las rnams gang 'dod byed du gzhug_/yang na gser ram gos mtshon nam/_/rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub rnams/_/ji ltar 'dod pa rkyen gyis bsgyur/_/gang 'dod pa de 
[\[328a.6\]]gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje sgyu ma bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/rde'u shing bu yi rgyu dag las/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te/_/she'u re sman gyis byugs nas ni/_/rdo rje sngags 
[\[328a.7\]]kyis tshig 'di bzlas/_/she'u re'u i na ya/_/a mo ka a g+hus sa g+hus/_/shing bu dag gis gdab bya zhing /_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/_/des ni sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur/_/bsdu bar 'dod na slar la bzlog_/de yang bkri drang 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]thabs su 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni ro bsreg pa'i bsgrub thabs so/_/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/_/bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms te/_/ro la sngags kyis btab nas ni/_/dri zhim chu yis byug par bya/_/zhun 
[\[328b.2\]]chen khu bar btsos pa yi/_/ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya/_/dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu/_/lha yi phyag rgya dgod par bya/_/gnas der sdong bu re re la/_/lha rnams snying po bris pa gdags/_/ro yi phyi rol shun pa la/_/'gro drug sa bon bkod 
[\[328b.3\]]nas ni/_/rim gyis sbyang ba'i las su bya/_/thab khung dkyil gang yin pa yi/_/phyag rgya gzhung dang mthun par dgod/_/de stengs shing brtsigs gru bzhi la/_/ka ba zur bzhi sum brtsegs kyi/_/bar khang yang thog bcas par bya/_/bar khang ro gzhag 
[\[328b.4\]]shar du bstan/_/yang stengs ras sam shog shog la/_/bris pa'i phyag rgya tshang bar dgod/_/bar khang glo skar phyogs bzhi nas/_/gzungs thag phyogs bzhir bla mar dbul/_/de mthar 'khor gyi lha rnams dgod/_/de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis/_/me 
[\[328b.5\]]yi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/_/rdo rje las kyi kar ma yis/_/las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par rol/_/rdo rje bla ma gcig gis ni/_/ro yi nyes pa bgrang zhing bshags/_/rdo rje skabs sbyor chen po yi/_/rdo rje mchod pa skabs su dbul/_/bkra shis gnas kyi 
[\[328b.6\]]smon lam ni/_/skabs sam mjug tu gdab par bya/_/rdo rje grangs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/_/grangs gzung dkar byang bla ma dbul/_/sdig pa'i gnag byang gshegs shing bsreg_/me lha spyan drang mchod pa bya/_/bstod pa dag kyang legs par bya/_/ro yi 
[\[328b.7\]]sgrib pa 'byongs ma 'byongs/_/me la ltas su blta bar bya/_/mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na/_/bsreg sbyang cho ga rgya cher bya/_/de ni tshogs rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje thal chen bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/de la thal ba thams 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]cad kun/_/gu gul nag po dang sbyar ba/_/ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/_/rdo rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab na/_/bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni phrin 
[\[329a.2\]]las bzhi'i sgrub thabs so/_/las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis/_/rdzas dang kha dog phyogs dang dbyibs/_/yam shing bsreg rdzas khyad par las/_/dkar dang dmar ser mthing gnag las/_/shar lho nub byang phyogs dag tu/_/zlum po le'u tshe 
[\[329a.3\]]pad+ma zhi/_/gru bzhi zur brgyad 'khor lo rgyas/_/gru chad gzhu dbyibs zla gam dbang /_/gru gsum b+ha ga mngon spyod pa'o/_/ting 'dzin byams dang dang bas zhi/_/snying rje dga' bas rgyas pa ste/_/dga' dang chags pas dbang du 'gyur/_/btang 
[\[329a.4\]]snyoms khros pas drag por 'gyur/_/so so'i las kyi lha rgyud la/_/sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang /_/glu rgyud 'byor pas mchod par bya/_/zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la/_/khro bos ye shes me ru sbyang /_/so so'i rgyud du bshad bstabs te/_/
[\[329a.5\]]klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du/_/dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/_/sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg par bya/_/nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas ni/_/ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul/_/phung po lnga ni yab lnga la/_/'byung ba yum lnga'i dbyings su bstim/_/
[\[329a.6\]]shes pa brgyad ni ma brgyad la'o/_/yul brgyad phra men brgyad la bstim/_/skye bzhes bsdus pa'i sreg rdzas rnams/_/rnam thar sgo bzhi'i klong du bstim/_/sgrib dang dngos grub don rnams ni/_/me la mkhas pas brtag par bya/_/so so'i dbyibs 
[\[329a.7\]]dang kha dog la/_/dbyibs dang kha dog shes par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdzas bsgrub pa'i thabs gsang ba'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas/_/gnas dang sa gzhi brtags par ni/_/sa stegs tshon gyis bri bar bya/_/dbus su 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]thig bzhi le'u tshe dgu/_/de'i mtha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bya/_/sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bri/_/mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri 'bar/_/dbus su zla gam kha sprod bri/_/phyogs mtshams brgyad du kha~M brgyad bri/_/'khor lo'i bar khyams mu khyud 
[\[329b.2\]]la/_/nang du bltas pa'i kha~M brgyad gsal/_/rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad/_/mu khyud brgyad la phyir bltas brgyad/_/gru chad bzhi la nang bltas bzhi/_/sgo bzhir phyir blta bri bar bya/_/phyi rol bar khyams de dag la/_/phyi lta nyi shu rtsa brgyad 
[\[329b.3\]]bri/_/bskal pa'i me ri phyi khyams la/_/phyir lta bcu ni bri bar bya/_/de la phyag rgya rim par dgod/_/ro yi tshol stangs rnam bzhi yis/_/dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams bcol/_/ye shes spyan gyis lta ba dang /_/rdo rje 'gros kyis btsal ba dang /_/
[\[329b.4\]]phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rol pa dang /_/ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'jo tshul dang /_/btsal nas maN+Dal sgo bzhi nas/_/bro chen bzhi yis sbyang bar bya/_/shar du dug gsum 'joms pa'i bro/_/lho ru khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro/_/nub tu rta mchog zhal gyi 
[\[329b.5\]]bro/_/byang du gdul sbyong drag po'i bros/_/sbyang bar bya ba rab tu gces/_/de nas dbus su gzhag bya ste/_/mgo bo shar du bstan pa de'i/_/phung po bru~M las gzhal med khang /_/de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog bsgom/_/so so'i rdzas kyi gnas 
[\[329b.6\]]rnams la/_/rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod/_/bsnyen pas phyin phebs rtags byung nas/_/bam de byang shar mtshams su bsgral/_/rdo rje thig gis btab nas kyang /_/rdzas rnams so so'i skos su gdab/_/des mtshon rnam lngas bkro bar bya/_/
[\[329b.7\]]'khor lo'i spyi bo nyid nas bkro/_/rdo rjes snying ga'i phyogs nas bkro/_/rin chen zur brgyad lte ba nas/_/pad+mas kha yi phyogs nas so/_/ral gris yan lag rnams nas bkro/_/de nas phyag rgya'i gnas rnams su/_/rdzas rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]dgod/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i gnod dgu la/_/sku gsung thugs dang ldan par ni/_/gsol ba'i 'od dang bcas par dgram/_/rdzas kyis mdzes par brgyan par bya/_/rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram/_/mchod pa'i dam rdzas tshang 
[\[330a.2\]]bar bsham/_/de nas rnal 'byor chen po kun/_/bdag nyid phyag rgyar gnas pa de/_/bskyed pa ting 'dzin tshul bzhin bskyed/_/rang bzhin rdzogs chen spyan drangs mchod/_/bsgrub pa nyams len bzlog par bya/_/dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur 
[\[330a.3\]]bya/_/de nas gtor ma tsho gsum du/_/dang por bcad de sbyin sreg bya/_/bar mas mkha' 'gro tshim par bya/_/tha ma mi zad gter du sba/_/las rnams rdzogs par byas na ni/_/dpal chen nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur na/_/dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci 
[\[330a.4\]]dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/sa stengs chag phyed tshad du bya/_/sum brtsegs byas dbus zla gam brgyad/_/phyi mtha' thod pas bskor ba la/_/me dpung 'bar 
[\[330a.5\]]bas bskor ba'o/_/de yi phyi rim dmar chen rgyas/_/dbus su ban d+ha mtshan ldan la/_/yab yum snying po bris la bzhag_/zla gam brgyad la ma brgyad bzhag_/mthing gnag ma tha me ri 'bar/_/de 'og thod tshar gsum du bya/_/sgo khyams dur 
[\[330a.6\]]khrod rdzas kyis brgyan/_/sgo rtseg sgo khyud tha ma bran/_/gnas mchog rab tu dben pa yi/_/ri yi rtse 'am nags tshal lam/_/sde dpung phra mos mi tshugs shing /_/'du 'dzi 'gro 'ong chad par shis/_/rnal 'byor gdeng dang rab ldan zhing /_/brjid 
[\[330a.7\]]cing sran tshugs khu 'phrig chung /_/brtul zhugs che la rtog pa med/_/las kyi phreng ba lhag chad med/_/dri zhim sman gyis phyi bkru zhing /_/shi ne d+he hus nang yang bkru/_/tshad mar sbyar ba'i bka' dag dang /_/ldan pas dus btab bzhin du brtsam/_/
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]rgyu yang brtag par bya ba ni/_/mdzes shing bkra shis ldan pa la/_/bong tshod lo ni dar la bab/_/rigs lnga'i mtshan rtags yod pa shis/_/bsgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de lta bu/_/dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrangs nas/_/byin gyis brlab pa rab tu bya/_/
[\[330b.2\]]d+ha hu ma 'das dbang po bsgyur/_/bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis/_/dbang po lnga la gdab par bya/_/snang srid gtam ni dri ba'am/_/legs nyes dri ba'i pra yang dbab/_/rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo rnams su/_/so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/_/phyag 
[\[330b.3\]]rgya bkod de bsgral bar bya/_/phung po gzhal yas khang du bya/_/nang grol thams cad lhar bsgoms te/_/bsgral sbyangs sbyar ba byas nas ni/_/mchod dang mnyes dang dam skongs dang /_/dngos grub rnam gsum thob nas blang /_/zhes gsungs 
[\[330b.4\]]so/_/de la 'di ni mchog phran gtsang ma bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/maN+Dal gru bzhi tshad ldan la/_/zla gam sgo gcig rdo rjes bskor/_/mu khyud sgo bzhi rab tu bri/_/khyu mchog dbang po phyed ldan la/_/phyi nang khrus kyang de bzhin bya/_/dbus su bzhag 
[\[330b.5\]]ste shar du bstan/_/lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags/_/man ngag lung ldan phyag tu dbul/_/phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram/_/de yi khong du gzhal yas su/_/ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba'i/_/thugs kar nor bu rin chen 
[\[330b.6\]]'bar/_/dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la/_/dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i snying po la/_/til 'bru tsam gyi hU~M dmar gnas/_/rdo rje 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/_/rdo rje pra yang dbab par bya/_/de nas mtshan rtags bzang ba dang /_/dngos grub blangs te bsgral 
[\[330b.7\]]bar bya/_/bskams te bdud rtsi'i rtsa bar shis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dregs pa can gnon pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas/_/ji ltar rigs pa 'dus pa dang /_/maN+Dal gzhi gcig skyong nul bya/_/
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]chag rams bstod pa'i maN+Dal bzhi/_/gru bzhir gzhi las spags par bya/_/de dag ma tang gzugs su bya/_/snying ga man chad dbus su bsnol/_/maN+Dal chen po'i 'og tu gzhug_/dbus su 'khor lo'i thig btab la/_/dpal 
[\[331a.2\]]chen lnga yi phyag rgya gzhag_/bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes pa la/_/gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod/_/sgo bzhir sgo srung de bzhi gzhag_/yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas/_/phyi rol khyams la me rir bya/_/de mtha' thod pa tshar 
[\[331a.3\]]gsum bltams/_/de yi phyi rim me bur 'tshub/_/gu gu thul dang za ra tshags/_/zhing dang sbrul chun sgo khyud la/_/ban d+ha snying por bcas pa dag_/so so'i gnas su de bzhin gzhag_/rdo rje'i dbyibs su brtsigs pa'i thab/_/zur bzhi kha bzhi dag la bya/_/snying gar 'khor 
[\[331a.4\]]lo'i thab tu bya/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i yam shing brtsig_/hom lnga 'brel pa'i las chen la/_/thab khung lnga yi bye brag tu/_/rgyud drug yam shing spungs pa las/_/ye shes lnga yi me klong du/_/nyon mongs lnga yi bsreg sbyang thim/_/bya bar 'os pa 
[\[331a.5\]]mtha' dag kun/_/rnal 'byor can gyis ci rigs bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni ma tang 'greng bu gnon pa'i thabs so/_/dkyil 'khor ma tang gzugs su bya/_/mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan/_/mgo lus yan lag rnams la ni/_/
[\[331a.6\]]maN+Dal bcu gcig rab tu bya/_/zhal du hom khung gru gsum la/_/yam shing dag gis brdzangs nas ni/_/sbyin sreg hom gyi las rnams bya/_/snying gar gru gsum rtse gsum la/_/bang rim gsum par byas nas ni/_/phur bu nyi shu rtsa gsum dgod/_/
[\[331a.7\]]zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin bya/_/lte bar gru gsum mthing nag la/_/zur la thod pa tshar gsum bri/_/gzhu bdun dgra sta brgyad kyang dgod/_/phur bu dgu dang kha T+wAM dgu/_/rtsang dmar drug cu rtsa brgyad dgod/_/yum gyi mkha' ru bsgoms nas su/_/gzir 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]gnan drag po'i las rnams bya/_/yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon la/_/gnas kyi ma mo brgyad rnams kyi/_/bri 'am mtshan ma gzhag par bya/_/gzhan rnams kyang ni ci rigs par/_/ma tang dgug dang dbab dang gnon/_/byin brlabs 
[\[331b.2\]]mkhas pas tshul bzhin bya/_/bya ba thams cad ci rigs bya/_/des ni gnon pa'i las chen 'grub/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/thams cad 'byor par byas nas ni/_/sa stengs skyong nul legs byas la/_/
[\[331b.3\]]dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/_/zla gam dmar po sgo bzhir ldan/_/rdo rje'i ra bas bskor bar bya/_/dpal ldan tshe yi phyag rgya dgod/_/rin chen sna tshogs bum pa la/_/tshe yi rdzas kyis gang ba de/_/pad+ma ban d+has kha bkab la/_/gzungs thag btags 
[\[331b.4\]]nas dbus su gzhag_/tshe dpag med par de mnga' gsol/_/bum pa rin chen las byas bzhi/_/gsang ba'i yum du de mnga' gsol/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i bum pa bzhi/_/rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gtso gzungs dang /_/so so'i 'khor gyi sems 
[\[331b.5\]]dpa' rnams/_/gtso gzungs zung du 'brel bar ni/_/phyogs phyogs dag tu tshom bur bri/_/sgo bzhir sgo srung la sogs gzhag_/sems dpa'i phyag rgya kun bkod nas/_/tshe dpag med pa'i thugs ka nas/_/'khyil cing 'tsher ba'i byang chub 
[\[331b.6\]]sems/_/nyi zla'i ga'u gnas pa de/_/a yu byang chub sems su zhu/_/de las rgyal mtshan mchod ldan dang /_/rin chen gter dang dbang bskur mdzad/_/gsang ba'i tshe gter 'dzin dang bzhi/_/thugs kar 'phros nas de bzhin du/_/tshom bu rim gyis 
[\[331b.7\]]spros nas ni/_/dkar dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstims/_/skye med dbyings su sbas nas ni/_/mi 'gyur phyag rgyas gdab par bya/_/yang na ting 'dzin khyad par gyis/_/lo 'am zla ba'i mtha' dag tu/_/skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni/_/phyag rgya chen pos 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]gnas pa des/_/shar phyogs ngos su kha bltas te/_/lha klu gnod sbyin ji snyed pa/_/shar phyogs nam mkhar gnas pa rnams/_/thams cad khong du rngubs pa las/_/phyir mi 'byung bar khong du bstims/_/dbugs de tha mar sna 
[\[332a.2\]]ru bsring /_/phyogs bcur de ltar goms byas nas/_/dpal tshe gzi byin thams cad thob/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/maN+Dal tshad dang mthun pa la/_/dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/_/gru chad zla gam bzhi par 
[\[332a.3\]]bya/_/gzhan yang zla gam ci rigs dgram/_/pad+ma'i rtse la rin po che/_/ge sar dag gis mdzes par bya/_/phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha tshogs dgod/_/dbus su tshangs pa'i skud pa can/_/sul med dung can 'khor bar gzhag_/shar du sul 'greng de 
[\[332a.4\]]bzhin te/_/lho ru dpag bsam shing bu can/_/nub tu shong bu gnyis pa gzhag_/byang du bse phor rgya gram mo/_/snod kyi mtshan nyid bkod nas su/_/dri chen zhu ba ma~M sa dang /_/rak+ta dri chu phyogs phyogs su/_/de dag skabs su sbyor ba yi/_/ka 
[\[332a.5\]]kol la dang du ru ska/_/dzA ti pha la kha dri zhim/_/lce pog dkar po rim bzhin sbyar/_/'di dag kyang ni rim pa bzhin/_/a ka ru dang ga pur dang /_/gur gum pad+ma li ga dur/_/de nas ras ya na'i tshogs/_/rigs dang las dang kha dog gis/_/ci 
[\[332a.6\]]rigs so sor dbye bar bya/_/sa bon lnga yis rnam par sbyangs/_/gsang chen de nyid dam pa yi/_/rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs brgya yis/_/sbyang ba mchog tu bya ba yin/_/khrol bu dag ni sbyangs pa na/_/bsal dang bsngo dang bsdu dang dbye/_/khrus 
[\[332a.7\]]dang bshags dang yon tan brjod/_/byin dbab bzlas pa rtags byung dang /_/bsdu dang btag btsag gzhal ba bya/_/mtshan ldan snod du rgya yis gdab/_/rigs dang mthun pa'i gzungs kyis gdags/_/dbang bskur byin brlab tshul bzhin bya/_/
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]ting 'dzin mi g.yeng 'byongs pa dang /_/dngos grub blang ba la sogs bya/_/de nas ril bu 'am 'de gu 'am/_/skyo ma la sogs ci rigs par/_/rnal 'byor mchog gis spyad par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni stan bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/gang 
[\[332b.2\]]yang rung ba'i sems can de/_/las bab pa yi rnal 'byor pas/_/raM yaM khaM gis sreg sbyang bya/_/rgyud drug sa bon 'bru lngas sbyang /_/rol pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bya zhing /_/rnam shes sbyor ba'i lhums su 'phang /_/byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yis/_/sku 
[\[332b.3\]]bskyed ye shes skur spros te/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni ga Na bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma la/_/bsnyen sgrub lung bzhin sbyor bar bya/_/dkar dmar 'dres pa'i byang chub sems/_/
[\[332b.4\]]rdo rje lce yis blang bar bya/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bya/_/'gro drug sgrib pa sbyong bar byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni spyir bsgrub pa'i thabs so/_/yi dam bcas pa btang na yang /_/bdag lus phyal bar mi gtang zhing /_/de nyid dran 
[\[332b.5\]]pa chen por bya/_/'phags pa mchod par brtson pa dang /_/rang gi lta ba gsal ba dang /_/gsang sngags sdom la gnas pa dang /_/gsang sngags phyag rgya ma nyams dang /_/yo byad tshogs na nges par 'grub/_/mi ldan don rnams brlag par 'gyur/_/
[\[332b.6\]]zhes gsungs so/_de la 'di ni mi 'grub pa'i chad pa'o/_/bsnyen bsgrub rim par ma rdzogs par/_/dngos la zhen cing sgrub byed pa/_/rang rgyud sreg par gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni bsgrubs nas ma grub pa'i chad pa'o/_/bka' 
[\[332b.7\]]bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/dus bzhin grub par ma gyur na/_/rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i/_/ye shes las grub lha rnams kyang /_/tshal par 'gas pa gdon mi za/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dngos grub gzhan dag de dag tu/_/mi zad 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/de dag la sogs bsam yas mchog_/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam dang /_/nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa/_/brjod med brjod las 'das pa yi/_/dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub/_/ces 
[\[333a.2\]]gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rnam grangs bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de mi 
[\[333a.3\]]'da' ba dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las sdom pa zab mo 'di phyung ngo /_/de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sdom pa ci'i phyir bsrung ba'o/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad la/_/log 
[\[333a.4\]]rtog 'khrul pa bsam mi khyab/_/de nyid gzhil ba'i gdul thabs su/_/phyi nang sdom pa ji snyed pa/_/rtog 'dul thabs su de snyed gsungs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dam tshig gi mdo kun 'dir 'dus pa'o/_/ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas kun/_/
[\[333a.5\]]gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po las/_/'dul ba'i thabs su so sor snang /_/snang yang rtog 'dul ma grub phyir/_/rmad byung ngang du gcig par 'dus/_/de bas gsang sngags ngo mtshar che/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dam tshig rnam par dag pa'o/_/
[\[333a.6\]]chos kun ye nas dag pa'i phyir/_/log rtog ye nas rnam par dag_/de bas sdom pa rnam par dag_/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa'o/_/thams cad thig le rdo rje bas/_/bsrung ba'i tha 
[\[333a.7\]]snyad rnams dang bral/_/kun khyab bdal ba'i ngang nyid la/_/bsrung du med na sdom pa yin/_/nam mkha' bzhin du kun du khyab/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni rtogs pa'i dam tshig go/_/bde chen rnam dag lhun grub par/_/lta bas rtogs shing 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]chud gyur na/_/dam tshig nyid kyang rnam dag ste/_/lta ba khyad par ji bzhin du/_/'dul ba'i khyad par de ltar gnas/_/de bas dam tshig zhes bya ba/_/rang gi lta ba yin par gsungs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni dam tshig gi mdo gsang 
[\[333b.2\]]ba'o/_/gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po yi/_/dam tshig bsam yas ji snyed pa/_/rtsa ba yan lag gnyis su 'dus/_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum yin te/_/sku gsung thugs su rgyal bas gsungs/_/yan lag dam tshig mi spong dang /_/mi 'dor 
[\[333b.3\]]spyod dang shes pa dang /_/grub pa yin te rnam lnga po/_/mdor na rnam pa brgyad du grags/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni mdo rgyas pa'o/_/sku yi dam tshig ces bya ba/_/bla ma spun la gdung sems ldan/_/mngan dang dpya sems spangs pa yin/_/
[\[333b.4\]]bla ma la yang rnam gsum ste/_/dam tshig dbang dang shes rab rgyud/_/man ngag lung ston slob dpon la/_/mngan dang dpya ba'i sems bor na/_/lus ngag sgo nas smos ci dgos/_/mgo dang mig dang gsang ma snying /_/rtag tu 'bral bar 
[\[333b.5\]]'phangs pa ltar/_/bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la/_/mi 'bral sems kyis de ltar lta/_/de yi phyi bzhin be'u ltar 'brang /_/de yi dgos pa ci yang rung /_/skongs na srog la'ang mi lta na/_/zang zing gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/lus la dbang ba'i rgyal 
[\[333b.6\]]po 'am/_/lus srog bskyed pa'i pha ma bas/_/shin tu gnyan zhing bkur bar bya/_/ci phyir dbyings dang rnam thar gyi/_/sgo rnams de yi ston pa yin/_/dngos grub bye brag ji snyed pa/_/de la rag las rjes su 'brang /_/ma rig mun pas gtibs pa 
[\[333b.7\]]la/_/sems kyi sgron ma de yis 'degs/_/lha mi yongs kyi 'dren ston yin/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i srog shing yin/_/yon tan kun gyi gter mdzod yin/_/gal te yon tan mi ldan yang /_/bla mar 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]bzung nas spang byas na/_/kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pa yin/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas skur pa yin/_/de yi nyams pa brjod mi lang /_/yon tan ldan pa'i bla ma de/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/rgyal 
[\[334a.2\]]sras dang ni mthu chen rnams/_/phyag 'tshal mchod cing bkur sti byed/_/'jig rten 'di na mthu chen kun/_/de yi dgongs pa skong ba dang /_/khur zhing bran du khas len na/_/rdo rje slob mas smos ci dgos/_/rdo rje spun la gdung sems kyang /_/
[\[334a.3\]]'dres dang ma 'dres yongs kyi spun/_/yang dag lam du zhugs pa la/_/mngan dang dpyas kyis sems tsam yang /_/rtag tu spang bar bya ba yin/_/brtse zhing gdung ba'i shugs phyung la/_/gcig la gcig ni mig bzhin blta/_/mdor na srog 
[\[334a.4\]]la mi chags par/_/spun dang ming sring dgos pa sgrub/_/ci phyir rdo rje spun rnams ni/_/'di nas byang chub thug pa ru/_/mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i grogs mchog ste/_/mar me 'od dang sdong bu 'dra'o/_/dper na 'jig rten mi rnams kyang /_/mang po 
[\[334a.5\]]'dus na dka' ba'ang 'grub/_/de bzhin rdo rje ming sring spun/_/dngos grub sgrub pa'i grogs mchog yin/_/dper na grogs dang ldan pa'i mi/_/'tshe ba rnams kyis mi tshugs bzhin/_/de bzhin rnal 'byor grogs ldan yang /_/rgol ba rnams 
[\[334a.6\]]kyis mi tshugs shing /_/'bras bu myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/de bas nan tan bskyed de bsrung /_/de yang sku yi dam tshig ste/_/bsrung ba yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/mdor na snang srid thams cad ni/_/gzugs su snang ba mtha' yas 
[\[334a.7\]]kun/_/chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par/_/gzugs sku 'ja' tshon tshul du gsal/_/de nyid don las mi 'da' bar/_/rtogs pa sku yi dam tshig ces/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/_/gsung gi dam tshig ces bya ba/_/sngags kyi 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]rnal 'byor gral sgo bas/_/phyag rgya bzhi ru rnam gsal nas/_/rdo rje sngags rnams rgyun mi gcad/_/bsgom dang bzlas dang 'phro 'du'i sngags/_/ting 'dzin me dang 'dra ba la/_/bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dras bskyod nas/_/sgrib pa'i bud shing bsreg 
[\[334b.2\]]par bya/_/bzlas brjod sngags kyis brtul zhugs kyang /_/sgra chen ma yin chung bar min/_/mgyogs par ma yin bul bar min/_/drag par ma yin dal bar min/_/yig 'bru yan lag nyams ma yin/_/yengs min glal sogs bar gcod 
[\[334b.3\]]min/_/rgyu ba'i sems rnams spangs pa dang /_/bzlas pa'i skyon bcu spangs nas ni/_/dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi/_/bsnyen pa rab tu rdzogs pa gces/_/ye shes lha rnams nye ba dang /_/dbyings dang rnam thar 'dzom pa dang /_/dngos grub rnam 
[\[334b.4\]]gsum thob pa dang /_/'phro 'dus 'gro don bya ba dang /_/de yis lha rnams mnyes pa dang /_/las de myur du 'grub pa'i phyir/_/bsrung ba'i dam tshig yin par gsungs/_/mdor na snang srid thams cad kun/_/skye med gsung las ma g.yos kyang /_/
[\[334b.5\]]gsung gi bye brag nyid yin par/_/rtogs shing slar yang dbyings su thim/_/rtogs pa gsung du rgyal bas gsungs/_/thugs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba/_/spyir gsang bzhi dang bar gsang bzhi/_/gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad pa'i/_/gsang 
[\[334b.6\]]sngags gsang ba'i don rnams kun/_/bum pa'i nang gi me mar bzhin/_/snod ma yin pa'i gang zag la/_/dus dang gnas skabs kun du gsang /_/snod dang ldan pa rnams la yang /_/dbang ma thob par bshad pa min/_/ci phyir gsang don de 
[\[334b.7\]]nyid la/_/ma rtogs pa rnams skur pa 'debs/_/log par rtogs pa ltung bar 'gyur/_/don ma rtogs na yid ches med/_/khams gsum skye bo'i bcas kar 'gyur/_/dngos grub bar gcod bgegs su 'gyur/_/de bas gzhan du bstan pa min/_/
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]mdor na thugs kyi dam tshig ni/_/srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/_/sems rtog rnam pa thams cad kun/_/skye med dbyings las ma g.yos kyang /_/so sor rtogs pa thugs nyid snang /_/snang nyid dbyings las mi 'da' bar/_/
[\[335a.2\]]rtogs pa thugs su rgyal bas gsungs/_/de ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig gi/_/mdo nyid rgyas par bshad pa yin/_/rtsa ba'i dam tshig gi mdo rgyas par bshad pa'o/_/mi spong dam tshig ces bya ba/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal phrag dog lnga rnams 
[\[335a.3\]]ni/_/rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas ngo bo ste/_/ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas/_/spangs na rnal 'byor don dang 'gal/_/mi dor dang du blang ba ni/_/dri chen dri chu rak+ta dang /_/ma~M sa dang ni zil pa lnga/_/'bras bu lnga yis bsdus pa rnams/_/rnal 'byor pas ni 
[\[335a.4\]]rtag tu bza'/_/'di yang dam tshig rmad po che/_/spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/sbyor dang sgrol dang ma byin len/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang ngag rtsub smra dang lnga/_/don dam skyes bus spyad par bya/_/shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/_/phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga/_/dbang po 
[\[335a.5\]]yul lnga kha dog lnga/_/rigs lnga ye shes lnga nyid du/_/don ldan skyes bus shes par bya/_/lung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/grub par bya ba'i don chen yang /_/sangs rgyas lnga las gzhan mi bsgrub/_/grub par bya ba'i dam tshig ste/_/'di dag bsrung 
[\[335a.6\]]bar rab tu gces/_/de yang ci phyir bsrung zhe na/_/'dod chags rang dang spyir snang ba/_/chags shing zhen pa thams cad kun/_/pad+ma rigs kyi ngo bo yin/_/zhe sdang de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs/_/gti mug sangs rgyas yin par gsungs/_/nga rgyal yid bzhin 
[\[335a.7\]]nor bu ste/_/phrag dog zhes bya las su bshad/_/de bas spang bar bya ba min/_/dri chen snang mdzad gtso bo yin/_/dri chu gdon mi za grub pa/_/rak+ta snang ba mtha' yas sku/_/ma~M sa rin chen 'byung ldan gtso/_/byang chub sems ni rdo rje sems/_/des na dang du 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]blang bar gsungs/_/sems can thams cad gsad bya ba/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig yin/_/bud med rnams la chags bya ba/_/snang ba mtha' yas dam tshig ste/_/gzhan gyi nor 'phrog rnam snang gis/_/rin chen 'byung ba'i [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]phra ma/_/
[\[335b.2\]]ngag rtsub gdon mi za 'grub pa'i/_/dam tshig yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/de bas spyad par bya ba'o/_/gzugs su snang ba rnam snang mdzad/_/tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan gtso/_/'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te/_/'du byed gdon mi za grub 
[\[335b.3\]]pa/_/rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'o/_/sa ni rdo rje zhes su bshad/_/rin chen chu ste pad+ma me/_/thogs med rlung gi rang bzhin te/_/nam mkha'i khams ni rnam snang mdzad/_/mig gi dbang po rnam snang mdzad/_/rna ba rin chen 'byung ba'i tshul/_/snang 
[\[335b.4\]]ba mtha' yas sna zhes grags/_/lce ni gdon mi za grub pa/_/lus ni mi bskyod pa ru bshad/_/gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul/_/sgra ni rin chen 'byung ba ste/_/dri ni snang ba mtha' yas so/_/ro ni don yod grub pa yin/_/reg rnams mi 
[\[335b.5\]]bskyod pa ru bshad/_/de bzhin dkar po rdo rje'i rigs/_/ser po bder gshegs rigs su bshad/_/mthing ga rin chen dmar po chos/_/ljang gu las kyi rigs su bshad/_/de phyir shes par bya ba yi/_/dam tshig yin par dpa' bos 
[\[335b.6\]]gsungs/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu yang /_/rigs lnga nyid du grub pas na/_/de grub pa yi dam tshig yin/_/dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/_/yan lag dam tshig 'da' ba'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yan lag gi dam tshig mdo rgyas pa'o/_/de 
[\[335b.7\]]la 'di ni dbye ba'o/_/rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams/_/bsrung ba rtog pa gnyis su dbye/_/de dag dngos su bsrung bas na/_/mi 'da' bsrung ba'i sdom bcas yin/_/rnam par dag pa'i ngang nyid du/_/de dag rtogs pas khyad par du/_/rtogs pa'i 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]dam tshig yin par gsungs/_/de la 'di ni dam tshig nyams pa ltung ba'i gnas so/_/rtsa ba nyams pa'i skyon chen yang /_/bskal pa grangs med bgrangs par yang /_/dmyal ba'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje bla ma'i sku smad na/_/
[\[336a.2\]]dus gsum sangs rgyas brnyas pa yin/_/byang chub sems la skur pas na/_/de yi sdig pa brjod mi lang /_/dper na 'jig rten sa yi rdul/_/grangs kyis bgrang bar shes kyang srid/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu thigs kyang /_/grangs kyis bgrang zhing shes su 
[\[336a.3\]]rung /_/'di yi sdig pa brjod mi nus/_/shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal las/_/thar bar nams kyang mi 'gyur te/_/srid gsum sems can gsad pas ni/_/bla ma'i bka' bcag char mi phod/_/rdo rje spun la smad pa ni/_/nyams pa'i skyon yang brjod 
[\[336a.4\]]par dka'/_/bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu/_/dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur/_/tshe 'dir bsgrub pa log pa dang /_/'bad pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/dbyings dang rnam par thar pa yi/_/sgo rnams nyams 
[\[336a.5\]]par gyur pas na/_/bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas su yun ring ste/_/lkugs pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin/_/thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi ni lus su skye/_/thong gshol 'bar ba lnga brgya yis/_/de yi lce 
[\[336a.6\]]la gshog par byed/_/bskal pa du mar myong ba dang /_/dngos grub 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/mdor na rtsa ba nyams gyur na/_/'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung /_/rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang /_/de yi snying khrag 'thung bar nges/_/mi spong dam tshig 
[\[336a.7\]]nyams gyur na/_/dngos grub thams cad spangs par 'gyur/_/mi dor dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/dngos grub 'bras bu mi 'thob cing /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]spre'u'i gnas su skye/_/spyad pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/'du shes med pa'i 'gog par ltung /_/shes 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/'du shes med pa'i khros pas ltung /_/grub pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/bdud kyi khams su ltung bar 'gyur/_/rtogs pa'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/ru tra chen po'i gnas su ltung /_/de la sogs te bsam mi 
[\[336b.2\]]khyab/_/ces gsungs so/_/de la 'di ni nyams pa bskang ba'i tshad do/_/dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na/_/mgon btsun mnyam pa'i don rtogs na/_/de nyid skongs pa'i gnas su 'gyur/_/bla ma spun la smad gyur na/_/tshe 'di nyid la mnyes byas te/_/mthol 
[\[336b.3\]]bshags drag pos 'gyod byas na/_/de ni skongs pa'i las su 'gyur/_/gal te bdag gam bla ma spun/_/ma bskangs bar du tshe 'phos na/_/de ni bskang ba'i tshad las 'das/_/gsung gi tha tshig ral gyur na/_/rdo rje chos su bdag bsgoms la/_/tha tshig 
[\[336b.4\]]gang brlag 'bum 'bum gdon/_/thugs kyi tha tshig ral gyur na/_/rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms pa la/_/lo gsum bar du mi smra bar/_/bsam gtan sbyor bar rab tu bya/_/yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/_/so so'i rigs kyis de bzhin bskong /_/
[\[336b.5\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de skad ces gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi dam tshig ni/_rang rang gi snying la gnas par mthong nas/_a la la zhes pa'i sgra phyung nas rang rang gi dam tshig la dmigs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi 
[\[336b.6\]]rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las dam tshig rnam par bkod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos brtul zhugs rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[336b.7\]]snyoms par zhugs so/_/zhugs nas kyang gsang sngags thams cad kyi brtul zhugs rnam par rol pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo /_/gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po yi/_/brtul zhugs ngo mtshar rmad byung ba/_/chos kun rol par 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]snang ba'i phyir/_/ji ltar spyad kyang brtul zhugs te/_/dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos/_/dka' thub sdom la rten pa'i mis/_/bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/dka' thub sdom la mi gnas shing /_/'dod pa'i longs 
[\[337a.2\]]spyod rab bsten pas/_/bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/rigs ngan dang ni sme sha can/_/rtag tu gsod la brtson pa dang /_/ma byin len dang mi tshangs spyod/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra la dga' ba dang /_/rtsub pa'i ngag la dga' ba ni/_/gsang sngags 
[\[337a.3\]]bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/_/pha dang khu bo mes po la/_/zhe sdang sems kyis bsgral byas na/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob/_/ma dang bu mo sring mo la/_/'dod chags sems kyis sbyar byas na/_/chags pa chen po'i dngos grub thob/_/snying rje med par 
[\[337a.4\]]gsod pa dang /_/'jigs pa med par sbyor ba la/_/bshang gci zas su za ba dang /_/rang gi khu bas mchod pa dang /_/dur khrod rgyan la dga' ba ni/_/theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/_/bsod snyoms zas la mi chags shing /_/ma bslangs pa la'ang 
[\[337a.5\]]chags mi bya/_/nags tshal dgon pa'i sa phyogs su/_/bsod snyoms blangs te bza' bar bya/_/sems kyi brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/ting 'dzin stobs dang ldan par bya/_/lus kyi brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/thogs med stang thabs tshul du gnas/_/
[\[337a.6\]]ngag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/sngags kyi yi ge drag tu brjod/_/dben pa'i phyogs su gnas bcas la/_/g.yang gzhi gos su gyon nas ni/_/che ba'i nga rgyal rtag tu bskyed/_/wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/spang bar bya ba'i thabs su spyad/_/
[\[337a.7\]]cang shes brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/shes bya kun la 'jug par bya/_/lus kyi rtsal gyi bya ba dag_/gyi ling brtul zhugs chen pos bya/_/phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/gtsang sme med par kun la spyad/_/glang chen myos pa'i brtul zhugs 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]kyis/_/mi 'byed rmongs tshul bstan par bya/_/stag mchog rngam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/dpa' brtul gtum pa'i las chen bya/_/khyung chen mkha' lding brtul zhugs kyis/_/lta ba spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcad/_/gtum thung dom gyi brtul zhugs kyis/_/
[\[337b.2\]]re ba med pa'i las chen bya/_/rgya mtsho gter gyi brtul zhugs kyis/_/yid thub mi ldog brtan par bya/_/lkugs pa lug gi brtul zhugs kyis/_/gti mug bzhin du shes rab ldan/_/ri bo lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/mi 'gyur rab tu brtan par 
[\[337b.3\]]bya/_/nam mkha' lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/yangs dog kun dang bral bar bya/_/gnam lcags lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/drag shul las la sbyar bar bya/_/lag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/mthu stobs dag la spyad par bya/_/kha dog 
[\[337b.4\]]brtul zhugs chen po yis/_/zon bag khu 'phrig spyad par bya/_/glang chen chur 'jug brtul zhugs kyis/_/nges pa'i nga rgyal spyad par bya/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]seng ge'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/grogs ngan la sogs spang bar bya/_/reg 'jam bya yi brtul 
[\[337b.5\]]zhugs kyis/_/'grogs na bde zhing chags par bya/_/sgyu ma rgya yi brtul zhugs kyis/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i las chen bya/_/ce spyang khra yi brtul zhugs kyis/_/gtsang sme med par spyad pa dang /_/thogs med gsod la brtson par bya/_/nga rgyal 
[\[337b.6\]]stag mchog brtul zhugs kyis/_/che ba'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya/_/mkha' lding lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis/_/kun du mdzes pa'i spyod pa spyad/_/rgyal po 'khor skyong brtul zhugs kyis/_/sa thub 'khor dang ldan par bya/_/bcu gnyis dang ni gsum dag 
[\[337b.7\]]gi/_/brtul zhugs blo dang ldan par bya/_/de la sogs te bsam mi khyab/_/ces gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las rnal 'byor gyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chan pos phrin las rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/zhugs nas yang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/'dus 
[\[338a.2\]]pa'i 'khor rnams nyon cig_/btsal med lhun grub dkyil 'khor las/_/phrin las rgya mtsho bsam yas kyang /_/rnal 'byor dgos pa'i dbang dag tu/_/las bzhi dag tu rgyal bas gsungs/_/dang pos zhi ba'i lha yin te/_/gnyis pa rgyas pa zhes 
[\[338a.3\]]su bya/_/gsum pa dbang du sdud pa'i las/_/bzhi pa drag po'i las su gsungs/_/de dag lha yi dkyil 'khor dang /_/gnas dang dus dang rdzas rnams dang /_/dbyibs dang kha dog maN+Dal dang /_/yul dang ting nge 'dzin dag dang /_/phyogs dang stan dang 
[\[338a.4\]]'dug stangs dang /_/tho ba phur pa gtor ma dang /_/bzlas brjod hom dang bskul tshig dang /_/'khor lo me lha'i mtshan nyid dang /_/yul dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ste/_/bcu gnyis dang ni gnyis dag gis/_/bya ba thams cad rdzogs par gsungs/_/ya 
[\[338a.5\]]ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/_/ma zhes bya ba rgyas pa yin/_/dbang du sdud pa ba~M du bshad/_/e nyid drag po'i mtshan nyid do/_/lha yi rnal 'byor rim pa yang /_/rdo rje sems dpa' zhi drag bya/_/rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'dzin/_/rgyas pa'i las ni 
[\[338a.6\]]byed par 'gyur/_/snang ba mtha' yas rgyas pa dang /_/dbang gi las ni byed par 'gyur/_/gdon mi za bas las kun byed/_/yang na drag po nyid la'o/_/kun du bzang pos ci yang byed/_/spyan ni zhi ba'i mchog yin te/_/bsrung ba mA ma kI yis byed/_/gos 
[\[338a.7\]]dkar can gyis dbang du byed/_/sgrol ma las rnams kun la sbyar/_/sa yi snying pos rgyas par byed/_/nam mkha'i snying pos 'phel bar byed/_/lag na rdo rjes drag po byed/_/spyan ras gzigs kyis snying brtse bar/_/yid kyis yid du 'ong bar byed/_/
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]byams pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_/sgrib pa sel bas rnam dag byed/_/kun du bzang pos nor sgrub byed/_/'jam dpal shes rab rno bar byed/_/sgeg mos sangs rgyas mtshan rnams 'grub/_/phreng bas rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_/sangs rgyas yul du 
[\[338b.2\]]phyin par byed/_/glu yis dbyangs snyan grub par byed/_/rig ma dag dang lhan cig rtsen/_/gar gyis phyag rgya gar mchog dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs/_/bdug pas yid 'ong dngos grub thob/_/me tog rab dgyes mdzes par byed/_/
[\[338b.3\]]dI bas 'od gsal mdangs dang ldan/_/dri yis dri nga dag par byed/_/lcags kyu yis ni spyan drang dang /_/rdo rjes dgug pa'i las rnams byed/_/zhags pas 'dren cing 'ching bar byed/_/sgrog gis dbang du byed cing sdom/_/dril bus dgyes sgrol dbab par byed/_/
[\[338b.4\]]byed pa po dang bya ba mos/_/thams cad thams cad kun la sbyor/_/rdul snyed dbang po drug rnams kyis/_/cis 'dul thabs kyis sna tshogs byed/_/khrag 'thung chen pos gti mug 'joms/_/khrag 'thung rdo rjes zhe sdang 'joms/_/rin chen he rus nga 
[\[338b.5\]]rgyal 'joms/_/pad+ma he rus 'dod chags 'joms/_/las kyi he rus phrag dog 'joms/_/khrag 'thung chen pos thim par byed/_/badzra kro d+his 'khyud par byed/_/rat+na kro d+his sbyor bar byed/_/pad+ma kro d+his skyod par byed/_/karma kro d+his 'bebs 
[\[338b.6\]]par byed/_/dkar mo'i tshogs kyis 'gugs par byed/_/rkun mo'i tshogs kyis mthu 'phrog byed/_/rmongs ma'i tshogs kyis myos par byed/_/thal byed mas ni thal bar rlog_/sbos mo'i tshogs kyis dbang du byed/_/gtum mos sgrol zhing myos 
[\[338b.7\]]par byed/_/sme sha can gyis za bar byed/_/ma tshogs mas ni rgyud 'phel byed/_/seng gdong tshogs kyis zil gyis gnon/_/stag gdong tshogs kyis 'joms par byed/_/wa gdong tshogs kyis rol par byed/_/khyi gdong tshogs kyis gsod cing 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]za/_/rgod gdong tshogs kyis rgyug par byed/_/dur byas rnam par 'dren par byed/_/bya rog tshogs kyis dbang du 'du/_/'ug gdong tshogs kyis 'dren cing lta/_/gshed pos 'gugs shing sgrol bar byed/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pas 
[\[339a.2\]]skrod par byed/_/gzhan gyis mi thub mngag gzhug byed/_/rta yis dug rnams 'joms par byed/_/dbyug sngon can gyis gsod par byed/_/stobs chen char 'bebs byed pa'i mchog_/mi g.yo bas ni skrag cing 'khrug_/rdo rje hU~M gis 
[\[339a.3\]]'ching bar byed/_/rnam par rgyal bas gnon par byed/_/khams gsum bdag pos 'joms par byed/_/phra men tshogs rnams mang po kun/_/mngag gzhug pho nya'i las rnams byed/_/slas dang byi mo'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/thams cad 
[\[339a.4\]]thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/mdor na lha yi rnal 'byor ni/_/cis 'dul thabs kyis de ltar ro/_/yid 'ong bkra shis dben pa ru/_/rdo rje zhi ba sgrub par shis/_/me tog nags tshal skyed mos tshal/_/nyams dga' bar ni rgyas par shis/_/kha 
[\[339a.5\]]dog dmar zhing gcong rong mang /_/ri bor gnas su dbang du bya/_/sum mdo grog gle rkang gcig drung /_/rtsub pa'i gnas su drag po bya/_/snga dro zhi ba gung la rgyas/_/srod la dbang bya gung la ni/_/drag po'i las rnams brtsam par bya/_/rdzas dang bsreg bya'i rdzas 
[\[339a.6\]]rnams kyang /_/dkar zhing dmar ba'i rdzas rnams dang /_/zho dang ldan pa'i zhing dag ga_/rtse mo las byas zhi ba'i rdzas/_/ser zhing kha ba'i ror ldan pa'i/_/bar gyi shing las byas pa kun/_/rgyas pa'i las su bsngags pa yin/_/skyur zhing kha dog dmar 
[\[339a.7\]]ba dang /_/drungs pa las byas shing gi rnams/_/dbang gi rdzas su rab tu grags/_/gnag cing rtsub pa tsha ba yi/_/ror ldan rtsa ba'i shing las byas/_/rdo rje drag po nyid la'o/_/zlum po dang ni 'khor lo dag_/zhi ba yi ni las su gsungs/_/zur bzhi zur 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]drug zur brgya dam/_/pad+ma 'am rin chen dbyibs 'dra ba/_/rgyas pa'i las la shis pa'o/_/zla ba kham dang gzhu yi dbyibs/_/pad+mo smyung po'am mkha' 'dra ba/_/dbang du bya ba'i las yin no/_/gru gsum mam ni gru chad dam/_/rdo rje'i dbyibs dang mda' 
[\[339b.2\]]'dra bar/_/byas pa rdo rje drag po la'o/_/dkar po zhi ba ser po rgyas/_/dmar po dbang la nag po drag_/ljang gu spyi yi las su gsungs/_/ser skya zhi rgyas las yin te/_/dmar skya zhi ba dbang gi las/_/sngo skya zhi ba drag po'i las/_/rgyas dang dbang dang drag 
[\[339b.3\]]po la'ang /_/zhi ba'i tshul du sbyar bar bya/_/des na las rnams re re la'ang /_/bzhi bzhi dag tu rgyal bas gsungs/_/zlum po'i thab khung rdo rje yis/_/brgyan pa zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/pad+ma gru bzhi rin po ches/_/brgyan pa rgyas pa'i las su shis/_/
[\[339b.4\]]zla gam khung bu mda' gzhus brgyan/_/dbang du bsdu ba'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/gru gsum rtsang thod kyis brgyan pa/_/drag po spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/_/ljon pa ma dang lcug phran ma/_/sdod cig ma dang me reg ma/_/spyan dang mA ma gos dkar sgrol/_/byin 
[\[339b.5\]]gyis brlab pa'i gnas byas te/_/dad byams snying rje dang ba dang /_/dga' chags btang snyoms khros pa yi/_/ting 'dzin dag gis zhi dang rgyas/_/dbang drag so so'i 'phro 'du bya/_/byang du bltas te zhi ba bya/_/rgyas pa'i tshe na shar du blta/_/dbang la nub tu 
[\[339b.6\]]drag po lho/_/zhi ba ku sha'i khri stengs su/_/rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung du gnas/_/pad+ma'i steng du sems dpa' yi/_/skyil mo krung gis rgyas par bya/_/khri steng dag tu phyed skyil gyis/_/dbang du bsdu ba'i las bya'o/_/sa gzhi gru gsum nyid la ni/_/rus 
[\[339b.7\]]sbal gyi ni rgyas btab kyis/_/mngon par spyod pa brtson par bya/_/zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang /_/zur gsum tho ba'i gtun tshogs kyis/_/las bzhi yum gyi gtun khung du/_/gti mug nga rgyal 'dod chags dang /_/zhe sdang mtshan ma rdul du brdung /_/
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]gser dngul zangs dang lcags dag gam/_/zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la/_/ri rab tshul du rab brjid pa'i/_/phur pa las rnams so so yi/_/lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa la/_/rtse mo ya~M ba~M e yi dbyibs/_/mtshan ma ming du 
[\[340a.2\]]bcas pa la/_/btab na zhi rgyas dbang drag 'gyur/_/dngul phye 'bras chan dkar po la/_/zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor mar sbyar/_/gser phye 'bru chan ser po la/_/rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma sbyar/_/dbang la zangs phye 'bru dmar cha na/_/drag po'i lcags phye 
[\[340a.3\]]sha khrag la'o/_/shAn ting puSh+Ting ba shang dang /_/mA ra ya yi sngags tshig la/_/swA hA swA hA hU~M phaT kyis/_/brgyan pa'i mgo la o~M bzhag pa/_/bzlas pa'i sngags su shes par bya/_/hom khung zlum po gru bzhi dang /_/zla gam gru gsum gdengs pa ru/_/rdo rje 
[\[340a.4\]]rin chen mda' gzhu dang /_/rdo rje rtse dgu'i phyag rgya gzhag_/zho can ser skyur rtsub pa yi/_/yam shing dag la me sbar te/_/lhan ne gzi byin lhun chen dang /_/gtum chen rngam pa'i lha tshogs la/_/las bzhi'i tshul du bsregs na 'grub/_/sngags dang 'dod 
[\[340a.5\]]pa'i ming spel te/_/bskul pa bya ba'i tshig tu bshad/_/ras sam gro ga shing shun la/_/zhi rgyas 'khor lo'i sngags bcas bri/_/lcags gsum ga pur bcug nas ni/_/mchod cing bskul na gdon mi za/_/zhing chen ras sam smad dkris la/_/dbang drag 
[\[340a.6\]]'khor lo'i sngags bcas bri/_/kham phor nang ngam thod par gzhug_/dur khrod gnas la sogs pa ru/_/bskul zhing mnan pa byas na ni/_/gdon mi za bar mnan par 'gyur/_/las bzhi'i me lha'i mtshan nyid ni/_/me yi lha ni snang mtha' yas/_/
[\[340a.7\]]me yi lha mo gos dkar mo/_/thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas ni/_/gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur/_/gdug rtsub rnams la zhi ba sbyar/_/dbul phongs rnams la rgyas pa sbyar/_/dbang ni 'dod gzir rnams la ste/_/zhe sdang can la drag po'i las/_/thams 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_/yid bzhin nam mkha' 'gengs pa dang /_/dgug cing phyi bzhin 'breng ba dang /_/myos nas gas te 'tshig pa ni/_/las bzhi'i 'bras bur rgyal bas gsungs/_/'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor 
[\[340b.2\]]lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las las kyi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des skye 'gro thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_zhugs nas kyang brnag 
[\[340b.3\]]pa'i nan tur 'di dag gsungs so/_/rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang /_/lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang /_/rdo rje spun la 'khu byed pa/_/rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrar gyur dang /_/skye bo yongs la gnod pa dang /_/ma chags 
[\[340b.4\]]pa yi sems can la/_/brnag pa'i nan tur bya bar gsungs/_/dgug dang gsad dang bskam pa dang /_/dbye dang bskrad dang mnan pa dang /_/bcing ba'i las dang bdun dag gis/_/grub par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs/_/dgug pa'i las dag bya ba yang /_/
[\[340b.5\]]bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan byas te/_/rkang rjes nyid kyis blangs la/_/mi rus bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /_/dur khrod ro yi ras dag dang /_/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo yi/_/'gram nyid nas ni blangs pa'i sa/_/rlung gis khyer ba'i shing lo dang /_/grog mkhar 
[\[340b.6\]]sa rnams btags nas su/_/lung bong gcin gyis spru bar bya/_/de nas yan lag tshang ba yi/_/gzugs la snying gar gro ga 'am/_/shing shun legs par glan nas ni/_/ra khyi khrag gis ming bris te/_/hU~M dang phaT kyi bar du gzhug_/drag po'i dkyil 
[\[340b.7\]]'khor gru gsum du/_/mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan/_/gang na gnas pa de nyid nas/_/de yi rnam par shes pa ni/_/thogs med rlung dang 'dra ba ste/_/lcags kyu yis ni snying drangs te/_/ya~M las rlung gis bteg nas ni/_/bdag gi drung du phyin pa dang /_/
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]gzugs brnyan nang du de bcug pa/_/srin bu me khyer 'dra bar gsal/_/zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dam du gzhug_/lcags sgrog phyag rgyas sgrog tu gzhug_/dril bu'i phyag rgyas brtan par bya/_/gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug_/yungs 
[\[341a.2\]]kar rgyal po'i mtshon gyis brdeg_/rdo rje mig gis bltar mngon par/_/nyams pa de nyid gnon par ni/_/nyin mtshan kun la drangs te bsam/_/yang na su~M b+ha'ang lhag par 'jebs/_/de ni dgug pa'i mchog tu gsungs/_/gal te gsad pa'i las 
[\[341a.3\]]bya na/_/dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te/_/dug shing snying po'i tsher ma yis/_/khugs pa'i gzugs de dbug par bya/_/drag por gyur pa'i phur pa yis/_/dpral ba snying mgrin pus mo gnyis/_/gnas lnga dag tu btab par bsgom/_/rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis 
[\[341a.4\]]gdab/_/rdo rje rtse gcig phyag rgya dang /_/be con rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /_/rdo rje brjid pas phur pa gnon/_/bskal pa'i mthar yang zug bsams te/_/gu gul dud pas myos su gzhug_/yungs kar rgyal pos brdeg par bya/_/de nas gzugs kyi dngos 
[\[341a.5\]]po de/_/rab tu rno ba'i mtshon cha yis/_/pho ni rkang pa g.yas nas gtub/_/mo ni rkang pa g.yon nas gtub/_/rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang /_/bcas te 'bar ba'i lha tshogs la/_/drag po hom du sbyin sreg bya/_/nyin mtshan gung la bya bar gsungs/_/las 
[\[341a.6\]]'di byas na nges par yang /_/lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gal te skam pa'i las byas na/_/dgug pa de nyid sbyar byas te/_/de yi ming nas smos nas ni/_/gzugs de dug gi tsher mas dbug_/dug dang skye tshe lan tshwa dang /_/'bru mar tsha bar
